40001001	Ɔmɛni ndi Yesu Kristo kaba kemo bekyuli anyi. Na kási Dawid kaba kani nálɛ kási Abraham kemo.
40001002	Na ɔ́si Abraham lɛlɔ úbalɛ Ɔga Dawid lɛlɔ ni, kaba kammɔ kemo bati anyi atɔ asia ndi amɛni. Abraham, Isak, Yakob,
40001003	Yuda ku nwuna banwani bananabi, Peres ku Sera bani uni ndi Tamar, Hesron, Ram,
40001004	Aminadab, Nahson,
40001005	Salmon, Boas ɔni uni ndi Rahab, Obed ɔni uni ndi Rut, Yisai, Ɔga Dawid.
40001006	Na ɔ́si Dawid lɛlɔ úbalɛ uwi ɔni na Babilonƒuɔ béƒie Israelƒuɔ bésienku bana kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, kaba kammɔ kemo bati anyi ndi amɛni. Dawid, Salomo ɔni uni ndi uleku ɔni na Uria úti dii,
40001007	Rehabeam, Abia, Asa,
40001008	Yehosaƒat, Yoram, Usia,
40001009	Yotam, Ahas, Hiskia,
40001010	Manase, Amon, Yosia,
40001011	Yekonia ku nwuna banwani bananabi.
40001012	Ɔ́si uwi ɔni na Israelƒuɔ bási Babilon bébo úbalɛ uwi ɔni na báwɔ Yesu ni, kaba kammɔ kemo bati anyi ndi amɛni. Yekonia, Sealtiel, Serubabel,
40001013	Abihud, Eliakim, Asor,
40001014	Sadok, Akim, Elihud,
40001015	Eleasar, Matan,
40001016	Yakob, Yoseƒ ɔni néti Maria ɔni náwɔ Yesu ɔni baalɔ banii Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi.
40001017	Anwuɔsu ɔ́si Abraham lɛlɔ úbalɛ Dawid lɛlɔ ni, ɔdi kaba leevu-ine. Na ɔ́si Dawid lɛlɔ úbalɛ uwi ɔni na Babilonƒuɔ béƒie Israelƒuɔ bésienku bana kalɔ lɛlɔ lɛnɔ ɔdi kaba leevu-ine. Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́si uwi ɔmmɔ kemo úbalɛ uwi ɔni báwɔ Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ ɔdi kaba leevu-ine.
40001018	Ɔmɛni ndi kalɛ na ɔ́bla asa na badubɔwɔ Yesu Kristo. Bévele Maria béte Yoseƒ, nsu asa na badubuti lɛlɔ ni, Maria ɔ́nu ɔ́ti ka ɔda kaƒɔ. Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun náya na úbo úte lɛni.
40001019	Yoseƒ ɔdi ukyuli ɔni nse siin na Katɔti anumi. Nsu ka útayɔ ka uuwi Maria anumi kalɔ na kadi akɔ ɔsu ni, ɔ́bla kasusu ɔnii ɔɔnyonu-nwu kpoo.
40001020	Ka ɔ́bla ɔkya kasusu kamɛni na útatɛ ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina-nwu na kɔna kemo, na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Yoseƒ, Dawid kaba kemo ubi, tayia ka eti Maria aani ƒ^ulekudi kalɛ. Ɔsika kaƒɔ kani na ɔda mɛni ni, Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun kemo na ɔ́si.
40001021	Na ɔdubɔwɔ ɔnanabi. Na awɔ Yoseƒ asia-nwu lɛnyi anii Yesu, ɔsika anwu ndubudie nwuna bekyuli ɔlɛku bana ekpidi kemo."
40001022	Maria lɛlɔ etemila amɛni álɛ lɛni kalɛ na ala ani na Katɔti ɔ́su úse ɔkɛ nwuna kenye udiene lɛlɔ ebo ete lɛni sɔsɔ. Ɔ́su ɔnii,
40001023	"Adagyaa ɔdi ɔdubɔda kaƒɔ na ɔwɔ ubi ɔnanabi. Na bekyuli badubɔlɔ-nwu banii Imanuel." Na nwuna kalɔ budie ndi Katɔti ulieku-bu.
40001024	Anwuɔsu uwi ɔni na Yoseƒ ɔ́gyinya ni, úti Maria ɔ́bla ulekudi aani kalɛ na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu.
40001025	Nsu ni, Yoseƒ ku Maria baaagyi lɛlɔ aani ɔnana ku uleku kalɛ útédu uwi ɔni na ɔ́wɔ ubidi ɔnanabi ɔmmɔ. Na Yoseƒ ɔ́sia-nwu lɛnyi ɔnii Yesu.
40002001	Uwi ɔni na Herode ɔɔdi lɛga ni, báwɔ Yesu na ɔma ɔni baalɔ Betlehem na Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na uwi ɔmmɔ kani kemo ni, benengu bani mɔɔtɛya ala ani mɔɔlɛ́ na ayabi lɛlɔ taati badi bási ɔƒɛ katukɔ bébo Yerusalem.
40002002	Na béye banini, "Wɛ na báwɔ ubi ɔni ndubɔdi lɛga na Yudaƒuɔ kalɔ lɛlɔ? Bɔ́nu nwuna lɛyabi na ɔƒɛ katukɔ. Na búbo bɔnii bubemwi-nwu."
40002003	Uwi ɔni na Ɔga Herode únu litemi lɛmɛni ni, ɔƒɛ ɔ́da anwu ku bekyuli bani nkya Yerusalem mmɔ ƒui geen.
40002004	Anwuɔsu ɔ́lɔ Katɔti bakpane benengu bammɔ ƒui ku ɔda bubo ala batinane ɔ́sala na úye-ma ɔnini, "Wɛ na badubɔwɔ Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ?"
40002005	Amu na básu-nwu banini, "Betlehem na badubɔwɔ-nwu na Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ, ɔsika lɛni na Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi únweni ɔnii,
40002006	'Awɔ Betlehem, bekyuli baasu ka adi ɔma ubliidi na Yuda kalɔ lɛlɔ. Nsu uuuse lɛni! Ɔsika ƒula kemo na ɔtɔnkune ubendi ɔdi ɔdubɔlɛ ɔsi na watɔnku mina kadi bekyuli Israelƒuɔ.' "
40002007	Anwuɔsu Herode ɔ́lɔ baƒɔ bani nási ɔƒɛ katukɔ mmɔ úsienku kɔƒɛlɛ, na úye-ma únu uwi ɔni geen bánu ka lɛyabi lɛmmɔ lɛ́lɛ.
40002008	Amu na údie-ma ulu ɔnii beteesie Betlehem. Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bisie na bitáwia ɔnamu ɔmmɔ kaduɛ. Na si bɛnu-nwu ni, bɛsɔ binwini bibasu-mi na ami lɛnɔ ntémwi-nwu."
40002009	-
40002010	Amu na baƒɔ bammɔ báyu ulu. Na ka bésela ni, básɔ bánu lɛyabi lɛni kani na bánu na ɔƒɛ katukɔ mmɔ. Na ka bánu-ni ni, ebiti áda-ma geen. Ɔsika lɛyabi lɛmmɔ lɛ́tɔnku-ma lítédi línye kesii kani na ubi ɔmmɔ ɔtɛ.
40002011	Na ka béduo ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo na bánu ubi ɔmmɔ ku uni Maria ni, bálɛ akɔnkɔ na bémwi-nwu. Na báƒɛnimi bana kɔvumi na béte-nwu ala abuni adi ani ndi sika ugyiedi ku oloƒui ku klobo.
40002012	Nwuna kama ni, Katɔti ɔ́lɛ-ma na kɔna kemo ɔnii basɔ batasia Herode kudɔ. Anwuɔsu básia ulu ɔbambadi lɛlɔ bésie bana kalɔ lɛlɔ.
40002013	Ka baƒɔ bammɔ bátɔlɔ kama ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina Yoseƒ na kɔna kemo. Na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Herode ɔdubɔya na bawia ubi ɔmmɔ kama ulu na badu-nwu. Anwuɔsu ta, na eti ubi ɔmmɔ ku uni na bikeli bisie Egyipte kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na bitélie mmɔ utédu uwi ɔni na masu-ɔ nnii, 'Sɔ nwini bo.' "
40002014	Usien ɔmmɔ kani na Yoseƒ útiku ubi ɔmmɔ ku uni na békeli bésie Egyipte.
40002015	Na bélie mmɔ útédu uwi ɔni na Herode úkpi. Kalɛ na bákya mmɔ ɔ́ya na ala ani na Katɔti ɔ́su úse ɔkɛ nwuna kenye bediene lɛlɔ ébo éte lɛni ɔnii, "Lɛ́lɔ mina Ubi lɛ́siku Egyipte."
40002016	Uwi ɔni na Herode úti-nwu ka baƒɔ bani nási ɔƒɛ katukɔ mmɔ bátɔlɔ-nwu ni, úti kɔnyi geen. Anwuɔsu ɔ́ya na nwuna bekpone bésie Betlehem ku amadɔ mmɔ ƒui. Na bátádu bebi bananabi bani náaƒɔ akwa anyɔ ku bani nétedu tɔ lɛni aani kalɛ na baƒɔ bammɔ béti bátina ka lɛyabi lɛmmɔ lɛ́lɛ kenye.
40002017	Banamu bamɛni bɔdu bɔ́ya na lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yeremia ɔ́su úse líbo líte lɛni sɔsɔ ɔnii,
40002018	"Bekyuli bénu kɔku kɔdi na Rama ka beewulo momoomo. Rahel bawɔ beewulo bana bebi. Na belenu kɔnu bɔsia, ɔsika bebi bammɔ békpi."
40002019	Ka Herode úkpi ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina Yoseƒ na kɔna kemo na Egyipte.
40002020	Na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Ta, na eti ubi ɔmmɔ ku uni na asɔ enwini esie Israel kalɔ lɛlɔ. Bekyuli bani náwia ka badu ubi ɔmmɔ béekpi."
40002021	Anwuɔsu Yoseƒ ɔ́ta na úti ubi ɔmmɔ ku uni na bátɔlɔ bésie Israel kalɔ lɛlɔ.
40002022	Nsu uwi ɔni na Yoseƒ únu ɔnii Arkelao ɔni ndi Herode ubidi nébo úbelie ɔti kenye aani Yudea ɔga ni, ɔ́yia mmɔ busie. Na ka Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi úbo-nwu ɔda na kɔna kemo ɔnii utesie mmɔ ni, údeyi úsie Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ.
40002023	Na ka úduo mmɔ ni, útélie ɔma ɔni baalɔ banii Nasaret. Na bana mmɔ bulie ɔ́ya na Katɔti kenye udiene litemi lɛni na ɔ́su úse ɔnii, "Bekyuli badubɔlɔ-nwu banii Nasareni," úbo úte lɛni sɔsɔ.
40003001	Uwi ɔmmɔ kama ni, Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane úsie ketele kani nkya Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ, na úse kalɔ ɔɔkɔ́ lɛsa
40003002	ɔnini, "Binwini kama bɛkya bina ekpidi, ɔsika uwi ɔni na Katɔti ɔdi lɛga na bula kɔyi kemo úude."
40003003	Yohane ɔmɛni ndi ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesaia ɔ́su úse ɔnini, "Ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔva na ketele kemo ɔnii, 'Binye kagyumana bite Blɔti. Bɛklibi bina lɛlɔ bise kaduɛ bite nwuna bubo.' "
40003004	Na awu ɔni na Yohane ɔkya ni, ɔƒlumu linwini na béti bédi-nwu. Na ebuo ɔku kabuli kada-nwu kevobi. Na nwuna adila ani na ɔɔdi ndi uwɔ ku baalɔlɔ bani muubile edula.
40003005	Na bekyuli bási Yerusalem ku Yudea kalɛkɛ ku Yordan ketu amadɔ ƒui bébo-nwu kudɔ.
40003006	Bédie bana ala ekpidi kalɔ na Yohane ɔ́kpila-ma ntu na Yordan ketu kemo.
40003007	Uwi ɔni na Yohane ɔ́nu Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku Sadukiƒuɔ pii ka badubo na ɔkpila-ma ntu ni, ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, "Amii bani mbo likyulikpi aani balakpi! Bitatɔlɔ lɛlɔ bɛnii si bákpila-mii ntu kani ni, ɔ́sa na bɛ́lɛ Katɔti kɔtu kɔni na ɔdubɔni bekyuli bekpidi kemo.
40003008	Bɛtina na bina ɔbladu kemo ka bínwini kama bɛ́kya bina alaekpidi.
40003009	Na bitakali ka Abraham kaba kemo bebi bɛdi ɔsu ni, Katɔti ɔɔɔdubo-mii kɔtu bɔni. Mɔɔsu-mii nnii Katɔti ɔkana udie kaba ɔsiku atakpɛ amɛni kemo ute Abraham.
40003010	Bɛɛnu ka bada kadadi benye kugyii lɛlɔ na bada-ku ku ligyiitu. Kugyii biala naaanwu ebi buni ni, badubɔmɛnɛ-ku bakya lɛgyavonku kemo.
40003011	"Ami mɔɔkpila-mii ntu taatina ka bínwini kayi na bɛ́da ekpidi bɔbla bɛ́ya. Nsu ukyuli ɔni nkpɛ-mi kama ɔdubo ni, anwu ndubuti Katɔti Kɔyu ku ogya ɔkpila-mii. Ukyuli ɔmmɔ utulo-mi, na ńtamanku ka lɛbla kabla lite-nwu muedi.
40003012	Ɔda nwuna kɔɔlɛ kɔni na ɔdubɔƒɛ nwuna edula udie na uti uwi unwu kemo. Nsu ɔdubɔkyula aƒaƒa ku lɛmuyɔ lɛkladi na ogya ɔni naaadubo buni kudii kemo!"
40003013	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Yesu ɔ́si Galilea úbo Yohane kudɔ na Yordan ketu kɔtu ɔnii Yohane ɔkpila-nwu ntu.
40003014	Nsu ka Yohane ɔ́yɔ ka Yesu ɔvumana nwuna kasusu kammɔ ɔsu ni, ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, "Ami mmomu na ɔlɛka libo-ɔ kudɔ, na ɔɔɔdi awɔ na ɔlɛka ebo-mi kudɔ anii nkpila-a ntu!"
40003015	Nsu Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Awɔ nu kalɔ na bɔbla-nwu lɛni ɔƒɛni asa. Ɔsika ɔmɛni ndubɔya na bɔbla Katɔti lɛƒɔyɔ." Anwuɔsu Yohane únu kalɔ.
40003016	Amu ka Yohane ɔ́kpila Yesu ntu na ɔ́nya ɔ́lɛ ntu bɔmmɔ kemo kani na katɔ kálɛmi na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́si kɔɔyu aani abloduma kalɛ, na kúbelie-nwu lɛlɔ.
40003017	Na bénu Katɔti lɛdi ka lɛ́si katɔ lɛnini, "Ɔmɛni ndi mina Ubi Ɔyɔne ɔni mɔɔƒɔ́-mi anu geen."
40004001	Amu na Katɔti Kɔyu kútiku Yesu kúsienku ketele kemo kesii kani na ukisine ɔmmɔ ukpoku-nwu ɔnu.
40004002	Na ka Yesu úlie kɔka usien ku ɔƒɛ emeyi aavlene kama ni, kɔka kúbo kɔɔda-nwu.
40004003	Amu na ukisine ɔmmɔ úbo-nwu kudɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Si Katɔti ubidi na adi ni, su atabi amɛni na enwini adila."
40004004	Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔɔsu ɔnii, 'Adila lɛti eléte ngba. Mmomu Katɔti litemi biala lɛlɔ bɔdi muute ngba geen.' "
40004005	Amu na ukisine ɔmmɔ ɔ́kpanku Yesu úsienku Yudaƒuɔ ɔma unengudi kemo. Na úti-nwu útényene Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ likpo lɛni nákuku lítulo ƒui.
40004006	Amu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Si Katɔti Ubidi na adi ni, na aba lɛgyu eténye kalɔ. Ɔsika Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔɔsu ɔnii, 'Katɔti ɔdubɔtala nwuna batu na bagyu-ɔ bada enu kemo ɔni na ƒula ɔgba muedi uletulo atabi adi.' "
40004007	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Nsu Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔmmɔ ɔɔsu ɔnii, 'Tasɔ ƒula Unwoti Katɔti anu.' "
40004008	Amu na ukisine ɔmmɔ úti Yesu úsienku kɔbi kangyaa kɔdi lili. Mmɔ na ɔ́tina-nwu kayawi agala ku ana bukeye ƒui.
40004009	Na ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, "Si álɛ akɔnkɔ na émwi-mi ni, ndubuti ala amɛni ƒui lite-ɔ."
40004010	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Satan, gyu-mi lɛlɔ! Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Ƒula Unwoti Katɔti kani na ɔlɛka alɛ akɔnkɔ emwi.' "
40004011	Amu na ukisine ɔmmɔ ɔ́tɔlɔ Yesu kudɔ, na Katɔti batu bébo bébebunku-nwu.
40004012	Uwi ɔni na Yesu únu ka béƒie Yohane bákya ɔtɔ ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Galilea.
40004013	Útelie Nasaret, mmomu úsie útélie Kapernaum, ɔma ɔni na uwi Galilea Ɛpu kudɔ na Sebulon ku Naƒtali kalɔ lɛlɔ.
40004014	Úlie mmɔ kalɛ na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesaia kenye kani na ɔ́su úse kebo kete lɛni ɔnini,
40004015	-
40004016	"Sebulon ku Naƒtali bekyuli bani nli lɛdisa kemo na ɛpu ulu lɛlɔ na Yordan ketu ɔvi ku Galilea kesii kani na bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ lɛnɔ belie ni, badubɔnu bukeye. Na bani na belie kukpi ɔgbankpi kemo ni, Katɔti bukeye bɔdubuwi-ma lɛlɔ."
40004017	Ɔ́si uwi ɔni na Yesu útélie Kapernaum ni, úse kalɔ ɔɔkɔ́ lɛsa ɔnini, "Binwini kama bɛkya bina ekpidi, ɔsika uwi ɔni na Katɔti ɔdi lɛga na bula kɔyi kemo úude."
40004018	Na ka Yesu ɔkɛ Galilea Ɛpu kɔtu ni, ɔ́nu banwani inyɔ badi bani ndi asawu bewine. Ama ndi Simon ɔni baalɔ Petro ku ɔnwani Andrea ka bada asawu beedie lɛna na Ɛpu ɔmmɔ kemo.
40004019	Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Ɔ́si ɔƒɛni ni, bɛsiaku-mi na lɛtina-mii kalɛ na beedie bekyuli teete Katɔti."
40004020	Mmɔ kani na báda bana lɛsawu béwi na básiaku-nwu kama.
40004021	Amu ka úsie blii ni, ɔ́sɔ ɔ́nu banwani inyɔ badi bani baalɔ Yakobo ku Yohane bani ndi Sebedeo bebi. Ama ku bana ɔti Sebedeo ɔmɛni bakya ɔkɔlɔ kemo baaklibi bana lɛsawu asa na Yesu ɔ́lɔ-ma.
40004022	Mmɔ kani na báda bana ɔti bákya ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo na ama lɛnɔ básiaku-nwu kama.
40004023	Yesu ɔ́vi Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui na ɔ́tina ala na Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ. Na ɔ́kɔ lɛsa na Katɔti lɛgadi litemi buni lɛlɔ. Na ɔ́bwi bekyuli bani muuƒi lɛlɛ lidu lidu ƒui.
40004024	Nwuna lɛlɔ litemi lígyingya na Siria kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui. Anwuɔsu bekyuli bákpanku balɛne bani na lɛlɛ lidu lidu liikpóku-ma béboku. Na badi ni, ayu ekpidi elie-ma lɛlɔ eekpóku-ma. Na badi beeƒi kalɛ teebo. Badi lɛnɔ lɛlɔ kakɛ kékpi-ma. Na Yesu ɔ́bwi-ma ƒui.
40004025	Bekyuli pii bási Galilea ku lɛma linengudi leevu lɛdi kemo ku Yerusalem ku Yudea kalɔ ku Yordan ketu ɔvi ƒui bábasiaku Yesu kama.
40005001	Na ka Yesu ɔ́nu bekyuli pii bani nsiaku-nwu ni, úsie kɔbi kɔdi lili na úlie kalɔ. Mmɔ na nwuna basiakune bákpɛ béde-nwu.
40005002	Na úse kalɔ ɔɔtina bekyuli bammɔ ƒui ala ɔnini,
40005003	"Lɛlɔ litaayɔ bekyuli bani nánu báti ka Katɔti lɛti lɛlɔ na basia anu. Ama ndubuduo Katɔti Lɛga Kadikɔ.
40005004	Lɛlɔ litaayɔ bekyuli bani muuwulo kɔnyana. Katɔti ɔdubɔsia-ma kɔnu.
40005005	Lɛlɔ litaayɔ bekyuli bani muuboku lɛlɔ kalɔ. Ama badubɔdi kayawi lɛlɔ ala aani kalɛ na Katɔti ɔ́su úse.
40005006	Lɛlɔ litaayɔ bekyuli bani na anumi eegyie-ma ka belie siin na Katɔti anumi. Badubɔkɛ lɛla lɛni mayɔ-ma kaƒɔ.
40005007	Lɛlɔ litaayɔ bekyuli bani mɔɔnu bana bekyulikpana kɔnyana. Katɔti ɔdubɔnu-ma kɔnyana.
40005008	Lɛlɔ litaayɔ bekyuli bani kayi kemo nse nwaa. Ama ndubunye Katɔti anumi.
40005009	Lɛlɔ litaayɔ bekyuli bani mɔɔklibi bekyuli ntɛ. Katɔti ɔdubɔlɔ-ma ɔnii nwuna bebi geen.
40005010	Lɛlɔ litaayɔ ama bani na bekyuli beekpóku ka belie siin na Katɔti anumi ɔsu. Ama ndubuduo Katɔti Lɛga Kadikɔ.
40005011	"Lɛlɔ litaayɔ-mii si bekyuli beedumi-mii na beekpóku-mii na baanyi ɔkɔ taasia-mii ka bɛsiaku-mi ɔsu.
40005012	Ebiti ada-mii na lɛlɔ lɛnɔ lɛyɔ-mii, ɔsika bibo lɛyuƒɔla bonwu na katɔ. Lɛni kani na békpoku Katɔti kenye bediene bani nágyu batɔ-mii.
40005013	"Amii nse aani mma bite bekyuli ƒui. Nsu si mma bɔmmɔ emini ása ni, ulu ɔdi uuubo ɔni na basɔ bakya-mu emini. Na ka kɔsia kɔdi kuuubo-mu lɛlɔ ɔsu ni, beebó-mu teewiakun na bekyuli banya-mu bavi.
40005014	"Amii nse aani bukeye bite kayawi ƒui. Ɔma ɔni nsia kɔbi lili ni, ulabɛ.
40005015	Ukyuli biala ulátu asogya teebi-nwu ala. Mmomu uuti taaƒala katɔ kalɛ na ɔdi biala nédu mmɔ ɔnu bukeye.
40005016	Lɛni kani na ɔdi ka bina ablala ekeye aani asogya ute bekyuli. Na banu bina ala abuni aani bɛɛbla bati kalɛ na bemwi bina Katɔti.
40005017	"Bitakali bɛnii líbo nnii mbada Mose ɔda bubo ku ala ani na Katɔti kenye bediene bátina lidie. Ńtebo nnii mbada-nya lidie munu munu. Mmomu ni, líbo kalɛ na ala ani bátina mmɔ ebo ete lɛni.
40005018	Na mɔɔyá na bɛti geen ka ni, na katɔ ku kalɔ anumi ni, balada lɛla linwi ina dɛ na lise blii suɛ muedi beledie na ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ kemo wetédu ka ala ani na ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ bɔɔtina búbo búte lɛni.
40005019	Anwuɔsu si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́ta unye ɔda bubo bɔmɛni lɛlɔ na ɔ́tina bekyuli bamba lɛnɔ ɔnii babla lɛni ni, balabu-nwu na Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma. Nsu ukyuli ɔni madi ɔda bubo bɔmɛni lɛlɔ na watina bekyuli bamba lɛnɔ ɔnii babla lɛni ni, badubɔbu-nwu geen na Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma.
40005020	Anwuɔsu mɔɔsu-mii nwaa nnii asa na bɛdubɔkana na biduo Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ni, ɔdi ka bilie siin kalɛ na Katɔti ɔɔwia bitulo ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ.
40005021	"Kuuku ni, bínu ka básu bekyuli banii, 'Tadu ukyuli.' Na ukyuli ɔni mabla lɛni ni, ɔlɛka batɛku-nwu litemi.
40005022	Nsu ɔƒɛni ni, ami mɔɔsu-mii nnii ukyuli ɔni meti kɔnyi makya ɔnwani ni, badubɔtɛku-nwu litemi. Na ukyuli ɔni lɛnɔ masu ɔnwani ɔnii, 'Aaadi ukyuli ɔdi' ni, badubɔlɔ-nwu benengu anumi. Na ukyuli ɔni masu ɔnwani ɔnii, 'Ɔdɔlɔdi na adi' ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔni-nwu kɔtu na lɛgyavonku lɛmmɔ kemo.
40005023	Anwuɔsu si anii eeti etela esienku Katɔti na nwuna lɛkpabi lɛlɔ na ényimo ka ƒ^ɔnwani ɔda-a kaƒɔ ni,
40005024	da etela ammɔ se lɛkpabi lɛmmɔ anumi na esie kɔnakunwi na awɔ ku ƒ^ɔnwani biwi kenye ntu asa na ebo ebeti etela ammɔ akpa ete Katɔti.
40005025	"Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔnii uuti-ɔ usienku litemi katɛkɔ ni, wia uwi na awɔ ku-nwu bɛka-ni bɔklibi. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni asa na bísie bítéduo litemi katɛkɔ mmɔ ni, ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔdubuti-ɔ ute litemi ɔtɛne. Na anwu lɛnɔ ɔdubuti-ɔ ute beƒiene na bakya-a ɔtɔ.
40005026	Na mɔɔsu-ɔ nwaa nnii adubɔkya mmɔ utálɛ uwi ɔni na áƒɔ kayu kani na ada ƒui áwɔlɔ.
40005027	"Bínu ka básu banii, 'Bagya ku bele batadi kɔsɔnɔ.'
40005028	Na ami mɔɔsu-mii nnii ɔnana ɔni manu uleku ɔbambadi na wada-nwu ɔkwɛ ni, ɔ́bla likpidi na nwuna kayi kemo.
40005029	Anwuɔsu si ƒula kɔdianu lɛnimi lɛɛyá na aabla likpidi ni, die-ni vaakun. Ɔdia ute-ɔ ka ƒula lɛlɔ kakɛ kadi kayii utulo si Katɔti úti awɔ ukyuli umodi ɔmmɔ ƒui ɔ́kya lɛgyavonku kemo.
40005030	Na si ƒula kɔdianu kɔnu mɔɔyá-a na aabla likpidi ni, kulo-ku vaakun. Ɔdia ute-ɔ ka ƒula lɛlɔ kakɛ kadi kayii utulo si Katɔti úti awɔ ukyuli umodi ɔmmɔ ƒui ɔ́kya lɛgyavonku kemo.
40005031	"Básu banii, 'Ɔnana biala ɔni manyonu ulekudi ni, ute-nwu ɔku ka ɔ́nyonu-nwu.'
40005032	Nsu ami mɔɔsu-mii nnii si ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́nyonu ulekudi ɔni na ɔɔɔdi kɔsɔnɔ na ɔ́di ni, ɔnana ɔmmɔ náya na ɔ́di kɔsɔnɔ. Na ɔnana ɔni meti uleku ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ ɔ́di kɔsɔnɔ.
40005033	"Kuuku ni, bínu lɛnɔ ka básu bekyuli banii, 'Bitalɛ kenye kani bíse kama. Na bɛbla bɛsia kenye kani na bise bite Blɔti lɛlɔ.'
40005034	Nsu ɔƒɛni ni, ami mɔɔsu-mii nnii bitakpali ala si biisé kenye kadi. Bitakpali ala bitalɔ katɔ, ɔsika mmɔ ndi Katɔti lɛgaboku.
40005035	Bitakpali ala bitalɔ kalɔ, ɔsika aka ndi Katɔti lɛgba kanyakɔ. Na bitakpali ala bitalɔ Yerusalem, ɔsika mmɔ ndi Katɔ Ɔga Ɔyikune Ƒui ɔma.
40005036	Na bitakpali ala na bɛlɔ bina lili, ɔsika biiibo ɔyikun na bɛya na bina lili linwini lɛƒuala iye lɛnwu.
40005037	Bɛya na bina ɛɛn ɔbla ɛɛn, na bina oowo ɔbla oowo. Si bíti lɛla bamba bíbunku ɔmɛni lɛlɔ ni, na ɔmmɔ ɔdi ukisine ɔmmɔ ablala.
40005038	"Binu ka básu banii, 'Si ábwɛ ƒula ukyulikpana lɛnumi ni, babwɛ awɔ lɛdi lɛnɔ. Na si áƒɛ ƒula ukyulikpana lɛnyi ni, baƒɛ awɔ lɛdi lɛnɔ.'
40005039	Nsu ɔƒɛni ni, ami mɔɔsu-mii nnini, bitedie bina bakpana ekpidi ani na bábla-mii kasi. Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́ƒiɛmi-ɔ kɔdianu ɔtugya ni, nwini kɔmii ɔdi lɛnɔ te-nwu.
40005040	Na si ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔwia-a katɛ ɔnii ɔɔƒɔ́ ƒula awu ɔtɔdi ni, die ɔni na akya ewi-nwu lɛlɔ lɛnɔ te-nwu.
40005041	Na si bekpone akɔ ɔdi únye-ɔ lɛlɔ ɔnii tiku-nwu etila na bisie liluku linwi ni, awɔ sie anyɔ.
40005042	Si ukyuli ɔdi úye-ɔ lɛla lɛdi ni, te-nwu. Na si kevokɔ na ɔdi lɛnɔ uye-ɔ ni, na ete-nwu.
40005043	"Bínu ka básu banii, 'Bɛyɔ bina bekyulikpana na bini bina bekisine!'
40005044	Nsu ɔƒɛni ni, ami mɔɔsu-mii nnii bɛyɔ bina bekisine na bɛkpali katɔ bite bekyuli bani muukpóku-mii.
40005045	Na bɛdubunwini Katɔti ɔni nkya katɔ bebi geen. Ɔsika ɔɔyá na nwuna ɔƒɛ ɔɔlɛ́ teewi bekyuli bekpidi ku babuni ƒui lɛlɔ likeke. Na ɔnantu lɛnɔ ɔɔna teete bekyuli bani mɔɔbla ala abuni ku bani mɔɔbla ekpidi.
40005046	Si bekyuli bani mɔɔyɔ́-mii kani na amii lɛnɔ bɛɛyɔ́ ni, Katɔti ɔɔɔdubo-mii kayu kadi bɔƒɔ. Lɛni kani na kuyi baƒɔne lɛnɔ baabla.
40005047	Na si bina bakpana lɛti na biigyele ni, bítabla lɛla lɛdi bítagya. Ama bani naaadi baƒɔtaadine muedi ni, baabla lɛni.
40005048	Bɛbla sɛɛn aani kalɛ na bina Ɔti ɔni nkya katɔ use sɛɛn.
40006001	"Bɛnu kaduɛ kalɛ na bilabla lɛbuni bɛnii bekyuli banu-mii. Ɔsika si bɛ́bla lɛni ni, Katɔti ulaƒɔ-mii kayu kadi na Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma.
40006002	Anwuɔsu si éte ukyuli lɛla lɛdi ni, tebo-ni kudu aani kalɛ na anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli baabla. Ama beebó kudu na kasalakɔ ku ɔmankemo kalɛ na bekyuli bemwi-ma. Na mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii báakɛ bana lɛyuƒɔla na kayawi kamɛni kemo.
40006003	Anwuɔsu si eebunku ukyuli ɔdi ni, bunku-nwu kalɛ na ƒula ɔkpana ɔbuni ƒui muedi uláti lɛla lɛni na ábla.
40006004	Na ƒula Katɔti ɔni mɔɔnu ala abuni ani na bekyuli bátanu uwi ɔni na aabla-nya ni, ɔdubɔƒɔ-ɔ kayu.
40006005	"Na si bɛɛkpali katɔ ni, bitabla ala aani anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli kalɛ. Ama baayɔ́ ka bata benye Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ ku ɔmankemo ekpo ekpo asa bakpali katɔ kalɛ na bekyuli ƒui banu-ma. Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii báakɛ bana lɛyuƒɔla biala ƒui.
40006006	Na si aakpali katɔ ni, duo ƒula katɔma na akalɛ ɔtɔ, na akpali ƒ^ɔti ɔni na balanu. Na anwu ɔni mɔɔnu-ɔ uwi ɔni na bekyuli bamba balánu-ɔ ni, ɔdubɔƒɔ-ɔ kayu.
40006007	"Na si bɛɛkpali katɔ ni, bitasu etemila keeke bitasia kama aani kalɛ na ama bani naaadi baƒɔtaadine baabla. Ama baakali banii bana butemi pii bɔdubɔya na bakɛ lɛla lɛni na baawia.
40006008	Bitalɛ-ma, ɔsika bina Katɔti ɔgyi ala ani na bɛɛwia asa na biiye-nwu.
40006009	Anwuɔsu lɛni na ɔlɛka bɛkpali katɔ bɛsu bɛnii, 'Bula Ɔti ɔni nkya katɔ, balɔ-ɔ lɛnyi buni.
40006010	Ƒula lɛga kadikɔ kebo-bu akɔ. Babla ƒula lɛƒɔyɔ na kalɔ lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na use na katɔ.
40006011	Te-bu bula ɔmwi limeyi adila.
40006012	Na eti bula ekpidi akyiɛ-bu aani kalɛ na buuti taakyiɛ bani mɔɔƒiɔ́-bu.
40006013	Taya na buduo bukpoku taanu kemo, na edie-bu alɛku alaekpidi akɔ. Ɔsika lɛga bɔdi ku ɔyikun ku bukeye bɔdi awɔ ɔdi uwi ƒui. Ɔsia lɛni.'
40006014	"Na si bíti bina bekyulikpana bɔƒiɔ bɛkyiɛ-ma ni, bina Katɔti lɛnɔ ɔdubuti bina ɔdi ɔkyiɛ amii lɛnɔ.
40006015	Nsu si bíteti bina bekyulikpana bɔƒiɔ bitakyiɛ-ma ni, bina Katɔti lɛnɔ uleti bina bɔƒiɔ ulakyiɛ-mii.
40006016	"Na si biilie kɔka ni, bitabla anumi nyanyaanya aani anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli kalɛ. Baanyina anumi kalɛ na ukyuli biala ɔnu-ma ɔti ka beelie kɔka sɔsɔ. Mɔɔsu-mii nwaa nnii báaƒɔ bana lɛyuƒɔla ƒui báwɔlɔ.
40006017	Si biilie kɔka ni, bɛƒɔ anumi na bigyeli lili.
40006018	Ɔmɛni ɔdubɔya na bekyuli baláti banii biilie kɔka. Mmomu ƒ^ɔti ɔni nkya kesii biala ndubɔti. Na anwu ɔni mɔɔnu ala ani na bekyuli balánu ni, anwu kani ndubɔƒɔ-mii kayu.
40006019	"Bitatɛ akɛla bitesie bitete lɛlɔ na kayawi kamɛni kemo. Kayawi mɛni ni, kubweyi kɔdububile-nya na etili, na beyune lɛnɔ beduo beyu-nya.
40006020	Mmomu ni, bɛbla ala abuni ani menwini lɛyuƒɔla mete-mii na katɔ. Mmɔ ni, kubweyi kulebile-nya na eletili, na beyune lɛnɔ beleduo beletéyu-nya.
40006021	Ɔsika kesii kani na ƒula akɛla ese ni, mmɔ na aasia lɛnu.
40006022	"Anumi ese aani asogya ute ɔlɔna. Na si ƒula anumi aanu nwaa ni, bukeye bɔdubɔƒɔ awɔ ukyuli umodi ɔmmɔ ƒui.
40006023	Nsu si ƒula anumi alánu nwaa ni, lɛdisa lɛdubɔƒɔ-ɔ lɛlɔ ƒui. Anwuɔsu si ƒula bukeye búnwini lɛdisa ni, na ɔdubɔbla-a suu geen.
40006024	"Ukyuli biala ulákana na wabla benwoti inyɔ kabla. Ɔdubukisi unwi na ɔyɔ ɔkladi litemi. Na ɔdubɔdi unwi etemila lɛlɔ, na ɔta unye ɔkladi etemila lɛlɔ. Alakana Katɔti ku lɛlakɛ kabla bɔsala.
40006025	Anwuɔsu mɔɔsu-mii nnii biteti kasusu pii na bɔdi ku bɔni iye bina adala lɛlɔ. Ɔsika ngba bɔƒɔ kuye butulo adila. Na ɔlɔna lɛnɔ ɔ́ƒɔ kuye utulo adala.
40006026	Bɛnu baasɛ ka balátuma na baláklibi edula teese teete lɛlɔ na linwu kemo, nsu bina Katɔti ɔɔnu-ma lɛlɔ. Na ɔdubɔnu amii lɛlɔ utulo-ma, ɔsika bɛ́ƒɔ kuye bítulo-ma.
40006027	Ukyuli ɔdi ulakana na wabla na wakuku webu ka uuti bɔkuku bɔmmɔ kasusu pii ɔsu.
40006028	"Anwuɔsu bɛsɔ biteti kasusu pii na adala lɛlɔ. Bɛnu kalɛ na egyii anwula aalɛ́ lili. Alábla kabla kadi na beledi adi lɛnɔ teete lɛlɔ.
40006029	Nsu mɔɔsu-mii nnii Ɔga Salomo ku nwuna lɛlakɛ muedi ni, nwuna adala átadia bɔnu aani anwula amɛni kemo ɔdi.
40006030	Katɔti muute eveteli amɛni bɔdia lɛni. Na eveteli amɛni ni, bɔkana bɔnu ɔmwi. Na kɔnaadi asɔ eeebo, ɔsika bákyula-nya na ogya kemo. Katɔti ɔdubɔsia-mii anu na ute-mii adala utulo eveteli amɛni. Bina bɔƒɔtaadi bɔsɔ.
40006031	"Anwuɔsu bɛsɔ biteti kasusu bɛnii, 'Wɛ na bɔdubɔkɛ lɛla lɛdi bɔdi iye lɛdi bɔni iye lɛdi bɔkya.'
40006032	Ala amɛni lɛlɔ na ama bani naaadi baƒɔtaadine beeti kasusu pii. Bina Ɔti ɔni nkya katɔ ɔgyi ka bɛɛyaki ala amɛni ƒui.
40006033	Mmomu anumi egyie-mii na Katɔ Ɔga ala lɛlɔ na kalɛ na bɛbla lɛlɔ siin utulo. Na Katɔti wabla ala abambadi ƒui lɛnɔ wete-mii.
40006034	Anwuɔsu biteti kasusu pii na kadi kani nétegye tɔ lɛlɔ. Limeyi lɛmmɔ alatidi lɛdanku nina etila. Útalɛka biti etila bamba bibunku limeyi lɛmmɔ adi lɛlɔ.
40007001	"Bitatɛku bekyuli litemi kalɛ na Katɔti lɛnɔ ulatɛku-mii litemi.
40007002	Ɔsika Katɔti ɔdubɔtɛku-mii litemi aani kalɛ kani na amii lɛnɔ bɛɛtɛku bekyuli litemi. Na ulu ɔni lɛlɔ bɛ́sia bɛ́tɛku-ma litemi ni, ulu ɔmmɔ kani lɛlɔ na ɔdubɔsia ɔtɛku amii lɛnɔ litemi.
40007003	"Anwuɔsu ni, tanu alakpi ani nkya ƒula ɔnwani anumi. Mmomu ka ligyuku lɛni nkya-a anumi bɔnu asa.
40007004	Tasu ƒula ɔnwani anii, 'Ya na lidie-ɔ alakpi lɛnumi' na uwi ɔni na ligyuku lɛkya awɔ ɔlati lɛnumi.
40007005	Awɔ, anumi lɛlɔ ukyuli, ka ligyuku lɛni nkya-a lɛnumi budie na ɔbla-a nwaa. Na anu edie alakpi ani nkya ƒula ɔnwani lɛnumi.
40007006	"Bitebo ala ani nse kedee bitewi beƒiebuo. Si bíti bíte-ma ni, badubɔta bebeƒie-mii. Bitebo bina asɛɛ ebi ani náƒɔ kuye bitewi baplakuo, ɔsika badubɔnya-nya bakya aba. Katɔti muuti ala abuni teete bekyuli bani muuvele-nwu ala ammɔ.
40007007	"Bivele Katɔti ala, na ɔdubuti-nya ute-mii. Bɛwia nwuna ala, na ɔdubɔya na bɛkɛ-nya. Bibo Katɔti kegbuta kɔnu na ɔdubɔlɛmi ute-mii.
40007008	Ɔsika ukyuli biala ɔni muuvele Katɔti ala ni, ɔdubute-nwu. Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔwia ni, ɔɔkɛ́. Na ukyuli biala ɔni muubó Katɔti kegbuta kɔnu ni, ɔɔlɛmi teete-nwu.
40007009	"Ubi ɔti ɔdi uleti lɛtabi ulete ubidi si úye-nwu bodobodo.
40007010	Na uleti kɔlakpi ulete-nwu si úye-nwu kabɛ.
40007011	Ina ka bɛdi alaekpidi bablane muedi ni, bɛgyi kalɛ na biti ala abuni bite bina bebi. Anwuɔsu geen ni, Katɔti ɔni nse kedee ɔgyi kalɛ na uti ala abuni ute bekyuli bani muuvele-nwu utulo.
40007012	Ala ani na aayɔ́ ka bekyuli bamba babla bete-ɔ ni, bla-nya te ama lɛnɔ lɛni kani. Ɔmɛni ndi Mose ɔda bubo ku Katɔti kenye bediene ala ani bátina kalɔ budie.
40007013	"Bɛsia kayakun kani nse blii suɛ mmɔ biduo. Ɔsika si bɛ́sia kayakun kani nábɛbɛ na akɛ ulu ɔni nse buɛɛ lɛlɔ ni, adubuduo lɛgyavonku kemo. Na nwuna lɛlɔ na bekyuli pii bakɛ.
40007014	Nsu kayakun kani ulu ntɛ késela ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii kemo ni, kese blii suɛ. Na ulu ɔni ntɛ úsela mmɔ uudé busie. Na bani mɔɔnu ulu ɔmmɔ beeemomo.
40007015	"Bɛnu kaduɛ na ɔkɔ banyine bani nábla lɛlɔ aani Katɔti kenye bediene. Beebo-mii kudɔ aani baƒonu bani nse buɛɛ. Nsu na bana lɛlɔ kemo geen ni, badi begiti.
40007016	Bana udu na bɛdubuti bɛti-ma. Lɛnyɛ kɔbuli kulánwu atoo. Na liyu kugyii kulánwu kɔyaka ebi.
40007017	Kugyii kɔni nédie evete kaduɛ ni, kɔɔnwu ebi abuni. Na kugyii kɔni nátakana evete budie ni, kɔɔnwu ebi ekpidi.
40007018	Kugyii kɔbuni kulánwu ebi ekpidi, na kugyii kukpidi kulánwu ebi abuni.
40007019	Kugyii kɔdi biala na kulánwu ebi abuni ni, baadá-ku na beeti-ku taakya ogya.
40007020	Anwuɔsu ni, ala ani na ɔkɔ banyine bani nábla lɛlɔ aani Katɔti kenye bediene baabla ndubɔya na bɛti-ma.
40007021	"Ɔɔɔdi ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔlɔ-mi ɔnii, 'Blɔti, Blɔti,' ndubuduo Katɔti Lɛga Kadikɔ. Mmomu bekyuli bani mɔɔbla mina Ɔti ɔni nkya katɔ lɛyɔla ndubuduo mmɔ.
40007022	Na Katɔti litemi bɔtɛ limeyi ni, bekyuli pii badubɔsu-mi banii, 'Blɔti! Bɔ́su ƒula kenye na bɔ́gya ayu ekpidi na ƒula lɛnyi kemo. Na bɔ́bla akɔla budie taatina lidu lidu lɛnɔ na ƒula lɛnyi kemo.'
40007023	Mmɔ na ndubɔsu-ma nnii, 'Lɛɛɛgyi-mii kula kula! Bɛtɔlɔ-mi kudɔ, amii bekyuli bekpidi.'
40007024	"Anwuɔsu ni, ukyuli ɔni muunú mina etemila amɛni na ɔɔdi-nya lɛlɔ ni, ɔdi ɔnundane. Use aani ukyuli ɔni nátu nwuna ɔtɔ na lɛtakpɛ lɛlɔ.
40007025	Ɔnantu ɔ́na na ntukpa búyi, na ɔƒɛƒɛɛ úkpo momoomo ɔ́siaku ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ. Nsu útaƒɛ, ɔsika ɔ́tu-nwu ɔ́lɛ lɛtakpɛ lɛlɔ.
40007026	Nsu ukyuli ɔni muunú mina etemila na uládi-nya lɛlɔ ni, ɔdi ɔdɔlɔdi. Use aani ukyuli ɔni nátu nwuna ɔtɔ na kɔnwinimi lɛlɔ.
40007027	Ɔnantu ɔ́na na ntukpa búyi, na ɔƒɛƒɛɛ úkpo momoomo ɔ́siaku ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ, na ɔ́ƒɛ butu butu."
40007028	Ka Yesu ɔ́su ala amɛni ƒui ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, nwuna ala bɔtina bɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye.
40007029	Kalɛ na ɔ́tina ala uuuse aani ɔda bubo ala batinane bani na bɔtɛya na bátɛya-nya kalɛ. Mmomu ɔ́tina ala ku ɔyikun aani ukyuli ɔni ndanku litemi lɛmmɔ úboku kalɛ.
40008001	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́si ɔ́yu kɔbi kɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, bekyuli pii básiaku-nwu kama.
40008002	Amu na ɔnana ɔdi muuƒi ɔlɛgyie úbo úbalɛ akɔnkɔ na nwuna anumi na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Blɔti! Si aayɔ́ ni, akana na abla-mi sɛɛn."
40008003	Yesu únene kɔnu útuku-nwu, na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Mɔɔyɔ́. Lɛlɔ lɛbla-a sɛɛn." Mmɔ kani ni, ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba ɔnana ɔmmɔ.
40008004	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Nu kaduɛ, na tasu ukyuli ɔdi lɛla lɛdi. Mmomu teesie na eti lɛlɔ atátina Katɔti ɔkpane, na udie-ɔ kenye. Na ete akpala ani na Mose ɔda bubo bɔ́tina. Na ukyuli biala ɔnu ɔti ka ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-a sɔsɔ."
40008005	Nwuna kama ka Yesu úduo Kapernaum ni, Romaƒuɔ bekpone unengu ɔdi úbo úbevele-nwu ɔnini,
40008006	"Blɔti! Mina kabla ɔblane uuƒi kpakplaa na ɔ́tɛ kaduli ɔni na ulakana bɔta."
40008007	Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Ndubusie ntábwi-nwu."
40008008	Bekpone unengu ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, "Blɔti, oowo! Ńtamanku ka ebo mina kaduli. Nsu su litemi lɛdi kani na mina kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔlɛ ɔdubɔba-nwu.
40008009	Ami lɛnɔ ndi ukyuli ɔni nkya benengu badi kalɔ, na bekpone badi lɛnɔ bakya-mii kalɔ. Si lɛ́su ɔdi nnii, 'Teesie' ni, uusié. Na si lɛ́su ɔdi lɛnɔ nnii ubo ni, uubo. Na si lɛ́su mina kabla ɔblane nnii, 'Bla ɔmɛni' ni, ɔɔbla."
40008010	Ka Yesu únu ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́bla-nwu kalɛ kadi na ɔ́su bekyuli bani nsiaku-nwu mmɔ ɔnini, "Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka na Israelƒuɔ akɔ muedi ni, ńtanu tɔ bɔƒɔtaadi bɔmɛni udu.
40008011	Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka bekyuli pii badubɔsi ɔƒɛ katukɔ ku kanukɔ bebo Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma limeyi kadikɔ. Badubulie kalɔ na badi ku Abraham ku Isak ku Yakob na mmɔ.
40008012	Nsu Katɔti ɔdubɔbɔku Yudaƒuɔ badi bani nka badi bagadine mmɔ utákya kasuudikɔ. Mmɔ na badubuwulo na badu bana anumi."
40008013	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su bekpone unengu ɔmmɔ ɔnini, "Teesie kaduli. Kalɛ na áƒɔ ádi ni, ɔdububo ute-ɔ lɛni." Na bekpone unengu kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔlɛ ɔ́ba-nwu uwi ɔmmɔ kemo kani.
40008014	Ka Yesu úsie Petro kaduli ni, ɔ́nu ka Petro uleni ɔtɛ uuƒi kpakplaa ɔni na lɛlɔ lɛ́ƒɔ-nwu ogya.
40008015	Amu na Yesu úƒie-nwu kɔnu ɔ́da na ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-nwu kɔnakunwi, na ɔ́ta na ɔ́bla-nwu lɛƒɔ.
40008016	Na useyi uwi ni, béti bekyuli pii bani na ayu ekpidi eekpóku-ma béboku Yesu. Na ɔ́su lɛlakpa linwi na ɔ́bɔku-nya ɔ́lɛku-ma lɛlɔ kemo. Na ɔ́bwi bani muuƒi mmɔ ƒui.
40008017	Ɔ́bla ɔmɛni kalɛ na kenye kani na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesaia ɔ́su úse ubo ute lɛni ɔnini, "Anwu ɔlati ɔ́bwi-bu lɛlɛ lɛni na buuƒi ƒui."
40008018	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́nu bekyuli pii bani nnye-nwu kudɔ ni, ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane bammɔ ɔnii baya na beteesie ɛpu ɔmmɔ ɔvi.
40008019	Ɛpu ɔvi mmɔ ni, ɔda bubo ala ɔtinane ɔdi úbo-nwu kudɔ. Na ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, "Ala ɔtinane, kesii biala na adubusie ni, ndubɔsiaku-ɔ kama."
40008020	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Beƒiebuo bebo libu lɛni kemo na baatɛ, na baasɛ bebo ayu. Nsu Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ni, anwu uuubo katɛnkɔ muedi."
40008021	Na ukyuli bamba ɔdi ɔ́su ɔnini, "Blɔti, masiaku-ɔ. Nsu ya na lɛka busie ntáva mina ɔti."
40008022	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Siaku-mi kama. Na aya na bani nli aani bekpine ka bátaƒɔ bátadi ɔsu bataava bana bekpine."
40008023	Yesu úduo ɔkɔlɔ ɔdi kemo na nwuna batɛyane lɛnɔ básiaku-nwu kama.
40008024	Kɔnakunwi ni, ɔƒɛƒɛɛ kpakplaa ɔdi úse kalɔ uukpó na ɛpu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Na uubó ntu teewi ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo, na ɔɔyɔ́ ɔnyi. Nsu uwi ɔmmɔ ƒui ni, na Yesu anwu ɔtɛ ɔlɛɛ.
40008025	Batɛyane bammɔ bátágyila-nwu na básu banii, "Blɔti, ƒɔ-bu! Bɔdaku bukpi!"
40008026	Mmɔ na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, "Bi ɔsu na bibo liƒu lɛni? Bina bɔƒɔtaadi bɔsɔ." Amu na ɔ́ta na ɔ́bɔku ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ku ntu bɔni mɔɔnwanɛ lɛlɔ mmɔ ɔnii bɔda bɔya. Na mmɔ ƒui kábla kpoo.
40008027	Amu na ɔ́bla ukyuli biala kalɛ kadi. Na béye lɛlɔ banini, "Bi? Bútanu ukyuli ɔmɛni udu kudii! Ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ku ntu bɔni mɔɔnwanɛ lɛlɔ muedi buunú-nwu litemi!"
40008028	Ka Yesu útéduo Gadara kalɛkɛ na ɛpu ɔvi ni, nkyuli inyɔ badi na ayu ekpidi eekpóku-ma bási bekyuli kavakɔ mmɔ bábasiaku-nwu. Na ka bana lɛlɔ lɛɛda liƒu geen ɔsu ni, ukyuli ɔdi ulásia ulu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.
40008029	Kɔnakunwi ni, báva ku lɛdi momoomo na béye-nwu banii, "Bi na awɔ Katɔti Ubidi aawia-bu kudɔ mɛni? Ébo anii abaka-bu kɔtu bɔni asa na uwi ɔni na Katɔti ɔdubɔtɛku-bu litemi wedu?"
40008030	Amu na amadɔ mmɔ ni, baplakuo pii badi benye baadi.
40008031	Mmɔ na ayu ekpidi ammɔ évele Yesu anini, "Si anii aabɔku-bu alɛku ni, na abɔku-bu atákya baplakuo pii bammɔ kemo."
40008032	Mmɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́bɔku-ma ɔnii, "Bɛvi bɛlɛ-ma kemo." Anwuɔsu bálɛ-ma kemo bétéduo baplakuo bammɔ kemo. Na baplakuo bammɔ békeli báyu kɔbi kɔmmɔ lɛlɔ bátánu béduo ɛpu ɔmmɔ kemo na békpi.
40008033	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu ni, baplakuo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ békeli bátɔlɔ bésie ɔma kemo. Na bátásu ala ani ƒui na alɛku baplakuo bammɔ ku bekyuli bani na ayu ekpidi eekpóku mmɔ lɛlɔ.
40008034	Anwuɔsu ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli ƒui bésie banii batásiaku Yesu. Na ka bánu-nwu ni, bévele-nwu ka ɔtɔlɔ bana kalɔ lɛlɔ.
40009001	Yesu úduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo na bénwini básia ɛpu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ bésie nwuna ɔma.
40009002	Mmɔ na béti ɔnana ɔdi na ɔ́ƒɛ uwi kalɔ báva lɛtala lɛlɔ, na béti-nwu béboku-nwu kudɔ. Ka Yesu ɔ́nu ka báƒɔ bɔ́di geen ɔsu ni, ɔ́su ɔlɛne ɔmmɔ ɔnini, "Ubi, kɛ kayi. Líti ƒula ekpidi lɛ́kyiɛ-ɔ."
40009003	Amu na ɔda bubo ala batinane badi bakya baasu lɛlɔ banii, "Ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔɔkɔ́ kakɔ na uutemi enyekpi."
40009004	Yesu ɔ́nu bana kasusu kamɛni ɔ́ti na úye-ma ɔnini, "Bi ɔsu na biiti kasusu kekpidi kamɛni udu?
40009005	Na ɔmani bɔsu nse kpɛtɛ kpɛtɛ ntulo ka lɛsu nnii, 'Líti ƒula ekpidi lɛ́kyiɛ-ɔ' munuu ka lɛsu nnii, 'Ta, na esie'?
40009006	Ndubudie lɛtina-mii ka Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ubo ɔyikun na uti ekpidi ɔkyiɛ na kayawi mɛni." Anwuɔsu ɔ́su ukyuli ɔni náƒɛ uwi kalɔ mmɔ ɔnini, "Ta nye, na eti ƒula atɛla na eteesie kaduli."
40009007	Amu na ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔ́ta na úti nwuna lɛtɛla na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie kaduli.
40009008	Uwi ɔni na bekyuli bammɔ bánu ɔmɛni ni, liƒu lɛ́da-ma na bémwi Katɔti ka úti ɔyikun ɔmɛni udu úte ukyuli.
40009009	Amu ka Yesu ɔ́si mmɔ úsela ni, ɔ́nu kuyi ɔƒɔne ɔdi na baalɔ banii Mateo ka ɔ́kya nwuna kabla kablakɔ. Na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Siaku-mi kama." Mmɔ kani na Mateo ɔ́ta na ɔ́siaku-nwu kama.
40009010	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ulie ɔɔdi na Mateo kaduli ni, kuyi baƒɔne pii ku alaekpidi bablane babambadi bébo babadiku Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane na mmɔ.
40009011	Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bani nánu ɔmɛni ni, béye nwuna batɛyane banii, "Bi ɔsu na bina ala ɔtinane ku bekyuli bamɛni udu baadi?"
40009012	Yesu únu lɛla lɛni na básu na údie kenye ɔnini, "Balɛne mɔɔwia ɔbwine, na ɔɔɔdi bani na beléƒi.
40009013	Bitáwia lɛla lɛni nkya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo kalɔ binu ka ni, 'Lɛƒɔndia na Katɔti ɔɔwia, na ɔɔɔdi bebuo buti taakpa.' Ńtebo nnii mbawia bekyuli babuni, mmomu bekyuli bekpidi ɔsu na líbo."
40009014	Amu na Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane basiakune bébo bébeye Yesu banini, "Bi ɔsu na abu ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ buulie kɔka uwi uwi, na ƒula batɛyane ama belemonku kɔka bulie?"
40009015	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Bɛɛƒɔ́ taadi ka bekyuli bani na bálɔ béboku uleku ketikɔ badubo kɔnyana buteewulo na uwi ɔni na uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ ɔkya-ma kudɔ? Ulebo ulete lɛni kudii! Nsu limeyi lɛdi lɛdububo ɔni na badubuti uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ na bana kudɔ. Na uwi ɔmmɔ na badubulie kɔka.
40009016	"Ukyuli biala uléti lɛdiku lɛwɔdi taaka taada lɛkukudi lɛlɔ. Ɔsika lɛdiku lɛwɔdi lɛmmɔ lɛdubɔduli kɔkukudi kɔmmɔ na ɔya na liƒi lɛmmɔ libomo libu.
40009017	Lɛni kani na beleti ntɛ bɔwɔdi teewi ɔku koƒo kɔkukudi kɔni kemo béewi ntɛ dii. Si ɔɔdi lɛni ni, ɔku koƒo kɔkukudi kɔmmɔ kɔdubɔbwɛ na ntɛ bɔmmɔ lɛnɔ bɔdubuwiakun. Nsu beeti ntɛ bɔwɔdi beewi ɔku koƒo kɔwɔdi kemo. Na bana anyɔ ƒui badubɔdia."
40009018	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔɔtɛmiku-ma ni, Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔdi úbo-nwu kudɔ na ɔ́lɛ akɔnkɔ úvele-nwu ɔnini, "Mina ubi ulekubi úkpi ɔƒaani, nsu bo na eti ƒula enu asia-nwu lɛlɔ na ɔdubɔta."
40009019	Anwuɔsu Yesu ɔ́ta ɔ́siaku-nwu ku nwuna batɛyane lɛnɔ.
40009020	Na ka Yesu úsela ni, uleku ɔdi ɔni na ubugya uuwi akwa leevu-anyɔ úbasia Yesu kama na útuku-nwu awu kɔtu.
40009021	Ɔ́bla lɛni ɔsika ɔ́ƒɔ ɔ́di ka si ɔ́nya útuku-nwu awu kɔtu ni, ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔba-nwu.
40009022	Yesu únwini na ɔ́nu uleku ɔmmɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Kɛ kayi, mina ubi ulekubi! Ƒula bɔƒɔtaadi bɔ́bwi-ɔ." Mmɔ kani ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-nwu.
40009023	Amu na Yesu útéduo Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmmɔ kaduli kemo, na ɔ́nu lɛkwanu bediene ku bani muuwulo.
40009024	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Ukyuli biala ɔlɛ keyi. Ulekubi ɔmmɔ útekpi, mmomu bɔlɛɛ kani ɔda." Amu na bése kalɔ baamá-nwu.
40009025	Amu ka bágya bekyuli bammɔ bálɛku ni, Yesu úduo ulekubi ɔmmɔ ɔtɔ kemo, na ɔ́da-nwu kɔnu. Na ɔ́ta ulie.
40009026	Litemi lɛmɛni lígyingya na kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ kesi kesii.
40009027	Amu ka Yesu ɔ́si mmɔ úsela ni, banumbwɛne inyɔ badi báta básiaku-nwu kama ku kɔvanu banii, "Ɔga Dawid uwɔ! Nu-bu kɔnyana."
40009028	Amu uwi ɔni na Yesu útéduo kaduli kemo ni, banumbwɛne inyɔ bammɔ bébo-nwu kudɔ. Na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, "Bɛɛƒɔ́ taadi ka ndubɔkana-mii bɔbwi?" Mmɔ na bédie kenye banii, "Bɔ́ƒɔ bɔ́di!"
40009029	Amu na Yesu útuku bana anumi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Ubo ute-mii kalɛ kani na bɛ́ƒɔ bɛ́di."
40009030	Mmɔ kani na anumi álɛmi-ma. Na Yesu úbo-ma ɔda kpakplaa ɔnini, "Bitasu ukyuli ɔdi lɛla lɛmɛni."
40009031	Nsu ka bási mmɔ ni, bébo litemi lɛmɛni kudu na kalɛkɛ kammɔ lɛlɔ ƒui ɔ́si Yesu lɛlɔ.
40009032	Uwi ɔni na banana bási baalɛ́ ni, bekyuli badi béti ɔnana ɔdi ɔni na kɔyu kukpidi kɔ́ya na ulakana butemi béboku Yesu kudɔ.
40009033	Na Yesu ɔ́gya kɔyu kukpidi kɔmmɔ ɔ́lɛku-nwu lɛlɔ kemo. Mmɔ kani na ukyuli ɔmmɔ úse kalɔ uutemi. Ɔmɛni ɔ́bla bekyuli bani nnye mmɔ kalɛ kadi, na básu banii, "Bútanu ɔmɛni udu kudii na Israel kalɔ lɛlɔ!"
40009034	Nsu Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi básu banii, "Ayu ekpidi ɔga néti-nwu ɔyikun ɔni na ɔda ɔɔgyá ayu ekpidi ammɔ."
40009035	Yesu úsie ɔ́vi lɛma ku akpaklɔ ani nkya amadɔ mmɔ kemo. Ɔ́tina ala na Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ. Na ɔ́kɔ litemi buni lɛsa lɛni nkɛnku Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ lɛlɔ. Na ɔ́bwi lɛlɛ lidu lidu.
40009036	Na ka ɔ́nu bekyuli esu esu ammɔ ni, bákywi-nwu kaƒɔ ɔsika béƒu na beeebo bebunkune. Na bese aani baƒonu bani neeebo ɔdane.
40009037	Anwuɔsu únwini na úbo nwuna batɛyane bammɔ lɛgba ɔnini, "Edula ani néedu ka baƒɛ ni, emomo. Nsu bekyuli bani maƒɛ-nya beeemomo.
40009038	Anwuɔsu bivele edula ɔlati ɔmmɔ na uti kabla bablane badi ubebunku kabla kammɔ kemo."
40010001	Yesu ɔ́lɔ nwuna batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ ɔ́sala na úte-ma ɔyikun kalɛ na bagya ayu ekpidi balɛku bekyuli lɛlɔ na babwi lɛlɛ lidu lidu lɛnɔ.
40010002	Batalane bammɔ anyi ndi amɛni. Simon ɔni basɔ baalɔ Petro ku ɔnwani Andrea ku Yakobo ku ɔnwani Yohane bani ndi Sebedeo bebi
40010003	ku Ƒilipo ku Bartolomeo ku Toma ku kuyi ɔƒɔne Mateo ku Yakobo ɔni ndi Alƒeo ubidi ku Tadeo
40010004	ku Simon ɔni nási Kana ku Yuda Iskariot ɔni ndubo Yesu kakya bɔkya.
40010005	Yesu ɔ́tala banana leevu-inyɔ bamɛni na úbo-ma ɔda ɔnini, "Bitesie bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na bitesie Samariaƒuɔ ɔma ɔdi lɛnɔ kemo.
40010006	Mmomu bisie Israelƒuɔ bani nse aani baƒonu bani náyii ulu mmɔ kudɔ.
40010007	Bisie na bitákɔ lɛsa bɛnii, 'Uwi ɔni na Katɔti ɔdi lɛga na bula kɔyi kemo úude.'
40010008	Bɛbwi balɛne na bɛgyila bekpine. Bɛbwi bani muuƒi ɔlɛgyie, na bɛgya ayu ekpidi. Bíteye ɔyikun ɔmɛni na mina kudɔ, anwuɔsu amii lɛnɔ biteti bitadi kuye.
40010009	Biteti egulabi adi biala bitada.
40010010	Na ɔdi biala uteti koƒo utada aani ala bevelene kalɛ. Biteti awu iye lɛgbanvuo lɛbambadi lɛdi iye ugyii ɔdadi. Kabla ɔblane biala ni, nwuna kabla kemo na ɔdubɔdi.
40010011	"Si biduo ɔma iye lɛkpaklɔ lɛdi kemo ni, bɛwia ukyuli ɔbuni ɔni mɔɔyɔ́ ka ɔƒɔ-mii. Na biduo-nwu kudɔ na bɛkya mmɔ utédu uwi ɔni na bɛdubɔtɔlɔ.
40010012	Na si biduo kaduli kadi kemo ni, bigyele-ma bɛnii, 'Keyi kayɔku-mii.'
40010013	Si báƒɔ-mii ku kaƒɔ ƒaa ni, keyi buɛɛ kegye kammɔ kadubɔƒɔ kaduli kammɔ ƒui. Na si bátaƒɔ-mii ni, keyi buɛɛ kegye kammɔ kaaadubulieku-ma.
40010014	Na si ama iye ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli bátaƒɔ-mii iye béni bina litemi ni, bɛtɔlɔ na biveli bina lɛgba kalɔ ɔtumu biwi-ma.
40010015	Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka limeyi lɛni na Katɔti ɔdubɔtɛku bayawine litemi ni, ɔdubɔnu lɛma likpidi aani Sodom ku Gomora kɔnyana utulo ɔma ɔmmɔ kalɛ.
40010016	"Bɛnu! Mɔɔtala-mii aani baƒonu lɛkya begiti akɔ. Binye kagyumana aani balakpi kalɛ, nsu bɛda lɛlɔ aani babloduma.
40010017	Bɛsia lɛlɔ anu, ɔsika bekyuli badubudie-mii bete na beƒie-mii besienku litemi katɛkɔ. Na badubo-mii bubo lɛnɔ na Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ.
40010018	Na ka bɛdi mina batɛyane ɔsu ni, badubɔtɛku-mii litemi na kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ badine ku baga anumi. Na bɛsu ama bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ litemi buni lɛmmɔ.
40010019	Si béti-mii bésienku litemi katɛkɔ ni, biteti kasusu na lɛla lɛni bɛdubɔsu lɛlɔ.
40010020	Ɔsika Katɔti ndubute-mii etemila ani na bɛdubɔsu. Katɔti Kɔyu kɔdubɔtɛmi kɔsiaku-mii lɛlɔ.
40010021	"Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, bekyuli badi badubuti bana banwa alati bete na badu na ami ɔsu. Na bebi bati badi lɛnɔ badubɔbla lɛni na bana bebi lɛlɔ. Bebi badubɔta benye bana bawɔne lɛlɔ na bakya-ma kakya kalɛ na badu-ma.
40010022	Ukyuli biala ɔdubukisi-mii na ami ɔsu. Nsu si bínye bina bɔƒɔtaadi kemo kpakplaa bitédu kawɔlɔkɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ-mii ngba.
40010023	Si beekpóku-mii na ɔma unwi kemo ni, bikeli bisie ɔbambadi kemo. Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka bilawɔlɔ bina kabla na Israel lɛma ƒui kemo asa na ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, masɔ mebo.
40010024	"Ɔtinane ɔ́ƒɔ lɛnyi útulo nwuna ɔtɛyane. Na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔdi ukyuli lɛlɔ lɛnɔ ni, útulo ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔɔdi.
40010025	Anwuɔsu ni, ɔtɛyane biala ɔbla ka ɔlɛ nwuna ala ɔtinane kalɛ. Na ukyuli ɔni na baadi lɛlɔ lɛnɔ ni, ɔbla ka ɔlɛ Unwoti. Na si bekyuli beedumi ɔtɔlati ɔdi banii ayu ekpidi ɔtɔnkune ɔdi ni, na badubɔlɔ kaduli kammɔ bekyuli ƒui anyikpi betulo ɔtɔlati ɔmmɔ.
40010026	"Anwuɔsu bitayia bekyuli, ɔsika lɛla lɛni na béti ala bébi iye bábla bábɛ ni, Katɔti ɔdubudie-ni keyi.
40010027	Na ala ani ƒui na bínu bɛ́siku ami ɔlati kudɔ ni, bidie-nya keyi. Na lɛla biala na lɛ́su-mii kabɛsɛ ni, bɛkɔ-nya lɛsa.
40010028	Bitayia bekyuli bani na ɔlɔna kani na badubɔkana bɔdu na balakana ukyuli kɔyu aku bɔdu. Mmomu bɛyia Katɔti ɔni ndubɔkana na ɔdu ukyuli kɔyu ku ɔlɔna na lɛgyavonku kemo.
40010029	Baasɛ wɛlɛ wɛlɛ bani na akana eye bana inyɔ ku kaplɛ unwi muedi ni, ɔdi ulekpi na Katɔti kama.
40010030	Na amii bina lili linwini muedi ni, Katɔti ɔgyi nwuna bumomo ƒui.
40010031	Anwuɔsu bitayia, ɔsika bɛ́ƒɔ kuye bítulo baasɛ pii.
40010032	"Si ukyuli ɔdi udie lɛlɔ kenye na kadi anumi ka ɔdi mina ɔdi ni, ami lɛnɔ ndubudie-nwu kenye na mina Ɔti anumi na katɔ.
40010033	Nsu si ukyuli ɔdi úni-mi na kadi anumi ni, ami lɛnɔ ndubuni-nwu na mina Ɔti anumi.
40010034	"Bitakali bɛnii mina bubo búti keyi kayɔdi búboku kayawi. Oowo! Bekyuli badubɔdɔ na ami ɔsu!
40010035	Bebi bananabi badubɔta benye bana bati lɛlɔ. Na bebi belekubi badubɔta benye bana beni lɛlɔ. Na bebile badubɔta benye bana begyieni lɛlɔ.
40010036	Na ukyuli ukisine geen ni, ɔdubɔsi anwu ɔlati nwuna kaduli kemo.
40010037	"Na ukyuli biala ɔni mayɔ ɔti iye uni teetulo-mi ni, útamanku ka ɔbla mina ɔtɛyane. Lɛni kani na ukyuli ɔni mayɔ ubidi ɔnanabi iye ulekubi teetulo-mi lɛnɔ ni, útamanku ka ɔbla mina ɔtɛyane.
40010038	Ukyuli biala na ulayɔ ka ɔsiaku-mi kama na ubo abi aani ami kalɛ ni, útamanku ka ɔbla mina ɔtɛyane.
40010039	Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔwia ka ulie ngba ute nwuna lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubɔyila-mu. Na ukyuli ɔni nányonu nwuna ngba na ɔsiaku-mi kama ni, ɔdubɔkɛ ngba geen.
40010040	"Ukyuli biala ɔni maƒɔ-mii ni, ɔ́ƒɔ ami lɛnɔ. Na ukyuli biala maƒɔ-mi ni, ɔ́ƒɔ Katɔti ɔni nátala-mi lɛnɔ.
40010041	Ukyuli biala ɔni maƒɔ Katɔti kenye udiene ka ɔdi kenye udiene ute Katɔti ɔsu ni, anwu ku kenye udiene ɔmmɔ badubɔkɛ lɛyuƒɔla linwi na Katɔti kudɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni maƒɔ ukyuli ɔni nse siin ka use siin ɔsu ni, anwu ku ukyuli ɔmmɔ badubɔkɛ lɛyuƒɔla linwi na Katɔti kudɔ.
40010042	Bɛnu ɔmɛni kaduɛ ka ukyuli biala meti ntu ɔɔƒɛɛ mete mina basiakune bamɛni akɔ ubliidi ƒui ka ɔsiaku-mi ɔsu ni, nwuna lɛyuƒɔla lilabɔ-nwu."
40011001	Uwi ɔni Yesu údie nwuna batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ ulu ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́ta mmɔ na úsie utátina ala na utákɔ lɛsa ute lɛma lɛni nkya amadɔ mmɔ.
40011002	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane ɔtɛ aban ɔtɔ. Únu kabla kani na Kristo ɔɔbla, na ɔ́tala nwuna batɛyane badi ɔ́kya Yesu.
40011003	Na bétéye Yesu banii, "Awɔ ndi ukyuli ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́su úse ka ɔdubo, munuu butaanu ukyuli bamba ulu?"
40011004	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Binwini bisie na bitásu Yohane ala ani na biinú ku ani na bɛɛnu ka mɔɔbla.
40011005	Banumbwɛne baanu, na bani náƒɛ bewi kalɔ beesié. Ama bani muuƒi ɔlɛgyie lɛlɔ lɛɛbla sɛɛn na batutine beenú. Bekpine baata na mɔɔkɔ́ litemi buni lɛmmɔ lɛsa teete bawabane.
40011006	Lɛlɔ litaayɔ bekyuli bani na bana kasusu kalabla inyɔ inyɔ na mina ala ani mɔɔbla ɔsu."
40011007	Uwi ɔni na Yohane batɛyane bammɔ báatɔlɔ mmɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́su Yohane lɛlɔ litemi ɔ́tina bekyuli bammɔ ɔnini, "Ka bísie ketele kemo ni, bítesie bɛnii bitánu evete ani na ɔƒɛƒɛɛ uubó taavinku.
40011008	Bítesie bɛnii bitánu ɔnana ɔni nkya lɛwu lɛni mɔɔdia bɔnu. Bekyuli bammɔ udu ni, ɔga kesii na beelie.
40011009	Bɛsu-mi ukyuli ɔni udu na bísie bítánu! Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi munuu dɛ? Ɛɛn, na sɔsɔ na ɔdi. Nsu mɔɔsu-mii ka bɛ́nu ukyuli ɔni ntulo kenye udiene muedi.
40011010	Yohane ɔmɛni ndi ɔtu ɔni lɛlɔ na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔmmɔ ɔ́su ɔ́siku uwi ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́su Ubidi ɔnini, 'Ndubɔtala ɔtu ɔdi na ɔgyu ɔtɔ-ɔ na ɔklibi bekyuli ute ƒula bubo.'
40011011	Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane ɔ́ƒɔ kuye utulo ukyuli ɔni nélie kayawi kamɛni úbavi. Nsu ni, ukyuli ɔni nátaƒɔ lɛnyi na Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma muedi ni, ɔ́ƒɔ kuye útulo Yohane ɔmmɔ.
40011012	Na ɔ́si Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane uwi úbalɛ ɔmwi ni, bekyuli pii báta ku lɛnungyie batáwia Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ɔmmɔ beduo. Nsu bekyuli bani anumi egyie-ma geen lɛti na baanwanɛ lɛlɔ ni, ama ndubuduo mmɔ.
40011013	Na Mose ɔda bubo ku Katɔti kenye bediene básu Katɔti litemi úbalɛ Yohane uwi lɛlɔ.
40011014	Na si bɛɛyɔ́ ka bɛƒɔ bana litemi bɛdi ni, Yohane ndi Elia ɔni na básu bése ka webo.
40011015	Si bɛɛkana ni, biti lɛla lɛni lɛ́su mɛni.
40011016	"Ɔƒɛni ni, bi na ndubuti ɔmwi kadi bekyuli lɛkɔku? Bese aani banamu bani mɔɔƒia na kuye. Na bana bakpana baakpali-ma taasu banii,
40011017	'Búdie uleku buti agya búte-mii, nsu bítatɔ. Búdie lɛkwanu búte-mii, nsu bítewulo.'
40011018	Ɔsika uwi ɔni na Yohane úbo ni, úlie kɔka na útani ntɛ. Na ukyuli biala ɔ́su ɔnii uukpi libuo.
40011019	Nsu uwi ɔni na ami ɔni ndi Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi líbo ni, lɛ́di na lɛ́ni. Na ukyuli biala ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Bɛnu ɔdivone ɔmɛni! Uukpi ntɛ! Anwu ku kuyi baƒɔne ku bekyuli bekpidi muusié.' Nsu takpete-ma. Katɔti lɛnunda lɛdubudie lɛlɔ keyi na lɛla lɛni na ukyuli ɔɔbla kemo."
40011020	Na lɛma lɛni kemo na Yesu ɔ́bla akɔla pii ni, bekyuli bammɔ bétenwini kama bátakya bana ekpidi. Anwuɔsu úse kalɔ na ɔɔdɔnku-ma.
40011021	Ɔ́su ɔnini, "Bɔbwɛ muute awɔ Korasin! Na bɔbwɛ muute awɔ Betsaida! Si lɛma likpidi Tiro ku Sidon na nka lɛ́bla akɔla budie taatina ani lɛ́bla na bina akɔ ni, badubɔda adala ani mɔɔtina ka béni bana ekpidi.
40011022	Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka limeyi lɛni na Katɔti ɔdubɔtɛku bayawine litemi ni, ɔdubɔnu Tiro ku Sidon lɛma kɔnyana utulo amii.
40011023	Na awɔ Kapernaum ni, aakali ka Katɔti ɔdubɔtalaku-ɔ katɔ? Oowo! Katɔti ɔdubɔyulaku-ɔ kalɔ besienku lɛgyavonku kemo. Ɔsika akɔla budie taatina ani lɛ́bla na bina akɔ ni, si Sodom na lɛ́bla-nya ni, nka ɔmua ɔdi ɔma úbalɛ ɔmwi.
40011024	Bɛnu ɔmɛni bɛti geen ka limeyi lɛni na Katɔti ɔdubɔtɛku bayawine litemi ni, ɔdubɔnu Sodom kɔnyana utulo awɔ."
40011025	Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Yesu ɔ́su ɔ́kpali katɔ ɔnini, "Ati, katɔ ku kalɔ Unwoti, mɔɔgyá-a enu. Éti ala amɛni ábɛla banundane ku bakutine, na édie-nya átina bani nétesie anumi na lɛlati lɛdi kemo.
40011026	Sɔsɔ Ati, lɛni na aayɔ́ ka ɔlɛ."
40011027	Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, "Mina Ɔti úti ala ƒui úte-mii. Na anwu lɛti ngyi ukyuli ɔni udu na ndi. Na ami lɛti ngyi ukyuli ɔni na mina ɔti lɛnɔ ɔdi. Na mɔɔƒuna bekyuli badi bani na medie-nwu matina.
40011028	"Amii bani nti etila bonwu na lɛlɔ líitu-mii ni, bibo-mi kudɔ na ndubɔya na bɛnwuna.
40011029	Bibo bɔda kɔda, na bɛtɛya bɛsiku-mi kudɔ. Nse buɛɛ na muuboku lɛlɔ kalɔ, na bɛdubɔkɛ bɔnwuna.
40011030	Ɔsika kabla kani na mete-ɔ ni, keeebo ɔkplu. Na mina etila lɛnɔ ese ƒaa ƒaa."
40012001	Uwi ɔdi kama ni, Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bási baaví kemo kadi na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ. Ka kɔka kɔɔda nwuna batɛyane bammɔ ɔsu ni, bése kalɔ baaƒɛ edula adi ani nse aani anta taavumi taakun.
40012002	Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi bánu ɔmɛni na básu Yesu banii, "Ƒula batɛyane báabla lɛla lɛni na ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ bútile kuƒi ka babla na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ."
40012003	Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye na úye-ma ɔnini, "Bítaka Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ala bítenu lɛla lɛni na Dawid ɔ́bla uwi ɔni na kɔka kɔɔda anwu ku nwuna bekyuli?
40012004	Útéduo Katɔti ɔtɔ kemo na úti adila ani na béti bákpa béte Katɔti úboku na bádi. Ɔ́bla lɛni ina ka bakpane lɛti pɛ na ɔlɛka badi adila ammɔ.
40012005	Ngyi ka bɛ́ka lɛnɔ na ɔda bubo ɔku kemo ka ina ka bulabla kabla kadi na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ni, bakpane bani nkya Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ beeti bebuo taakpa. Na baladu-ma kɔtɔ.
40012006	Na mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, lɛla lɛni náƒɔ kuye ntulo Katɔti kakpakɔ lɛkya bina akɔ mɛni.
40012007	Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔɔsu ɔnii, 'Kɔnyana bɔnu na ami Katɔti mɔɔwia, na ɔɔɔdi ka biti bebuo bɛkpa.' Si biinú ala amɛni kalɔ ni, nka biládu bekyuli bani na bátaƒiɔ-mii kɔtɔ.
40012008	Ɔsika Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔdi lɛnwunameyi Unwoti."
40012009	Amu na Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ kadi.
40012010	Mmɔ na útánu ɔnana ɔni na kɔnu kunwi kɔ́gogolo-nwu. Bekyuli badi bakya mmɔ bani nkya mɔɔwia ka bakywɛ Yesu kakpagyuɛ kalɛ na ɔƒiɔ ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ. Anwuɔsu béye-nwu banini, "Ɔda bubo buute kuƒi ka babwi ɔlɛ na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ?"
40012011	Yesu lɛnɔ úye-ma ɔnini, "Si úbo úte ka bina ɔdi ubo koƒonu kɔdi na kútánu ubu na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ni, ulésie uledie-ku?
40012012	Ukyuli ɔ́ƒɔ kuye útulo koƒonu. Anwuɔsu ɔda bubo buute kuƒi ka bɔnu kɔnyana na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ."
40012013	Amu na ɔ́su ɔnana ɔni na kɔnu kɔ́gogolo-nwu mmɔ ɔnini, "Nene ƒula kɔnu." Na únene-ku. Kɔnakunwi ni, kɔnu kɔmmɔ kɔ́sɔ kɔ́bla aani kalɛ na kunyɔdi kɔmmɔ kuse.
40012014	Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bani nkya mmɔ bátɔlɔ na bátábla kasusu ka badu Yesu.
40012015	Uwi ɔni na Yesu únu ka Ƒarisiƒuɔ beeti-nwu lɛlɔ kasusu kekpidi ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ-ma kudɔ mmɔ, na bekyuli pii badi básiaku-nwu. Ɔ́bwi bani muuƒi ƒui na bana akɔ.
40012016	Na ɔ́bala-ma ɔnii betedie-nwu keyi.
40012017	Ɔ́su lɛni kalɛ na lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔ́su úse ɔkɛnku nwuna Kenye Udiene Yesaia lɛlɔ ebo ete lɛni sɔsɔ. Ɔ́su ɔnini,
40012018	"Ɔmɛni ndi mina kabla ɔblane ɔni na lɛ́ƒuna, na mɔɔyɔ́-nwu. Na mina kayi kasia-nwu lɛlɔ geen. Ndubuti mina Kɔyu lɛkya-nwu lɛlɔ kemo na wedie litemi bɔtɛ siin keyi watina kadi ƒui.
40012019	Ulablaku ukyuli ɔdi unyeƒi iye ɔvanku ukyuli ɔdi. Na ukyuli ɔdi ulénu-nwu lɛdi na kuyeya ulu lɛlɔ.
40012020	Ɔdubɔda ama bani beeebo lɛlɔkplu buɛɛ, na ulakpainku bani na enu áƒɛ-ma. Mmomu ɔdubunye kpakplaa utédu ka litemi bɔtɛ siin wadi lɛlɔ geen.
40012021	Na kadi bekyuli ƒui badubɔsia anwu lɛti anu."
40012022	Amu na bekyuli badi béti ɔnana ɔdi ɔni na kɔyu kukpidi kuukpóku-nwu na ulákana bɔnu iye ulétemi béboku Yesu kudɔ. Na Yesu ɔ́bɔku kɔyu kɔmmɔ na ɔlɛne ɔmmɔ ɔ́kana na uutemi na ɔɔnu lɛnɔ.
40012023	Ɔmɛni ɔ́bla bekyuli bammɔ kalɛ kadi. Na béye banii, "Ɔga Dawid Uwɔ Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ na ɔdi mɛni?"
40012024	Amu na uwi ɔni na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bénu ɔmɛni ni, básu banini, "Ɔkɛnku ayu ekpidi unengu Beelsebul lɛlɔ na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔɔgyá ayu ekpidi taalɛku bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo."
40012025	Na Yesu ɔ́ti bana kasusu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Lɛga kadikɔ kani néle lɛlɔ akpa akpa ni, kelénye. Na ɔma iye kaduli kani muule lɛlɔ akpa akpa na beekpóku lɛlɔ ni, kaabwɛ.
40012026	Na si lɛkpa linwi liikpóku lɛkpa linyɔdi na Satan lɛga kadikɔ kemo ni, na ɔɔtina ka lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ kéle lɛlɔ na kadubɔbwɛ.
40012027	Na bi ɔsu na bɛɛsu bɛnii Beelsebul ɔyikun kemo na mɔɔgyá ayu ekpidi taalɛku bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo? Si use lɛni ni, bɛɛkali ka nwuna ɔyikun kemo na bina basiakune ama beeti taagya ayu ekpidi taalɛku bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo? Oowo! Ala ani na bina basiakune baabla mɔɔtina ka bina kakali kaaadia!
40012028	Ɔɔɔdi Beelsebul ɔyikun na ɔdi. Mmomu Katɔti Kɔyu néte-mi ɔyikun ɔni na muuti taagya ayu ekpidi taalɛku bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo. Na ɔmɛni ɔɔtina ka Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kéebo-mii akɔ.
40012029	"Mbo ɔyikun ntulo Satan, ɔsika ukyuli ɔdi ulakana na wabwɛ weduo ɔyikune ɔdi kɔduli weti-nwu ala ntu si ɔ́kana-nwu buƒie bunyimi asa na wakana-nwu kaduli buduo.
40012030	"Ukyuli ɔni naaasiaku-mi ni, ɔ́ta únye-mi lɛlɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni naaani teede-mi ni, na uukeli-mi.
40012031	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, mɔɔsu-mii nnii Katɔti ɔdubuti alaekpidi biala na bekyuli bábla ku anyikpi biala ani na bálɔ Katɔti ƒui ɔkyiɛ-ma. Nsu anyikpi ani na ukyuli ɔdi ɔdubɔlɔ Katɔti Kɔyu ni, Katɔti uleti ulakyiɛ-nwu.
40012032	Na ukyuli ɔni ndubɔlɔ Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi anyikpi adi ni, Katɔti ɔdubuti ɔkyiɛ-nwu. Nsu uleti anyikpi ani na ukyuli ɔdi ɔdubɔlɔ Katɔti Kɔyu ulakyiɛ-nwu na ngba bɔmɛni kemo iye bɔni ndububo kemo lɛnɔ.
40012033	"Ɔdi ka bɛti ka kugyii kɔbuni kɔɔnwu ebi abuni, na kugyii kɔni naaadia kɔɔnwu ebi ani naaadia. Kugyii biala ebi na beeti taanu kugyii kɔmmɔ udu taati.
40012034	Bɛdi bekyuli bekpidi geen aani balakpi! Na ala abuni adi alalɛ-mii kenye! Ala ani nkya ukyuli kasusu kemo kani na uudie keyi.
40012035	Ukyuli ɔbuni ni, ala abuni ani nse-nwu na uudie taalɛku keyi. Na ukyuli ukpidi lɛnɔ ni, alaekpidi ani nse-nwu na uudie taalɛku keyi.
40012036	Mɔɔyá na ɔbla-mii nwaa ka litemi bɔtɛ limeyi ni, ukyuli biala ɔdubudie lɛlɔ kenye na etemila keeke biala nálɛ-nwu kenye lɛlɔ.
40012037	Na amii alati etemila na Katɔti ɔdubuti ɔtɛku-mii litemi na ɔdu-mii kɔtɔ iye ute-mii ubo."
40012038	Amu na ɔda bubo ala batina ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi básu Yesu banii, "Ala ɔtinane, bɔɔwia ka abla akɔla budie taatina adi atina-bu kalɛ na bɔƒɔ-ɔ bɔdi."
40012039	Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Bɛnu kalɛ na ɔmwi limeyi kaba bekyuli bebo likyulikpi na balayia Katɔti. Bɛɛwia bɛnii mbla akɔla budie taatina adi, nsu lɛɛɛdubo bɔbla. Akɔla budie taatina ani kani na bɛdubɔnu ndi ani ndaku Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yona.
40012040	Kalɛ na Yona ɔ́kya kabɛ kebendi kaƒɔ kemo emeyi atɛ usien ku ɔƒɛ ni, lɛni kani na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛnɔ ɔdubɔkya kalɔ kemo emeyi atɛ usien ku ɔƒɛ.
40012041	Na litemi bɔtɛ limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, Niniweƒuɔ badubɔta bebebo-mii lɛnimi enwu, ɔsika bénwini kama bákya bana ekpidi uwi ɔni na Yona ɔ́kɔ lɛsa úte-ma. Na mɔɔsu-mii ka ukyuli ɔdi ɔkya-mii akɔ mɛni na utulo Yona.
40012042	Na litemi bɔtɛ limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, Uleku Ɔga ɔni nási kada kakɛ lɛnɔ ɔdubɔta unye na ubo-mii lɛnimi enwu, ɔsika ɔ́si ɔgyu kakaaka na úsie Ɔga Salomo kudɔ úténu-nwu lɛnunda ala bɔtina. Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ukyuli ɔdi ntulo Salomo ɔkya mɛni.
40012043	"Mɔɔsu-mii ka uwi ɔni na bágya kɔyu kukpidi bálɛku ukyuli lɛlɔ kemo ni, kuusié taavi kesii kani nákwi taawia keliekɔ. Na si útakɛ kadi ni,
40012044	kɔɔsu lɛlɔ kɔnii, 'Ndubɔsɔ linwini nteesie mina kaduli kakukudi kammɔ.' Na ɔɔsɔ teesie taatánu ka lɛla lɛdi liiibo ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo, nsu bákpala mmɔ na lɛdi biala lise sɛɛn.
40012045	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, ɔɔsɔ teenwini teesie na utákpanku ayu ekpidi maatɛ ani ntulo-nwu, na bebo bebelie mmɔ. Na kawɔlɔkɔ ni, ukyuli ɔmmɔ ablala eebie teetulo kalɛ na ése kudeedi muedi. Ɔmɛni ndububo kaba kekpidi kamɛni lɛlɔ."
40012046	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔkya uutemiku bekyuli bammɔ ni, nwuna banwani ku uni bébo bébenye kɔmadɔ banii baawia ka batɛmiku-nwu.
40012047	Amu na bekyuli bani nnye mmɔ akɔ unwi útásu Yesu ɔnii, "Nu, ƒ^ini ku ƒula banwani benye kɔmadɔ ngye baawia ka batɛmiku-ɔ."
40012048	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Ɔma ndi mina uni na ɔma bene ndi mina banwani?"
40012049	Amu na ɔ́kywɛ kɔnu ɔ́tina nwuna batɛyane na ɔ́su ɔnini, "Bɛɛnu mina uni ku mina banwani!
40012050	Na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla mina Ɔti ɔni nkya katɔ lɛyɔla ni, anwu ndi mina ɔnwani ɔnanabi ku ɔnwani ulekubi ku mina uni."
40013001	Limeyi lɛmmɔ kani ni, Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ kaduli kammɔ na úsie ɛpu kɔtu. Na úlie kalɔ na úse kalɔ ɔɔtina ala.
40013002	Bekyuli pii bani náka bámana-nwu bebomo ɔsu ni, útéduo ɔkɔlɔ ɔdi kemo. Na bekyuli bammɔ ama bénye ɛpu kɔtu mmɔ.
40013003	Mmɔ na ɔ́tina-ma ala pii na agba kemo ɔnini, "Uwi ɔdi nébo úbavi ni, ukyuli ɔdi úsie utágya edula.
40013004	Uwi ɔni na ɔɔgya edula ammɔ ni, adi éwi ulu kɔtu na baasɛ bála bádi.
40013005	Edula ammɔ adi lɛnɔ éwi atakpɛ lɛlɔ, kesii kani na lɛti liiibo kaduɛ. Éyile bɔkwɛ, ɔsika lɛti lɛmmɔ líteduo kalɔ lítesie ɔgyu.
40013006	Anwuɔsu uwi ɔni na ɔƒɛ ɔ́lɛ ni, ana ƒui áyɛyɛ na ékpi, ɔsika ana lidu lítanyi kalɔ.
40013007	Edula ammɔ adi lɛnɔ éwi liyu livo akɔ. Na ka ákwɛ ni, alakpi ammɔ átu ébi-nya lɛlɔ ƒui.
40013008	Na edula ammɔ adi éwi kalɔ kabuni lɛlɔ na ánwu ebi. Adi ánwu ebi eti anyɔ. Adi lɛnɔ ánwu liti ku leevu, na adi lɛnɔ ánwu aavlatɛ."
40013009	Na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Biti bina lɛnunda bɛɛwia ɔmɛni kalɔ binu!"
40013010	Amu na batɛyane bammɔ bébo Yesu kudɔ na bébeye-nwu banii, "Bi ɔsu na aatina bekyuli bammɔ ala na agba kemo?"
40013011	Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Amii na Katɔti údie Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma lɛnunda abɛla ɔ́tina, na ɔɔɔdi ama.
40013012	Ɔsika ukyuli ɔni mbo ala ammɔ udu ni, Katɔti ɔdubute-nwu ubu na ɔkɛ utulo kalɛ na ɔɔwia. Nsu ukyuli ɔni neeebo ala ammɔ adi ni, libliidi lɛni nse-nwu muedi ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ-ni ɔ́siku-nwu kudɔ.
40013013	Lɛla lɛni ɔsu na mɔɔtina-ma ala na agba kemo ndi ka baanu nsu balánu taati. Na lɛni kani na beenú nsu belenu kalɔ.
40013014	Ɔmɛni ɔsu Kenye Udiene Yesaia lɛsuse líbo líte lɛni na bana lɛlɔ ɔnini, 'Bɛdubunu bɔdi, nsu bilénu kalɔ! Na bɛdubɔnu bɔdi, nsu bilanu biláti.
40013015	Ɔsika bekyuli bamɛni balábu lili kemo taanu. Na bétile atu na bébile bana anumi. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, nka bana anumi adubɔnu nwaa. Na bana atu lɛnɔ adubunu na benu kalɔ na benwini bebo ami Katɔti kudɔ na lɛbwi-ma!'
40013016	Nsu amii ni, lɛlɔ litaayɔ-mii geen ka bina anumi aanu na bina atu lɛnɔ eenú ɔsu.
40013017	Ɔsika mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii Katɔti kenye bediene ku bekyuli pii bani nse siin báwia kpakplaa ka banu lɛla lɛni na bɛɛnu mɛni, nsu bátanu. Na báwia kpakplaa ka benu lɛla lɛni na biinú mɛni, nsu bétenu."
40013018	Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, "Ɔƒɛni ni, binu lɛla lɛni na edula ɔgyane lɛgba lɛmɛni kalɔ lɛɛtina.
40013019	Bekyuli bani muunú Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma lɛlɔ litemi nsu belenu-ni kalɔ ni, bese aani edula ani néwi ulu kɔtu na ukisine ɔmmɔ uubo teebedie litemi lɛmmɔ taalɛku-ma kasusu kemo.
40013020	Edula ani néwi atakpɛ lɛlɔ ni, anya ndi bekyuli bani muunú litemi lɛmmɔ na baaƒɔ́-ni ku ebiti kɔnakunwi.
40013021	Nsu ka litemi lɛmmɔ lítaƒɔ-ma lɛlɔ kemo ɔsu ni, lilélie-ma kemo teetu uwi ɔdi. Anwuɔsu si lɛbibo iye bukpoku bɔdi búbo-ma lɛlɔ na litemi lɛmmɔ ɔsu ni, enu aaƒɛ-ma kɔnakunwi.
40013022	Na edula ani néduo ákya liyu livo akɔ ni, anya ndi bekyuli bani muunú litemi lɛmmɔ. Nsu ka béti kasusu pii básia kayawi kamɛni ala lɛlɔ ku lɛlakɛ ɔsu ni, litemi lɛmmɔ lílaƒɔ bana lɛlɔ kemo na babla ala abuni.
40013023	Na edula ani néwi kalɔ kabuni ndi bekyuli bani muunú litemi lɛmmɔ na beenú-ni kalɔ. Na ebi adi aanwu eti anyɔ, adi liti ku leevu, na adi lɛnɔ aavlatɛ."
40013024	Yesu úbo-ma lɛgba lɛbambadi ɔnini, "Katɔti lɛga bɔdi litemi bugyingya buse aani ɔmɛni. Ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́gya edula abuni na nwuna kemo.
40013025	Na usien ɔdi ka bekyuli ƒui báatɛ ni, nwuna ukisine ɔdi útágya livo likpidi ebi ɔ́kya edula ammɔ kemo na ɔ́gyu ɔ́tɔlɔ.
40013026	Na uwi ɔni na edula ammɔ álɛ lili na ése kalɔ aanwu ni, alakpi ekpidi ani na ukisine ɔmmɔ ɔ́gya ɔ́kya edula ammɔ kemo lɛnɔ ákwɛ.
40013027	"Amu na kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ kabla bablane bésie-nwu kudɔ na bétéye-nwu banini, 'Ati, bɔ́nu ka edula abuni na ágya na ƒula kemo. Na wɛ na livo likpidi lɛmɛni ani lɛ́si?'
40013028	"Kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnii, 'Ukisine ɔdi nábla ɔmɛni.' "Amu na béye-nwu banii, 'Aawia ka busie butágyu-nya budie?'
40013029	"Ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Oowo. Ɔƒɛni kalɛ si bɛɛgyú livo lɛmmɔ ni, bɛdubɔgyu edula ammɔ adi lɛnɔ bɛsalaku livo lɛmmɔ.
40013030	Bɛya na nwuna akpa anyɔ ƒui eteenye utálɛ edula ɔƒɛwi. Na uwi ɔmmɔ na ndubɔsu edula baƒɛne bammɔ nnii bɛka livo lɛmmɔ bɔgyu na binyimi-ni esu esu na bɛkyula-ni. Na edula ammɔ ni, bɛƒɛ-nya na biti-nya biwi mina unwu kemo.' "
40013031	Yesu ɔ́sɔ úbo-ma lɛgba lɛdi ɔnini, "Katɔti lɛga bɔdi litemi bugyingya buse aani edula kebi blii suɛ kani na ukyuli ɔdi úti útáva na nwuna kemo.
40013032	Ɔdi edula kebi kani nse blii suɛ ntulo na ebi ammɔ ƒui akɔ. Nsu si ɔ́kwɛ na ɔ́lɛ lili ni, uubómo teetulo kemo kammɔ edula akladi ƒui. Na uugyingya teebi kalɔ kammɔ, na baasɛ beebo taabatu ayu na kuna kɔgba akɔ."
40013033	Yesu ɔ́sɔ úbo-ma lɛgba lɛbambadi ɔnini, "Katɔti lɛga bɔdi litemi bugyingya buse aani ɔmɛni. Uleku ɔdi úti bɔnyii ɔ́salaku ɔlaaƒɔ koƒo kunwi na ɔ́nwu ɔ́sala útédu uwi ɔni na bɔnyii bɔmmɔ bɔ́ƒɔ ɔlaaƒɔ ɔmmɔ ƒui na úƒu."
40013034	Agba kemo na Yesu úti ɔ́su bekyuli bammɔ ala amɛni ƒui. Útetemi útete-ma ɔni na ɔɔɔdi lɛgba na úbo.
40013035	Ɔ́bla lɛni kalɛ na lɛla lɛni na Katɔti kenye udiene ɔ́su úse libo lite lɛni uwi ɔni na ɔ́su ɔnini, "Ndubutemi lite-ma na agba kemo. Na ndubudie ala ani na baaagyi ɔ́si kayawi kalɔ kesiekɔ ƒui lɛtina-ma."
40013036	Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ bekyuli bammɔ kudɔ na úsie kaduli. Amu na nwuna batɛyane bammɔ bébo-nwu kudɔ na básu-nwu banini, "Die lɛgba lɛni na ébo na livo lɛni na bágya bákya edula kemo lɛlɔ mmɔ te-bu."
40013037	Yesu údie kalɔ ɔnini, "Ukyuli ɔni nákya edula abuni ammɔ ndi ami ɔni ndi Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi.
40013038	Na kemo kammɔ ndi kayawi. Na ebi abuni ammɔ ndi Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma bekyuli. Livo lɛmmɔ ndi bekyuli bani ndi ukisine ɔmmɔ badi.
40013039	Na ukisine ɔni nágya livo lɛmmɔ ndi ɔbɔnsamu. Na edula bɔƒɛ uwi ndi kayawi kawɔlɔkɔ. Na edula baƒɛne bammɔ ndi Katɔti batu.
40013040	"Na kalɛ na baasála livo na baakyula-ni ni, lɛni kani na ɔdubo buse na kayawi kawɔlɔkɔ.
40013041	Ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, ndubɔtala mina batu na bedie ala ani mɔɔyá na bɔɔbla ekpidi ku ekpidi bablane ƒui bedie Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ.
40013042	Badubuti anya ku-ma ƒui batákya lɛgyavonku kemo. Mmɔ na keku ku animi bɔdu bɔkya!
40013043	Na Katɔti bekyuli ama badubukeye aani ɔƒɛ na bana Katɔti ɔma. Si bɛɛyɔ́ ni, biti lɛla lɛni lɛ́su mɛni!
40013044	"Katɔti lɛga bɔdi bɔ́ƒɔ kuye aani lɛlakɛ libendi lɛdi. Uwi ɔdi kemo ni, ukyuli ɔdi útákɛ lɛlakɛ lɛdi na béti bábala na kemo kadi. Mmɔ na ɔ́sɔku ala úbi lɛlakɛ lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ. Na ana kubiti ɔsu ni, úsie útéti nwuna ala ani ƒui na úbo úye, na únwini úsie útéye kemo kammɔ."
40013045	Yesu ɔ́su ɔnini, "Katɔti lɛga bɔdi buse aani lɛla lɛni náƒɔ kuye geen. Uwi ɔdi ni, uyedine ɔdi ɔɔwia asɛɛ ebi ani náƒɔ kuye geen.
40013046	Na ka útákɛ kɔni ntulo ana ƒui ni, úti ala ani ƒui nse-nwu úye na útéye kɔsɛɛ kebi kammɔ.
40013047	"Amu na Katɔti lɛga bɔdi buse aani kalɛ na asawu bewine badi baabla. Asawu bewine badi béwi asawu na ɛpu ɔdi kemo na bédie ketu kemo lɛna lidu lidu.
40013048	Na ka asawu ɔmmɔ úyi ku lɛna ni, báni asawu ɔmmɔ béboku ɛpu kɔtu na bélie kalɔ na baaƒuna lɛna lɛmmɔ. Beeti lɛna lɛbuni lɛmmɔ teewi kɔgyigyɛ kemo na beebó lɛni naaadia teewiakun.
40013049	Lɛni kani na kayawi kawɔlɔkɔ kadubo buse. Katɔti batu badubɔƒuna bekyuli babuni balɛku bekpidi akɔ.
40013050	Na bebo bekpidi bammɔ bakya lɛgyavonku kemo. Mmɔ na keku ku animi bɔdu bɔkya."
40013051	Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, "Bínu ala ani ƒui na lɛ́su-mii mɛni kalɔ?" Na ama lɛnɔ bédie kenye banii, "Ɛɛn."
40013052	Na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, "Amu ni, ala ɔtinane biala ɔni mɔɔtɛya Katɔti lɛga bɔdi lɛlɔ ala ni, use aani ɔtɔlati ɔni mbo ala awɔdi ku ala akukudi lɛnɔ. Na uudie-nya keyi."
40013053	Amu ka Yesu úbo agba amɛni ƒui ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ mmɔ.
40013054	Na úsie útéduo nwuna ɔma. Mmɔ na ɔ́tina ala na bana kasalakɔ. Na bekyuli bani nénu ala ani na ɔ́tina ni, ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye. Amu na béye lɛlɔ banini, "Wɛ na ɔ́kɛ nwuna lɛlati lɛmɛni ɔ́siku? Na wɛ na ɔ́kɛ ɔyikun ɔni na ɔda ɔɔbla akɔla budie taatina amɛni udu?
40013055	Ɔɔɔdi ɔnwine ɔmɛni kani ubidi na ɔdi yoo? Na ɔɔɔdi uni lɛnɔ ndi Maria, na nwuna banwani bananabi lɛnɔ ndi Yakobo ku Yoseƒ ku Simon ku Yuda, na nwuna banwani belekubi lɛnɔ nkya-bu akɔ mɛni yoo?
40013056	Na ɔma néte-nwu lɛlati ku ɔyikun ɔmɛni udu?"
40013057	Na ɔ́yu-ma ɔkplu ka baƒɔ-nwu, anwuɔsu béni-nwu. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Katɔti kenye udiene ni, ubo ɔbu na kesi kesii ntu nwuna ɔma ku nwuna kadi bekyuli akɔ kani."
40013058	Na ka bátaƒɔ Yesu bátadi ɔsu ni, útabla akɔla budie taatina pii na Nasaret.
40014001	Lebo lɛmmɔ kemo ni, Herode ɔni mɔɔdi lɛga na Galilea únu Yesu lɛlɔ litemi.
40014002	Na ɔ́su nwuna badi ɔnini, "Ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔdi Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane ɔni násɔ únwini úbo úlie ngba. Ɔmɛni ɔsu na ubo ɔyikun ɔni na ɔɔbla akɔla budie taatina lɛni."
40014003	Ɔ́su lɛni ɔsika Herode ɔmɛni náya na béƒie Yohane na ɔ́ya bényimi-nwu na béti-nwu bákya aban ɔtɔ. Herode ɔ́bla ɔmɛni na ɔnwani Ƒilipo ulekudi Herodia ɔsu.
40014004	Ɔsika Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane ɔ́su Herode ɔnini, "Katɔti ɔda bubo buléte kuƒi ka nka eti ƒula ɔnwani ulekudi Herodia."
40014005	Anwuɔsu Herode ɔ́yɔ ka badu Yohane. Nsu ɔ́yia bekyuli pii bani ƒui nénu-nwu ala bɔtina, ɔsika bana ƒui baabu Yohane aani Katɔti kenye udiene.
40014006	Limeyi lɛdi ni, Herode ɔɔdi nwuna lɛwɔmeyi na ɔ́lɔ bekyuli pii. Na Herodia ubidi ulekubi úbatɔ na bekyuli bammɔ anumi. Ɔmɛni ɔ́da Herode ebiti geen.
40014007	Na ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ Katɔti ɔnini, "Mɔɔsu-ɔ ka ndubute-ɔ lɛla biala na éye."
40014008	Amu na uni ɔ́kya ugblebi ɔmmɔ kakwɛ na lɛla lɛni na uye lɛlɔ. Anwuɔsu útéye ɔnini, "Mɔɔwia Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane lili ka eti-ni akya lɛkyami kemo ete-mi mɛni kani."
40014009	Lɛla lɛni na ulekubi ɔmɛni úye ɔ́bla Herode kɔnyana. Nsu ɔ́si kenye kani na úse na benengu bammɔ ƒui anumi ɔsu ni, ɔ́su ka babla ugblebi ɔmmɔ lɛyɔla bete-nwu.
40014010	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔ́tala ukyuli ɔdi na útékulo Yohane lili na aban ɔtɔ katɛnkɔ mmɔ.
40014011	Úti lili lɛmmɔ ɔ́kya lɛkyami lɛdi kemo úboku ugblebi ɔmmɔ na anwu lɛnɔ úti-ni úsienku uni.
40014012	Yohane batɛyane bébo bébeti nwuna ukpine ɔmmɔ bátáva, na bésie bátásu Yesu.
40014013	Uwi ɔni na Yesu únu ka bádu Yohane ni, úti ɔkɔlɔ na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie kesii kani nábɛ. Nsu ka bekyuli bénu kesii kani na ɔkya ni, bana pii bási bana lɛma kemo bakɛ lɛgba bátasiaku-nwu na mmɔ.
40014014	Amu na Yesu ɔ́lɛ ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo. Na uwi ɔni na ɔ́nu bekyuli pii bammɔ ni, bana lɛlɔ lɛ́kywi-nwu kaƒɔ na ɔ́bwi bani muuƒi.
40014015	Uwi ɔni na useyi uwi údu ni, nwuna batɛyane bákpɛ béde-nwu na básu-nwu banini, "Kadi káasa káwɔlɔ, na mɛni lɛnɔ kágyunku ɔma. Anwuɔsu die bekyuli bamɛni ulu pla na beteesie akpaklɔ kemo na bakɛ lɛla lɛdi beye badi."
40014016	Yesu údie kenye ɔnii, "Utalɛka batɔlɔ. Amii alati bite-ma lɛla lɛdi na badi."
40014017	Batɛyane bammɔ básu-nwu banini, "Adila ani bubo kani ndi bodobodo ɛlɔ ku kɔkpaku inyɔ."
40014018	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Biti-nya biboku-mi mɛni."
40014019	Na ɔ́su bekyuli bammɔ ƒui ɔnii belie kalɔ na livo lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ mmɔ. Amu na úti bodobodo ɛlɔ ku kɔkpaku inyɔ bɔmmɔ na ɔ́talaku anumi ɔ́nu katɔ na ɔ́gya Katɔti enu. Na ɔ́bwɛ bodobodo ɔmmɔ kɔkɛ kɔkɛ úte nwuna batɛyane. Na batɛyane bammɔ lɛnɔ béti béte bekyuli bammɔ.
40014020	Na bana ƒui bádi na bémo. Na nwuna batɛyane básala kɔkɛ wɛlɛ wɛlɛ kɔni bádi bébu na úyi kɔgyigyɛ leevu inyɔ.
40014021	Na bekyuli bani nádi adila ammɔ babla aani banana mpimu ɛlɔ. Nsu bátaka beleku ku banamu.
40014022	Mmɔ kani na Yesu ɔ́ya na nwuna batɛyane bákɔ béduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo ɔnii bataatɔ beteesie ɛpu ɔmmɔ ɔvi ɔni ngye. Na anwu ɔ́ƒɔ lɛlɔ ɔ́kya kama uudie bekyuli bammɔ ulu.
40014023	Ɔmɛni kama ni, anwu lɛti ɔ́kɔ úsie kɔbi lili na útákpali katɔ. Na usien ɔmmɔ ƒui ni, anwu lɛti pɛ kani nkya mmɔ.
40014024	Na uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, na ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ úusie ɔgyu. Na ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ubendi ɔni muukpó taasiaku-nwu ɔsu ni, ntu bɔmmɔ buubó ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ taavinku.
40014025	Na lɛdigye aani lɛdɔ ɛtɛ ku lɛdɔ ɛku ntɛ ni, Yesu úsie ntu anumi na úbo nwuna batɛyane bammɔ kudɔ.
40014026	Uwi ɔni na bánu ka ɔkɛ ntu anumi mmɔ ni, ɔ́gyu-ma ɔtɔtɔ na banii, "Ukpine na ɔdi!" Anwuɔsu bése kalɔ baava momoomo!
40014027	Nsu Yesu útemiku-ma kɔnakunwi ɔnii, "Bɛkɛ kayi! Ami na ɔdi! Bitayia!"
40014028	Amu na Petro ɔ́su ɔnini, "Si awɔ geen na ɔdi ni, su-mi anii ami lɛnɔ nsie ntu bɔmmɔ anumi na libo-ɔ kudɔ."
40014029	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Bo!" Na Petro ɔ́lɛ ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo na ɔkɛ ntu bɔmmɔ anumi úsela Yesu kudɔ.
40014030	Nsu ni, ka ɔ́nu ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ɔni muukpó momoomo ni, liƒu lɛ́da-nwu na úse kalɔ ɔɔnyi ntu bɔmmɔ kemo. Amu na Petro ɔ́va ɔ́su ɔnini, "Blɔti, die-mi!"
40014031	Kɔnakunwi Yesu únine kɔnu ɔ́da-nwu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Ƒula bɔƒɔtaadi na mina lɛlɔ bútedu! Bi ɔsu na ƒula kasusu kaabla inyɔ inyɔ?"
40014032	Na bana inyɔ ƒui bétéduo ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo, na ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́da bukpo ɔ́ya.
40014033	Amu na batɛyane bammɔ bábu-nwu geen. Na básu-nwu banini, "Katɔti Ubidi geen na adi!"
40014034	Ka bétédu ɛpu ɔmmɔ ɔvi ngye ni, bátáyu na Genesaret kalɔ lɛlɔ.
40014035	Mmɔ ni, bekyuli bammɔ bánu Yesu báti. Na bébo-nwu kudu kaduɛ. Anwuɔsu bekyuli pii bététiku balɛne bani nkya amadɔ mmɔ ƒui béboku Yesu kudɔ.
40014036	Na balɛne bammɔ bévele-nwu banii ɔya na betuku nwuna awu kɔtu. Na bani ƒui nétuku-nwu awu kɔtu ni, bana lɛlɛ lɛ́ba-ma.
40015001	Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi ku ɔda bubo ala batinane badi bási Yerusalem bébo Yesu kudɔ na bébeye-nwu banii,
40015002	"Bi ɔsu na ƒula batɛyane balásiaku bula bati kuuku ɔda bubo kama? Baláƒɔ bana enu kalɛ na bula ɔdi ɔɔtina asa na baadi."
40015003	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Na bi ɔsu na biiní na biládi Katɔti ɔda bubo lɛlɔ na bɛsiaku bina bati kuuku ala bɔtina kama?
40015004	Katɔti ɔnini, 'Bu ƒula ɔti ku ƒula uni. Na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔlɔ ɔti iye uni lɛnyikpi lɛdi ni, ɔlɛka badu-nwu kukpi kɔtɔ.'
40015005	Nsu bɛɛtina ka ukyuli ɔdi ɔni mbo lɛla lɛni na ɔkana na uti ubunku ɔti iye uni nsu ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Líti lɛla lɛmɛni líse kenye lite Katɔti' ni,
40015006	ɔ́kɛ kenyekɔ kalɛ na uni na ulabu na ulebunku nwuna bawɔne lɛnɔ. Ulu ɔmɛni lɛlɔ na bɛɛsia teeni Katɔti ɔda bubo kalɛ na bɛsia bina bati bammɔ ala bɔtina kama.
40015007	Amii anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli! Lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesaia ɔ́su úse líbo líte lɛni na bina lɛlɔ geen.
40015008	Katɔti ɔnini, 'Bekyuli bamɛni bada bana kenye kani baabu-mi, nsu balayɔ-mi na bana kayi kemo.
40015009	Keeke kani na baabla-mi kabla. Baatina kayawi lɛlɔ ala aani si mina ɔda bubo bɔdi.' "
40015010	Amu na Yesu ɔ́lɔ bekyuli pii bammɔ úboku nwuna kudɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bise atu na binu ɔmɛni biti bɛtɛya lɛla.
40015011	Adila ani muuduo ukyuli kaƒɔ ni, ɔɔɔdi anya mɔɔyá na uusé lɛlɔ. Mmomu etemila ani mɔɔlɛ́ taasi-nwu kenye kemo mɔɔyá na uusé lɛlɔ."
40015012	Amu na nwuna batɛyane bammɔ bébo-nwu kudɔ na bábasu-nwu banini, "Agyi ka ala ani na ásu mɛni éduo Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ geen?"
40015013	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Mina ɔti ɔni nkya katɔ ɔdubɔgyu kugyii biala na útalɛ ɔvaakun.
40015014	Anwuɔsu bitakpete-ma. Bese aani banumbwɛne bani mɔɔtɔnku banumbwɛne bamba. Na si ɔnumbwɛne ɔtɔnku nwuna ɔkpana ɔnumbwɛne ni, bana inyɔ ƒui badubɔnu beduo ubu kemo."
40015015	Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Die adila ani muusé lɛlɔ lɛgba lɛmɛni kalɔ tina-bu."
40015016	Na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Ɔmua use amii lɛnɔ susuusu aani bana kalɛ kani?
40015017	Binu ɔmɛni kalɔ ka ni, lɛla ndi lɛla lɛni muuduo ukyuli kenye kemo ni, liiduo kaƒɔ kemo. Na kama ni, uudie-ni teewiakun.
40015018	Nsu ni, etemila ani mɔɔlɛ́ kenye kemo ni, ási kayi kemo. Na anya mɔɔyá na ukyuli uusé lɛlɔ.
40015019	Na kasusu kekpidi kani mɔɔyá na bekyuli baadú bekyuli, na baadi kɔsɔnɔ, na baabla lɛyalɛ ala, na beeyú, na baadá bekyuli kenye, na baalɔ bekyuli anyikpi ni, ana ƒui aasí kayi kemo.
40015020	Ala amɛni udu mɔɔyá na ukyuli uusé lɛlɔ. Nsu si ukyuli ɔdi útaƒɔ kɔnu aani kalɛ na Ƒarisiƒuɔ baatina kalɛ asa na ɔ́di ni, ɔmmɔ ulaya na uusé lɛlɔ."
40015021	Yesu ɔ́si mmɔ na úsie kalɛkɛ kani nde lɛma linengudi lɛni ndi Tiro ku Sidon.
40015022	Mmɔ ni, kalɛkɛ kammɔ uleku úbo Yesu kudɔ. Na úvele-nwu ɔnini, "Blɔti, Ɔga Dawid Uwɔ, nu-mi kɔnyana! Kɔyu kukpidi kɔdi kuukpóku mina ubi ulekubi na uubó abi geen!"
40015023	Nsu Yesu útakpete-nwu. Amu na nwuna batɛyane bébo bábasu-nwu banini, "Bɔku-nwu, ɔsika ɔsiaku-bu uutile-bu atu."
40015024	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Israelƒuɔ bese aani baƒonu bani náyii kalɛ. Na bana kudɔ kani na Katɔti ɔ́tala-mi."
40015025	Mmɔ na uleku ɔmɛni ɔ́lɛ-nwu akɔnkɔ kalɔ na úvele-nwu ɔnini, "Ati, bunku-mi."
40015026	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Ɔɔɔdia ka beti bebi adila bebo bewi bana bakpɛwe."
40015027	Uleku ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, "Ati, sɔsɔ na ɔdi. Nsu bakpɛwe lɛnɔ baadi adila kɔkɛ kɔni mɔɔsí bana unwoti kadikɔ teewi kalɔ."
40015028	Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Adi uleku ɔni náƒɔ ɔ́di geen! Ákɛ lɛla lɛni na aawia." Anwuɔsu uwi ɔmmɔ kemo kani ni, ubidi ulekubi ɔmmɔ ɔlɛ ɔ́ba-nwu.
40015029	Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ mmɔ na ɔkɛ Galilea Ɛpu ɔmmɔ kɔtu útákɔ lɛbinkpo lɛdi na ɔ́yu úlie kalɔ.
40015030	Bekyuli pii bébo-nwu kudɔ na badanku balɛne bani ndi bekyuli bani náƒɛ béwi kalɔ ku bani na lɛlɔ ekpo átasa-ma ku banumbwɛne ku bamumu ku bani muuƒi lɛlɛ bamba ƒui bébewi Yesu anumi na ɔ́bwi-ma.
40015031	Ɔni na bekyuli bammɔ bánu ka bamumu beetemi, na bani na lɛlɔ ekpo átasa-ma ása-ma, na bani náƒɛ bewi kalɔ beesié, na banumbwɛne lɛnɔ baanu ni, ɔ́bla-ma kalɛ kadi. Na bémwi Israel Katɔti.
40015032	Yesu ɔ́lɔ nwuna batɛyane úboku nwuna kudɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Kaƒɔ kaakywí-mi teete bekyuli bamɛni, ɔsika báakya-mi kudɔ emeyi atɛ sɔɔn. Na ɔƒaani ni, basɔ beeebo lɛla lɛdi na badi. Naaayɔ nnii muudie-ma ulu ku kɔka. Anumi adubɔvinku-ma si bakɛ ulu."
40015033	Nwuna batɛyane béye-nwu banini, "Wɛ na bɔdubɔkɛ adila na ketele kemo mɛni bute bekyuli pii bamɛni na udu-ma?"
40015034	Yesu úye-ma ɔnii, "Adila adi ese?" Na básu-nwu banii, "Bodobodo maatɛ ku kɔkpaku blii suɛ kani nse."
40015035	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su bana ƒui ɔnii basɔ belie kalɔ.
40015036	Na úti bodobodo maatɛ ku kɔkpaku kɔmmɔ na ɔ́gya Katɔti enu, na ɔ́bwɛ ɔdi biala kɔkɛ kɔkɛ na úti úte nwuna batɛyane. Na ama lɛnɔ béle-nwu béte bekyuli bammɔ.
40015037	Na bana ƒui bádi na bémo. Amu na batɛyane bamɛni básala adila kɔkɛ kɔni na bádi bébu ƒui na kúyi kɔgyigyɛ maatɛ.
40015038	Na banana bani nádi adila ammɔ bumomo bɔdubɔbla mpimu ine. Nsu bátaka beleku ku banamu.
40015039	Amu na Yesu údie bekyuli bammɔ ulu na úduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Magadan kalɛkɛ lɛlɔ.
40016001	Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku Sadukiƒuɔ badi bésie Yesu kudɔ banii betéwi-nwu kenye benu. Anwuɔsu básu-nwu banii, "Bla akɔla adi na bɔnu bɔti nwaa ka Katɔti kudɔ na ási sɔsɔ."
40016002	Nsu Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Si ɔƒɛ úsela kanukɔ na kayaa kégyie ni, bɛɛsu bɛnii kadi kadubo bɔdia kɔnaadi.
40016003	Na ɔtanta tutuutu si ɔƒɛ ɔ́tu ɔdubo na kadi kese suu ni, bɛɛsu bɛnii ɔnantu ɔdubo bɔna. Bɛɛkana na bɛɛtí kalɛ na kadi kadubo buse si bɛ́nu kayaa. Nsu bilákana na bɛnu ala ani mɔɔtina uwi ɔni na Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ɔdububo bɛti!
40016004	Amii, ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli bekpidi bani mɔɔlɛ́ Katɔti kama ni, bɛɛwia ka lɛbla akɔla budie taatina na bɛnu. Nsu naaabla! Akɔla budie taatina ani kani na bɛdubɔnu ndi ani nálɛ na Yona lɛlɔ." Anwuɔsu ɔ́gyu ɔ́tɔlɔ-ma kudɔ.
40016005	Amu na batɛyane bammɔ ku Yesu béti ɔkɔlɔ ɔdi na bávia bésie ɛpu ɔmmɔ ɔvi. Ka bédu mmɔ ni, bánu ka báyiƒla na béteti adila adi baaada.
40016006	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bɛnu kaduɛ na Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku Sadukiƒuɔ bɔnyii bɔni baakya ala kemo na uuƒu lɛlɔ."
40016007	Amu na bése kalɔ beeye lɛlɔ banii, "Ɔni na búteti adila adi bɔɔɔda ɔsu na ɔɔsu ɔmɛni?"
40016008	Na ka Yesu ɔ́ti lɛla lɛni baasu ɔsu ni, úye-ma ɔnini, "Bi ɔsu na bɛɛtɛmiku lɛlɔ ɔ́si adila ani na bɛɛɛda ɔsu? Bina bɔƒɔtaadi na mina lɛlɔ bɔ́sɔ. Útabla-mii tɔ nwaa?
40016009	Bilényimo kalɛ na líti bodobodo ɛlɔ líte banana mpimu ɛlɔ na bádi bémo ku kɔgyigyɛ ɛlɛ kɔni na kɔkɛ kɔmmɔ kúyi?
40016010	Na bodobodo maatɛ ɔni na líti líte banana mpimu ine nɔɔ? Bilényimo kɔgyigyɛ ɛlɛ kɔni na kɔkɛ kɔmmɔ kúyi?
40016011	Dɛ na ɔ́bla na bilenu kalɔ bɛnii ɔɔɔdi adila lɛlɔ litemi na mɔɔsu uwi ɔni na lɛ́su nnii, 'Bɛnu kaduɛ na Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku Sadukiƒuɔ bɔnyii bɔni baakya ala kemo na uuƒu lɛlɔ'?"
40016012	Mmɔ asa na ɔ́bla batalane bammɔ nwaa ka ɔɔɔdi bɔnyii bɔni baakya ala kemo na uuƒu lɛlɔ ɔda na uubó-ma. Mmomu ni, ala ani na Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku Sadukiƒuɔ baatina na ɔda.
40016013	Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bésie kalɛkɛ kani nde Kaesarea Ƒilipi amadɔ. Mmɔ na úye nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, "Ɔma na bekyuli baasu banii ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndi?"
40016014	Bédie kenye banii, "Badi banii awɔ ndi Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane. Na badi lɛnɔ banii awɔ ndi Katɔti Kenye Udiene Elia. Na babambadi lɛnɔ baasu banii awɔ ndi Yeremia iye Katɔti kenye bediene bammɔ akɔ ɔbambadi ɔdi."
40016015	Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, "Na amii nɔɔ? Ɔma na bɛɛsu ka ami ndi?"
40016016	Mmɔ na Simon Petro údie kenye ɔnini, "Awɔ ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ. Na adi Katɔti ɔni nli ngba uwi ƒui Ubidi."
40016017	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Lɛlɔ litaayɔ awɔ, Simon, Yona ubidi. Ɔsika ɔɔɔdi ɔyawine nédie litemi geen lɛmɛni ɔ́tina-a. Mmomu mina Ɔti ɔni nkya katɔ nédie ɔ́tina-a.
40016018	Anwuɔsu mɔɔsu-ɔ ka awɔ ndi Petro ɔni kalɔ ndi lɛtakpɛ. Na lɛtakpɛ lɛmɛni lɛlɔ na ndubuti mina baƒɔtaadine lɛtu linyine aani ɔtɔ kalɛ. Na kukpi ɔyikun muedi ulakana-ma lɛlɔ bɔdi.
40016019	Na ndubuti Katɔti lɛga bɔdi ɔyikun lite-ɔ. Na lɛla lɛni na bɛdubɔƒɛnimi na kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔsia-ni kɔnu. Na lɛla lɛni na bɛdubɔnyonu na kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔsia ani lɛnɔ kɔnu."
40016020	Amu na Yesu úbo nwuna batɛyane ɔda ɔnii, "Bitasu ukyuli ɔdi bɛnii ami ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ."
40016021	Ɔ́si uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Yesu úse kalɔ ɔɔsu nwuna batɛyane bammɔ nwaa ɔnii, "Ɔlɛka lisie Yerusalem na ntébo abi na kadi benengu ku bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane enu kemo. Badubɔdu-mi. Nsu limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔgyila-mi ɔlɛku kekpine na nsɔ mbelie ngba."
40016022	Petro ɔ́da-nwu úsienku kɔmadɔ na ɔ́dɔnku-nwu. Na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Pɛ kuse Blɔti! Tuo lisuo lɛmmɔ wiakun! Ɔmmɔ utebo-ɔ lɛlɔ kudii!"
40016023	Yesu únwini kɔnakunwi ɔ́su Petro ɔnini, "Satan! Gyu tɔlɔ-mi lɛlɔ! Éti lɛlɔ eenwíni ukisine na mina lɛlɔ. Aayɔ́ akpanku-mi atákya likpidi kemo! Kasusu kani na éti mɛni kátasi Katɔti kudɔ. Mmomu bekyuli kasusu kadi."
40016024	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, "Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔwia ka ɔsiaku-mi kama ni, ɔlɛka udie nwuna lɛlɔ atu na ubo abi na ɔsiaku-mi kama.
40016025	Ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔwia ka ɔƒɔ nwuna lili ngba ute lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubɔyila-mu. Na ukyuli biala ɔni nányonu nwuna ngba ka ɔsiaku-mi kama ni, ɔdubɔkɛ ngba geen.
40016026	Bi kɔsia na ukyuli ɔdubɔkɛ si ɔ́kɛ kayawi ala ƒui na ɔ́yila ngba geen bɔmmɔ. Munuu bi na ukyuli ubo na uti ɔvumana na ɔkɛ ngba geen bɔmmɔ?
40016027	Ɔsika ami ɔni ndi Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndububo ku Katɔti batu na Katɔti ɔyikun kemo. Na ndubɔƒɔ ukyuli biala kayu na nwuna kabla kenye.
40016028	Mɔɔsu-mii nwaa ka ni, bekyuli badi bakya mɛni ɔni na belekpi watálɛ uwi ɔni na bánu ka Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi úbo aani ɔga kalɛ."
40017001	Emeyi aku kama ni, Yesu útiku Petro ku Yakobo ku ɔnwani Yohane úsienku kɔbi kɔdi nákuku lili. Na bátákya mmɔ ama lɛti.
40017002	Ɔƒɛni ka baanu ni, kavumana kadi kébo Yesu lɛlɔ. Nwuna anumi eekeye aani ɔƒɛ, na nwuna adala lɛnɔ eekeye na aatu anumi.
40017003	Amu na batɛyane ɛtɛ bamɛni bánu Mose ku Elia ka baatɛmiku Yesu.
40017004	Na Petro ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, "Blɔti, ɔdia si bɔ́sɔ bɔkya mɛni! Si átuna ni, ndubɔtu nvo ɛtɛ. Ƒula kadi kenwi ku Mose kadi kenwi ku Elia lɛnɔ kadi kenwi."
40017005	Uwi ɔni na ɔɔsu ɔmɛni ni, uyɔlɔ ɔni muukeye úbewi-ma lɛlɔ. Na bénu Katɔti lɛdi na uyɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo na lɛ́su lɛnini, "Ɔmɛni ndi mina ubi ɔyɔne unwi pɛ ɔni mɔɔƒɔ́-mi anu geen. Binu-nwu litemi."
40017006	Uwi ɔni na batɛyane ɛtɛ bamɛni bénu lɛdi lɛmɛni ni, liƒu lɛ́da-ma geen na báyu bébi kalɔ.
40017007	Yesu úbo-ma kudɔ na úbetuku-ma na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, "Bɛta binye. Bɛsɔ bitayia."
40017008	Amu ka bákɔliku anumi katɔ ni, bátanu ukyuli ɔdi ntu Yesu kani.
40017009	Na ka bási baayu kɔbi kɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, Yesu úbo-ma ɔda ɔnini, "Bitasu ukyuli ɔdi lɛla lɛni bɛ́nu mɛni wetédu uwi ɔni na ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi mata malɛ bekpine akɔ."
40017010	Amu na batɛyane bammɔ béye Yesu banii, "Bi ɔsu na ɔda bubo ala batinane baasu banii ɔlɛka Elia ɔka bubo asa na ala amɛni abalɛ?"
40017011	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Sɔsɔ na ɔdi ka Elia ɔka bubo na ubaklibi lɛla biala use.
40017012	Nsu mɔɔsu-mii nnii Elia úubo, nsu bekyuli bátanu-nwu bátati. Na bábla-nwu kalala kalɛ na baayɔ́. Lɛni kani na badubɔbla ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛnɔ kalala."
40017013	Mmɔ na batɛyane bammɔ báti ka Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane na ɔda.
40017014	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane báyu bébo bekyuli pii bammɔ kudɔ ni, ɔnana ɔdi úbo Yesu kudɔ na úbalɛ-nwu akɔnkɔ kalɔ.
40017015	Na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Ati, nu mina ubi ɔnanabi ɔmɛni kɔnyana. Uuƒi kalɛteebo na uubó abi geen. Uwi pii ni, uubuli teeduo ɔgya kemo ku ntu kemo lɛnɔ.
40017016	Líti-nwu líboku ƒula batɛyane, nsu bátakana na babwi-nwu."
