40017017	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Amii, ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli, bi ɔsu na bilaƒɔ-mi taadi na bɛɛyu atu ɔkplu? Uwi ɛlɛ sɔɔn na ndubɔkɛku-mii kayi? Naaakana na makya-mii kudɔ uwi biala! Biti ɔnamu ɔmmɔ biboku-mi mɛni!"
40017018	Amu na Yesu ɔ́bɔku kɔyu kukpidi kɔni nli ɔnamu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ kemo na kɔ́lɛ! Na ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-nwu kɔnakunwi.
40017019	Amu na batɛyane bammɔ bébo Yesu kudɔ na bébeye-nwu banii, "Bi ɔsu na bútakana kɔyu kukpidi kɔmmɔ bɔbɔku bɔlɛku?"
40017020	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Bina bɔƒɔtaadi na mina lɛlɔ bɔ́sɔ. Mɔɔsu-mii nwaa nnii si banii bibo bɔƒɔtaadi bɔni nse aani edula kebi kebliidi ƒui ni, nka bɛdubɔkana na bɛsu kɔbi kɔmɛni bɛnii, 'Gyu mɛni, ténye ngye!' Na kɔdubusie. Lɛla biala liiibo na bilakana bɔbla!
40017021	Nsu amu ntu aakpali katɔ na elie kɔka asa na adubɔkana na abɔku kɔyu kukpidi kɔmɛni udu alɛku."
40017022	Uwi ɔni na batɛyane bammɔ ƒui bábasa na Galilea ni, Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Badubo ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi buti bɔkya bekyuli enu kemo,
40017023	na badu-mi. Na emeyi atɛ kama ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔgyila-mi ɔsiku bekpine akɔ." Mmɔ ni, batɛyane bammɔ enu áƒɛ-ma.
40017024	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bébo bébeduo Kapernaum ni, Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ kuyi baƒɔne bébeye Petro banii, "Bina ala ɔtinane lɛnɔ uuyi kakpakɔ kuyi kɔmmɔ?"
40017025	Petro údie kenye ɔnii, "Uuyi nii!" Amu ka Petro útéduo bana kaduli ni, mmɔ kani na Yesu ɔ́ka-nwu buye ɔnini, "Simon, bi ndi ƒula kasusu? Ɔma bene na ɔlɛka baƒɔ kuyi bete baga na kayawi kamɛni? Kalɔ kammɔ bekyuli munuu baƒɔ?"
40017026	Na Petro údie kenye ɔnini, "Baƒɔ." Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Ɔmɛni ɔɔtina ka kalɔ kammɔ bekyuli ama útalɛka baƒɔ ɔdi.
40017027	Nsu ka bulayɔ bɔnii bɔɔƒiɔ́ ukyuli ɔdi ɔsu ni, teesie ɛpu kɔtu na atátu ɔdaa. Na kabɛ kedeedi kani na adubɔni alɛku ni, adubɔnu ligulabi lɛdi na nwuna kenye lɛni ndubudu ami ku-ɔ kakpakɔ kuyi bɔƒɔ. Die-ni, na atáƒɔ-ma bula kuyi kayu."
40018001	Uwi klukui ɔdi kama ni, batɛyane bammɔ bébo Yesu kudɔ na bébeye-nwu banii, "Ɔma náƒɔ kuye utulo na Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma?"
40018002	Amu na Yesu ɔ́lɔ ɔnamu blii suɛ ɔdi úbenyene-ma anumi.
40018003	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Mɔɔsu-mii nnii si bítavumana udu na binwini aani banamu ni, bileduo Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma kudii.
40018004	Ukyuli ɔni náƒɔ kuye utulo ƒui na Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ni, anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni néboku lɛlɔ kalɔ na únwini aani ɔnamu ɔmɛni udu.
40018005	"Na ukyuli ɔni maƒɔ ɔnamu blii suɛ aani ɔmɛni udu na mina lɛnyi kemo ni, ɔ́ƒɔ ami lɛnɔ.
40018006	Nsu si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́ya na banamu bamɛni akɔ ɔdi únwini kama ɔ́kya nwuna bɔƒɔtaadi na mina lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔni-nwu kɔtu geen utulo si béti kukɔ bonwu báƒala-nwu ɔkwɛ na bátányina-nwu ɛpu kemo.
40018007	"Bɔbwɛ muute kayawi ɔsika ala adi akya-ka kemo ani ndubɔya na bekyuli benwini kama bakya bana bɔƒɔtaadi na mina lɛlɔ. Ala ammɔ udu adubo bɔkya uwi biala bɔdi. Nsu ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na ala amɛni adubɔsia eduo bekyuli akɔ ni, bɔbwɛ ndi anwu ɔdi.
40018008	Anwuɔsu si ƒula kɔnu iye ƒula ɔgba mɔɔyá na aabla likpidi ni, kulo-ku vaakun. Ɔdia ute-ɔ si ebo kɔnu kunwi iye ɔgba unwi na ákɛ ngba ƒui utulo ka ebo enu ku lɛgba na Katɔti uti-ɔ ɔkya lɛgyavonku kemo.
40018009	Na si ƒula lɛnumi mɔɔyá-a na aabla likpidi ni, die-ni vaakun. Ɔdia ute-ɔ si ebo lɛnumi linwi na akɛ ngba ƒui kemo utulo ka Katɔti uti-ɔ utákya lɛgyavonku kemo.
40018010	"Bɛnu kaduɛ kalɛ na bilanu banamu wɛlɛ wɛlɛ bamɛni ɔdi bɛnii ɔɔɔdi lɛla lɛdi na bina akɔ. Ɔsika mɔɔsu-mii nwaa nnii bebo Katɔti batu bani nnye mina Ɔti anumi na katɔ uwi biala.
40018011	Ɔsika Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi úbo ɔnii ubaƒɔ bekyuli bani náyii ngba geen ulu ɔmmɔ.
40018012	"Si ukyuli ɔdi ubo baƒonu eti anyɔ na kunwi kɔ́yii ni, lɛla lɛni na ɔdubo bɔbla ndi ka ɔdubɔda liti ku aavlene-yaalenwi bammɔ unyene kɔbi kaƒɔna mmɔ na bataadi. Na usie utáwia unwi ɔni náyii mmɔ.
40018013	Na mɔɔsu-mii nnii si ɔ́nu-ku ni, lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ-nwu na kuna lɛlɔ utulo baƒonu liti ku aavlene-yaalenwi bani nátayii mmɔ lɛlɔ.
40018014	Lɛni kani na bina ɔti ɔni nkya katɔ ulawia ka banamu wɛlɛ wɛlɛ bamɛni ɔdi ɔyii.
40018015	"Si ɔƒɔtaadine ɔkpana ɔ́ƒiɔ-ɔ ni, sie-nwu kudɔ na etédie atina-nwu ka ɔ́ƒiɔ-ɔ. Na ya na ɔmɛni ɔbla bina inyɔ ntɛ lɛti kɔtɛ. Si únu kalɔ ni, awɔ ku-nwu bɛsɔ bilie kɔnwa ku kɔnwa.
40018016	Nsu si útenu lɛlɔ kalɔ ni, ya na ukyuli unwi iye ɛlɛɛ benuku-ɔ litemi lɛmmɔ aani kalɛ na bénweni na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka akɛ nkyuli inyɔ iye ɛtɛ na benye-ɔ litemi kama.
40018017	Na si mmɔ lɛnɔ útenu kalɔ ni, ya na baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa lɛmmɔ bati. Na si mmɔ lɛnɔ útenu lɛlɔ kalɔ ni, die-nwu atu aani ukyuli ɔni na útaƒɔ útadi iye likpidi ɔblane ɔni na útenwini kayi.
40018018	"Anwuɔsu mɔɔsu bina ƒui nnii lɛla lɛni lɛlɔ na bitile kuƒi na kayawi mɛni ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔsia-ni kɔnu. Na lɛla lɛni lɛlɔ na bite kuƒi na kayawi mɛni ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔsia-ni kɔnu lɛnɔ.
40018019	"Na nsɔ mɔɔsu-mii lɛnɔ nnii si bina inyɔ bɛ́bla kenye kenwi na kayawi mɛni na bɛ́sala bivele lɛla lɛdi ni, mina ɔti ɔni nkya katɔ ɔdubɔbla-ni ute-mii.
40018020	Ɔsika kesii kani na nkyuli inyɔ iye ɛtɛ bása na mina lɛnyi kemo ni, ami lɛnɔ nkya-ma akɔ."
40018021	Amu na Petro ɔ́kpɛ úde Yesu na úye-nwu ɔnini, "Blɔti, si mina ɔƒɔtaadine ɔkpana ɔɔƒiɔ́-mii ni, kɔlɛ na ɔdi ka liti lɛkyiɛ-nwu? Liti lɛkyiɛ-nwu laa maatɛ?"
40018022	Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Ɔɔɔdi maatɛ kani! Mmomu liti ku aavlanyɔ akpa maatɛ na ɔlɛka eti akyiɛ-nwu.
40018023	"Ɔmɛni ɔsu na Katɔti lɛga bɔdi buse aani ɔga ɔni náwia ka ɔbuku nwuna bekyuli bani mɔɔbla-nwu kabla akunta.
40018024	Uwi ɔni na úse kalɔ kani na béti ɔnana ɔdi ɔni nda-nwu lɛlakɛ bonwu kayu béboku.
40018025	Na ka ɔnana ɔmmɔ uuubo lɛla lɛni na ɔkana kayu kammɔ bɔƒɔ ɔsu ni, ɔga ɔmmɔ údie lɛdi ɔnii beti anwu ku ulekudi ku nwuna bebi ku ala ani ƒui na ubo beye na baƒɔ kayu kammɔ.
40018026	"Mmɔ na ɔnana ɔmɛni ɔ́lɛ ɔga ɔmmɔ akɔnkɔ kalɔ na úvele-nwu ɔnini, 'Kɛku-mi kayi na ndubɔƒɔ-ɔ kana ƒui!'
40018027	Ɔnana ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ lɛ́kywi ɔga ɔmmɔ kaƒɔ, anwuɔsu úti kayu kammɔ ƒui ɔ́kyiɛ-nwu na ɔ́nyonu-nwu na ɔ́tɔlɔ.
40018028	"Amu ka ɔnana ɔmɛni ɔ́lɛ ni, útánu nwuna ɔblane ɔkpana ɔni nda-nwu abuli atɛ lɛyuƒɔla. Amu na úƒie-nwu na ɔ́da-nwu limɔ ɔ́mana momoomo na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ƒɔ-mi kayu kani na ada-mi!'
40018029	"Na nwuna ɔkpana ɔmmɔ úvele-nwu ɔnini, 'Kɛku-mi kayi na ndubɔƒɔ-ɔ kana ƒui!'
40018030	"Nsu úbulo na ɔ́ya na bákya-nwu ɔtɔ watálɛ uwi ɔni na wakana kayu kammɔ ƒui bɔƒɔ.
40018031	Na ka nwuna kabla bablane bakpana bánu lɛla lɛni nálɛ ni, kasusu kékpoku-ma na bésie bátásu ɔga ɔmmɔ ala ani ƒui nébo.
40018032	"Anwuɔsu ɔga ɔmmɔ ɔ́tala na bátálɔ kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ béboku na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ukyuli ukpidi na adi. Ka évele-mi anii nti nkyiɛ-ɔ ni, líti lɛla lɛdi biala lɛ́kyiɛ-ɔ.
40018033	Lɛni kani na ɔdi ka awɔ lɛnɔ anu ƒula ɔkpana kɔnyana aani kalɛ na lɛ́nu-ɔ kɔnyana.'
40018034	Na ɔga ɔmmɔ ɔ́kɛ kɔnyi geen na úti-nwu úte ɔnii bakya-nwu ɔtɔ na bani-nwu kɔtu utédu uwi ɔni na waƒɔ kayu kammɔ ƒui."
40018035	Amu na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ kɔtɛ kɔmmɔ ɔnini, "Lɛni kani na mina Ɔti ɔni nkya katɔ ɔdubɔbla bina akɔ ɔdi biala si biléti taakyiɛ bina baƒɔtaadine bakpana ɔ́si bina kayi kemo ƒui."
40019001	Ka Yesu ɔ́su ala amɛni ƒui ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ Galilea na úsie Yudea kalɛkɛ na Yordan ketu ɔvi.
40019002	Na bekyuli pii badi básiaku-nwu kama na ɔ́bwi-ma lɛlɛ na mmɔ.
40019003	Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi bésie-nwu kudɔ banii bétéwi-nwu kenye benu. Na béye-nwu banini, "Mose ɔda bubo úte kuƒi ka ɔnana ɔsia kasusu biala lɛlɔ na ɔnyonu ulekudi?"
40019004	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Bítaka na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka kalɔ kesekɔ ni, Katɔti údie ɔnana ku uleku?
40019005	Na Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, ɔnana ɔdubɔda ɔti ku uni use na uti lɛlɔ utámana ulekudi na bana inyɔ babla ɔlɔna unwi.'
40019006	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, basɔ baaadi nkyuli inyɔ. Mmomu bénwini ukyuli unwi. Anwuɔsu útalɛka ukyuli ugyingya lɛla lɛni na Katɔti úti ɔ́sala."
40019007	Mmɔ na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ básu-nwu banii, "Amu na bi ɔsu na Mose úte kuƒi ɔnii ɔnana ute ulekudi ɔku ka ɔnyonu-nwu na udie-nwu ulu?"
40019008	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Mose úte-mii kuƒi ɔnii bɛnyonu bina beleku na bina atu ɔkplu ɔsu. Nsu ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ ni, na uuuse lɛni.
40019009	Na ɔƒɛni ni, mɔɔsu-mii nnii si ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́nyonu ulekudi na ɔɔɔdi kɔsɔnɔ na ɔ́di asa na útéti uleku ɔbambadi ni, ɔ́di kɔsɔnɔ."
40019010	Amu na Yesu batɛyane básu-nwu banini, "Si lɛni na kɔgya ku kule litemi lise ni, si ɔnana úteti uleku muedi ni, na ɔdia utulo."
40019011	Na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Ɔɔɔdi ukyuli biala ndubɔkana na ɔbla ala ani na bɛɛsu mɛni, amu ntu bekyuli bani na Katɔti úte-ma kani.
40019012	Ɔsika lɛla lɛni ɔsu na banana beléti beleku lɛdanku kasusu lidu lidu. Badi ni, lɛni na báwɔ-ma. Na badi ama ni, bekyuli nábla-ma lɛni. Na badi lɛnɔ ni, beléti beleku ɔsika baawia ka belie ngba bataabla Katɔti lɛga bɔdi kabla ɔsu. Si bɛɛkana ni, bitaabla lɛla lɛni na lɛ́su mɛni."
40019013	Bekyuli badi béti banamu béboku Yesu kudɔ banii uti enu ɔsia-ma lɛlɔ na ɔkpali katɔ ute-ma. Nsu ni, nwuna batɛyane bádɔnku bekyuli bammɔ.
40019014	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su batɛyane bammɔ ɔnini, "Bɛya na banamu bammɔ bebo-mi kudɔ na bitetile-ma kuƒi. Ɔsika Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kese kete bekyuli bani néboku lɛlɔ kalɔ aani banamu bamɛni udu kalɛ."
40019015	Yesu úti nwuna enu ɔ́sia-ma lɛlɔ na ɔ́kpali katɔ úte-ma. Nwuna kama ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ.
40019016	Na uwi bamba kemo ni, okloƒu ɔdi úbo Yesu kudɔ na úye-nwu ɔnini, "Ɔtinane, bi ndia na ɔlɛka lɛbla asa na Katɔti ute-mi ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii?"
40019017	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Lɛla lɛni ndia na ɔlɛka babla lɛlɔ litemi na eeye-mi? Katɔti lɛti pɛ ndia. Na si aayɔ́ anii Katɔti ute-ɔ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii ni, di nwuna ɔda bubo ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ."
40019018	Mmɔ na ɔnana ɔmmɔ úye-nwu ɔnini, "Ɔda bubo bɔmani?" Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Tadu ukyuli, tadi kɔsɔnɔ, teyu, tada ƒula ukyulikpana kenye,
40019019	bu ƒula ɔti ku ƒula uni, na ayɔ ƒula ukyulikpana aani ƒula lɛlɔ kalɛ."
40019020	Amu na okloƒu ɔmɛni údie kenye ɔnini, "Lɛ́ɛdi ɔmmɔ ƒui lɛlɔ. Bi lɛnɔ násɔ ébu na lɛbla?"
40019021	Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Si aayɔ́ anii aabla sɛɛn awɔlɔ ƒui ni, sie na etéti ala ani ƒui na ébo eye. Na eti egulabi ammɔ ete bawabane, na adubɔkɛ lɛyuƒɔla na katɔ. Ɔmmɔ kama asa na ebo abasiaku-mi kama."
40019022	Nsu ka okloƒu ɔmmɔ únu lɛla lɛmɛni ni, ebiti átada-nwu na ɔ́gyu ɔ́tɔlɔ, ɔsika ubo egulabi pii.
40019023	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, "Mɔɔsu-mii nwaa nnii ɔdubɔyu balakɛne ɔkplu asa na beduo Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ.
40019024	Nsɔ mɔɔsia kama lɛsu-mii nnii úse ubo ɔlakɛne ɔkplu geen asa na wakana na weduo Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ utulo kalɛ na ebuo ɔni nébomo utulo ƒui ɔvi udila liƒi."
40019025	Uwi ɔni na batɛyane bammɔ bénu ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye. Anwuɔsu béye banii, "Amu si use lɛni ni, ɔma ndubɔkana na ɔkɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii?"
40019026	Amu na Yesu ɔ́nu-ma anumi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Ɔyawine biala ulakana ɔmɛni bɔbla. Nsu Katɔti anwu ni, ɔɔkana lɛla biala bɔbla."
40019027	Amu na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Nu! Bɔ́da lɛla lɛdi biala búse na bɔsiaku-ɔ kama. Bi na bɔdubo bɔkɛ?"
40019028	Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Amii bɛkɛ kayi. Uwi ɔni na ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi mebo na mina lɛlɔyɔ kemo na nlie mina lɛgaboku lɛlɔ na kayawi kawɔdi kammɔ kemo ni, bina leevu-inyɔ bani nsiaku-mi lɛnɔ bɛdubulie agaboku lɛlɔ na bɛdi Israelƒuɔ adukpa leevu-inyɔ lɛlɔ.
40019029	Na ukyuli biala ɔni néni nwuna kaduli iye banwani bananabi iye banwani belekubi iye uni iye bebi iye imo ka ɔsiaku-mi ɔsu ni, ɔdubɔkɛ-nya akpa eti anyɔ utulo. Na Katɔti ɔdubute-nwu ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
40019030	Nsu ni, bekyuli pii bani ntɔ ɔƒɛni ni, badubɔvi bakpɛ kama. Na bani nkpɛ kama ɔƒɛni ni, badubɔvi batɔ."
40020001	"Katɔti lɛga bɔdi buse aani ɔmɛni kalɛ. Uwi ɔdi ni, ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́ta ɔtanta tutuutu ɔnii utáwia bekyuli badi na batuma nwuna kemo bete-nwu na limeyi lɛyuƒɔla kenye.
40020002	Kemo ɔlati ku kabla bablane bénu lɛlɔ kalɔ ka badubɔƒɔ limeyi lɛyuƒɔla, na bátɔlɔ bésie-nwu kemo.
40020003	"Uwi ɔni na úbo lɛdɔ yaalenwi ni, ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔ́sɔ úsie kuyeya na útánu banana badi ka benye ukpludi.
40020004	Anwuɔsu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Amii lɛnɔ biteesie mina kemo bitátuma na ndubɔƒɔ-mii kayu kani námanku bina kabla kammɔ.'
40020005	Anwuɔsu bésie kemo kammɔ. "Na ɔ́sɔ úsie kuyeya mmɔ útábla lɛni kani lɛdɔ leevu-inyɔ ku lɛdɔ ɛtɛ kemo.
40020006	Uwi ɔni na lɛdɔ ɛlɔ líbo ni, ɔ́sɔ úsie kuyeya mmɔ na útánu banana babambadi ka bénye mmɔ. Na úye-ma ɔnini, 'Bi nébo ɔsu na amii bilie mɛni ɔmwi limeyi limodi na bítabla kabla kadi?'
40020007	"Bédie kenye banii, 'Ukyuli ɔdi útete-bu kabla kadi ɔnii bɔbla.' "Anwuɔsu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Amu biteesie mina kemo.'
40020008	"Amu uwi ɔni na lɛdɔ ɛku líbo ni, kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ ɔ́su batumane bammɔ lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔnini, 'Lɔ batumane bammɔ ƒui na aƒɔ-ma kayu. Na ese kalɔ asi bekyuli bekplodi lɛlɔ atálɛ bedeedi lɛlɔ.'
40020009	"Amu na báƒɔ limeyi lɛyuƒɔla kayu béte bekyuli bani nébo useyi lɛdɔ ɛlɔ kemo.
40020010	Na uwi ɔni na údu bani néesie ɔtanta lɛdɔ ɛku lɛlɔ ni, básusu banii ama badubɔkɛ betulo bana bakpana. Nsu ama lɛnɔ ɔdi biala ɔ́kɛ limeyi kenye lɛyuƒɔla.
40020011	Na ka báƒɔ egulabi ammɔ ni, bése kalɔ baadɔnku kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ banii,
40020012	'Bekyuli bani nábla kabla ɔdɔ unwi ku abu bani nénye ɔƒɛ lɛlɔ limeyi limodi ƒui bɔ́ƒɔ lɛyuƒɔla linwi!'
40020013	"Amu na kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Bakpana, binu kalɔ. Ńtaƒiɔ-mii. Ami ku-mii ƒui búnu kalɔ bɔnii limeyi kenye kayu ndi bina lɛyuƒɔla.
40020014	Anwuɔsu bɛƒɔ bina lɛyuƒɔla na biteesie kaduli. Mɔɔyɔ́ ka lite bekyuli bekplodi bamɛni lɛyuƒɔla lɛni kani na líte-mii.
40020015	Mbo kuƒi na lɛblaku mina egulabi kalɛ na mɔɔyɔ́. Anwuɔsu ɔƒɛ utada-mii na mina lɛƒɔndia lɛlɔ.' "
40020016	Amu na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ ɔnini, "Lɛni geen na bekyuli bani ntɔ badubɔvi bakpɛ kama, na bani nkpɛ kama bavi batɔ."
40020017	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bákɔ bésela Yerusalem ni, úti-ma úsienku kɔƒɛlɛ.
40020018	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Binu, búsela Yerusalem kesii kani na badubuti ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi bakya bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane enu kemo. Na badubɔdu-mi kukpi kɔtɔ.
40020019	Na ama bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ badubuti-mi babla lɛmala, na bebo-mi, na bakana-mi bamana ugyii lɛlɔ na likpi. Nsu emeyi atɛ kama ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔgyila-mi ɔlɛku bekpine akɔ."
40020020	Amu na Sebedeo ulekudi útiku nwuna bebi inyɔ úsienku Yesu kudɔ ɔnii útevele-nwu kebunku.
40020021	Na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, "Bi na aawia?" Amu na uleku ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, "Mɔɔwia ka ese-mi kayi na si éduo ƒula lɛga kadikɔ na ete kuƒi na mina bebi bananabi inyɔ bamɛni belie ƒula kɔdianu kakɛ ku ƒula kɔmii kakɛ."
40020022	Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bɛɛɛgyi lɛla lɛni geen na biiye. Lɛbibo lɛni ndubo buti ni, amii lɛnɔ bɛdubɔkana-nya buti?" Amu na bedie kenye banii, "Ɛɛn, bɔdubɔkana."
40020023	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Sɔsɔ na ɔdi ka bɛdubɔkana-nya buti. Nsu liiibo kuƒi ka lidie ukyuli ɔdi nnii ulie-mi kɔdianu ku kɔmii. Kuliekɔ kɔmɛni kuse kute bekyuli bani na mina ɔti ɔ́klibi-ku úse."
40020024	Amu uwi ɔni na batɛyane leevu bakladi bénu ka banwani bammɔ baayɔ́ ka badi-ma lɛlɔ ni, béti kɔnyi geen!
40020025	Anwuɔsu Yesu ɔ́lɔ-ma ɔ́sala na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bɛgyi ka lɛlɔ badine bani mɔɔdi bekyuli bani nátaƒɔ bátadi lɛlɔ ni, bebo ɔyikun biala na bana lɛlɔ.
40020026	Nsu ɔɔɔdi lɛni na ɔlɛka use na amii baƒɔtaadine akɔ. Si bina akɔ ɔdi ɔɔyɔ́ ka ɔƒɔ lɛnyi ku ɔbu ni, ɔlɛka unwini kabla ɔblane ute bakladi.
40020027	Na si bina akɔ ɔdi ɔɔyɔ́ ka ɔbla udeedi ni, ɔlɛka ɔbla lɛlɔ aani ukyuli uyedi ute bakladi ƒui.
40020028	Lɛni na ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛ́bla. Ńtebo nnii babla mina kabla. Mmomu líbo mbabla kabla na liti mina ngba lɛƒɔ bekyuli pii lili kayu."
40020029	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bátɔlɔ Yeriko ni, bekyuli pii badi basiaku-ma.
40020030	Na banumbwɛne inyɔ badi belie ulu kudɔ na bénu ka Yesu ɔ́si ɔɔví. Amu na bése kalɔ baava banii, "Blɔti, Ɔga Dawid Uwɔ! Nu-bu kɔnyana!"
40020031	Bekyuli bammɔ básu banumbwɛne bammɔ banii baba lɛsɛ. Nsu ni, báva momoomo bébu banii, "Blɔti, Ɔga Dawid Uwɔ! Nu-bu kɔnyana!"
40020032	Yesu údi únye na ɔ́lɔ-ma úboku na úye-ma ɔnini, "Bi na bɛɛwia bɛnii mbla nte-mii?"
40020033	Amu na bédie kenye banini, "Ati, bɔɔyɔ́ ka aya na butaanu."
40020034	Amu na Yesu ɔ́nu-ma kɔnyana na útuku bana anumi. Na kɔnakunwi ni, bákana na baanu, na básiaku-nwu kama.
40021001	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bákpɛ béde Yerusalem na bétédu Betƒage na Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́tala nwuna batɛyane inyɔ na batɔ anumi.
40021002	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Biteesie lɛkpaklɔ lɛni ntɛ-mii lɛtɔtɔ mmɔ kemo. Mmɔ ni, bɛdubɔnu ebuo utine ɔni na bákya-nwu kabuli na ubidi unye-nwu kudɔ. Bidie-nwu kabuli na biti-ma biboku-mi.
40021003	Na si ukyuli ɔdi úye-mii lɛla lɛdi ni, bɛsu-nwu bɛnii, 'Blɔti mɔɔwia-ma.' Na badubɔnyonu-ma bete-mii kɔnakunwi."
40021004	Ɔmɛni ɔ́lɛ lɛni aani kalɛ na Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi ɔ́su úse ɔnii,
40021005	"Bɛsu Sion bekyuli bɛnii, 'Bɛnu! Bina ɔga ɔdubo-mii kudɔ. Úboku lɛlɔ kalɔ na ulie ebuo ala utine ubi lɛlɔ ɔdubo.' "
40021006	Anwuɔsu batɛyane inyɔ bammɔ bésie na bátábla aani kalɛ na Yesu ɔ́tala-ma ɔnii batábla.
40021007	Na béti ebuo utine ɔmmɔ ku ubi béboku, na béti bana adi béwi-ma lɛlɔ, na Yesu ɔ́kɔ úlie ubi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.
40021008	Na bekyuli bammɔ beete yiidu na béti bana adi béwi ulu lɛlɔ. Na badi lɛnɔ békulo kuke béwi ulu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.
40021009	Amu na bekyuli bani ntɔ ku bani nkpɛ ƒui bése kalɔ baava taasu banii, "Yiidu! Ɔga Dawid Uwɔ ɔmmɔ ɔ́si ɔdubo o-o! Bimwi anwu ɔni ndubo na Blɔti lɛnyi kemo! Hosiana!"
40021010	Uwi ɔni na Yesu úduo Yerusalem ni, nwuna lɛlɔ litemi lɛ́ƒɔ ɔma ɔmmɔ ƒui. Na bekyuli béye lɛlɔ banii, "Ɔma na ɔdi?"
40021011	Na bekyuli bamba bédie kenye banini, "Ɔmɛni ndi Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesu ɔni nási Nasaret na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ!"
40021012	Yesu úsie útéduo Katɔti kakpakɔ na ɔ́gya bekyuli bani nkya mɔɔdi kuye na mmɔ ɔ́lɛku kaduli kammɔ kemo. Údi kasiakɔ kani lɛlɔ na bekyuli bani mɔɔvumana kɔlɔ bamba egulabi teete bekyuli mmɔ úbo. Na údi bani muuyé babloduma lɛnɔ eboku úbo.
40021013	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bénweni na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Badubɔlɔ mina kaduli banii kesii kani na badubɔkpali katɔ.' Nsu amii bíti-ka bínwini beyune kabɛkɔ!"
40021014	Amu na badi béti banumbwɛne ku bani naaakana busie kaduɛ béboku kakpakɔ kaduli mmɔ, na Yesu ɔ́bwi-ma.
40021015	Na ka bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bánu akɔla ani na Yesu ɔdaku bɔbla ku banamu bani mɔɔva taasu banii, "Bimwi Ɔga Dawid Uwɔ" mmɔ ni, béti kɔnyi geen.
40021016	Anwuɔsu béye Yesu banii, "Eenú lɛla lɛni na banamu bammɔ baasu mɛni?" Na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Muunú. Na ngyi lɛnɔ ka bɛ́ka ɔmɛni na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka ni, 'Ábla banamu ku bebiwɔ anii beti bumwi bɔni náƒɔ kuye geen bete-ɔ.' "
40021017	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bammɔ kudɔ na úsie útéduo Betania útátɛ.
40021018	Na kadi kégye ɔtanta ɔni na ɔ́sɔ únwini ɔdubo ni, kɔka kubo kɔɔda-nwu.
40021019	Na ka ɔ́nu kɔdingyii kɔdi na ulu kudɔ mmɔ ni, údeyi úsie mmɔ. Nsu útanu lɛla lɛdi útetulo kuna evete. Anwuɔsu ɔ́su kugyii kɔmmɔ ɔnini, "Asɔ alanwu ebi adi kudii lɛnɔ." Kɔnakunwi ni, kɔdingyii kɔmmɔ kúse kalɔ kɔɔyɛyɛ.
40021020	Ka batɛyane bammɔ bánu lɛni ni, kasusu kéƒu-ma. Na béye banini, "Bi náya na kɔdingyii kɔmɛni kúkpi kɔnakunwi lɛni?"
40021021	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii si bɛ́ƒɔ bɛ́di na bina kasusu keeese inyɔ inyɔ ni, bɛdubɔkana lɛla lɛni na lɛ́bla kɔdingyii kɔmɛni bɔbla. Nsu ɔɔɔdi ɔmɛni lɛti. Mmomu ni, bɛdubɔkana na bɛsu kɔbi kɔmɛni muedi bɛnii, 'Gyu mɛni téduo ɛpu kemo,' na ɔdubɔlɛ lɛni.
40021022	Na lɛla biala lɛni na bɛdubuye Katɔti na bɔƒɔtaadi kemo ni, bɛdubɔkɛ-ni."
40021023	Amu na Yesu únwini úbo Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ. Na ka ɔɔtina ala ni, Katɔti bakpane benengu ku Yudaƒuɔ benengu bammɔ bébeye-nwu banii, "Kenyekɔ kamani na ebo asa na aabla ala amɛni udu? Na ɔma néte-ɔ kenyekɔ kammɔ?"
40021024	Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Bɛya na liye-mii lɛla lɛdi linu. Na si bídie kenye kaduɛ ni, asa masu-mii kenyekɔ kani na mbo asa na mɔɔbla ala amɛni.
40021025	Wɛ na Yohane ɔ́kɛ kenyekɔ kani na ubo asa na ɔ́kpila bekyuli ntu ɔ́siku? Katɔti kudɔ na kási munuu ukyuli kudɔ na kási?" Amu na bése kalɔ beeye lɛlɔ teenu banii, "Bi na ɔlɛka bɔsu? Si bɔ́su bɔnii kási Katɔti kudɔ ni, ɔdubuye-bu ɔnii, 'Bi ɔsu na bítaƒɔ Yohane bítadi?'
40021026	Nsu si bɔ́su bɔnii ukyuli kudɔ na ɔ́kɛ-ka ɔ́siku ni, bɔɔyia ka bekyuli badubɔbla-bu lɛla lɛdi, ɔsika bana ƒui báƒɔ bádi banii Katɔti kenye udiene na ɔdi."
40021027	Anwuɔsu na bédie kenye banini, "Bɔɔɔgyi kesii kani na ɔ́kɛ kenyekɔ kammɔ ɔ́siku." Mmɔ na Yesu lɛnɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Lɛni kani na ami lɛnɔ lɛɛɛdubo-mii bɔsu kenyekɔ kani mbo asa na mɔɔbla ala amɛni udu."
40021028	"Dɛ na bɛɛkali taasiku litemi lɛmɛni lɛlɔ? Ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya na ubo bebi bananabi inyɔ. Ɔ́su unengudi ɔnini, 'Ubi, teesie tátuma na mina kemo ɔmwi.'
40021029	"Amu na ubi ɔmmɔ údie ɔti ɔda ɔnii, 'Lɛɛɛdubo busie.' Nsu kama ni, ɔ́vumana kasusu na úsie.
40021030	"Amu na ɔti úsie útásu ubidi unyɔdi lɛnɔ lɛni kani. Na anwu ɔ́tuna, nsu útesie.
40021031	"Bana kemo ɔmani nábla ɔti ɔmmɔ lɛyɔla?" Bédie kenye banii, "Ubi unengudi ɔmmɔ." Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Mɔɔsu-mii nwaa nnii beyune ku bayalɛ baaví-mii teeduo Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma!
40021032	Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane úbo úbatina-mii ulu buni ɔni lɛlɔ na bɛsia, nsu bítaƒɔ-nwu bítadi. Nsu beyune ku bayalɛ ama báƒɔ bádi. Na ina ka bɛ́nu ɔmɛni muedi ni, bítavumana bina kasusu na bɛƒɔ-nwu bɛdi.
40021033	"Binu lɛgba lɛbambadi lɛdi. Ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́kya dii ɔni mbo adingyii kemo kani na ɔ́tu awodu ɔ́mana. Ɔ́bla ntɛ kebulokɔ na ɔ́tu ɔgyumanane keliekɔ. Amu na úti kemo kamɛni úte bekyuli badi ɔnii bataanu-ka lɛlɔ, na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie ulu.
40021034	Uwi ɔni na egyiibi ammɔ édu bude ni, kemo ɔlati ɔmɛni ɔ́tala nwuna kabla bablane ɔnii batáƒɔ nwuna kadikɔ beboku-nwu.
40021035	"Kemo lɛlɔ banune bamɛni béƒie kabla bablane bamɛni na bébo unwi na bádu unwi, na bébo unwi lɛnɔ atabi bádu.
40021036	Amu na kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ ɔ́sɔ ɔ́tala kabla bablane babambadi bani mmomo ntulo bedeedi. Na bábla ama lɛnɔ aani kalɛ na bábla bedeedi bammɔ.
40021037	Kawɔlɔkɔ ni, ɔ́tala ubidi ɔlati ɔ́kya-ma. Na ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́di ka badubɔbu mina ubidi anwu.'
40021038	"Nsu uwi ɔni na lɛlɔ banune bamɛni bánu ubidi ɔmɛni ni, básu lɛlɔ banini, 'Aanu kemo ɔlati ubidi ɔni ndi nwuna ala ɔdine. Bɛya na bɔdu-nwu na buƒie nwuna ala bɔƒɔ.'
40021039	Anwuɔsu béƒie-nwu na bebo balɛku kemo kammɔ kemo, na bádu-nwu."
40021040	Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, "Ɔƒɛni ni, bi na bɛɛbu ka kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ ɔdubo kemo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ bɔbla si ɔ́si úbo?"
40021041	Bédie kenye banini, "Ɔdubɔdu bekyuli bekpidi bammɔ ulikplu kemo na uti kemo kammɔ ute lɛlɔ banune babambadi bani ndubuti edula beboku-nwu si údu edula ɔƒɛwi."
40021042	Na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bínu na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka ni, 'Lɛtabi lɛni na batune béni báva banii lɛɛɛdia ni, ani mmomu nébenwini lɛtabi lɛni náƒɔ kuye litulo na atabi ƒui akɔ. Katɔti nábla lɛla bonwu lɛmɛni. Na lɛ́ƒɔ-bu anu geen!' "
40021043	Amu na Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Anwuɔsu mɔɔsu-mii nnii Katɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ nwuna lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ na bina kudɔ bileduo-ka! Na ɔdubuti ute bekyuli bamba bani ndubɔbla nwuna lɛyɔla.
40021044	Na ukyuli biala ɔni mebuli mayu lɛtabi lɛni béni báva mmɔ lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubɔdu lɛlɔ. Na si lɛtabi lɛmmɔ lɛnɔ lɛ́lɛ líbo ɔdi lɛlɔ ni, lɛdubutu-nwu lɛbwɛ kpɛtɛ kpɛtɛ."
40021045	Na ka bakpane benengu ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ bénu Yesu agba amɛni ni, báti ka ama na ɔda.
40021046	Anwuɔsu báwia ka beƒie-nwu. Nsu baayia bekyuli pii bammɔ, ɔsika bana ƒui baabu Yesu aani Katɔti kenye udiene.
40022001	Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́tina bekyuli ala na agba kemo ɔnii,
40022002	"Katɔti lɛga bɔdi buse aani ɔmɛni. Uwi ɔdi ni, ɔga ɔdi ɔ́di uleku buti limeyi lɛdi úte ubidi.
40022003	Ɔ́tala nwuna kabla bablane ɔnii batásu bekyuli bani na ɔ́lɔ ɔnii bebo limeyi kadikɔ mmɔ na bebo. Nsu béni na banii belebo.
40022004	"Anwuɔsu ɔ́tala kabla bablane babambadi ɔnii batásu bekyuli bammɔ banii, 'Limeyi lɛni bɔdubo bɔdi lídu! Bɔ́ɔdu bebuo bani ƒui na bɔdubuti bútaanu-mii kama. Na báaklibi lɛla biala bése. Anwuɔsu biteebo uleku ketikɔ!'
40022005	"Nsu bana ɔdi biala útabu nwuna bɔlɔ bɔmmɔ. Mmomu bátɔlɔ bésie kesii kani na ɔdi biala ɔɔyɔ́. Ɔdi ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie nwuna kemo. Na ɔdi lɛnɔ úsie kuye kadikɔ.
40022006	Na babambadi lɛnɔ béƒie kabla bablane bammɔ na bébo-ma na bádu-ma.
40022007	Ɔga ɔmmɔ ɔ́kɛ kɔnyi geen, na ɔ́tala nwuna bekpone na bátádu bekyuli badune bammɔ ƒui na bákyula bana ɔma.
40022008	"Amu na ɔ́lɔ nwuna kabla bablane na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Mina ubi uleku buti limeyi lɛmmɔ bɔdi uwi údu. Nsu bekyuli bani na lɛ́lɔ liboku limeyi lɛmmɔ kadikɔ ni, bátamanku bétete limeyi lɛmmɔ.
40022009	Anwuɔsu biteesie kuye ekpo ekpo ƒui na bitálɔ bekyuli bani na bɛdubɔnu ƒui bɛnii bebo limeyi kadikɔ mɛni.'
40022010	Amu na kabla bablane bammɔ bésie kuye ekpo ekpo ƒui bátálɔ ukyuli biala na bánu béboku. Bekyuli bekpidi ku babuni ƒui béyi ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ.
40022011	"Na ka ɔga ɔmmɔ úduo úsie utánu bekyuli bani nlie kadikɔ mmɔ ni, ɔ́nu ɔnana ɔni naaakya uleku ketikɔ limeyi bɔdi awu.
40022012	Na ɔga ɔmmɔ úye-nwu ɔnini, 'Ɔkpana, dɛ na ɔ́bla asa na ébo mɛni na aaakya uleku ketikɔ limeyi bɔdi awu?' Nsu útakana kenye budie.
40022013	"Amu na ɔ́su nwuna bagyumanane mmɔ ɔnini, 'Bibo kɔgba bɛda-nwu enu ku lɛgba, na bibo-nwu bɛlɛku bitákya kasuudikɔ. Mmɔ na keku ku animi bɔdu bɔdubɔkya.' "
40022014	Na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ lɛgba lɛmɛni ɔnini, "Katɔti ɔɔlɔ bekyuli pii ka baƒɔ-nwu badi, nsu ɛlɛɛ kani na ɔ́ƒuna údie-ma akɔ."
40022015	Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi bátása na bábla kasusu banii betéwi Yesu kenye benu na bawia-nwu litemi.
40022016	Anwuɔsu bátala bana batɛyane badi ku bekyuli bani nsiaku Herode kama bákya Yesu. Na ka bésie ni, básu-nwu banini, "Ala ɔtinane, bɔgyi ka ese siin na aatina Katɔti bɔƒɔtaadi ulu ɔmmɔ geen, ɔsika alánu ukyuli anumi taabla lɛla lɛdi. Na alákpete bekyuli asula lɛnɔ.
40022017	Anwuɔsu, su-bu ƒula kasusu. Bula ɔda bubo buute kuƒi ka butaaƒɔ kuyi teete Romaƒuɔ Ɔga Unengudi munuu útalɛka butaaƒɔ?"
40022018	Nsu Yesu ɔ́ɔnu bana lɛkwɛ likpidi ɔ́ti ɔsu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Amii anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli! Bi ɔsu na bɛwia-mi litemi?
40022019	Bɛtina-mi kaplɛ kani na biiti taaƒɔ kuyi kɔmmɔ na bɔnu." Amu na béti ɔdi béboku-nwu.
40022020	Mmɔ na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, "Ɔma na báta básia mɛni, na ɔma lɛnyi nsia mɛni?"
40022021	Amu na bédie kenye banini, "Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare na ɔdi." Anwuɔsu Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Biti lɛla lɛni ndi Kaesare lɛdi bite Kaesare. Na biti lɛla lɛni ndi Katɔti lɛdi bite Katɔti."
40022022	Ka bénu ɔmɛni ni, kasusu kéƒu-ma na bátɔlɔ-nwu kudɔ.
40022023	Na limeyi lɛmmɔ kani lɛlɔ ni, Sadukiƒuɔ bani mɔɔsu banii bekpine basɔ baláta bébo Yesu kudɔ.
40022024	Na bébeye-nwu banini, "Ala ɔtinane, Mose ɔ́su-bu ɔnii si ɔnana ɔdi úkpi na ɔ́da ulekudi úse na beeebo bebi ni, na ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔnwani ɔnanabi uti ukpinele ɔmmɔ. Na anwu ku-nwu bawɔ bebi. Na beti bebi bammɔ babla aani ɔnana ɔni nsɔ neeebo mmɔ bebi.
40022025	Amu na uwi ɔdi ni, banwani bananabi maatɛ badi bákya mɛni. Ɔnanabi unengudi úti uleku, na bátawɔ asa na ɔnanabi ɔmmɔ úkpi. Na nwuna ɔnwani ɔnanabi ɔni nsia-nwu kama úti ukpinele ɔmmɔ.
40022026	Na ɔnanabi unyɔdi ku ɔtɛdi útálɛ maatɛdi lɛlɔ ƒui béti uleku ɔmmɔ ɔni anwu ku bana kemo ɔdi bátawɔ asa na békpi.
40022027	Na kawɔlɔkɔ ni, uleku ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ úbekpi.
40022028	Na ɔƒɛni ni, limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na bekpine badubɔsɔ bata ni, bana akɔ ɔmani ulekudi na uleku ɔmmɔ wenwini ka bana ƒui béti-nwu dii?"
40022029	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Bɛ́yii ulu ɔmmɔ geen! Ɔsika bilenu Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔmmɔ kalɔ, na bɛɛɛgyi lɛla lɛdi na Katɔti ɔyikun lɛlɔ.
40022030	Na si bekpine básɔ báta belie ngba ni, badubɔbla aani Katɔti batu na beleti beleku na belelie agya lɛnɔ.
40022031	Bítaka lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔ́su-mii ɔ́si kalɛ na bekyuli badubɔsɔ bata lɛlɔ? Katɔti ɔ́su ɔ́siku bina bati kuuku lɛlɔ ɔnini,
40022032	'Ami ndi Abraham Katɔti ku Isak Katɔti ku Yakob Katɔti!' Ɔmɛni ɔɔtina ka ama bani néekpi ni, bamua beli ngba. Anwuɔsu ɔdi ama lɛnɔ Katɔti."
40022033	Na ka bekyuli pii bammɔ bénu ala amɛni ni, bana kasusu kábla kalɛ kadi na ala ani na Yesu ɔ́tina ɔsu.
40022034	Uwi ɔni na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ bénu ka Yesu ala kenye budie bɔ́ya na Sadukiƒuɔ bammɔ básɔ bátakana na beye lɛla lɛdi ni, bábasala.
40022035	Na bana kemo unwi ɔni ndi ɔda bubo ala ɔtinane ɔ́wia ɔnii uuye Yesu litemi lɛdi na uti ɔkywɛ-nwu kakpagyuɛ. Ɔ́su ɔnini,
40022036	"Ala ɔtinane, ɔda bubo bɔmani ndi bunengudi ƒui na ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ ƒui akɔ?"
40022037	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Ɔlɛka bɛyɔ Unwoti ɔni ndi bina Katɔti ku bina kayi ƒui ku bina kɔyu ƒui ku bina kasusu ƒui.
40022038	Na ɔmɛni ndi ɔda bubo bunengudi ƒui. Na ɔdi uuutulo ɔmɛni.
40022039	Na ɔni nsɔ nsia lɛnɔ use aani udeedi ɔmmɔ kalɛ. Yɔ ƒula ukyulikpana aani ƒula lɛlɔ kalɛ.
40022040	Ɔda bubo inyɔ bɔmɛni lɛlɔ na Mose ɔda bubo ku Katɔti kenye bediene ala bɔtina ƒui bɔsia."
40022041	Ka Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi bása lisu ni, Yesu úye-ma litemi lɛdi ɔnini,
40022042	"Bi na bɛɛkali taasiku Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ? Na ɔma kaba kemo ubi na ɔdi?" Bédie kenye banii, "Ɔga Dawid kaba kemo ubi na ɔdi."
40022043	Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, "Si use lɛni ni, dɛ na ɔ́bla asa na Dawid ɔkɛnku Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun lɛlɔ na ɔɔlɔ-nwu ɔnii Ɔti? Na Dawid ɔmmɔ ɔlati ɔ́su ɔnini,
40022044	'Katɔti ɔ́su mina Ɔti ɔnini, "Sɔ lie-mi kɔdianu kakɛ wetédu uwi ɔni na maya na akɔliku ƒula lɛgba anya ƒula bekisine lɛlɔ." '
40022045	Na si Dawid ɔɔlɔ Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ɔnii Ɔti ni, dɛ na ɔ́bla na ɔ́sɔ ɔdi Dawid ɔmmɔ kaba kemo ubi?"
40022046	Bana akɔ ɔdi útakana na udie Yesu litemi lɛmmɔ kenye. Na ɔ́si limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, ɔdi ɔ́sɔ útakana na use kayi uye Yesu litemi lɛbambadi lɛdi.
40023001	Ɔmɛni kama ni, Yesu ɔ́tɛmiku bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ ku nwuna batɛyane.
40023002	Ɔ́su ɔnini, "Ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ ama ni, benye Mose kenye na bebo kuƒi kɔni na bedie Katɔti ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ kalɔ.
40023003	Anwuɔsu ɔlɛka bɛbla lɛla biala na básu-mii kaduɛ. Nsu ni, bitasiaku ala ani na baabla kama, ɔsika baládi ala ani baasu mmɔ lɛlɔ.
40023004	Kalɛ na beedie ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ kalɔ ni, ubo bekyuli ɔkplu geen ka badi-mu lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na baatɛ etila ku unu taasia bekyuli lili. Na balayɔ ka bakyaku-ma kɔnu na akɔsi-ma bude.
40023005	"Baabla lɛla biala kalɛ na bekyuli banu-ma aani Katɔti kabla bablane geen. Bɛnu ala ani na bébo báda bana atɛntɛ ku enubɔ na Bunweni Kedee etemila asia-nya lɛlɔ, ku kalɛ na bákya-nya na ébomo. Na bɛnu kakpakɔ ala ani na báta bámana ala abuni lidu lɛni bákya mmɔ lɛlɔ.
40023006	Baayɔ́ kuliekɔ kɔbuni bulie na emeyi kadikɔ ku kuliekɔ kunengudi bulie na Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ.
40023007	Baayɔ́ banii bekyuli beteebo kalɔ teegyele-ma na kuyeya na bataalɔ-ma banii Ala Ɔtinane.
40023008	"Na bɔƒɔtaadi ulu lɛlɔ ni, bitaya na bekyuli balɔ-mii Unwoti, ɔsika banwa na bɛdi bite lɛlɔ. Na Unwoti unwi pɛ kani na bibo.
40023009	Na bina akɔ ni, bitalɔ ukyuli ɔdi na kayawi mɛni bɛnii Blɔti, ɔsika Blɔti unwi pɛ na bibo. Na ɔkya katɔ.
40023010	Na bitalɔ ɔdi bɛnii Ɔtinane, ɔsika bina Ɔtinane unwi pɛ ɔni kani na bibo ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ.
40023011	Bina kemo ɔni mɔɔwia ɔnii ɔƒɔ lɛnyi ku ɔbu ni, ɔlɛka ɔbla aani kabla ɔblane.
40023012	Na ukyuli ɔni na ɔɔtalaku lɛlɔ katɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔyula-nwu kalɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni muuboku lɛlɔ kalɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔtalaku-nwu katɔ.
40023013	"Bɔbwɛ muute amii Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɛdi! Bɛ́kalɛ Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ulu bɛ́da bekyuli. Na amii alati biléduo, na biléte bekyuli bamba bani mɔɔkya ɔkplu lɛnɔ ulu na beduo.
40023014	Bɔbwɛ muute amii Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɛdi! Biisié bekpinele kudɔ ka bitébunku-ma, nsu bɛɛtɔ́lɔ-ma taaƒɔ-ma ala. Na bɛɛkpali katɔ gyɔlɔɔ taabu-ma kɔdɔlɔ. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, bina kɔtu bɔni bɔdubɔkɔ katɔ bubu!
40023015	"Bɔbwɛ muute amii Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɛdi! Bɛkɛ kayawi ekpo ekpo ƒui biitú lɛlɔ kalɛ na bɛkɛ ina ɔƒɔtaadine unwi bite Katɔti. Na si bɛ́kɛ ɔdi ni, bɛɛtina-nwu kalɛ na ubie na uduo lɛgyavonku lɛmmɔ kemo utulo amii alati ƒui!
40023016	"Bɔbwɛ muute amii banumbwɛne ulu batinane bani anumi nábwɛ! Bɛɛtina bɛnii, 'Si ukyuli ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ Katɔti kakpakɔ úse kenye kadi ni, linyese lɛmmɔ liiibo ɔkplu. Nsu si ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ sika ugyiedi ani nsia Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ úse kenye kadi ni, linyese lɛmmɔ lɛdubɔyu ɔkplu geen.'
40023017	Banumbwɛne badɔlɔdi! Bi náƒɔ kuye útulo, sika ugyiedi ɔmmɔ munuu Katɔti kakpakɔ kani mɔɔyá na sika ugyiedi ɔmmɔ ɔɔbla kedee?
40023018	Bɛɛtina lɛnɔ bɛnii, 'Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ Katɔti lɛkpabi úse kenye kadi ni, linyese lɛmmɔ liiibo ɔkplu. Nsu si ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ ala ani na béti básia lɛkpabi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ úse kenye ni, linyese lɛmmɔ lɛdubɔyu ɔkplu geen.'
40023019	Banumbwɛne geen na bɛdi! Bi náƒɔ kuye útulo, ala ani nsia lɛkpabi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ munuu lɛkpabi lɛni mɔɔyá na ala ammɔ aabla kedee?
40023020	Anwuɔsu ni, si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ lɛkpabi úse kenye ni, na linyese lɛmmɔ lɛdanku lɛkpabi lɛmmɔ ku ala ani nsia-ni lɛlɔ ƒui.
40023021	Na si ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ Katɔti kakpakɔ úse kenye ni, na linyese lɛmmɔ lɛdanku kakpakɔ kammɔ ku Katɔti ɔni keliekɔ ndi kakpakɔ kammɔ.
40023022	Na si ukyuli ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ katɔ úse kenye ni, nwuna linyese lɛmmɔ lɛdanku Katɔti lɛgaboku ku Katɔti ɔlati ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.
40023023	"Bɔbwɛ muute amii Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɛdi! Biiti kevoma kutu akyala ƒɛƒɛɛ ani bɛ́bla muedi lɛkpa leevudi teete Katɔti, nsu bíni na biládi ɔda bubo bɔni náƒɔ kuye geen butulo lɛlɔ. Na muna lɛlɔ bɔdi ndi kalɛ na bilanu bekyuli anumi bilabla lɛla lɛdi. Na bɛnu bekyuli kɔnyana. Na bɛdi lɛla biala ulu lɛlɔ bite bekyuli. Ala amɛni lɛnɔ na ɔlɛka bɛbla, na bitada ɔdi bitese.
40023024	Batɔnkune banumbwɛne bɛɛsia bina ɔdi anu na bɛɛtimi alɔlɔ blii suɛ na ntɛ anumi. Nsu bina ablala aatina ka biibweli kubweyi kɔni ntulo balɔlɔ bammɔ ƒui!
40023025	"Bɔbwɛ muute amii Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɛdi! Bɛɛƒɔ bina lɛɛƒɛɛ ku akyami kama na eekeye, nsu ana kemo eesé lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na bíyi ku ɔdivo ku ami lɛti lɛkɛ.
40023026	Awɔ Ƒarisini ɔnumbwɛne! Ka ƒula ɔɔƒɛɛ kemo bɔƒɔ, na nwuna kama lɛnɔ kadubukeye.
40023027	"Bɔbwɛ muute amii Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɛdi! Bise aani kɔƒiɔtɔ kɔni na bákwa-ku kama na kɔɔdia bɔnu. Nsu nwuna kemo ɔdi ukpine ɔni nébie na úbu ekubi ekubi.
40023028	Lɛni kani na bɛɛbla lɛlɔ aani bekyuli babuni na bekyuli anumi, nsu bíyi ku kenwini ku ekpidi lidu.
40023029	"Bɔbwɛ muute amii Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɛdi! Bɛɛtú kɔƒiɔtɔ kɔbuni teete Katɔti kenye bediene bani nélie siin, na bɛɛklibi-ku kaduɛ.
40023030	Na bɛɛsu ka, 'Si bula bati kuuku uwi na bulie ni, nka abu bulasiaku-ma kama na bɔdu Katɔti kenye bediene bammɔ.'
40023031	Nsu bina ala ani bɛɛbla mɔɔtina geen ka bekyuli bani nádu Katɔti kenye bediene bammɔ kaba bebi na bɛdi.
40023032	Anwuɔsu ni, bisie anumi na bɛwɔlɔ lɛla lɛni na bina bati kuuku bése kalɔ.
40023033	"Bekyuli bekpidi bɛdi! Bise aani balakpi ku bana bebi! Anwuɔsu ni, bɛɛɛdubo bɔkana na bikeli Katɔti kɔtu kɔni na ɔdubɔni-mii na lɛgyavonku kemo!
40023034	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, ndubɔtala Katɔti kenye bediene ku banundane ku Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane lɛkya-mii akɔ. Na ka biikisi-ma ɔsu ni, bɛdubɔkana badi bɔmana ugyii lɛlɔ na bekpi, na bibo badi kugyiimi na kasalakɔ, na bɛbɔku badi lɛnɔ bɛsiku ɔma unwi bisienku ɔma unyɔdi kemo.
40023035	Na bekyuli bani nse siin ubugya ɔni na bíwiakun ɔ́si Habel lɛlɔ útálɛ Barakia ubidi Sakaria ɔni na bina bati bádu-nwu na kakpakɔ ku lɛkpabi ntɛ mmɔ ni, ubugya ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔsi bina kadi bekyuli ƒui lɛlɔ.
40023036	Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ubugya buwiakun bɔmɛni bɔsia amii bani nlie ngba mɛni lɛlɔ.
40023037	"Yerusalem, Yerusalem! Awɔ muubó Katɔti kenye bediene ku bekyuli bani na Katɔti ɔ́tala ɔ́kya-mii atabi taadu. Kɔlɛ kɔlɛ sɔɔn mɛni na líbimi mina enu nnii mɔɔsála-mii aani kalɛ na akɔkɔ uledi uuti nwuna avwi teebi nwuna bebi lɛlɔ, nsu étenu kalɔ!
40023038	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Katɔti ɔdubudie ɔma ɔmɛni atu na ɔyii udu.
40023039	Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, ɔ́si ɔƒaani ni, bɛsɔ bɛɛɛdubo-mi bɔnu wetédu ka bɛdubɔsu bɛnii, 'Bimwi anwu ɔni ndubo na Blɔti lɛnyi kemo!' "
40024001	Ka Yesu ɔ́lɛ ɔ́si Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ ɔɔtɔlɔ ni, nwuna batɛyane bébo-nwu kudɔ na bakya baatina-nwu kakpakɔ lɛtɔ lɛmmɔ.
40024002	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bɛsia-ni anumi kaduɛ. Ɔsika mɔɔsu-mii nnii badubɔƒɛ lɛtɔ lɛmɛni ƒui, ɔni na lɛtabi lɛdi lilébu lilasia lɛkpanadi lɛlɔ muedi. Badubugyingya ana ƒui bewi kalɔ."
40024003	Uwi ɔni na Yesu úsie útélie Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ ni, nwuna batɛyane bébo-nwu kudɔ na básu-nwu banii ɔtina-ma uwi ɔni na ala amɛni adubɔlɛ ku ala abambadi ani lɛnɔ ndubɔlɛ na watina ka kawɔlɔkɔ kani na ɔdubɔsɔ ubo uwi údu.
40024004	Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bise anu kaduɛ na ukyuli ɔdi ulátɔlɔ-mii.
40024005	Bekyuli pii badubuti mina lɛnyi bebo babasu-mii banini, 'Ami ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ' na batɔlɔ bekyuli pii.
40024006	Bɛdubunu kekpo ku kekpo etemila. Nsu bitaya na ɔtɔtɔ ɔgyu-mii. Ɔdi ka ala amɛni ƒui udu alɛ, nsu ulátina ka kawɔlɔkɔ kammɔ kéedu tɔ.
40024007	Kalɔ kadi bekyuli badubɔta na bekpoku babambadi. Na lɛga kadikɔ kadubukpoku kabambadi. Na kɔka kɔdububo na ekpo ekpo. Na kalɔ lɛnɔ kadubo butaakunku na ekpo ekpo.
40024008	Ala amɛni ndubuse kalɔ aani kalɛ na kawɔƒɔ keesé uleku kalɔ ku bɔdu.
40024009	"Bina bekisine badubɔya na beƒie-mii bete ɔma benengu na batɛku-mii litemi. Na bani-mii kɔtu na badu-mii. Kadi ƒui bekyuli badubukisi-mii, ɔsika bɛdi mina batɛyane.
40024010	Bekyuli bani náƒɔ-mi bádi pii badubunwini kama bakya-mi uwi ɔmmɔ kemo. Na badubɔkya bana bakpana kakya na beteekisi lɛlɔ.
40024011	Bekyuli pii badubɔta banyi ɔkɔ banii ama ndi Katɔti kenye bediene na batɔlɔ bekyuli pii.
40024012	Likpidi bɔbla lɛdubo bumomo na baƒɔtaadine pii basɔ baláyɔ lɛlɔ.
40024013	Na ukyuli ɔni ndubɔkya ɔkplu utálɛ kawɔlɔkɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubute-nwu ngba ƒui.
40024014	Na bekyuli badubɔkɔ Katɔti lɛga bɔdi litemi buni lɛmmɔ lɛsa na kayawi ƒui kalɛ na ukyuli biala ɔkɛ kuƒi unu-ni asa na kawɔlɔkɔ kammɔ kedu.
40024015	"Na bɛdubɔnu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti uukisi na liisé lɛlɔ ka unye nwuna likpo kedee kalɛ na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Daniel únweni úse. Na amii bani mɔɔká ɔku ɔmmɔ ni, biduo-nwu kemo kaduɛ na binu-nwu kalɔ.
40024016	Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, amii bani nkya Yudea ni, ɔdi ka bikeli bisie abi lɛlɔ.
40024017	Na ukyuli ɔni nnye nwuna lɛsa lili ni, utayu utebo kalɔ ɔnii ubedie nwuna ala na ɔtɔ kemo.
40024018	Na ukyuli ɔni nkya kemo ɔsɔ utenwini utesie kaduli ɔnii utéti nwuna kɔdi.
40024019	Na baƒɔndane ku bebi beni bani nda bebi bani mɔɔnyimi ni, bana lɛlɔ lɛdubɔbla kɔnyana geen.
40024020	Bivele Katɔti bɛnii bukeli bɔmɛni butebo na kɔyɔ uwi iye lɛnwunameyi lɛdi lɛlɔ.
40024021	Ɔ́si kayawi kalɔ kesekɔ ni, lɛbibo libendi lɛmɛni udu lítebo tɔ kudii. Na nina udu ɔdi lɛnɔ ɔsɔ ulebo kudii.
40024022	Nsu ni, Katɔti ɔ́ɔƒana emeyi ammɔ. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, ukyuli ɔdi ɔsɔ uuubo ngba. Nsu bekyuli bani na Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna úse ɔsu na ɔdubɔƒana emeyi ammɔ.
40024023	Anwuɔsu si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Nu! Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔkya mɛni,' iye si badi básu banii, 'Ɔkya ngye' ni, bitaƒɔ-nwu bitadi.
40024024	Ɔsika bekyuli badubɔta banyi ɔkɔ banii ama ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ, na badi lɛnɔ basu banii Katɔti kenye bediene badi. Na badubɔbla akɔla budie bɔtina ebendi lidu lidu, kalɛ na si nka bakana ni, beti batɔlɔ bekyuli bani na Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna úse muedi.
40024025	Binu! Mɔɔlɛ-mii lise asa na uwi ɔmmɔ udu.
40024026	"Si bekyuli básu-mii banii, 'Ɔkya ketele kemo' ni, bitesie bitatánu. Na si básu-mii banii, 'Ɔkya ɔtɔ mɛni' ni, bitaƒɔ bitadi.
40024027	Ɔsika ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndubudie mina lɛlɔ keyi aani kalɛ na ɔnantu ɔdubo bɔna ɔɔbwɛ bukeye taasi kayaa na ɔƒɛ katukɔ taatálɛ kanukɔ.
40024028	Anwuɔsu bitayiƒla ka kesii kani na lɛla lɛdi likpi lɛtɛ ni, mmɔ na begbini baasa.
40024029	"Na lɛbibo emeyi ammɔ kama ni, ɔƒɛ ɔdubɔbla suu, na kɔbuli kɔsɔ kulekeye lɛnɔ, na ayabi adubɔnu asi katɔ, na kayaa ɔyikun ƒui ɔdubɔkunku.
40024030	"Ala adi adubɔlɛ na kayaa ani mɔɔtina ka Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔdubo. Na kayawi bekyuli ƒui badubuwulo na bana ekpidi ɔsu uwi ɔni na badubɔnu ka Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔkɛ uyɔlɔ kemo ɔ́yu ɔ́si kayaa ɔdubo na bukeye bonwu ku ɔyikun kemo.
40024031	Badubɔvwii kakpɛɛ. Na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔdubɔtala nwuna batu na basi katɔ betédie bekyuli baƒunadi ƒui basiku kayawi kesii biala.
40024032	"Bɛtɛya lɛla lɛdi bɛsiku kɔdingyii lɛlɔ. Si uwi ɔni na bɛnu ka kɔdingyii kɔmmɔ kɔgba kúmo ntu na kuse kalɔ kuudie evete awɔdi ni, na ɔɔtina ka ketudi údu.
40024033	Lɛni kani na si bɛnu ala amɛni ƒui ni, bɛti ka uwi ɔni na Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ubo úude, na unye kayakun.
40024034	Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ala amɛni ƒui adubɔlɛ asa na bina akɔ badi na mɛni bɛdubɔsa bukpi.
40024035	Katɔ ku kalɔ kadubɔvi, nsu mina etemila anya aaadubo bɔvi kudii.
40024036	"Ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔɔgyi limeyi iye uwi ɔni kemo na ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, nsɔ ndubo. Katɔti batu baaagyi, na ami lɛnɔ lɛɛɛgyi. Ati lɛti kani ngyi.
40024037	Ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, ndubo buse aani kalɛ na ɔ́lɛ na Noa uwi.
40024038	Uwi ɔmmɔ asa na ɔnantu wana waƒɔ kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui ni, bekyuli bákya bátaadi taani. Na banana ku beleku beeti lɛlɔ útálɛ limeyi lɛni na Noa útéduo ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo.
40024039	Nsu bátati lɛla lɛni mɔɔlɛ́ úti útédu uwi ɔni na ɔnantu ɔ́na ɔ́gbala-ma ƒui. Lɛni kani na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi bubo lɛnɔ bɔdubɔbla.
40024040	Na banana inyɔ badubunye kemo na, Katɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ unwi na ɔda unwi use.
40024041	Na beleku inyɔ badubɔkya ɔlaaƒɔ kakɔkɔ, na Katɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ unwi na ɔda unwi use.
40024042	"Anwuɔsu bilie kagyumana, ɔsika bɛɛɛgyi limeyi lɛni na bina Unwoti ɔdububo.
40024043	Si kaduli ɔlati ɔgyi uwi ɔni na uyune ɔdububo ni, nka ɔdubulie kagyumana. Na uláya na uyune ɔmmɔ wabwɛ weduo-nwu ɔtɔ kemo.
40024044	Lɛni kani na ɔlɛka amii lɛnɔ bilie kagyumana, ɔsika ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndububo mbeyu-mii lɛtu.
40024045	"Kabla Ɔblane ɔni náda anu na ɔɔbla ala ulu lɛlɔ ni, anwu na nwuna unwoti uuti teenye kabla bablane bakladi kenye. Na uunye-ma kenye teete-ma adila na uwi ɔbuni kemo.
40024046	Kubiti geen ndubo kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ si nwuna unwoti ɔ́si úbo úbanu ka ɔɔbla lɛla lɛni na ɔ́su.
40024047	Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka unwoti ɔmɛni ɔdubuti kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔbla nwuna ala ƒui lɛlɔ ɔnune.
40024048	Nsu si ɔdi kabla ɔblane ukpidi ni, ɔdubɔsu na nwuna kayi kemo ɔnini, 'Mina unwoti ɔdubutu uwi geen!'
40024049	Anwuɔsu ɔdubuse kalɔ uteebo nwuna kabla ɔblane bakpana bammɔ. Na anwu ku ntɛ bekpine bataadi na bataani.
40024050	Na unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔdububo uwi ɔni na kabla ɔblane ɔmɛni ulásia-nwu anu ku uwi ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔɔɔgyi uuuse.
40024051	Na unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔni kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ kɔtu geen. Na nwuna kɔtu bɔni kɔdubɔyu ɔkplu aani anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɔdi kalɛ! Mmɔ na keku ku animi bɔdu bɔdubɔkya!"
40025001	"Na uwi ɔni na ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndububo ni, Katɔti lɛga bɔdi buse aani ɔmɛni. Uwi ɔdi kemo ni, belekubi leevu badi béti bana lɛsogya banii batákpanku uleku ɔgya ku ulekudi besienku kaduli.
40025002	Bana kemo ɛlɔ badi badɔlɔdi, na ɛlɔ bakladi lɛnɔ badi banundane.
40025003	Badɔlɔdi bammɔ béti bana lɛsogya, nsu béteti inɔmii bɔdi bétebunku-ni.
40025004	Na banundane bammɔ ama béti inɔmii bébunku bana lɛsogya báda.
40025005	Ka uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ ɔ́kpɛ kama ku bubo ɔsu ni, lɛlɛɛ líbo lɛɛda begblebi bammɔ na bálɛɛ.
40025006	"Ɔbla usientɛ asa bénu kɔvanu ka ni, 'Bɛɛnu uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ o-o! Bɛta bɛlɛ bibo na butásiaku-nwu!'
40025007	"Amu na begblebi leevu bammɔ báta na bátu bana lɛsogya.
40025008	Na badɔlɔdi bammɔ básu banundane bammɔ banii, 'Bite-bu bina inɔmii bɔmmɔ bɔdi, ɔsika bula lɛsogya lɛdaku buni.'
40025009	"Na banundane bammɔ básu-ma banini, 'Bula inɔmii bulédu abu ku-mii, anwuɔsu biteesie beyene kudɔ na bitéye bina bɔdi.'
40025010	"Ka bánya bátɔlɔ kani na uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ úbeduo. Na begblebi ɛlɔ bani náda lɛlɔ bése mmɔ básiaku-nwu béduo uleku ketikɔ mmɔ, na bákalɛ ɔtɔ.
40025011	"Kama ni, begblebi bakladi bammɔ lɛnɔ bébo na básu banii, 'Ati, ati! Ya na buduo!'
40025012	"Na uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Kudi kudii! Lɛɛɛgyi-mii.' "
40025013	Amu na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ lɛgba lɛmmɔ ɔnini, "Anwuɔsu bilie kagyumana, ɔsika bɛɛɛgyi limeyi iye uwi ɔni na masɔ mebo."
40025014	"Na uwi ɔni na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔdubo ni, Katɔti lɛga bɔdi bɔdubuse aani ɔmɛni lɛnɔ. Uwi ɔdi kemo ni, unengu ɔdi ɔ́ta na ɔ́bla kasusu ka usie ulu ɔdi. Ɔ́lɔ nwuna kabla bablane na úti nwuna ala ɔ́kya-ma lɛkɔkɔ.
40025015	Úte ɔdi biala lɛla lɛni na wakana bɔda. Unwi ni, úte-nwu egulabi aƒɔ alɔ. Na ɔbambadi ni, úte-nwu aƒɔ anyɔ. Na ɔkladi ni, úte-nwu koƒo kunwi. Na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie ulu.
40025016	Kabla ɔblane ɔni náƒɔ aƒɔ alɔ amɛni úsie kalɔ kɔnakunwi na útébo egulabi ammɔ únwini na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kɛ aƒɔ alɔ ɔ́sia.
40025017	Lɛni kani na kabla ɔblane ɔni náƒɔ aƒɔ anyɔ lɛnɔ úbo nwuna ɔdi únwini na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kɛ aƒɔ anyɔ abambadi ɔ́sia.
40025018	Nsu kabla ɔblane ɔni náƒɔ egulabi koƒo kunwi anwu úsie útégyeli kalɔ na úti nwuna unwoti egulabi ɔ́bala mmɔ.
40025019	"Na emeyi pii adi kama ni, kabla bablane bamɛni unwoti ɔmmɔ únwini úbo na anwu ku-ma bábu akunta.
40025020	Kabla ɔblane ɔni náƒɔ egulabi aƒɔ alɔ úti aƒɔ alɔ bamba ɔ́sia úboku na ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Ati, éte-mi egulabi aƒɔ alɔ na lɛ́kɛ alɔ líbunku.'
40025021	"Nwuna unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnii, 'Kabla ɔblane ɔbuni, ábla lɛla biala ulu lɛlɔ geen! Ka ásia ala blii suɛ amɛni anu kaduɛ ɔsu ni, ndubuti-ɔ linyene ala enengudi kenye. Bo butaadi na butaani na butaakɛ ebiti!'
40025022	"Kabla ɔblane ɔni náƒɔ egulabi aƒɔ anyɔ lɛnɔ úbo na ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Ati, éte-mi egulabi aƒɔ anyɔ na lɛ́kɛ aƒɔ anyɔ bamba líbunku.'
40025023	"Nwuna unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnii, 'Kabla ɔblane ɔbuni, ábla lɛla biala ulu lɛlɔ geen! Ka ásia ala blii suɛ amɛni anu kaduɛ ɔsu ni, ndubuti-ɔ linyene ala enengudi kenye. Bo butaadi na butaani na butaakɛ ebiti!'
40025024	"Amu na kabla ɔblane ɔni náƒɔ egulabi koƒo kunwi úbo na ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Ati, ngyi ka adi ukyuli ɔni na ƒula litemi libo ɔkplu na eedé edula na kesii kani na átava adi. Na aaƒɛ edula kesii kani na átagya adi.
40025025	Na ka mɔɔyia ɔsu ni, líti ƒula egulabi ammɔ ńtéku lɛ́kya kalɔ. Anwuɔsu aanu ƒula egulabi ƒui mɛni.'
40025026	"Nwuna unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Kabla ɔblane ukpidi ku ɔkɔsɔne na adi. Agyi ka muudé edula na kesii kani na ńtava adi, na mɔɔƒɛ edula kesii kani na ńtagya lɛla lɛdi.
40025027	Amu bi ɔsu na éteti mina egulabi étetése egulabi kesekɔ, na si líbo ni, na mbaƒɔ mina egulabi ku kuvonsia?'
40025028	"Amu na unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔ́su kabla ɔblane bamba ɔnini, 'Bɛƒɔ egulabi ammɔ na nwuna kudɔ na biti-nya bite ukyuli ɔni nda aƒɔ leevu mmɔ.'
40025029	Ɔsika ukyuli ɔni mbo lɛla lɛdi ni, anwu kani na basɔ badubo bute na ɔsɔ ɔkɛ ubu. Na ukyuli ɔni neeebo ɔdi anwu ni, ubliidi ɔni nse-nwu muedi ni, badubɔƒɔ balɛku-nwu lɛkɔkɔ.
40025030	Na kabla ɔblane ɔni na nwuna lɛlɔ liiibo kɔsia kɔdi mɛni anwu ni, bibo-nwu bɛlɛku bitákya kasuudikɔ. Mmɔ na keku ku animi bɔdu bɔdubɔkya.
40025031	"Uwi ɔni na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔdububo na nwuna lɛga bɔdi kemo ni, Katɔti batu bana ƒui badubɔka bamana-nwu. Na ɔdubo ubelie nwuna lɛgaboku lɛlɔ.
40025032	Na kadi ƒui bekyuli badubɔsala bebenye-nwu anumi. Mmɔ na ɔdubule-ma kemo aani kalɛ na baƒonu lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔɔƒuna baƒonu taalɛku bese akɔ.
40025033	Ɔdubɔya na bekyuli babuni bebenye-nwu kudɔ. Na ɔdubɔya na bekyuli bekpidi bammɔ besie kama.
40025034	"Na Ɔga ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔsu bekyuli bani nnye-nwu kudɔ ɔnini, 'Amii ndi bekyuli bani na Katɔti ɔni ndi mina Ɔti ɔ́ya na lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ-mii kaduɛ. Anwuɔsu bibo na bibeduo lɛga kadikɔ kani na Katɔti ɔ́klibi úse úte-mii ɔ́si kayawi kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui.
40025035	Mɔɔƒɔ-mii kayu kamɛni ɔsika uwi ɔni na kɔka kɔ́da-mi ni, bíte-mi adila. Ka utukwɛ ɔ́da-mi ni, bíte-mi ntu. Ka ndi ɔƒɔ ni, bígyingya enu bɛ́ƒɔ-mi na ḿbeduo-mii kudɔ.
40025036	Na ka nkɛ kasɔngya ni, bíte-mi adala. Na uwi ɔni na muuƒi ni, bɛ́nu-mi lɛlɔ. Ka bákya-mi ɔtɔ ni, bíbo bíbanu-mii.'
40025037	"Mmɔ ni, bekyuli babuni bamɛni badubuye-nwu banini, 'Ati, uwi ɔmani na bɔ́nu-ɔ ka kɔka kɔɔda-a na búte-ɔ adila, iye utukwɛ ɔɔda-a búte-ɔ ntu?
40025038	Uwi ɔmani na adi ɔƒɔ ébeduo-bu na bɔ́ƒɔ-ɔ, iye akɛ kasɔngya na búte-ɔ adala?
40025039	Na uwi ɔmani na búnu ka eeƒi iye bákya-a ɔtɔ na búbo búbanu-ɔ?'
40025040	"Amu na Ɔga ɔmmɔ ɔdubudie kenye ɔnini, 'Mɔɔsu-mii nnii uwi ɔni na bíbunku ukyuli ɔni na bilábu ƒui na mina badi akɔ ni, ami na bɛ́bla bíte.'
40025041	"Amu na ɔdubɔsu bani na ɔ́ya na bésie kama ɔnini, 'Bɛkpɛ bɛlɛ-mi lɛlɔ, amii bani na Katɔti úwida! Biteesie lɛgyavonku lɛni neeeni kudii na Katɔti ɔ́klibi úse úte ukisine ɔmmɔ ku nwuna ayu ekpidi kemo!
40025042	Kɔka kɔ́da-mi na bítete-mi adila na lɛdi. Utukwɛ ɔ́da-mi na bítete-mi ntu na lɛni.
40025043	Ndi ɔƒɔ ḿbeduo-mii na bítaƒɔ-mi. Nkɛ kasɔngya na bítete-mi adala. Líƒi na bákya-mi ɔtɔ, nsu bítabanu-mi.'
40025044	"Amu na ama lɛnɔ badubuye-nwu banini, 'Ati, uwi ɔmani na bɔ́nu ka kɔka kɔɔda-a, iye utukwɛ ɔɔda-a, iye adi ɔƒɔ, iye ákɛ kasɔngya, iye eeƒi, iye bákya-a ɔtɔ na bútebo na bubebunku-ɔ?'
40025045	"Mmɔ na Ɔga ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔsu-ma ɔnini, 'Mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, uwi ɔni na bítabla lɛbuni bítete ukyuli ɔni na balábu ƒui na mina badi akɔ ni, ami na bítabla bítete!' "
40025046	Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ ɔnini, "Bekyuli bamɛni na badubuti batákya lɛbibo lɛni naaadubo bɔsa kudii kemo. Na bekyuli babuni bammɔ badubɔkɛ ngba bɔni naaadubo bɔsa kudii."
40026001	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ ala amɛni ƒui bɔtina ni, ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini,
40026002	"Bɛgyi ka kébu emeyi anyɔ na bɔdi limeyi lɛni bɔɔlɔ Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi. Na badubuti ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, bete na bakana-mi bamana ugyii lɛlɔ."
40026003	Amu na bakpane benengu ku ɔma benengu bátása na Ɔkpane Unengudi Kaiaƒa kaduli.
40026004	Na béti kasusu kalɛ na beƒie Yesu na bɔbɛ kemo na badu-nwu.
40026005	Nsu básu lɛnɔ banii, "Buleƒie-nwu na limeyi bɔdi kemo, ɔsika bekyuli badubɔta babakyaku-bu unyeƒi."
40026006	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Yesu ɔ́kya Betania na ɔnana ɔdi baalɔ Simon ɔni na úƒi ɔlɛgyie kesii.
40026007	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ulie ɔɔdi ni, uleku ɔdi úbo-nwu kudɔ mmɔ. Ɔda inɔmii ku ɔsii ɔdi. Na buunwenyi ƒɛƒɛɛ na bɔ́ƒɔ kuye geen. Na úwilimi-mu úwi Yesu lili lɛlɔ.
40026008	Ka nwuna batɛyane bánu ɔmɛni ni, útayɔ-ma kaƒɔ. Béye lɛlɔ banii, "Bi ɔsu na uubile inɔmii bɔmɛni lɛni?
40026009	Ɔdubɔkana na uti inɔmii bɔmɛni uye kuye bonwu na uti egulabi ammɔ ute bawabane."
40026010	Ka Yesu únu lɛla lɛni na badaku bɔsu ni, ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bi ɔsu na bilaya na uleku ɔmɛni ɔkɛ atu kesekɔ? Ɔ́bla lɛla lɛbuni úte-mi.
40026011	Bawabane bakya-mii akɔ uwi biala. Nsu ami ni, ɔɔɔdi uwi biala na ndubɔkya-mii kudɔ.
40026012	Uleku ɔmɛni úti inɔmii bɔmmɔ úwi-mi lɛlɔ úse úte mina bɔva.
40026013	Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, kesi kesii na badubɔkɔ litemi buni lɛmɛni lɛlɔ lɛsa na kayawi mɛni ni, badubuti lɛla lɛni na uleku ɔmɛni ɔ́bla mɛni basu batina na beti benyimo-nwu."
40026014	Amu na basiakune leevu-inyɔ bammɔ akɔ unwi ɔni baalɔ Yuda Iskariot úsie bakpane benengu kudɔ.
40026015	Na úye-ma ɔnini, "Bi na bɛdubute-mi si lɛ́kya Yesu kakya na lídie-nwu lite-mii?" Mmɔ ni, bátuna ka badubute-nwu sika ɔƒualadi ebi aavlatɛ.
40026016	Na ɔ́si uwi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ úsela ni, úse kalɔ ɔkya ɔɔwia uwi ɔbuni ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔsia na udie Yesu ute-ma.
40026017	Amu na limeyi lideedi lɛni lɛlɔ na baadi bodobodo ɔni néteƒu ni, batɛyane bammɔ bébo Yesu kudɔ banii, "Wɛ na aayɔ́ ka butáklibi Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi bɔdi adila bute-ɔ?"
40026018	Ɔ́tala-ma ɔnana ɔdi kudɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bisie ɔmankemo na bitásu-nwu bɛnii, 'Ala ɔtinane ɔnii, "Mina uwi úudu. Na ƒula kesii na ami ku mina batɛyane bɔdubɔdi Kukpi Lili Bɔvia adila ammɔ." ' "
40026019	Anwuɔsu batɛyane bamɛni bábla kalɛ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma na bátánwa Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi bɔdi adila amɛni bése.
40026020	Na ka useyi uwi údu ni, Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ bébo bebelie kalɔ.
40026021	Na uwi ɔni na belie baadi ni, Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, bina kemo unwi ɔdubɔkya-mi kakya."
40026022	Litemi lɛmɛni lɛ́yu batɛyane bamɛni ɔlɛ geen na bésie kalɔ beeye-nwu unwi unwi banii, "Blɔti, ɔɔɔdi ami na ada, ntu?"
40026023	Yesu údie kenye ɔnii, "Ukyuli ɔni na ami ku-nwu kɔnu nkya lɛkyami kemo ndubɔkya-mi kakya.
40026024	Ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndubukpi aani kalɛ na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔ́su. Nsu ni, bɔbwɛ muute ukyuli ɔni na ndubɔkya-mi kakya. Si nka bátawɔ-nwu muedi ni, na nka ɔdia-nwu utulo."
40026025	Amu na Yuda, ɔni ndubɔkya-nwu kakya mmɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, "Ala ɔtinane, ɔɔɔdi ami na ada, ntu?" Na Yesu údie kenye ɔnii, "Bɔsu na ada."
40026026	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane belie baadi ni, úti bodobodo. Na ka ɔ́gya Katɔti enu ni, ɔ́bwɛ-nwu kɔkɛ kɔkɛ na úle-ku úte-ma. Ɔ́su ɔnini, "Bɛƒɔ ɔmɛni na bɛdi. Ɔmɛni ndi mina ɔlɔna."
40026027	Amu na úti ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔdi, na ka ɔ́gya Katɔti enu ni, úti úte-ma. Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bina ƒui bɛni.
40026028	Ɔmɛni ndi mina ubugya ɔni na líti muusé kenye kani na Katɔti únyimi ku nwuna bekyuli likpo. Na ndubuti-nwu liwi kalɔ na bekyuli pii lili, kalɛ na Katɔti uti ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-ma.
40026029	Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo ntɛ bɔmɛni udu bɔdi bɔni ntu limeyi lɛni na ami ku-mii bɔdubɔni ntɛ bɔwɔdi na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ."
40026030	Amu na bátu ɔnu ɔdi béti bemwi Katɔti, na bávi bálɛ bésie Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ.
40026031	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, "Bina ƒui bɛdubukeli-mi kudɔ, na kebu ami lɛti. Ɔsika Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔɔsu ɔnini, 'Katɔti ɔdubɔdu baƒonu ɔdane ɔmmɔ na nwuna baƒonu begyingya.'
40026032	Nsu na mina bɔsɔ bɔta bɔsi bekpine akɔ ni, ndubɔgyu lɛtɔ-mii na Galilea."
40026033	Amu na Petro ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, "Si ina bakladi ƒui béni-ɔ muedi ni, ami lɛɛɛdubo-ɔ kama bɔlɛ kudii!"
40026034	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su Petro ɔnini, "Mɔɔsu-ɔ ka usien ɔmɛni asa na akɔkɔ wete kenye muedi ni, adubɔsu kɔtɛ ƒui ka aaagyi-mi."
40026035	Petro údie kenye ɔnini, "Si ina ɔlɛka badu ami ku-ɔ muedi ni, lɛɛɛdubo bɔsu nnii lɛɛɛgyi-ɔ." Na lɛni kani na nwuna batɛyane bammɔ ƒui básu.
40026036	Amu na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bammɔ bésie kesii kani baalɔ Getsemane, na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bɛsɔ bilie mɛni na lisie ngye ntákpali katɔ."
40026037	Úti ku Petro ku Sebedeo bebi inyɔ bammɔ ɔ́da. Na ka bákɛ ni, kɔyɔ kúwi-nwu na lɛƒɛda lɛ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo.
40026038	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Muunú ɔlɛ na mina kɔyu kemo geen aani si bukpi nda. Bɛsɔ binye mɛni na bitaagyumana ku-mi."
40026039	Amu ka úsie lɛtɔtɔ blii ni, ɔ́yu úbi kalɔ na ɔ́kpali katɔ ɔnini, "Mina Ɔti, si wadia ni, na aƒɔ lɛbibo ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔmɛni na mina kudɔ. Nsu ni, tabla mina lɛyɔla, mmomu bla ƒula lɛdi."
40026040	Ka ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie batɛyane ɛtɛ bammɔ kudɔ ni, ɔ́nu ka baalɛɛ. Na úye Petro ɔnini, "Bítakana na binyeku-mi kagyumana ɔdɔ unwi pɛ?
40026041	Bɛsɔ bilie kagyumana na bɛkpali katɔ kalɛ na bileduo bukpoku taanu kpakplaa kemo. Kɔyu kɔɔyɔ́ ka kɔbla, nsu ɔlɔna use kpɛtɛ kpɛtɛ."
40026042	Amu na Yesu ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie kunyɔdi na ɔ́kpali ɔnini, "Mina Ɔti, si lɛbibo lɛni ndubo buti mɛni lilávi-mi lɛlɔ na ɔdi-ɔ lɛƒɔyɔ ka liti-ni ni, ya na ɔlɛ lɛni."
40026043	Ka Yesu ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo ni, úbanu ka lɛlɛɛ litulo batɛyane ɛtɛ bammɔ na bátakana bana anumi muedi bubimi.
40026044	Yesu ɔ́da-ma úse na ɔ́sɔ úsie kɔtɛdi na ɔ́kpali katɔ kalɛ na ɔ́kpali úbavi.
40026045	Amu na ɔ́sɔ úbo batɛyane bammɔ kudɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Ɔsu bɔtɛ na bɛmua bɛtɛ bɛɛnwuna lɛni? Ɔƒɛni na uwi ɔmmɔ údu ka beti Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔmmɔ bakya bekyuli bekpidi enu kemo.
40026046	Bɛta na buteesie. Bɛnu, kakya ɔkyane ɔmmɔ úude."
40026047	Yesu ɔmua unye ɔɔtɛmiku-ma asa na Yuda ɔni ndi leevu-inyɔ bammɔ akɔ unwi ɔ́da úbalɛ. Ɔdanku bekyuli lisu lɛni na bakpane benengu ku batɔnkune bédie. Na bada lɛkɛɛ ku ligyii.
40026048	Kakya ɔkyane ɔmmɔ ɔ́ya na báti bése ɔnini, "Ukyuli ɔni na makya kɔgbu ni, anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni na bɛɛwia. Biƒie-nwu."
40026049	Ka Yuda ɔ́nya ɔ́nu Yesu kani na úsie-nwu kudɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Ala ɔtinane, keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-ɔ." Amu na ɔ́kya-nwu kɔgbu.
40026050	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Ɔkpana, bi na aawia mɛni?" Amu na bekyuli bammɔ bébo Yesu kudɔ na béƒie-nwu na báda-nwu kpakplaa.
40026051	Na bani nsiaku Yesu mmɔ kemo unwi ɔ́ni nwuna ɔkɛɛ ɔ́kpa na úbeyi ɔkpane unengudi kabla ɔblane kɔtu úkulo.
40026052	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Ti ƒula ɔkɛɛ kya nwuna kakyakɔ. Bekyuli bani mɔɔgyumana lɛlɔ ku lɛkɛɛ ni, lɛkɛɛ kenye na beekpi.
40026053	Munuu aaagyi anii lɛkana na livele mina Ɔti na ubebunku-mi? Na mmɔ kani ɔdubuti Katɔti batu bekpone limomo lɛni ntulo akpa leevu-anyɔ umene-mi!
40026054	Nsu si bébo na békpo béte-mi ni, na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku etemila ammɔ elebo aani kalɛ na Katɔti ɔ́su úse lɛni na ɔdi ka ɔlɛ."
40026055	Ɔmɛni kama ni, Yesu úye bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ ɔnini, "Bi ɔsu na ɔlɛka biti ligyii ku lɛkɛɛ bibo bɛnii bibeƒie-mi aani si lɛ́ta línye aban lɛlɔ? Lɛ́tina bekyuli ala limeyi biala na Katɔti kakpakɔ na bíteƒie-mi.
40026056	Nsu ala amɛni ƒui álɛ lɛni kalɛ na ala ani na básu bése na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ébo éte lɛni." Amu na nwuna batɛyane ƒui békeli bátɔlɔ-nwu kudɔ.
40026057	Amu na ama bani néƒie Yesu mmɔ bétiku-nwu bésienku Ɔkpane Unengudi Kaiaƒa kaduli, kesii kani na bakpane benengu ku ɔma benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bása belie.
40026058	Petro anwu ɔkpɛ kama buɛɛ na úbavi útéduo kaduli kammɔ kemo. Útélie kalɔ na bagyumanane bammɔ kudɔ na ɔnu kalɛ na litemi lɛmmɔ lɛdubɔwɔ.
40026059	Bakpane benengu bamɛni ku litemi batɛne bani nlie mmɔ ƒui báyɔ ka bawiaku Yesu litemi lɛdi lɛni lɛlɔ na basia na bakɛ-nwu badu.
40026060	Nsu ina ka bekyuli pii bébo bábada-nwu kenye muedi ni, bátakɛ lɛla lɛdi. Nkyuli inyɔ badi bébo
40026061	na básu banii, "Ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Ndubɔƒɛ Katɔti kakpakɔ. Na emeyi atɛ kama ni, ndubɔsɔku-ka lɛtu.' "
40026062	Ɔkpane unengudi ɔ́ta unye na úye Yesu ɔnini, "Eenú etemila ani na baasu na ƒula lɛlɔ mɛni? Bi na ebo na adubɔsu?"
40026063	Nsu Yesu úbile kenye na útasu lɛla lɛdi. Ɔkpane unengudi ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Lɛ́kpali Katɔti mɔɔkya-a nnii su-bu si awɔ ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni ndi Katɔti Ubidi ɔmmɔ."
40026064	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Ɛɛn. Awɔ násu, na use lɛni sɔsɔ. Na mɔɔsu-mii nnii uwi klukui kemo ni, bɛdubɔnu Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔmmɔ ka ulie Katɔ Ɔyikune Ƒui kɔdianu. Na bɛdubɔnu ka ɔ́si katɔ ɔdubo na uyɔlɔ kemo!"
40026065	Uwi ɔni na ɔkpane unengudi únu ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́ni nwuna awu ɔ́bwɛ na ɔ́va ɔnini, "Binu enyekpi ani na ɔɔtɛmi! Bɔsɔ buláwia kenye bediene badi lɛnɔ!
40026066	Bi ndi bina kasusu?" Bana ƒui bédie kenye banii, "Ɔlɛka badu-nwu kukpi kɔtɔ!"
40026067	Amu na bétuo lisuo béwi-nwu anumi na bébo-nwu. Na badi lɛnɔ báƒiɛmi-nwu lɛtugya.
40026068	Na béye-nwu banii, "Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ na adi? Su-bu ukyuli ɔni nébo-ɔ!"
40026069	Amu na Petro ɔmua ulie keyi mmɔ asa na ɔkpane unengudi kabla ɔblane ɔni ndi ulekubi úbo mmɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Awɔ lɛnɔ ásiaku Yesu ɔni nási Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ."
40026070	Nsu Petro ɔ́tuala na bekyuli bammɔ ƒui anumi ɔnii, "Ńtenu lɛla lɛni na aasu mɛni kalɔ."
40026071	Na ɔ́tɔlɔ mmɔ úténye kaduli kammɔ kayakun. Ulekubi kabla ɔblane ɔbambadi lɛnɔ ɔ́nu Petro na ɔ́su bani nnye mmɔ ɔnii, "Anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́siaku Yesu Nasareni ɔmmɔ."
40026072	Amu na Petro ɔ́sɔ ɔ́tuala na ɔ́kpali ala ɔnini, "Lɛɛɛgyi ukyuli ɔmmɔ!"
40026073	Uwi útetu asa na bani nnye mmɔ bébo bábasu Petro banii, "Útalɛka eni anii aaadi-ma akɔ unwi. Ɔsika ƒula butemi buudie-ɔ keyi nwaa."
40026074	Amu na Petro ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kpali ala momoomo ɔnini, "Katɔti ɔni-mi kɔtu si ɔkɔ na mɔɔnyi nnii lɛɛɛgyi ukyuli ɔmmɔ." Kɔnakunwi ni, akɔkɔ úte kenye.
40026075	Na Petro únyimo lɛla lɛni Yesu ɔ́su ɔnini, "Asa na akɔkɔ ɔdubute kenye ni, adubɔsu kɔtɛ sɔɔn ka aaagyi-mi." Anwuɔsu ɔ́lɛ keyi na útéwulo geen.
40027001	Ka kadi kégye ni, bakpane benengu ku ɔma benengu bálɛ ugyii ka badubɔdu Yesu.
40027002	Bébo-nwu kɔgba na béti-nwu bátákya Romaƒuɔ aban unengu Pilato enu kemo.
40027003	Uwi ɔni na Yuda ɔni nákya-nwu kakya únu ka bádu Yesu kukpi kɔtɔ ni, ɔ́yu-nwu ɔlɛ geen. Na úti sika aƒualadi ebi aavlatɛ ammɔ úsienku bakpane benengu ku ɔma benengu bammɔ.
40027004	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Lɛ́bla likpidi ka lɛ́kya ukyuli ɔni nátaƒiɔ ɔmmɔ kakya nnii badu-nwu." Na bédie kenye banini, "Ɔmɛni anwu ɔɔɔkɛ-bu. Ƒula litemi na lɛdi!"
40027005	Amu na Yuda úbo egulabi ammɔ úwi Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ, na úsie útákya lɛlɔ ɔbuli.
40027006	Na bakpane benengu bammɔ bábuma egulabi ammɔ na básu banii, "Utalɛka buti egulabi amɛni bɔsalaku ani nkya Katɔti kakpakɔ kuyi kavumi kemo, ɔsika ukyuli ubugya egulabi na adi. Na bula ɔda bubo buutile ɔmɛni kuƒi."
40027007	Na ka básala eli ni, bálɛ-nwu ugyii banii badubuti egulabi amɛni betéye kalɔ kani baalɔ banii Ɔvɔne Kalɔ, na bataava baƒɔ na mmɔ.
40027008	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, baalɔ kalɔ kammɔ banii Ubugya Kalɔ úbalɛ ɔmwi.
40027009	Amu na lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yeremia ɔ́su úse úbo úte lɛni sɔsɔ ɔnii, "Béti sika aƒualadi ebi aavlatɛ ani na Israelƒuɔ bátuna ka baƒɔ na nwuna lili
40027010	bétéye ɔvɔne kalɔ aani kalɛ na Unwoti ɔ́su-mi."
40027011	Na béti Yesu bényene Romaƒuɔ aban unengu Pilato anumi. Na úye-nwu ɔnini, "Awɔ ndi Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga?" Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Awɔ mɔɔsu."
40027012	Nsu ina ka bakpane benengu ku ɔma benengu bammɔ benye baadá-nwu kenye muedi ni, Yesu útakpete-ma.
40027013	Amu na Pilato úye-nwu ɔnini, "Etemila ani na baasu na ƒula lɛlɔ mɛni aakɛ́-ɔ yoo?"
40027014	Nsu ɔ́bla aban unengu ɔmmɔ kalɛ kadi geen ka Yesu útakya-nwu kenye muedi.
40027015	Na Yudaƒuɔ emeyi ammɔ bɔdi biala kemo ni, Romaƒuɔ aban unengu ɔmɛni ɔɔnyonu Yudaƒuɔ ɔtɔntɛne unwi ɔni lili na kadi bébevele.
40027016	Na uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, na ɔtɔntɛne ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni na bekyuli beenú-nwu kɔku, na baalɔ-nwu banii Baraba.
40027017	Amu na uwi ɔni na bekyuli pii bamɛni bábasa ni, Pilato úye-ma ɔnini, "Ɔma na bɛɛyɔ́ bɛnii nnyonu nte-mii? Baraba munuu Yesu ɔni na bekyuli baalɔ-nwu Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ?"
40027018	Ɔ́bla lɛni ɔsika ɔgyi ka lɛnungyie ɔsu na Yudaƒuɔ benengu bammɔ bédie-nwu béte.
40027019	Na uwi ɔni na Pilato ɔkya ɔɔtɛ litemi ni, ulekudi ɔ́tala ɔtu ɔ́kya-nwu ɔnii, "Die enu na ukyuli ɔni nátaƒiɔ ɔmɛni litemi kemo. Ɔsika kamaadi usien lígye kɔna na nwuna lɛlɔ kɔni náya na liƒu lɛ́da-mi geen!"
40027020	Na bakpane benengu ku ɔma benengu bammɔ bébile bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ atu ka beye Pilato na ɔnyonu Baraba na badu Yesu.
40027021	Amu na Pilato úye bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ ɔnini, "Nkyuli inyɔ bamɛni kemo ɔmani na bɛɛyɔ́ bɛnii nnyonu nte-mii?" Bédie kenye banii, "Baraba!"
40027022	Na Pilato ɔ́sɔ úye-ma ɔnini. "Bi na mbla Yesu ɔni na baalɔ-nwu banii Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ɔƒɛni?" Bana ƒui bédie kenye banii, "Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ!"
40027023	Nsu Pilato ɔ́sɔ úye-ma ɔnini, "Na bi likpidi na ɔ́bla?" Mmɔ ni, bése kalɔ baava momoomo banii, "Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ!"
40027024	Uwi ɔni na Pilato ɔ́nu ka ɔ́sɔ ulakana lɛla lɛdi bɔbla, na mmomu unyeƒi kpakplaa ndubo bɔlɛ ni, úti ntu na ɔ́ƒɔ enu na bekyuli bammɔ anumi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Ukyuli ɔmɛni kukpi kɔɔɔsia-mi lɛlɔ! Bina litemi na lɛdi."
40027025	Amu na bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ ƒui bédie kenye banii, "Nwuna kukpi kɔsia abu ku bula bebi lili!"
40027026	Amu na Pilato ɔ́nyonu Baraba úte-ma. Na ka ɔ́ya na béti kɔbuli kɔni na bélii básala na bébo Yesu kaduɛ ni, ɔ́nyonu-nwu úte aban bekpone ɔnii bakana-nwu bamana ugyii lɛlɔ.
40027027	Amu na nwuna bekpone bammɔ béti Yesu bésienku Pilato kaduli na bekpone bani nkya mmɔ ƒui báka bámana-nwu.
40027028	Bédie nwuna awu na béti awu ugyiedi ɔdi bákya-nwu.
40027029	Na bédi liyu kabwa bébi-nwu lili asa na béti ugyii bákya-nwu kɔdianu lɛkɔkɔ. Bábla-nwu ala amɛni ƒui aani ɔga kalɛ. Na bálɛ akɔnkɔ na nwuna anumi, na baamá-nwu taasu banii, "Yiidu! Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga ulie ngba gyɔlɔɔ!"
40027030	Bétuo lisuo béwi-nwu lɛlɔ na báƒɔ ugyii ɔmmɔ báƒiɛmi-nwu lili.
40027031	Uwi ɔni na báma-nwu lɛni báwɔlɔ ni, bédie-nwu awu ugyiedi ɔmmɔ na básɔku nwuna lɛwu bákya-nwu. Amu na bétiku-nwu bátɔlɔku banii batákana-nwu bamana ugyii lɛlɔ.
40027032	Uwi ɔni na bási ɔmankemo bakɛ bésela ni, básiaku ɔnana ɔdi ɔni nási Kirene na baalɔ-nwu banii Simon. Bekpone bammɔ béƒie-nwu banii ɔlɛka ubunku Yesu ugyii ɔmmɔ buti.
40027033	Na béti Yesu bésienku kataku kadi baalɔ Golgota ɔni kalɔ budie ndi Opokuo.
40027034	Béte Yesu ntɛ bɔni na básala ku kuvo kɔni mbo ɔdu kati kati banii ɔni. Nsu ka útu-mu ɔnu ni, útani.
40027035	Amu na bekpone bammɔ bákana-nwu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ na bátu egulabi asa na béti nwuna lɛwu béle béte lɛlɔ.
40027036	Nwuna kama ni, básɔ bélie kalɔ na bágyumana-nwu.
40027037	Na bébo kegyiikɛ kadi bámana-nwu eli. Na bénweni lɛla lɛni ɔsu na bádu-nwu básia-ka lɛlɔ banii, "Yesu, Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga, mɛni."
40027038	Bákana beyune inyɔ badi lɛnɔ bámana ligyii lɛlɔ bébunku Yesu. Unwi ɔma-nwu kɔdianu kakɛ na unwi lɛnɔ ɔma-nwu kɔmii kakɛ.
40027039	Bekyuli bani návi mmɔ ƒui bákunku bana eli na bédumi Yesu.
40027040	Básu banii, "Awɔ násu ka adubɔƒɛ Katɔti kakpakɔ na asɔku-ka atu emeyi atɛ kama! Si adi Katɔti Ubidi ni, yu na aƒɔ lɛlɔ asiku kukpi enu kemo."
40027041	Lɛni kani na bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane ku ɔma benengu bammɔ lɛnɔ báma-nwu banini,
40027042	"Úbunku badi, nsu ulákana na ubunku lɛlɔ. Ɔɔɔdi anwu ndi Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga ɔmmɔ? Ɔyu ɔsi ugyii ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ na bɔnu na bɔƒɔ-nwu bɔdi!
40027043	Ɔ́sia Katɔti anu, na ɔɔlɔ lɛlɔ ɔnii Katɔti Ubidi. Na si Katɔti ɔɔyɔ́ ni, ɔdubɔƒɔ-nwu ɔƒɛni kani bɔnu!"
40027044	Lɛni kani na beyune bani na bákana-ma ligyii lɛlɔ bébunku Yesu lɛlɔ mmɔ bédumi-nwu.
40027045	Amu na kalɔ kammɔ ƒui kábla suu ɔ́si lɛdɔ leevu-inyɔ uwi útalɛ lɛdɔ ɛtɛ kemo.
40027046	Na ɔdɔ ɔtɛdi ɔmɛni kemo ni, Yesu ɔ́va momoomo ɔ́su ɔnini, "Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?" Ɔni kalɔ ndi, "Mina Ɔti, mina Ɔti! Bi ɔsu na áda-mi ányonu?"
40027047	Na ka bekyuli badi bani nnye mmɔ bénu lɛni ni, básu banii, "Ɔɔkpali Elia!"
40027048	Bana akɔ unwi úkeli útéti unwo ɔni na béti bákya ntɛ bɔni nányi kemo na úti ɔ́tu ugyii ɔdi lɛlɔ úboku-nwu ɔnii ɔni.
40027049	Nsu bekyuli bakladi básu banii, "Sɔ nye! Bɛya na bɔnu si Elia ɔdubo ubamami-nwu ugyii ɔmɛni lɛlɔ."
40027050	Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́va momoomo na ɔ́yula.
40027051	Kɔnakunwi na Katɔti kakpakɔ na ɔma kemo ni, kɔdi kɔni na béti béle Kakpakɔ mmɔ kɔ́bwɛ kemo inyɔ ɔ́si katɔ úbedu kalɔ. Na kalɔ kammɔ ƒui kákunku, na atakpɛ ábwɛ.
40027052	Na kɔƒiɔtɔ kúbimi, na bekyuli kedee bani nékpi báta bálɛ bekpine akɔ.
40027053	Na ka bávi bálɛ bana kɔƒiɔtɔ kemo na Yesu bɔsɔ bɔta kama ni, bésie Yudaƒuɔ ɔma unengudi ɔmmɔ kemo, na bédie bana lɛlɔ keyi bátina bekyuli pii.
40027054	Na uwi ɔni na bekpone unengu ku bekpone bani nnye mɔɔgyumana Yesu bánu kalɛ na kalɔ kákunku ku ala ani nálɛ ƒui na mmɔ ni, ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́gyu-ma na liƒu lɛ́da-ma geen! Na básu banii, "Sɔsɔ na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔdi Katɔti Ubidi."
40027055	Amu na beleku pii bani nási Galilea na badi Yesu bebunkune bákya mmɔ. Na benye ɔgyu baanu ala ani nálɛ.
40027056	Bana badi ndi Maria Magdalene, ku Maria ɔni ndi Yakobo ku Yoseƒ uni, ku Yohane ku Yakobo uni.
40027057	Uwi ɔni na useyi uwi údu ni, ɔnana ɔlakɛne ɔdi baalɔ Yoseƒ na ɔdi Yesu ɔtɛyane ɔ́si Arimatea úbo.
40027058	Úsie Pilato kudɔ na útéye-nwu ɔnii uti Yesu ukpine ute-nwu. Pilato úte kuƒi ka beti ukpine ɔmmɔ bete-nwu.
40027059	Amu na Yoseƒ úti kɔdi kɔƒualadi kɔdi na úti únyimi ukpine ɔmmɔ.
40027060	Na úti-nwu útáva lɛtakpɛ ubu kaƒiɔtɔ kawɔdi kani na ɔ́ya na béku béte-nwu kemo. Na ɔ́ya na béminime lɛtakpɛ lɛdi bétile-ka kenye na ɔ́tɔlɔ.
40027061	Na Maria Magdalene ku Maria unyɔdi básɔ bélie kaƒiɔtɔ anumi mmɔ.
40027062	Na kadi kégye ɔni ndi lɛnwunameyi ni, bakpane benengu ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ bésie Pilato kudɔ.
40027063	Na básu-nwu banini, "Unengu, uwi ɔni na ɔkɔ ɔnyine ɔmmɔ úlie ngba ni, ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Si líkpi ni, nsɔ ndubɔta lɛlɛ bekpine akɔ emeyi atɛ kama.'
40027064	Anwuɔsu su kpakplaa anii bagyumanane banu kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kaduɛ utálɛ limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ kalɛ na nwuna batɛyane bammɔ beléyu ukpine ɔmmɔ na basu banii ɔ́ta ɔ́lɛ bekpine akɔ. Ɔsika buláwia ka katɔlɔ kani masia ketulo kedeedi."
40027065	Amu na Pilato ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Biti bekpone bisienku na bitágyumana kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kalɛ biala bɛdubɔkana."
40027066	Amu na bésie bátábala lɛtakpɛ lɛmmɔ kenye na bése-ni likpo kalɛ na si ukyuli ɔdi útuku-ka na banu bati. Na báda bekpone bése mmɔ na baagyumana kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ.
40028001	Ka kadi kégye Kwasida ɔtanta ni, Maria Magdalene ku Maria ɔkladi ɔmmɔ bésie banii batánu Yesu kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ.
40028002	Kɔnakunwi ni, kalɔ kákunku momoomo geen. Na Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi ɔ́yu ɔ́si katɔ úbo na úbeminime lɛtakpɛ lɛmmɔ, na úlie-ni lɛlɔ.
40028003	Nwuna lɛlɔ liikeye aani ɔƒɛ na nwuna awu use ƒututuutu.
40028004	Liƒu lɛ́da bagyumanane bammɔ na lɛlɔ lɛ́tɔ-ma geen, na básini bátɛ aani bekpine.
40028005	Amu na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ útemiku beleku bammɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bitayia. Ngyi ka bɛɛwia Yesu ɔni na bákana bámana ugyii lɛlɔ mmɔ.
40028006	Uuubo mɛni. Ɔ́ta úlie ngba aani kalɛ na ɔ́su úse. Bibo na bibanu likpo lɛni na báva-nwu.
40028007	Bisie pla na bitásu nwuna batɛyane bɛnii ɔ́ta ɔ́lɛ bekpine akɔ ulie ngba, na ɔtɔ-mii anumi úsela Galilea. Mmɔ na bɛdubɔnu-nwu. Ɔmɛni ɔsu nkɛ."
40028008	Anwuɔsu bábabla bátɔlɔ kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kudɔ. Na ina ka liƒu lɛ́da-ma muedi ni, béti ebiti békeli bésie banii batásu Yesu batɛyane kenye kammɔ.
40028009	Kɔnakunwi ni, ama ku Yesu bása na ulu lɛlɔ. Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Lígyele-mii." Mmɔ na bákpɛ béde-nwu na béboku lɛlɔ kalɔ báda-nwu lɛgba na bémwi-nwu.
40028010	Na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bitayia. Biteesie na bitásu mina banwa bɛnii beteesie Galilea. Mmɔ na badubɔnu-mi."
40028011	Uwi ɔni na beleku bammɔ bénwini bésela ni, bekpone bammɔ badi bésie ɔma kemo na bátásu Yudaƒuɔ bakpane benengu bammɔ ala ani nálɛ mmɔ ƒui.
40028012	Amu na bakpane benengu bammɔ ku ɔma benengu bátása banii beeti kasusu. Béte bekpone bammɔ egulabi pii adi,
40028013	na básu-ma banini, "Bɛsu bɛnii usien uwi ɔni na bɛɛlɛɛ ni, nwuna batɛyane bébo na bébeyu ukpine ɔmmɔ bátɔlɔku.
40028014	Na si Romaƒuɔ aban unengu únu litemi lɛmɛni ni, bɔdubɔya na unu kalɔ geen ka ɔɔɔdi bina bɔƒiɔ."
40028015	Bagyumanane bammɔ báƒɔ egulabi ammɔ na bábla aani kalɛ na básu-ma. Na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ bégyingya Yesu ukpine buyu litemi lɛmmɔ na bana akɔ úbalɛ ɔmwi.
40028016	Na batɛyane leevu-unwi bammɔ bákɔ bésie Galilea lɛbinkpo lɛni lɛlɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma úse.
40028017	Na ka bánu-nwu ni, bana badi bémwi-nwu. Nsu badi lɛnɔ kasusu kábla-ma inyɔ inyɔ.
40028018	Amu na Yesu ɔ́kpɛ úde-ma na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Katɔti úti katɔ ku kalɔ ɔyikun ƒui úte-mi.
40028019	Anwuɔsu biteesie kayawi kadi biala bekyuli akɔ na bɛtina-ma ala kalɛ na benwini mina batɛyane. Na bɛkpila-ma ntu na Ati ku Ubi ku Katɔti Kɔyu lɛnyi kemo.
40028020	Na bɛtina-ma bɛnii badi ala ani ƒui na lɛ́tina-mii lɛlɔ. Na ndubɔkya-mii akɔ uwi ƒui utálɛ kayawi kawɔlɔkɔ."
41001001	Ɔmɛni ndi litemi buni lɛni nkɛnku Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ ɔni ndi Katɔti ɔlati ubidi.
41001002	Kukuuku ni, Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesaia únweni úse ka Katɔti ɔ́su Ubidi ɔnini, “Ndubɔtala ɔtu ɔdi na wagyu watɔ-ɔ, kalɛ na ɔklibi bekyuli ute ƒula bubo.
41001003	Adubunu ka ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔkɛ ɔɔva na ketele kemo taasu ɔnini, 'Binye kagyumana bite Blɔti. Bɛklibi bina lɛlɔ kaduɛ bite nwuna bubo!' ”
41001004	Ɔtu ɔmɛni ndi Yohane. Anwu nébo úbelie ketele kemo, kesii kani na ɔɔkpila bekyuli ntu na ketu kemo aani kalɛ na Yudaƒuɔ baabla kalɛ. Na ɔɔkɔ́ lɛsa ka ɔlɛka bekyuli benwini kayi na bada ekpidi bɔbla baya na baƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmmɔ, na Katɔti ɔdubuti bana alaekpidi ɔkyiɛ-ma.
41001005	Bekyuli pii bási Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ ku bana ɔma unengudi ɔni baalɔ Yerusalem bésie ketele kamɛni kemo béténu Yohane litemi. Bédie bana ekpidi kalɔ béte Katɔti, na Yohane ɔ́kpila-ma ntu na ketu kani baalɔ Yordan kemo.
41001006	Uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, Yohane ɔkya ɔƒlumu linwini awu, na úti ebuo ɔku kabuli ɔ́da kevobi. Nwuna adila ani na ɔɔdi ndi uwɔ ku baalɔlɔ bani muubile edula.
41001007	Nwuna linyesia lɛni lɛlɔ na ɔɔkɔ́ lɛsa ndi ɔnii, “Ukyuli ɔni nkpɛ-mi kama ɔdubo ni, anwu utulo-mi ƒui. Ńtedu ka lɛbla kabla kadi lite-nwu muedi.
41001008	Ami ni, ntu na muuti taabla bula bɔkpila ɔdi. Nsu anwu ndubuti Katɔti Kɔyu ɔkpila-mii.”
41001009	Uwi útetu asa na Yesu ɔ́si ɔma ɔni baalɔ Nasaret na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ úbo, na ɔ́ƒɔ Yohane ntu bɔkpila ɔdi na Yordan kemo.
41001010	Ka Yesu ɔ́nya ɔ́lɛ ntu bɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔ́nu ka katɔ kébimi na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́si kɔɔyu-nwu lɛlɔ aani aasɛ.
41001011	Na lɛdi lɛdi lɛ́si Katɔ lɛɛsu lɛnii, “Awɔ ndi mina ubi ɔni náƒɔ-mi kuye, na kubiti kɔɔda-mi ƒula lɛlɔ.”
41001012	Kɔnakunwi ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́kpanku Yesu kúsienku ketele kemo, kesii kani na beƒiebuo bakya.
41001013	Anwu lɛti úlie mmɔ emeyi aavlene. Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo na Satan úkpoku Yesu ɔ́nu si wasiaku-nwu. Ɔmɛni kama ni, Katɔti batu bébo bébebunku-nwu na bákya-nwu ɔkplu.
41001014	Uwi ɔni na béƒie Yohane ɔni mɔɔbla ntu bɔkpila ɔdi bákya ɔtɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Galilea na útásu Katɔti litemi buni mmɔ.
41001015	Ɔkya ɔɔsu ɔnini, “Uwi ɔbuni ɔmmɔ úudu. Katɔti lɛga bɔdi uwi úude. Binwini kama bɛkya bina ekpidi na bɛ́ƒɔ litemi buni lɛmɛni bɛdi!”
41001016	Ka Yesu ɔkɛ ɔɔví na ɛpu ɔdi kudɔ na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, ɔ́nu asawu bewine inyɔ badi bani ndi Simon ku ɔnwani Andrea ka bakya beewi asawu.
41001017	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, “Bibasiaku-mi, na matina-mii kalɛ na bidie bekyuli biboku Katɔti kudɔ.”
41001018	Na kɔnakunwi ni, báda bana lɛsawu béwi na báta básiaku-nwu.
41001019	Úsie anumi blii úbu na ɔ́nu banwani inyɔ badi bani ndi Sebedeo bebie Yakobo ku Yohane. Na belie bana ɔkɔlɔ kemo baaklibi bana lɛsawu.
41001020	Ka Yesu ɔ́nu-ma kani na ɔ́lɔ-ma. Ama lɛnɔ báta kɔnakunwi na báda bana ɔti Sebedeo ku nwuna kabla bablane lɛti pɛ bákya ɔkɔlɔ kemo, na básiaku Yesu.
41001021	Yesu ku nwuna basiakune bamɛni bésie bétéduo ɔma ɔni baalɔ Kapernaum. Na lɛnwunameyi lɛni nébo na bana mmɔ busie kama ni, Yesu úsie bana kasalakɔ na úsie ɔkya ɔɔsu litemi buni.
41001022	Ɔ́bla bekyuli bani nénu nwuna ala bɔtina kalɛ kadi, ɔsika uuuse aani ama bani baatina ɔda bubo. Mmomu ni, ɔɔtina ala ku ɔyikun taasiku nwuna kayi kemo.
41001023	Uwi ɔmmɔ kani kemo ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔni na kɔyu kukpidi kulie-nwu lɛlɔ ɔkya kasalakɔ mmɔ na ɔ́va momoomo ɔnini,
41001024	“Yesu Nasareni, bi na aawia asiku bula kudɔ? Bubo na ébo anii abakyula-bu? Ngyi ukyuli ɔni na adi. Awɔ ndi Katɔti Ɔtalane Kedee!”
41001025	Yesu ɔ́bala kɔyu kɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Da bɔtɛmi ya! Na avi alɛ ɔnana ɔmmɔ kemo.”
41001026	Kɔyu kɔmɛni kɔ́kunku ɔnana ɔmɛni momoomo na kɔ́ya-nwu ɔ́va asa na kɔ́vi kɔ́lɛ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo.
41001027	Ɔ́bla bekyuli bani nnye ƒui yaa na béye lɛlɔ banii, “Bi litemi lɛdi mɛni? Bi bɔkpa bɔwɔdi udu na bɔmɛni bɔdi? Ukyuli ɔmɛni ubo ɔyikun ɔni na ɔɔtɛmi ku ayu ekpidi na eenú-nwu litemi!”
41001028	Anwuɔsu Yesu lɛlɔ litemi lígyingya na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui.
41001029	Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane ku Yakobo ku Yohane bálɛ kasalakɔ mmɔ, na bátɔlɔ bésie Simon ku Andrea kaduli.
41001030	Ka bétéduo mmɔ ni, bekyuli badi básu Yesu ka Simon ulekudi uni uuƒi ɔtɛ ɔni na lɛlɔ lɛbi-nwu.
41001031	Anwuɔsu Yesu úsie útéduo-nwu kudɔ, na úƒie-nwu kɔnu ɔ́da na ɔ́tala-nwu únyene. Kɔnakunwi na nwuna ɔlɛ ɔ́da-nwu ɔ́ya, na ɔ́ta na úte-ma adila.
41001032	Ka useyi uwi údu ni, bekyuli béti balɛne pii ku bekyuli bani na ayu ekpidi asiaku-ma béboku Yesu banii ɔbwi-ma.
41001033	Na ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli ƒui bébenye kayakun mmɔ baanu.
41001034	Yesu ɔ́bwi bekyuli pii bani muuƒi lɛlɛ lidu lidu na ɔ́gya ayu ekpidi pii lɛnɔ ɔ́lɛku bekyuli bani na ayu ekpidi asiaku-ma lɛlɔ. Ka Yesu ɔgyi ɔnii ayu amɛni agyi ukyuli ɔni na ɔdi ɔsu ni, útatuna ka ayu ammɔ asu lɛla lɛdi asiku nwuna lɛlɔ.
41001035	Ɔtanta tutuutu asa na kadi kadubɔda ni, Yesu ɔ́ta ɔ́lɛ kaduli mmɔ. Na ɔ́lɛ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo úsie kesii kani na ukyuli ɔdi biala uuude, na útákpali katɔ.
41001036	Kama ni, Simon ku nwuna bakpana bésie bakya baawia Yesu.
41001037	Na uwi ɔni bánu-nwu ni, básu-nwu banini, “Bekyuli pii bakya baawia-a!”
41001038	Nsu Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛya na busie lɛma lɛbambadi lɛnɔ. Ɔlɛka lɛsu ama lɛnɔ litemi buni lɛmɛni, ɔsika ɔmɛni ndi mina kabla kani na líbo mabla na kayawi kemo.”
41001039	Anwuɔsu úsie ɔ́vi Galilea kalɔ kesii biala. Ɔkɛ ɔɔsu litemi buni na kasalakɔ, na ɔɔgyá ayu ekpidi taalɛku bekyuli lɛlɔ lɛnɔ.
41001040	Ɔnana ɔdi ɔni muuƒi ɔlɛgyie úbo Yesu kudɔ. Ɔ́lɛ akɔnkɔ, na úvele-nwu ɔnii ubunku-nwu. Ɔ́su Yesu ɔnii, “Si aayɔ́ ni, akana na abwi-mi na lɛlɔ lɛbla-mi sɛɛn.”
41001041	Nwuna lɛlɔ lɛ́kywi Yesu kaƒɔ, anwuɔsu únene kɔnu na útuku-nwu. Amu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Mɔɔyɔ́. Lɛlɔ lɛbla-a sɛɛn ƒui!”
41001042	Kɔnakunwi ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-nwu.
41001043	Mmɔ kani na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ka ɔtɔlɔ mmɔ, na úbo-nwu ɔda kpakplaa ɔnini,
41001044	“Tedi tenye ulu lɛlɔ na asu bekyuli lɛla lɛni nébo. Mmomu teesie na eti lɛlɔ atátina ɔkpane. Na ete akpala ani na Mose ɔda bubo bɔ́tina. Na ɔmɛni ɔdubɔtina bakpane bammɔ ka ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-a na ábla sɛɛn.”
41001045	Nsu ka ukyuli ɔmɛni úsela ni, úse kalɔ ɔɔva taasu kalɛ na Yesu ɔ́bwi-nwu. Na ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Yesu útakana na uduo ɔma ɔdi kemo, ɔsika bekyuli pii beebo-nwu kudɔ. Ɔmɛni ɔsu Yesu ɔ́ƒɔ lɛlɔ ɔkya alakpi akɔ. Nsu bekyuli básɔ bási ekpo ekpo bébo-nwu kudɔ mmɔ.
41002001	Emeyi adi kama ni, únwini úsie Kapernaum na nwuna bɔsɔ bubo lɛlɔ kɔtɛ kúbeyi ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo uwi klukui kemo.
41002002	Uwi útetu asa na bekyuli bébeyi kesii kani na úduo mmɔ na kaduli ku keyi ƒui. Na ɔkya ɔɔsu-ma litemi buni lɛmmɔ.
41002003	Mmɔ na nkyuli ine béti ɔlɛne ɔdi náƒɛ uwi kalɔ béboku-nwu.
41002004	Na ka bátakɛ kavinkɔ na kayakun ɔ́si bekyuli bumomo ɔsu ni, bátákɔ ɔtɔ katɔ na báyula ɔlɛne ɔmmɔ ku nwuna atɛla báva Yesu anumi.
41002005	Ka Yesu ɔ́nu kalɛ na báƒɔ bádi kpakplaa ka ɔdubɔkana ɔlɛne ɔmɛni bɔbwi ɔsu ni, Yesu ɔ́su ɔlɛne ɔmɛni ɔnii, “Ubi, líti ƒula ekpidi lɛ́kyiɛ-ɔ.”
41002006	Nsu ɔda bubo ala batinane bani nkya mmɔ beeti kasusu na bana kayi kemo banii,
41002007	“Bi ɔsu na ɔɔtɛmi lɛni? Katɔti lɛti mɔɔkana ekpidi buti taakyiɛ!”
41002008	Yesu ɔ́nu bana kasusu kemo ɔ́ti na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, “Bi ɔsu na ɔmɛni uukpóku-mii?
41002009	Ukyuli biala ɔkana ɔsu ɔnii, 'Líti ƒula ekpidi lɛ́kyiɛ-ɔ.' Nsu ubo ɔkplu utulo si ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Ta, na eti ƒula lɛtala na eteesie.'
41002010	Anwuɔsu kalɛ na bɛƒɔ bɛdi ka ami ɔni ndi Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi mbo kuƒi ka liti ekpidi lɛkyiɛ bekyuli na kayawi kamɛni kemo ɔsu ni, bɛnu!”
41002011	Mmɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ únwini anumi ɔ́tina ɔlɛne ɔmmɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ta, na eti ƒula lɛtala na eteesie kaduli.”
41002012	Na ɔnana ɔmɛni ɔ́ta kɔnakunwi na úti nwuna lɛtala na úsie ɔ́vi bekyuli bani nnye mmɔ akɔ, na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie nwuna kesii. Ɔmɛni ɔ́bla bekyuli bani nnye mmɔ ƒui kalɛ kadi. Na bátakɔsi Katɔti bumwi. Bana ƒui básu banii bátanu lɛla lɛmɛni udu kudii!
41002013	Amu na Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Galilea Ɛpu kudɔ na bekyuli bammɔ ƒui bébo nwuna kudɔ mmɔ, na ɔ́su-ma litemi buni.
41002014	Ka úti úsela ɛpu kudɔ mmɔ ni, útánu Lewi ɔni ndi Alƒeo ubidi ka ɔ́bla keliekɔ kadi na ulie mmɔ ɔɔƒɔ́ kuyi. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bo basiaku-mi kama.” Amu na Lewi úmii ɔ́ta kɔnakunwi na ɔ́siaku-nwu.
41002015	Useyi uwi ɔmmɔ ni, Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane ku bekyuli pii bani nsiaku-nwu bébo Lewi kesii banii babadiku-nwu. Na basiakune bammɔ akɔ ni, badi badi kuyi baƒɔne ku alaekpidi bablane. Amu na ɔda bubo ala batinane bani nkya Yudaƒuɔ lɛkpa linwi lɛni baalɔ Ƒarisiƒuɔ kemo lɛnɔ bébo mmɔ.
41002016	Anwuɔsu uwi ɔni na ɔda bubo ala batinane bani nási Ƒarisiƒuɔ lɛkpa lɛmmɔ kemo bánu ka Yesu ulie ɔɔdiku bekyuli bani lɛlɔ neeebo ɔbu mɛni ni, béye nwuna batɛyane banii, “Dɛ na ɔ́bla na anwu ku bekyuli bamɛni udu nlie mɔɔdi?”
41002017	Ka Yesu únu litemi lɛni na badaku bɔsu ni, ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Balɛne mɔɔwia kuvo ɔblane, na ɔɔɔdi bekyuli bani mbo lɛlɔ ɔkplu. Ńtebo nnii mbalɔ bekyuli babuni na benwini kayi, mmomu líbo na bekyuli bani ngyi ka alaekpidi bablane badi ɔsu.”
41002018	Amu uwi ɔdi ka Yohane ku nwuna batɛyane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ beelie kɔka na bana katɔ bɔkpali ɔsu ni, bekyuli badi bébo Yesu kudɔ bébeye-nwu banii, “Bi ɔsu na ƒula batɛyane ama belélie kɔka aani kalɛ na Yohane badi ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ beelie kɔka?”
41002019	Yesu údie kenye na úbo-ma lɛgba ɔnii, “Uleku ɔgya bakpana beení adila na uleku ketikɔ? Munuu útalɛka ebiti ada-ma ka uleku ɔgya ɔkya-ma akɔ?
41002020	Nsu limeyi lɛdi ni, badubuti-nwu bɔtɔlɔku nwuna bakpana kudɔ na bakpana bammɔ badubunyimi kenye ku kɔnyana.
41002021	Ukyuli ɔdi ulétile kɔdi kɔkukudi liƒi ku lɛdiku lɛwɔdi. Lɛdiku lɛwɔdi lɛmmɔ lɛdubɔni kɔkukudi kɔmmɔ kugyingya si báƒɔ-ku. Na ɔdubɔya na liƒi lɛkukudi lɛmmɔ liibómo litulo kalɛ na lise kudeedi.
41002022	Na lɛnɔ ni, beléti ntɛ bɔwɔdi teewi ɔku koƒo kɔkukudi kɔni kemo béewi ntɛ dii. Ntɛ bɔwɔdi bɔdubuƒuƒuo na bɔya ɔku koƒo kɔkukudi kɔmmɔ kɔbwɛ na ntɛ ku koƒo lɛnɔ kulálɛ kɔsia. Mmomu ni, ntɛ bɔwɔdi beeti teewi ɔku koƒo kɔwɔdi kemo.”
