41015001	Ɔtanta tutuutu ni, bakpane benengu bátása ku Yudaƒuɔ benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane ku litemi batɛne ƒui. Ka béti litemi lɛmɛni lɛlɔ kasusu ku kalɛ na badubɔbla-ni ni, bényimi Yesu na bétiku-nwu bátɔlɔku bésienku aban unengu ɔni baalɔ Pilato kudɔ.
41015002	Mmɔ ni, Pilato úye Yesu ɔnini, “Awɔ ndi Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga?” Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ɛɛn, lɛni na use aani kalɛ na adaku bɔsu.”
41015003	Bakpane benengu béti etemila pii básia Yesu lili.
41015004	Anwuɔsu Pilato ɔ́sɔ úye-nwu ɔnini, “Alasu lɛla lɛdi? Se kɔtu na enu etemila ani na badaku bɔsu taasiku-ɔ lɛlɔ!”
41015005	Nsu Yesu ɔ́sɔ útebimi kenye, na ɔ́bla Pilato dɛye dɛye!
41015006	Na limeyi lɛmɛni bɔdi biala uwi ni, Pilato úti ɔ́sia lɛlɔ ka ɔdubɔnyonu ukyuli unwi na bekyuli bekpidi bani béƒie bákya ɔtɔ akɔ ɔni lili na badubuvele bete.
41015007	Uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, béƒie ɔnana ɔdi baalɔ Baraba bákya ɔtɔ. Anwu nátɔnku bekyuli bani náta bénye Romaƒuɔ Ɔga lɛlɔ. Na bana lɛsɛ lɛni na bákya ɔsu ni, béƒie anwu ku nwuna basiakune na bádu-ma kukpi kɔtɔ na bekyuli bɔdu ɔsu.
41015008	Amu na uwi ɔni na bekyuli pii bamɛni bábasa ni, béye Pilato banii ɔkali nwuna ɔtɔ batɛne kɔnyana bɔnu aani kalɛ na ɔɔbla uwi ndi uwi mmɔ.
41015009	Úye-ma ɔnini, “Bɛɛyɔ́ ka lɛnyonu Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga lite-mii?”
41015010	Pilato úye-ma ɔmɛni ɔsika ɔ́ti ka lɛnungyie ɔsu na bakpane benengu bamɛni béti Yesu béboku-nwu.
41015011	Nsu bakpane benengu bammɔ bénwini bekyuli lisu lɛmɛni kasusu kalɛ na Pilato ɔnyonu Baraba mmomu uti ute-ma.
41015012	Pilato ɔ́sɔ útemi úte bekyuli lisu lɛmɛni na úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi na bɛɛwia ka lɛbla ku ukyuli ɔni na bɛɛlɔ Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga mɛni?”
41015013	Amu na báva básu-nwu banini, “Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ!”
41015014	Pilato úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu? Bi bɔƒiɔ na ɔ́ƒiɔ?” Nsu bana ƒui básɔ báva momoomo básu banini, “Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ!”
41015015	Ka Pilato ɔɔyɔ́ ka ebiti ada-ma ɔsu ni, ɔ́nyonu Baraba úte-ma. Na ɔ́ya na bébo Yesu kaduɛ ku kɔbuli kɔni na bélii básala, na úti-nwu úte bekpone ɔnii batákana-nwu bamana ugyii lɛlɔ.
41015016	Bekpone bammɔ bétiku Yesu na bétéduo aban unengu ɔmmɔ kaduli na bálɔ bekpone bakladi banii bebo.
41015017	Amu na béti awu ugyiedi ɔdi bákya Yesu aani ɔga kalɛ, na bédi liyu kabwa kadi bébi-nwu aani kagabwa.
41015018	Na bakya beewi-nwu anumi kalɔ banini, “Yiidu! Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga ulie ngba gyɔlɔɔ!”
41015019	Béti kegyiimi bébo-nwu kuli na bétuo lisuo béwi-nwu lɛlɔ. Amu na bálɛ akɔnkɔ na nwuna anumi na béboku eli kalɔ béte-nwu.
41015020	Uwi ɔni na báma-nwu báwɔlɔ ni, bédie nwuna awu ugyiedi ɔmmɔ na basɔku nwuna lɛwu geen bakya-nwu. Amu na bétiku-nwu bátɔlɔku banii batákana-nwu bamana ugyii lɛlɔ.
41015021	Uwi ɔni na bakɛ bésela ni, básiaku ɔnana ɔni baalɔ Simon ka ɔ́si lɛkpaklɔ ɔdubo Yerusalem. Amu na bekpone bammɔ básu-nwu banii ɔlɛka ubunku Yesu ugyii ɔmmɔ buti. Na Simon ɔmɛni ɔ́si Sireni, na nwuna bebi ndi Aleksandra ku Ruƒo.
41015022	Béti Yesu bésienku kataku kadi baalɔ Golgota ɔni kalɔ ndi kesii kani nálɛ ukyuli kuli.
41015023	Mmɔ na béte-nwu ntɛ bɔni na básala ku kuvo kɔni mbo ɔdu kati kati banii ɔni, nsu Yesu útani.
41015024	Amu na bekpone bammɔ bákana-nwu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ mmɔ. Na bátu egulabi bánu asa na béti nwuna lɛwu béle béte lɛlɔ kalɛ na bati ɔdi biala ku nwuna lɛla.
41015025	Bákana-nwu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ na ɔtanta lɛdɔ yaalenwi.
41015026	Na bébo kegyiikɛ kadi bámana-nwu eli na bénweni lɛla lɛni ɔsu na bádu-nwu básia-ka lɛlɔ banini, “Ɔmɛni ndi Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga.”
41015027	Na bákana beyune inyɔ lɛnɔ bámana ligyii lɛlɔ mmɔ bébunku Yesu. Unwi ɔ́ma-nwu kɔdianu kakɛ, na unwi lɛnɔ ɔ́ma-nwu kɔmiinu kakɛ.
41015028	Ɔmɛni úbo úte lɛni kalɛ na bénweni bése na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo banini, “Bádu-nwu bébunku ekpidi bablane.”
41015029	Bekyuli bani návi ƒui bákunku bana eli na bédumi Yesu básu banini, “Ɛhɛɛn! Awɔ násu ka adubɔƒɛ bula kakpakɔ kenengudi na asɔ atu-ka emeyi atɛ kama!
41015030	Yu na aƒɔ lɛlɔ asiku kukpi enu kemo na bɔnu!”
41015031	Lɛni kani na bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bammɔ lɛnɔ báma-nwu básu lɛlɔ banini, “Úbunku badi, nsu ulákana nwuna lɛlɔ bubunku!
41015032	Si anwu ɔni baalɔ Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga mɛni ndi Kristo ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna úse sɔsɔ ni, ɔkya ɔkplu na ɔyu ɔ́si ugyii lɛlɔ ubo kalɔ na bɔƒɔ-nwu bɔdi!” Nkyuli inyɔ bani na bákana bámana ligyii lɛlɔ bébunku Yesu mɛni ni, ama lɛnɔ bédumi-nwu.
41015033	Ɔƒii uwi ni, kalɔ kammɔ ƒui kábla suu. Na ɔmɛni ɔ́bla lɛni laa útédu lɛdɔ ɛtɛ kemo.
41015034	Na lɛdɔ ɛtɛ ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Yesu ɔ́va momoomo ɔ́su ɔnini, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” Bɔtɛmi bɔmɛni kalɔ ndi bɔnii, “Mina Ati, mina Ati, bi ɔsu na áda-mi ányonu?”
41015035	Bekyuli bani nnye mmɔ badi bénu lɛla lɛni na ɔ́su na badaku lɛlɔ bɔsu banini, “Binu! Ɔɔkpali Elia.”
41015036	Bana akɔ ɔdi úkeli útéti unwo ɔni na béti bákya ntɛ bɔni nányi kemo na úti ɔ́tu kegyiimi kadi lɛlɔ úboku Yesu ɔnii ɔni. Amu na ɔ́su bakladi ɔnini, “Bɛya na bɔnu si Elia ɔdubo ubamami-nwu ɔsiku ugyii ɔmɛni lɛlɔ!”
41015037	Nsu Yesu ɔ́va momoomo na ɔ́yula.
41015038	Kɔnakunwi ni, kɔdi kubendi kɔni nƒa Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ na béti bábala Katɔti katɔma kedee kayakun mmɔ kɔ́bwɛ kemo inyɔ kɔ́si katɔ kúbewi kalɔ.
41015039	Na ka bekpone unengu ɔni nnye ugyii ɔmɛni anumi únu Yesu bɔva na ɔ́nu kalɛ na úkpi ni, ɔ́su ɔnini, “Sɔsɔ na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔdi Katɔti Ubidi.”
41015040	Beleku badi lɛnɔ benye ɔgyu na baanu. Bana akɔ badi ndi Maria Magdalene ku Salome ku Maria ɔni bebi ndi Yakobo ɔnamudi ku Yose.
41015041	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́kya Galilea ni, ama nátaasiaku-nwu na béteebunku-nwu. Beleku babambadi pii bani násiaku-nwu bébo Yerusalem lɛnɔ benye mmɔ.
41015042	Ala amɛni ƒui álɛ na limeyi lɛni ntɔ lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ. Na ka ɔdaku useyi uwi budu ni,
41015043	Yudaƒuɔ litemi batɛne kemo unwi ɔni baalɔ Yoseƒ na ɔ́si Arimatea ni, úse kayi na úsie utánu Pilato. Yoseƒ ɔmɛni ɔlati ɔdi ukyuli ɔni nnye mɔɔsia anu na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ bubo lɛlɔ. Ka útédu Pilato kudɔ ni, úvele-nwu ɔnii ute-nwu ulu na ɔƒami Yesu ukpine ɔmɛni utáva asa na lɛnwunameyi lidu.
41015044	Ɔmɛni ɔ́bla Pilato kalɛ kadi ka únu ɔnii Yesu úkpi pla lɛni. Anwuɔsu ɔ́lɔ bekpone unengudi ɔni nnye ablala amɛni kenye mmɔ, na úye-nwu únu si Yesu úukpi sɔsɔ.
41015045	Na ka unengu ɔmɛni ɔ́su-nwu ka sɔsɔ na ɔdi ni, Pilato úte Yoseƒ kuƒi ɔnii utáƒami ukpine ɔmmɔ.
41015046	Amu na Yoseƒ úse útáƒami Yesu ukpine na únyimi-nwu ɔ́kya lɛdiku lɛwɔdi lɛni na úye kemo. Na úti-nwu útákya lɛtakpɛ kaƒiɔtɔ kani béku bése na kɔbi kɔdi kaƒɔna. Amu na ɔ́ya na béminime lɛtakpɛ lɛdi béti bétile kaƒiɔtɔ kamɛni kenye.
41015047	Na uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, Maria Magdalene ku Maria ɔni ndi Yoseƒ uni bébo mmɔ bébenye bánu kesii kani na béti Yesu ukpine bátákya.
41016001	Kadi kégye useyi uwi ɔni na lɛnwunameyi kadi káyu ni, Maria Magdalene ku Maria ɔni ndi Yakobo uni ku Salome bétéye klobo banii batáwɛɛ Yesu ukpine.
41016002	Amu ka kadi kégye Kwasida ɔtanta ni, báta bésie kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kudɔ.
41016003	-
41016004	Uwi ɔni na bakɛ bésela ni, béye lɛlɔ banini, “Ɔma na bɔdubɔkɛ na uminime lɛtakpɛ lɛmmɔ udie na kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kenye ute-bu?” Béye lɛlɔ ɔmɛni ɔsika lɛtakpɛ lɛmmɔ líbomo geen. Nsu ka bédu mmɔ ni, bánu ka ukyuli ɔdi úuminime lɛtakpɛ lɛmmɔ údie.
41016005	Anwuɔsu ka béduo kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kemo ni, bánu okloƒu ɔdi ka ulie kɔdianu kakɛ. Na ɔda ala aƒualadi sɔɔn! Ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́gyu-ma.
41016006	Amu na okloƒu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bitayia. Ngyi ka Yesu Nasareni na bɛɛwia, anwu ɔni na bákana bámana ugyii lɛlɔ. Uuubo mɛni! Ɔ́ta uli ngba! Bɛnu! Mɛni ndi likpo lɛni na béti-nwu bákya.
41016007	Anwuɔsu biteesie na bitásu nwuna batɛyane ku Petro lɛnɔ bɛnii, 'Yesu ɔtɔ-mii na Galilea. Mmɔ na bɛdubɔnu-nwu aani kalɛ na ɔ́su-mii úse.' ”
41016008	Ɔmɛni ɔ́bla beleku bamɛni kalɛ kadi, na bálɛ kaƒiɔtɔ kamɛni kemo ku lɛlɔ bɔtɔ, na békeli bátɔlɔ. Ɔni bakɛ ulu bésela ni, bátasu ukyuli biala lɛla lɛdi, ɔsika liƒu lɛɛda-ma.
41016009	Ka Yesu ɔ́ta ɔ́lɛ kaƒiɔtɔ kemo na Kwasida ɔmɛni lɛdigye ni, ɔ́ka lɛlɔ budie bɔtina Maria Magdalene ɔni lɛlɔ kemo na ɔ́bɔku ayu ekpidi maatɛ ɔ́lɛku dii.
41016010	Anwu nésie útásu Yesu bakpana ka Yesu ɔ́ta uwi ɔni kemo na ama bakya beewulo kɔnyana na nwuna kukpi ɔsu.
41016011	Na ka Maria ɔ́su-ma ɔnii Yesu ɔ́ta uli ngba na ɔ́nu-nwu ni, bátaƒɔ-nwu bátadi.
41016012	Ɔmɛni kama ni, Yesu údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina batɛyane inyɔ ka bakɛ ulu. Bátanu-nwu bátati na kalɔ kesekɔ.
41016013	Nsu kama ka bábati ni, básɔ bénwini bátásu bakladi. Nsu bakladi bammɔ bátaƒɔ-ma bátadi.
41016014	Kukplodi ni, Yesu údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina nwuna batɛyane leevu-unwi uwi ɔni na belie baadi. Nsu ɔ́dɔnku-ma ɔsika beeebo bɔƒɔtaadi, na bábla atu ɔkplu bágya, na bátaƒɔ bekyuli bani nánu-nwu ka ɔ́ta ɔ́sɔ úbo uli ngba bátadi.
41016015	Ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biteesie kayawi ƒui na bitákɔ Katɔti litemi buni lɛmɛni lɛsa na bekyuli ƒui akɔ.
41016016	Ukyuli ɔni náƒɔ litemi buni lɛmɛni ɔ́di na ɔ́ƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ni, Katɔti ɔdubudie-nwu ɔlɛku ekpidi kɔtu bɔni kemo. Na ukyuli ɔni nátaƒɔ útadi ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔdu-nwu kɔtɔ.
41016017	Na Katɔti ɔdubute baƒɔtaadine ɔyikun na babla akɔla lidu lidu. Badubɔgya ayu ekpidi na mina lɛnyi kemo. Badubutemi adi lidu lidu.
41016018	Na si béƒie kɔlakpi báda iye báni ugyulo ukpidi ɔdi biala ni, ulabla-ma lɛla lɛdi. Si béti bana enu básia balɛne lɛlɔ ni, badubɔkɛ lɛlɔ ɔkplu.”
41016019	Uwi ɔni na Blɔti Yesu ɔ́tɛmiku-ma mmɔ kama ni, Katɔti úti-nwu úsienku katɔ na útélie keliekɔ kenengudi kani nsiaku Ɔti kadi.
41016020	Nwuna basiakune lɛnɔ bávi kayawi ƒui na básu litemi buni lɛmɛni. Na Blɔti ɔ́kɛnku-ma lɛlɔ na údie ɔ́tina ka nwuna litemi lɛdi litemi geen ɔ́si akɔla lidu lidu lɛni na bátaabla na nwuna ɔyikun kemo ɔsu.
42001001	Ati Tioƒilo, bekyuli pii bákya ɔkplu na bábla kalɛ na bakana bɔbla na bénweni ala ani ƒui nálɛ na bula akɔ bése.
42001002	Bénweni-nya aani kalɛ na bekyuli bani nánu ala amɛni ɔ́si nyana kalɔ kesekɔ básu-bu na bákɔ-nya lɛsa lɛnɔ.
42001003	Anwuɔsu ni, Ɔbune Tioƒilo, ka ami líwi lɛlɔ lɛ́tɛya ala amɛni ƒui ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ ɔsu ni, lɛ́bla kasusu ka ɔdia ka línweni kalɛ na ala amɛni álɛ nwaa lite-ɔ.
42001004	Mɔɔbla ɔmɛni kalɛ na anu litemi geen lɛmmɔ ati ƒui ɔ́si ala ani na bátina-a lɛlɔ.
42001005	Uwi ɔni na Herode ɔɔdi lɛga na Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti ɔkpane ɔdi ɔkya ɔni baalɔ Sakaria. Ɔ́si ɔkpane bɔdi ulu ɔni nkɛ ɔkpane ɔni baalɔ Abia ulu lɛlɔ. Sakaria ɔmɛni ulekudi baalɔ Elisabet na anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́si Katɔti ɔkpane ɔni baalɔ Aaron kaba kemo.
42001006	Ɔgya ku ule bamɛni bélie ngba bɔbuni na Katɔti anumi. Na bádi nwuna ɔda bubo ƒui lɛlɔ kaduɛ.
42001007	Bekyuli bamɛni beeebo bebi badi, ɔsika Elisabet ɔdi udinkɔ. Na bana inyɔ lɛnɔ báabi lɛlɔ.
42001008	Limeyi lɛdi ni, Sakaria ɔkya Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ ɔɔbla nwuna ɔkpane kabla ɔsika nwuna lɛlɔ na údu.
42001009	Ɔsika na bana bakpane ɔdi bɔbla kemo ni, bátu egulabi bánu na Sakaria ɔmmɔ ɔdi nénwini úwi. Anwuɔsu anwu na báƒuna ka ɔkyula oloƒui ute Katɔti na nwuna lɛkpabi lɛlɔ. Amu na úduo úsie Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ mmɔ.
42001010	Na uwi ɔni na ɔkya ɔɔkyula oloƒui ɔmmɔ ni, bekyuli bakladi bewi keyi baakpali katɔ.
42001011	Amu na Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina-nwu na unye use kesii kani na oloƒui ɔmmɔ ɔɔkywí kɔdianu kakɛ.
42001012	Na ɔni na Sakaria ɔ́nu-nwu ni, liƒu lɛ́da-nwu geen.
42001013	Nsu Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Sakaria, tayia! Katɔti únu ƒula bɔkpali, na ƒula ulekudi Elisabet ɔdubɔwɔ ɔnanabi ute-ɔ. Na adubɔsia-nwu lɛnyi anii Yohane.
42001014	Si báwɔ-nwu ni, adubɔkɛ kubiti geen. Lɛni kani na bekyuli pii lɛnɔ badubɔkɛ kubiti.
42001015	Ɔdubo ukyuli ubendi bɔbla na Katɔti anumi. Útalɛka ɔni ntɛ kpakplaa iye bɔbambadi bɔdi udu lɛnɔ. Na ɔ́si nwuna bɔwɔ uwi ni, Katɔti kɔyu kɔdubɔƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo.
42001016	Na anwu ndubo Israel bekyuli pii bɔsɔku buboku bana Unwoti Katɔti kudɔ.
42001017	Anwu ndubɔka Blɔti bubo na ɔyikun ku kayi buse kemo aani kalɛ na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Elia úse kalɛ. Na anwu ndubo bebi ku bati bɔsɔku bɔsala. Na ɔdubunwini batuɔkplune kasusu úboku kasusu kedee bɔbla lɛlɔ. Ɔmɛni ndubɔya na Blɔti bekyuli benye kagyumana bete-nwu.”
42001018	Amu na Sakaria úye ɔtu ɔmɛni ɔnini, “Bi ndubɔya na lɛƒɔ ɔmɛni lɛdi? Ɔsika lɛ́ɛbla unengu na mina ulekudi lɛnɔ ɔ́ɔbi.”
42001019	Amu na ɔtu ɔmɛni údie kenye ɔnini, “Ami ndi Gabriel ɔni muunye Katɔti anumi. Anwu nátala-mi ɔnii mbasu-ɔ kenye kabuni kamɛni.
42001020	Nsu átaƒɔ-mi kenye kamɛni átadi. Ina ka átaƒɔ-ka átadi ni, kadubo bɔlɛ na uwi ɔni na Katɔti úse-ka úse lɛlɔ. Na ɔmɛni ɔsu adububo limu wetédu limeyi lɛni na kenye kamɛni kébo kéte lɛni sɔsɔ.”
42001021	Uwi ɔni na ala amɛni ƒui aalɛ́ ni, ɔ́bla bekyuli bani nnye bagya Sakaria na keyi mmɔ kalɛ kadi, ɔsika balati lɛla lɛni ɔsu na uutu uwi na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ mmɔ lɛni.
42001022	Ka ɔ́lɛ úbo ni, ɔsɔ ulákana-ma butemiku. Anwuɔsu bánu báti ka ɔ́nu budie bɔtina bɔdi na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ mmɔ. Na ka ulákana butemi ɔsu ni, enu kani na uudie taatɛmiku-ma ala.
42001023	Na uwi ɔni na nwuna lɛkpa kabla kása na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ mmɔ ni, Sakaria ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie kaduli.
42001024	Na ɔmɛni kama ni, Elisabet úbada kaƒɔ ɔni na ɔsɔ ulalɛ. Na ɔ́bɛla lɛlɔ abuli alɔ sɔɔn.
42001025	Amu na Elisabet ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ɔƒɛni ni, Katɔti ɔ́bla ɔmɛni úte-mi, na ɔ́tala mina kɔƒa na kadi anumi.”
42001026	Na Elisabet kaƒɔ bɔda kɔbuli kɔkundi kemo ni, Katɔti ɔ́tala nwuna ɔtu Gabriel ɔnii usie ɔma ɔni baalɔ Nasaret na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ.
42001027	Ɔtu ɔmɛni úti kenye úsienku ulekubi ɔni na bévele béte ɔnana ɔni baalɔ banii Yoseƒ na ɔ́si Ɔga Dawid kaba kemo. Ulekubi ɔmmɔ lɛnyi ndi Maria.
42001028	Ɔtu ɔmmɔ úbo Maria kudɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Mɔɔkɔ́-ɔ lɛlɔ buɛɛ! Blɔti ɔsiaku-ɔ na úte-ɔ kusɛ kusɛ.”
42001029	Ɔtu ɔmɛni kenye kani na ɔ́su ɔ́ya na Maria kasusu kéƒu, ɔsika útenu kenye kammɔ kalɔ.
42001030	Amu na ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Maria, tayia. Ƒula lɛlɔ lɛ́da Katɔti kubiti geen.
42001031	Adubo kaƒɔ bɔda na awɔ ɔnanabi, na adubɔsia-nwu lɛnyi anii Yesu.
42001032	Ɔdubo lɛnyi bɔƒɔ geen na badubɔlɔ-nwu banii Katɔti ɔni ndi Ɔyikune Ƒui ɔlati Ubidi. Na Unwoti Katɔti ɔdubɔya na ubi ɔmmɔ ɔdi lɛga aani nwuna Nana Dawid kalɛ.
42001033	Na ɔdubo lɛga bɔdi na Yakob kaba kemo uwi ƒui. Na nwuna lɛga kadikɔ kalása kudii.”
42001034	Amu na Maria úye-nwu ɔnini, “Dɛ na ɔmɛni webo wete lɛni ka adagyaa na ndi?”
42001035	Mmɔ na ɔtu ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔyikune Ƒui ɔmmɔ Kɔyu kɔdubo-ɔ lɛlɔ na nwuna ɔyikun ɔƒɔ-ɔ lɛlɔ kemo. Anwuɔsu ubi kedee ɔni na adubo bɔwɔ ni, badubɔlɔ-nwu banii Katɔti Ubidi.
42001036	Ɔƒɛni mɔɔyá-a na ati ka ni, ƒula ɔtɔ kemo uleku ɔni ndi Elisabet na baalɔ-nwu udinkɔ ni, ɔ́ɔda kaƒɔ ina ka nwuna akwa éesie lɛtɔtɔ geen. Na nwuna kɔbuli kɔkundi kemo na ɔkya mɛni.
42001037	Ɔsika lɛla lɛdi liiibo Katɔti ɔkplu.”
42001038	Amu na Maria ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Nu, Blɔti kabla ɔblane na ndi. Ɔbla ute-mi aani kalɛ na ásu.” Amu na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́tɔlɔ.
42001039	-
42001040	Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo kani na Maria úmi ɔ́ta na ɔ́babla úsie Sakaria kesii na abi lɛlɔ na Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ ɔnii utégyele Elisabet.
42001041	Na ka Elisabet únu Maria kegye ni, ubi ɔni nkya-nwu kaƒɔ kemo úkpo, na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ Elisabet lɛlɔ kemo ƒui.
42001042	Mmɔ na ɔ́su ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Béte-ɔ kusɛ kusɛ na beleku ƒui akɔ, na béte ƒula kaƒɔ ubi lɛnɔ kusɛ kusɛ!
42001043	Ɔma na ndi ɔsu na Blɔti uni ɔɔkɔ́-mi lɛlɔ?
42001044	Uwi ɔni kani na ƒula kegye kánya kéduo-mi atu kemo ni, mmɔ kani na ubi ɔni nkya-mi kaƒɔ kemo úkpo na lɛlɔyɔ kemo.
42001045	Na lɛlɔ litaayɔ-ɔ geen, ɔsika áƒɔ ádi ka kenye kani na Katɔti ɔ́su ɔ́siku-ɔ lɛlɔ kadububo kete lɛni.”
42001046	Amu na Maria ɔ́su ɔnini, “Mina kayi keemwi Blɔti.
42001047	Na lɛlɔ lɛɛyɔ́ mina kɔyu na Katɔti ɔni ndi mina Ɔƒɔne lɛlɔ.
42001048	Ɔsika únyimo ami, nwuna kabla ɔblane ɔni naaadi lɛla lɛdi. Na ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ni, kaba ƒui badubo-mi bɔlɔ banii ukyuli ɔni na lɛlɔ lɛɛyɔ́-mi.
42001049	Ɔsika Ɔyikune Ƒui nábla ala ebendi amɛni úte-mi, na nwuna lɛnyi nse kedee.
42001050	Nwuna kɔnyana bɔnu kuse kute kaba ƒui bekyuli bani mɔɔbu-nwu.
42001051	Údie nwuna ɔyikun keyi, na úgyingya bekyuli bani mɔɔtalaku lɛlɔ katɔ.
42001052	Úboku baga benengudi ƒui kalɔ, na ɔ́kɔliku bani néboku lɛlɔ kalɔ katɔ.
42001053	Ɔ́ya na bekyuli bani na kɔka kɔɔda ƒui bémo ku ala abuni sɔɔn, na balakɛne bénwini ku enukplu.
42001054	Nwuna anumi asia kenye kani na ɔ́su bula bati kuuku úse lɛlɔ, na úbo ɔnii ubebunku Israel kadi bekyuli ƒui.
42001055	Únyimo ka uti kɔnyana bɔnu ute Abraham ku nwuna bawɔ úsela ƒui!”
42001056	Amu na Maria ɔ́sɔ ɔkya Elisabet kudɔ aani abuli atɛ sɔɔn asa na ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie ɔma.
42001057	Uwi úbedu Elisabet ka ɔwɔ. Na ɔ́wɔ ɔnanabi.
42001058	Na Elisabet bekutene ku banwa ƒui bénu akɔla ebendi ani na Katɔti ɔ́bla úte-nwu. Na bana ƒui bákɛku-nwu ebiti kaduɛ.
42001059	Ka ɔnamu ɔmmɔ ɔ́ƒɔ emeyi maane ni, bébo banii bebekulo-nwu lego na báwia ka basia-nwu ɔti lɛnyi banii Sakaria.
42001060	Nsu uni útatunaku-ma na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛsia-nwu lɛnyi bɛnii Yohane.”
42001061	Amu na bákyaku-nwu unyeƒi banii, “Na ka balálɔ ƒula ɔtɔ kemo ukyuli ɔdi banii Yohane nɔɔ?”
42001062	Amu na bébo ɔti enu béye-nwu bénu lɛnyi lɛni na ɔɔwia ka basia ubidi.
42001063	Mmɔ na Sakaria ɔ́ƒɔ lɛla lɛni lɛlɔ na beenweni ala taasia na únweni ɔnii, “Nwuna lɛnyi ndi Yohane.” Na ɔ́bla bana ƒui dɛye dɛye.
42001064	Mmɔ kani na Sakaria úse kalɔ ku butemi na uumwi Katɔti.
42001065	Liƒu bonwu lɛdi lɛ́da nwuna bekutene ɔni náya na litemi lɛmɛni lígyingya lɛ́kya lɛma lɛni nkya Yudea abi lɛlɔ ƒui kemo.
42001066	Bekyuli bani ƒui nénu ala amɛni béti kasusu kadi na béye lɛlɔ banii, “Bi ukyuli udu na ɔnamu ɔmɛni ɔdubo bunwini geen tɔ?” Béye lɛlɔ lɛni ɔsika use nwaa ka Katɔti ɔyikun ɔsiaku-nwu.
42001067	Mmɔ na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ ubi ɔmmɔ ɔti Sakaria lɛlɔ kemo na ɔ́su úse ɔnini,
42001068	“Bɛya na bumwi Blɔti, Israel Unwoti, ɔsika úbo úbebunku nwuna kadi na ɔƒɔ-ma na bakɛ bɔnwuna.
42001069	Úti Ɔƒɔne Ɔyikune ɔdi úte-bu ɔni na ɔdi anwu ɔlati kabla ɔblane Dawid kaba kemo ubi.
42001070	Úse kenye kamɛni úse kukuuku ɔkɛ nwuna kenye bediene kedee lɛlɔ ka ni,
42001071	ɔdubudie-bu ɔlɛku ekpidi bablane ku ama bani na muukisi-bu ƒui enu kemo.
42001072	Ɔ́su ka ɔdubɔnu bula bati kuuku kɔnyana na wenyimo bunyimi kedee bɔni nkya ama ku-nwu ntɛ.
42001073	Na ɔ́su bula ɔti Abraham kenye kpakplaa kamɛni úse ka ni,
42001074	ɔdubudie-bu na bula bekisine enu kemo, na ɔdubɔya na bɔbla-nwu kabla na liƒu lɛsɔ lɛɛɛdubo-bu bɔda.
42001075	Na ɔdubɔbla-bu kedee na buse siin na nwuna anumi na bula ngba emeyi kemo ƒui.
42001076	Na awɔ, mina ubi ni, badubɔlɔ-ɔ banii Katɔti Ɔni Ntulo Ƒui Kenye Udiene. Awɔ ndubo bɔgyu bɔtɔ na Blɔti lɛtɔtɔ kalɛ na aklibi ulu ese ete nwuna bubo.
42001077	Na aya nwuna bekyuli bati ka badubɔkɛ bɔƒɔ na bana ekpidi buti taakyiɛ ɔsu.
42001078	Bula Katɔti use buɛɛ, na ɔɔnu kɔnyana. Ɔdubɔtala Ɔƒɔne ɔkya-bu ɔni muukeye aani kalɛ na ɔƒɛ ɔɔtu.
42001079	Na ɔya na bukeye bɔmɛni bɔsi katɔ buwi bekyuli bani nli kasuudikɔ na kukpi liƒu lɛɛda-ma kalɛ na ɔkpanku-bu ɔvinku keyi buɛɛ ulu lɛlɔ.”
42001080	Amu na ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́lɛ lili na kayi kasia Katɔti lɛlɔ kpakplaa. Na ketele ntɛ kani na úlie úti útédu uwi ɔni na ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ Israel kadi anumi.
42002001	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare Augusto úte ɔyikun ɔnii benweni bekyuli bani ƒui nkya Roma lɛga bɔdi kalɔ anyi.
42002002	Na bekyuli anyi bunweni budeedi bɔmɛni kemo ni, aban unengu ɔni baalɔ banii Kirenio mɔɔdi Siria kalɔ lɛlɔ.
42002003	Anwuɔsu ukyuli biala úsie nwuna ɔma úténweni lɛnyi.
42002004	Amu na Yoseƒ lɛnɔ ɔ́ta ɔ́si Nasaret ɔma na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ úsie Betlehem na Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ kesii kani na báwɔ Ɔga Dawid. Yoseƒ úsie mmɔ ɔsika ɔdi Dawid kaba kemo ubi.
42002005	Útiku Maria ɔni na bévele béte-nwu na ɔda kaƒɔ lɛnɔ.
42002006	Na uwi ɔni na bakya Betlehem mmɔ ni, uwi úbedu Maria ka ɔwɔ.
42002007	Ɔ́wɔ nwuna ubi ɔnanabi udeedi na ɔtɔ kakɛ kani na bebuo batɛ. Na únyimi-nwu ɔ́kya kɔdi kemo, na úti-nwu ɔ́va lɛla lɛni kemo na bebuo bammɔ baadi, ɔsika kakyakɔ kadi kasɔ keeebo na baƒɔ keduokɔ.
42002008	Amu na likpo lɛmmɔ na kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ni, baƒonu badane badi bakya baanu bana bebuo lɛlɔ usien ƒui.
42002009	Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ-ma lɛlɔ na Unwoti bukeye bɔdi búkeye búbewi-ma lɛlɔ. Ɔmɛni ɔsu báyia geen,
42002010	nsu Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bitayia. Líboku-mii linyesia lɛbuni lɛni ndubuti lɛlɔyɔ ku ebiti geen ute bekyuli ƒui.
42002011	Na ɔmwi limeyi lɛmɛni kani lɛlɔ ni, báwɔ Ɔƒɔne ɔni ndi Blɔti Kristo béte-mii na Ɔga Dawid ɔma kemo.
42002012	Na lɛla lɛni na bɛdubuti bɛnu bɛti ni, ani ndi ka bɛdubɔnu ubiwɔ ɔni bényimi bákya kɔdi kemo na ɔtɛ bebuo kadikɔ.”
42002013	Kɔnakunwi ni, Katɔti batu lɛkpa bonwu lɛdi lɛ́si kayaa lɛ́da lɛ́lɛ-ma lɛlɔ na líbebunku ɔtu ɔmɛni na bakya beemwi Katɔti banii,
42002014	“Ɔbu ku bumwi ute Katɔti na katɔ kakaaka ƒui, na keyi buɛɛ kasiaku bayawine ƒui bani na Katɔti ɔɔyɔ́!”
42002015	Na uwi ɔni na Katɔti batu bamɛni bátɔlɔ-ma kudɔ na básɔ bénwini bésie katɔ ni, baƒonu badane bamɛni básu lɛlɔ banii, “Bɛya na busie Betlehem butánu ala ani nálɛ na Unwoti údie ɔ́tina-bu mɛni.”
42002016	Amu na bábabla bésie na bátánu Maria ku Yoseƒ ku ubiwɔ ɔni ntɛ bebuo kadikɔ mmɔ.
42002017	Na ka bánu-nwu lɛni ni, básu ala ani ƒui na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔ́si ubi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.
42002018	Amu na bekyuli bani ƒui nénu baƒonu badane bamɛni etemila ni, ɔ́bla-ma kalɛ kadi.
42002019	Nsu Maria únyimo ala amɛni ƒui, na úti-nya lɛlɔ kasusu úsie ɔgyu.
42002020	Amu na baƒonu badane bammɔ básɔ bénwini na beemwi Katɔti na ala ani ƒui na bánu ku ani bénu lɛnɔ lɛlɔ, ɔsika ana ƒui ese pɛpɛɛpɛ kalɛ kani na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-ma.
42002021	Na emeyi maane kama ka uwi úbedu ka bekulo ubi ɔmmɔ lego ni, básia-nwu lɛnyi banii Yesu aani kalɛ kani na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su úse asa na badubɔda-nwu kaƒɔ.
42002022	Amu na uwi úbedu ka Yoseƒ ku Maria babla lɛlɔ bɔbla sɛɛn ɔdi aani kalɛ na Mose ɔda bubo bɔɔtina kenye. Na béti ubiwɔ ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ bésienku Yerusalem banii beeti-nwu bete Unwoti.
42002023	Lɛni na bénweni bákya Katɔti ɔda bubo ɔku kemo banii, “Ɔnanabi udeedi biala ku ebuo ɔgyani udeedi biala ni, ɔdi ka bedie-nwu bese bete Unwoti.”
42002024	Na bésie bátábla akpala béte Unwoti, ɔsika ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ bɔ́tina ka beti babloduma inyɔ iye bamangbɛ inyɔ bakpa bete-nwu.
42002025	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔnana ɔdi baalɔ banii Simeon ɔkya Yerusalem. Na ɔdi ukyuli ɔbuni ɔni na ɔɔyia Katɔti na unye ɔɔnu ulu ute Israel bɔƒɔ. Na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔsiaku-nwu
42002026	na kúse-nwu kayi ka ulekpi wetédu lebo lɛni na ɔ́nu ka báwɔ Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni kenye na Katɔti ɔ́su úse.
42002027	Amu na Kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔ́tɔnku Simon kúsienku Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ mmɔ. Na ka bawɔne bamɛni béti Yesu ubiwɔ béboku banii bababla ala ani ƒui na ɔdi ka babla bete-nwu na ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ kenye ni,
42002028	Simon ɔ́ƒɔ ubiwɔ ɔmmɔ ɔ́da, na ɔ́gya Katɔti enu ɔnini,
42002029	“Unwoti, ɔƒɛni ni, ka ásia ƒula linyese anu ɔsu ni, akana na edie ami, ƒula kabla ɔblane, ulu na nteesie ku keyi buɛɛ.
42002030	Ami ɔlati mina anumi ánu Ɔƒɔne
42002031	ɔni na áya na úbo na kadi bekyuli ƒui anumi.
42002032	Ɔdi bukeye bɔni ndubudie ƒula lɛyɔla keyi ute bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ. Na ɔdubuti ɔbu uboku ƒula kadi bekyuli Israelƒuɔ akɔ.”
42002033	Ala ani na Simon ɔ́su mɛni áya na ɔ́bla Yoseƒ ku Maria dɛye dɛye.
42002034	Na Simon úte-ma kusɛ kusɛ na ɔ́su Maria ɔnini, “Ubi ɔmɛni ɔdi Katɔti Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi. Na ɔdi bɔƒɔ iye bɔyii ute Israelƒuɔ pii na kalɛ na báƒɔ-nwu kenye. Ɔdi bɔnu bɔti bɔni nási Katɔti kudɔ na bekyuli pii badubɔta benye-nwu lɛlɔ.
42002035	Na ɔdubo bekyuli bamɛni kasusu kani nábɛ keyi budie. Na ɔkɛ ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, adubunu ɔlɛ aani kalɛ na kewii kaatu ukyuli kayi.”
42002036	-
42002037	Amu na uleku ɔdi ɔni ndi Katɔti kenye udiene ɔkya mmɔ na baalɔ-nwu banii Hana. Na nwuna ɔti Ƒanuel ɔ́si Aser kaba kemo. Akwa maatɛ kani na úlie kɔgya asa na ɔgyani úkpi. Na ɔdi ukpinele ɔni na ɔ́ɔbi lɛlɔ geen. Ɔbla akwa liti ku aavlatɛ-ine sɔɔn mɛni. Uusié Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ mmɔ uwi ndi uwi teetémwi Katɔti usien ku ɔƒɛ na ɔɔkpali katɔ na uulie kɔka lɛnɔ.
42002038	Uwi ɔmmɔ kani kemo ni, anwu lɛnɔ úbo na úti linugya úte Katɔti, na útemi ɔ́siku ubi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ úte bekyuli bani ƒui nnye baanu Katɔti ulu ka waƒɔ Yerusalem.
42002039	Na ka Yoseƒ ku Maria báwɔlɔ bana ɔdi bɔbla aani kalɛ na Katɔti ɔda bubo ɔku ɔ́tina kalɛ ni, bénwini bésie bana ɔma Nasaret na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ.
42002040	Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́lɛ lili na ɔ́kɛ lɛlɔ ɔkplu, na ɔ́da anu geen. Na nwuna lɛlɔ lɛ́da Katɔti kubiti.
42002041	Lɛkwa ndi lɛkwa ni, Yesu bawɔne beesié Yerusalem taatádi limeyi lɛni baalɔ banii Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi.
42002042	Amu ka Yesu ɔ́ƒɔ akwa leevu-anyɔ ni, básɔ bésie Yerusalem aani kalɛ na baabla kukuuku kalɛ.
42002043	Na ka limeyi lɛmmɔ bɔdi lɛ́sa na básɔ bénwini bésela ɔma ni, Yesu anwu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kya kama na Yerusalem mmɔ. Na nwuna bawɔne bátati lɛni.
42002044	Ama bábu banii ɔkya bekyuli bammɔ akɔ ɔsu bésie ɔƒɛ umodi ulu asa na bése kalɔ baawia-nwu na bakpana ku nwuna lɛlɔ bekyuli akɔ.
42002045	Na ka bátanu-nwu ɔsu ni, básɔ bénwini bésie Yerusalem bakɛ baawia-nwu.
42002046	Na limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛlɔ ni, bátánu-nwu na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ ka anwu ku Yudaƒuɔ ala batinane badi belie. Mmɔ na ɔkya uunú bana ala ani na baasu na uuye-ma etemila ekpo ekpo teenu.
42002047	Na bani nénu-nwu ala kenye budie ni, ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye na lɛlati bonwu lɛni udu na ɔda uudie ala ani beeye-nwu kenye ɔsu.
42002048	Ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́gyu nwuna bawɔne ka bánu-nwu lɛni. Na uni úye-nwu ɔnini, “Ubi, bi ɔsu na ábla-bu lɛmɛni udu? Ami ku ƒula ɔti ƒui búduo lɛƒɛda kemo na bɔkɛ bɔɔví taawia-a.”
42002049	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na bɛkɛ bɛɛwia-mi taavi? Bɛɛɛgyi bɛnii mina Ɔti kesii na ɔlɛka lɛkya yoo?”
42002050	Nsu ama bétenu lɛla lɛni na ɔ́su-ma mɛni kalɔ.
42002051	Amu na Yesu ɔ́siaku-ma na bátɔlɔ bésie Nasaret, na úboku lɛlɔ kalɔ úte-ma. Na ala amɛni ƒui éduo uni kasusu kemo úsie ɔgyu.
42002052	Na Yesu úbalɛ lili na lɛnunda ku ɔlɔna kemo, na ɔ́ƒɔ lɛnyi na bekyuli ku Katɔti ƒui anumi.
42003001	-
42003002	Na lɛkwa leevu-lɛlɔndi lɛni na Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare Tiberio ɔɔdi lɛga ni, Kenye Udiene Yohane ɔni ndi Sakaria ubidi ɔ́kɛ linyesia lɛdi ɔ́siku Katɔti kudɔ uwi ɔni na uli ketele kemo. Na Pontio Pilato ɔɔtɔnku aban na Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na Herode ɔɔdi Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na uwi ɔmmɔ kani kemo ni, Herode ɔnwani Ƒilipo lɛnɔ ɔɔdi kalɔ kani baalɔ Iturea ku Trakoniti kalɛkɛ lɛlɔ. Na Lɛlɔ Ɔdine Lisania lɛnɔ ɔɔdi Abilene kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, Hana ku Kaiaƒa badi Katɔti bakpane benengudi.
42003003	Amu na Yohane ɔkɛ ɔɔví Yordan utuvi ku kalɛkɛ mmɔ bene ƒui ɔɔsu Katɔti litemi ɔnii, “Binwini kama bɛkya bina ekpidi na bɛƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi kalɛ na Katɔti uti bina ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-mii.”
42003004	Na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesaia ɔku kemo ni, lɛni na bénweni bákya banini, “Ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔva na ketele kemo ɔnini, 'Binye kagyumana bite Blɔti. Bɛklibi bina lɛlɔ kaduɛ bite nwuna bubo.
42003005	Biyile lɛbonga na bɛbwɛ abi ku abinkpo ƒui na atɛ kalɔ. Na binyene lilu lɛni nábu. Na kesii kani nse kpukplo kpukplo ni, bɛbla-nwu suɛlɛ suɛlɛ.
42003006	Mmɔ na bekyuli ƒui badubɔnu Ɔƒɔne ɔni na ɔ́tala!' ”
42003007	Bekyuli pii bálɛ bébo banii Yohane ɔkpila-ma ntu. Nsu Yohane ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bibo likyulikpi aani balakpi! Bitatɔlɔ lɛlɔ bɛnii si bákpila-mii ntu kani ni, ɔ́sa na bɛ́lɛ Katɔti kɔtu kɔni na ɔdubɔni bekyuli bekpidi kemo.
42003008	Bɛtina na bina ɔbladu kemo ka bínwini kama bɛ́kya bina alaekpidi. Na bitakali ka Abraham kaba kemo bebi bɛdi ɔsu ni, Katɔti ɔɔɔdubo-mii kɔtu bɔni. Mɔɔsu-mii nnii Katɔti ɔkana udie kaba ɔsiku atakpɛ amɛni kemo ute Abraham.
42003009	Bɛɛnu ka bada kadadi benye kugyii lɛlɔ na bada-ku ku ligyiitu. Kugyii biala naaanwu ebi buni ni, badubɔmɛnɛ-ku bakya lɛgyavonku kemo!”
42003010	Amu na bekyuli bammɔ béye-nwu banii, “Na bi na ɔlɛka bɔbla ɔƒɛni?”
42003011	Amu na údie kenye ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Awɔ ɔni mbo awu ɔkyadi na údu inyɔ ni, ti unwi te ukyuli ɔni neeebo ɔdi. Na ukyuli ɔni mbo adila lɛnɔ ni, na ule-nya lɛni kani.”
42003012	Kuyi baƒɔne badi lɛnɔ bébo banii ɔkpila-ma ntu. Ama béye-nwu banini, “Ala ɔtinane, bi na ɔlɛka bɔbla?”
42003013	Amu na Yohane ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bitaƒɔ kuyi bitetulo lɛla lɛni na ɔda bubo búte ulu bɔ́wɔ.”
42003014	Bekpone badi lɛnɔ béye-nwu banini, “Na abu nɔɔ? Bi na ɔlɛka bɔbla?” Amu na ɔ́su ama lɛnɔ ɔnini, “Bɛya na bina lɛyuƒɔla lɛda-mii ebiti. Na bɛsɔ bitasia ɔmɛni kama bitanya ukyuli ɔdi bitamana na bɛƒɔ-nwu egulabi adi iye bitadu ukyuli ɔdi kɔtɔ na ulu ukpidi lɛlɔ.”
42003015	Bekyuli bamɛni lɛnunsia lɛ́kɔ katɔ líbu na bákali ka Yohane ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni na benye bagya.
42003016	Anwuɔsu Yohane ɔ́su bana ƒui ɔnini, “Ntu na ami líti mɔɔkpila-mii. Nsu ukyuli ɔdi ɔsia-mi kama ɔdubo ɔni na utulo-mi ƒui! Ńtedu ka lɛbla kabla kadi lite-nwu muedi. Na ukyuli ɔmɛni ndubuti Katɔti Kɔyu ku ogya ɔkpila-mii.
42003017	Ɔda nwuna kɔɔlɛ kɔni na ɔdubɔƒɛ nwuna edula udie na uti uwi unwu kemo. Nsu ɔdubɔkyula aƒaƒa ku lɛmuyɔ lɛkladi na ogya ɔni naaadubo buni kudii!”
42003018	Na Yohane ɔ́su Katɔti litemi na lilu pii lɛlɔ úte bekyuli, na ɔ́su-ma geen ka bavumana udu ku bana ngba bulie.
42003019	Na ka aban lɛga ɔdine Herode úƒie ɔnwani ulekudi ɔni baalɔ Herodia ɔ́ƒɔ ku udunkpi ala bamba pii ani na ɔ́bla ɔsu ni, Yohane ɔ́dɔnku-nwu.
42003020	Ɔmɛni ɔsu Herode ɔ́sɔ ɔ́bla lɛla lɛni návi ntu lítulo ƒui ɔni na ɔ́ya na béti Yohane bátákya ɔtɔ kemo.
42003021	Ka Yohane ɔ́kpila bekyuli ƒui ntu ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́kpila Yesu lɛnɔ ntu. Na uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔkya ɔɔkpali katɔ ni, katɔ kálɛmi.
42003022	Na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́yu kúbo kúbelie-nwu lɛlɔ aani abloduma kalɛ. Amu na bénu Katɔti lɛdi ka lɛ́si katɔ lɛnini, “Awɔ ndi mina Ubi Ɔyɔne. Aaƒɔ́-mi anu geen.”
42003023	Yesu ɔ́ƒɔ aani akwa aavlatɛ uwi ɔni na úse nwuna kabla kalɔ. Bekyuli kasusu kaatina-ma ka nwuna ɔwɔne ndi Yoseƒ ɔni ɔti ndi Eli
42003024	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Mattat ɔni ɔti ɔdi Lewi ɔni ɔti ɔdi Melki ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yanai ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yoseƒ
42003025	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Matatia ɔni ɔti ɔdi Amos ɔni ɔti ɔdi Nahum ɔni ɔti ɔdi Hesli ɔni ɔti ɔdi Nagai
42003026	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Mahat ɔni ɔti ɔdi Matatia ɔni ɔti ɔdi Semein ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yosek ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yoda
42003027	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yohanan ɔni ɔti ɔdi Resa ɔni ɔti ɔdi Sorobabel ɔni ɔti ɔdi Sealtiel ɔni ɔti ɔdi Neri
42003028	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Melki ɔni ɔti ɔdi Adi ɔni ɔti ɔdi Kosam ɔni ɔti ɔdi Elmadam ɔni ɔti ɔdi Er
42003029	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yesu ɔni ɔti ɔdi Elieser ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yorim ɔni ɔti ɔdi Matat ɔni ɔti ɔdi Lewi
42003030	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Simeon ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yuda ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yoseƒ ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yonam ɔni ɔti ɔdi Eliakim
42003031	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Melea ɔni ɔti ɔdi Mena ɔni ɔti ɔdi Matata ɔni ɔti ɔdi Natan ɔni ɔti ɔdi Dawid
42003032	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yisai ɔni ɔti ɔdi Obed ɔni ɔti ɔdi Boas ɔni ɔti ɔdi Sala ɔni ɔti ɔdi Nahson
42003033	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Aminadab ɔni ɔti ɔdi Admin ɔni ɔti ɔdi Arni ɔni ɔti ɔdi Hesron ɔni ɔti ɔdi Peres ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yuda
42003034	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yakob ɔni ɔti ɔdi Isak ɔni ɔti ɔdi Abraham ɔni ɔti ɔdi Tera ɔni ɔti ɔdi Nahor
42003035	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Serug ɔni ɔti ɔdi Reu ɔni ɔti ɔdi Peleg ɔni ɔti ɔdi Eber ɔni ɔti ɔdi Sala
42003036	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Kainan ɔni ɔti ɔdi Arƒaksad ɔni ɔti ɔdi Sem ɔni ɔti ɔdi Noa ɔni ɔti ɔdi Lamek
42003037	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Metusala ɔni ɔti ɔdi Henok ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yared ɔni ɔti ɔdi Mahaleel ɔni ɔti ɔdi Kainan
42003038	ɔni ɔti ɔdi Enos ɔni ɔti ɔdi Set ɔni ɔti ɔdi Adam ɔni ɔti ɔdi Katɔti.
42004001	Ɔni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui ni, Yesu únwini ɔ́si Yordan mmɔ. Na Kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔ́tɔnku-nwu kúsienku ketele kemo.
42004002	Mmɔ na Satan útékpoku-nwu ɔ́nu emeyi aavlene sɔɔn. Na uwi ɔmɛni kemo ƒui ni, Yesu útadi lɛla lɛdi ɔsu kɔka kúbo kɔɔda-nwu na kawɔlɔkɔ.
42004003	Amu na Satan ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Si Katɔti ubi na adi ni, na asu lɛtabi lɛmɛni na linwini adila.”
42004004	Nsu Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔ́su ɔnii ɔɔɔdi lɛdila lɛti pɛ muute ukyuli ngba geen.”
42004005	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Satan ɔ́sɔ útiku-nwu útényene kesii kani nákuku. Na ɔ́tina-nwu kayawi ala ku kana lɛga kadikɔ ƒui.
42004006	Na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ndubuti kayawi ƒui ɔyikun ɔmɛni ku kana akɛla amɛni ƒui lite-ɔ, ɔsika béti-nya béte-mi, na lɛkana liti-nya lite ukyuli ɔni mɔɔyɔ́.
42004007	Anwuɔsu ala amɛni ƒui adubunwini awɔdi si ákya lili kalɔ ete-mi.”
42004008	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔɔsu ka ni, 'Unwoti Katɔti lɛti pɛ kani na ukyuli ɔdubumwi na ɔbla-nwu kabla.' ”
42004009	Nwuna kama ni, Satan útiku Yesu úsienku Yerusalem na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ ɔtɔ katɔ ƒui, na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Si Katɔti ubi na adi ni, da lɛlɔ nyonu siku mɛni na atáƒiɛmi kalɔ.
42004010	Ɔsika Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔɔsu ɔnii, 'Katɔti ɔdubɔya na nwuna batu benye-ɔ kagyumana.'
42004011	'Badubukeyi-ɔ ɔni na eleti lɛlɔ alaƒiɛmi lɛtabi lɛdi muedi.' ”
42004012	Nsu Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔmmɔ ɔɔsu ka ni, 'Takɔku Unwoti Katɔti aanu.' ”
42004013	Ka Satan úkpoku Yesu ɔ́nu lɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́gyu ɔ́tɔlɔ-nwu kudɔ na ɔ́da-nwu únyene mmɔ asa.
42004014	Amu na Yesu ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie Galilea na Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun kemo. Na nwuna lɛlɔ kɔtɛ kúgyingya kɔ́kya mmɔ ku amadɔ mmɔ ƒui.
42004015	Ɔ́tina ala na Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ na ukyuli biala úmwi-nwu ala bɔtina.
42004016	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu úsie Nasaret kesii kani na bátumini-nwu ɔ́si lɛnamu uwi. Na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ni, úsie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ aani kalɛ kani na ɔɔyɔ́ bɔbla. Na ɔ́ta únye utaaka Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ala.
42004017	Amu na béti Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesaia ɔku béte-nwu. Ɔ́ƒɛnimi ɔku ɔmmɔ na ɔ́ka kesii kani na bénwini banii,
42004018	“Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-mi lɛlɔ kemo ƒui, ɔsika Katɔti náƒuna-mi ɔnii nti litemi buni lɛmɛni mboku bawabane. Na ɔ́tala-mi ɔnii nkɔ lɛsa nte bekyuli bani na béƒie kalɛ na bakɛ bɔnwuna. Na bani na anumi ábwɛ-ma ni, bataanu. Na bekyuli bani na baanya taakya ku lɛbibo ni, bakɛ bɔnwuna.
42004019	Na lɛya bati ka Katɔti uwi ɔni na weti waƒɔ nwuna bekyuli údu.”
42004020	Na Yesu únyimi kakunkɛ kammɔ na ɔ́sɔku-nwu úte ala ammɔ lɛlɔ ɔnune, na ɔ́yu úlie kalɔ. Bekyuli bammɔ ƒui béti anumi bálɛ-nwu lɛlɔ, na benye baanu-nwu kpoo.
42004021	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bunweni Kedee likpo lɛni na bínu ka lɛ́ka mɛni ni, líbo líte lɛni ɔmwi kadi.”
42004022	Na nwuna etemila ani na ɔɔsu áda-ma kayi geen, na kalɛ na unyemi lɛnɔ ɔɔta-nwu útakɔsi na ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye. Na béye lɛlɔ banini, “Ɔɔɔdi Yoseƒ ubidi ɔmmɔ na ɔdi mɛni yoo?”
42004023	Na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ngyi ka bɛdubo-mi lɛgba lɛmɛni bunyimene bɛnii, 'Uvone, bwi awɔ ɔlati ƒula lɛlɔ.' Na bɛsɔ bɛdubo-mi bɔsu lɛnɔ bɛnii, 'Ala ani udu na búnu ka ábla na Kapernaum ni, bla-nya na awɔ ɔlati ƒula ɔma.' ”
42004024	Na Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Nsu mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, balábu Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi na anwu ɔlati nwuna ɔma.
42004025	Ɔdi litemi geen ka bekpinele pii bákya Israel kalɔ lɛlɔ na lebo lɛni na Elia ɔ́kya. Na ɔnantu úbada akwa atɛ ku kakɛ. Na kɔka bonwu kɔdi kúbo kalɔ kammɔ ƒui lɛlɔ.
42004026	Nsu ni, Katɔti útatala Elia ɔnii utébunku Israel ukpinele ɔdi. Mmomu ɔ́tala-nwu ɔ́kya ukpinele ɔdi na Sarep na Sidon kalɔ lɛlɔ.
42004027	Lɛnɔ ni, bekyuli pii bákya béteeƒi ɔlɛgyie na Israel kalɔ na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Elisa uwi. Nsu ɔɔɔdi bana akɔ ɔdi na bábwi, amu ntu Naeman ɔni nási Siria kalɔ lɛlɔ lɛti pɛ.”
42004028	Ka bekyuli bani nkya kasalakɔ mmɔ bénu ɔmɛni ni, béti kɔnyi geen.
42004029	Na báta bénye na bátákpɛ Yesu bálɛku ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo bétényene kɔyuɛ kɔdi kɔtu ku kasusu ka bebo-nwu batákya kɔyuɛ kemo.
42004030	Nsu Yesu úsie ɔ́vi-ma ntɛ na ɔ́tɔlɔ.
42004031	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Kapernaum ɔmankemo na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ. Mmɔ ni, úse kalɔ ɔ́tina bekyuli ala na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ.
42004032	Na nwuna butemi ku ɔyikun ɔsu ni, nwuna ala bɔtina bɔ́bla bekyuli bammɔ dɛye dɛye.
42004033	Amu na ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́kya Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ mmɔ ɔni lɛlɔ na kɔyu kukpidi kulie. Na ɔ́va ku lɛdi momoomo ɔ́su ɔnini,
42004034	“Ao! Bi na aawia-bu kudɔ mɛni, Yesu Nasareni? Bubo na ébo mɛni anii abakyula-bu? Ngyi ukyuli ɔni na adi! Awɔ ndi Katɔti Ɔtalane Kedee!”
42004035	Amu na Yesu ɔ́bɔku kɔyu kɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ba lɛsɛ! Na avi alɛ ukyuli ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ kemo!” Amu na kɔyu kukpidi kɔmmɔ kúƒwimi ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔ́ƒiɛmi kalɔ na bana anumi, na kɔ́vi kɔ́lɛ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo kɔ́tɔlɔ. Nsu ukyuli ɔmmɔ útaƒɔ ɔlɛ ɔdi.
42004036	Ɔ́bla bekyuli bammɔ ƒui yaa na béye lɛlɔ banii, “Bi etemila udu na adi mɛni? Ukyuli ɔmɛni ubo kuƒi na uuti ɔyikun taabɔku ayu ekpidi na aaví taalɛ bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo.”
42004037	Na ala ani baasu taasiku Yesu lɛlɔ mɛni égyingya ákya ekpo ani ƒui na amadɔ mmɔ.
42004038	Yesu ɔ́lɛ Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ mmɔ na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Simon kesii. Na Simon ɔmɛni uleni ɔtɛ ɔlɛ ɔni na lɛlɔ lɛ́ƒɔ ogya geen. Na báya na Yesu ɔ́ti.
42004039	Amu na úsie uténye-nwu kudɔ na kesii kani na ɔtɛ, na ɔ́bɔku ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ. Na kɔnakunwi ni, ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-nwu na ɔ́ta únye na úsie kalɔ ɔɔnwá teete-ma.
42004040	Na ka kadi kábla buɛɛ ni, bekyuli bani ƒui na lɛlɛ lidu lidu lɛda bana bakpana ni, béti-ma béboku Yesu kudɔ. Na úti enu ɔ́sia-ma lɛlɔ unwi unwi na ɔ́bwi-ma ƒui.
42004041	Ayu ekpidi lidu pii lɛnɔ lɛ́vi lɛ́lɛ bekyuli kemo na baava taasu banii, “Awɔ ndi Katɔti Ubidi!” Nsu Yesu ɔ́bala ayu ekpidi ammɔ na útete-ma ulu ka basu lɛla lɛdi, ɔsika báti ka anwu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ.
42004042	Kadi kégye ni, Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo úsie kesii kani nábɛ. Amu na bekyuli bammɔ bése kalɔ baawia-nwu taavi. Na ka bánu-nwu ni, bákya ɔkplu ka betile-nwu kuƒi kalɛ na ulatɔlɔ.
42004043	Nsu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔlɛka lisie ntásu Katɔti lɛga bɔdi litemi buni lɛmɛni na lɛma bamba lɛnɔ kemo, ɔsika ɔmɛni na Katɔti ɔ́tala-mi ɔnii mbabla.”
42004044	Anwuɔsu ɔ́su Katɔti litemi na Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ ƒui na kalɔ kammɔ kemo.
42005001	Limeyi lɛdi ni, Yesu unye ɛpu ɔni baalɔ banii Genesaret kɔtu, na bekyuli baanwanɛ lɛlɔ kalɛ na bakpɛ bede-nwu na benu Katɔti litemi lɛni na ɔɔsu.
42005002	Yesu ɔ́nu ka lɛkɔlɔ inyɔ linye ɛpu kɔtu mmɔ na lɛsawu bewine bammɔ bátɔlɔ bésie baaƒɔ bana lɛsawu.
42005003	Amu na Yesu ɔ́kɔ úduo unwi kemo ɔni ndi Simon ɔdi, na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnii udi ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ usienku ntu anumi blii. Ɔkɔlɔ kemo mmɔ na úlie ɔ́tina bekyuli bammɔ ala.
42005004	Ka ɔ́tina-ma ala ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́su Simon ɔnini, “Di ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ sienku kesii kani na ntu bɔmmɔ bɔ́gyu blii, na awɔ ku ƒula bakpana biwi bina lɛsawu na bidie lɛna.”
42005005	Na Simon údie kenye ɔnini, “Ati, usien umodi ɔmɛni bɔ́bla kabla ku lɛnungyie na bútedie lɛla lɛdi. Nsu ni, ndubɔya na buwi lɛsawu lɛmmɔ aani kalɛ na ásu.”
42005006	Béwi lɛsawu lɛmmɔ na bédie lɛna pii ɔni náya na bana lɛsawu líse kalɔ liikúlo.
42005007	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, bébo bana bakpana enu na ɔkɔlɔ unyɔdi kemo banii bebo bebebunku-ma. Bébo na bédie lɛna béwi lɛkɔlɔ inyɔ lɛmɛni kemo tɛtɛɛtɛ ɔni blii nébu na lɛkɔlɔ lɛmmɔ lɛnyi ntu kemo.
42005008	Ka Simon Petro ɔ́nu lɛla lɛni nálɛ mɛni ni, ɔ́lɛ akɔnkɔ na Yesu anumi na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Blɔti, takpɛ tede-mi, ɔsika alaekpidi ɔblane na ndi.”
42005009	Lɛna pii lɛni na bédie mɛni ɔsu ni, ɔ́bla anwu ku nwuna badi kalɛ kadi.
42005010	Lɛni kani na ɔ́bla Simon bakpana Yakobo ku Yohane bani ndi Sebedeo bebi lɛnɔ. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su Simon ɔnini, “Tayia. Ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ni, bɛdubuteedie bekyuli teete Katɔti.”
42005011	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, báni lɛkɔlɔ lɛmmɔ ƒui bétéwi utublii na bányonu lɛla biala béwi na bésie bátásiaku Yesu kama.
42005012	Uwi ɔdi ni, Yesu úsie ɔma ɔdi kemo ɔni na ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́kya úteeƒi ɔlɛgyie. Amu ka ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔ́nu Yesu ni, ɔ́yu ɔ́tɛ kalɔ na Yesu anumi na úvele-nwu ɔnii, “Ati, si aayɔ́ ni, akana na aya na ɔlɛ ɔmɛni ɔba-mi.”
42005013	Yesu únene kɔnu útuku-nwu. Na ɔ́su ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Mɔɔyɔ́ lɛni. Anwuɔsu ɔlɛ ɔmɛni ɔba-a.” Mmɔ kani ni, ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-nwu.
42005014	Amu na Yesu úbo-nwu ɔda ɔnini, “Tasu ukyuli ɔdi lɛla lɛdi. Mmomu teesie siin na eti lɛlɔ atátina Katɔti ɔkpane. Na ɔdubɔnu-ɔ kaduɛ na wedie-ɔ kenye wete ukyuli biala ka sɔsɔ ni, ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-a. Na abla akpala aani kalɛ na Mose ɔda bubo bɔɔtina.”
42005015	Nsu Yesu lɛlɔ kɔtɛ kuugyingya teesie ɔgyu kakaaka. Na bekyuli pii beebo kalɛ na benu-nwu ala bɔtina na ɔbwi-ma lɛlɛ lɛni nda-ma.
42005016	Nsu uwi ndi uwi ni, ɔɔlɛ́ teesie kesii kani nábɛ taatákpali katɔ.
42005017	Limeyi lɛdi ka Yesu ɔkya ɔɔtina ala ni, Yudaƒuɔ lɛkpa lɛni baalɔ Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku ɔda bubo ala batinane badi bási Galilea ku Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ ekpo ekpo ƒui bébo bélie mmɔ. Na Katɔti ɔyikun ɔni Yesu uti ɔbwi balɛne lɛnɔ ɔkya-nwu lɛlɔ kemo.
42005018	Na mmɔ ni, bekyuli badi béti ukyuli ɔni na lɛlɔ kakɛ kenwi kékpi-nwu béboku. Na báwia ulu ɔni na beti-nwu beduoku ɔtɔ kemo na beti-nwu batáva Yesu anumi.
42005019	Nsu bekyuli bumomo ɔsu ni, bátakana ulu bɔkɛ. Ɔmɛni ɔsu béti-nwu bákɔliku lɛsa. Na bátu liƒi na kugyiikɛ akɔ mmɔ na báyula-nwu ku nwuna atɛla bátáva Yesu anumi na bekyuli bammɔ ntɛntɛ na ɔtɔ kemo mmɔ.
42005020	Na ka Yesu ɔ́nu bana bɔƒɔtaadi ɔsu ni, ɔ́su ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ɔnana, ákɛ ƒula ekpidi buti taakyiɛ!”
42005021	Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bákya anumi ku lɛlɔ buye banii, “Ɔma na ɔdi mɛni na úti lɛlɔ ɔɔkɔ́ku Katɔti lɛni! Katɔti lɛti pɛ kani ndubɔkana na uti ukyuli ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-nwu!”
42005022	Amu ka Yesu ɔ́nu-ma kasusu ɔ́ti ɔsu ni, úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na bɛɛkali ala amɛni udu?
42005023	Ɔmani bɔsu mbo ɔkplu ntulo na amɛni kemo, 'Ákɛ ƒula ekpidi buti taakyiɛ' munuu 'Ta nye na esie'?
42005024	Ndubudie lɛtina-mii ka Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ubo kuƒi na kayawi kamɛni lɛlɔ na uti ekpidi ɔkyiɛ.” Anwuɔsu únwini na ɔ́su lɛlɔ kakɛ kenwi ukpine ɔmɛni ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-ɔ nnii ta na eti ƒula atɛla na eteesie kaduli!”
42005025	Mmɔ kani ni, ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔ́ta únye bekyuli bammɔ anumi na úti nwuna atɛla ani lɛlɔ na ɔtɛ na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie kaduli na uumwi Katɔti.
42005026	Ɔmɛni ɔ́bla bekyuli bammɔ ƒui dɛye dɛye! Na ka liƒu lɛ́ƒɔ-ma lɛlɔ kemo ƒui ɔsu ni, bémwi Katɔti na básu banii, “Bi akɔla budie taatina adi na bɔ́nu mɛni ɔmwi?”
42005027	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́vi ɔ́lɛ ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo na útánu kuyi ɔƒɔne ɔdi baalɔ banii Lewi ka ɔkya nwuna kabla kablakɔ. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ta, na asiaku-mi.”
42005028	Lewi ɔ́ta na ɔ́siaku-nwu na ɔ́da lɛla biala úwi.
42005029	Lewi ɔ́ya na bánwa adila abuni ɔnii uuti ɔkya Yesu kubiti na nwuna kaduli. Na bekyuli pii bébo mmɔ ku kuyi baƒɔne bamba lɛnɔ.
42005030	Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bani nkya kasalakɔ mmɔ bákyaku Yesu basiakune unyeƒi banii, “Bi ɔsu na bɛɛdi na bɛɛní ku kuyi baƒɔne ku alaekpidi bablane babambadi bamɛni?”
42005031	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bekyuli bani mbo lɛlɔ ɔkplu baláwia uvone, amu ntu balɛne lɛti.
42005032	Ɔɔɔdi bekyuli bani nse siin na líbo mbalɔ nnii benwini kayi, mmomu alaekpidi bablane.”
42005033	Bekyuli badi béye Yesu banii, “Dɛ na ɔ́bla na Yohane basiakune béteelie kɔka bulie bulie na baakpali katɔ, na Ƒarisiƒuɔ basiakune lɛnɔ baabla lɛni, nsu ƒula badi ama bɔdi kani na baadi na baaní?”
42005034	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bɛɛkali ka bekyuli bani na bálɔ béboku uleku ketikɔ badubulie kɔka lebo lɛni na uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ ɔmua ɔkya-ma kudɔ? Kudi kudii! Ulakana bubo bute lɛni!
42005035	Nsu ni, limeyi lɛdi lɛdubo lɛni na badubuti uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ batɔlɔku-ma kudɔ. Na mmɔ ni, ɔɔɔdi ukyuli ɔdi nsɔ ndubo-ma bɔsu asa na badubulie kɔka.”
42005036	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ úbo-ma lɛgba lɛmɛni ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔdi ulabwɛ awu awɔdi taaka taada ɔkukudi liƒi. Si ɔdi ɔ́bla lɛni ni, agyi anii úbile awu ɔwɔdi ɔmmɔ. Na ɔkukudi ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ ku ɔwɔdi ɔmmɔ ulamanku lɛlɔ.
42005037	Na beleti ntɛ bɔwɔdi teewi ɔku koƒo kɔkukudi kɔni kemo béewi ntɛ dii. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, ntɛ bɔwɔdi bɔmmɔ bɔdubuƒuƒuo na bɔya ɔku koƒo kɔkukudi kɔmmɔ kɔbwɛ, na ntɛ bɔmmɔ lɛnɔ buwiakun.
42005038	Nsu beeti ntɛ bɔwɔdi beewi ɔku koƒo kɔwɔdi kemo.
42005039	Na ɔƒɛni lɛnɔ ni, ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́sɔ uláwia ntɛ bɔwɔdi si ɔ́ɔni bɔkukudi úmo. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, bɔsu na ɔdubɔsu ɔnii, 'Budeedi bɔdia butulo bɔmɛni!' ”
42006001	Na lɛnwunameyi lɛdi lɛlɔ ni, Yesu ku nwuna basiakune bakɛ ulu ɔni ntɛ ɔ́vi edula kemo kadi. Amu na basiakune bammɔ bakya baaƒɛ edula ammɔ taavumi taakun.
42006002	Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi béye-ma banini, “Bi ɔsu na bɛɛbla lɛla lɛni na bula ɔda bubo bútete-bu kuƒi ka bɔbla na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ?”
42006003	Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye na úye-ma ɔnini, “Bítaka Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ala bítenu lɛla lɛni na Dawid ɔ́bla uwi ɔni na kɔka kɔɔda anwu ku nwuna bekyuli?
42006004	Dawid útéduo Katɔti ɔtɔ kemo na útéti adila ani na béti bákpa béte Katɔti ɔ́di. Na úte nwuna badi lɛnɔ na bádi ɔdi ina ka ɔdi bɔƒiɔ na bula ɔda bubo kenye ka ukyuli bamba ɔdi adila ammɔ. Amu ntu Katɔti ɔkpane lɛti pɛ.”
42006005	Amu na kawɔlɔkɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ni, anwu ndi Unwoti ute lɛnwunameyi.”
42006006	Na lɛnwunameyi lɛbambadi lɛlɔ ni, Yesu úsie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ na útátina ala. Na mmɔ ni, ukyuli ɔdi ɔkya ɔni na nwuna kɔdianu kɔ́gogolo-nwu.
42006007	Na ka ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi baawia ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na basia na bada Yesu kenye ka ɔɔƒiɔ́ ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ ɔsu ni, básia-nwu anumi kaduɛ banii baanu si wabwi ɔlɛ na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ.
42006008	Nsu ka Yesu ɔ́nu bana kasusu ɔ́ti ɔsu ni, ɔ́su ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ta nye, na alɛ ebo anumi mɛni.” Na ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔ́ta úbenye-ma anumi.
42006009	Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi na bula ɔda bubo búte-bu ulu ka bɔbla na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ? Ɔdia ka bɔbla lɛbuni na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ munuu ka bɔbla likpidi? Iye ni, ɔdia ka bɔƒɔ bekyuli ngba munuu bɔyila-mu?”
42006010	Yesu ɔ́tɛ anu ɔ́mana-ma na ɔ́su ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Nene ƒula kɔnu.” Únene-ku, na mmɔ kani ni, nwuna kɔnu kɔ́sɔ kɔ́bla-nwu kaduɛ.
42006011	Kɔnyi kɔ́kɔ bana ƒui ɔsu bése kalɔ beeti kasusu na lɛla lɛni na badubɔkana Yesu bɔbla lɛlɔ.
42006012	Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie kɔbi lɛlɔ. Na ɔkya ɔɔkpali katɔ usien ɔmmɔ ƒui.
42006013	Ka kadi kégye ni, ɔ́lɔ nwuna basiakune ƒui úbasala nwuna kudɔ na ɔ́ƒuna leevu-inyɔ bani na ɔ́sia-ma lɛnyi ɔnii nwuna batalane.
42006014	Ama ndi Simon ɔni na ɔ́sia lɛnyi ɔnii Petro ku ɔnwani Andrea ku Yakobo ku Yohane ku Ƒilipo ku Bartolomeo
42006015	ku Mateo ku Toma ku Alƒeo ubidi Yakobo ku Simon ɔni bátaalɔ banii ukyuli ɔni mɔɔyɔ́ nwuna ɔma
42006016	ku Yakobo ubidi Yuda ku Yuda Iskariot ɔni nébenwini kakya ɔkyane.
42006017	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna basiakune báyu bási kɔbi kɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, bébo bébenye kesii kani na nse ƒiaa. Na nwuna basiakune pii badi bakya mmɔ ku bekyuli lisu bonwu lɛni nási Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui ku Yerusalem ku lɛma lɛni nde ɛpu kɔtu lɛni ndi Tiro ku Sidon.
42006018	Bébo banii bebenu ala ani na Yesu ɔɔtina na ɔbwi-ma lɛlɛ lidu lɛni na beeƒi. Bekyuli bani na ayu ekpidi eekpóku lɛnɔ bébo na ɔ́bwi-ma.
42006019	Bekyuli bammɔ ƒui bákya ɔkplu ka betuku Yesu na bana lɛlɛ lɛba-ma, ɔsika ɔyikun ɔdi udu útaalɛ Yesu lɛlɔ kemo na ɔɔbwi bekyuli ƒui.
42006020	Yesu ɔ́sia nwuna basiakune anu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lɛlɔ litaayɔ amii bawabane, ɔsika Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kadi bina ɔdi!
42006021	Lɛlɔ litaayɔ amii bani na kɔka kɔɔda ɔƒɛni, ɔsika amii ndubumo! Lɛlɔ litaayɔ amii bani muuwulo ɔƒɛni, ɔsika bɛdubɔma!
42006022	Lɛlɔ litaayɔ-mii si bekyuli beekisi-mii na beení-mii na beedumi-mii na baasu-mii banii bibo likyulikpi na ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔsu!
42006023	“Bɛkɛ ebiti si amɛni ƒui aalɛ́ na bɛtɔ ku ebiti, ɔsika Katɔti ɔdubute-mii lɛyuƒɔla bonwu na katɔ. Ɔsika ala amɛni udu na béti bábla Katɔti kenye bediene bani nákya ƒui.
42006024	“Nsu bɔbwɛ muute amii balakɛne, ɔsika bɛ́ɛkɛ bina ngba ebiti mɛni!
42006025	Bɔbwɛ muute amii bani némo ɔƒɛni, ɔsika kɔka kɔdubo-mii bɔda! Bɔbwɛ muute amii bani mɔɔmá ɔƒɛni, ɔsika bɛdubo kɔnyana ku keku buwulo!
42006026	Bɔbwɛ muute amii bani na bekyuli ƒui beemwi ɔƒɛni, ɔsika lɛni kani na bana bati kuuku bémwi bekyuli bani nátɔlɔ bekyuli ka badi Katɔti kenye bediene.
42006027	“Nsu amii bani muunú-mi butemi ni, mɔɔsu-mii nnii bɛyɔ bina bekisine na bɛbla lɛbuni bite-ma.
42006028	Na bekyuli bani mɔɔkpali ala taakya-mii ni, bite-ma kusɛ kusɛ. Na bekyuli bani mɔɔbla-mii kalala ni, bɛkpali katɔ na bana lili.
42006029	Na si ɔdi ɔƒiɛmi-ɔ kɔnu ɔtugya unwi ni, ya na ɔƒiɛmi-ɔ ɔtugya unyɔdi lɛnɔ. Na si ukyuli ɔdi úti ƒula awu ɔni na aakya taasia ɔtɔdi lɛlɔ ni, ya na uti ɔtɔdi lɛnɔ si ɔɔyɔ́.
42006030	Ukyuli biala ɔni mevele-ɔ lɛla lɛdi ni, te-nwu. Na si ɔdi úti-ɔ lɛla lɛdi ni, tasu anii aasia-ni kama.
42006031	Lɛla lɛni na aayɔ́ anii babla bete-ɔ ni, ani kani na awɔ lɛnɔ ɔlɛka abla ete bekyuli.
42006032	“Si bekyuli bani mɔɔyɔ́-ɔ kani na awɔ lɛnɔ aayɔ́ ni, bi ɔsu na ɔlɛka bemwi-ɔ? Alaekpidi bablane muedi ni, baayɔ́ bekyuli bani mɔɔyɔ́-ma.
42006033	Na si bekyuli bani nábla-a lɛbuni kani na awɔ lɛnɔ aabla lɛbuni teete ni, bi ɔsu na ɔlɛka bemwi-ɔ? Alaekpidi bablane lɛnɔ baabla lɛni.
42006034	Na si bekyuli bani na masɔku mete-ɔ lɛti pɛ na eevó ƒula ala teete ni, bi ɔsu na aawia ka bemwi-ɔ? Alaekpidi bablane lɛnɔ beevó teete bana bakpana kalɛ basɔku bete-ma!
42006035	Mmomu ni, bɛyɔ bina bekisine na bɛbla-ma lɛbuni. Bivo ala bite-ma, na bina anu atasia ka badubɔsɔku bete-mii kokooko. Si bɛ́bla lɛni ni, bɛdubɔkɛ lɛyuƒɔla bonwu. Na bɛdubɔlɔ-mi banii Katɔti Ɔni Ntulo Ƒui bebi. Ɔsika Katɔti ubo kaƒɔ buni ute bani ala alaƒɔ-ma anu ku belikplune lɛnɔ muedi.
42006036	Bitaanu kɔnyana aani kalɛ kani na bina Katɔti ɔɔnu kɔnyana.
42006037	“Bitababla bitatɛku bekyuli litemi, na Katɔti lɛnɔ ulatɛku-mii litemi. Bitadu bekyuli kɔtɔ, na Katɔti lɛnɔ uládu-mii kɔtɔ. Biti bɛkyiɛ bekyuli, na Katɔti lɛnɔ weti wakyiɛ-mii.
42006038	Bite bekyuli ala, na Katɔti lɛnɔ wete-mii ala. Geen ni, Katɔti ɔdubuyile-mii kɔvumi tɛtɛɛtɛ na nwuna lɛƒɔndia kenye. Keyile kani udu na ákɔku éte ukyuli ni, kana udu kani na Katɔti ɔdubɔkɔku ute-ɔ.”
42006039	Amu na Yesu úbo-ma lɛgba ɔnini, “Ɔnumbwɛne ulakana ɔnumbwɛne ɔkpana bɔtɔnku. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, bana inyɔ ƒui badubɔnu beduo ubu kemo.
42006040	Ala ɔtɛyane biala uletulo nwuna ɔtinane. Nsu si uwi ɔni na ɔtɛyane ɔmmɔ ɔ́wɔlɔ ala bɔtɛya ni, ɔɔbla aani nwuna ala ɔtinane kalɛ.
42006041	“Bi ɔsu na aanu lɛlakpi lɛni nkya ƒula ɔnwani lɛnumi na alánu kegyiikɛ kani nsia-a lɛnumi ani?
42006042	Dɛ na ɔ́bla na aasu ƒula ukyulikpana anii, 'Buvele, ya na lidie-ɔ lɛlakpi lɛnumi.' Na átakana na anu kegyiikɛ kani nsia-a lɛnumi? Anumi lɛlɔ ukyuli na adi! Ka kegyiikɛ kani nsia-a lɛnumi bɔtimi asa na anu nwaa na edie ƒ^ɔnwani lɛlakpi lɛnumi.
42006043	“Kugyii kɔbuni kulánwu ebi ekpidi, na kugyii kukpidi lɛnɔ kulanwu ebi buni.
42006044	Kugyii biala ni, kuna ebi lɛlɔ na baanu-ku taati. Belede kɔnwingyie ebi na liyu kugyii lɛlɔ, na belede atoo na lɛnyɛ kɔbuli lɛnɔ lɛlɔ.
42006045	Ukyuli ɔbuni ni, ala abuni na uudie taalɛku nwuna akɛla abuni ani nkya nwuna kayi kemo. Na ukyuli ukpidi lɛnɔ uuboku akɛla ekpidi ani nkya-nwu kayi kemo. Ɔsika ala ani néyi ukyuli kayi kemo ni, anya na nwuna kenye kaasu.
42006046	“Bi ɔsu na bɛɛlɔ-mi bɛnii Blɔti, nsu bilábla taasiaku lɛla lɛni na lɛ́su-mii lɛlɔ?
42006047	Ukyuli biala ɔni muubo-mi kudɔ na uubo teebenu lɛla lɛni mɔɔsu na ɔɔbla taasiaku-ni lɛlɔ ni, ndubɔtina-mii kalɛ na ukyuli ɔmmɔ use.
42006048	Use aani ukyuli ɔni mɔɔtú ɔtɔ na ɔ́ka awodu libu budie, na ɔ́nwu lɛti ku atabi kpakplaa úti ɔ́kya lɛtakpɛ lɛlɔ asa na ɔ́tu ɔtɔ ɔ́sia-nwu lɛlɔ. Ka ketu kéyi na kágba kávi awodu ammɔ kalɔ ni, ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ útabla lɛla lɛdi, ɔsika ɔ́kɛ kenyekɔ kabuni.
42006049	Nsu ukyuli biala ɔni muunú-mi litemi na uleti-ni taada ni, use aani ukyuli ɔni mɔɔtú ɔtɔ na ɔtɔ kalɔ katayu ɔkplu. Ɔsu si uwi ɔni na ketu kéyi na kágba kávi ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kalɔ ni, ɔɔƒɛ teewi kalɔ ku kɔku bonwu!”
42007001	Ka Yesu ɔ́su bekyuli bamɛni ala amɛni ƒui ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Kapernaum.
42007002	Mmɔ ni, Romaƒuɔ bekpone unengu ɔdi ɔkya ɔni na mbo kabla ɔblane ɔni na ɔɔyɔ́ geen. Kabla ɔblane ɔmɛni úbo uuƒi kpakplaa ɔni na ɔɔyɔ́ ukpi muedi.
42007003	Amu ka unengu ɔmɛni únu Yesu kɔku ni, ɔ́tala Yudaƒuɔ benengu badi ɔnii batásu-nwu na ubo, na ubabwi nwuna kabla ɔblane ɔmɛni ute-nwu.
42007004	Bébo Yesu kudɔ na bébevele-nwu kpakplaa banii, “Ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔ́manku ka ete-nwu kebunku,
42007005	ɔsika ɔɔyɔ́ bula kadi. Na anwu ɔlati ɔ́tu Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ úte-bu.”
42007006	Ɔmɛni ɔsu Yesu ɔ́ta ɔ́siaku-ma. Yesu útagyunku kaduli kammɔ pii ɔdi asa unengu ɔmɛni ɔ́tala nwuna bakpana ɔnii batásu-nwu banii, “Ati, sɔ tebo abi. Ami ni, ntamanku ka awɔ ebo-mi kudɔ na mina kaduli.
42007007	Na ntamanku lɛnɔ ka ami lɛda lɛlɛ-ɔ anumi. Anwuɔsu su ƒula kenye litemi kani, na mina kabla ɔblane lɛlɔ lɛyu ɔkplu.
42007008	Ami lɛnɔ ndi unengu ɔdi ɔni na nsɔ nkya benengu betulone bamba ɔyikun kalɔ. Na mbo bekpone na bakya-mi kalɔ. Mɔɔsu ɔdi nnii, 'Sie mɛni' na uusié. Na mɔɔsu ɔbambadi lɛnɔ nnii, 'Bo mɛni' na uubo. Na mɔɔsu mina kabla ɔblane nnii, 'Bla lɛni' na ɔɔbla.”
42007009	Ka ɔ́su lɛni ni, ɔ́bla Yesu kalɛ kadi. Amu na únwini na ɔ́su bekyuli lisu lɛni nsiaku-nwu ɔnini, “Mɔɔyá-mii bɛti ka ni, ńtanu bɔƒɔtaadi bɔmɛni udu na Israelƒuɔ akɔ muedi dii!”
42007010	Amu na bekyuli bani na bátala mmɔ básɔ bénwini bésie kaduli na bátánu ka kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔlɛ ɔ́ba-nwu.
42007011	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu úsie ɔma ɔni baalɔ Nain kemo, na nwuna basiakune ku bekyuli pii badi bakɛ basiaku-nwu.
42007012	Uwi ɔni na údu ɔma ɔmmɔ kabanye ni, ɔ́siaku kekwa bablane otogyi ɔdi ka ɔ́si ɔɔlɛ́. Ukpinele ɔdi ubi ɔnanabi unwi pɛ ndi ukpine ɔni na beti béselaku. Na ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli pii báka bámana ukpinele ɔmɛni.
42007013	Ka Yesu ɔ́nu uleku ɔmɛni ni, nwuna lɛlɔ lɛ́bla-nwu kɔnyana. Amu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Da buwulo ya.”
42007014	Amu na Yesu úsie ɔ́vi-ma ntɛ na útétuku ukpine adaka ɔmmɔ. Amu na bekyuli bani nti ukpine ɔmmɔ bédi bénye. Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su ɔnini, “Okloƒu! Mɔɔsu-ɔ nnii ta nye!”
42007015	Na ukpine ɔmmɔ ɔ́ta úlie na úse kalɔ ku butemi. Amu na Yesu úti-nwu úte uni.
42007016	Bekyuli bammɔ ƒui báyia geen, na bémwi Katɔti. Ɔmɛni ɔsu básu banini, “Katɔti kenye udiene ɔni náƒɔ kuye geen ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ-bu akɔ! Katɔti ɔ́yu úbo ɔnii ubedie nwuna bekyuli!”
42007017	Yesu lɛlɔ litemi lɛmɛni lɛ́ku lɛ́vi Yudea kalɔ kammɔ ku amadɔ ƒui.
42007018	Amu uwi ɔni na Yohane basiakune básu Yohane ala amɛni ni, ɔ́lɔ bana akɔ inyɔ badi,
42007019	na ɔ́tala-ma ɔ́kya Blɔti ɔnii betéye-nwu banini, “Awɔ ndi ukyuli ɔni mebo munuu butaasia ukyuli bamba anu?”
42007020	Amu ka bébo Yesu kudɔ ni, básu banini, “Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane nátala-bu ɔnii bubeye-ɔ bɔnii, 'Awɔ ndi ukyuli ɔni na ndububo munuu butaanu ukyuli bamba ulu?' ”
42007021	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kani kemo ni, Yesu ɔ́bwi bekyuli pii lɛlɛ na ɔ́gya ayu ekpidi, na ɔ́ya na banumbwɛne pii bánu.
42007022	Amu na údie kenye na ɔ́su Yohane batalane ɔnini, “Bɛsɔ binwini na bitásu Yohane ala ani na bɛ́nu na bínu bɛnii banumbwɛne baanu, bani na báƒɛ bewi kalɔ beesié, ɔlɛgyie beƒine lɛlɛ lɛ́ba-ma, batutine beenú, bekpine baata teelie ngba, na mɔɔsu bawabane Katɔti litemi buni.
42007023	Lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ ukyuli ɔni nátanu linyeyɔla lɛdi na mina lɛlɔ.”
42007024	Ka Yohane batu bátɔlɔ kama ni, Yesu úse kalɔ uutemi taasiku Yohane lɛlɔ teete kasalakɔ bekyuli bammɔ ɔnini, “Uwi ɔni na bɛ́lɛ bísie Yohane kudɔ na ketele kemo ni, bi na bɛ́sia anu ka bɛdubo bɔnu? Ukyuli ɔni nse aani livete lɛni na ɔƒɛƒɛɛ uubó taavinku?
42007025	Bi geen ndi lɛla lɛni na bɛ́lɛ bísie bitánu? Ukyuli ɔni nálɛ bɔkpi ku adala? Bekyuli bani na báda lɛlɔ lɛni na belie ebiti kemo ni, bagadine lɛgbanya na beelie.
42007026	Bɛsu-mi lɛla lɛni na bísie bitánu! Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi bɔnu na bísie? Sɔsɔ na ɔdi, na mɔɔsu-mii nnii utulo Katɔti kenye udiene.
42007027	Ɔsika Yohane lɛlɔ litemi na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Ndubɔtala ɔtu ɔdi na ƒula lɛtɔtɔ, na ɔdubɔgyu ɔtɔ-ɔ ɔni ndubɔklibi ulu use ute-ɔ.' ”
42007028	Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Yohane utulo ukyuli biala ɔni na báwɔ na kayawi kamɛni kemo. Nsu ukyuli ɔni na uuubo lɛnyi lɛdi muedi na Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ni, utulo Yohane.”
42007029	Bekyuli bammɔ ƒui bénu Yohane litemi buni bɔsu, na ama ku kuyi baƒɔne muedi báƒɔ lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔɔwia taasiku-ma kudɔ ku bana kɔyi kemo, na ɔ́kpila-ma ntu.
42007030	Nsu Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku ɔda bubo ala batinane béni lɛla lɛni ndi Katɔti lɛyɔla, na bátatuna ka Yohane ɔkpila-ma ntu.
42007031	Yesu úsie anumi ku nwuna butemi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔƒɛni ni, bi na ɔlɛka liti ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli lɛkɔku geen tɔ? Dɛ na bese?
42007032	Bese aani banamu wɛlɛ wɛlɛ bani mɔɔƒia na kuyeya. Badi baava taasu bakpanadi banini, 'Búdie uleku buti lɛnu búte-mii, nsu bítatɔ! Búdie lɛkwanu búte-mii, na bítewulo.'
42007033	Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane úbo na anwu úlie kɔka, na ntɛ lɛnɔ bútetuku-nwu kenye, nsu bɛnii, 'Kɔyu kukpidi kɔsiaku-nwu!'
42007034	Na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi úbo lɛnɔ na anwu ɔ́di na ɔ́ni ntɛ. Na bɛnii, 'Bɛnu ɔdivone ku ntɛkpine ɔmɛni! Ɔdi kuyi baƒɔne ku alaekpidi bamba lidu bablane ɔkpana!'
42007035	Nsu bekyuli bani ƒui nsiaku Katɔti lɛnunda kama ni, beedie taatina ka lɛdi lɛnunda geen.”
42007036	Ƒarisini ɔdi ɔ́lɔ Yesu ɔnii ubadi na nwuna kesii. Na Yesu úsie na útádi.
42007037	Uleku ɔyalɛ ɔdi ɔkya ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo. Amu ka únu banii Yesu úbo Ƒarisini ɔmmɔ kesii ɔnii ubadi ni, úti ɔsii ku inɔmii ƒɛƒɛɛ bɔdi úboku.
42007038	Úbenye Yesu kudɔ na uuwulo teewi-nwu lɛgba lɛlɔ. Na uleku ɔmmɔ úti nwuna lili linwini úni imii bɔni néwi Yesu lɛgba mmɔ, na ɔ́dada-nwu lɛgba. Na úti inɔmii bɔmmɔ úwi Yesu lɛgba lɛnɔ.
42007039	Ka Ƒarisini ɔni nálɔ Yesu bɔdi ɔ́nu ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́bla kasusu ɔnii, “Si ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔdi Katɔti kenye udiene geen ni, nka ɔlɛka ɔnu ɔti uleku ɔni udu nébo uutuku-nwu mɛni, na ɔti lɛyalɛ ngba bɔni lɛnɔ na ulie!”
42007040	Amu na Yesu údie ɔ́lɛ-nwu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Simon, mbo lɛla lɛdi na ndubo-ɔ bɔsu.” Amu na Simon ɔnini, “Ala ɔtinane, taasu-mi lɛla lɛmmɔ.”
42007041	Amu na Yesu úse kalɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni muuvó egulabi teete bekyuli, na nkyuli inyɔ badi bada-nwu kayu. Unwi ɔda egulabi bumomo ɔni mabla aani kɔbuli kunwi lɛyuƒɔla kayu. Na unyɔdi ɔda abuli leevu lɛyuƒɔla kayu.
42007042	Bekyuli bamɛni ƒui ɔdi útakana na ɔƒɔ-nwu kayu kamɛni. Anwuɔsu úti kayu kɔmmɔ ƒui ɔ́kyiɛ-ma. Na nkyuli inyɔ bamɛni kemo ni, ɔmani na aabu anii ɔdubɔyɔ ɔlakɛne ɔmɛni utulo?”
42007043	Amu na Simon ɔnini, “Mɔɔbu nnii ukyuli ɔni na úti kayu kenengudi ɔ́kyiɛ.” Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ásu na ɔ́tɛ.”
42007044	Mmɔ na Yesu únwini útánu uleku ɔmmɔ na ɔ́su Simon ɔnini, “Aanu uleku ɔmɛni? Ka líbo-ɔ kudɔ ni, étete-mi ntu anii nƒɔ lɛgba. Nsu uleku ɔmɛni úti nwuna imii ɔ́ƒɔ-mi lɛgba, na úti nwuna lili linwini úni-ni.
42007045	Átaƒɔ-mi ku kubiti na akya-mi kɔgbu. Nsu ɔ́si uwi ɔni mbeduo ni, anwu útada tɔ mina lɛgba bɔdada útaya.
42007046	Awɔ étete-mi inɔmii bɔdi anii nkya lili. Nsu anwu úti inɔmii ƒɛƒɛɛ úwi-mi lɛgba ƒui.
42007047	Anwuɔsu mɔɔsu-ɔ ka ni, na bɔyɔ bɔni na údie ɔ́tina-mi ɔsu ni, ɔ́kɛ nwuna ekpidi pii ani na ɔ́bla ƒui buti taakyiɛ. Na ukyuli ɔni na blii na béti bákyiɛ-nwu ni, nwuna bɔyɔ lɛnɔ buse blii.”
42007048	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su uleku ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ákɛ ƒula ekpidi buti taakyiɛ.”
42007049	Ka bekyuli bani lɛnɔ nlie kadikɔ mmɔ bénu Yesu lɛla lɛni na ɔ́su ni, béye lɛlɔ banii, “Ɔma na ɔdi mɛni ɔni mɔɔkana na uuti bekyuli ekpidi muedi taakyiɛ-ma?”
42007050	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su uleku ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ƒula bɔƒɔtaadi búdie-ɔ, ɔsu teesie ku keyi buɛɛ.”
42008001	Na uwi ɔdi kama ni, Yesu ɔ́vi ɔgbami úsie lɛma ku akpaklɔ kemo. Na ɔkɛ ɔɔsu litemi buni taasiku Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ lɛlɔ. Leevu-inyɔ banii na ɔ́ƒuna lɛnɔ basiaku-nwu.
42008002	Beleku bani na Yesu ɔ́bwi na bana lɛlɛ lidu ku bani na ɔ́gya ayu ekpidi ɔ́lɛku-ma lɛlɔ kemo badi lɛnɔ basiaku-nwu. Na bana akɔ ɔdi ndi Maria ɔni bátaalɔ banii Magdalene ɔni lɛlɔ kemo na Yesu ɔ́gya ayu ekpidi maatɛ ɔ́lɛku.
42008003	Uleku ɔbambadi lɛnɔ ɔkya-ma akɔ ɔni baalɔ banii Yohana na ɔgyani baalɔ Kusa na útaabla kabla na Ɔga Herode litemi katɛkɔ aani ɔkutine unengu ɔdi kalɛ. Beleku bamba pii ku ɔni baalɔ Susana lɛnɔ básiaku Yesu na béteeti bana akɛla teebunku anwu ku nwuna batɛyane.
42008004	Bekyuli pii bátaasi lɛma bun bun teebo Yesu kudɔ. Na uwi ɔni na bekyuli pii bábasala ni, Yesu úbo-ma lɛgba lɛmɛni ɔnini,
42008005	“Edula ɔkyane ɔdi úsie utágya edula. Amu ka ɔɔgya edula amɛni teewi kemo ni, adi álɛ ébo ulu kudɔ na bekyuli bánya-nya, na baasɛ bála bádi.
42008006	Adi álɛ ébo atakpɛ lɛlɔ. Na ka ákwɛ ni, átakɛ ntu ku lɛti buni. Anwuɔsu ákwi na ékpi.
42008007	Edula ammɔ adi éduo liyu livo akɔ. Na livo lɛ́tu libi edula ammɔ lɛlɔ, na ényimi-nya ƒui.
42008008	Na akladi anya álɛ ébo kalɔ buni lɛlɔ. Na ka ákwɛ ni, ánwu ebi eti anyɔ anyɔ.” Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bibimi atu, na binu kaduɛ!”
42008009	Yesu basiakune béye-nwu lɛgba lɛmɛni kalɔ bénu.
42008010	Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Katɔti úti nwuna lɛga bɔdi lɛnunda abɛla ɔ́tina-mii. Nsu bekyuli bakladi ama ni, agba na muubó-ma kalɛ na 'si ina baanu ni, balanu baláti. Na ina beenú ni, belénu kalɔ.'
42008011	“Lɛgba lɛni na líbo kalɔ bunu ndi ɔmɛni. Edula ammɔ ndi Katɔti litemi.
42008012	Na edula ani nálɛ ébo ulu kɔtu ese aani bekyuli bani muunú, nsu ukisine uubo taabada litemi lɛmmɔ teedie-ma kayi kemo. Na ɔ́ya-ma na balakana bɔƒɔ bɔdi na Katɔti ɔƒɔ-ma ngba.
42008013	Na ani nálɛ ébo atakpɛ lɛlɔ ni, ese aani bekyuli bani na bénu litemi lɛmmɔ na báƒɔ-ni ku ebiti mmɔ kani, nsu líteduo-ma lɛlɔ kemo geen. Anwuɔsu baaƒɔ́ taadi uwi klukui kemo kani. Na si uwi ɔni na bukpoku taanu bɔdi búbo ni, baayuɛ.
42008014	Edula ani nálɛ ébo liyu livo akɔ ni, ese aani bekyuli bani muunú litemi lɛmmɔ, nsu kayawi lɛƒɛda ku lɛlakɛ ku kayawi kamɛni ebiti aatú taabali-ma, na alaya na ebi ammɔ egyie na baƒɛ-nya.
42008015	Na edula ani nálɛ ébo kalɔ kabuni lɛlɔ ni, ese aani bekyuli bani muunú litemi lɛmmɔ teeti-ni taada ku kayi nwaa. Na beeboku lɛlɔ kalɔ na beenye momoomo teetédu kawɔlɔkɔ kalɛ na banwu ebi pii.
42008016	“Ukyuli ɔdi ulátu asogya teebi-nwu ala iye uti-nwu utábɛla ɔkya lɛla lɛdi kalɔ. Mmomu ɔɔkɔliku asogya ɔmmɔ taasia katɔ likpo lɛni maya na wekeye wewi kesii biala. Na ukyuli biala ɔni muuduo ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo ɔnu nwaa.
42008017	Lɛla biala lɛni na bábala bákya kesii biala ni, lɛdubɔda lɛlɛ keyi. Na lɛla lɛni na bébi ala ni, badubudie-ni beboku bukeye kemo.
42008018	“Bɛnu lɛlɔ kemo kaduɛ na kalɛ na biinú etemila lɛlɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni muunú na únu kalɔ ni, ɔdubunu kalɔ ubu. Na ukyuli ɔni neeese atu ni, libliidi lɛni na ɔɔbu ɔnii únu muedi ni, badubɔƒɔ-ni na nwuna kudɔ.”
42008019	Yesu banwani ku bana uni bébo-nwu kudɔ, nsu bátakana Yesu bɔkpɛ bude ɔkɛnku bekyuli bammɔ bumomo ɔsu.
42008020	Amu na ukyuli ɔdi útásu Yesu ɔnii, “Ƒula uni ku ƒula banwani benye keyi baawia-a.”
42008021	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su bana ƒui ɔnini, “Mina uni ku mina banwani ndi bekyuli bani muunú Katɔti litemi na baadi-ni lɛlɔ.”
42008022	Limeyi lɛdi ni, Yesu úduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo ku nwuna batɛyane. Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛya na bɔvia busie ɛpu ɔvi ɔni ngye.” Anwuɔsu ama lɛnɔ bése kalɔ ku ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ buku.
42008023	Ka bakɛ ntu anumi bésela ni, Yesu ɔ́lɛɛ. Na kɔnakunwi ni, ɔƒɛƒɛɛ kpakplaa ɔdi úbo uukpó na ntu anumi mmɔ ɔni na ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo ƒui kadaku ntu bɔƒɔ ɔsu bakya kukpi ku ngba ntɛ.
42008024	Batɛyane bammɔ bésie na bátágyila Yesu na básu-nwu banini, “Ati! Bɔdaku bukpi!” Amu na Yesu ɔ́ta únye na údie lɛdi ɔ́bɔku ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ku ntu bɔni mɔɔnwanɛ lɛlɔ mmɔ, na ana ƒui kenye káyɔ na ɔ́bla buɛɛ.
42008025	Na úye batɛyane bammɔ ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na biiibo bɔƒɔtaadi?” Nsu bunye kani na benye yaa, na liƒu lɛnɔ lɛ́da-ma. Na béye lɛlɔ banini, “Ukyuli ɔmani na ɔdi mɛni bɔdi? Ɔɔtɛmi teete ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ku ɛpu ntu bɔni mɔɔnwanɛ lɛlɔ na beenú-nwu litemi!”
42008026	Amu na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bávia bésie bétédu kalɔ kani baalɔ Gerase na ɛpu ɔvi si ási Galilea.
42008027	Ka Yesu ɔ́si ɔɔlɛ́ ɔkɔlɔ kemo kani na ukyuli ɔdi na ayu ekpidi eli-nwu lɛlɔ úsie úbasiaku-nwu. Na ɔdi ukyuli ɔni na ɔ́si ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo. Ɔbla uwi pii ɔdi mɛni ni, kasɔngya kani na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔɔkɛ. Na ulátuna ɔnii uulie nwuna kaduli amu ntu bekyuli kɔƒiɔtɔ akɔ.
42008028	Uwi ɔni na ɔ́nu Yesu ni, ɔ́va momoomo na úƒwimi lɛlɔ ɔ́va kalɔ na Yesu lɛgba kudɔ. Na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Yesu, Katɔti Ɔni Ntulo Ƒui Ubi! Bi na aawia mina kudɔ mɛni? Muuvele nda-a, tani-mi kɔtu.”
42008029	Ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔ́su ɔmɛni, ɔsika Yesu ɔ́bɔku kɔyu kɔni nlie-nwu lɛlɔ mmɔ, na ɔ́su-ku ɔnii, “Vi lɛ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo!” Uwi pii kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔɔdi ukyuli ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔni na si ina bényimi-nwu enu na bébo-nwu kɔgba muedi ni, ɔɔƒɛ abuala ammɔ na kɔyu kɔmmɔ kuukeliku-nwu taatákya ketele kemo.
42008030	Yesu úye-nwu ɔnini, “Dɛ na baalɔ-ɔ lɛnyi?” Amu na údie kenye ɔnini, “Ami baalɔ banii Lisu.” Ɔ́su lɛni ɔsika ayu ekpidi pii néduo akya-nwu lɛlɔ kemo.
42008031	Amu na ayu ammɔ évele Yesu anii utabɔku-ma utatákya ayu ekpidi abi kebokɔ.
42008032	Mmɔ ni, baplakuo pii badi bakɛ kataku kadi lɛlɔ baadi. Amu na ayu ekpidi ammɔ évele Yesu anii ɔya na betéduo baplakuo bammɔ lɛlɔ kemo. Amu na Yesu úte-ma kuƒi.
42008033	Anwuɔsu bávi bálɛ ɔnana ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ kemo bétéduo baplakuo bammɔ kemo. Na bana ƒui békeli báyu kataku kammɔ lɛlɔ na bátányina lɛlɔ bákya ɛpu kemo na báyii ku udu.
42008034	Ka bekyuli bani mɔɔnu baplakuo bammɔ lɛlɔ bánu ala ani nálɛ ni, békeli bésie ɔmankemo na bátásu bekyuli bávi ku akpaklɔ lɛnɔ ƒui.
42008035	Na bekyuli bammɔ bálɛ bésie banii batánu lɛla lɛni nálɛ. Amu ka bébedu Yesu kudɔ ni, bánu ɔnana ɔni lɛlɔ kemo na Yesu ɔ́bɔku ayu ekpidi ɔ́lɛku mmɔ ka ulie Yesu lɛgba akɔ ku kasusu sɛɛn na ɔda adala na ulie kpoo. Amu na bana ƒui báyia.
42008036	Na bekyuli bani nánu kalɛ na ala ammɔ álɛ ni, básu bakladi kalɛ na ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na ayu ekpidi amɛni élie lɛlɔ lɛ́bla nwaa.
42008037	Ɔmɛni ɔsu Gerase kalɔ kammɔ ku kana amadɔ bekyuli básu Yesu banii ɔtɔlɔ bana kalɔ lɛlɔ, ɔsika baayia. Anwuɔsu Yesu úduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo ka ɔtɔlɔ.
42008038	Amu na ukyuli ɔni na Yesu ɔ́bwi mɛni úvele Yesu ɔnii, “Ya na lɛsiaku-ɔ.” Nsu Yesu útatuna na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini,
42008039	“Teesie kaduli na atásu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔ́bla úte-ɔ.” Amu na ukyuli ɔmɛni úsie útávi ɔmankemo na ɔ́su ɔ́vi ƒui lɛla lɛni na Yesu ɔ́bla úte-nwu.
42008040	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie ɛpu ɔvi ɔni ngye ni, bekyuli bammɔ báƒɔ-nwu kaduɛ, ɔsika bana ƒui benye bagya-nwu.
42008041	Amu na ɔnana ɔni baalɔ Yairo na ɔdi Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ benengu akɔ unwi ɔ́da úbalɛ. Na ɔ́yu ɔ́tɛ Yesu lɛgba kalɔ na úvele-nwu ɔnii ɔsiaku-nwu na besie nwuna kaduli,
42008042	ɔsika ubidi ulekubi unwi ɔni na ɔdubɔƒɔ aani akwa leevu-anyɔ ni, ɔtɛ ɔlɛ ɔdaku bukpi. Ka Yesu ɔkɛ úsela ni, lɛni na bekyuli baanwanɛ lɛlɔ ka bani bede-nwu.
42008043	Na bekyuli bamɛni akɔ ni, uleku ɔni na ubugya uuwi na ɔbla akwa leevu-anyɔ sɔɔn lɛnɔ ɔ́kya-ma akɔ. Uleku ɔmɛni úubile nwuna egulabi ƒui ɔnii ɔɔbwi ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ, nsu úutuku ɔ́nɔ.
42008044	Amu na ɔkɛ buɛɛ útávi Yesu kama na bekyuli akɔ na útuku-nwu awu kɔtu. Mmɔ kani ni, ubugya ɔmmɔ kenye kékulo.
42008045	Amu na Yesu úye ɔnii, “Ɔma nétuku-mi?” Nsu ukyuli biala úni. Amu na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, nu kalɛ na bekyuli ƒui bɛ́mua basiaku-ɔ!”
42008046	Nsu Yesu ɔ́su ɔnini, “Lɛ́ti ka ukyuli ɔdi útuku-mi, ɔsika ɔyikun ɔdi ɔ́vi ɔ́lɛ-mi lɛlɔ kemo.”
42008047	Ka uleku ɔmmɔ ɔ́nu ɔ́ti ka ulakana bɔbɛ ɔsu ni, lɛlɔ lɛɛtɔ́-nwu na ɔ́yu ɔ́tɛ Yesu lɛgba kalɔ. Amu na ɔ́sɔku lɛla biala kalɔ údie na bekyuli bammɔ ƒui anumi. Na údie ɔ́su lɛla lɛni ɔsu na útuku-nwu awu ku kalɛ na ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-nwu kɔnakunwi.
42008048	Ɔmɛni ɔsu Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Mina ubi uleku, ƒula bɔƒɔtaadi bɔ́bwi-ɔ. Teesie ku keyi buɛɛ.”
42008049	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔmua ɔdaku litemi lɛmɛni bɔsu ni, anwu kani na ɔtu ɔdi ɔ́da úbalɛ na ɔ́si Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ unengu ɔni baalɔ Yairo mmɔ kesii. Na úbasu-nwu kenye ɔnini, “Ƒ^ubidi ulekubi ɔmmɔ úukpi ɔsu da ala ɔtinane ɔmmɔ bɔlɔ ya.”
42008050	Nsu Yesu únu litemi lɛmmɔ na ɔ́su Yairo ɔnini, “Tayia. Awɔ ƒɔ di ka ubi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyu ɔkplu.”
42008051	Uwi ɔni na bétéduo Yairo kaduli mmɔ ni, útete kuƒi na ukyuli ɔdi uduo ɔtɔ kemo ntu Petro ku Yohane ku Yakobo ku ulekubi ɔmmɔ ɔti ku uni kani.
42008052	Na bekyuli pii benye mmɔ beewulo kɔnyana ku keku na ubi ɔmmɔ ɔsu. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛsɔ bitewulo. Ubi ɔmmɔ útekpi. Bɔlɛɛ na ɔda.”
42008053	Amu na bana ƒui béti-nwu báma, ɔsika ama bagyi ka úkpi.
42008054	Amu na Yesu úƒie-nwu kɔnu ɔ́da na ɔ́kpali-nwu ɔnini, “Ubi, ta nye!”
42008055	Ulekubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo ngba na ɔ́ta kɔnakunwi. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnii bawia lɛla lɛdi bete ulekubi ɔmmɔ na ɔdi.
42008056	Ala amɛni ƒui ábla nwuna bawɔne dɛye dɛye, nsu Yesu úbo-ma ɔda ɔnii batasu ukyuli ɔdi lɛla lɛni nálɛ mɛni.
42009001	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́lɔ nwuna batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ ɔ́sala na úte-ma kuƒi ku ɔyikun ɔni na beti bagya ayu ekpidi ƒui na babwi lɛlɛ lidu lɛnɔ.
42009002	Amu na ɔ́tala-ma ɔnii beteesie na batásu Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ etemila bete bekyuli na babwi balɛne.
42009003	Asa na badubɔgyu ni, Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biteti lɛla lɛdi bitada na bina ulu busie kemo aani ugyii ɔdadi iye ala bevelene koƒo iye adila iye egulabi. Na awu ɔbambadi muedi ni, bitasu bɛnii biiti ɔdi.
42009004	Kesii biala na báƒɔ-mii ni, bɛsɔ bɛkya kaduli kammɔ kemo utédu uwi ɔni na ɔlɛka bɛtɔlɔ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo.
42009005	Na kesii kani na bátaƒɔ-mii ni, bɛtɔlɔ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo na biveli bina lɛgba kalɔ ɔtumu muedi biwi ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo aani Katɔti kɔtu bɔni kati bute.”
42009006	Amu na batɛyane bammɔ bátɔlɔ na bátávi akpaklɔ ani ƒui kemo na baasu Katɔti litemi buni na baabwi balɛne lɛnɔ.
42009007	Ka Herode ɔni mɔɔdi Galilea lɛlɔ únu ala ani ƒui mɔɔlɛ́ mɛni ni, úbeƒu ɔsika bekyuli badi baasu ka Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane násɔ ɔ́ta úbo uli ngba.
42009008	Na babambadi lɛnɔ baasu banii Elia násɔ únwini úbo. Na badi lɛnɔ banii Katɔti kenye bediene bakukudi bammɔ akɔ unwi násɔ úbo uli ngba.
42009009	Amu na Herode ɔ́su ɔnini, “Lɛ́ya na békulo Yohane lili, na ɔma na ɔdi nsɔ nkɛ mɔɔbla ala amɛni na muunú-nwu kɔku?” Anwuɔsu Herode ɔkya ɔɔwia ulu ɔni na ɔsia na ɔnu Yesu.
42009010	Batɛyane bammɔ bénwini bébo na bábasu Yesu ala ani ƒui na bábla. Amu na útiku-ma na bátɔlɔ bésie ɔma ɔni baalɔ banii Betsaida kakɛ.
42009011	Ka bekyuli pii bénu lɛni ni, básia-nwu kama bésie mmɔ. Yesu lɛnɔ ɔ́ƒɔ-ma na ɔ́tɛmi úte-ma ɔ́si Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ ala lɛlɔ, na ɔ́bwi bani na ɔlɛ ɔda.
42009012	Lebo lɛni na ɔƒɛ úsela bɔnu ni, Batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ bébo Yesu kudɔ na básu-nwu banini, “Ya na bekyuli bamɛni batɔlɔ na beteesie akpaklɔ ani nde amadɔ mɛni kemo, kalɛ na bakɛ adila ku keduokɔ, ɔsika mɛni ɔdi ketele ntɛ.”
42009013	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Amii alati bite-ma lɛla lɛdi na badi.” Mmɔ na básu-nwu banii, “Adila ani ƒui na bɔda mɛni ndi bodobodo ɛlɔ ku kɔbɛ inyɔ. Aawia ka busie butéye adila bute bekyuli pii bamɛni?”
42009014	Na banana bammɔ babla mpimu ɛlɔ na mmɔ. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Bɛya na bekyuli bammɔ belie esu esu aani nkyuli liti liti.”
42009015	Na ka batɛyane bábla lɛni ni,
42009016	Yesu úti bodobodo ɛlɔ ku kɔbɛ inyɔ bɔmmɔ na ɔ́kɔliku anumi ɔ́nu katɔ. Amu na ɔ́gya Katɔti enu úte-ma, na ɔ́bwɛ-nwu kɔkɛ kɔkɛ na úti úte nwuna batɛyane ɔnii beti bele bete bekyuli bammɔ.
42009017	Na bana ƒui bádi bémo na batɛyane bammɔ básala kɔkɛ wɛlɛ wɛlɛ kɔni nébu na kúyi kɔgyigyɛ leevu-inyɔ.
42009018	Ka Yesu lɛti ɔkya ɔɔkpali katɔ limeyi lɛdi ni, nwuna batɛyane bébo-nwu kudɔ. Amu na úye-ma ɔnini, “Ɔma na bekyuli baasu banii anwu na ndi?”
42009019	Amu na bédie kenye banii, “Badi baasu banii awɔ ndi Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane. Na badi lɛnɔ banii awɔ ndi Elia. Na badi lɛnɔ baasu taatina banii Katɔti kenye bediene bakukudi bammɔ akɔ unwi násɔ únwini úbo uli ngba.”
42009020	Amu na úye-ma ɔnini, “Na amii nɔɔ? Ɔma na bɛɛsu ka anwu na ndi?” Mmɔ na Petro údie kenye ɔnii, “Awɔ ndi Katɔti Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ.”
42009021	Amu na Yesu úbo-ma ɔda kpakplaa ɔnii batasu ukyuli ɔdi kenye kamɛni.
42009022	Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, “Ɔlɛka ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, libo abi geen na kadi benengu ku bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane enu kemo na beni-mi, na badu-mi. Nsu na emeyi atɛ kama ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔgyila-mi ɔlɛku bekpine akɔ mbelie ngba.”
42009023	Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, “Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔwia ka ɔsiaku-mi ni, ɔlɛka udie lɛlɔ atu na ubo abi limeyi ndi limeyi na ɔsiaku-mi kama.
42009024	Ɔsika ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔwia ka ɔƒɔ nwuna lili ngba ute lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubɔyila-mu. Na ukyuli biala ɔni nányonu nwuna ngba ka ɔsiaku-mi ɔsu ni, ɔdubɔkɛ ngba geen.
42009025	Bi kɔsia na ukyuli ɔdubɔkɛ si ɔ́kɛ kayawi ala ƒui na ɔ́yila ngba geen bɔmmɔ?
42009026	Si ami ku mina ala ani mɔɔtina ƒui ékpo ukyuli ɔdi kɔƒa ni, anwu lɛnɔ ɔdubukpo ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi kɔƒa uwi ɔni na mebo na mina bukeye ku Katɔti ku nwuna batu kedee ƒui bukeye kemo.
42009027	Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii bina akɔ badi na mɛni ni, belekpi wetédu uwi ɔni na Katɔti wedie nwuna lɛga bɔdi ɔyikun keyi na limeyi likplodi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.”
42009028	Ɔ́bla aani Kwasida unwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́su ala amɛni kama ni, útiku Petro ku Yohane ku Yakobo na bákɔ bésie kɔbi lili batákpali katɔ.
42009029	Ka ɔdaku katɔ bɔkpali ni, nwuna anumi bɔnu bɔ́vumana na nwuna adala eekeye na aatu anumi.
42009030	Na kɔnakunwi ni, banana inyɔ badi bébenye-nwu kudɔ bani ndi Mose ku Elia na baatɛmi.
42009031	Báda bálɛ na Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma bukeye kemo na bátɛmi ku Yesu na ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔdubɔsia na ɔwɔlɔ lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔɔwia na nwuna kukpi na Yerusalem kemo.
42009032	Petro ku nwuna bakpana béduo lɛlɛɛ kemo geen, nsu bágyinya bábanu lɛlɔyɔ bukeye bɔni kemo na Yesu ɔkya ku bekyuli inyɔ bani nnye-nwu kudɔ.
42009033	Ka bekyuli bammɔ baagyú ni, Petro ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Ati, bula mɛni bubo bɔdia geen! Ya bɔtu nvo ɛtɛ na mɛni. Kenwi kadi ƒula kadi, kenwi kadi Mose kadi, na kenwi kadi Elia lɛnɔ kadi.” Na ala ani na ɔɔsu mɛni ƒui ni, tati tati kemo na ɔ́su-nya.
42009034	Lebo lɛni na ɔmua unye ɔɔtɛmi ni, uyɔlɔ ɔdi ɔ́yu úbewi-ma lɛlɔ. Na batɛyane bammɔ báyia uwi ɔni na uyɔlɔ ɔmɛni ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ-ma lɛlɔ.
42009035	Amu na bénu Katɔti lɛdi na uyɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo ka lɛɛsu lɛnini, “Ɔmɛni ndi mina Ubi Ɔƒunadi. Binu-nwu litemi!”
42009036	Amu ka lɛdi lɛmmɔ lɛ́da bɔtɛmi lɛ́ya ni, bánu ka Yesu lɛti nébu unye. Amu na batɛyane bammɔ béti ala ani na bánu mmɔ bábala, na bátasu-nya ukyuli ɔdi uwi ɔmmɔ.
42009037	Ka kadi kégye ni, Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane ɛtɛ bammɔ bási báyu kɔbi kɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Na bábasiaku bekyuli pii badi.
42009038	Mmɔ na ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́va momoomo ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ala ɔtinane! Muuvele nda-a, nu mina ubi! Anwu kani ndi-mi ubi!
42009039	Kɔyu kukpidi kɔdi kuukpóku-nwu na kɔɔyá na ɔɔva momoomo kɔnakunwi. Ɔɔsinsi lɛlɔ na uuti lɛlɔ taaƒiɛmi kalɔ na avlɔvɔ aalɛ́-nwu kenye. Lɛni na ɔɔbla-nwu laa ɔkplu kemo asa na kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔɔnyonu-nwu.
42009040	Lívele ƒula batɛyane nnii bagya kɔyu kukpidi kɔmmɔ bete-mi, nsu bátakana-ku bɔgya.”
42009041	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Amii, ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli, bi ɔsu na bilaƒɔ-mi taadi na bɛɛyu atu ɔkplu? Uwi ɛlɛ sɔɔn na ndubɔkɛku-mii kayi? Na uwi ɔmani na ndubɔda-mii ntálɛ?” Amu na ɔ́su ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ti ƒ^ubidi boku mɛni.”
42009042	Ka ɔnamu ɔmmɔ ɔ́si ɔdubo ni, anwu kani na kɔyu kɔmmɔ kúbo-nwu kɔ́va kalɔ na ɔ́sinsi. Amu na Yesu ɔ́bɔku kɔyu kukpidi kɔmmɔ na ɔ́bwi ɔnamu ɔmmɔ, na ɔ́sɔku-nwu úte ɔti.
42009043	Katɔti ɔyikun bonwu ɔmɛni ɔ́bla bekyuli bammɔ ƒui dɛye dɛye. Yesu ala bɔbla átakɔsi na aabla-ma dɛye dɛye uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini,
42009044	“Bitayiƒla lɛla lɛni na líse kalɔ ndaku-mii bɔsu! Badubo Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi buti bɔkya bekyuli enu kemo.”
42009045	Nsu batɛyane bammɔ bétenu ɔmɛni kalɔ. Ɔdi lɛla lɛni na béti bábala-ma, nsu baayia-nwu lɛla lɛdi buye bɔsiku litemi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.
42009046	Unyeƒi ɔdi úbeduo batɛyane bammɔ ntɛ ɔni ndi bana akɔ ɔni náƒɔ kuye utulo lɛlɔ.
42009047	Amu ka Yesu ɔ́ti-ma kasusu ɔsu ni, úti ɔnamu ɔdi úbenyene-ma anumi na nwuna kudɔ.
42009048	Mmɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, “Ukyuli ɔni náƒɔ ɔnamu ɔmɛni na mina lɛnyi kemo ni, ɔ́ƒɔ ami lɛnɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔƒɔ́-mi ni, ɔ́ƒɔ ukyuli ɔni nátala-mi. Ɔsika ukyuli ɔni néboku lɛlɔ kalɔ ƒui na bina akɔ ni, anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni náƒɔ kuye utulo ƒui.”
42009049	Amu na Yohane ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, bɔ́nu ka ukyuli ɔdi ɔkya ɔɔgyá ayu ekpidi na ƒula lɛnyi kemo na bɔ́su-nwu bɔnii ɔda ɔya, ɔsika ɔɔɔdi bula akɔ unwi.”
42009050	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Bitabala-nwu. Ɔsika si ukyuli ɔdi útata útenye-mii lɛlɔ ni, bɛti bɛnii unye-mii kama.”
42009051	Amu ka uwi ɔni na ɔlɛka Katɔti uti Yesu usienku katɔ ɔdaku budu ni, ɔ́lɛ ugyii ka uteesie Yerusalem.
42009052	Ɔ́tala batu badi ɔnii bagyu batɔ lɛkpaklɔ lɛdi kemo na Samaria na batáklibi lɛla biala bese bete-nwu.
42009053	Nsu ka ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli báti ka bɔvi na ɔ́vi úsela Yerusalem ɔsu ni, bétenu kalɔ.
42009054	Amu na ka batɛyane bani ndi Yohane ku Yakobo bánu lɛni ni, béye Yesu banii, “Ati, aawia ka bɔkpali ogya bɔsi katɔ bubewi-ma lɛlɔ na ɔkyula-ma?”
42009055	Mmɔ na Yesu únwini na ɔ́dɔnku-ma, na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bilenu Kɔyu kɔni mɔɔdi-mii lɛlɔ kalɔ! Ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, ńtebo nnii mbakyula bekyuli, mmomu líbo nnii mbaƒɔ-ma ngba.”
42009056	Na anwu ku batɛyane bammɔ bébo bávi bésie lɛkpaklɔ bamba.
42009057	Ka bakɛ bésela ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Ndubɔsiaku-ɔ kesii biala na ésela.”
42009058	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Beƒiebuo bebo libu lɛni kemo na baatɛ, na baasɛ lɛnɔ bebo ayu. Nsu Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ni, anwu uuubo katɛnkɔ muedi.”
42009059	Na Yesu ɔ́su ukyuli bamba ɔnini, “Siaku-mi.” Nsu ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ati, ya na lɛka mina ɔti busie butáva asa.”
42009060	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ya na ama bani neeebo Katɔti ngba geen bɔmmɔ bataava bana bekpine. Na awɔ eteesie na atásu Katɔti lɛga bɔdi litemi.”
42009061	Ukyuli bamba lɛnɔ ɔnii, “Blɔti, masiaku-ɔ. Nsu ya-mi lɛka mina lɛlɔ bekyuli busie butákada asa.”
42009062	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔni naaabla nwuna kabla ku kayi ƒui ni, útamanku Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma.”
42010001	Ɔmɛni kama ni, Blɔti ɔ́ƒuna banana liti ku aavlanyɔ-inyɔ babambadi na ɔ́tala-ma inyɔ inyɔ ɔnii besie lɛma ku akpaklɔ ani kemo na nka ɔlɛka usie.
42010002	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Edula pii éedu bɔƒɛ, nsu nkyuli ɛlɛɛ badi kani nnye kabla kamɛni lɛlɔ. Bɛkpali katɔ na bivele kemo ɔlati na umene bekyuli bani maƒɛ-nya masala.
42010003	Biteesie! Mɔɔtala-mii aani baƒonu na begiti akɔ.
42010004	Na biteti egulabi kavumi iye koƒo iye lɛgbanvuo, na bitedi bitenye ulu bɛnii biigyele ukyuli ɔdi.
42010005	“Kaduli biala na bítéduo ni, bɛka bɔsu bɛnii, 'Keyi buɛɛ kasiaku kaduli kamɛni bekyuli.'
42010006	Na si ukyuli ɔni mɔɔyɔ́ keyi buɛɛ ɔdi ɔkya mmɔ ni, bɛya na bina keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-nwu. Nsu si ɔdi uuubo ni, bɛsɔku bina keyi buɛɛ kegye bɛtɔlɔku.
42010007	Bɛsɔ bɛkya kaduli kani kemo na báƒɔ-mii. Na lɛla biala lɛni na badubuti bete-mii ni, bɛdi na bɛni-ni. Ɔsika kabla ɔblane biala ni, ɔlɛka bete-nwu nwuna lɛyuƒɔla. Bitatáka bitamana ɔ́si kaduli kani úsie kani.
42010008	“Na ɔma biala ɔni kemo na báƒɔ-mii ni, bɛdi lɛla biala na bákɛ béte-mii.
42010009	Bɛbwi balɛne na ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo. Na bɛsu ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli bɛnii, 'Uwi ɔni na Katɔti ɔdi lɛga na bula kɔyi kemo ɔ́ɔkpɛ úde.'
42010010	Nsu si bísie ɔma ɔdi kemo na bátaƒɔ-mii ni, bɛlɛ bisie kuyeya na bɛsu bɛnii,
42010011	'Bina ɔma ɔtumu ɔni mma-bu lɛgba kalɔ muedi ni, búveli búwi-mii. Nsu binyimo ka uwi ɔni na Katɔti ɔdi lɛga na bina kɔyi kemo ɔ́ɔkpɛ úde-mii!'
42010012	Na mɔɔsu-mii kede kede nnii na litemi bɔtɛ limeyi ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔnu Sodom ɔma kɔnyana utulo ɔma ɔmmɔ!
42010013	“Bɔbwɛ muute amii Korasin! Na bɔbwɛ muute amii Betsaida! Si Tiro ku Sidon lɛma likpidi kemo na lɛ́bla akɔla budie taatina ani lɛ́bla na bina akɔ ni, nka badubɔyu belie kalɔ kukuuku na beti aƒɔ ekuku bada lɛlɔ na bawɛɛ ntɔ ɔni mɔɔtina ka béni bana ekpidi!
42010014	Katɔti ɔdubɔnu Tiro ku Sidon lɛma kɔnyana butulo amii na litemi bɔtɛ limeyi.
42010015	Na awɔ Kapernaum ni, bɔkali na bɛda bɛnii bɛdubɔkɔliku lɛlɔ bitédu katɔ? Badubɔyula-mii na bɛyii udu!”
42010016	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Ukyuli biala ɔni muunú bina litemi ni, ɔɔtina ka uunú ami lɛnɔ litemi. Na ukyuli biala ɔni muuní-mii ni, ɔɔtina ka uuní ami lɛnɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔni muuní-mi ni, ɔɔtina ka uuní Katɔti ɔni nátala-mi lɛnɔ.”
42010017	Nkyuli liti ku aavlanyɔ-inyɔ bammɔ básɔ bénwini bébo ku ebiti. Na bábasu-nwu banii, “Blɔti, ayu ekpidi muedi énu-bu litemi ɔni bɔ́bɔku-ma na ƒula lɛnyi kemo.”
42010018	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lɛ́nu Satan ka ɔ́si katɔ úbanu aani ogya bɔtu kalɛ.
42010019	Binu kaduɛ! Líte-mii ɔyikun ɔni na bɛkana na bɛkɔ bɛnya balakpi ku batamlukpa lɛlɔ. Na bɛkana bɛdi ukisine ɔmmɔ ɔyikun ƒui lɛlɔ ɔni na lɛla lɛdi lilabla-mii.
42010020	Nsu ni, lɛlɔ litayɔ-mii ka ayu ekpidi eenú-mii litemi ɔsu. Mmomu ebiti ada-mii ka Katɔti únweni-mii anyi ɔ́kya Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma.”
42010021	Uwi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti Kɔyu ebiti áƒɔ Yesu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ati, katɔ ku kalɔ Unwoti, mɔɔgyá-a enu ɔsika lɛla lɛni na éti ábɛla bakutine ku banundane ni, ani na éti átina bekyuli bani na baaagyi lɛku ku badɔlɔdi. Sɔsɔ na ɔdi, Ati, lɛni geen na aayɔ́ anii ɔlɛ.”
42010022	Amu na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, “Mina Ɔti úti ala ƒui úte-mi. Ɔdi biala ɔɔɔgyi ukyuli ɔni na Katɔti Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔdi, ntu Katɔti lɛti pɛ. Na ɔdi lɛnɔ ɔɔɔgyi ukyuli ɔni na Katɔti ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ ɔdi, ntu Ubidi ɔmmɔ lɛti pɛ ku bekyuli bani na Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́ƒuna ka udie Ɔti ɔmmɔ ɔtina kani.”
