42010023	Amu na Yesu únwini útánu nwuna batɛyane bammɔ na ɔ́su-ma na bɔbɛ kemo ɔnini, “Lɛlɔ litaayɔ-mii geen ka bɛɛnu ala ani na bɛdaku bɔnu mɛni!
42010024	Mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, Katɔti kenye bediene pii ku baga lɛnɔ báwia ka banu lɛla lɛni bɛɛnu ɔƒɛni, nsu bátanu. Na báwia ka benu lɛla lɛni na amii biinú mɛni, nsu bétenu.”
42010025	Mmɔ na ɔda bubo ala ɔtinane ɔdi úbo ku kasusu ka ɔkɔku Yesu ɔnu. Na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Ala ɔtinane, bi na ɔlɛka lɛbla asa lɛkɛ ngba ƒui?”
42010026	Amu na Yesu údie kenye na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Bi na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔɔsu? Na dɛ na awɔ eenú litemi lɛmmɔ kalɔ?”
42010027	Mmɔ na ɔnana ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnii, “Yɔ Unwoti Katɔti ku ƒula kayi ƒui, ku ƒula kɔyu ƒui ku ƒula ɔyikun ƒui ku ƒula kasusu ƒui lɛnɔ, na ayɔ ƒula ukyulikpana aani ƒula lɛlɔ kalɛ.”
42010028	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ásu na ɔ́tɛ. Bla lɛni na adubɔkɛ ngba ƒui.”
42010029	Nsu ka ɔda bubo ala ɔtinane ɔmɛni ɔɔwia ka ute lɛlɔ ubo ɔsu ni, ɔ́sɔ úye Yesu ɔnini, “Ɔma ndi mina ukyulikpana?”
42010030	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Dii ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni nási Yerusalem úsela Yeriko, na beyune bátáda-nwu ulu. Na bébo-nwu na bédie-nwu lɛlɔ ala na bányonu-nwu báva na ɔɔyɔ́ ukpi.
42010031	Úbebo úte ka Katɔti ɔkpane ɔdi úbo ɔɔví ulu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Nsu ka ɔ́nu ukyuli ɔmɛni na kuludɔ ni, ɔ́sia ɔ́vi ɔbambadi ɔ́tɔlɔ.
42010032	Lɛni kani na Lewini ɔdi lɛnɔ úbo ɔɔví. Na ka ɔ́nu ɔnana ɔmmɔ ni, anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́sia ɔ́vi ɔbambadi ɔ́tɔlɔ.
42010033	Nsu Samariani ɔdi ɔni nábasia mmɔ úsela ulu ɔdi ni, úbasiaku ukyuli ɔmmɔ. Na ka ɔ́nu-nwu ni, kaƒɔ kákywi-nwu.
42010034	Amu na úsie útédu-nwu kudɔ na úti inɔmii ku ntɛ úwi-nwu lɛlɛ lɛmmɔ kemo na únyimi-ni ƒui. Na ɔ́gyu ɔnana ɔmmɔ útásia anwu ɔlati ebuo lɛlɔ. Na úti-nwu úsienku baƒɔ keduokɔ na ɔ́nu-nwu lɛlɔ.
42010035	Kadi kégye ni, údie egulabi adi úte keduokɔ lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmmɔ ɔnii, 'Taanu-nwu lɛlɔ. Na si lɛ́si líbo mɔɔví mɛni ni, ndubɔƒɔ-ɔ lɛla biala lɛni na adubɔsɔ ebile na nwuna lɛlɔ.' ”
42010036	Amu na Yesu úye ɔda bubo ala ɔtinane ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Na ƒula kasusu kenye ni, nkyuli ɛtɛ bamɛni akɔ ɔmani nátina lɛlɔ aani ukyulikpana na ukyuli ɔni néduo beyune enu kemo mɛni lɛlɔ?”
42010037	Mmɔ na ɔda bubo ala ɔtinane ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔni nánu-nwu kɔnyana.” Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ lɛnɔ teesie na atábla lɛni.”
42010038	Amu na ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane básia bana ulu bátɔlɔ bésela ni, bébedu ɔma ɔdi. Mmɔ na uleku ɔdi baalɔ Marta ɔ́ƒɔ-nwu úsienku nwuna kaduli.
42010039	Marta ɔmɛni ubo ɔnwani ulekubi ɔni baalɔ Maria. Anwu ɔ́yu úlie Yesu kudɔ na uunú-nwu ala ani na ɔɔtina.
42010040	Kaduli ablala ani nsia Marta lɛti pɛ lɛlɔ ékpoku-nwu kayi. Ɔmɛni ɔsu úbo na úbasu Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, ulábla-a lɛla lɛdi ka mina ɔnwani ulekubi ɔ́da kaduli ablala amɛni ƒui ɔ́sia-mi lɛlɔ? Su-nwu na ubo ubebunku-mi!”
42010041	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Marta! Nu kalɛ na eekpóku lɛlɔ na ala pii lɛlɔ.
42010042	Nsu lɛlakpa linwi kani námanku baawia. Na lɛbuni lɛmmɔ na Maria ɔ́ƒuna. Na basɔ baláƒɔ-ni na nwuna kudɔ.”
42011001	Limeyi lɛdi ni, Yesu ɔkya likpo lɛdi ɔɔkpali katɔ. Ka ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, nwuna batɛyane akɔ unwi ɔdi úbo-nwu kudɔ, na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, tina-bu kalɛ na butaakpali katɔ aani kalɛ na Yohane ɔ́tina nwuna batɛyane.”
42011002	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Si bɛɛkpali katɔ ni, na bɛsu bɛnii, 'Ati, balɔ-ɔ lɛnyi buni. Ƒula lɛga kadikɔ kebo-bu akɔ. Babla ƒula lɛƒɔyɔ na kalɔ lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na use na katɔ.
42011003	Te-bu bula limeyi adila limeyi ndi limeyi.
42011004	Na eti bula alaekpidi akyiɛ-bu, ɔsika abu lɛnɔ buuti taakyiɛ ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔƒiɔ́-bu. Na taya na buduo bukpoku taanu kemo. na edie-bu alɛku alaekpidi akɔ.' ”
42011005	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Si banii bina akɔ ɔdi úsie nwuna ɔkpana ɔdi kudɔ usien ntɛ útásu-nwu ɔnii, 'Ɔkpana, vo-mi bodobodo ɛtɛ ɔdi,
42011006	ɔsika mina ɔkpana ɔdi ɔ́si ulu úbeduo-mi ɔƒɛni kani. Na liiibo lɛdila lɛdi na lite-nwu!'
42011007	“Na banii ƒula ɔkpana ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-ɔ ɔnii, 'Tebete-mi lɛƒɛda lɛdi! Ami ku mina bebi bɔ́ɔtɛ na bɔ́kalɛ ɔtɔ. Nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo bɔkana bɔta ɔƒɛni bubete-ɔ lɛla lɛdi.'
42011008	Si úbo úte lɛni ni, bi na adubo bɔbla? Mɔɔsu-mii nnii si nka kɔkpana kenye lɛti ɔsu ni, ulata. Nsu kalɛ na enye eevele-nwu taasia kama ɔsu ni, ɔdubɔta na ute-ɔ lɛla biala lɛni na aawia.
42011009	“Anwuɔsu mɔɔsu-mii nnii bivele Katɔti na ɔdubuti ute-mii, bɛwia na bɛdubɔkɛ, bibo kɔnu kegbuta na ɔdubɔlɛmi ute-mii.
42011010	Ɔsika ukyuli biala ɔni muuvele Katɔti ni, uute-nwu. Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔwia lɛla lɛdi ni, ɔɔkɛ́-ni. Na ukyuli biala ɔni muubó kɔnu kegbuta ni, Katɔti ɔɔlɛmi teete-nwu.
42011011	“Na amii bani ndi bebi bati ni, bute na ɔdi ɔdubuti kɔlakpi ute ubidi si úye-nwu kabɛ?
42011012	Munuu, katamlukpa na adubuti ete-nwu si úye-nwu akɔkɔ lɛvala?
42011013	Ina ka bɛdi alaekpidi bablane ni, bɛgyi kalɛ na biti ala abuni bite bina bebi. Amu na Ati ɔni nkya katɔ nɔɔ? Bi ɔsu na uleti nwuna Kɔyu ulete bekyuli bani muuvele-nwu?”
42011014	Uwi ɔdi ni, Yesu ɔkya ɔɔgyá kɔyu kɔdi na kulákana butemi. Amu ka kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔ́vi kɔ́lɛ ukyuli ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ kemo ni, ukyuli ɔmmɔ úse kalɔ ku butemi. Ɔmɛni ɔ́bla bekyuli bani nnye mmɔ dɛye dɛye.
42011015	Nsu bana akɔ badi básu banini, “Ayu ekpidi ƒui unengu ɔni baalɔ banii Beelsebul muute-nwu ɔyikun ɔmmɔ ɔnii utaagya-ma taalɛku.”
42011016	Na babambadi lɛnɔ báyɔ ka bakywɛ Yesu kakpagyuɛ ɔsu básu-nwu banii ɔbla akɔla adi na uti udie ɔtina ka Katɔti náƒuna-nwu.
42011017	Nsu Yesu ɔ́ti lɛla lɛni na badanku na bana kasusu kemo. Anwuɔsu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Kalɔ kani muule lɛlɔ akpa akpa na beenye teekpoku lɛlɔ ni, kalɔ kammɔ kelétu uwi. Na kaduli kenwi bekyuli bani muule lɛlɔ na beekpóku lɛlɔ ni, bugyingya na beegyingya.
42011018	Anwuɔsu si Satan lɛga kadikɔ kebo akpa akpa ani muukpóku lɛlɔ ni, dɛ na lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ kadubunye? Bɛɛsu ka mɔɔgyá ayu ekpidi taalɛku ka Beelsebul uute-mi ɔyikun ɔnii mbla lɛni ɔsu.
42011019	Na si Beelsebul lɛlɔ na mɔɔgyá-ma ni, ɔma lɛlɔ na bina basiakune ama baasia taagya ayu ekpidi taalɛku bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo? Amii alati bina basiakune muudie taatina-mii ka bɛɛnyi ɔkɔ.
42011020	Oowo! Katɔti ɔyikun kemo mmomu na mɔɔgyá ayu ekpidi taalɛku. Na ɔmɛni uudie taatina-mii nwaa ka ni, Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kéebo kébeduo-mii kudɔ.
42011021	“Si ɔyikune ɔdi ɔ́klibi nwuna ekpola na unye ɔɔgyumana nwuna kaduli ni, agyi anii nwuna akɛla adi alayi.
42011022	Nsu si ukyuli ɔni mbo ɔkplu utulo-nwu úbo úbekpoku-nwu na ɔ́di-nwu lɛlɔ ni, uuƒie nwuna ekpola ani lɛlɔ ɔ́sia anu taaƒɔ na anwu ku nwuna bakpana beti ukyuli ɔmmɔ akɛla ani na béyu bele.
42011023	“Ukyuli ɔni neeenyeku-mi ni, agyi anii ɔ́ta únye-mi lɛlɔ geen. Na ukyuli ɔni neeebunku-mi na bɔsala ni, agyi anii bugyingya na uugyingya.
42011024	“Si kɔyu kukpidi kɔ́vi kɔ́lɛ ukyuli lɛlɔ kemo ni, kɔɔkɛ taavi ekpo ekpo ani nákwi taawia kesii kani na kulie. Na si útakɛ kadi ni, ɔɔsu lɛlɔ ɔnii, 'Ndubɔsɔ linwini lisie mina kaduli kani na lɛ́tɔlɔ mmɔ.'
42011025	Anwuɔsu ɔɔsɔ teesie taatánu ka bákpala ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo sɛɛn na béni ala ƒui.
42011026	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu ni, ɔɔsɔ teenwini teesie na utákpanku ayu ekpidi maatɛ ani mbo kalala ntulo-nwu na bebo bebelie mmɔ. Na kawɔlɔkɔ ni, ukyuli ɔmmɔ ablala eebie teetulo kalɛ na úse kudeedi muedi.”
42011027	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́su ala amɛni ni, uleku ɔdi ɔ́va ku lɛdi momoomo na bekyuli akɔ mmɔ na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Lɛlɔ lɛyɔ uleku ɔni náwɔ-ɔ na úte-ɔ lɛnyi na ányimi!”
42011028	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bekyuli bani muunú Katɔti litemi na baabla taasiaku-ni lɛlɔ mmomu na lɛlɔ lɛyɔ!”
42011029	Amu ka bekyuli bammɔ beemomo Yesu kudɔ teebu ni, úsie anumi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛnu kalɛ na ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli bebo likyulikpi! Akɔla budie bɔtina na baawia banu, nsu balanu budie bɔtina bɔdi uti utulo Yona bɔdi.
42011030	Kalɛ kani na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yona ɔdi likposela ute Niniweƒuɔ ni, lɛni kani na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛnɔ wenwini likposela wete ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli.
42011031	Na litemi bɔtɛ limeyi ni, Uleku Ɔga ɔni nási kada kakɛ ɔdubɔta unye na ubo-mii lɛnimi enwu, ɔsika ɔ́ta ɔ́si nwuna kalɔ úsie ɔgyu kakaaka ɔnii úténu Ɔga Salomo lɛnunda ala bɔtina. Nsu mɔɔsu-mii nnii ukyuli ɔni ntulo Salomo ɔkya mɛni.
42011032	Niniweƒuɔ badubɔta benye na bebo-mii lɛnimi enwu na litemi bɔtɛ limeyi. Ɔsika uwi ɔni na Yona ɔ́su-ma Katɔti litemi ni, bávumana udu na bénwini bana ekpidi kudɔ. Nsu mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, ukyuli ɔdi ɔkya-mii akɔ mɛni na utulo Yona!
42011033	“Ukyuli ɔdi ulátu asogya na uuti taabɛla iye ubi-nwu ala. Mmomu buti na uuti taasia likpo lɛni na bekyuli bani muuduo mmɔ banu nwaa.
42011034	Buse na ukyuli anumi ese aani asogya ute nwuna ɔlɔna. Si anumi aanu-ɔ kaduɛ ni, awɔ ukyuli umodi ɔmmɔ ni, use-ɔ nwaa ɔ́ka ɔ́mana. Nsu si ƒula anumi aaadia ni, agyi anii awɔ ukyuli ɔmmɔ akya lɛdisa kemo.
42011035	Anwuɔsu sia lɛlɔ anu na ati ka bukeye bɔni na bɔkya-a lɛlɔ kemo bɔɔɔdi lɛdisa.
42011036	Si bukeye bɔ́ƒɔ-ɔ lɛlɔ ƒui na ƒula kakɛ kadi kaaakya lɛdisa kemo ni, agyi anii kesii biala kadubo bukeye kalɛ kani na si asogya ɔɔda na nwuna bekeye buuwi-ɔ na use kalɛ.”
42011037	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ butemi ni, Ƒarisini ɔdi ɔ́lɔ-nwu bɔdi na nwuna kaduli. Amu na úsie útélie kalɔ na ɔtɔ kemo na baadi.
42011038	Ɔ́bla Ƒarisini ɔmmɔ dɛye dɛye ka ɔ́nu ka Yesu útaƒɔ kɔnu kalɛ na ɔdi ɔmmɔ ɔɔtina asa na úse kalɔ ku bɔdi.
42011039	Anwuɔsu Blɔti ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ɔƒaani ni, amii Ƒarisiƒuɔ bɛɛƒɔ bina akyami ku lɛɛƒɛɛ kama, nsu bina lɛlɔ kemo geen anwu ni, likyulikpi ku kalala bɔbla bɔ́ƒɔ-ni ƒui.
42011040	Badɔlɔdi! Ɔɔɔdi Katɔti ɔmmɔ kani na ábla ala ƒui kemo ku kama yoo?
42011041	Biti ala ani ƒui nkya bina akyami ku lɛɛƒɛɛ kemo mmɔ bite bawabane kalɛ na bina lɛla biala lɛbla sɛɛn.
42011042	“Bɔbwɛ muute amii Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Biiti bina edula lɛkpa leevudi ku kevoma kutu akyala ƒɛƒɛɛ aani evete lidu lidu teete Katɔti. Nsu biiní ka utalɛka bɛnu bekyuli anumi bɛbla ala, na bilayɔ Katɔti lɛnɔ. Amɛni na ɔdi ka bɛbla bibunku ala ani na bɛdaku, na ɔɔɔdi ka bɛda ɔdi bise.
42011043	“Bɔbwɛ muute amii Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Ɔsika bɛɛwia ka bilie kuliekɔ kunengudi na bina kasalakɔ. Na bɛɛwia ka bekyuli bataakya-mii kenye ku ɔbu na kuyeya.
42011044	“Bɔbwɛ muute-mii, ɔsika bise aani kɔƒiɔtɔ kɔni na bétese-ku likpo, na bekyuli beesié taavi-ku lɛlɔ ɔsika baaagyi.”
42011045	Amu na ɔda bubo ala batinane akɔ unwi ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ala ɔtinane, si ásu ɔmɛni ni, eedumi abu lɛnɔ.”
42011046	Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bɔbwɛ muute amii ɔda bubo ala batinane lɛnɔ. Etila ani na bekyuli balakana buti ni, anya bɛɛtɛ taasia bekyuli kama. Na bilábla kasusu bɛnii biibunku-ma na bakana etila ammɔ buti.
42011047	“Bɔbwɛ muute-mii geen, ɔsika bɛɛtú kɔƒiɔtɔ kɔbuni teete Katɔti kenye bediene. Nsu Katɔti kenye bediene bammɔ geen na bina bati kuuku bádu.
42011048	Na amii alati bɛɛƒɔ́ ɔmɛni enu ka lɛla lɛni na bina bati bammɔ bábla lɛdia-mii. Ama bádu Katɔti kenye bediene na amii bɛ́tu bana kɔƒiɔtɔ.
42011049	Ɔmɛni ɔsu na Katɔti lɛnunda lɛ́su lɛnii, 'Ndubɔtala Katɔti kenye bediene ku batu lɛkya-ma na badubɔdu badi na badubukpoku bakladi.'
42011050	Anwuɔsu ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli ƒui ni, badubo-ma kɔtu bɔni na Katɔti kenye bediene bani ƒui na bádu ɔ́si kayawi kamɛni kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui ɔsu.
42011051	Ɔ́si ɔni bádu Abel úbedu Sakaria ɔni na bádu na lɛkpabi ku kesii kani na baalɔ banii likpo kedee ntɛ. Lɛni geen mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, Katɔti ɔdubo ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli kɔtu bɔni na bana ƒui ɔsu!
42011052	“Bɔbwɛ muute amii ɔda bubo ala batinane! Ɔsika ɔtɔ ɔni kemo na lɛnunda lɛkya ni, bɛ́kalɛ kayakun kammɔ bíse. Nsu amii alati bini bɛnii bileduo. Na biitile bekyuli bamba bani mɔɔwia beduo lɛnɔ kuƒi.”
42011053	Ka Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ likpo lɛmmɔ ni, Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bese kalɔ ku Yesu litemi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ kɔnyi buti, na beedie-ni bɔƒiɔ taasu ala lidu lidu.
42011054	Na bakya baawia ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na basia bakya-nwu litemi kenye na ɔbla likpidi lɛdi.
42012001	Ka bekyuli mpimu mpimu badi bábasa mmɔ ɔni na baanya lɛlɔ muedi ni, Yesu ɔ́ka nwuna batɛyane bɔsu ɔnini, “Binye kagyumana kaduɛ na Ƒarisiƒuɔ ɔkɔ ablala ani muuƒú bekyuli mmɔ lɛlɔ.
42012002	Ala ani ƒui na bekyuli bábla bábɛ ni, adubo bɔda bɔlɛ keyi nwaa.
42012003	Anwuɔsu lɛla biala na bɛ́su na kasuudikɔ ni, ɔdubɔlɛ keyi. Na kabɛsɛ iye katɔma kɔtɛ biala na bɛ́su ni, ɔtɔ katɔ na badubo-ku lɛsa bɔkɔ.
42012004	“Bakpana, mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, bitayia bekyuli bani na ɔlɔna kani na badubɔkana bɔdu na ɔmmɔ kama na basɔ balakana lɛla lɛdi bɔbla.
42012005	Ukyuli ɔni na ɔlɛka bɛyia ni, ndubo-mii bɔtina. Bɛyia Katɔti ɔni na si ɔ́du-ɔ ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, na ɔsɔ ubo ɔyikun na uti-ɔ ubo ɔkya lɛgyavonku lɛni mɔɔda uwi ƒui kemo. Bɛƒɔ-mi bɛdi ka ni, anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni na ɔlɛka bɛyia.
42012006	Ɔɔɔdi kaplɛ inyɔ kani na beeyé baasɛ wɛlɛ wɛlɛ ɛlɔ? Nsu Katɔti anu alávia ɔdi lɛlɔ.
42012007	Bula lili linwini muedi ni, Katɔti ɔgyi-ni bumomo. Anwuɔsu ni, bɛda bɔyia bɛya ɔsika bɛ́ƒɔ kuye bitulo baasɛ pii.
42012008	“Mɔɔsu-mii nwaa ka ni, ukyuli ɔni masu na kadi anumi ka ɔdi mina ɔdi ni, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛnɔ ɔdubɔsu lɛni kani na Katɔti batu anumi na nwuna lɛlɔ.
42012009	Nsu ukyuli ɔni meni-mi na kadi anumi ni, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛnɔ weni-nwu na Katɔti batu ƒui anumi.
42012010	Na ukyuli biala ɔni masu lɛla lɛdi na wata wenye Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubuti ɔkyiɛ-nwu. Nsu ukyuli ɔni matɛmi enyekpi Katɔti Kɔyu lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti uleti ulakyiɛ-nwu.
42012011	“Si bákpanku-mii bésienku Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ iye batɔnkune iye bagadine anumi banii baatɛku-mii litemi ni, ɔƒɛ utada-mii bɛnii bi na bɛdubo bɔsu iye dɛ na bɛdubudie lɛlɔ kenye.
42012012	Ɔsika Katɔti Kɔyu kɔdubɔtina-mii na uwi ɔmmɔ kani lɛlɔ lɛla lɛni na bɛdubo bɔsu.”
42012013	Ukyuli ɔdi ɔkya bekyuli akɔ mmɔ na ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Ala ɔtinane, su mina ɔnwani na ule bula ɔti kadikɔ kani na ɔ́da úse-bu ute-mi.”
42012014	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔnana, ɔma néte-mi kuƒi ɔnii nle ala iye ntɛ litemi na bina inyɔ ntɛ?”
42012015	Amu na ɔ́su bana ƒui ɔnini, “Bɛsia lɛlɔ anu na binye lɛlɔ kagyumana na ɔdivo udu biala bɔdi lɛlɔ, ɔsika ukyuli ngba geen bɔɔɔkɛnku ala ani nse-nwu lɛlɔ ina dɛ na ɔdi ɔlakɛne.”
42012016	Amu na Yesu úbo-ma lɛgba lɛmɛni ɔnini, “Ɔlakɛne ɔdi ɔ́kya dii ɔni na ubo kalɔ buni kani náya na nwuna edula ádia geen.
42012017	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔ́bla kasusu ɔnii, 'Ka liiibo kesii kani makya mina edula amɛni ni, bi na ɔlɛka lɛbla?
42012018	“ 'Lɛla lɛni ndubɔbla ndi ɔnii ndubugyingya mina edula kakyakɔ kakukudi na lɛbla kawɔdi kani na kébomo kétulo kamɛni. Mmɔ na ndubɔkɛ kesii kani na makya mina edula ƒui.
42012019	Na ndubɔsu lɛlɔ nnii kuli kɔdia-mii. Ala buni ani ƒui ása-mi ute akwa pii. Ndubɔnwuna, na lɛdi, na lɛni, na lɛkya lɛlɔ ebiti.'
42012020	“Nsu Katɔti anwu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Awɔ ɔdɔlɔdi! Usien ɔmɛni kani na adubo ƒula ngba bɔda buse. Na ɔma ndubɔdi ala ani na áwia ése éte lɛlɔ mɛni?' ”
42012021	Amu na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ nwuna kɔtɛ ɔnini, “Lɛni na use ute bekyuli bani mɔɔwia akɛla batɛ bese lɛlɔ, na beeebo lɛla lɛdi na Katɔti anumi.”
42012022	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Anwuɔsu na mɔɔsu-mii nnii bitekpoku lɛlɔ na lɛla lɛni na bɛdi bilie ngba lɛlɔ iye ɔlɔna adala lɛlɔ.
42012023	Ngba bɔ́ƒɔ kuye butulo adila, na ɔlɔna lɛnɔ ɔ́ƒɔ kuye utulo adala.
42012024	Bɛnu baasɛ na kayaa ka balágya na baláƒɛ edula lɛnɔ. Beeebo linwu iye edula kakyakɔ. Nsu Katɔti uute-ma bɔdi! Na amii bɛ́ƒɔ kuye bitulo baasɛ kukuuku.
42012025	Bɛɛkali ka ɔdi wakana ngba bulie gyɔlɔɔ butulo nwuna uwi ina blii suɛ na nwuna lɛlɔ bukpoku ɔsu?
42012026	Na si bɛɛɛdubo lɛla lɛdi bɔkana bɔbla na ala wɛlɛ wɛlɛ amɛni lɛlɔ ni, bi ɔsu na biikpóku lɛlɔ na ala bamba lɛnɔ lɛlɔ.
42012027	“Bɛnu kalɛ na anwula ani mɔɔdia bɔnu aalɛ́ lili. Balábla kabla kadi iye beledi adi teete lɛlɔ. Nsu mɔɔsu-mii nnii Ɔga Salomo muedi ku nwuna lɛkɛ ƒui ni, útakɛ adala ani ndia édu anwula amɛni.
42012028	Katɔti muute livo lɛmɛni bɔdia bɔmɛni udu. Livo lɛmɛni linye ɔmwi na uwi bamba na bekulo-ni bakya ogya na bakyula-ni na livongu kemo. Bute na Katɔti ɔmmɔ ulete-mii adala uletulo livo lɛmmɔ? Bi ɔsu na bina bɔƒɔtaadi buse blii suɛ lɛni?
42012029	Anwuɔsu bitayia na anumi eteegyie-mii na biteeye bɛnii bi na bɔdubɔdi iye bi na bɔdubɔni.
42012030	Ɔsika bekyuli bani nátaƒɔ Katɔti bátadi ni, ama mɔɔsia ala amɛni anu uwi ndi uwi. Bina Ɔti ɔgyi ka ala amɛni ƒui adi ala ani na bɛɛwia.
42012031	Mmomu ni, biteeti kasusu na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ lɛlɔ na ɔdubuti ala amɛni ƒui ute-mii.
42012032	“Mina basiakune lisu libliidi, bitayia. Ɔsika ɔdi Katɔti lɛƒɔyɔ ka ute-mii nwuna lɛga kadikɔ.
42012033	Biti bina lɛlɔ ala biye na bile egulabi ammɔ bite bawabane. Na bɛwia egulabi kɔvumi kɔni na bɛgyi ka kulatɔ bise katɔ bite lɛlɔ. Mmɔ na bina akɛla adubuse kpoo na alaƒana kudii. Ɔsika uyune ɔdi ulakana mmɔ buduo, na kubweyi kɔni muubile ala lɛnɔ kulakana-nya bubile.
42012034	Ɔsika kesii kani na bina akɛla ese ni, mmɔ na bina kɔyi lɛnɔ kɔdubɔkya.
42012035	“Bɛklibi lɛlɔ bise bite lɛla biala mebo, na bɛtu akpagya. Na bina likpo liteni.
42012036	Na binye lɛni aani kabla bablane bani nnye bagya bana Unwoti ka ɔsi uleku ketikɔ ɔda ubalɛ. Na si úbo na uubó kɔnu kegbuta ni, na balɛmi bete-nwu kɔnakunwi.
42012037	Kabla bablane bammɔ badubɔkɛ ebiti geen si bana Unwoti úbanu-ma ka benye kagyumana bete nwuna bɔsɔ bubo! Mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, ɔdubɔsabla kɔdi lɛlɔ use, na ɔya na belie kalɔ na anwu alati ute-ma adila na badi.
42012038	Na ina usientɛ iye kadi ƒulu ƒulu na webo na wabanu-ma ka benye kagyumana ni, nu ebiti ani udu na wabla-ma!
42012039	Ɔƒɛni ni, bɛdubɔnu bɛti ka si bɔti na kaduli ɔlati wati uwi na uyune webeyu-nwu ni, nka ulete-nwu kuƒi na wabwɛ weduo-nwu ɔtɔ.
42012040	Anwuɔsu na ɔlɛka amii lɛnɔ binye kagyumana, ɔsika ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndububo mbeyu-mii lɛtu.”
42012041	Amu na Petro úye Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, abu na lɛgba lɛmɛni lɛdanku, munuu ukyuli biala na ada?”
42012042	Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Kabla ɔblane ɔni náda anu na ɔɔbla ulu lɛlɔ ni, anwu na nwuna Unwoti uuti teenyene kabla bablane bakladi kenye. Na anwu ndubute kabla bablane bakladi bana lɛdila kalɛ na ɔ́manku na uwi ɔbuni kemo.
42012043	Nu, si kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔ́kana na ɔɔbla ɔmɛni kaduɛ asa na nwuna Unwoti úbo ni, ɔdubɔbla ebiti bonwu geen ute kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ!
42012044	Geen geen ni, mɔɔsu-mii nnii Unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔdubuti kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ unyene nwuna ala ƒui kenye.
42012045	Nsu si kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Mina Unwoti úsela útákya ulu na uwi utu,' ɔsu na úse kalɔ ɔɔdi na ɔɔní ntɛ teekpi na uubó kabla bablane bakladi bani ndi banana ku beleku ƒui na ɔɔbla-ma kalala ni,
42012046	nwuna Unwoti ɔdububo ubeyu-nwu ɔtu ɔni na ɔɔɔgyi uuuse. Mmɔ ni, Unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔni-nwu kɔtu kpakplaa kɔni námanku batuɔkplune bammɔ udu.
42012047	“Kabla ɔblane ɔni ngyi lɛla lɛni na nwuna Unwoti ɔɔwia ka nka ɔbla ute-nwu nsu uuní-ni bɔbla ka útada lɛlɔ útese ɔsu ni, bubo na badubo-nwu bubo na ebola eduo-nwu lɛlɔ.
42012048	Nsu kabla ɔblane ɔni naaagyi lɛla lɛni na nwuna Unwoti ɔɔwia ka ɔbla nsu ɔ́bla lɛla lɛni na bani-nwu kɔtu ni, nwuna kɔtu bɔni bɔɔbla blii suɛ. Si ukyuli ɔni na béte-ɔ ala pii ni, lɛni kani na ɔlɛka abla ala pii. Na ukyuli ɔni na béte-ɔ ala pii betulo ni, lɛni kani na ɔlɛka abla kabla pii etulo.
42012049	“Líti Katɔti kɔtu bɔni líboku bekyuli akɔ ɔni nse aani ogya kalɛ. Na mɔɔwia geen ka nka ogya ɔmmɔ úuse kalɔ ɔdaku bɔda.
42012050	Lɛƒɛda bonwu lɛdi lɛdubo-mi lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na ketu keeti ukyuli. Na liiibo bɔnwuna bɔdi úti utédu uwi ɔni na lɛƒɛda lɛmɛni líbo líbavi.
42012051	Bɔkali bɛda bɛnii keyi buɛɛ na líti líboku kayawi? Oowo! Ɔɔɔdi keyi buɛɛ, mmomu lɛlɔ bugyingyaku na bɔdi.
42012052	Na ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ni, kaduli kani kemo na nkyuli ɛlɔ bakya ni, badubo lɛlɔ bule. Inyɔ bata benye ɛtɛ lɛlɔ.
42012053	Ubi ɔti wata wenye bananabi lɛlɔ, na bananabi bata benye bana ɔti lɛlɔ. Bebi beni badubɔta benye bana belekubi lɛlɔ, na belekubi lɛnɔ bata benye bana beni lɛlɔ. Na begyieni badubɔta benye bana bebi bele lɛlɔ, na bebi bata benye bana begyieni lɛlɔ.”
42012054	Yesu ɔ́su bekyuli bammɔ lɛnɔ ɔnini, “Si bɛ́nu ka uyɔlɔ úminime lɛlɔ ɔ́si ɔƒɛ kanukɔ na kayaa ni, bɛɛsu kɔnakunwi ka ɔnantu ɔdubo bɔna. Na ɔɔlɛ́ lɛni.
42012055	Na si bɛ́nu bɛ́ti ka kada kakɛ ɔƒɛƒɛɛ uukpó ni, bɛɛsu ka liwulu lɛdubo. Na ɔɔlɛ́ lɛni.
42012056	Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli, ka bɛɛnu kalɔ ku kayaa na bɛɛtí uwi taatina ni, bi ɔsu na bilenu uwi ɔmɛni anwu kalɔ?
42012057	“Bi ɔsu na bileduo ala kemo taanu lɛbuni lɛni na ɔlɛka bɛbla bɛti?
42012058	Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́lɔ-ɔ katɛ na litemi katɛkɔ ka awɔ ku-nwu bɛ́kɛ lɛla lɛdi ni, sia ulu biala lɛlɔ na bɛklibi litemi lɛmmɔ asa na biduo litemi katɛkɔ. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, ɔdubuti-ɔ ute litemi batɛne ku beƒiene na bakya-a ɔtɔ.
42012059	Na mɔɔyá-a na ati ka mmɔ na adubo bɔkya wetédu uwi ɔni na áƒɔ ƒula kɔtu bɔni kayu étédu kawɔlɔkɔ.”
42013001	Lebo lɛmmɔ ni, bekyuli badi bakya mmɔ bani násu Yesu kalɛ na Pilato ɔ́du Galileaƒuɔ badi uwi ɔni na bákya bátaabla akpala teete Katɔti.
42013002	Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bɛɛbu bɛnii ka bádu Galileaƒuɔ bammɔ lɛni ɔsu ni, ama ndi alaekpidi bablane benengudi ntulo Galileaƒuɔ bakladi ƒui?
42013003	Oowo, ɔɔɔdi lɛni kudii! Nsu bɔsu nda-mii nnii si bítada bina ala ekpidi bɔbla bítaya ni, lɛni kani na amii lɛnɔ bɛdubo bukpi.
42013004	Na nkyuli leevu-maane bani na Siloa ɔtɔ ubendi ɔmmɔ ɔ́ƒɛ úbo na békpi nɔɔ? Bɛɛkali ka ɔmɛni ɔsu ama ndi bekyuli bekpidi ntulo ama bani nli Yerusalem mmɔ ƒui?
42013005	Oowo, ɔɔɔdi lɛni kudii! Mɔɔsu-mii ka si bítavumana udu ni, lɛni kani na bina ƒui bɛdubo bukpi aani ama kalɛ.”
42013006	Amu na Yesu úbo-ma lɛgba lɛmɛni ɔnini, “Uwi ɔdi kemo ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni na ubo kɔdingyii kɔdi na nwuna kemo. Úsie ɔnii utáwia kugyii kɔmɛni ebi, nsu útakɛ adi.
42013007	Amu na ɔ́su nwuna kemo kammɔ lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔnii, 'Nu! Akwa atɛ sɔɔn mɛni ka muubo mɛni taabawia kugyii kɔmɛni ebi taanɔ. Da-ku va kalɔ, ɔsika kuuubo lɛblakula na kalɔ kani lɛlɔ na kunye mmɔ.'
42013008	“Nsu kemo lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, 'Ati, nyonu-ku na kɔsɔ kunye lɛkwa linwi pɛ bɔnu. Ndubuku-ku kalɔ na lɛkya-ku ala ani ndubɔya na kalɔ kammɔ kelie lɛmwi na bɔnu.
42013009	Na si kɔ́kana ebi bonwu ni, ɔdia. Nsu si útakana bɔnwu ni, akana na ada-ku ava kalɔ.' ”
42013010	Na lɛnwunameyi lɛdi lɛlɔ ni, Yesu ɔkya ɔɔtina ala na Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ kadi.
42013011	Na uleku ɔdi lɛnɔ ɔ́kya mmɔ ɔni na kɔyu kukpidi kɔdi kuukpóku akwa leevu-maane sɔɔn. Kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔ́ya na kalɔ kani na uleku ɔmmɔ úbo ɔkɛ uwi biala ɔni na ulakana na unye ligeen.
42013012	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́nu-nwu ni, ɔ́kpali-nwu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Uleku, ƒula ɔlɛ ɔ́ba-a!”
42013013	Na Yesu úti nwuna enu ɔ́sia uleku ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Na kɔna kunwi ni, uleku ɔmmɔ ɔ́ta únye ligeen na úmwi Katɔti.
42013014	Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ɔnune úti kɔnyi geen sɔsɔ na ɔni na Yesu ɔ́bwi ɔlɛne na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ɔsu. Anwuɔsu ɔ́su bekyuli bammɔ ƒui ɔnini, “Bubo emeyi aku ani buti bɔbla bula kabla. Anwuɔsu bibo na emeyi amɛni kemo si lɛla lɛdi lɛda bina akɔ ɔdi na babwi-nwu, na ɔɔɔdi lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ!”
42013015	Mmɔ na Blɔti údie kenye na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Amii, anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli, biidie bebuo bani mɔɔbla-mii kabla iye beeti-mii ala lɛbuli na bɛɛkpanku-ma teesienku ntu kanikɔ.
42013016	Na ɔƒɛni ni, bɛɛnu Abraham kaba kemo ubi nnye mɛni ɔni na Satan úbo lɛkpu akwa leevu-maane sɔɔn mɛni. Ɔɔɔdia ka baƒɛnimi-nwu abuli ammɔ na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ?”
42013017	Kenye kani na Yesu údie mɛni ɔ́ya na kɔƒa kúkpo nwuna bekisine, na bekyuli bakladi bákɛ ebiti na akɔla budie taatina ani ƒui na ɔ́bla ɔsu.
42013018	Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bɛgyi kalɛ na Katɔti lɛga bɔdi litemi bugyingya buse? Na bi na ɔlɛka buti-mu bɔmanku?
42013019	Bɛnu! Ɔnana ɔdi úti edula kebi blii suɛ kadi útáva nwuna kemo. Ka edula kebi kamɛni kákwɛ ni, kébenwini kugyii bonwu na baasɛ bábatu ayu bákya-ku kɔgba akɔ.”
42013020	Yesu ɔ́sɔ úbo-ma lɛgba lɛbambadi ɔnini, “Katɔti lɛga bɔdi litemi bugyingya buse aani ɔmɛni.
42013021	Uleku ɔdi úti bɔnyii ɔ́salaku ɔlaaƒɔ koƒo kunwi, na ɔ́nwu ɔ́sala útédu uwi ɔni na bɔnyii bɔmmɔ bɔ́ƒɔ ɔlaaƒɔ ɔmmɔ ƒui na úƒu.”
42013022	Yesu úsie ɔ́vi lɛma ku akpaklɔ kemo na ɔ́tina bekyuli ala uwi ɔni na úsela Yerusalem.
42013023	Mmɔ na ukyuli ɔdi úye-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, bekyuli bani na ndubɔkɛ bɔƒɔ ni, baaadubo bumomo yoo?” Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini,
42013024	“Kya ɔkplu na asia kayakun kani nse blii suɛ kemo eduo. Ɔsika bekyuli pii badubɔwia geen banii baasia mmɔ beduo, nsu balakana.
42013025	Uwi ɔdubo ubedu ɔni na Unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔta na ɔkalɛ kayakun kammɔ. Na amii bani nébu binye keyi bɛdubo kɔnu kayakun buteebo bɛnii, 'Ati, lɛmi-bu!' “Nsu Unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔdubudie kenye ɔnii, 'Lɛɛɛgyi-mii!'
42013026	“Na bɛdubɔsu bɛnii, 'Abu ku-ɔ nádi na bɔ́ni, na átina ala na bula ɔma!'
42013027	“Nsu anwu ɔdubɔsɔ udie kenye ɔnii, 'Lɛɛɛgyi-mii! Bɛkpɛ bisie-mii lɛlɔ, amii bekyuli bekpidi.'
42013028	“Mmɔ na keku ku animi bɔdu bɔdubɔkya uwi ɔni na bɛdubɔnu Abraham ku Isak ku Yakob ku Katɔti kenye bediene ƒui na Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma uwi ɔni kemo na Katɔti ɔ́gya-mii ɔnii biteduo.
42013029	Bekyuli badubɔsi ɔƒɛ katukɔ ku kanukɔ bebo. Na basi katɔ kakɛ ku kada kakɛ babasala na badi na bani na Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma.
42013030	Na bekyuli bani ndi bekplodi ni, badubunwini bedeedi. Na bani ndi bedeedi ni, badubunwini bekplodi.”
42013031	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi bébo Yesu kudɔ na bábasu-nwu banii, “Babla na avi alɛ mɛni kɔnakunwi eteesie likpo bamba, ɔsika Ɔga Herode ɔɔwia ka ɔdu-ɔ.”
42013032	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bisie na bitásu uƒukutu ɔmmɔ ka lɛ́su lɛnii, 'Ɔmwi ni, ndubo ayu ekpidi bɔgya na lɛbwi bekyuli lɛlɛ lɛni na beeƒi utálɛ kɔnaadi. Na limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛlɔ ni, ndubɔwɔlɔ mina kabla.'
42013033	Anwuɔsu ɔ́bla bi ɔ́bla dɛ ni, ndubusie anumi ɔmwi utálɛ kɔnaadi ku keegye. Ɔsika útalɛka badu Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi na likpo bamba si ɔɔɔdi Yerusalem ɔma kemo.
42013034	“Yerusalem, Yerusalem! Awɔ mɔɔdú Katɔti kenye bediene, na awɔ muubó Katɔti batalane bani na ɔ́tala ɔ́kya-a atabi. Kɔlɛ kɔlɛ sɔɔn mɛni ka líbimi mina enu nnii mɔɔsála-mii aani kalɛ na akɔkɔ uledi uuti nwuna avwi teebi nwuna bebi lɛlɔ, nsu étenu kalɔ.
42013035	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Katɔti ɔdubudie ɔma ɔmɛni atu. Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, bɛsɔ bɛɛɛdubo-mi bɔnu wetédu uwi ɔni na bɛdubɔsu bɛnii, 'Bimwi anwu ɔni ndubo na Blɔti lɛnyi kemo!' ”
42014001	Na lɛnwunameyi lɛdi lɛlɔ ni, Yesu úsie Ƒarisiƒuɔ benengu akɔ unwi ɔdi kesii likpo lɛni na bálɔ-nwu banii ubadi. Na bekyuli bakya baatú-nwu kpakplaa.
42014002	Mmɔ na ɔnana ɔdi na lɛgba ku enu eeƒu-nwu úbo-nwu kudɔ.
42014003	Amu na Yesu úye ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ ɔnini, “Bula ɔda bubo búte-bu ulu ka bɔbwi ukyuli na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ, munuu bútete-bu ulu?”
42014004	Nsu bátakana kenye bubimi bɔsu lɛla lɛdi. Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́kpɛ ukyuli ɔmɛni úsienku kɔƒɛlɛ na ɔ́bwi-nwu na ɔ́ya-nwu na ɔ́tɔlɔ.
42014005	Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si bina ɔdi ubo ubi iye ebuo ɔni muuti ala na ɔ́nu libiɔ lɛdi kemo na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ni, bɛɛɛdubo-nwu budie na lɛnwunameyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ kɔnakunwi?”
42014006	Nsu bátakana-nwu kenye budie.
42014007	Ka Yesu ɔ́nu ɔ́ti kalɛ na bekyuli bani na bálɔ-ma béboku likpo lɛdi bakya baanwanɛ kuliekɔ kɔni na kɔ́ƒɔ kuye ni, úbo-ma lɛgba lɛdi ɔnini,
42014008	“Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́lɔ-ɔ ɔnii bo-nwu uleku ketikɔ ni, tetélie likpo lɛni na lɛ́ƒɔ kuye litulo. Ɔsika ɔƒɛni kalɛ ɔ́lɔ ukyuli ɔni náƒɔ kuye utulo-ɔ lɛnɔ na mmɔ.
42014009	Na ukyuli ɔni nálɔ bina inyɔ ƒui úboku mmɔ ulasu-ɔ ɔnii, 'Ya na ukyuli ɔmɛni ubelie mmɔ.' Na alata eletélie likpo lɛni nátaƒɔ kuye ku kɔƒa.
42014010	Mmomu si bálɔ-ɔ bésienku likpo lɛdi ni, sie télie likpo lɛni nátaƒɔ kuye. Na si ukyuli ɔni nálɔ-ɔ úboku mmɔ úbo ni, na ubasu-ɔ ɔnii, 'Ɔkpana, ta mmɔ na ebelie likpo lɛni náƒɔ kuye mɛni.' Na ɔmɛni ɔdubɔkɔliku-ɔ katɔ na bekyuli bakladi bani na bálɔ béboku mmɔ ƒui anumi.
42014011	Ɔsika ukyuli biala ɔni makɔli lɛlɔ katɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdububoku-nwu kalɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔni meboku lɛlɔ kalɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔkɔliku-nwu katɔ.”
42014012	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su ukyuli ɔni nálɔ-nwu ɔnii ubo kadikɔ mmɔ ɔnini, “Si álɔ bekyuli anii bebo na babadi na ƒula kesii ni, talɔ bakpana iye ƒula banwani iye lɛlɔ bekyuli iye ƒula bekutene bani ndi balakɛne. Ɔsika ama lɛnɔ badubɔlɔ-ɔ lɛni kani banii bo na abadi. Na si úbo lɛni ni, agyi anii lɛla lɛni na ábla éte-ma lɛyuƒɔla na básɔku beete-ɔ mmɔ.
42014013	Mmomu si aadi limeyi lɛmɛni udu ni, lɔ bawabane ku bekyuli bani naaakana busie kaduɛ ku bani náƒɛ bewi kalɔ ku bani na anumi ábwɛ-ma.
42014014	Ɔmɛni ɔdubɔya na Katɔti ute-ɔ kusɛ kusɛ. Ɔsika bekyuli bammɔ baaadubo-ɔ kayu kadi bɔkana bɔƒɔ. Katɔti ndubɔƒɔ-ɔ kayu na limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na bekyuli babuni badubɔsɔ bata bási bekpine akɔ.”
42014015	Ka bekyuli bani nlie kadikɔ mmɔ akɔ unwi únu litemi lɛmɛni ni, ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Kubiti geen ndubɔda bekyuli bani ndubo babadi Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma.”
42014016	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Dii ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́lɔ bekyuli pii badi na limeyi libendi lɛdi kadikɔ.
42014017	Ka uwi údu ka bese bɔdi ku bɔni kalɔ ni, ɔ́tala nwuna kabla bablane ɔnii batásu nwuna bekyuli bani ƒui na ɔ́lɔ na bebo. Ɔsika lɛla biala lɛ́ɛsadi!
42014018	“Nsu bana ƒui bése kalɔ atɔ asia ku kuƒi buvele. Ukyuli udeedi ɔ́su kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔnii, 'Líye kalɔ kadi na ɔdi ka lisie ntánu-ka. Anwuɔsu su-nwu anii, “Buvele, naaakana bubo.” '
42014019	“Ɔbambadi lɛnɔ ɔnii, 'Líye ɔmantɛ bakɔ leevu bani mebunku-mi na kemo. Na ulu ndaku bɔyu ntábla-ma lɛnu kalɛ na badubo bɔkana bɔtuma. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, su-nwu anii, “Buvele, naaakana bubo.” '
42014020	“Ɔbambadi lɛnɔ ɔnii, 'Ɔƒɛni kani na búti lɛlɔ na báwɛɛ-bu ɔgya ku ule, anwuɔsu naaakana bubo.'
42014021	“Kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie útásu nwuna Unwoti ala amɛni ƒui. Mmɔ ni, Unwoti ɔmmɔ úti kɔnyi geen na ɔ́su nwuna kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔnini, 'Babla na esie lilu lɛlɔ ku ekpo ani ƒui na akpanku bawabane ku bekyuli bani naaakana busie kaduɛ ku bani na anumi ábwɛ-ma ku bani ƒui náƒɛ bewi kalɔ eboku.'
42014022	“Amu na kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ úsie útábla lɛni. Na ɔ́sɔ únwini úbasu nwuna Unwoti ka ɔ́lɔ-ma, nsu kuliekɔ pii kɔ́sɔ kúbu.
42014023	“Amu na Unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Sie na asia umolu ku akpaklɔ lilu na akya ɔkplu na akpanku bekyuli ƒui eboku kalɛ na mina ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo ƒui keyi.
42014024	Na mɔɔsu-ɔ nwaa nnii bekyuli bani ƒui na lɛ́lɔ nnii bebo kadikɔ ni, ɔdi biala ulétuku mina adila amɛni kenye ulanu!' ”
42014025	Uwi ɔdi ka bekyuli pii badi basiaku Yesu ni, únwini na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini,
42014026	“Ukyuli biala ɔni muubo-mi kudɔ ni, ulakana-mi bɔtɛya si ulayɔ-mi teetulo ɔti ku uni ku ulekudi ku bebi ku nwuna banwani bananabi ku belekubi ku anwu ɔlati lɛlɔ muedi.
42014027	Si ukyuli ɔni naaadubo bɔkana na ubo abi aani ami kalɛ na ɔsiaku-mi kama ni, ulakana-mi bɔtɛya.
42014028	“Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔwia ka ɔtu ɔtɔ bonwu ɔdi ni, ɔɔka kalɔ bulie na ɔɔbu atula ammɔ ƒui kuye taanu si ubo egulabi ammɔ udu ɔyikun kalɛ na wakana ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ bɔwɔlɔ asa na use kalɔ.
42014029	Na si útakana ɔmɛni bɔbla ni, ulakana ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ bɔwɔlɔ, ina ɔ́nwu lɛti ku atabi kpakplaa ɔ́kya awodu kalɔ ɔ́wɔlɔ. Na si bekyuli bani nnye amadɔ bánu ɔmɛni báti ni, badubo-nwu butaama banii,
42014030	'Ukyuli ɔmɛni úse ɔtɔ bɔtu kalɔ, nsu útakana bɔwɔlɔ.'
42014031	“Si ɔga ɔdi ɔ́ta kekpo ku nwuna bekpone mpimu leevu na útásiaku ɔga ɔbambadi ɔni mbo bekpone mpimu aavlanyɔ ni, ɔɔsɔku lili kemo taabu kaduɛ si nwuna ɔyikun ɔni na ubo ɔdubɔya na unye ɔsiaku nwuna ukisine ɔmmɔ.
42014032	Na si ɔ́nu ka uuubo ɔyikun ɔmmɔ udu ni, ɔdubɔtala nwuna batu na besie batásiaku ɔga ɔmmɔ na bevele-nwu na basɔ belékpo na benwini bakpana mmomu asa na ɔga ɔmmɔ ɔda ɔlɛ muedi.”
42014033	Amu na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ nwuna kɔtɛ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lɛni kani na bina akɔ ɔdi ulakana-mi bɔtɛya si útada atu útedie lɛla biala lɛlɔ.
42014034	“Mma bubo emini. Nsu si emini ása mma kemo ni, ulu ɔdi biala ɔsɔ uuubo na bakya-mu emini lɛnɔ.
42014035	Ɔɔɔdi lɛla lɛni na beti bakya kalɔ lɛmwi na útamanku kebu muedi. Buwiakun na beewiakun-mu. “Anwuɔsu bibimi atu na binu-mi kalɔ kaduɛ!”
42015001	Limeyi lɛdi ni, kuyi baƒɔne pii ku alaekpidi bablane babambadi bébo Yesu kudɔ banii bebenu-nwu litemi.
42015002	Mmɔ na Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bése kalɔ beetemi teewi-nwu na bana lɛlɔ kemo banii, “Ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔɔƒɔ́ alaekpidi bablane na anwu ku-ma baadi muedi!”
42015003	Anwuɔsu Yesu úbo-ma lɛgba lɛmɛni ɔnini,
42015004	“Si banii bina akɔ ɔdi ubo baƒonu eti anyɔ na bana akɔ unwi ɔ́yii ni, bi na adubo bɔbla? Adubɔda liti ku aavlene-yaalenwi bammɔ enyene kadikɔ mmɔ na atásia kɔni náyi mmɔ kama wetédu uwi ɔni nánu-ku.
42015005	Na si ánu-ku ni, adubɔkɛ kubiti geen, na agyu-ku asia amangba.
42015006	Na eti-ku eboku kaduli. Na adubɔlɔ ƒula bakpana ku bekutene na asu-ma anii, 'Ebiti aada-mi geen, ɔsika lɛ́nu mina koƒonu kɔni náyii ɔsu bɛkɛku-mi ebiti!'
42015007	Na mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, lɛni na ebiti enengudi adubɔda Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma badi ƒui na alaekpidi ɔblane unwi pɛ ɔni nénwini kayi ɔsu utulo ebiti ani bebo na nkyuli liti ku aavlene-yaalenwi babuni bani naaawia kayi bunwini.
42015008	“Na si uleku ɔdi ubo sika ɔƒualadi ebi leevu ani ndubɔƒɔ nkyuli leevu limeyi kayu na ɔ́yila unwi ni, bi na ɔdubo bɔbla? Ɔdubɔtu asogya na ɔkpala nwuna ɔtɔ kemo ƒui na ɔwia lɛkɔkɔ lɛmmɔ ƒui kaduɛ wetédu uwi ɔni na ɔ́nu sika ubi ɔmmɔ.
42015009	Na si ɔ́nu-nwu ni, ɔdubɔlɔ nwuna bakpana ku bekutene ɔsala, na ɔsu-ma ɔnii, 'Ebiti aada-mi geen, ɔsika lɛ́nu mina sika ubi ɔni náyii ɔsu bɛkɛku-mi ebiti.'
42015010	Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, lɛni kani na Katɔti batu lɛnɔ baakɛ́ ebiti na alaekpidi ɔblane unwi ɔni nénwini kayi ɔsu.”
42015011	Yesu úsie anumi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni mbo bebi bananabi inyɔ.
42015012	Amu na ɔnamudi ɔ́su ɔti ɔnini, 'Ati, ti mina kadikɔ kani na adubo-mi bute te-mi gyɔnkɔ.' Ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔnana ɔmmɔ úti ala ammɔ úle akpa anyɔ úte nwuna bebi inyɔ bammɔ.
42015013	“Na emeyi alɛɛ adi kama ni, ɔnamudi ɔmmɔ úti nwuna ala ammɔ ƒui úye na úti egulabi ammɔ na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie ɔlɔgyu kakaaka kesii kani na útélie ngba basa basa na úbile egulabi ammɔ ƒui.
42015014	Ɔ́di lɛla biala lɛni na ɔda ɔ́wɔlɔ. Na ɔmmɔ kama ni, kɔka kubendi kɔdi kúbo na kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ƒui ɔsu kɔka kúbo kɔɔda-nwu na ɔsɔ uuubo lɛla lɛdi na ɔdi.
42015015	Ɔmɛni ɔsu úti lɛlɔ útése ɔkpa úte ɔnana ɔdi ɔnii utaabla kabla udu biala na wakɛ ute-nwu. Na ɔnana ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ úti-nwu útákya nwuna baplakuo kanyuɛkɔ na nwuna lɛkpaklɔ lɛdi.
42015016	Kɔka ɔsu ni, ɔ́yɔ ka nka ɔkɛ baplakuo adila ani na beete-ma mmɔ adi ɔdi, ɔsika ɔ́nu aani bekyuli lɛnɔ bakana-nya bɔdi, nsu ukyuli ɔdi útete-nwu adi.
42015017	“Kawɔlɔkɔ ni, ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo lɛlɔ kemo na ɔ́su lɛlɔ ɔnii, 'Bekyuli bani nése lɛlɔ ɔkpa béte mina ɔti na baabla nwuna kabla ni, baakɛ́ adila taadi na eebú muedi. Na ami nlie mɛni na kɔka kɔdubo-mi bɔdu!
42015018	Ndubo bɔta na lɛsɔ linwini nteesie mina ɔti kudɔ, na ntásu-nwu nnii, “Ati, lɛ́bla likpidi na lɛ́ƒiɔ Katɔti ku awɔ lɛnɔ.
42015019	Ńsɔ ńtamanku ka alɔ-mi anii ƒula ubi. Mmomu bla-mi aani bekyuli bani néti lɛlɔ bése ɔkpa béte-ɔ akɔ ɔdi.” '
42015020	Amu na ɔ́ta kɔnakunwi na úti ala na ɔ́yu ulu úsela ɔti kudɔ. “Ka ɔti ɔ́nu-nwu ɔ́ti ɔni na ubidi ɔmɛni ɔmua ɔkɛ ɔgyu ɔdubo ni, ubidi lɛlɔ lɛ́bla-nwu kɔnyana, na úkeli útátu ɔda-nwu ku kubiti.
42015021	“Mmɔ na ubidi ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ati, lɛ́bla likpidi lɛ́ƒiɔ Katɔti, na lɛ́ƒiɔ awɔ lɛnɔ. Na ńsɔ ńtamanku ka alɔ-mi anii ubi lɛnɔ!'
42015022	“Nsu ni, ɔti ɔ́kpali nwuna kabla bablane ɔnii, 'Bɛbabla na biti adala abuni bibakya-nwu. Na biti asɛɛ ku lɛgbanvuo lɛbuni lɛnɔ bɛkya-nwu enu ku lɛgba.
42015023	Ɔmɛni kama ni, bisie na bitéƒie ebuo ɔni nélie lɛmwi kaduɛ na bɛdu-nwu. Na bɛya na bɔdi limeyi.
42015024	Ɔsika mina ubi ɔmɛni ni, búti-nwu bɔnii úkpi. Nsu ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo ngba. Ɔ́yii na bɔ́sɔ bɔ́nu-nwu.' Ɔmɛni ɔsu bése kalɔ ku limeyi bɔdi.
42015025	“Amu na uwi ɔmɛni kemo ƒui ni, ubidi unengudi úsie ɔɔví taanu bana imo. Ka ɔ́si ɔdubo na ɔ́kpɛ uudé kaduli ni, únu kɔgya ku katɔ kani nda.
42015026	Amu na ɔ́kpali kabla bablane bammɔ akɔ unwi na úye-nwu ɔnini, 'Bi mɔɔlɛ́ kaduli?'
42015027	Mmɔ na kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, 'Ƒ^ɔnwani násɔ únwini úbo ɔma na ƒ^ɔti ɔ́ya na bádu ebuo ɔni nélie lɛmwi, ɔsika ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo úbeduo ɔni na lɛla lɛdi lɛɛɛda-nwu.'
42015028	“Ɔmɛni ɔ́ya na livo líƒi ɔnwani unengudi ɔmmɔ kaduɛ ɔni na úni ɔnii ɔsɔ uleduo kaduli muedi. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔti ɔ́vi ɔlɛ úbo-nwu kudɔ mmɔ, na úbevele-nwu ɔnii ubo ubeduo kaduli.
42015029	Nsu ubidi ɔmmɔ únwini na ɔ́su ɔti kɔnakunwi ɔnii, 'Bi ɔsu na nnye mɔɔbla kabla akwa pii amɛni kemo teete-ɔ aani ƒula kabla ɔblane na ńtata ńtenye ƒula ɔda bubo ɔdi lɛlɔ kudii, na étete-mi lɛla lɛdi ina ese muedi étete-mi anii ndi limeyi ku mina bakpana.
42015030	Nsu ka ƒ^ubidi ɔni nébile ƒula lɛkɛ na ɔkɛ ɔsiaku bayalɛ mɛni ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo ɔma ni, ádu ebuo ɔni nélie lɛmwi éte-nwu!'
42015031	“Mmɔ na ɔti ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Mina ubi, awɔ akya-mi kudɔ uwi biala na ala ani na mbo ƒui ni, awɔ adi na adi.
42015032	Nsu ni, ɔlɛka bɔdi limeyi na bɔkɛ ebiti, ɔsika búti-nwu bɔnii bukpi na ƒ^ɔnwani úkpi na ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo ngba. Bɔyii na ɔ́yii na bɔ́sɔ bɔ́nu-nwu.' ”
42016001	Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Dii ni, ɔlakɛne ɔdi ɔkya ɔni mbo kabla ɔblane ɔni mɔɔnu-nwu ala lɛlɔ. Amu na bábasu ɔlakɛne ɔmmɔ ka nwuna ala lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmɛni uubile-nwu egulabi.
42016002	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔlakɛne ɔmmɔ ɔ́lɔ nwuna ala lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmɛni na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Bi ndi lɛla lɛni udu na línu lɛ́siku-ɔ lɛlɔ mɛni? Bu akunta na kalɛ na éti aanu mina ala lɛlɔ ƒui boku-mi, ɔsika asɔ alakana mina ala lɛlɔ bɔsɔ bɔnu lɛnɔ.'
42016003	“Mmɔ na kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔ́su lɛlɔ ɔnii, 'Mina Unwoti ɔdubo-mi bɔgya na mina kabla kemo. Bi na ndubo bɔbla? Liiibo ɔyikun na makana kalɔ bubeyi. Na ala buvele lɛnɔ buukpó-mi kɔƒa.
42016004	Ɛhɛɛn! Lɛ́ɛti lɛla lɛni mabla! Na si mina kabla kálɛ-mi enu kemo muedi ni, na mina bakpana baƒɔ-mi na banu-mi lɛlɔ na bana kɔduli.'
42016005	“Ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔ́lɔ bekyuli bani nda nwuna Unwoti kayu unwi unwi. Úye udeedi ɔnini, 'Ɛlɛ kayu na ada mina Unwoti?'
42016006	“Ɔyune ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, 'Inɔ kutubwi bonwu eti anyɔ.' “Amu na ala lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Aanu ƒula kayu ɔku mɛni. Sɔ lie kalɔ na enweni liti kani ese.'
42016007	“Lɛni kani na úye ɔyune ɔbambadi ɔnii, 'Awɔ nɔɔ? Ɛlɛ kayu na ada?' “Ɔyune ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ ɔnini, 'Ɔbla aani antabi aƒɔ apimu unwi.' “Mmɔ na ala lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmɛni ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Aanu ƒula kayu ɔku mɛni. Nweni eti leevu-maane se.'
42016008	“Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Unwoti ɔmmɔ úmwi kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ na lɛkwɛ lɛni na ɔ́bla mmɔ ɔsu. Sɔsɔ ni, bekyuli bani nli nte kayawi kamɛni lɛlɔ ala ni, baasia anu taabla bana lɛlɔ ala teetulo ama bani mɔɔsia Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ anu.”
42016009	Mmɔ na Yesu úse anumi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biti bina kayawi lɛlakɛ bibunku bekyuli. Na si lɛkɛ lɛmmɔ lɛ́sa ni, na Katɔti waƒɔ-mii wakya nwuna ɔma kemo.
42016010	“Ukyuli ɔni mɔɔda ala ani nse blii suɛ na ulu lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubɔda ala enengudi lɛnɔ na ulu lɛlɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni naaasia ulu lɛlɔ ku ala ani nse blii suɛ ni, ulasia ulu lɛlɔ ku ala enengudi lɛnɔ.
42016011	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu si bítada kayawi kamɛni kemo lɛlakɛ na ulu lɛlɔ ni, dɛ na wabla asa na ukyuli waƒɔ-mii wadi ka bɛdubɔda kɔyu kemo lɛlakɛ lɛni ndi Katɔti etela na ulu lɛlɔ?
42016012	Na si átanu ukyuli bamba ala ani nse-ɔ kudɔ lɛlɔ na ulu lɛlɔ ni, dɛ wabla asa na banyonu awɔ ɔlati adi bete-ɔ?
42016013	“Kabla ɔblane ɔdi ulakana benwoti inyɔ kabla bɔbla. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, ɔdubɔyɔ unwi na ukisi ɔkladi. Lɛnɔ ni, ɔdubunu unwi litemi na weni ɔkladi lɛdi. Bilakana Katɔti bɔsiaku na bɛsɔ bɛsiaku lɛlakɛ lɛnɔ.”
42016014	Uwi ɔni na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bénu ala ani na Yesu ɔ́su ni, báma-nwu ɔsika baayɔ́ egulabi geen.
42016015	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Amii ndi bekyuli bani mɔɔtina lɛlɔ aani bekyuli babuni na bakladi anumi. Nsu Katɔti ɔgyi bina ƒui kayi kemo. Ɔsika ala ani náƒɔ kuye na bekyuli anumi ni, aaadi lɛla lɛdi na Katɔti anumi.
42016016	“Mose ɔda bubo ɔku ku Katɔti kenye bediene ala ani na bénweni bése ni, ábla kabla ábawɔ Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane lebo. Na ɔ́si uwi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, biinú ka baasu litemi buni lɛni nkɛnku Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ lɛlɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔɔnwanɛ lɛlɔ ka ɔkɛ nwuna ulu uduo Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ kemo.
42016017	Nsu ni, use kpɛtɛ kpɛtɛ ka katɔ ku kayawi kakana na kavi utulo ɔni na bada ɔda bubo bɔmɛni litemi blii suɛ lɛdi muedi bedie.
42016018	“Ɔnana biala ɔni manyonu uleku na weti ɔbambadi ni, anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́di kɔsɔnɔ. Na ɔnana ɔni meti uleku ɔni na bányonu ni, ɔ́di kɔsɔnɔ.
42016019	“Dii ni, ɔnana ɔlakɛne ɔdi ɔkya ɔni mɔɔda adala ani náƒɔ kuye, na ebiti kemo sɔɔn na ɔ́kya nwuna ngba emeyi kemo ƒui.
42016020	Na ɔwabane ɔdi na baalɔ banii Lasaro lɛnɔ ɔ́kya. Alɛbi áƒɔ ɔwabane ɔmɛni lɛlɔ ƒui ɔni na béteeti-nwu taabava ɔlakɛne ɔmmɔ ɔtɔ kayakun.
42016021	Ubo lɛnunsia ka si ɔlakɛne ɔmmɔ ɔɔdi ni, kɔkɛ wɛlɛ wɛlɛ kɔni muuwi kalɔ kɔdubudu-nwu na ɔ́la ɔdi. Bakpɛwe muedi beebo taabayalɛ-nwu alɛbi ammɔ.
42016022	“Ɔwabane ɔmmɔ úbekpi na Katɔti batu bébetiku-nwu bétésie Abraham kudɔ, na baadi limeyi na katɔ. Ɔlakɛne ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ úbekpi na báva-nwu.
42016023	Na kekpine mmɔ ni, ɔ́nu ka ɔkya abi kebokɔ. Mmɔ ka ɔ́talaku anumi katɔ ni, ɔ́nu Abraham na katɔ kakaaka ka Lasaro ulie-nwu kudɔ.
42016024	Amu na ɔ́kpali ɔnii, 'Ati Abraham! Nu-mi kɔnyana na aya na Lasaro uti lɛnimi ɔkya ntu bɔdi kemo na udu ubo-mi unyemi lɛlɔ na lɛlɔ lɛbla-mi buɛɛ. Ɔsika lɛlɔ lɛɛkywí-mi na ogya ɔmɛni kemo!'
42016025	“Nsu Abraham ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ubi, nyimo ka na ƒula ngba bɔni na élie kemo ni, ala abuni sɔɔn na áƒɔ. Na Lasaro anwu ni, ala ekpidi sɔɔn na ɔ́ƒɔ. Nsu ɔƒɛni ni, ɔɔkɛ́ ebiti na awɔ eebó abi.
42016026	Na ɔni mbunku ɔmmɔ ni, ubu bonwu ɔdi ɔkya abu ku-ɔ ntɛ. Na si ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔwia ka ɔvia ubo mmɔ ni, ulakana. Na lɛni kani na ɔdi lɛnɔ ulakana bɔvia bɔsi mmɔ bubo bula kudɔ mɛni.'
42016027	“Mmɔ ni, ɔlakɛne ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ati Abraham, muuvele nda-a nnii tala Lasaro na usie mina ɔti kesii.
42016028	Mmɔ ni, mbo banwani bananabi ɛlɔ. Ya na utébo-ma ɔda kaduɛ kalɛ na ama belebo likpo lɛni na lɛbibo lɛkya mɛni.'
42016029	“Amu na Abraham ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ƒula banwani bebo ala ani na Mose ku Katɔti kenye bediene bénweni bése. Na ɔdi ka benu na badi-nya lɛlɔ.'
42016030	“Mmɔ na ɔlakɛne ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, 'Ati Abraham, belénu-ma litemi! Nsu si banii ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́si kekpine mɛni úsie-ma kudɔ ni, badubunu-nwu litemi na benwini kama bakya bana ekpidi.'
42016031	“Nsu Abraham ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Si bétenu Mose ku Katɔti kenye bediene litemi ni, si ina ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́ta ɔ́si kekpine mɛni úsie-ma kudɔ muedi ni, baláƒɔ-nwu litemi!' ”
42017001	Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Ala ani mɔɔyá na ukyuli ɔɔbla likpidi ni, adubo bɔkya. Nsu bɔbwɛ muute ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na ala amɛni adubɔsia asa na eduo bekyuli akɔ!
42017002	Si béti kukɔ bonwu kɔdi báƒala-nwu ɔkwɛ na bányina-nwu bákya ɛpu kemo muedi ni, ɔdia-nwu utulo kɔtu kɔni na Katɔti ɔdubɔni anwu ɔni maya na likpidi lɛsia-nwu lɛlɔ liduo mina banamu akɔ.
42017003	Anwuɔsu bɛsia ala ani na bɛɛbla anu. “Na si ƒula ɔkpana ɔ́bla-a likpidi lɛdi ni, dɔnku-nwu. Na si úkpi kɔtɔ ni, na eti akyiɛ-nwu.
42017004	Si ɔ́bla lɛla lɛdi ɔ́ƒiɔ-ɔ maatɛ na limeyi linwi kemo na ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo ubekpi-ɔ kɔtɔ maatɛ ɔmmɔ ni, ti kyiɛ-nwu.”
42017005	Yesu batalane bévele Yesu banii, “Blɔti, ya na bula bɔƒɔtaadi bumomo bubu.”
42017006	Amu na Blɔti ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si bibo bɔƒɔtaadi na búdu aani lɛla lɛdi kebi kani nse blii suɛ ntulo ƒui ni, nka bɛdubɔkana na bɛsu kugyii kɔmɛni bɛnii, 'Gyu likpo lɛmɛni na etéduo ɛpu kemo ngye.' Na kɔdubɔbla lɛni kani.
42017007	“Bɛbu ɔmɛni bɛnu. Si bina ɔdi ubo kabla ɔblane ɔni mɔɔtuma kemo teete-nwu iye ɔɔnu-ɔ baƒonu lɛlɔ na ɔ́si kemo úbeduo ni, bɔsu na adubɔsu-nwu anii ɔbabla na utélie kalɔ utaadi nwuna adila?
42017008	Oowo! Mmomu adubɔsu-nwu anii, 'Klibi lɛlɔ na asabla kɔdi, na anwa, na eti mina adila ese-mi na lɛdi lɛwɔlɔ asa na awɔ lɛnɔ adi.'
42017009	Útalɛka agya-nwu enu ka ɔ́bla nwuna kabla ɔblane kabla ɔsu.
42017010	Lɛni kani na use ute amii lɛnɔ. Si bɛ́bla ala ani ƒui na lɛ́su-mii nnii bɛbla ni, bɛsu bɛnii, 'Kabla bablane kani na bɔdi. Na bɔ́bla lɛla lɛni kani na ɔdi ka bɔbla.' ”
42017011	Amu ka Yesu ɔkɛ úsela Yerusalem ni, ɔ́vi Samaria ku Galilea ɔmii lɛlɔ.
42017012	Na ka ɔdaku lɛkpaklɔ lɛdi buduo ni, banana leevu badi na beeƒi ɔlɛgyie bábasiaku-nwu. Balɛne bamɛni bénye ɔgyu.
42017013	Na báva ku lɛdi momoomo banii, “Ati Yesu, nu-bu kɔnyana!”
42017014	Yesu ɔ́nu-ma na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biteesie na biti bina lɛlɔ bitátina Katɔti bakpane na banu-mii kaduɛ.” Ka bakɛ bésela ni, bánu báti ka bana ɔlɛ ɔ́ba-ma.
42017015	Nsu ka bana unwi ɔ́nu ɔ́ti ka nwuna ɔlɛ ɔ́ba-nwu ni, ɔ́sɔ únwini na uumwi Katɔti ku lɛdi momoomo.
42017016	Na úbo úbalɛ akɔnkɔ na Yesu anumi na ɔ́gya-nwu enu. Na ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔdi Samariani.
42017017	Mmɔ na Yesu úye ɔnini, “Ɔɔɔdi banana leevu na lɛ́bwi yoo? Wɛ na yaalenwi bakladi básia?
42017018	Dɛ na ɔ́bla asa na ukyuli ɔni naaadi Yudani ɔmɛni kani násɔ únwini úbo ɔnii ubagya Katɔti enu?”
42017019	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ta nye, na eteesie. Ƒula bɔƒɔtaadi náya na ƒula ɔlɛ ɔ́ba-a.”
42017020	Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi béye Yesu banii baawia bati uwi ɔni geen na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kadububo. Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kelebo na ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na bekyuli bakana-ka bɔnu.
42017021	Ɔdi ulasu ɔnii, 'Bɛnu! Aanu-ka mɛni!' iye 'Aanu-ka ngye'. Ɔsika Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ kakya bina akɔ.”
42017022	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Uwi ɔdi ɔdubo ɔni na bɛdubɔwia bɛnii bɛɛnu limeyi lɛni na ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, mebo. Nsu bilanu!
42017023	Bekyuli badi badubo-mii akɔ bɔkya bani ndubɔsu-mii banii, 'Bɛnu-nwu ngye!' iye 'Bɛnu-nwu mɛni!' Nsu bitesie bitatáwia-mi mmɔ!
42017024	Ɔsika kalɛ na kayaa kaabwɛ ogya taasi ɔƒɛnyi unwi teesie ɔkladi ni, lɛni geen na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛdubo buse.
42017025	Nsu ni, ɔlɛka lɛka abi bubo geen na ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli beni-mi.
42017026	“Ala ani nálɛ na Noa uwi ni, anya kani na ndubo bɔlɛ na uwi ɔni na ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, masɔ mebo.
42017027	Bekyuli baadi na baaní. Na banana ku beleku beeti lɛlɔ úti útédu limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na Noa úduo ɔkɔlɔ ubendi ɔmmɔ kemo. Na ɔnantu ɔ́na na ntukpa búyi bɔ́ƒɔ kalɔ ƒui na ɔ́du bekyuli ƒui.
42017028	“Lɛni na ɔdubo buse aani kalɛ na úse na Lot uwi lɛnɔ. Bekyuli baadi na baaní, na baadi kuye lɛnɔ. Badi benye baakya edula, na badi benye baatú lɛtɔ.
42017029	Na limeyi lɛni na Lot ɔ́vi ɔ́lɛ Sodom ni, ogya ku agyabi ani muunwenyi ku ɔnyi gbagbangba ási katɔ ébewi ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo na ɔ́kyula-ma ƒui.
42017030	“Lɛni kani na ɔdubo buse na limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndubɔda lɛlɛ.
42017031	Limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, ukyuli ɔni nnye nwuna ɔtɔ lɛsa ni, ɔsɔ utayu ɔnii utéduo ɔtɔ kemo uti nwuna ala adi. Lɛni kani si kemo na ɔdi ɔkya ni, ɔsɔ utasu ɔnii uunwíni usie kaduli.
42017032	Binyimo lɛla lɛni nálɛku Lot ulekudi!
42017033	Ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔwia ka ɔƒɔ nwuna lili ngba ute lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubɔyila-mu. Na ukyuli biala ɔni nányonu nwuna ngba ni, ɔdubɔsɔ ɔkɛ-mu.
42017034	Na usien ɔmmɔ ni, nkyuli inyɔ badubɔtɛ lɛtala linwi lɛlɔ, na Katɔti ɔdubuti unwi na ɔda ɔkladi ɔva.
42017035	Beleku inyɔ badubunye bataakɔ ɔlaaƒɔ na kukɔ lɛlɔ. Na Katɔti ɔdubuti unwi na ɔda ɔkladi unyene.
42017036	Banana inyɔ badubunye bataatuma na ɔkpanku unwi ɔtɔlɔku na ɔnyonu ɔkladi unyene.”
42017037	Mmɔ na batɛyane bammɔ béye Yesu banini, “Blɔti, na wɛ?” Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Kesii kani na lɛla líkpi lɛ́tɛ ni, mmɔ na begbini baasa.”
42018001	Yesu úbo nwuna batɛyane lɛgba lɛdi ɔ́tina-ma ɔnii ɔlɛka bataakpali katɔ uwi biala na ɔɔɔdi ka enu aƒɛ-ma.
42018002	Ɔ́su ɔnini, “Litemi ɔtɛne ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔma ɔdi kemo ɔni na uláyia Katɔti na uláƒalɛ ukyuli lɛnɔ.
42018003	Na ɔma ɔmmɔ kani kemo ni, ukpinele ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni muusié teebo-nwu kudɔ teebevele-nwu ɔnii, 'Bunku-mi na mina ukisine ɔsu.'
42018004	“Ɔbla uwi pii ni, litemi ɔtɛne ɔmmɔ úni na útabla lɛla lɛdi na litemi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ. Nsu kawɔlɔkɔ ni, ɔ́su nwuna lɛlɔ ɔnini, 'Ina ka naaayia Katɔti na naaaƒalɛ ukyuli ni,
42018005	na lɛƒɛda lɛni na ukpinele ɔmɛni uute-mi ɔsu ni, ndubɔnu ka líkpo nwuna ukisine líte-nwu. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, ulada bubo uláya na ulete-mi bɔnwuna.' ”
42018006	Mmɔ na Blɔti úsie anumi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Binu lɛla lɛni na litemi ɔtɛne ukpidi ɔmmɔ ɔ́su.
42018007	Na ɔƒɛni ni, bɔtɛ na Katɔti ulatɛ litemi uledie nwuna bekyuli bani muuwulo taakpali-nwu usien ku ɔƒɛ banii ubunku-ma? Munuu bɛɛkali bɛnii ɔdubɔkpɛ kama ku bana bɔƒɔ?
42018008	Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii Katɔti ɔdubɔtɛ litemi na ute-ma ubo kɔnakunwi. Nsu ni, si Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi úbo ni, ɔdubɔnu bekyuli bani mbo bɔƒɔtaadi?”
42018009	Yesu úbo lɛgba lɛmɛni úte bekyuli bani mɔɔkali banii ama bana udu kani ndia na basɔ balánu ukyuli bamba ɔdi aani bana kalɛ.
42018010	Na ɔ́su ɔnii, “Uwi ɔdi kemo ni, nkyuli inyɔ badi bésie Katɔti kakpakɔ banii batákpali katɔ. Unwi ɔdi Ƒarisini na ɔkladi ɔdi kuyi ɔƒɔne.
42018011	Ƒarisini ɔmmɔ ɔ́tu anwu lɛti na útákpali katɔ ɔnini, 'Katɔti mɔɔgyá-a enu, ɔsika liiibo egulabi lɛnungyie, na liiibo likyulikpi, na naaadi kɔsɔnɔ aani bekyuli bakladi kalɛ. Na mɔɔgyá-a enu lɛnɔ, ɔsika liiise aani kuyi ɔƒɔne ɔni ngye lɛnɔ kalɛ.
42018012	Muulie kɔka emeyi anyɔ na Kwasida unwi kemo. Na muuti mina lɛkɛ lɛkpa leevudi teeboku-ɔ.'
42018013	“Nsu kuyi ɔƒɔne ɔmmɔ anwu únye ɔgyu ɔgyu na uláwia ɔnii ɔɔkɔliku nwuna lili muedi katɔ. Nsu úti nwuna enu úwi kayi na ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Katɔti, nu ami alaekpidi ɔblane kɔnyana!' ”
42018014	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii nnii ka básɔ bénwini bésie kaduli ni, kuyi ɔƒɔne ɔmmɔ ɔ́bla sɛɛn na Katɔti anumi na ɔɔɔdi Ƒarisini ɔmmɔ. Ɔsika ukyuli biala ɔni na ɔ́bla nwuna lɛlɔ ukyuli ubendi ni, Katɔti ɔdububoku-nwu kalɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔni na weboku lɛlɔ kalɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔkɔliku-nwu katɔ.”
42018015	Bekyuli badi béti bana bebi béboku Yesu banii uti nwuna enu ɔsia-ma eli. Ka Yesu batalane bánu ɔmɛni ni, bádɔnku bekyuli bammɔ na ɔmmɔ ɔsu.
42018016	Nsu Yesu ɔ́lɔ banamu bammɔ úboku na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bɛya na banamu bebo-mi kudɔ na bitetile-ma kuƒi. Ɔsika Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kese kete bekyuli bani néboku lɛlɔ kalɔ aani banamu bamɛni udu kalɛ.
42018017	Na binyimo ɔmɛni bɛnii ukyuli biala ɔni naaadubo Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ bɔƒɔ aani ɔnamu blii kalɛ ni, uleduo-ka kemo kudi kudii.”
42018018	Yudani ɔtɔnkune ɔdi úye Yesu ɔnini, “Ala ɔtinane buni, bi na ɔlɛka lɛbla asa na lɛkɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii?”
42018019	Amu na Yesu úye-nwu ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na aalɔ-mi aani ɔbuni? Ukyuli biala ɔdi ɔɔɔdia ntu Katɔti lɛti pɛ.
42018020	Ngyi ka agyi ɔda bubo bɔni mɔɔsu bɔnii, 'Tadi kɔsɔnɔ, tadu ukyuli, teyu, tada ƒula ukyulikpana kenye, na abu ƒula ɔti ku ƒula uni.' ”
42018021	Amu na ukyuli ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔ́si mina lɛnamu uwi ƒui ni, mɔɔdi ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ ƒui lɛlɔ kaduɛ.”
42018022	Ka Yesu únu-nwu litemi lɛmmɔ ni, ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Lɛla linwi lɛ́sɔ líbu-ɔ na abla. Ti ala ani nse-ɔ ƒui ye, na eti egulabi ammɔ ete bawabane. Ɔmɛni ndubɔya-a na akɛ akɛla ese ete lɛlɔ na katɔ. Ɔmmɔ kama na ebo abasiaku-mi.”
42018023	Nsu uwi ɔni na ɔnana ɔmmɔ únu lɛla lɛmɛni ni, lɛlɔ lɛ́yuɛ-nwu ɔsika ubo lɛlakɛ geen.
42018024	Yesu ɔ́nu kalɛ na lɛlɔ lɛ́yuɛ-nwu na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ubo ɔlakɛne ɔkplu asa na weduo Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ!
42018025	Na kalɛ na ɔlakɛne uduo Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ ni, ubo ɔkplu utulo kalɛ na ebuo ɔni nébomo utulo ƒui ɔvili udila liƒi.”
42018026	Mmɔ na bekyuli bani nénu lɛla lɛmɛni béye Yesu banii, “Na ɔma geen ndubɔkɛ bɔƒɔ?”
42018027	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Lɛla lɛni na ukyuli ulakana bɔbla kudii ni, lise Katɔti anwu kpɛtɛ kpɛtɛ ka ɔbla-ni.”
42018028	Mmɔ na Petro ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Nu, abu bɔ́da bula kɔduli ala ƒui búwi na búbo bɔsiaku-ɔ.”
42018029	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Sɔsɔ na ɔdi. Na mɔɔyá-mii bɛti bɛnii ukyuli biala ɔni náda nwuna kaduli úwi iye ɔ́da ulekudi iye banwani bananabi iye nwuna bawɔne iye bebi úwi na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ ɔsu ni,
42018030	ɔdubɔkɛ ala ammɔ udu ɔsia kama na ngba bɔmɛni kemo ku ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii na uwi ɔni mebo lɛnɔ kemo.”
42018031	Yesu útiku batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ úsienku kɔmadɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Binu! Búsela Yerusalem, kesii kani na ala ani na Katɔti kenye bediene bénweni básiku ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, lɛlɔ adububo ete lɛni.
42018032	Bekyuli badubuti-mi bakya bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ enu kemo na beti-mi babla lɛmala. Badubo-mi budumi na betuo lisuo bewi-mi lɛlɔ.
42018033	Badubo-mi bubo na badu-mi. Nsu na emeyi atɛ kama ni, ndubɔsɔ lɛta lɛsi bekpine akɔ.”
42018034	Na ala amɛni ƒui ni, batɛyane bammɔ bétenu-nya kalɔ. Etemila amɛni kalɔ bunu lɛnɔ ɔdi lɛla lɛni nábɛ-ma. Na bétenu lɛla lɛni na Yesu ɔ́su-ma mmɔ kalɔ.
42018035	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́kpɛ úde Yeriko ni, ɔnumbwɛne ɔdi ulie ulu kɔtu mmɔ uuvele ala.
42018036	Ka únu bekyuli pii bani mɔɔví kɔku ni, úye ɔnii, “Bi na ɔdi mɔɔlɛ́?”
42018037	Amu na básu-nwu banii, “Yesu Nasareni nási ɔɔví.”
42018038	Mmɔ na ɔ́va momoomo ɔnii, “Yesu, Ɔga Dawid Uwɔ! Nu-mi kɔnyana!”
42018039	Amu na bekyuli bani ntɔ lɛtɔtɔ bádɔnku-nwu banii ɔba ku lɛsɛ. Nsu ɔƒɛni geen na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́talaku lɛdi katɔ úbu ɔnii, “Dawid Uwɔ, nu-mi kɔnyana!”
42018040	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu Yesu údi únye na ɔ́su ɔnii bakpanku ɔnumbwɛne ɔmmɔ beboku-nwu kudɔ. Ka úbedu-nwu kudɔ ni, Yesu úye-nwu ɔnini,
42018041	“Bi na aawia-mi anii mbla nte-ɔ?” Ɔnumbwɛne ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Ati, mɔɔyɔ́ ka lɛsɔ ntaanu.”
42018042	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Amu sɔ taanu! Ƒula bɔƒɔtaadi bɔ́bwi-ɔ.”
42018043	Kɔnakunwi ni, ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kana na ɔɔnu na ɔ́siaku Yesu na ɔkɛ uumwi Katɔti. Na ka bekyuli pii bammɔ bánu ɔmɛni ni, bana ƒui bémwi Katɔti.
42019001	Yesu úsie útéduo Yeriko, na ɔ́sia ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo úsela.
42019002	Mmɔ na kuyi baƒɔne unengu ɔdi baalɔ banii Sakeo ɔ́kya, na ubo egulabi geen.
42019003	Ɔ́kya útaawia ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔsia na ɔnu ukyuli ɔni geen na Yesu ɔdi. Nsu ka anwu ɔlati ɔdi ukyuli klukui ɔsu ni, útakana na ɔkɛ ulu ɔdi ka bekyuli bemomo ɔsu.
42019004	Anwuɔsu úkeli ɔtɔ bekyuli bammɔ lɛtɔtɔ na útákɔ kugyii kɔni nákuku kalɛ na ɔnu Yesu, ɔsika ɔgyi ɔnii ɔdubo ubasia mmɔ.
42019005	Ka Yesu úbedu kugyii kɔmmɔ kalɔ ni, údi únye na ɔ́kɔliku anumi katɔ na ɔ́su Sakeo ɔnini, “Sakeo, babla na ayu ebo kalɔ, ɔsika ƒula kudɔ na ndubo buduo ɔmwi.”
42019006	Sakeo ɔ́babla ɔ́yu úbo kalɔ na úte Yesu eduo ku ebiti geen.
42019007	Bekyuli bammɔ ƒui bése kalɔ beetemi-nwu na Yesu lɛlɔ kalɔ kalɔ banii, “Ɔnana ɔmɛni úsela utéduo ukyuli ɔni ndi alaekpidi ɔblane ɔmɛni kudɔ.”
42019008	Amu na Sakeo ɔ́ta únye na ɔ́su Blɔti ɔnini, “Ati! Buvele, nu! Ndubuti mina lɛkɛ kakɛ kenwi ƒui lite bawabane. Na bekyuli bani ƒui na líti lɛnungyie kemo lɛ́ƒɔ-ma ala litulo kalɛ na ɔdi ka lɛƒɔ ni, ndubɔƒɔ-ma kayu kammɔ akpa ene.”
42019009	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ɔmwi ni, ngba bɔƒɔ búbo búbedu kaduli kamɛni kemo. Ɔsika ukyuli ɔmɛni lɛnɔ ɔdi Abraham kaba kemo ubi.
42019010	Na ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, líbo nnii mbedie bekyuli bani ƒui náyii ulu geen ɔmmɔ.”
42019011	Amu na bekyuli bammɔ bakɛ beenú ala ani na Yesu ɔkɛ ɔɔsu-ma. Na úsie anumi na úbo-ma lɛgba lɛdi, ɔsika ɔ́ɔkpɛ úde Yerusalem na bákali banii Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ kéede geen ɔƒɛni.
42019012	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Dii ni, ɔnana ɔbune ɔdi ɔkya ɔni náta úsie kalɔ ɔgyu kakaaka ɔdi kemo kalɛ na betése-nwu lɛga. Na ɔ́bla kasusu ka ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔdubɔsɔ unwini ubo ɔma.
42019013	Asa na watɔlɔ ni, ɔ́lɔ nwuna kabla bablane leevu ɔ́sala. Na úte ɔdi biala egulabi koƒo kunwi. Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Biti egulabi ammɔ bɛdi kuye na bɔnu kɔsia kɔni na ɔdi biala wakɛ.'
42019014	“Nsu ɔnana ɔmɛni ɔma bekyuli béteekisi-nwu, anwuɔsu bátala batu badi na básia-nwu kama banii batásu Ɔga Unengudi banii, 'Bulayɔ ka ɔnana ɔmɛni unwini-bu ɔga.'
42019015	“Nsu Ɔga Unengudi úse ɔnana ɔmmɔ lɛga na ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo ɔma. Kɔnakunwi ni, ɔ́ya na bálɔ nwuna kabla bablane bábasala na nwuna anumi ɔnii uunú kɔsia kɔni na bákɛ.
42019016	“Kabla ɔblane udeedi úbo na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ati, lɛ́kɛ egulabi aƒo leevu lɛ́sia unwi ɔni na éte-mi mmɔ lɛlɔ.'
42019017	“Mmɔ na Unwoti ɔmmɔ úte-nwu mbo ɔnii, 'Ábla-nwu kaduɛ! Kabla ɔblane ɔbuni na adi! Ka áda kabla blii suɛ kamɛni ulu lɛlɔ ɔsu ni, ndubuti-ɔ linyene lɛma linengudi leevu kenye.'
42019018	“Kabla ɔblane unyɔdi lɛnɔ úbo na úbasu-nwu ɔnini, 'Ati, lɛ́kɛ egulabi aƒo alɔ lɛ́sia unwi ɔni néte-mi lɛlɔ!'
42019019	“Amu na Unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔ́su kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ ɔnini, 'Awɔ adubunye lɛma ɛlɔ kenye!'
42019020	“Kabla ɔblane ɔbambadi úbo na anwu ɔnini, 'Ati, aanu ƒula egulabi koƒo kunwi kɔni néte-mi. Líti-ku lɛ́bɛla na mina lɛdiku kemo.
42019021	Mɔɔyia-a ɔsika ƒula udu ubo ɔkplu. Na eeti lɛla lɛni naaadi awɔ lɛdi teenwini awɔ lɛdi. Na edula ani na átakya muedi aaƒɛ-nya.'
42019022	“Mmɔ na Unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Kabla ɔblane ukpidi na adi! Awɔ ɔlati ƒula kenye etemila na ndubuti lɛdu-ɔ kɔtɔ! Agyi ka udu ubo-mi ɔkplu. Na muuti lɛla lɛni naaadi ami lɛdi teenwini ami lɛdi. Na mɔɔƒɛ edula ani na ńtakya.
42019023	Na si agyi lɛni ni, bi ɔsu na éteti mina egulabi átatákya egulabi kesekɔ? Mmɔ ni, ngyi ka nka ndubɔkɛ kɔsia lɛsia-nwu lɛlɔ si lɛ́si líbo.'
42019024	“Amu na ɔ́su bekyuli bani nnye mmɔ ɔnii, 'Bɛda egulabi ammɔ bɛƒɔ-nwu kudɔ bite kabla ɔblane ɔni mbo egulabi aƒo leevu.'
42019025	“Nsu bekyuli bammɔ básu-nwu banini, 'Ati, kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ anwu ubo egulabi aƒo leevu use!'
42019026	“Amu na Unwoti ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, 'Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, ukyuli ɔni mbo lɛla lɛdi ni, anwu na Katɔti ɔdubute ɔsia. Na ukyuli ɔni neeebo lɛla lɛdi ni, libliidi lɛni na úbo muedi ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ-ni na nwuna kudɔ.
42019027	Na ɔƒɛni ni, mina bekisine bani na banii nka baláwia ka bese-mi lɛga ni, bɛkpanku-ma biboku mɛni na bɛdu-ma na mina anumi.' ”
42019028	Ka Yesu ɔ́su-ma ala amɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́gyu ɔ́tɔ-ma Yerusalem.
42019029	Uwi ɔni na ɔ́kpɛ uudé Betƒage ku Betania na Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi kudɔ ni, ɔ́tala nwuna batɛyane inyɔ ɔnii bataatɔ.
42019030	Mmɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biteesie ɔma ɔni nkya-mii lɛtɔtɔ mmɔ kemo. Na si biiduo-nwu kemo ni, bɛdubɔnu ebuo ala utine ubi ɔdi ka bébo-nwu báda mmɔ. Na ukyuli ɔdi útelie-nwu lɛlɔ kudii. Bɛƒɛnimi-nwu na biti-nwu biboku mɛni.
42019031	Si ukyuli ɔdi úye-mii lɛla lɛni ɔsu na bɛɛƒɛnimi-nwu ni, bɛsu-nwu bɛnii, 'Blɔti mɔɔwia-nwu.' ”
42019032	Batɛyane bammɔ báyu ulu bésie na bátánu lɛla biala aani kalɛ kani na Yesu ɔ́su-ma.
42019033	Na uwi ɔni na benye baaƒɛnimi ebuo ɔmmɔ ni, ebuo ɔmmɔ balati béye-ma banii, “Bi ɔsu na bɛɛƒɛnimi-nwu?”
42019034	Amu na batɛyane bammɔ bédie kenye banii, “Blɔti mɔɔwia-nwu.”
42019035	Na béti ebuo ɔmmɔ béboku Yesu. Mmɔ na béti bana adi béwi ebuo ɔmmɔ kama na bébunku Yesu na ɔ́kɔ úlie-nwu kama.
42019036	Ka ulie-nwu lɛlɔ na bésela ni, bekyuli badi béti bana adi béwi kalɔ na ulu lɛlɔ.
42019037	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́kpɛ úde Yerusalem na likpo lɛni na ulu ɔmmɔ úti ɔ́yu Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ ni, nwuna batɛyane pii bammɔ bése kalɔ baagyá Katɔti enu na beete yiidu ku kɔvanu momoomo na ala ebendi ani na bánu ɔsu.
42019038	Na básu banii, “Bimwi Ɔga ɔni nási ɔdubo na Blɔti lɛnyi kemo! Na keyi buɛɛ kaƒɔ Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ƒui! Hosiana!”
42019039	Mmɔ na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bani nkya otogyi ɔmmɔ kemo básu Yesu banini, “Ala ɔtinane, bɔku ƒula batɛyane na baba ku lɛsɛ!”
42019040	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii si bába lɛsɛ ni, atabi amɛni alati adubuse kalɔ ataava.”
42019041	Ɔni na Yesu ɔ́ni úde Yerusalem úbu na ɔ́nu ɔma ɔmmɔ ni, úwulo na nwuna lili.
42019042	Na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Mɔɔyɔ́ geen ka nka bɛnu bɛti ɔmwi limeyi lɛmɛni lɛlɔ lɛla lɛni námanku-mii asa bɛkɛ keyi buɛɛ! Nsu ku ɔƒɛni ni, bilánu taati!
42019043	Uwi ɔdi ɔdubo ɔni na bina bekisine badubɔka-mii bakya ekpo ekpo ƒui. Na badubutile eƒi ƒui na lɛla biala lɛsɔ lilakana buduo iye lɛlɛ keyi.
42019044	Bekyuli badubo ɔma ɔmɛni bɔyila ku udu na badu bekyuli bani nkya-nwu kemo ƒui. Na lɛtabi lɛdi muedi lɛsɔ lilése nina keliekɔ. Ɔsika bíni na bítanu bítati uwi ɔni na Katɔti úbo ɔnii ubedie-mii!”
42019045	Yesu úsie útéduo Katɔti kakpakɔ na úse kalɔ ɔɔgyá beyedine bani nkya mmɔ taalɛku.
42019046	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Benweni bákya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Mina kaduli ni, bekyuli badubɔlɔ-ka banii kaduli kani bekyuli baakpali katɔ.' Na amii bíti mmɔ bínwini beyune kabɛkɔ!”
42019047	Limeyi ndi limeyi ni, Yesu ɔ́tina ala na Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ. Katɔti bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane ku bekyuli batɔnkune báwia ka badu-nwu.
42019048	Nsu bátakɛ ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na basia, ɔsika bekyuli pii bakya mmɔ na bana atu asia nwuna etemila ammɔ lɛlɔ kpakplaa.
42020001	Limeyi lɛdi ka Yesu ɔkya ɔɔtina bekyuli ala na Katɔti kakpakɔ na ɔɔsu-ma litemi buni ala ni, bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane ku ɔma benengu bébo mmɔ.
42020002	Amu na bábasu-nwu banini, “Su-bu kenyekɔ kani na ebo asa na aabla ala amɛni udu? Na ɔma néte-ɔ kenyekɔ kammɔ?”
42020003	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bɛya na liye-mii lɛla lɛdi linu na bɛsu-mi.
42020004	Kenyekɔ kani na Yohane ɔ́kɛ asa na ɔ́bla ntu bɔkpila ɔdi úte bekyuli ni, Katɔti kudɔ na kási munuu ukyuli kudɔ na kási?”
42020005	Mmɔ na bese kalɔ ku unyeƒi bɔkya ama alati bana akɔ banii, “Bi na ɔlɛka bɔsu? Si bɔ́su bɔnii Katɔti kudɔ na ɔ́kɛ kenyekɔ kammɔ ɔ́siku ni, ɔdubuye-bu ɔnii, 'Bi ɔsu na bítaƒɔ Yohane bítadi?'
42020006	Na si bɔ́su bɔnii ukyuli kudɔ na ɔ́kɛ-ka ɔ́siku ni, kasalakɔ bekyuli bamɛni ƒui badubo-bu atabi bubo, ɔsika bana ƒui báƒɔ bádi ka Katɔti kenye udiene na Yohane ɔdi.”
42020007	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu bédie kenye banii, “Bɔɔɔgyi kesii kani na ɔ́kɛ kenyekɔ kammɔ ɔ́siku.”
42020008	Mmɔ na Yesu lɛnɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lɛni kani na ami lɛnɔ lɛɛɛdubo-mii bɔsu kenyekɔ kani mbo asa na mɔɔbla ala amɛni udu.”
42020009	Amu na Yesu úbo bekyuli bammɔ lɛgba lɛmɛni ɔnini, “Dii ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́bla adingyii kemo kadi. Ka úsela ulu ɔdi utákya na uwi utu ɔsu ni, úti-ka ɔ́kya bekyuli badi enu ɔnii bataanu-ka lɛlɔ teete-nwu.
42020010	Ka uwi údu ka bese kalɔ ku ebi ammɔ bude ni, ɔ́tala nwuna kabla ɔblane ɔdi ɔnii usie na utáƒɔ nwuna kadikɔ na kemo kammɔ lɛlɔ banune kudɔ uboku. Nsu kemo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ bébo kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ na bábɔku-nwu, na bétete-nwu lɛla lɛdi.
42020011	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu ɔ́tala kabla ɔblane ɔbambadi. Nsu kemo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ bébo anwu lɛnɔ na béwi-nwu anumi kalɔ, na béti-nwu bémene, na bétete-nwu lɛla lɛdi.
42020012	Ɔ́tala kabla ɔblane ɔtɛdi. Na kemo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ bébo-nwu na bákya-nwu ɔlɛ lɛlɔ na bábɔku-nwu bálɛku mmɔ.
42020013	“Mmɔ na kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ úye lɛlɔ ɔnii, 'Bi na ɔlɛka lɛbla? Ndubɔtala mina ubidi ɔyɔne na lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́di ka badubɔƒalɛ-nwu.'
42020014	“Nsu ka kemo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ bánu ubi ɔmmɔ ni, básu lɛlɔ banii, 'Aanu kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ ubi geen mɛni. Bɛya na bɔdu-nwu na nwuna ala amɛni ƒui enwini abu adi!'
42020015	Anwuɔsu báni-nwu bálɛku ɔba ɔmmɔ kemo na bádu-nwu.” Mmɔ na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi na kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ ɔdubo kemo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ bɔbla?
42020016	Mɔɔyá na bɛti ka ɔdububo ubadu kemo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ ƒui na uti kemo kammɔ ɔkya lɛlɔ banune babambadi lɛkɔkɔ.” Ka bekyuli bammɔ bénu lɛni ni, básu banii, “Oowo! Utebo lɛni!”
42020017	Yesu ɔtɛ anu ɔ́nu-ma na úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi na Bunweni Kedee bɔmɛni kalɔ bɔɔtina bɔni mɔɔsu bɔnii, 'Lɛtabi lɛni na batune béni báva banii lɛɛɛdia ni, ani mmomu nébenwini lɛtabi lɛni náƒɔ kuye litulo na atabi ƒui akɔ'?
42020018	Ukyuli biala ɔni mebuli mebo lɛtabi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubo-nwu bukulo eku eku. Na si lɛtabi lɛmmɔ lɛnɔ lɛlɛ libo ɔdi lɛlɔ ni, lɛdubo-nwu bɔbwɛ kpɛtɛ kpɛtɛ.”
42020019	Ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Katɔti bakpane benengu bákya ɔkplu banii beeƒie Yesu na mmɔ, ɔsika bánu báti ka bana lɛlɔ geen ɔsu na úbo lɛgba lɛmmɔ. Nsu baayia bekyuli bammɔ.
42020020	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu ni, báwia ulu ɔbambadi ɔni lɛlɔ basia na beƒie-nwu. Béte bekyuli badi ala na bɔbɛ kemo. Na bása ku-ma lili banii besie Yesu kudɔ. Na babla lɛlɔ aani si litemi lɛmmɔ geen na ama alati baawia bati bete lɛlɔ. Na bátala-ma banii batákywɛ Yesu kakpagyuɛ ku etemila adi. Na bakɛ ulu ɔni na beti-nwu bakya Roma aban unengu enu kemo.
42020021	Ɔmɛni ɔsu kenye bewine bamɛni bésie Yesu kudɔ. Na béye-nwu banini, “Ɔtinane, bɔgyi ka ala ani na aasu ku ani na aatina ƒui adi etemila geen. Na bɔgyi lɛnɔ ka alánu ukyuli anumi taabla ala. Mmomu aatina litemi geen lɛni na Katɔti ɔɔyɔ́ ka bekyuli babla.
42020022	Ɔmɛni ɔsu bɔɔwia ka bɔti si ɔdia ka buteeyi kuyi teete Romaƒuɔ Ɔga Unengudi iye ɔɔɔdia?”
42020023	Nsu Yesu ɔ́ɔnu bana lɛkwɛ likpidi ɔ́ti na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini,
42020024	“Biti sika ɔƒualadi ubi ɔmmɔ bɛtina-mi. Ɔma bɔtaa ku lɛnyi nsia mɛni?”
42020025	Amu na bédie kenye banini, “Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare ɔdi na ɔdi.” Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛƒɔ lɛla biala lɛni ndi Ɔga Unengudi ɔdi bite Ɔga Unengudi. Na bɛƒɔ lɛla biala lɛni ndi Katɔti lɛdi bite Katɔti.”
42020026	Na bekyuli anumi mmɔ ni, bátakana na beƒie-nwu na lɛla lɛdi lɛlɔ. Bana kenye kékpi-ma na bábla yaa na kenye kani na Yesu údie ɔsu.
42020027	Amu na Sadukiƒuɔ bani mɔɔsu banii ukpine ɔsɔ ɔɔɔdubo bɔta ni, bébo Yesu kudɔ na bábasu-nwu banini,
42020028	“Ala ɔtinane, Mose únweni ɔda bubo bɔmɛni úte-bu ɔnini, 'Si ɔnana ɔdi úkpi na ɔ́da ulekudi úse na beeebo bebi ni, na ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔnwani uti uleku ɔmmɔ. Na anwu ku ukpinele ɔmmɔ bawɔ. Na bebi bammɔ ni, bekyuli badubɔnu-ma aani ɔnana ɔni nsɔ neeebo mmɔ bebi.'
42020029	Na uwi ɔdi ni, banwani banana maatɛ bákya. Ɔnanabi unengudi úbeti uleku na úbekpi na anwu ku ulekudi bátawɔ.
42020030	Ɔnwani unyɔdi lɛnɔ úbeti ukpinele ɔmmɔ.
42020031	Ɔtɛdi lɛnɔ lɛni kani. Na lɛla lɛmmɔ kani nálɛku banwani maatɛ bamɛni ƒui. Bana ƒui békpi ɔni na ɔdi útawɔ.
42020032	Kawɔlɔkɔ ƒui ni, uleku ɔmmɔ ɔlati úbekpi.
42020033	Na ɔƒɛni ni, limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na bekpine badubɔsɔ bata ni, ɔmani uleku na uleku ɔmmɔ wadi wenwini ka bana ƒui béti-nwu dii?”
42020034	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Ngba bɔmɛni kemo kani na banana ku beleku beeti lɛlɔ.
42020035	Nsu banana ku beleku ƒui bani námanku ka bata basi bekpine akɔ na ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii kemo ni, basɔ beleti lɛlɔ.
42020036	Badubuse aani kalɛ na Katɔti batu bese, na basɔ belekpi lɛnɔ. Badi Katɔti bebi ɔsika báta bálɛ kekpine.
42020037	Ɔmmɔ kalɔ geen na Mose údie na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka bekpine basɔ baata teelie ngba. Ɔsika uwi ɔni na unye kugyii kɔni mɔɔda anumi ni, ɔ́lɔ Katɔti aani Abraham Katɔti ku Isak Katɔti ku Yakobo lɛnɔ Katɔti.
42020038	Ɔmɛni ɔɔtina ka ama bani néekpi ni, bamua beli ngba. Anwuɔsu ɔdi ama lɛnɔ Katɔti.”
42020039	Mmɔ ni, ɔda bubo ala batinane bammɔ badi bédie kenye banini, “Ala ɔtinane, édie kenye kammɔ geen!”
42020040	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔdi ɔ́sɔ útese kayi na uye lɛla bamba lɛdi lɛnɔ.
42020041	Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Dɛ na ɔ́bla asa na bekyuli básu banii Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔsi Dawid kaba kemo?
42020042	Na Dawid ɔmmɔ ɔlati ɔ́su na kɔgya ɔku kemo ɔnini, 'Unwoti ɔ́su mina Ɔti ɔnii, “Sɔ lie-mi kɔdianu kakɛ
42020043	wetédu uwi ɔni na meti ƒula bekisine makya-a lɛgba kalɔ.” '
42020044	Na si Dawid ɔ́lɔ-nwu ɔnii Ɔti ni, dɛ na ɔ́bla na Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ɔɔbla Dawid kaba kemo ubi?”
42020045	Uwi ɔni na bekyuli ƒui benye beenú ala ani na Yesu ɔɔsu ni, ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini,
42020046	“Binye kagyumana bite lɛlɔ kaduɛ na ɔda bubo ala batinane lɛlɔ. Bekyuli bamɛni baayɔ́ busie taavi na bakya bana lɛwu bonwu bonwu. Na baayɔ́ ka bekyuli beteeboku kalɔ teegyele-ma na kuyeya. Ama mɔɔyɔ́ kuliekɔ kunengudi bulie na Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ ku kuliekɔ kɔbuni na emeyi kadikɔ.
42020047	Beesié bekpinele kudɔ ka betébunku-ma, nsu baatɔ́lɔ-ma taaƒɔ-ma ala. Na baakpali katɔ gyɔlɔɔ taabu bekyuli kɔdɔlɔ. Anwuɔsu bana kɔtu bɔni bɔdubɔkɔ katɔ butulo ƒui!”
42021001	Na kakpakɔ mmɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́talaku anumi na ɔ́nu kalɛ na balakɛne beeti bana etela taabakya kakpakɔ kavumi kemo.
42021002	Na ɔ́nu lɛnɔ kalɛ na ukpinele ɔwabane ɔdi úti kɔplɛ inyɔ bɔdi úbakya kavumi kammɔ kemo.
42021003	Na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii nnii ukpinele ɔwabane ɔmɛni ni, úte lɛla útulo bakladi ƒui.
42021004	Ɔsika bakladi ama ni, lɛla lɛni kani na baayɔ́ na bana lɛkɛ kemo kani na béte. Nsu uleku ɔmmɔ ku nwuna kɔwaba ni, lɛla lɛni ƒui na nse-nwu na nka wadi ni, ani na úti úte mɛni.”
42021005	Uwi ɔmɛni ni, batɛyane badi bakya baatɛmi taasiku Katɔti kakpakɔ lɛlɔ. Na básu kalɛ na kakpakɔ kammɔ kaadia bɔnu ku kalɛ na atabi ammɔ aadia bɔnu ku etela ani na bekyuli béti báklibi Katɔti kakpakɔ kammɔ. Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini,
42021006	“Ala ani ƒui na bɛɛnu mɛni ni, uwi ɔdi ɔdubo ɔni na lɛtabi lɛdi lɛsɔ lɛɛɛdubo buse nina keliekɔ. Mmomu bekyuli badubo ɔdi biala bugyingya búwi kalɔ.”
42021007	Amu na béye-nwu banini, “Ala ɔtinane, uwi ɔmani na ɔdubɔlɛ lɛni? Na bi na bɔdubuti bɔnu bɔti bɔnii uwi ɔni na ala amɛni alɛ údu?”
42021008	Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Binye kagyumana na ukyuli ɔdi utatɔlɔ-mii. Bekyuli pii bani mɔɔsu banii ami mina kenye na beedie ni, badubo na bábasu banii, 'Ami na ɔdi,' na 'Uwi ɔmmɔ úudu'. Nsu bitasiaku-ma kama.
42021009	Bitayia si biinú kekpo kɔku ku bekyuli lɛlɔ bɔta bunye. Ala amɛni udu adubɔka bɔlɛ, nsu ɔɔɔdi nwuna kalɔ ndi ɔnii kawɔlɔkɔ kéede.”
42021010	Yesu ɔ́sɔ úsie anumi na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Kɔlɔ kɔdubukpoku lɛlɔ, na lɛga kɔdikɔ kɔdubukpoku lɛlɔ.
42021011	Kalɔ bɔkunku kpakplaa bɔdubɔkya. Na kɔka bonwu lɛnɔ kɔdubo bɔkya. Na lɛlɛ lidu lidu lɛnɔ lɛdubɔƒɔ ekpo ekpo ƒui. Na liƒu ala adubo butaalɛ na kayaa.
42021012	“Na asa na ala amɛni adububo abalɛ ni, bekyuli badubo-mii buƒie na bekpoku-mii. Bekyuli badubuti-mii bete na batɛku litemi na Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ na bakya-mii ɔtɔ. Na badubo-mii buti buboku baga ku lɛlɔ badine anumi na batɛku-mii litemi na ami ɔsu.
42021013	Na uwi ɔmɛni kemo geen na ulu ɔ́lɛmi úte-mii ka bɛsu Katɔti litemi buni lɛmmɔ.
42021014	Bɛklibi lɛlɔ bise kalɛ na bilékpoku lɛlɔ na ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na bɛdubuti bidie bina lɛlɔ ɔsu.
42021015	Ɔsika ndubuti kenye ogya etemila ku lɛnunda lite-mii kalɛ na bina bekisine badi balakana bunye bɔsiaku-mii iye batɛmi bedie-mii kudii.
42021016	Bina bawɔne ku banwani bananabi ku bina lɛlɔ bekyuli ku bina bakpana ndubo-mii buti bute. Na badubɔdu bina badi.
42021017	Ukyuli biala ɔdubo-mii bukisi na ami ɔsu.
42021018	Nsu alɔlɔ muedi ulelie ɔdi lɛlɔ.
42021019	Binye kpakplaa, na bɛdubɔkɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
42021020	“Si uwi ɔni na bɛ́nu ka bekpone báka bámana Yerusalem ni, bɛdubɔti ka ɔma ɔmmɔ bɔbwɛ uwi údu.
42021021	Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, bekyuli bani ƒui nkya Yudea ni, ɔdi ka bekeli besie abi lɛlɔ. Na bekyuli bani ƒui nkya ɔma bonwu ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔdi ka batɔlɔ. Na bekyuli bani ƒui nkya akpaklɔ ku lɛma lɛni na amadɔ ni, betesie ɔma bonwu ɔmmɔ kemo.
42021022	Ɔsika uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ndi kɔtu bɔni emeyi ani nálɛ ka ebo aani kalɛ na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila átina kalɛ.
42021023	Ɔdubɔyu ɔkplu geen ute beleku bani nda kaƒɔ ku bebi beni bani muute bebi lɛnyi. Lɛbibo bonwu lɛdi lɛdubo kalɔ kamɛni lɛlɔ. Na Katɔti kɔtu bɔni bɔdubo bekyuli bamɛni lɛlɔ.
42021024	Badubo badi bɔdu ku kewii. Na badubo badi buƒie bɔtɔlɔku busienku kɔlɔ bamba lɛlɔ ƒui. Na bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ badubɔdi Yerusalem lɛlɔ úti útédu uwi ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́tunaku-ma.
42021025	“Akɔla ala budie taatina adubo butaalɛ na ɔƒɛ ku kɔbuli ku ayabi anumi. Na kalɔ lɛlɔ bekyuli ƒui badubɔyila lɛnunsia biala. Na bɔyia bonwu bɔdubɔkya bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo na kalɛ na ɛpu uudie lɛdi na uukpóku lɛlɔ ɔsu.
42021026	Bekyuli badubo butaayila na liƒu ɔsu uwi ɔni na béti benye bagya lɛla lɛni ndubɔlɛku kayawi kemodi kammɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔsika ala ani nkya kayaa asɔ elenye ana kenyekɔ, na lɛla biala ɔbladu ɔvumana.
42021027	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndubɔda lɛlɛ kayaa na uyɔlɔ kemo na mina ɔyikun bonwu ku bukeye kemo.
42021028	Si uwi ɔni na ala amɛni ése kalɔ aalɛ́ ni, bɛklibi lɛlɔ na bitaasia anu, ɔsika bina bɔƒɔ uwi úude.”
42021029	Amu na Yesu úbo-ma lɛgba lɛdi ɔnini, “Bɛbu kɔdingyii ku egyii abambadi lɛlɔ bɛnu.
42021030	Si bɛ́nu ka evete awɔdi ése kalɔ aalɛ́ ni, bɛgyi bɛnii ketudi kéede.
42021031	Lɛni kani na si bɛ́nu ka ala amɛni aalɛ́ ni, bɛgyi bɛnii Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ bubo uwi úudu.
42021032	“Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ala amɛni ƒui adubɔlɛ asa na bina akɔ badi na mɛni bɛdubɔsa bukpi.
42021033	Katɔ ku kalɔ kadubɔvi, nsu mina etemila anya aaadubo bɔvi kudii.
42021034	“Bɛnu kaduɛ na bileti bina uwi bilete bɔdi ku bɔni ebiti sɔɔn. Na ɔdi uléteekpoku nwuna lɛlɔ na kayawi kamɛni ala lɛlɔ. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛdubo-mii buyu bɔtu.
42021035	Na ɔdubɔbla aani kalɛ na kakpagyuɛ keedie ebuo. Na ukyuli biala ulálɛ-nwu kemo.
42021036	Anwuɔsu binye kagyumana na bitaakpali katɔ uwi biala kalɛ na bɛkɛ ɔyikun na bɛlɛ sɛɛn na ala ani ƒui ndubɔlɛ mɛni kemo ku kalɛ na bɛkana ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, litemi bɔtɛ kenye bunye.”
42021037	Na emeyi ammɔ kemo ƒui ni, Yesu úti útaatina bekyuli bammɔ ala na Katɔti kakpakɔ. Na useyi uwi ni, ɔɔtɔlɔ teesie Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ.
42021038	Na ɔdigyewi biala ni, bekyuli bammɔ baata teesie kakpakɔ teeténu-nwu ala bɔtina.
42022001	Uwi údu ka Yudaƒuɔ badi bodobodo ɔni néteƒu na limeyi lɛni baalɔ Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi lɛlɔ.
42022002	Nsu ka Katɔti bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane baayia bekyuli bammɔ ɔsu ni, bátaawia ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na basia badu Yesu na bɔbɛ kemo.
42022003	Amu na Satan úduo Yuda ɔni baalɔ lɛnɔ banii Iskariot lɛlɔ kemo. Na ɔdi Yesu batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ akɔ unwi.
42022004	Anwuɔsu Yuda úsie Katɔti bakpane benengu ku Katɔti kakpakɔ lɛlɔ banune benengu kudɔ. Na bátɛmi básiku ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔdubɔvi asa na beƒie Yesu lɛlɔ.
42022005	Ebiti áda-ma, na básu-nwu ka badubɔƒɔ-nwu kayu kadi.
42022006	Na Yuda lɛnɔ únu kalɔ lɛni. Anwuɔsu úse kalɔ ɔɔwia uwi ɔbuni ɔni lɛlɔ na weti Yesu wakya-ma enu.
42022007	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, limeyi lɛni na badu baƒonu bebi bete Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi líbedu na bodobodo ɔni néteƒu emeyi bɔdi kemo.
42022008	Na Yesu ɔ́tala Petro ku Yohane ku kenye kamɛni ɔnini, “Bisie na bitáklibi Kukpi Lili Bɔvia adila bise kalɛ na bɔdi.”
42022009	Mmɔ na béye-nwu banini, “Wɛ na aayɔ́ ka bɔklibi-nya buse?”
42022010	Amu na údie kenye ɔnini, “Si biiduo Yerusalem ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔdubo-mii bɔsiaku ɔni nti ntu ku ketubwi. Bɛsiaku-nwu na bitéduo kaduli kani kemo na weduo.
42022011	Na bɛsu ɔtɔlati ɔmmɔ bɛnii, 'Ala ɔtinane ɔnii buye-ɔ bɔnii, “Ɔtɔ ɔmani kemo na ami ku mina batɛyane bɔdubo Kukpi Lili Bɔvia adila bɔdi?” '
42022012	Ɔdubɔtina-mii katu taasia lɛgbanya lɛdi ka báklibi-nwu na bése kuliekɔ bése-nwu kemo. Bɛklibi adila ammɔ bise mmɔ.”
42022013	Amu na báyu ulu na bésie bátánu lɛla biala pɛpɛɛpɛ aani kalɛ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma. Na báklibi Kukpi Lili Bɔvia adila ammɔ bése mmɔ.
42022014	Ka uwi ɔmmɔ údu ni, Yesu ku nwuna batalane bésie bétélie kalɔ kalɛ na badi.
42022015	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔdi-mi bɔyɔ ɔ́si kukuuku ƒui ka lɛdiku-mii Kukpi Lili Bɔvia adila amɛni asa na libo abi.
42022016	Na mɔɔsu-mii kede kede nnii nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo-nya bɔdi úti útédu uwi ɔni na lɛla lɛni na adila amɛni bɔdi bɔdanku lɛdubɔlɛ na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ.”
42022017	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu úti ɔɔƒɛɛ na ɔ́gya Katɔti enu. Na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bɛƒɔ ɔmɛni na bɛni bite lɛlɔ.
42022018	Mɔɔsu-mii nnii ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ni, nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo ntɛ bɔmɛni udu bɔni amu ntu uwi ɔni na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ kébo.”
42022019	Amu na úti bodobodo ɔdi na ɔ́gya Katɔti enu. Na ɔ́bwɛ-nwu kɔkɛ kɔkɛ na úti úte-ma. Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔmɛni ndi mina ɔlɔna ɔni na ndubuti lɛkpa lite Katɔti na bina lili. Bɛbla ɔmɛni na biti bitaakali-mi.”
42022020	Lɛni kani na úti ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔni kemo na ntɛ buwi úte-ma na adila ammɔ kama na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔmɛni ndi Katɔti bunyimi bɔwɔdi bɔni na úse likpo ku mina ubugya ɔni ndubuwi kalɔ na amii ɔsu.
42022021	Nsu ni, bɛnu bɛti bɛnii ukyuli ɔni ndubuti-mi ute badu ni, ulie ɔɔdiku-mi na kadikɔ mɛni.
42022022	Na ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, ndubo bukpi aani kalɛ na Katɔti ɔ́lɛ ugyii úse. Nsu ni, bɔbwɛ muute ukyuli ɔni makya-mi kakya.”
42022023	Mmɔ na bese kalɔ ku lɛlɔ buye teenu bana akɔ ɔni geen ndubo udu ɔmɛni bɔbla.
42022024	Unyeƒi ɔdi úbeduo batɛyane bammɔ akɔ ɔ́si bana akɔ ɔni baakali banii anwu ntulo ƒui lɛlɔ.
42022025	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ ni, bana baga bebo ɔyikun na bana bekyuli lɛlɔ. Na lɛlɔ badine bamɛni bebo lɛnyi lɛni na baayɔ́ ka bekyuli bammɔ bataalɔ-ma lɛni ndi Bekyuli Bakpana.
42022026	Nsu ɔɔɔdi lɛni na ɔlɛka use na bina akɔ. Mmomu ukyuli ɔni ntulo ƒui na bina akɔ ni, ɔlɛka ɔbla lɛlɔ ubliidi ƒui na bakladi akɔ. Na ɔdi ka ɔtɔnkune unwini kabla ɔblane.
42022027	Ɔma ndi ukyuli ɔni ntulo, ukyuli ɔni nlie kalɔ ɔɔdi, munuu ukyuli ɔni néti adila úse-nwu? Use nwaa ka ukyuli ɔni nlie kalɔ ɔɔdi ntulo. Nsu ami nkya-mii akɔ aani ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla-mii kabla.
42022028	Bíise kayi bɛ́siaku-mi na mina uwi kpakplaa ƒui kemo.
42022029	Na aani kalɛ na mina Ɔti úte-mi kenyekɔ ka lɛdi bekyuli lɛlɔ ni, lɛni kani na ndubo-mii kenyekɔ kammɔ udu bute.
42022030	Bɛdubɔdi na bɛni na mina adila kadikɔ na mina lɛga kadikɔ. Na bɛdubulie bagaboku lɛlɔ na bɛdi Israel kaba leevu-inyɔ kɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.”
42022031	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su Simon Petro ɔnini, “Simon, Simon! Se atu! Katɔti úte Satan kuƒi ka ɔkɔku-mii ɔnu na ule bani ndia ku bani naaadia ntɛ aani kalɛ umonsene ɔɔƒɛ́ kamu ebi taalɛku ligyɔ kemo.
42022032	Nsu ni, Simon, lɛ́ɛkpali katɔ na ƒula lili kalɛ na ƒula bɔƒɔtaadi bulayuɛ. Na uwi ɔni na adubunwini ebo-mi kudɔ ni, na akya ƒula banwani ɔkplu.”
42022033	Mmɔ na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Blɔti, nnye kagyumana ka ami ku awɔ ƒui bɔtɛ ɔtɔ, na bukpi muedi!”
42022034	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Petro, mɔɔsu-ɔ nnii usien ɔmɛni asa na akɔkɔ wete kenye ni, adubɔsu kɔtɛ ƒui ka aaagyi-mi.”
42022035	Amu na Yesu úye nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Uwi ɔdi návi ka lɛ́tala-mii na bɛɛɛda kavumi iye koƒo iye lɛgbanvuo lɛdi ni, bɛ́yaki lɛla lɛdi?” Amu na bédie kenye banii, “Bútayaki ina lɛlakpa linwi muedi.”
42022036	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Nsu ɔƒɛni ni, ukyuli ɔni mbo kavumi kadi iye koƒo kɔdi ni, uti ɔda. Na ukyuli ɔni neeebo kewii kadi ni, ɔdi ka uti nwuna awu ɔni na ɔɔkya taasia ɔtɔdi lɛlɔ uye, na usie utéye kewii kadi.
42022037	Na mɔɔsu-mii nnii Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo litemi lɛni mɔɔsu lɛnii, 'Baka-nwu bákya bekyuli bekpidi akɔ' ni, ɔlɛka libo-nwu kemo lɛni na mina lɛlɔ. Ɔsika lɛla lɛni na bénweni básiku-mi lɛlɔ ni, ɔlɛka ubo-nwu kemo lɛni sɔsɔ.”
42022038	Mmɔ na batɛyane bammɔ básu-nwu banini, “Blɔti, nu! Aanu kuwii inyɔ mɛni!” Amu na údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔmmɔ ɔ́bɔ.”
42022039	Yesu ɔ́vi ɔ́lɛ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na ɔɔyɔ́ bɔbla. Na batɛyane bammɔ lɛnɔ básiaku-nwu.
42022040	Ka údu likpo lɛmmɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Bitaakpali katɔ kalɛ na bileduo bukpoku taanu kemo.”
42022041	Amu na ɔ́da-ma úse na ɔ́kpɛ ɔ́lɛ-ma kudɔ úsie sɛsɛɛ na útálɛ akɔnkɔ na ɔ́kpali katɔ.
42022042	Na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ati, si átuna ni, na aƒɔ lɛbibo ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔmɛni na mina kudɔ. Nsu ni, tabla mina lɛyɔla, mmomu bla ƒula lɛdi.”
42022043	Mmɔ na Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi ɔ́si katɔ ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ-nwu anumi na ɔ́kya-nwu ɔyikun.
42022044	Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kpali katɔ úbu kpakplaa ɔni na únu ɔlɛ geen. Na ewulu ani nátuku-nwu ese aani ubugya na eedú teewi kalɔ.
42022045	Ka Yesu ɔ́ta na kesii kani na ɔɔkpali katɔ mmɔ ni, únwini úsie batɛyane bammɔ kudɔ. Na útánu ka batɛ baalɛɛ na kɔnyana kɔni néƒie-ma ɔsu.
42022046	Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na bɛtɛ bɛɛlɛɛ? Bɛta na bitaakpali katɔ kalɛ na bileduo bukpoku taanu kemo.”
42022047	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔmua unye ɔɔtɛmi ni, bekyuli pii badi bábalɛ-nwu lɛlɔ. Na Yuda ɔni ndi batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ akɔ unwi ntɔnku-ma. Úsie úbo Yesu kudɔ na ɔ́kya-nwu kɔgbu.
42022048	Nsu Yesu ɔ́su Yuda ɔnini, “Yuda, kɔgbu na ébo aakya ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, na eti-mi akya bekyuli enu kemo?”
42022049	Uwi ɔni na batɛyane bani nkya mmɔ ku Yesu bánu lɛla lɛni ndubo bɔlɛ ni, béye Yesu banini, “Blɔti, buteebeyi-ma ku bula kuwii?”
42022050	Amu na batɛyane bammɔ akɔ unwi úbeyi ɔkpane unengudi kabla ɔblane kɔdianu kɔtu úkulo.
42022051	Nsu Yesu ɔ́bala-ma ɔnini, “Ɔdi ɔsɔ utabla lɛla lɛdi na ɔmmɔ kama.” Amu na útuku kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ kɔtu na nwuna kɔtu kɔ́sɔ kúnwini kúbese kalɛ kani na kuse.
42022052	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su bakpane benengu ku kakpakɔ lɛlɔ banune benengu ku kadi benengu bani nébo mmɔ banii bebeƒie-nwu ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na ɔlɛka biti ligyii ku lɛkɛɛ bibo aani si ɔkantankpine na ndi?
42022053	Lɛ́kya-mii kudɔ na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ limeyi ndi limeyi na bitákya ɔkplu bɛnii biiƒie-mi. Nsu ni, Katɔti néte-mii kuƒi kɔmɛni. Na Satan ɔyikun ɔdi lɛlɔ ɔƒaani.”
42022054	Bakpane benengu ku lɛlɔ badine bammɔ béƒie Yesu, na béti-nwu bésienku ɔkpane unengudi kaduli. Na Petro lɛnɔ ɔsiaku-ma na kama kama.
42022055	Bekyuli badi básula ogya ɔdi na kaduli kammɔ kemo, na Petro lɛnɔ úsie unye ɔɔwaaku-ma.
42022056	Ka beleku kabla bablane bammɔ akɔ unwi ɔ́nu Petro ka ulie mmɔ ni, ɔ́kywɛ-nwu lɛnimi kɔnakunwi na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔmɛni lɛnɔ ɔsiaku Yesu.”
42022057	Nsu Petro úni ɔmɛni na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Uleku lɛɛɛgyi-nwu muedi!”
42022058	Na uwi klukui ɔdi kama ni, ɔnana ɔdi lɛnɔ ɔ́nu Petro ɔ́ti na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ lɛnɔ bana akɔ unwi na adi?” Nsu Petro ɔ́sɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔnana, ɔɔɔdi ami na ɔdi!”
42022059	Amu na ɔbla aani ɔdɔ unwi bubo kama ni, ɔnana ɔbambadi ɔdi lɛnɔ ɔ́sɔ úbo unye ɔɔsu kpakplaa ɔnii, “Unyeƒi ɔdi biala uuubo ɔmɛni kemo banii ɔnana ɔmɛni lɛnɔ ɔ́siaku Yesu, ɔsika Galileani na ɔdi!”
