42022060	Nsu Petro údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔnana, lɛɛɛgyi lɛla lɛni na aasu mɛni kula kula!” Kɔnakunwi ni, ɔni na ɔ́mua unye ɔɔtɛmi ni, akɔkɔ úte kenye.
42022061	Mmɔ na Blɔti únwini na ɔ́nu Petro ɔnusɛ. Amu na Petro únyimo ka Blɔti ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Asa na akɔkɔ wete kenye usien ɔmɛni ni, adubɔsu kɔtɛ ƒui ka aaagyi-mi.”
42022062	Mmɔ na Petro ɔ́vi ɔ́lɛ na útéwulo momoomo.
42022063	Bekyuli bani mɔɔgyumana Yesu na mmɔ ni, bákya-nwu lɛlɔ lɛma na bébo-nwu.
42022064	Bényimi-nwu anumi na bébo-nwu, na béye-nwu banini, “Su-bu ukyuli ɔni nébo-ɔ.”
42022065	Na bédumi-nwu na lilu bamba pii lɛnɔ lɛlɔ.
42022066	Uwi ɔni na kadi káda ni, kadi benengu ku Katɔti bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bábasa lisu. Na béti Yesu béboku bana anumi.
42022067	Amu na kasalakɔ bekyuli bammɔ béye Yesu banini, “Su-bu si awɔ ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ.” Amu na údie kenye ɔnini, “Si ina lɛ́su-mii lɛla lɛdi ni, bɛɛɛdubo bɔƒɔ bɔdi.
42022068	Na si líye-mii litemi lɛdi ni, bɛɛɛdubo kenye budie bɔsu-mi lɛla lɛdi.
42022069	Nsu ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ni, Katɔti ɔdubuse ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, liboku na nwuna kɔdianu.”
42022070	Amu na bana ƒui béye-nwu banini, “Amu ni, Katɔti Ubidi na adi?” Amu na údie kenye ɔnini, “Amii alati mɔɔsu bɛnii anwu na ndi.”
42022071	Amu na básu banini, “Bɔsɔ buláwia ka ukyuli bamba ɔdi udie kenye kadi na ɔmɛni lɛlɔ. Abu alati búnu ala ani na ɔ́su!”
42023001	Amu na bana ƒui báta na bétiku Yesu bésienku Pilato kudɔ.
42023002	Mmɔ na bése baadá-nwu kenye banini, “Búƒie ukyuli ɔmɛni ka ɔ́kpanku bula kadi ɔɔvínku ulu ukpidi lɛlɔ. Na ɔɔsu-ma ɔnii basɔ bataƒɔ kuyi betete Romaƒuɔ Ɔga Unengudi. Na ɔ́su lɛnɔ ɔnii anwu ndi Katɔti Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi na ɔnii ɔdi ɔga lɛnɔ.”
42023003	Amu na Pilato úye-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ ndi Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga?” Na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Awɔ mɔɔsu.”
42023004	Mmɔ na Pilato ɔ́su bakpane benengu ku bekyuli bammɔ ɔnini, “Ńtanu lɛla lɛdi na ukyuli ɔmɛni lɛlɔ kalɛ na lɛdu-nwu kɔtɔ kɔdi.”
42023005	Nsu bénye kpakplaa bébu na básu banii, “Nwuna ala ani na ɔɔtina éti lɛsɛ éboku Yudea bekyuli ƒui akɔ. Úse ɔmɛni kalɔ na Galilea, na úubo úbedu mɛni lɛnɔ.”
42023006	Uwi ɔni na Pilato únu litemi lɛmɛni ni, úye-ma ɔnini, “Galileani na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔdi?”
42023007	Anwuɔsu ka ɔ́ti ka Yesu ɔ́si Galilea kalɛkɛ kani lɛlɔ na Herode ɔɔdi ɔsu ni, úti-nwu úmene Herode. Na Herode ɔmɛni úsie ɔkya Yerusalem uwi ɔmmɔ kemo.
42023008	Ebiti áda Herode geen uwi ɔni na ɔ́nu Yesu, ɔsika úunu-nwu kɔku na ɔɔwia ka ɔnu-nwu ɔ́si kukuuku ƒui. Na ubo lɛnunsia ka ɔdubɔnu Yesu na ɔbla akɔla budie taatina bɔdi.
42023009	Anwuɔsu Herode úye Yesu etemila pii, nsu Yesu útedie lɛdi kenye.
42023010	Mmɔ na bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bálɛ bébo animi na báda kenye bonwu bonwu básia Yesu.
42023011	Herode ku nwuna bekpone báma Yesu na bédumi-nwu. Na béti awu gyɔlɔɔ ɔbuni ɔdi bákya-nwu aani ɔga kalɛ, na básɔku-nwu bémene Pilato.
42023012	Limeyi lɛmmɔ kani na Herode ku Pilato bénwini bakpana, na nka badi bekisine.
42023013	Pilato ɔ́lɔ bakpane benengu ku batɔnkune ku bekyuli bammɔ ɔ́sala.
42023014	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛ́kpanku ukyuli ɔmɛni biboku-mi bɛnii ɔɔkpanku bekyuli taavinku ulu ukpidi lɛlɔ. Na ɔƒɛni ni, líye-nwu ala na amii alati anumi. Na ńtanu lɛla likpidi lɛdi na nwuna lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na amii bɛ́da-nwu kenye.
42023015	Na Herode lɛnɔ útanu lɛla likpidi lɛdi na nwuna lɛlɔ, ɔsika na ɔ́sɔku-nwu úmene-bu. Ukyuli ɔmɛni útabla lɛla lɛni na bɔdu-nwu kukpi kɔtɔ.
42023016	Anwuɔsu ndubɔya na bebo-nwu kugyiimi na lɛda-nwu lɛnyonu.”
42023017	Na Kukpi Lili Bɔvia bɔdi emeyi biala kemo ni, ɔdi Pilato kabla ka ɔnyonu ɔtɔ batɛne akɔ unwi ute-ma.
42023018	Amu na bana ƒui báva momoomo banii, “Du-nwu! Na anyonu Baraba ete-bu!”
42023019	Na Baraba ɔmɛni ni, bákya-nwu ɔtɔ na lɛsɛ lɛdi na ɔ́kya na ɔma unengudi ɔmmɔ kemo ku ukyuli bɔdu ɔsu.
42023020	Na ka Pilato ɔ́yɔ ka ɔnyonu Yesu ɔsu ni, ɔ́sɔ útemi úte bekyuli bammɔ.
42023021	Nsu ama báva básialaku-nwu litemi lɛlɔ banii, “Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ! Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ!”
42023022	Mmɔ na Pilato ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma kɔtɛdi ɔnini, “Na bi likpidi na ɔ́bla? Ńtanu lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla na mɔɔdú-nwu kukpi kɔtɔ! Ndubɔya na bebo-nwu kugyiimi na lɛnyonu-nwu.”
42023023	Nsu bunye kani na benye baava momoomo banii, “Ɔdi ka aya na bɔkana Yesu bɔmana ugyii lɛlɔ.” Na kawɔlɔkɔ ni, bádi lɛlɔ.
42023024	Anwuɔsu Pilato úkulo litemi lɛmmɔ kemo kalɛ na bekyuli bammɔ baawia.
42023025	Na ɔ́nyonu ukyuli ɔni na baayɔ́ úte-ma. Na ɔdi ukyuli ɔni na litemi batɛne bákya ɔtɔ na lɛsɛ ku ukyuli bɔdu ɔsu. Na ɔ́nyonu Yesu ɔ́kya-ma enu kemo na batáblaku-nwu kalɛ na baayɔ́.
42023026	Bekpone bákpanku Yesu bátɔlɔku. Na ɔni bakɛ ulu bésela ni, bátásiaku Kireneni ɔdi baalɔ Simon ka ɔ́si lɛkpaklɔ lɛdi ɔdubo Yerusalem. Bédi-nwu bényene na bénye-nwu lɛlɔ banii uti ɔƒɔ ugyii ɔni na Yesu uti mmɔ na ɔsiaku-nwu kama.
42023027	Bekyuli pii badi basiaku Yesu kama. Na beleku badi bakya bana akɔ bani nkɛ muuwulo teete-nwu.
42023028	Amu na Yesu únwini na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Yerusalem beleku, bitewulo bitete-mi. Mmomu biteewulo na amii ku bina bebi lili.
42023029	Ɔsika uwi ɔdi ɔdubo ɔni na bekyuli badubɔsu banii, 'Lɛlɔ litaayɔ bedinkɔ ku kaƒɔ kani kemo na ubi útalɛ tɔ kudii ku anyi ani na bátanyimi kudii!'
42023030	Uwi ɔmmɔ ndi uwi ɔni na bekyuli badubɔsu abi banii, 'Ƒɛ beewi-bu lɛlɔ!' Na badubɔsu abinkpo banii, 'Bɛla-bu!'
42023031	Ɔsika si bákana na báni ukyuli ɔni na útabla lɛla lɛdi kɔtu lɛni ni, bɛti bɛnii bekyuli bekpidi kɔtu bɔni bɔdubutulo ɔmɛni ƒui.”
42023032	Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, bekpone bétiku banana bekpidi inyɔ badi bésela batádu ku Yesu.
42023033	Ka bébedu likpo lɛni baalɔ banii Opokuo ni, bákana Yesu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ mmɔ. Na banana bekpidi inyɔ bammɔ lɛnɔ ni, bákana-ma bámana ligyii lɛlɔ na Yesu kɔmii ku kɔdianu kakɛ.
42023034	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ati, ti kyiɛ-ma, ɔsika baaagyi lɛla lɛni na baabla.” Ɔmmɔ kama ni, bekpone bammɔ béle Yesu adala aani kalɛ na ɔdi biala egulabi ani na ɔ́tu ádi kalɛ.
42023035	Na uwi ɔmmɔ ni, bekyuli bammɔ ƒui benye mmɔ baanu. Na Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune bammɔ benye baamá Yesu taasu banini, “Ɔ́ƒɔ bekyuli bamba ngba, anwuɔsu ɔlɛka ɔƒɔ anwu ɔlati bɔdi lɛnɔ si anwu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni na Katɔti úse likpo úse na bɔnu ɛ-ɛ!”
42023036	Lɛni kani na bekpone bammɔ lɛnɔ báma Yesu. Na bésie-nwu kudɔ na béti ntɛ bɔni nányi béte-nwu banii ɔni.
42023037	Na básu-nwu banini, “Si Yudaƒuɔ ɔga na adi ni, na ekpo aƒɔ lɛlɔ!”
42023038	Na nwuna eli kakɛ ni, bunweni bɔdi bɔsia na bɔɔsu bɔnii, “Ɔmɛni ndi Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga.”
42023039	Bekyuli bekpidi bani lɛnɔ na bákana bámana ligyii lɛlɔ mmɔ akɔ unwi ɔkya uudumi Yesu ɔnini, “Ɔɔɔdi awɔ ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ? Kpo die lɛlɔ, na edie abu lɛnɔ!”
42023040	Mmɔ na ukyuli unyɔdi ɔ́dɔnku-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ aláyia Katɔti yoo? Kɔtu bɔni bunwi pɛ na bekpone béti béte awɔ ku anwu ƒui.
42023041	Na abu bula kɔtu bɔni ni, bɔdi ulu lɛlɔ. Ɔsika lɛla lɛni námanku-bu ni, ani na béti béte-bu. Nsu anwu útabla lɛla likpidi lɛdi.”
42023042	Amu na ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Yesu, nyimo-mi si éduo ƒula lɛga kadikɔ.”
42023043	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-ɔ geen nnii ɔmwi ɔmɛni kani ni, ami ku awɔ ƒui bɔdubo buduo Paradiso kemo.”
42023044	Uwi ɔmmɔ ka ɔ́bla aani ɔƒiiwi lɛdɔ leevu-inyɔ ni, ɔƒɛ ɔ́da bɔlɛ ɔ́ya na kadi kábla suu na kalɔ kammɔ ƒui lɛlɔ úti útédu lɛdɔ ɛtɛ kemo.
42023045	Na Katɔti kakpakɔ kɔdi kɔni nƒa mmɔ kɔ́bwɛ na kúle akpa anyɔ.
42023046	Na Yesu ɔ́va ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Ati, líti mina kɔyu lɛ́kya-a enu kemo.” Ka ɔ́su ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́yula.
42023047	Bekpone ɔtɔnkune ɔmmɔ ɔ́nu lɛla lɛni nálɛ na úmwi Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, “Sɔsɔ geen na ɔdi ka ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔdi ukyuli ɔbuni.”
42023048	Ka bekyuli bani nébo banii babanu ala ani mɔɔlɛ́ bánu lɛla lɛni nálɛ ni, bénwini bésie kɔduli na béti enu béwi lili.
42023049	Na bekyuli bani ƒui ngyi Yesu ku beleku bani nsiaku-nwu bási Galilea ni, bédi bénye ɔgyu sɛsɛɛ baanu ala amɛni.
42023050	Ɔnana ɔdi ɔkya ɔni baalɔ Yoseƒ na ɔ́si Arimatea na Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔdi ukyuli ɔbuni ɔni na bekyuli baabu geen. Na unye ɔgya uwi ɔni na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kadububo.
42023051	Ina ka ɔ́kya Yudaƒuɔ litemi batɛne bammɔ akɔ ni, útatunaku-ma na lɛla lɛni na bálɛ ugyii ku lɛla lɛni na bábla lɛlɔ.
42023052	Úsie Pilato anumi na útévele-nwu Yesu ukpine.
42023053	Amu na ɔ́ƒami ukpine ɔmmɔ na úti kɔdi kɔƒualadi únyimi-nwu lɛlɔ ƒui. Na úti-nwu útáva lɛtabi ubu kaƒiɔtɔ ɔdi kemo ɔni bátáva ukyuli ɔdi nwuna kemo kudii.
42023054	Limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛdi limeyi lɛni na baaklibi lɛlɔ asa na lɛnwunameyi kadi kegye.
42023055	Na beleku bani nsiaku Yesu ɔ́si Galilea ni, básiaku Yoseƒ bésie kaƒiɔtɔ kudɔ kesii kani na báva Yesu ukpine ɔmmɔ.
42023056	Na básɔ bénwini bésie kaduli na bátákɔ ala ƒɛƒɛɛ ɔni na beeti taawɛɛ ukpine lɛlɔ bése. Amu na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ni, bánwuna aani kalɛ na ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ bɔɔtina.
42024001	Na Kwasida ɔtanta tutuutu ni, beleku bammɔ bésie kaƒiɔtɔ kɔtu na bada ala ani ƒui na báklibi bése.
42024002	Mmɔ ni, bánu ka kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kenye kewi na lɛtabi bonwu lɛni na béti bákalɛ mmɔ lɛlɛ kɔmadɔ.
42024003	Anwuɔsu béduo bésie kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kemo, nsu bátanu Blɔti Yesu ukpine ɔmmɔ.
42024004	Ɔmɛni ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye. Na kɔnakunwi ni, nkyuli inyɔ badi báda bálɛ-ma lɛlɔ. Na bakya lɛwu lɛni muukeye na lɛɛtu anumi.
42024005	Liƒu lɛ́da-ma geen ɔni na béboku lɛlɔ kalɔ béte bekyuli bammɔ. Na bekyuli bammɔ béye-ma banini, “Bi ɔsu na bɛɛwia ukyuli ɔni nli ngba na bekpine akɔ?
42024006	Uuubo mɛni. Katɔti ɔ́gyila-nwu! Binyimo lɛla lɛni na ɔ́su-mii uwi ɔni na ɔkya Galilea ɔnii
42024007	ɔlɛka bekyuli beti Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi bakya bekyuli bekpidi enu kemo. Na bakana-nwu bamana ugyii lɛlɔ. Na emeyi atɛ kama ni, ɔdubɔsɔ ɔta ɔlɛ bekpine akɔ.”
42024008	Mmɔ ni, beleku bammɔ bényimo nwuna etemila ammɔ.
42024009	Na básɔ bénwini bási kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kudɔ na bátásu batalane leevu-unwi bammɔ ku bakladi ƒui lɛnɔ ala amɛni.
42024010	Beleku bammɔ ndi Maria Magdalene ku Yohana ku Maria ɔni ndi Yakobo uni. Ama ku beleku babambadi násu batalane bammɔ ala amɛni.
42024011	Nsu batalane bammɔ bákali banii ala ani na beleku bammɔ básu-ma adi kɔdɔlɔ etemila. Na bátaƒɔ bátadi.
42024012	Nsu Petro ɔ́ta na úkeli úsie kaƒiɔtɔ kudɔ mmɔ. Na ka úbo kalɔ ɔ́nu kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kemo ni, ɔ́nu ukpine kɔvadi, nsu ɔ́sɔ útanu lɛla lɛdi. Na ɔ́sɔ únwini ɔni na ɔ́bla-nwu dɛye dɛye na ala ani nálɛ ɔ́su.
42024013	Na limeyi lɛmmɔ kani lɛlɔ ni, Yesu basiakune inyɔ badi bakɛ ulu bésela lɛkpaklɔ lɛdi baalɔ banii Emaus kemo. Na ɔdubɔbla aani eluku maatɛ ɔ́si mmɔ útédu Yerusalem.
42024014	Na bakya baatɛmiku lɛlɔ na ala ani ƒui nálɛ lɛlɔ.
42024015	Ka bakɛ baatɛmi na béduo atɛ amɛni kemo ni, Yesu ɔlati úsie útásiaku-ma na anwu ku-ma bakɛ.
42024016	Bánu-nwu, nsu bátati banii anwu na ɔdi.
42024017	Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi na bɛkɛ bɛɛsu na ulu?” Na bédi bénye. Na bana anumi aatina ka bana lɛlɔ lɛ́ɛkywi kaƒɔ.
42024018	Na bana akɔ unwi ɔni baalɔ banii Kleopa úye Yesu ɔnini, “Awɔ lɛti pɛ ndi ɔƒɔ na Yerusalem na átati ala ani nátaalɛ mmɔ emeyi klukui amɛni kemo yoo?”
42024019	Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi ala?” Na bédie kenye banii, “Ala ani nálɛku Yesu Nasareni. Ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔdi Katɔti kenye udiene ɔni na Katɔti ku bekyuli ƒui bánu ka ubo ɔyikun geen na nwuna ablala ku ala ani na ɔ́su ƒui kemo.
42024020	Yudaƒuɔ Katɔti bakpane benengu ku bula lɛlɔ badine béti-nwu bákya Roma aban unengu enu kemo na ɔ́du-nwu kukpi kɔtɔ na bákana-nwu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ.
42024021	Nsu abu bɔ́kya bútaasia anu bɔnii anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni ndubɔƒɔ Israel bekyuli ƒui. Na ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔmwi ndi limeyi lɛtɛdi ka ala amɛni álɛ.
42024022	Bula lɛkpa lɛmɛni akɔ beleku badi báya na bula kayi kábla kalɛ kadi. Ɔsika bésie nwuna kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kudɔ ɔtanta tutuutu ɔmɛni.
42024023	Nsu bátatánu ukpine ɔmmɔ. Na bénwini bábasu-bu banii Katɔti batu badi bédie lɛlɔ bátina-ma. Na básu-ma banii Yesu uli ngba.
42024024	Bula badi akɔ badi bésie kaƒiɔtɔ kudɔ mmɔ na bátánu kalɛ na beleku bammɔ básu pɛpɛɛpɛ, nsu bátanu-nwu.”
42024025	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛ́dɔlɔ! Na bina bɔƒɔtaadi na ala ani na Katɔti kenye bediene básu-mii lɛlɔ bɔba!
42024026	Bɛɛɛgyi bɛnii ɔlɛka Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ubo abi amɛni udu asa na uduo nwuna lɛga bɔdi bukeye kemo?”
42024027	Na Yesu údie ala ammɔ kalɔ úte-ma ɔ́si ala ani na bénweni bákya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ɔ́si Mose ɔku ku ala ani ƒui na Katɔti kenye bediene bénweni ɔkɛnku anwu Yesu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.
42024028	Ka badaku lɛkpaklɔ lɛmmɔ budu ni, Yesu ɔ́bla aani si ɔ́vi úsela anumi.
42024029	Nsu bábala-nwu básu banini, “Kadi káasa ɔsu ni, sɔ kya-bu kudɔ mɛni.” Anwuɔsu úsie útéduo-ma kudɔ mmɔ.
42024030	Úlie kalɔ ɔnii ɔɔdiku-ma. Na úti bodobodo na ɔ́gya Katɔti enu, na ɔ́bwɛ-nwu kemo na úti úte-ma.
42024031	Mmɔ na bana anumi ébimi na bánu-nwu báti. Nsu ɔ́yii-ma anumi.
42024032	Amu na básu lɛlɔ banii, “Uwi ɔni na ɔkya ɔɔtɛmiku-bu na uudie Bunweni Kedee Ɔku etemila kalɔ teete-bu na ulu lɛlɔ ni, ebiti adi udu áda-bu kayi kemo.”
42024033	Mmɔ na báta kɔnakunwi na básɔ bénwini bésie Yerusalem. Na bátánu batalane leevu-unwi bammɔ ka básala lɛlɔ ku bekyuli bamba lɛnɔ.
42024034	Na básu-ma banini, “Blɔti ɔ́ta ɔ́lɛ kekpine sɔsɔ, na údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina Simon.”
42024035	Amu na nkyuli inyɔ bammɔ lɛnɔ bédie kalɔ básu-ma ala ani nálɛ na ulu lɛlɔ ku kalɛ na bánu-nwu báti uwi ɔni na ɔ́bwɛ bodobodo ɔmmɔ úte-ma.
42024036	Ka nkyuli inyɔ bamɛni badaku bana litemi bɔsu ni, kɔnakunwi Yesu úbo úbenye-ma ntɛ. Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-mii.”
42024037	Liƒu lɛ́da-ma geen, na básu banii ukpine kɔyu na baanu.
42024038	Nsu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Liƒu litada-mii lɛni! Na bina kasusu lɛnɔ keteƒu.
42024039	Bɛnu-mi enu ku lɛgba. Na bituku-mi na bɛnu bɛti ka ami na ɔdi. Ɔsika ukpine kɔyu kuuubo ɔlɔna ku ekubi aani kalɛ na bɛɛnu-mi ka mbo mɛni.”
42024040	Ka ɔ́su lɛni ni, úti nwuna enu ku lɛgba ɔ́tina-ma.
42024041	Ebiti áda-ma geen na ɔ́bla-ma kalɛ kadi ɔni na bátati kalɛ baƒɔ badi muedi! Mmɔ na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Adila adi ese?”
42024042	Amu na béti kakpaku keƒidi kadi béte-nwu.
42024043	Na ɔ́ƒɔ-ka ɔ́kun na bana anumi.
42024044	Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ala amɛni lɛlɔ kɔtɛ geen na lɛ́tɛmiku-mii ɔni na lɛ́kya-mii kudɔ. Ala ani ƒui na bénweni na Mose ɔda bubo ɔku kemo ku Katɔti kenye bediene ala ani bénweni ku kɔgya ɔku kemo ni, ɔlɛka ebo-nwu kemo lɛni.”
42024045	Mmɔ na ɔ́lɛmi-ma kasusu kalɛ na benu Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila ammɔ kalɔ.
42024046	Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lɛni na bénweni banii Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ɔdububo abi na ɔdubɔta ɔlɛ bekpine akɔ limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛlɔ.
42024047	Na nwuna basiakune badubɔkɔ lɛsa na nwuna lɛnyi kemo bete kalɔ ƒui bekyuli banii benwini kayi kalɛ na Katɔti uti bana ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-ma. Na lɛsa bɔkɔ bɔmmɔ bɔdubuse kalɔ bɔsi Yerusalem.
42024048	Amii na ɔlɛka bidie litemi lɛmɛni kenye kesii biala.
42024049	Na ami ɔlati ndubuti lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔ́su-mii úse limene-mii. Nsu ɔlɛka binye bɛgya Katɔti ɔyikun ɔmɛni na Yerusalem wetédu uwi ɔni na ɔyikun ɔmmɔ ɔsi katɔ ubeduo-mii lɛlɔ kemo.”
42024050	Amu na ɔ́tɔnku-ma na bálɛ Yerusalem ɔmankemo bésie Betania. Mmɔ na ɔ́kɔliku nwuna enu katɔ na úte-ma kusɛ kusɛ.
42024051	Na uwi ɔni kani na uute-ma kusɛ kusɛ mɛni ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ-ma kudɔ na Katɔti úti-nwu úsienku katɔ.
42024052	Amu na bémwi-nwu na bénwini bésie Yerusalem ku ebiti sɔɔn.
42024053	Na beesié Katɔti kakpakɔ busie busie taatágya Katɔti enu uwi biala.
43001001	Kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui ni, Anwu ɔni ndi Katɔti Litemi mmɔ ɔkya. Na Litemi lɛmɛni ku Katɔti nkya. Na Litemi lɛmɛni ɔlati ku Katɔti badi unwi. Na ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ ni,
43001002	Anwu ku Katɔti nli uwi ƒui.
43001003	Ɔkɛ Anwu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ na Katɔti ɔ́sia údie lɛla biala. Na lɛla lɛdi liiibo ɔni na ɔɔɔdi nwuna lɛlɔ na Katɔti ɔ́sia údie-ni.
43001004	Na Litemi lɛmmɔ kemo na ngba geen bɔɔsí. Na ngba bɔmɛni muute bekyuli Katɔti bukeye geen.
43001005	Bukeye bɔmɛni muukeye na bɔ́ɔyila lɛdisa. Na lɛdisa lítakana na linye bukeye bɔmɛni kenye.
43001006	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Katɔti ɔ́tala ukyuli ɔdi aani kenye udiene kalɛ, na baalɔ-nwu banii Yohane.
43001007	Úbo ɔnii ubedie kenye na ukyuli ɔni ndi bukeye bɔmɛni lɛlɔ kalɛ na ukyuli biala unu linyesia lɛmɛni na ɔƒɔ ukyuli ɔni ndi bukeye mmɔ ɔdi.
43001008	Ɔɔɔdi Yohane ɔmɛni ndi bukeye bɔmmɔ. Mmomu kenye kani na úbo ubedie na bukeye bɔmɛni lɛlɔ.
43001009	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, bukeye geen bɔni muuti bukeye teete ukyuli biala ɔ́si ɔdubo kayawi.
43001010	Nsu geen ni, ɔkya kayawi. Na ina ka nwuna lɛlɔ na Katɔti ɔ́kɛ asa na údie kayawi ni, bekyuli bátanu-nwu bátati.
43001011	Úbo anwu badi akɔ, nsu bétegyingya enu bátaƒɔ-nwu.
43001012	Nsu ɛlɛɛ badi báƒɔ-nwu. Na bani ƒui náƒɔ-nwu mmɔ aani Katɔti Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ni, úte-ma ɔyikun ɔni náya na benwini Katɔti bebi.
43001013	Na ubi bɔdi bɔmɛni bɔɔɔkɛnku kaba kemo kɔwɔ lɛlɔ. Na bɔɔɔdi ɔnana ku uleku kɔwɔ kemo na bɔ́si. Na bútasi ɔnana ubi bɔwia kasusu kemo lɛnɔ. Mmomu ni, Katɔti ubi bunwini bɔmɛni bɔ́si Katɔti ɔlati kudɔ.
43001014	Na Katɔti Litemi lɛmɛni líbo aani ukyuli ɔyawine, na úlie kalɔ lɛlɔ mɛni na bula akɔ. Na Katɔti lɛƒɔndia ku litemi geen lɛ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui. Na abu bɔ́nu kalɛ na uukeye ka ɔdi Katɔti ubidi unwi pɛ ɔsu.
43001015	Yohane údie-nwu ɔ́tina bekyuli uwi ɔni na ɔ́kɔ lɛsa úte kasalakɔ ƒui ɔnini, “Ɔmɛni ndi ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na ńtaatɛmi taasiku ɔni lɛ́su nnii ukyuli ɔdi ɔkpɛ-mi kama ɔdubo ɔni ntulo-mi ƒui, ɔsika ɔkya kukuuku asa na báwɔ-mi.”
43001016	Na Katɔti lɛƒɔndia ku litemi geen lɛni náƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui ɔsu ni, ɔ́bla bula ƒui lɛƒɔndia ɔ́sia kama.
43001017	Ɔsika kudeedi ni, Katɔti ɔkɛ Mose lɛlɔ úte-bu nwuna ɔda bubo. Nsu ɔkɛ Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ úte-bu lɛƒɔndia lɛmɛni ku litemi geen.
43001018	Ukyuli ɔdi útanu Katɔti nwaa dii. Nsu Katɔti ubidi unwi pɛ ɔni mma-nwu lɛlɔ ni, anwu nédie-nwu nwaa ɔ́tina bekyuli.
43001019	Yohane údie kenye kadi úte Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune bani nátala bakpane ku bana bebunkune básiku Yerusalem bákya-nwu. Bébo bébeye-nwu banini, “Ɔma geen na aasu anii adi tɔ?”
43001020	Amu na Yohane údie ala kalɔ úte-ma mmɔ kani ɔnini, “Lɛɛɛdi Katɔti Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni na básu bése ka webo.”
43001021	Bakpane bammɔ básɔ béye-nwu banini, “Amu ɔma na adi? Katɔti Kenye Udiene Elia na adi?” Údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔɔɔdi anwu na ndi.” Béye-nwu banii, “Na awɔ ndi Kenye Udiene ɔni básu bése ka ɔdubo?” Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Oowo.”
43001022	Anwuɔsu básu-nwu banini, “Su-bu lɛla lɛdi kalɛ na bɔkana kenye budie bute bekyuli bani nátala-bu! Ɔma na adi? Bi na aasu taasiku ƒula lɛlɔ?”
43001023	Údie kenye ɔ́su-ma aani kalɛ na Kenye Udiene Yesaia únweni úse ɔnini, “Ami ndi ukyuli ɔni mɔɔva na ketele kemo nnii bɛklibi ulu bise bite Blɔti bubo.”
43001024	Na bekyuli bani na bátala mɛni ni, bási Yudaƒuɔ lɛkpa lɛni baalɔ banii Ƒarisiƒuɔ kemo.
43001025	Anwuɔsu béye-nwu banini, “Si aaadi bekyuli bani na Katɔti ɔ́su úse ka badubo akɔ unwi aani Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi, iye Elia, iye Kenye Udiene ɔmmɔ ni, bi ɔsu na aabla ketu kemo ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmɛni?”
43001026	Yohane ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ntu kani na muuti taabla bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmɛni. Nsu ukyuli ɔdi ɔkya bina akɔ na bɛɛɛgyi-nwu.
43001027	Anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni nkpɛ-mi kama ɔdubo, na ami ńtedu ka lɛbla kabla kadi lite-nwu muedi.”
43001028	Lɛla lɛmɛni lɛ́lɛ na ɔma ɔni baalɔ banii Betania na Yordan Ketu ɔvi. Mmɔ na Yohane útaabla ketu kemo ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmɛni.
43001029	Kadi kégye ni, Yohane ɔ́nu ka Yesu ɔ́si ɔdubo. Amu na ɔ́su bani nnye-nwu kudɔ mmɔ ɔnini, “Bɛnu! Ɔmɛni ndi Katɔti Lɛkpa Koƒonu Ubi ɔni ndubo bayawine ekpidi buni budie-ma lɛlɔ.
43001030	Anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na ńtaatɛmi taasiku uwi ɔni na lɛ́su nnii ukyuli ɔdi ɔkpɛ-mi kama ɔdubo ɔni ntulo-mii ƒui, ɔsika ɔkya kukuuku asa na báwɔ-mi.
43001031	Ami lɛnɔ lɛɛɛgyi nnii anwu ndi ukyuli ɔmmɔ. Nsu nwuna bubo ɔsu na líbo mɔɔbla bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmɛni kalɛ na lidie-nwu lɛtina bula kadi bekyuli Israelƒuɔ.”
43001032	Amu na Yohane ɔ́sɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Lɛ́nu ka Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́yu kɔ́si katɔ aani kalɛ na abloduma ɔɔyu, na kúbelie-nwu lɛlɔ.
43001033	Kudeedi ni, ńtati-nwu. Nsu uwi ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́tala-mi ɔnii ntaabla bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, 'Si ánu ka mina Kɔyu kɔ́yu kuulie ukyuli ɔdi lɛlɔ ni, adubɔnu ati ka anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni muuti Katɔti Kɔyu taabla bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmmɔ.'
43001034	Na lɛ́nu ka ɔ́lɛ lɛni na ukyuli ɔmɛni lɛlɔ. Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka anwu ndi Katɔti Ubidi ɔmmɔ.”
43001035	Limeyi lɛni nsɔ nsia ni, ka Yohane ku nwuna basiakune inyɔ benye ni,
43001036	Yesu úsie úbavi. Amu ka Yohane ɔ́nu-nwu ni, ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bɛnu! Ɔmɛni ndi Katɔti Lɛkpa Koƒonu Ubi!”
43001037	Ka bénu ɔmɛni ni, Yohane basiakune inyɔ bammɔ bátu bénwini na básiaku-nwu. Yesu únwini ɔ́nu ka basiaku-nwu, na úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi na bɛɛwia?”
43001038	Mmɔ na bédie kenye banini, “Rabi,” ɔni kalɔ ndi ala ɔtinane, “Buvele, wɛ na eli?”
43001039	Ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bibo na bibanu.” Anwuɔsu anwu ku-ma bakɛ bétédu kesii kani na ɔ́kya, na bélie-nwu kudɔ useyi uwi ɔmmɔ ƒui ɔ́si lɛdɔ ine.
43001040	Na bekyuli bamɛni akɔ unwi ɔdi Andrea ɔni ndi Simon Petro ɔnwani.
43001041	Lɛla lideedi lɛni na Andrea ɔ́bla ndi ka úsie útáwia ɔnwani Simon na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Abu bɔ́nu Mesia ɔmmɔ!” iye Kristo. Na anyi ammɔ kalɔ budie ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi.
43001042	Na Andrea ɔ́tɔnku Simon úsienku Yesu kudɔ. Na ka Yesu ɔ́nu Simon ni, ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ ndi Yohane ubidi Simon, nsu bekyuli badubɔlɔ-ɔ banii Keƒas,” iye Petro. Na anyi ammɔ kalɔ budie ndi lɛtakpɛ.
43001043	Kadi kégye ni, Yesu ɔ́bla kasusu ka uteesie kalɔ kani baalɔ banii Galilea. Na ka ɔkɛ ulu ni, ɔ́nu ukyuli ɔni baalɔ Ƒilipo, na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bo, na abasiaku-mi.”
43001044	Na Ƒilipo lɛnɔ ɔ́si Betsaida ɔni ndi Andrea ku Simon ɔma.
43001045	Ɔƒɛni ni, Ƒilipo ɔ́gyu ɔ́tɔlɔ útáwia Natanael. Na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Abu bɔ́nu ukyuli ɔni geen lɛlɔ na Mose ku kenye bediene bénweni ala básiku-nwu lɛlɔ bése na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo! Anwu ndi Yoseƒ ubidi Yesu ɔni nási Nasaret!”
43001046	Natanael údie kenye ɔnini, “Dɛ! Bɔsi na lɛla lɛbuni lɛdi lɛdubɔsi Nasaret ntu?” Ƒilipo ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ bo, na abanu!”
43001047	Ka bákpɛ beedé na Yesu ɔ́nu ka Natanael ɔdubo ni, ɔ́su-nwu lɛlɔ kɔtɛ ɔnini, “Bɛɛnu ka ukyuli ɔdi ɔdubo na ulatɔlɔ bekyuli. Ɔdi Israelni geen!”
43001048	Natanael úye-nwu ɔnini, “Dɛ na ábla na agyi ukyuli ɔni udu na ndi?” Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Mɔɔnu-ɔ kukuuku na kɔdingyii kɔni kalɔ na eli asa na Ƒilipo úbo úbalɔ-ɔ.”
43001049	Natanael ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Rabi, awɔ ndi Katɔti Ubidi. Awɔ ndi Israelƒuɔ Ɔga.”
43001050	Amu na Yesu úye-nwu ɔnini, “Áƒɔ ala amɛni ƒui ádi ɔsika lɛ́su-ɔ nnii lɛ́nu-ɔ na kɔdingyii kɔmmɔ kalɔ ɔsu? Adubɔnu budie bɔtina bunengudi butulo bɔmɛni.
43001051	Litemi geen na mɔɔsu-ɔ ka ni, adubɔnu ka katɔ kálɛmi na Katɔti batu baakɔ́ teesie katɔ taayu teebo ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛlɔ.”
43002001	Na limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛni nsia ni, bekyuli badi baawɛɛ uleku ɔdi na ɔma ɔni baalɔ Kana na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ. Mmɔ ni, Yesu uni Maria lɛnɔ ɔ́kya bebunkune bammɔ akɔ.
43002002	Na bálɔ Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane lɛnɔ banii bebo uleku ketikɔ mmɔ.
43002003	Uwi ɔni na ntɛ bɔni básala bɔ́sa ni, Yesu uni úbo Yesu kudɔ úbasu-nwu lɛla lɛni mɔɔlɛ́ mɛni ɔnini, “Ntɛ bɔmmɔ bútedu.”
43002004	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Uleku, ɔɔɔdi awɔ masu-mi lɛla lɛni mabla. Uwi ɔni na mete kebunku útedu tɔ.”
43002005	Mmɔ na Yesu uni ɔ́su kabla bablane bani nnye mmɔ ɔnini, “Binye kagyumana na bɛbla lɛla lɛni na wasu-mii ɔnii bɛbla.”
43002006	Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, atabi kutubwi bonwu aku alɛ mmɔ. Na kadi biala kadubɔƒɔ aani alɔkumbwi ene iye aku. Aku na Yudaƒuɔ béteeti taabla bana lɛlɔ bɔƒɔ ɔdi.
43002007	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su kabla bablane bammɔ ɔnii bedu ntu bewi-ku kemo. Anwuɔsu bédu ntu béyile-ku tɛtɛɛtɛ utédu atu.
43002008	Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bidu bɔdi bisienku ukyuli ɔni muubo ntɛ ɔda.” Na bédu-mu bésienku-nwu.
43002009	Ka unengu ɔmɛni útu ntu bɔni nénwini ntɛ mɛni ɔ́nu ni, útati kesii kani na ntɛ bɔmmɔ bɔ́si. Nsu kabla bablane bani nédu ntu bɔmmɔ ama báti. Anwuɔsu unengu ɔmmɔ ɔ́lɔ uleku ɔgya,
43002010	na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bi na ábla mɛni? Ntɛ bɔbuni na bekyuli pii beeti teese kalɔ na si uwi ɔni na báani na búdu-ma ɔkwɛ asa beeti bukpidi teeboku. Nsu awɔ ni, ɔƒɛni édie ntɛ bɔbuni keyi!”
43002011	Lɛla lɛni nálɛ na Kana na Galilea mɛni ni, ani ndi akɔla budie taatina edeedi ani na Yesu ɔ́bla. Na ka údie nwuna ɔyikun ɔ́tina lɛni ni, nwuna batɛyane báƒɔ-nwu bádi.
43002012	Na uleku buti kama ni, Yesu ku uni ku Yesu banwani ku batɛyane bammɔ bátɔlɔ bésie ɔma ɔni baalɔ banii Kapernaum. Na bélie mmɔ emeyi alɛɛ adi.
43002013	Lebo lɛmmɔ ni, uwi ɔdaku budu ka badi Yudaƒuɔ Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi, na Yesu lɛnɔ úsie Yerusalem.
43002014	Ka údu Katɔti kakpakɔ ɔtɔ anumi ni, ɔ́nu ka beyedine belie beeyé ɔmantɛ bakɔ ku baƒonu ku babloduma bete lɛkpa. Na egulabi bavumanane lɛnɔ belie bana egulabi kasiakɔ.
43002015	Anwuɔsu Yesu úlii kɔbuli kɔdi ɔ́sala na ɔ́bɔku-ma ku baƒonu ku ɔmantɛ bakɔ bammɔ ɔ́lɛku mmɔ. Amu na úgyingya egulabi ammɔ úwi kalɔ na únwini bana ala kasiakɔ úbi kalɔ.
43002016	Amu na úsie bekyuli bani muuyé babloduma kudɔ na ɔ́bɔku-ma ɔnini, “Bɛda ala amɛni bidie mɛni, na biteti mina Ɔti ɔtɔ bitenwini kuye kadikɔ!”
43002017	Mmɔ ni, nwuna batɛyane bényimo lɛla lɛni nkya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔ́su Katɔti ɔnini, “Ƒula ɔtɔ lɛlɔ bɔnu anumi adubo-mi bugyie na ɔya na bekyuli bekpoku-mi.”
43002018	Na ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune bádɔnku Yesu banini, “Ɔma nátala-a lɛla lɛmɛni udu bɔbla? Akɔla budie bɔtina bɔmani na adubɔbla na eti atina-bu kenyekɔ kani na ebo ɔsu na aabla lɛni?”
43002019	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bɛƒɛ Katɔti ɔtɔ ɔmɛni, na ndubɔtalaku-nwu linyene limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛlɔ!”
43002020	Amu na báva básu banini, “Bi na aasu? Bábla kabla akwa aavlene-aku sɔɔn asa na bátu ɔtɔ ɔmɛni! Na awɔ aasu anii adubɔtalaku-nwu enyene emeyi atɛ kemo?”
43002021	Nsu bátati ka Yesu ɔ́tɛmi ɔ́siku nwuna ɔlɔna lɛlɔ aani Katɔti kakpakɔ ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ.
43002022	Kama ƒui ka Katɔti ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́lɛku bekpine akɔ úboku ngba ni, asa na nwuna batɛyane bényimo ka ɔ́su lɛni. Anwuɔsu báƒɔ ala ani na bénweni na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ku ala ani na Yesu ɔ́su mmɔ bádi.
43002023	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́kya Yerusalem na Kukpi Lili Bɔvia uwi kemo ni, bekyuli pii bánu akɔla lidu lidu lɛni na ɔ́bla na báƒɔ-nwu bádi ka ubo Katɔti ɔyikun.
43002024	Nsu Yesu útanyonu lɛlɔ útete bekyuli bammɔ, ɔsika ɔgyi bekyuli ƒui.
43002025	Anwuɔsu uláwia ka ukyuli ɔdi ɔtina-nwu lɛla lɛdi na ukyuli lɛlɔ, ɔsika anwu ɔlati ɔgyi ukyuli ɔyawine udu geen.
43003001	Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Yudaƒuɔ ɔtɔnkune ɔdi ɔkya ɔni nkya lɛkpa lɛni baalɔ Ƒarisiƒuɔ, na baalɔ-nwu banii Nikodemo.
43003002	Ɔ́bɛ úbo Yesu kudɔ usien na úbeye-nwu ɔnini, “Ala ɔtinane, buvele, bula ƒui bɔgyi ka awɔ nási Katɔti kudɔ ébo abatina-bu ala, ɔsika ukyuli biala ɔdi ulakana akɔla budie bɔtina bɔmɛni udu bɔbla amu ntu Katɔti uliku-nwu.”
43003003	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-ɔ geen ka ni, si bátasɔku ukyuli bátawɔ ni, Katɔti ulakana lɛga bɔdi na nwuna kayi kemo.”
43003004	Amu na Nikodemo úye-nwu ɔnini, “Bi na aasu? Dɛ na ukyuli ɔni náabi lɛlɔ wasɔ wetéduo uni kaƒɔ kemo na basɔku-nwu bawɔ?”
43003005	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-ɔ geen ka ni, si bátawɔ ukyuli bátalɛku ntu ku kɔyu kemo ni, ulakana Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ mmɔ buduo.
43003006	Ɔsika ukyuli ɔni na ɔlɔna kemo na básia báwɔ-nwu ni, ɔdi ɔlɔna kani. Nsu Katɔti Kɔyu kɔdubɔwɔ kɔyu kemo bekyuli.
43003007	Anwuɔsu utabla-a dɛye dɛye si mɔɔsu nnii ɔlɛka basɔku-mii bawɔ.
43003008	Ɔƒɛƒɛɛ uukpó teesie kesii kani na ɔɔyɔ́. Nsu alakana bɔti kesii kani ɔɔsí iye kesii kani na úsela ina ka eenú-nwu kɔku. Lɛni kani na aláti kalɛ na Kɔyu kemo kabla keeti ngba bɔwɔdi teete ukyuli.”
43003009	Amu na Nikodemo úye-nwu ɔnini, “Dɛ na ɔmɛni udu ɔɔlɛ́?”
43003010	Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Adi bula kadi Israelƒuɔ ala ɔtinane kemo ɔdi. Bi ɔsu na elenu ala amɛni kalɔ?
43003011	Mɔɔsu-ɔ geen ka bɔɔtɛmi taasiku ala ani na bɔgyi lɛlɔ, na buudie ani na bɔ́nu kenye teete-mii. Nsu bilaƒɔ ala ani kenye na buudie teete-mii taadi.
43003012	Na si mɔɔsu-mii ala ani mɔɔlɛ́ bina akɔ na kalɔ lɛlɔ mɛni na bilaƒɔ-mi taadi ni, dɛ na bɛdubɔkana na bɛƒɔ-mi bɛdi si lɛ́su-mii lɛla lɛni mɔɔlɛ́ na katɔ?
43003013	Ukyuli ɔdi útesie katɔ utáwia ala amɛni udu ntu ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi kani. Na ami kani nási katɔ líbo kayawi kamɛni lɛlɔ.
43003014	“Bínu na Mose ɔku kalɛ na ɔ́kana kɔlakpi kɔni bávɔ ku lɛbuala ɔ́mana ugyii lɛlɔ, na ɔ́kɔliku-ku katɔ na ketele kukuuku kalɛ na bekyuli bammɔ bakɛ ngba. Lɛni kani na ɔlɛka bakɔliku ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi katɔ,
43003015	kalɛ na ukyuli biala ɔni maƒɔ-mi madi ni, ɔkɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
43003016	“Ka Katɔti ɔɔyɔ́ bayawine geen ɔsu ni, úti Ubidi unwi pɛ ɔmmɔ úte. Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔƒɔ́-nwu taadi ni, ulayii. Mmomu ɔdubɔkɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
43003017	Ɔsika Katɔti útatala Ubidi ɔnii ubadu bekyuli bayawine kɔtɔ. Mmomu ɔkɛnku Ubidi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, ubedie-ma na bakɛ bɔƒɔ.
43003018	“Bekyuli bani mɔɔƒɔ́-nwu taadi ni, Katɔti uládu-ma kɔtɔ. Nsu bekyuli bani naaadubo-nwu bɔƒɔ bɔdi ni, Katɔti ɔ́ɔtɛku-ma litemi kukuuku na ɔ́ɔdu-ma kɔtɔ ka bátaƒɔ Katɔti Ubidi unwi pɛ bátadi ɔsu.
43003019	Lɛla lɛni ɔsu na ɔ́du-ma kɔtɔ ndi ka bukeye bɔ́si katɔ búbo kayawi, nsu bekyuli báyɔ lɛdisa bétulo bukeye bɔmmɔ. Ɔsika bana ablala adi likyulikpi ala.
43003020	Ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔbla likyulikpi ala ni, ukisi bukeye na ulakpɛ teede-mu. Ɔsika ɔɔyia ka nwuna ablala adubɔlɛ keyi na Katɔti ɔdubɔni-nwu kɔtu.
43003021	Nsu ukyuli biala ɔni nda nwuna ngba na ulu lɛlɔ geen ni, ɔɔkpɛ́ teede bukeye. Ɔsika ɔɔwia ka bukeye bɔmmɔ budie nwuna Katɔti bɔsiaku ablala atina.”
43003022	Ɔmɛni kama ni, Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bátɔlɔ Yerusalem bésie likpo bamba na Yudea kalɛkɛ lɛlɔ bátákya emeyi alɛɛ adi. Na bákya mmɔ baabla ketu kemo ntu bɔkpila ɔdi teete bekyuli.
43003023	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Yohane lɛnɔ ɔkya ɔɔkpila bekyuli ntu na Ainon na Salim kudɔ, ɔsika ntu bɔkya mmɔ kaduɛ, na bekyuli pii beesié-nwu kudɔ ka ɔkpila-ma ntu.
43003024	Uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, útedu tɔ ka kalɔ kammɔ ɔga úƒie Yohane ɔ́kya aban ɔtɔ.
43003025	Limeyi linwi lɛdi ni, Yohane batɛyane ku Yudani ɔdi bése kalɔ baakya unyeƒi na ntu bɔkpi ɔdi lɛlɔ.
43003026	Anwuɔsu bébo Yohane kudɔ na béye-nwu banini, “Ala ɔtinane, buvele, ukyuli ɔni na átina-bu na Yordan ketu ɔvi ngye na édie-nwu kenye ni, anwu lɛnɔ ɔɔbla ketu kemo ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmɛni. Ɔdia kalɛ na bula bekyuli ƒui békeli bésela-nwu kudɔ mɛni?”
43003027	Yohane údie kenye ɔnini, “Ukyuli biala ulakɛ lɛla lɛdi si ɔɔɔdi Katɔti néte-nwu lɛla lɛmmɔ.
43003028	Amii alati bɛdubudie-mi kenye ka lɛ́su-mii nwaa nnii ɔɔɔdi ami ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ. Nsu Katɔti ɔ́tala-mi ka lɛgyu lɛtɔ-nwu.
43003029	Na ɔƒɛni ni, anwu ɔni ndi uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ mbo uleku. Na uleku ɔgya ɔkpana ɔni nnye uleku buti kabla kamɛni kenye ni, si uwi ɔni na uleku ɔgya ku uleku ɔmmɔ bása baatɛmi bana lɛlɔyɔ atɛ ni, uunye teenu-nya ku ebiti. Lɛni kani na ami lɛnɔ ebiti aada-mi geen aani uleku ɔgya ɔkpana ɔmmɔ.
43003030	Nwuna lɛnyi ɔlɛka lɛkɔ katɔ, na mina lɛdi lɛyii lɛkya.
43003031	“Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni na katɔ na ɔ́si ni, utulo ukyuli biala. Na ukyuli ɔni nási kalɔ lɛnɔ ni, kalɔ ukyuli kani na ɔdi. Na ɔɔtɛmi ala taasiku kalɔ lɛlɔ. Anwu ɔni nási Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ni, utulo ukyuli biala.
43003032	Na anwu muudie ala ani na ɔ́nu ku ani na únu mmɔ kalɔ. Nsu ɛlɛɛ kani mɔɔƒɔ́-nwu taadi.
43003033	Bani mɔɔƒɔ́-nwu taadi ni, beedie taatina nwaa ka ala ani na Katɔti ɔɔsu ni, anya ndi litemi geen.
43003034	Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́tala ni, anwu mɔɔsu Katɔti etemila. Ɔsika Katɔti ɔ́tala nwuna Kɔyu ɔnii kubelie ukyuli ɔmɛni lɛlɔ ku kuna ɔyikun ƒui.
43003035	Katɔti ɔɔyɔ́ Ubidi na úti lɛla biala ɔ́kya nwuna enu kemo.
43003036	“Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔƒɔ́ Ubidi ɔmɛni taadi ni, ubo ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii. Na ukyuli ɔni muuní ka ɔdi Ubidi litemi lɛlɔ ni, ulákɛ ngba bɔmmɔ. Mmomu Katɔti kɔnyi kɔdubo butaasiaku-nwu.”
43004001	Na uwi ɔmmɔ ni, Ƒarisiƒuɔ bénu ka Yesu útaabla ntu bɔkpila ɔdi teete bekyuli na ɔɔkɛ́ basiakune pii teetulo Yohane
43004002	ina ka ɔɔɔdi anwu ɔlati nátaabla ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmɛni, mmomu nwuna batɛyane nátaabla-mu.
43004003	Ka Yesu ɔ́ti ka Ƒarisiƒuɔ bénu ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ únwini úsie Galilea.
43004004	Na nwuna ulu busie kemo ni, ɔlɛka ɔsia Samaria kalɔ lɛlɔ.
43004005	Amu na ɔ́kpɛ úde ɔma ɔni baalɔ banii Sikar ɔni nde kemo kani na bana Nana Yakob úte ubidi Yoseƒ.
43004006	Libiɔ lɛdi lɛkya mmɔ lɛni na Yakob úku. Na ka lɛlɔ lítu Yesu ɔƒiiwi ɔmmɔ na ulu busie gyɔlɔɔ kemo ɔsu ni, ɔ́yu úlie kalɔ na libiɔ lɛmɛni kudɔ.
43004007	-
43004008	Na uwi klukui kemo ka nwuna basiakune bésie ɔmankemo banii betéye adila adi ni, Samariani uleku ɔdi úbo ɔnii ubedu ntu. Amu na Yesu úvele-nwu ɔnini, “Te-mi ntu lɛni.”
43004009	Uleku ɔmɛni úye-nwu ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na awɔ Yudani eevele ami Samariani ntu?” Ɔ́su ɔmɛni ɔsika Yudaƒuɔ balákya Samariaƒuɔ lɛlɔ.
43004010	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Si bɔti na adubɔti litela lɛni na Katɔti ubo ute-ɔ ku ukyuli ɔni udu muuvele-ɔ ntu ɔnii ɔɔní ni, nka awɔ mmomu ndubuvele-mi ntu bɔni mɔɔgbá na buute ngba, na lite-ɔ ntu bɔmmɔ.”
43004011	Uleku ɔmmɔ úye-nwu ɔnini, “Ɔbune, na ka eeebo lɛla lɛni na eti edu-mu edie na libiɔ lɛmɛni lɛnɔ lɛ́gyu ni, wɛ na adubo ntu bɔni mɔɔgbá na buute ngba mmɔ bɔkɛ?
43004012	Munuu butulo na etulo bula Nana Yakob ɔni néku libiɔ lɛmɛni? Ntu bɔmmɔ na anwu ku nwuna bebi ku bebuo ƒui báni.”
43004013	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Si bekyuli báni ntu bɔmɛni ni, utukwɛ ɔɔsɔ taada-ma.
43004014	Nsu ntu bɔni na ndubute ni, utukwɛ ɔsɔ ulada ukyuli ɔni mani-mu. Mmomu bɔdubunwini libiɔ lɛni mɔɔyu na bana lɛlɔ kemo, na ɔdubute-ma ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.”
43004015	Ɔmɛni ɔsu uleku ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, muuvele nda-a, te-mi ntu bɔmmɔ bɔdi na utukwɛ ɔsɔ ulada-mi kudii, na nsɔ neeeteebo mɛni limeyi ndi limeyi.”
43004016	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini. “Teesie na atákpanku ƒ^ɔgyani eboku.”
43004017	Amu na uleku ɔmmɔ ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Liiibo kɔgya kɔdi.” Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Sɔsɔ geen na ɔdi ka anii eeebo kɔgya.
43004018	Ɔsika éelieku banana ɛlɔ. Na ɔni na awɔ ku-nwu bilie ɔƒɛni muedi ni, ɔɔɔdi ƒ^ɔgyani. Ásu ƒula litemi geen.”
43004019	Mmɔ ni, uleku ɔmɛni údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔbune, mɔɔtí ka Katɔti kenye udiene na adi!
43004020	Abu Samariaƒuɔ bɔgyi ka kɔbi kɔmɛni lɛlɔ kani na bula nana bene bábla lɛkpa. Nsu bi náya na amii Yudaƒuɔ bɛɛsu bɛnii Yerusalem kani ndi likpo lɛni na ɔlɛka bɔɔkpá?”
43004021	Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Uleku, ƒɔ-mi litemi lɛni mɔɔsu-ɔ mɛni di ka ni, uwi ɔdubo ɔni na ɔɔɔdi kɔbi kɔmɛni lɛlɔ iye Yerusalem na ɔlɛka bɛkpa Katɔti.
43004022	Ɔƒɛni amii Samariaƒuɔ ni, bɛɛkpá lɛla lɛni bɛɛɛgyi. Nsu abu Yudaƒuɔ ni, abu bɔgyi ala bɔ́siku-nwu lɛlɔ. Ɔsika bekyuli budie na likpidi kemo ni, Yudaƒuɔ akɔ na bɔ́si bubo.
43004023	Nsu uwi ɔdubo na úudu lɛnɔ ɔni na bekyuli bani nsiaku Katɔti na ulu geen lɛlɔ ni, badubɔkɔliku-nwu lɛnyi katɔ ku Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun na litemi geen kemo. Ɔsika ama ndi basiakune bani na Katɔti ɔɔwia.
43004024	Ka Katɔti ɔdi Kɔyu ɔsu ni, ɔlɛka bekyuli bani nsiaku-nwu ƒui baakɔliku-nwu lɛnyi katɔ ku nwuna Kɔyu ɔyikun na litemi geen kemo.”
43004025	Amu na uleku ɔmmɔ ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Ngyi ka Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni baalɔ Kristo ɔdubo. Na si úbo ni, ɔdubo lɛla biala kalɔ budie bute-bu.”
43004026	Mmɔ ni, Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Ami ɔni mɔɔtɛmiku-ɔ mɛni ndi Anwu ɔmmɔ.”
43004027	Na uwi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, nwuna batɛyane bási bébeduo, na ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye ka bánu ka ɔɔtɛmiku uleku ɔmɛni. Nsu ɔdi úteye Yesu ɔnini, “Bi na aawia?” iye “Bi ɔsu na aatɛmiku-nwu?”
43004028	Uwi ɔmɛni ni, uleku ɔmmɔ ɔ́da nwuna ketubwi úse libiɔ lɛmmɔ kɔtu na únwini úsie ɔmankemo na útásu ukyuli biala ɔnini,
43004029	“Bibo na bibanu ukyuli ɔni násu-mi ala ani ƒui na lɛ́bla na ngba kemo! Ɔdubɔkana na wadi Katɔti Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ?”
43004030	Anwuɔsu bekyuli bammɔ bási ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo bésie banii batánu-nwu.
43004031	Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Yesu batɛyane bévele-nwu banii, “Ala ɔtinane, di lɛla lɛdi.”
43004032	Nsu Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ami mbo adila ani na mɔɔdi, na bɛɛɛgyi-nya.”
43004033	Anwuɔsu béye lɛlɔ banini, “Ukyuli ɔdi néboku-nwu adila?”
43004034	Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Mina adila ndi ka lɛbla anwu ɔni nátala-mi lɛƒɔyɔ na lɛwɔlɔ kabla kani na úte-mi ka mbabla.
43004035	Bɔgyi ka baasu banii si ákya edula ni, abuli ene kama asa bɔɔƒɛ-nya. Nsu ndaku-mii bɔsu nnii útalɛka bunye butédu uwi ɔmmɔ. Edula ammɔ áabi! Bɛtalaku anumi na bɛnu ka edula ammɔ éegyie ka baƒɛ.
43004036	Katɔti ɔɔƒɔ edula ɔƒɛne biala kayu kabuni na edula ani na ɔdaku bɔsala teewi linwu lɛni nnye Katɔti kudɔ kemo ute ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii ɔsu. Na ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, edula ɔkyane ku edula ɔƒɛne ƒui badubɔkɛ ebiti geen.
43004037	Anwuɔsu lɛsugba lɛmɛni lɛdi litemi geen ka ni, ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔkya edula, na ukyuli ɔbambadi mɔɔƒɛ-nya.
43004038	Lɛ́tala-mii nnii bitáƒɛ edula ani na ɔɔɔdi amii nákya-nya. Bekyuli bamba nábla kabla kpakplaa kamɛni na edula amɛni bɔƒɛ kɔsia kani na amii bíbakɛ.”
43004039	Uwi ɔni na Samariaƒuɔ bénu ka uleku ɔmmɔ ɔ́su ɔnii, “Yesu ɔ́su-mi lɛla lɛni na lɛ́bla na mina ngba kemo” ni, bana akɔ pii bése kalɔ baaƒɔ́ Yesu taadi.
43004040	Ka bálɛ bébo bábanu Yesu na libiɔ lɛmɛni kudɔ ni, bévele-nwu banii ɔkya-ma kudɔ.
43004041	Amu na ɔ́tuna na ɔ́kya-ma kudɔ emeyi anyɔ. Na bekyuli babambadi pii lɛnɔ bani nénu ala ani na ɔɔsu ni, báƒɔ-nwu bádi.
43004042	Kama ni, bekyuli bammɔ básu uleku ɔmmɔ banini, “Ɔƒɛni bɔdaku bɔƒɔ taadi, ɔsika abu alati búnu nwuna etemila, na ɔɔɔdi lɛla lɛni na ásu lɛti pɛ ɔsu. Sɔsɔ na ɔdi, bɔ́ti ka anwu ndi bekyuli bayawine Ɔƒɔne.”
43004043	Na mmɔ bɔkya emeyi anyɔ kawɔlɔkɔ ni, Yesu úsie Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ.
43004044	Na ina ka Yesu ɔ́su dii ɔnii Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi biala uuubo ɔbu na anwu ɔlati nwuna kalɔ lɛlɔ ni,
43004045	Galileaƒuɔ bégyingya enu báƒɔ-nwu. Ɔsika bésie Yerusalem uwi ɔni na baadi Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi, na bánu lɛla biala lɛni na ɔ́bla.
43004046	-
43004047	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie Kana na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ mmɔ kesii kani na úti ntu únwini ntɛ. Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, aban unengu ɔdi nási Kapernaum únu ka Yesu ɔ́si Yudea úbo Galilea. Na ka ubidi lɛnɔ uuƒi kpakplaa ɔsu ni, unengu ɔmɛni úsie Kana na útánu Yesu na úvele-nwu ɔnii ɔsiaku-nwu na besie Kapernaum na utábwi ubidi ute-nwu, ɔsika úudu kaƒiɔtɔ kɔtu.
43004048	Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Si bítanu ka lɛbla akɔla budie taatina ni, biláƒɔ-mi biladi.”
43004049	Unengu ɔmɛni úvele-nwu ɔnini, “Ɔbune, muuvele nda-a, bo na abanu mina ubi kalɛ na ulekpi.”
43004050	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Teesie. Ƒ^ubidi uli ngba.” Unengu ɔmɛni ɔ́ƒɔ lɛla lɛni na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔ́di na ɔ́sɔ únwini úsela ɔma.
43004051	Ka ɔkɛ ulu ni, nwuna kabla bablane badi bébo bábasiaku-nwu na básu-nwu banii ubidi ɔ́ta.
43004052	Úye-ma uwi ɔni geen na ubi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ líse kalɔ lɛɛbla-nwu buɛɛ. Na bédie kenye banini, “Kamaadi ɔƒiiwi aani ɔdɔ unwi kemo na ogya bɔƒɔ bɔmmɔ bɔ́nyonu-nwu.”
43004053	Amu na ɔ́nu ɔ́ti ka uwi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ geen na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ƒ^ubidi uli ngba.” Na unengu ɔmɛni ku nwuna kaduli bekyuli ƒui báƒɔ Yesu bádi.
43004054	Ɔmɛni ndi akɔla budie bɔtina kunyɔdi bɔni na Yesu ɔ́bla na Galilea ka ɔ́si Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ.
43005001	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie Yerusalem na Yudaƒuɔ limeyi lɛdi bɔdi ɔsu.
43005002	Na ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo kesii kani nde likpo lɛni baalɔ Baƒonu Kayakun kudɔ ni, lɛba blii lɛdi lɛ́kya mmɔ lɛni baalɔ Betesda na Hebri butemi kemo. Bábla kɔgbakɛ ɛlɔ báka bamana lɛba lɛmmɔ.
43005003	Mmɔ na balɛne pii badi bátaatɛ bani ndi banumbwɛne ku bekpulone ku lɛlɔ kakɛ kenwi bekpine. Na béteenye mmɔ taagya ntu bɔmmɔ bɔkunku bɔdi udu.
43005004	Ɔsika Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi uubo uwi uwi teebebwiile ntu bɔmmɔ. Na ɔlɛne udeedi ɔni néduo ntu bɔmmɔ kemo na muna bubwiile kama ni, ɔlɛ ɔni na uuƒi mmɔ ɔɔba-nwu.
43005005	Ukyuli ɔdi ɔtɛ mmɔ ɔni náatɛ ɔlɛ akwa aavlatɛ-maane sɔɔn.
43005006	Na ka Yesu ɔ́nu-nwu ka ɔtɛ mmɔ na ɔ́ti ka úuƒi akwa pii ni, úye-nwu ɔnini, “Aayɔ́ ka ƒula ɔlɛ ɔba-a?”
43005007	Ɔlɛne ɔmɛni údie kenye ɔnini, “Ati, liiibo ukyuli ɔni mebunku-mi na liduo lɛba lɛmmɔ kemo si uwi ɔni na ntu bɔmmɔ bɔɔkunku. Si uwi ɔni na mɔɔkya ɔkplu ka liduo ni, ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́ɔka bɔgyu bɔtɔ butéduo kukuuku.”
43005008	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ta nye! Ti ƒula lɛtala na eteesie.”
43005009	Mmɔ mmɔ ni, ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔlɛ ɔ́ba-nwu! Na úti nwuna lɛtala na úsie. Na limeyi lɛni na ala amɛni álɛ ni, ɔdi lɛnwunameyi.
43005010	Anwuɔsu ka Yudaƒuɔ benengu bánu ɔnana ɔmɛni ku nwuna lɛtala ni, básu-nwu banini, “Ɔɔɔdi ulu ka agyu ƒula atɛla eti lɛni na ɔmwi lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ. Áta énye bula ɔda bubo lɛlɔ!”
43005011	Nsu ɔnana ɔmɛni údie kenye ɔnini, “Lɛni na ukyuli ɔni nábwi-mi ɔ́su-mi ɔnii, 'Ti ƒula lɛtala na eteesie.' ”
43005012	Amu na béye-nwu banini, “Ɔma ndi ukyuli ɔni násu-ɔ ɔnii ɔlɛka eti-ni na esie?”
43005013	Nsu ɔnana ɔmmɔ útati lɛla lɛdi útásu na Yesu lɛlɔ. Na Yesu lɛnɔ ɔ́ɔyii ɔ́kya bekyuli bammɔ akɔ.
43005014	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́nu-nwu na Katɔti kakpakɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Nu! Ɔƒɛni lɛlɔ lɛ́sɔ lɛ́yu-ɔ ɔkplu. Na tasɔ telie ataabla likpidi! Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, lɛla lɛni ntulo lɛmɛni lɛdubo-ɔ bɔbla!”
43005015	Amu na ukyuli ɔmɛni úsie útánu Yudaƒuɔ benengu na ɔ́su-ma ka Yesu ndi ukyuli ɔni nábwi-nwu.
43005016	Anwuɔsu bése kalɔ ku Yesu bukpoku, ɔsika lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ na ɔ́bwi-nwu.
43005017	Nsu Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Mina Ɔti uubunku bekyuli limeyi ndi limeyi, na ɔlɛka ami lɛnɔ lɛbla lɛni kani.”
43005018	Ɔmɛni bɔsu ɔsu ni, Yudaƒuɔ benengu básɔ báwia ulu bébu ka badu-nwu. Ɔsika na lɛnwunameyi ɔda bubo lɛlɔ tadi kama ni, ɔ́sɔ ɔ́tɛmi ɔ́siku Katɔti lɛlɔ aani Ɔti kalɛ. Na ɔmɛni ɔɔtina ka anwu ku Katɔti bese likeke.
43005019	Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii ami Katɔti Ubidi naaakana lɛla lɛdi bɔbla na ami ɔlati ɔyikun kemo. Mmomu lɛla lɛni na mɔɔnu ka mina Ɔti ɔɔbla ni, ani kani na ami lɛnɔ mɔɔbla. Anwuɔsu mina Ɔti ablala kama na ami Ubi lɛnɔ nsia.
43005020	Ɔsika Ati ɔɔyɔ́ ami Ubidi na ɔɔtina-mi lɛla biala lɛni na ɔɔbla. Na ɔdubɔtina-mi ala ani na lɛbla litulo ɔmɛni na ɔdubo-mii bɔbla kalɛ kadi.
43005021	Ɔsika kalɛ na mina Ɔti ɔɔgyila bekpine na beelie ngba ni, lɛni kani na ami Ubidi lɛnɔ muuti ngba teete bani na mɔɔyɔ́ ka lite ngba.
43005022	Na lɛnɔ ni, mina Ɔti ɔlati ulatɛku ukyuli ɔdi litemi. Mmomu ɔ́ɔnyonu likpidi biala litemi bɔtɛ úte ami Ubidi,
43005023	kalɛ na ukyuli biala utaabu Ubidi aani kalɛ kani na baabu Ɔti. Nsu si bíni na bilábu ami Katɔti Ubidi ɔni na ɔ́tala ɔ́kya-mii ni, bilábu Ɔti lɛnɔ.
43005024	“Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, ukyuli ɔni muunú-mi litemi na ɔɔƒɔ́ Katɔti ɔni nátala-mi taadi ni, uli ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii. Na Katɔti uládu-nwu kɔtɔ na nwuna ekpidi ɔsu. Mmomu ɔ́ɔvia kukpi ntu úduo ngba bɔwɔdi kemo.
43005025	Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka uwi ɔdubo na úudu lɛnɔ ɔni na bekyuli bani nékpi ni, badubunu Katɔti Ubi lɛdi. Na bekyuli bani ndubunu-ni na baƒɔ litemi lɛmmɔ ni, badubulie ngba geen.
43005026	Kalɛ na ngba ƒui bɔɔsí mina Ɔti kudɔ ni, lɛni kani na ɔ́ya na ngba ƒui bɔɔsí ami Ubidi lɛnɔ kudɔ.
43005027	Na úte-mi ɔyikun ɔni na lɛtɛku kayawi ƒui litemi, ɔsika ami ndi Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi.
43005028	“Ɔmɛni utabla-mii kalɛ kadi. Ɔsika uwi ɔdubo ɔni na bekyuli bani nékpi ƒui badubunu-mi lɛdi.
43005029	Na bana ƒui badubo bɔta balɛ bana kaƒiɔtɔ kemo. Na bani nábla lɛbuni ni, badubɔta bebelie ngba. Na bani nábla likpidi ni, badubɔta bebeduo kɔtɔ bɔdu kemo.
43005030	“Lɛɛɛdubo lɛla lɛdi bɔkana bɔbla na ami ɔlati ɔyikun kemo. Mmomu ndubɔtɛku bekyuli litemi aani kalɛ na mina Ɔti ɔ́su-mi. Anwuɔsu mina litemi bɔtɛ buse siin, ɔsika naaabla mina lɛƒɔyɔ. Mmomu Katɔti ɔni nátala-mi ni, nwuna lɛƒɔyɔ na mɔɔbla.
43005031	“Si muudie mina lɛlɔ kenye ni, bɛgyi bɛnii kenye budie bɔmmɔ buuubo ɔkplu.
43005032	Nsu ukyuli ɔdi lɛnɔ ɔkya ɔni muudie-mi kenye, na ngyi ka lɛla lɛni na ɔɔsu libo ɔkplu.
43005033	“Bɛ́tala bekyuli bɛnii betéye Yohane ala basiku-mi lɛlɔ, na ɔ́su-ma lɛla lɛni ndi litemi geen lɛmmɔ.
43005034	Nsu útalɛka ukyuli ɔyawine udie-mi kenye. Mmomu mɔɔsu-mii ɔmɛni kalɛ na bɛƒɔ-mi bɛdi na bɛkɛ ngba bɔƒɔ.
43005035	Yohane úkeye aani ogya ɔni mɔɔda. Na nwuna bukeye bɔmmɔ bɔ́da-mii ebiti uwi klukui ɔdi kemo.
43005036	“Nsu kenye kani na mbo na medie ni, ketulo Yohane ɔdi ƒui. Kabla lidu lɛni na Ati úte-mi ka mbawɔlɔ na kana lɛlɔ na nnye ni, aka muudie taatina ka Anwu nátala-mi.
43005037	Na mina Ɔti ɔni nátala-mi lɛnɔ údie kenye ɔ́tina-mii ɔ́si mina lɛlɔ ina ka bítenu-nwu lɛdi iye útedie lɛlɔ útatina-mii anumi ku anumi.
43005038	Nsu biláda-nwu litemi kaduɛ, ɔsika bíni na bítaƒɔ bítadi ka ami ndi ukyuli ɔni na ɔ́tala ɔ́kya-mii.
43005039	Bɛɛtɛya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ala uwi biala ku kakali ka si bɛ́bla lɛni ni, bɛdubɔkɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadu bɔsa kudii. Na ɔku ɔmmɔ geen muudie kenye taasiku-mi lɛlɔ.
43005040	Nsu biiní ka bibo-mi kudɔ na lɛya na bɛkɛ ngba bɔmmɔ.
43005041	“Naaawia bekyuli bayawine bumwi.
43005042	Ɔsika ngyi-mii kaduɛ ka bilayɔ Katɔti.
43005043	Ngyi ɔmɛni ɔsika líbo-mii kudɔ nnye na mina Ɔti kenyekɔ, nsu bítegyingya enu bítaƒɔ-mi. Na binye kagyumana ka bɛƒɔ ukyuli ɔni nnye anwu ɔlati kenye mmomu.
43005044	Dɛ na ɔdubɔbla asa na bɛƒɔ-mi bɛdi ka bilie bɛɛwia bumwi taasiku bina lɛlɔ kudɔ, na biláwia ka Anwu ɔni lɛti pɛ ndi Katɔti umwi-mii?
43005045	“Nsu bitakali bɛnii ami ndubo-mii kɔtɔ bɔdu na mina Ɔti kudɔ! Mose ɔni ɔda bubo lɛlɔ na bibo katɔ busie lɛnunsia ni, anwu mmomu ndubo-mii kɔtɔ bɔdu!
43005046	Si bɔƒɔ na bɛ́ƒɔ Mose bɛ́di ni, nka bɛdubɔƒɔ-mi bɛdi! Ɔsika únweni ala ɔ́siku-mi lɛlɔ.
43005047	Nsu ka bilaƒɔ ala ani na únweni taadi ni, dɛ bɛdubɔkana na bɛƒɔ lɛla lɛni mɔɔsu-mii bɛdi?”
43006001	Na ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́via ɛpu ɔni baalɔ banii Galilea Ɛpu na básɔ baalɔ-nwu Tiberia Ɛpu úsie nwuna ɔvi unyɔdi.
43006002	Na bekyuli pii badi basiaku-nwu, ɔsika bánu akɔla budie bɔtina bɔni na Yesu ɔ́bla na uwi ɔni na ɔ́bwi balɛne ɔsu.
43006003	Amu na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bákɔ bésie abi lɛlɔ na bátáyu bélie kalɔ na mmɔ.
43006004	Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, Yudaƒuɔ Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi bɔdi uwi ɔdaku budu.
43006005	Amu ka Yesu ɔ́tala anumi na ɔ́nu bekyuli lisu lɛni ndubo-nwu kudɔ mmɔ ni, úye Ƒilipo ɔnini, “Wɛ na bɔdubo adila bɔkɛ buye bute bekyuli bamɛni na badi?”
43006006	Nsu Yesu úye Ƒilipo kenye kammɔ ɔnii uuti ɔkɔku-nwu ɔnu ina ka anwu Yesu ɔgyi lɛla lɛni na anwu ɔlati ɔdubo bɔbla.
43006007	Amu na Ƒilipo údie kenye ɔnini, “Nkyuli eti ene limeyi lɛyuƒɔla muedi nwuna bodobodo uledu na bekyuli bamɛni ƒui bakɛ badi blii blii!”
43006008	Amu na Yesu batɛyane akɔ unwi ɔni ndi Andrea na ɔdi Simon Petro ɔnwani ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini,
43006009	“Okloƒu ɔdi ulie mɛni na ɔda kakpa bodobodo ɛlɔ ku kɔkpaku inyɔ. Nsu bi na ɔmɛni ɔdubɔbla bekyuli pii bamɛni?”
43006010	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Bɛya na bekyuli bammɔ bayu belie kalɔ.” Na livo pii liwi mmɔ, na bana ƒui báyu bélie kalɔ. Na banana lɛti bumomo bɔbla aani mpimu ɛlɔ.
43006011	Amu na Yesu úti bodobodo ɔmmɔ na ka ɔ́gya Katɔti enu ni, úle-nwu úte bani ƒui nlie kalɔ mmɔ. Lɛni kani na úti kɔkpaku lɛnɔ úle úte-ma kalɛ na baawia na bádi bémo.
43006012	Ka bádi bémo báwɔlɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Bɛsala kɔkɛ kɔni nébu lisu kalɛ na ɔdi ulebie.”
43006013	Anwuɔsu básala kakpa bodobodo kɔkɛ kɔmmɔ ƒui na kúyi kɔgyigyɛ leevu-inyɔ.
43006014	Amu ka bekyuli bammɔ bánu akɔla budie taatina bɔmɛni ni, básu banini, “Sɔsɔ anwu ndi Katɔti Kenye Udiene ɔni mebo kayawi.”
43006015	Na ka Yesu ɔ́nu ɔ́ti ka báyɔ ka beeƒie-nwu ɔkplu bɔdi besie lɛga ɔsu ni, ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kpɛ ɔ́lɛ-ma akɔ úsie abi lɛlɔ anwu lɛti.
43006016	Na useyi uwi ɔmmɔ ni, nwuna batɛyane báyu bésie ɛpu kɔtu.
43006017	Na bákɔ béduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo, na bávia bésela Kapernaum, ɔsika kadi kása na Yesu útebo-ma tɔ kudɔ.
43006018	Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, ɔƒɛƒɛɛ kpakplaa ɔdi úbo uukpó ɔni náya na ɛpu ɔmmɔ uukpóku lɛlɔ.
43006019	Uwi ɔni na béesie ɔgyu na ntu bɔmmɔ anumi aani eluku atɛ iye ene ni, bánu ka Yesu úsie ɔdubo ntu anumi na ɔ́kpɛ úde ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́gyu-ma!
43006020	Nsu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bitayia! Ami na ɔdi.”
43006021	Amu na lɛlɔ lɛ́yɔ-ma! Na ka Yesu ɔ́kɔ úduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo ni, bánu ka béduo likpo lɛni bésela kɔnakunwi.
43006022	Ka kadi kégye ni, bekyuli bani náƒɔ lɛlɔ bátɛ ɛpu ɔvi ɔmmɔ ni, bánu ka nka ɔkɔlɔ unwi pɛ ntɛ ɛpu kɔtu mmɔ. Na uwi ɔni na Yesu batɛyane bammɔ béduo ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo na baavia ketu ni, nka Yesu ɔɔɔsiaku-ma.
43006023	Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, lɛkɔlɔ bamba lɛni nási Tiberia líbo líbedi línye-ma kudɔ na kesii kani na Yesu úti bodobodo úte-ma na bádi mmɔ uwi ɔni na Blɔti ɔ́gya Katɔti enu ɔ́wɔlɔ kemo.
43006024	Anwuɔsu ka bekyuli bammɔ bánu ka Yesu iye nwuna batɛyane beeenye mmɔ ɔsu ni, ama alati bákɔ béduo lɛkɔlɔ lɛmmɔ kemo na bátɔlɔ bésie Kapernaum batáwia Yesu.
43006025	Ka bánu Yesu na ɛpu ɔvi ɔmmɔ ni, béye-nwu banini, “Ala ɔtinane, uwi ɔmani na ébo mɛni?”
43006026	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, bodobodo ɔni na bɛ́kɛ bɛ́di bímo ɔsu na bɛɛwia-mi. Na ɔɔɔdi ɔni na bínu akɔla budie taatina ani na lɛ́bla kalɔ ɔsu.
43006027	Bitekpoku lɛlɔ bitawia adila ani muubie kama ulu. Mmomu bɛwia adila ani neeebie na ese ésela uwi ƒui. Adila ammɔ udu na ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndubo-mii bute. Ɔsika ami na Katɔti ɔ́sia kɔnu úse.”
43006028	Mmɔ na bekyuli bammɔ béye Yesu banini, “Bi na ɔlɛka bɔbla si bɔnii bɔɔbla kabla kani na Katɔti ɔɔwia?”
43006029	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔɔwia ka bɛbla ndi ka bɛƒɔ ukyuli ɔni na ɔ́tala bɛdi.”
43006030	Amu na básɔ béye-nwu banini, “Akɔla budie taatina bɔmani na adubɔtina-bu kalɛ na bɔƒɔ-ɔ bɔdi? Bi na aakana bɔbla?
43006031	Bula bati kuuku bádi adila ani baalɔ banii mana na ketele kemo aani kalɛ na ɔkya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo banii, 'Úte-ma adila ɔ́siku katɔ na bádi.' ”
43006032	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii ɔɔɔdi Mose néte-mii adila ani nási katɔ. Mmomu mina Ɔti ni, anwu muute adila geen ani nási katɔ ébo.
43006033	Ɔsika Katɔti adila geen ani na uute bekyuli ndi ami ɔni mɔɔyá na bekyuli beelie ngba.”
43006034	Anwuɔsu básu-nwu banini, “Ati, teete-bu adila ɔmɛni uwi biala.”
43006035	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ami ndi adila ani mɔɔyá na bekyuli beelie ngba. Na ukyuli ɔni muubo-mi kudɔ ni, kɔka kɔsɔ kulada-nwu. Na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔƒɔ́-mi taadi ni, utukwɛ ɔsɔ ulada-nwu kudi kudii.
43006036	Nsu lɛ́su-mii nnii ina ka bɛ́ɛnu-mi ni, bilaƒɔ-mi taadi.
43006037	Bekyuli bani ƒui na Ati úte-mi ni, badubo-mi kudɔ. Na bani muubo-mi kudɔ mmɔ ni, lɛɛɛdubo-ma buni.
43006038	Ɔsika ńtasi katɔ ńtebo nnii mɔɔbla ami ɔlati lɛƒɔyɔ. Mmomu líbo nnii mbabla anwu ɔni nátala-mi lɛƒɔyɔ.
43006039	Na ukyuli ɔni nátala-mi lɛƒɔyɔ ndi ka bekyuli bani ƒui na úte-mi ni, naaayila bana akɔ ɔdi, mmomu kalɛ na lɛgyila-ma na bana ƒui basɔ bata bebelie ngba na limeyi likplodi lɛlɔ.
43006040	Ɔsika lɛla lɛni na mina Ɔti ɔɔwia ndi ka ukyuli biala ɔni muuti anu taasia ami Katɔti Ubidi lɛlɔ na ɔ́ƒɔ-mi ɔ́di ni, ɔdubɔkɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii na lɛgyila-nwu na limeyi likplodi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ na ɔsɔ ubelie ngba.”
43006041	Amu na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ bése kalɔ baatɛmi teewi-nwu, ɔsika ɔ́su ɔnii, “Ami ndi adila ani nási katɔ líbo” ɔsu.
43006042	Anwuɔsu béye banii, “Ɔɔɔdi Yesu ɔmɛni ndi Yoseƒ ubidi yoo? Bɔgyi ɔti ku uni. Dɛ na ɔ́bla na ɔɔsu ɔnii, 'Katɔ na lɛ́si líbo'?”
43006043	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bɛda bɔdɔ na bina lɛlɔ kemo bɛya.
43006044	Ukyuli ɔdi ulakana-mi kudɔ bubo si ɔɔɔdi Ati ɔni nátala-mi náya na ɔ́ni úde-mi. Na ndubɔgyila-nwu na limeyi likplodi lɛlɔ.
43006045	Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi únweni ɔnii, 'Katɔti ndubɔtina bana ƒui ala.' Anwuɔsu ukyuli biala ɔni nénu na ɔ́tɛya ala ɔ́siku Ati kudɔ ni, anwu muubo-mi kudɔ.
43006046	Ɔmɛni ulátina ka ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́ɔnu Ati ɔmmɔ. Mmomu ami ɔni lɛti nási Katɔti kudɔ ni, ami lɛti náanu-nwu.
43006047	Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ukyuli ɔni mɔɔƒɔ́-mi taadi ni, uulie ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
43006048	Ami ndi adila ani muute ngba.
43006049	Bina bati kuuku bádi adila ani baalɔ banii mana na ketele kemo, nsu békpi.
43006050	Nsu adila ani nási katɔ áyu ébo ni, adi adila ani udu na ukyuli biala ɔni madi-nya ni, ulekpi.
43006051	Ami ndi adila ani muute ngba. Na lɛ́si katɔ lɛ́yu líbo. Ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔdi adila amɛni adi ni, ɔdubo ngba bulie uwi ƒui. Na adila ani ndubute bekyuli ni, anya ndi mina ɔlɔna.”
43006052	Ɔmɛni ɔsu Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ bésie kalɔ baakya unyeƒi kpakplaa na ama alati akɔ banini, “Dɛ na ukyuli ɔmɛni wakana-bu nwuna ɔlɔna buti bute ɔnii bɔdi?”
43006053	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, si bítadi ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔlɔna na bɛni mina ubugya ni, biiibo ngba bɔdi na bina lɛlɔ kemo.
43006054	Ukyuli ɔni mɔɔdi mina ɔlɔna na ɔɔní mina ubugya ni, anwu muulie ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii. Na ndubɔgyila-nwu na limeyi likplodi lɛlɔ.
43006055	Ɔsika mina ɔlɔna ɔdi adila geen na mina ubugya lɛnɔ ɔdi lɛla lɛnidi geen.
43006056	Ukyuli ɔni mɔɔdi mina ɔlɔna na ɔɔní mina ubugya ni, ɔɔbla ku-mi unwi, na ami lɛnɔ mɔɔbla ku-nwu unwi.
43006057	Kalɛ na Ati ɔni nli ngba ɔ́tala-mi na ɔkɛnku anwu ɔsu na nli ngba ni, lɛni kani na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔdi mina ɔlɔna lɛnɔ welie ngba ɔkɛnku ami ɔsu.
43006058	Anwuɔsu ɔmɛni ndi adila ani nási katɔ áyu ébo. Na aaadi ani udu na bina bati kuuku bádi nsu békpi. Ukyuli ɔni madi adila ani mɔɔsu mɛni ni, ɔdubulie ngba uwi ƒui.”
43006059	Ala amɛni na Yesu ɔ́tina-ma na Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ na Kapernaum.
43006060	Ka nwuna basiakune pii bénu ɔmɛni ni, básu banii, “Litemi lɛmɛni kalɔ bunu bubo ɔkplu geen, énu! Ɔma ndubɔkana na use atu unu lɛmɛni?”
43006061	Nsu ina ka ukyuli ɔdi útasu Yesu lɛla lɛdi ni, únu ka baadɔ na bana lɛlɔ kemo na úye-ma ɔnini, “Lɛla lɛmɛni lɛtu-mii atu?
43006062	Amu dɛ na wabla-mii si banii bɛ́nu ka ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛ́kɔ lísela katɔ kesii kani na nka nli?
43006063	Katɔti Kɔyu muute ngba. Na ukyuli ɔlɔna ɔɔɔdi lɛla lɛdi. Ala ani ƒui na mɔɔsu-mii ni, ndanku Katɔti Kɔyu kɔni muute ngba úboku-mii.
43006064	Nsu bina akɔ badi balaƒɔ-mi taadi.” Yesu ɔ́su ɔmɛni ɔsika ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui ni, ɔ́ti bekyuli bani naaadubo-nwu bɔƒɔ bɔdi ku ukyuli ɔni ndububo-nwu kakya bɔkya.
43006065	Amu na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ɔmɛni ɔsu na lɛ́su-mii nnii ukyuli ɔdi ulakana-mi kudɔ bubo si ɔɔɔdi Ati náya na ɔ́kɛ ulu ɔmmɔ.”
43006066	Na ɔmɛni kama ni, nwuna basiakune pii bénwini kama na básɔ bátasiaku-nwu.
43006067	Amu na Yesu úye nwuna batalane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ ɔnini, “Amii lɛnɔ bɛɛwia ka bɛsɔ binwini yoo?”
43006068	Amu na Simon Petro údie kenye ɔnini, “Blɔti, ɔma kudɔ na búnwini búsela? Awɔ nda ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii etemila.
43006069	Na abu bɔ́ɔƒɔ bɔdi na bɔ́ɔnu bɔ́ti ka awɔ ndi Katɔti Ubidi Kedee ɔmmɔ.”
43006070	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Ami náƒuna bina leevu-inyɔ bamɛni ina ka bina akɔ unwi ɔdi ukisine.”
43006071	Yesu ɔ́su ɔmɛni ɔ́siku Yuda ɔni ndi Simon Iskariot ubidi lɛlɔ. Ɔsika na bana leevu-inyɔ akɔ ni, anwu ndubo-nwu kakya bɔkya.
43007001	Na ɔmɛni kama ni, Yesu útaavi na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ na útayɔ ka usie Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ ka Yudaƒuɔ bakya baawia ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na basia na badu-nwu ɔsu.
43007002	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Yudaƒuɔ ketele kemo kevo emeyi bɔdi uwi úudu.
43007003	Anwuɔsu Yesu banwani básu-nwu banini, “Tɔlɔ mɛni teesie Yudea kesii kani na ƒula basiakune badubɔnu ƒula ablala.
43007004	Ɔsika ukyuli ɔni mɔɔwia ka bati-nwu ni, ulabɛ taabla lɛla lɛdi. Ka aakana ala amɛni udu bɔbla ni, ya na kayawi bekyuli ƒui banu ƒula ablala bati!”
43007005	Básu-nwu lɛni ɔsika nwuna banwani muedi bátaƒɔ-nwu bátadi.
43007006	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Mina uwi útedu tɔ. Nsu amii ni, uwi biala use ute-mii.
43007007	Kayawi kalakana amii bukisi. Nsu keekisi ami, ɔsika muudie taasu kede kede ka bayawine ablala adi likpidi.
43007008	Amii biteesie bina limeyi lɛmmɔ kadikɔ. Ami ńtesela emeyi ammɔ kadikɔ, ɔsika mina uwi útedu tɔ ƒui.”
43007009	Ka ɔ́su lɛni ɔsu ni, ɔ́ƒɔ lɛlɔ ɔ́kya Galilea mmɔ.
43007010	Nsu uwi ɔni na nwuna banwani bátɔlɔ bésie emeyi ammɔ kadikɔ kama ƒui ni, anwu lɛnɔ úbesie na bɔbɛ kemo.
43007011	Na Yudaƒuɔ bákya béteeye-nwu lili banii, “Anwu nɔɔ, anwu nɔɔ?”
43007012	Na lɛni kani na nwuna lɛlɔ atɛ ada na bana akɔ mmɔ. Badi baasu banii, “Ukyuli ɔbuni na ɔdi.” Na babambadi lɛnɔ banini, “Oowo! Bekyuli na uuƒú taakya!”
43007013	Nsu Yudaƒuɔ bɔyia ɔsu ni, ukyuli ɔdi útakana na ɔsu lɛla lɛdi ɔlɛku ƒui na nwuna lɛlɔ.
43007014	Ka emeyi ani baadi mmɔ éle ntɛ ni, Yesu úsie útéduo Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ na ɔ́tina ala.
43007015	Ala bɔtina bɔmɛni bɔ́bla Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ dɛye dɛye, na baasu banii, “Wɛ na kebi kamɛni kásiku lɛlati lɛmɛni udu ka útesie ala katɛyakɔ kadi?”
43007016	Amu na Yesu údie kenye na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Mina ala bɔtina bɔɔɔdi ami alati bɔdi. Mmomu ukyuli ɔni nátala-mi ala bɔtina na bɔdi.
43007017	Ukyuli ɔni mɔɔyɔ́ ka ɔbla lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔɔwia ni, ɔdubɔti si ala ani na mɔɔtina ási Katɔti kudɔ iye ami ɔlati ɔyikun kemo na muutemi.
43007018	Na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔtɛmi na anwu ɔlati ɔyikun kemo ni, nwuna lɛlɔ bumwi na ɔɔwia. Nsu ukyuli ɔni mɔɔwia ka umwi ukyuli ɔni nátala-nwu ni, ɔɔbla ala ulu lɛlɔ na ulányi ɔkɔ.
43007019	Ɔɔɔdi Mose néte-mii ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ yoo? Nsu bina akɔ ɔdi uládi ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Bi ɔsu na bɛɛwia ka bɛdu-mi?”
43007020	Mmɔ na bekyuli bammɔ bédie kenye básu-nwu banini, “Kɔyu kukpidi kɔsiaku-ɔ! Ɔma mɔɔwia ka ɔdu-ɔ?”
43007021	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Lɛla linwi pɛ na lɛ́bla, na ɔ́bla bina ƒui kalɛ kadi.
43007022	Mose úbo-mii ɔda ɔnii bikulo bina bebi ago. Nsu ɔɔɔdi anwu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ na ago bukulo búse kalɔ bɔ́si. Mmomu ɔ́si bati kuuku uwi ƒui. Na biikúlo ago na lɛnwunameyi muedi lɛlɔ.
43007023	Na si bakana bekulo ukyuli lego na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ na bátata bétenye ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, ɔdi bɔƒiɔ si ami lɛ́bwi ukyuli ɔdi na lɛlɔ ƒui lɛ́yu-nwu ɔkplu?
43007024	Bitatɛ litemi anumi lɛlɔ! Mmomu bɛtɛ litemi na ulu geen lɛlɔ.”
43007025	Amu na bekyuli badi bási Yerusalem ɔma na béye banii, “Ɔɔɔdi ukyuli ɔmɛni na Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune baawia badu yoo?
43007026	Na aanu-nwu! Unye mɛni ɔɔtɛmi na kadi anumi! Na balakana-nwu lɛla lɛdi bɔsu! Munuu bɔti na báti geen ka anwu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ?
43007027	Si Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ úbo ni, ukyuli ɔdi uláti kesii kani na ɔ́si. Nsu ukyuli ɔmɛni anwu ni, bɔgyi kesii kani na ɔ́si.”
43007028	Na uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔɔtina ala na kakpakɔ mmɔ ni, úye-ma ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Bɛɛbu bɛnii bɛgyi-mi ku kesii kani na lɛ́si? Ńtebo mɛni na ami ɔlati ɔyikun kemo! Ukyuli ɔni nátala-mi ni, ulányi ɔkɔ. Na amii bɛɛɛgyi-nwu.
43007029	Nsu ami ngyi-nwu. Ɔsika anwu nátala-mii, na nwuna kudɔ na lɛ́si.”
43007030	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, báwia ka beƒie-nwu. Nsu ukyuli ɔdi útakana-nwu butuku, ɔsika nwuna uwi útedu tɔ.
43007031	Nsu bana akɔ pii báƒɔ-nwu bádi na béye banii, “Na si Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ úbo ni, ɔdubɔbla akɔla budie bɔtina butulo ani na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔ́ɔbla?”
43007032	Amu ka Yudaƒuɔ lɛkpa lɛni baalɔ bani Ƒarisiƒuɔ bénu ka nwuna lɛlɔ atɛ ada bekyuli bammɔ akɔ lɛni ɔsu ni, ama ku bakpane benengu bása lili na bátala kakpakɔ bagyumanane badi banii betéƒie Yesu.
43007033	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ndubɔsɔ lɛkya-mii kudɔ libu uwi klukui ɔdi kani na lɛtɔlɔ nteesie Anwu ɔni nátala-mi kudɔ.
43007034	Bɛdubo-mi bɔwia na bilanu-mi. Ɔsika kesii kani na ndubɔkya ni, bilakana mmɔ bubo.”
43007035	Amu na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ béye lɛlɔ banini, “Wɛ na ukyuli ɔmɛni úsela tɔ ɔsu na bulanu-nwu? Munuu ɔɔkali ka usie Helaƒuɔ lɛma kesii kani na bula kadi bekyuli badi bégyingya bakya na utátina-ma ala na mmɔ?
43007036	Bi na ɔdanku ɔni na ɔɔsu ɔnii, 'Bɛdubo-mi bɔwia na bilanu-mi,' na 'Kesii kani na ndubɔkya ni, bilakana mmɔ bubo'?”
43007037	Na limeyi likplodi lɛlɔ na emeyi ammɔ bɔdi kemo ɔni ndi limeyi linengudi ni, Yesu ɔ́ta únye na ɔ́su na lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Si utukwɛ ɔɔda ukyuli ɔdi ni, ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔtɔlɔ ubo-mi kudɔ na ubani ntu.
43007038	Lɛni na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔ́su ɔ́siku ukyuli ɔni mɔɔƒɔ́-mi taadi lɛlɔ ɔnini, 'Abiɔ ani naaakwi na aayá na ukyuli uulie ngba ntu bɔdubo butaagba taasiku-nwu kayi kemo.' ”
43007039	Mɛni ni, Kɔyu kɔni ndubɔƒɔ bekyuli bani náƒɔ-nwu bádi lɛlɔ kemo litemi na ɔɔsu. Ɔsika úti úbedu ɔƒɛni ni, Katɔti útatala tɔ Kɔyu kɔmmɔ ɔnii kutáƒɔ-ma lɛlɔ kemo. Ɔsika Yesu úteduo tɔ nwuna lɛga bɔdi bukeye kemo.
43007040	Ka bénu etemila amɛni ni, bana badi básu banii, “Sɔsɔ ukyuli ɔmɛni ndi Katɔti Kenye Udiene ɔmmɔ.”
43007041	Na babambadi lɛnɔ banini, “Ɔmɛni ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi.” Nsu badi ama ni, béye banini, “Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ni, Galilea na ɔdubo bɔsi?
43007042	Ɔɔɔdi bɔsu na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔ́su ka Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ wasi Ɔga Dawid kaba kemo na Betlehem ɔma kesii kani na Dawid ɔ́si yoo?”
43007043	Ɔkɛnku Yesu ɔsu ni, bekyuli bammɔ ƒui béle lɛlɔ.
43007044	Badi báyɔ ka beƒie-nwu, nsu ɔdi útakana-nwu butuku.
43007045	Ka kakpakɔ bagyumanane bani na bátala bénwini bésie Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku bakpane benengu bammɔ kudɔ ni, béye-ma banini, “Bi ɔsu na bítakpanku-nwu bíteboku?”
43007046	Amu na ama bédie kenye banini, “Bútenu ka ukyuli ɔdi ɔtɛmi aani ukyuli ɔmɛni kudii!”
43007047	Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ béye-ma banini, “Amii lɛnɔ ukyuli ɔmɛni úƒu-mii kasusu?
43007048	Bíinu dii si benengu badi iye Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi báƒɔ-nwu bádi?
43007049	Kudii! Nsu otogyi bekyuli bamɛni ƒui baaagyi ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ. Anwuɔsu na ewida asiaku-ma!”
43007050	Amu na Nikodemo ɔni ndi benengu bammɔ akɔ unwi na úusie Yesu kudɔ uwi ɔdi ni, úye-ma ɔnini,
43007051	“Bula ɔda bubo búte-bu ulu ka bɔdu ukyuli kɔtɔ si bútenu-nwu kenye litemi na bɔti lɛla lɛni na ɔdanku iye ɔɔbla?”
43007052	Nsu bédie kenye béye-nwu banini, “Awɔ lɛnɔ Galilea na ási yoo? Duo lɛku kemo na anu ati ka Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi ulási Galilea.”
43007053	Mmɔ ni, ukyuli biala ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie kaduli.
43008001	Nsu Yesu anwu ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie kɔbi kɔni baalɔ Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ.
43008002	Kadi kégye ɔtanta tutuutu ni, ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ. Na bekyuli bammɔ ƒui báka bámana-nwu, na anwu úlie-ma ntɛ na úsie kalɔ ɔɔtina-ma ala.
43008003	Amu na ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ bákpanku uleku ɔdi béƒie kɔnu ku kɔnu na kɔsɔnɔ kadikɔ béboku. Amu na báya na ɔ́sɔ únye bana ƒui anumi.
43008004	Amu na béye Yesu banini, “Ala ɔtinane, uleku ɔmɛni ni, béƒie-nwu kɔnu ku kɔnu ka ɔɔdi kɔsɔnɔ.
43008005	Ɔƒɛni na bula ɔda bubo kenye aani kalɛ na Mose ɔ́tina ni, ɔlɛka bubo-nwu atabi bɔdu. Na dɛ na awɔ aasu?”
43008006	Béye-nwu ɔmɛni banii beti bakywɛ-nwu kakpagyuɛ kalɛ na si ɔ́nu-ka kemo ni, na bakɛ kasiakɔ na beƒie-nwu. Nsu Yesu ɔ́yu ɔ́ƒa na únweni ala na ɔtumu akɔ ku nwuna lɛnimi.
43008007	Amu ka básɔ benye mmɔ beeye-nwu etemila ni, ɔ́talaku lɛlɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bina akɔ ɔni nátabla likpidi lɛdi kudii ni, anwu ɔka-nwu lɛtabi bubo.”
43008008	Amu na anwu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́yu ɔ́ƒa na únweni ala ɔ́sia kalɔ ku lɛnimi.
43008009	Ka benengu bammɔ bénu lɛni ni, bágyu bátɔlɔ unwi unwi ɔ́si unengudi lɛlɔ. Na báda Yesu ku uleku ɔmmɔ lɛti bényene bekyuli bammɔ ntɛ.
43008010	Amu na Yesu ɔ́talaku lɛlɔ na úye uleku ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Uleku, ńtɛlɛ-ma? Ɔdi biala útadu-ɔ kɔtɔ?”
43008011	Amu na uleku ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Oowo, Ati.” Anwuɔsu Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Lɛni kani na ami lɛnɔ naaadu-ɔ kɔtɔ. Anwuɔsu teesie. Mmomu tasɔ telie ataabla likpidi.”
43008012	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́tɛmiku bekyuli bammɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ami ndi kayawi kamɛni bukeye. Na ukyuli ɔni nsiaku-mi kama ni, ɔdubɔkɛ bukeye bɔni muute ukyuli ngba geen, na ulese ulávi lɛdisa kemo kudii.”
43008013	Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ básu-nwu banini, “Awɔ ɔlati muudie ƒula lɛlɔ kenye. Anwuɔsu ƒula kenye budie buuubo unu.”
43008014	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si ina muudie lɛlɔ kenye ni, mina kenye budie bubo unu, ɔsika ngyi kesii kani na lɛ́si, na ngyi kesii kani na lísela. Nsu amii bɛɛɛgyi kesii kani na lɛ́si iye kesii kani na lísela.
43008015	Kayawi kasusu kemo na bɛɛtɛ litemi. Nsu ami ni, naaatɛku ɔdi litemi.
43008016	Si banii bɔtɛ na ntɛ litemi muedi ni, nka mina litemi bɔtɛ bɔkɛ ulu lɛlɔ. Ɔsika ɔɔɔdi ami lɛti mɔɔtɛ litemi lɛmmɔ. Mmomu Katɔti ɔni nátala-mii unye-mi kama.
43008017	Na bina ɔda bubo kemo ni, bénweni banii nkyuli inyɔ lɛla kenye budie bubo unu.
43008018	Na ami ndi bana akɔ unwi ɔni muudie lɛlɔ kenye. Na Ati ɔni nátala-mi ndi unyɔdi.”
43008019	Amu na béye-nwu banini, “Ńtɛlɛ ƒ^ɔti ɔmmɔ?” Yesu údie kenye na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛɛɛgyi-mi iye mina Ɔti. Ɔsika si bɔgyi na bɛgyi-mi ni, nka bɛdubɔti mina Ɔti lɛnɔ.”
43008020	Kenye kamɛni na ɔ́su-ma na kesii kani nde egulabi kesekɔ na kakpakɔ kemo mmɔ. Nsu ukyuli ɔdi útakana-nwu buƒie, ɔsika nwuna uwi ɔmmɔ útedu tɔ.
43008021	Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ndubo bɔtɔlɔ na bɛdubo-mi bɔwia na bikpi bɛkya bina ekpidi kemo. Na kesii kani lísela ni, bilakana mmɔ bubo.”
43008022	Amu na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ béye lɛlɔ banini, “Bɔdu na ɔdubo lɛlɔ ka ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Kesii kani na lísela ni, bilakana bubo'?”
43008023	Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Amii ni, kalɔ mɛni na bɛ́si. Na ami ni, lɛ́si katɔ. Kayawi kamɛni ɔdi na bɛdi. Na ami ni, ɔɔɔdi kayawi kamɛni ɔdi na ndi.
43008024	Lɛ́su-mii ka bɛdubo bukpi bɔkya bina ekpidi kemo. Na si bítaƒɔ bítadi ka ami ndi Anwu ɔmmɔ ni, bɛdubo bukpi bɔkya bina ekpidi kemo sɔsɔ.”
43008025	Amu na béye-nwu banini, “Awɔ ndi ɔma?” Amu na údie kenye ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lɛla lɛni na lɛ́su-mii ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ kani na ndi.
43008026	Mbo ala pii na lɛsu lɛsiku-mii lɛlɔ na lɛdu-mii kɔtɔ na bina ɔbladu ɔsu. Nsu ukyuli ɔni nátala-mi ni, ulányi ɔkɔ. Na ala ani na línu lɛ́siku-nwu kudɔ ni, anya muuti taasu kayawi bekyuli.”
43008027	Mmɔ ni, bétenu kalɔ banii Ɔti lɛlɔ na ɔɔtɛmi taasiku.
43008028	Anwuɔsu Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si uwi ɔni na bɛ́kɔliku Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi katɔ ni, mmɔ na bɛdubɔti ka ami ndi Anwu ɔmmɔ. Na naaabla lɛla lɛdi na ami ɔlati ɔyikun kemo. Mmomu mɔɔtɛmi kalɛ kani na mina Ɔti ɔ́tina-mi.
43008029	Na anwu ɔni nátala-mi ni, unyeku-mi. Na útada-mi útese, ɔsika mɔɔbla lɛla lɛni mɔɔyɔ́-nwu kaƒɔ uwi biala.”
43008030	Na ka ɔ́tɛmi lɛni ni, bekyuli pii báƒɔ-nwu bádi.
43008031	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su Yudaƒuɔ bani náƒɔ-nwu bádi mmɔ ɔnini, “Si bɛɛbla taasiaku mina ala ani na lɛ́tina-mii lɛlɔ ni, na bɛdi mina basiakune sɔsɔ.
43008032	Na bɛdubɔti litemi geen, na litemi lɛmmɔ lɛya na bɛkɛ bɔnwuna.”
43008033	Amu na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ básu-nwu banini, “Abraham kaba bebi na bɔdi, na bɔɔɔkya ukyuli ɔdi kalɔ! Dɛ na ɔ́bla na aasu anii bɔdubɔkɛ bɔnwuna?”
43008034	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔbla likpidi ni, ɔkya likpidi kalɔ.
43008035	Na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla ukyuli bamba kabla ni, ulénwini kaduli kammɔ ala ɔdine geen. Mmomu ubi ɔni na ɔtɔlati ɔ́wɔ na kaduli kammɔ kemo geen ni, anwu mɔɔdi kaduli kammɔ ala uwi ƒui.
43008036	Anwuɔsu si ami Katɔti Ubidi lɛ́ya na ákɛ bɔnwuna ni, na ebo bɔnwuna geen sɔsɔ.
43008037	Ngyi ka Abraham kaba bebi na bɛdi. Nsu bɛɛwia ka bɛdu-mi, ɔsika bilaƒɔ mina ala ani na mɔɔtina-mii taadi.
43008038	Lɛla lɛni na mina Ɔti ɔ́tina-mi ni, ani na mɔɔsu. Na amii lɛnɔ bɛɛbla lɛla lɛni na bínu bɛ́siku bina ɔti kudɔ.”
43008039	Amu na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ básu-nwu banini, “Abraham ndi bula ɔti.” Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si Abraham bebi na bɛdi geen ni, bɛdubɔbla ala ani na Abraham ɔ́bla.
43008040	Nsu ami ɔni mɔɔsu-mii litemi geen lɛni na línu lɛ́siku Katɔti kudɔ ni, ami mmomu na bɛɛwia bɛdu. Ɔɔɔdi ɔmɛni udu na Abraham ɔ́bla.
43008041	Ala ani na ukyuli ɔni ndi bina ɔti ɔ́bla ni, anya na bɛɛbla.” Amu na básu-nwu banini, “Ɔɔɔdi kɔsɔnɔ bebi na bɔdi! Ɔti unwi na bubo, na anwu ndi Katɔti!”
43008042	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si Katɔti ndi bina ɔti ni, bɛdubɔyɔ-mi. Ɔsika Katɔti ɔmmɔ kudɔ geen na lɛ́si líbo mɛni. Ńtebo na ami ɔlati bɔyɔ kemo. Mmomu anwu ɔmmɔ nátala-mi.
43008043	Bi ɔsu na bilenu-mi kalɔ? Ngyi ka bilátuna bɛnii biise atu na binu lɛla lɛni na mɔɔsu.
43008044	Bina ɔti ndi ukisine ɔmmɔ, na bɛwia ka bɛbla nwuna lɛƒɔyɔ. Bekyuli ɔdune kani na ɔdi ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui. Na ulayɔ litemi geen lɛmmɔ, ɔsika ulasu lɛla siin lɛdi kudii. Si ɔ́nyi ɔkɔ ni, nwuna udu na uudie taatina na bɔtɛmi kemo. Ɔsika ɔkɔ ɔnyine na ɔdi, na anwu ndi ɔkɔ bɔnyi ƒui ɔti.
43008045	Nsu ka mɔɔsu-mii litemi geen lɛmɛni ɔsu ni, bilaƒɔ-mi taadi.
43008046	Bina akɔ ɔmani na madu-mi likpidi lɛdi kɔtɔ? Si mɔɔsu-mii litemi geen ni, bi ɔsu na bilaƒɔ-mi taadi.
43008047	Ukyuli ɔni ndi Katɔti ɔdi ni, anwu muunú ala ani na Katɔti ɔɔsu. Na lɛla lɛni ɔsu na bilabla taasiaku mina litemi lɛlɔ ndi ka bɛɛɛdi Katɔti ɔdi.”
43008048	Mmɔ na Yudaƒuɔ básu Yesu banini, “Ɔdi litemi geen ka bɔ́su-ɔ ka Samariani ukpidi na adi, na kɔyu kukpidi kɔsiaku-ɔ!”
43008049	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Kɔyu kukpidi kɔdi kɔɔɔsiaku-mi. Ami mɔɔtalaku mina Ɔti lɛnyi katɔ, nsu amii biibile-mi lɛnyi.
43008050	Naaawia lɛnyi teete lɛlɔ. Nsu ukyuli ɔni mɔɔwia ka bekyuli bakɔliku-mi lɛnyi katɔ ni, anwu ɔkya. Na anwu mɔɔtɛ litemi ulu lɛlɔ.
43008051	Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii ukyuli ɔni madi ala ani na mɔɔtina mɛni lɛlɔ ni, ulekpi kudi kudii!”
43008052	Mmɔ na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ básu-nwu banini, “Ɔƒɛni na bɔti nwaa ka kɔyu kukpidi kɔsiaku-ɔ! Abraham úkpi, na Katɔti kenye bediene lɛnɔ békpi, nsu awɔ aasu ka ukyuli biala ɔni madi ƒula ala ani na aatina lɛlɔ ulekpi kudi kudii!
43008053	Bulaƒɔ taadi ka bɔsu na ada anii etulo bula ɔti Abraham, munuu lɛni na aasu? Anwu úkpi, na Katɔti kenye bediene lɛnɔ békpi. Ɔma na aabu ka adi tɔ?”
43008054	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Si banii mina lɛlɔ na muumwi ni, nka bumwi bɔmmɔ bɔɔɔdi lɛla lɛdi. Nsu ukyuli ɔni muumwi-mi ni, anwu ndi mina ɔti. Anwu ndi ɔni na bɛnii anwu ndi bina Katɔti.
43008055	Amii bɛɛɛgyi-nwu. Nsu ami ngyi-nwu. Na ndubunwini ɔkɔ ɔnyine bina kalɛ si líni ɔmɛni. Ɔsika ngyi-nwu geen, na mɔɔdi nwuna etemila lɛlɔ.
43008056	Ebiti áda bina ɔti Abraham ka ɔ́ti ka ndubo. Anwuɔsu úti anu ɔ́sia mina bubo ku lɛlɔyɔ.”
43008057	Mmɔ na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ básu-nwu banini, “Awɔ átaƒɔ tɔ ina akwa liti, na anii áanu Abraham?”
43008058	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii asa badubɔwɔ Abraham ni, Ami nli.”
43008059	Mmɔ ka ɔ́su lɛni ni, bála atabi banii beebó-nwu, nsu Yesu ɔ́bala lɛlɔ na ɔ́vi ɔ́lɛ-ma akɔ na kakpakɔ mmɔ.
43009001	Ka Yesu ɔkɛ ɔɔví ni, útánu ɔnana ɔdi na anumi ábwɛ ɔ́si uwi ɔni na báwɔ-nwu ƒui.
43009002	Mmɔ na nwuna basiakune béye-nwu banini, “Ala ɔtinane, ɔma ekpidi náya na ɔnana ɔmɛni anumi ábwɛ asa na báwɔ-nwu? Anwu ɔlati ekpidi ɔsu, munuu nwuna bawɔne ekpidi ɔsu?”
43009003	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔnana ɔmɛni anumi ani nábwɛ-nwu ni, aaadanku nwuna ekpidi iye nwuna bawɔne ekpidi ani na bábla ɔsu. Mmomu anumi ábwɛ-nwu kalɛ na bekyuli banu Katɔti ɔyikun bati na ukyuli ɔmɛni lɛlɔ.
43009004	Si uwi ɔni na kadi kátasa tɔ ni, ɔdi ka butaabla Katɔti ɔni nátala-mi kabla. Ɔƒɛ ɔdubo bɔsa ɔni na ukyuli biala ɔsɔ ulakana lɛdi biala bɔbla.
43009005	Na lebo lɛni kemo na nkya bayawine akɔ ni, ami ndi bana bukeye.”
43009006	Ka Yesu ɔ́su lɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, útuo lisuo úwi kalɔ na úti ɔ́sala ku lɛti, na úti-ni úsusu ɔnana ɔmmɔ anumi.
43009007	Na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Teesie na atáƒɔ anumi na lɛba blii lɛni baalɔ bani Siloa kemo.” Na Siloa kalɔ ndi bátala-nwu. Anwuɔsu ɔnana ɔmmɔ úsie na útáƒɔ nwuna anumi. Na nwuna anumi álɛmi na ɔɔnu, na ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo kaduli.
43009008	Amu na nwuna bakpana ku bekyuli bani ƒui nánu-nwu uwi ɔni na úteevele ala béye lɛlɔ banini, “Ɔɔɔdi ɔnana ɔmɛni néteelie mɛni teevele ala mmɔ, iye?”
43009009	Badi banii anwu na ɔdi. Nsu babambadi ama banii, “Oowo, ɔɔɔdi anwu na ɔdi. Bɔlɛ kani na ɔ́lɛ-nwu.” Amu na ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔlati ɔnini, “Ami na ɔdi!”
43009010	Mmɔ na béye-nwu banini, “Dɛ na ɔ́bla asa na aakana bɔnu?”
43009011	Amu na údie kenye ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔni baalɔ Yesu ni, anwu nábla aba úsusu-mi anumi. Na ɔ́su-mi ɔnii ntésie na ntáƒɔ mina anumi na Siloa lɛba kemo. Anwuɔsu lísie. Na ka lɛ́nya lɛ́ƒɔ anumi lɛ́wɔlɔ kani na líse kalɔ mɔɔnu.”
43009012	Mmɔ ni, béye-nwu banii, “Ńtɛlɛ ukyuli ɔmmɔ?” Amu na údie kenye ɔnini, “Lɛɛɛgyi.”
43009013	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, bekyuli bammɔ béti ukyuli ɔni na nka anumi ábwɛ-nwu mmɔ bésienku Ƒarisiƒuɔ kudɔ.
43009014	Na limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na Yesu úti aba úsusu ɔnana ɔmmɔ anumi na ɔ́bwi-nwu ni, ɔdi lɛnwunameyi.
43009015	Mmɔ na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ lɛnɔ básɔ béye-nwu kalɛ na ɔ́bla asa na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kana na ɔɔnu. Na ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔmmɔ úti aba adi úsusu-mi anumi. Na lɛ́ƒɔ mina anumi. Na ɔƒɛni ni, mɔɔkana mɔɔnu.”
43009016	Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ badi básu banini, “Ukyuli ɔni nábla lɛla lɛmɛni ni, ɔɔɔdi Katɔti nátala-nwu! Ɔsika uládi lɛnwunameyi ɔda ɔni na Katɔti úbo-bu lɛlɔ.” Na babambadi ama banini, “Dɛ na ukyuli ɔni na ɔdi alaekpidi ɔblane wakana na wabla akɔla budie taatina amɛni udu?” Mmɔ ni, bekyuli bammɔ béle lɛlɔ akpa anyɔ.
43009017	Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ básɔ béye ɔnana ɔmmɔ banini, “Ka aasu anii anwu nábwi-ɔ lɛnumbwɛ ni, bi na awɔ ɔlati aasu taasiku ukyuli ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ?” Amu na ɔnana ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Katɔti kenye udiene na ɔdi.”
43009018	Ina amu ni, Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ bátaƒɔ bátadi ka sɔsɔ na ɔdi ka ɔnana ɔmmɔ anumi ábwɛ-nwu asa na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kana na ɔɔnu úti útédu uwi ɔni bálɔ nwuna bawɔne.
43009019	Mmɔ na béye-ma banini, “Bina ubi na ɔdi mɛni? Na ka bɛɛsu bɛnii bɛ́wɔ-nwu na ɔdi ɔnumbwɛne ni, dɛ na ɔ́bla asa na ɔɔkana bɔnu ɔƒɛni?”
43009020	Amu na nwuna bawɔne bédie kenye banini, “Bɔgyi ka bula ubi na ɔdi. Na bɔgyi lɛnɔ ka ɔni na bɔ́wɔ-nwu ni, ulánu.
43009021	Nsu kalɛ na ɔ́bla asa na ɔ́kana na ɔɔnu ni, bulákana bɔti. Na bɔɔɔgyi ukyuli ɔni nábwi-nwu lɛnumbwɛ lɛmmɔ lɛnɔ. Biye-nwu na anwu ɔlati ɔdubudie lɛlɔ kenye, ɔsika ɔ́ɔbi lɛlɔ kanaalɛ!”
43009022	Nwuna bawɔne básu ɔmɛni, ɔsika bátaayia Yudaƒuɔ benengu bammɔ. Ɔsika benengu bammɔ báalɛ ugyii bése ka ukyuli biala ɔni medie kenye ka Yesu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ni, badubudie-nwu bana akɔ na Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ.
43009023	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu na nwuna bawɔne básu banii, “Ɔ́ɔbi lɛlɔ kanaalɛ, ɔsu biye-nwu!”
43009024	Benengu bammɔ básɔ bálɔ ɔnana ɔni na nka anumi ábwɛ-nwu mmɔ, na básu-nwu banini, “Yia Katɔti, na asu-bu litemi geen lɛmmɔ! Abu bɔgyi ka ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔdi alaekpidi ɔblane!”
43009025	Amu na ɔnana ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Ami lɛɛɛgyi si ɔdi alaekpidi ɔblane iye ɔɔɔdi. Lɛla linwi lɛni kani na ngyi ndi ka anumi ábwɛ-mi dii. Nsu ɔƒɛni ni, mɔɔnu!”
43009026	Mmɔ na benengu bammɔ béye-nwu banini, “Bi na ɔ́bla-a, na dɛ na ɔ́bwi ƒula lɛnumbwɛ lɛmmɔ?”
43009027	Amu na ɔnana ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Lɛ́ɛsu-mii ḿbavi, nsu bilayɔ ka binu. Na bi ɔsu na bɛsɔ bɛɛyɔ́ binu ɔƒɛni? Bɛɛwia ka binwini nwuna basiakune lɛnɔ?”
43009028	Mmɔ na benengu bammɔ bábɔku-nwu banii, “Awɔ ndi ukyuli ɔmmɔ kama ɔsiakune. Abu Mose basiakune na bɔdi.
43009029	Bɔgyi ka Katɔti ɔ́tɛmiku Mose. Na ukyuli ɔmmɔ anwu ni, bɔɔɔgyi kesii kani na ɔ́si muedi!”
43009030	Amu na ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Bi litemi lɛdi mɛni? Bɔsu bɛda bɛnii bɛɛɛgyi kesii kani na ɔ́si, nsu anwu nábwi-mi lɛnumbwɛ!
43009031	Bɔgyi ka Katɔti ulenu alaekpidi bablane katɔ bɔkpali. Na bekyuli babuni bani mɔɔbu-nwu na baabla nwuna lɛƒɔyɔ mmomu katɔ bɔkpali na uunú.
43009032	Na ɔ́si kayawi kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui ni, ɔma nénu ka ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́ya na ɔnumbwɛne ɔni na báwɔ-nwu lɛni ɔkana bɔnu?
43009033	Na si ɔɔɔdi Katɔti kudɔ na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔ́si ni, nka ulakana lɛla lɛdi bɔbla.”
43009034	Amu na benengu bammɔ banini, “Awɔ ɔni na likpidi kemo na báwɔ-ɔ bákya na lɛni kani na éti ábi lɛlɔ ni, awɔ mɔɔwia ka atina-bu ala?” Mmɔ ni, bábɔku-nwu bédie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ mmɔ.
43009035	Ka Yesu únu ka bábɔku-nwu bédie mmɔ ni, ɔ́wia ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔ́nu. Na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Áƒɔ Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ádi?”
43009036	Mmɔ na ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ati, tina-mi ukyuli ɔmmɔ na makana-nwu bɔƒɔ bɔdi.”
43009037	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Áanu ukyuli ɔmmɔ ábavi. Na ami ɔmmɔ ndi ukyuli ɔni mɔɔtɛmiku-ɔ ɔƒɛni.”
43009038	Mmɔ kani na ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, “Blɔti, lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́di!” Na ɔ́lɛ akɔnkɔ na Yesu anumi na úmwi-nwu.
43009039	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su ɔnini, “Líbo kayawi kamɛni mbatɛku bekyuli litemi kalɛ na banumbwɛne bataanu, na bani mɔɔnu ni, anumi abwɛ-ma.”
43009040	Ka Ƒarisiƒuɔ bani nkya-ma akɔ bénu lɛla lɛni na Yesu ɔ́su ni, béye-nwu banini, “Bi na aasu? Abu lɛnɔ banumbwɛne na bɔdi?”
43009041	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si banii anumi nábwɛ-mii ni, nka bítaƒiɔ. Nsu ka amii alati bɛnii bɛɛnu ɔsu ni, ɔmɛni ɔɔtina ka bɛ́ƒiɔ.”
43010001	Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, ukyuli ɔni naaadubo kayakun kammɔ kenye bɔsia buduo lɛƒonuyu lɛmmɔ kemo mmomu ɔba kama na ɔdubɔkɔ uduo ni, ɔdi uyune ku ala ubilene.
43010002	Na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔsia kayakun kammɔ teeduo ɔba kemo ni, anwu ndi baƒonu ɔdane ɔbuni ɔmmɔ.
43010003	Kayakun kenye ɔgyumanane ɔɔlɛmi kayakun kammɔ teete anwu. Na baƒonu bammɔ beenú-nwu lɛdi si ɔɔkpali-ma kalɛ na ɔ́sia-ma anyi na ɔɔtɔnku-ma taalɛku.
43010004	Na si ɔ́kpanku-ma ɔ́lɛku ni, ɔɔtɔ-ma lɛtɔtɔ na baƒonu bammɔ baasiaku-nwu kama ɔsika bagyi-nwu lɛdi.
43010005	Baaadubo ukyuli bamba bɔsiaku. Mmomu badubukeli batɔlɔ ukyuli ɔbambadi kudɔ, ɔsika baaagyi-nwu lɛdi.”
43010006	Yesu úbo-ma lɛgba lɛmɛni, nsu bétenu lɛla lɛni na ɔ́su-ma kalɔ.
43010007	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, ami ndi ɔba kayakun ute baƒonu bammɔ.
43010008	Bekyuli bani ƒui nágyu bátɔ-mi lɛtɔtɔ na bébo aani si ami na ɔdi ni, badi beyune ku ala bebilene. Nsu baƒonu bammɔ bétenu-ma litemi.
43010009	Ami ndi kayakun kammɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔsia-mi lɛlɔ teeduo ɔba ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ndubɔƒɔ-nwu ngba. Ɔdubuduo mmɔ taalɛ na utaakɛ adila abuni taadi.
43010010	Buyu kani na uyune uubo teebeyu na ɔdu bebuo na ubile ala lɛnɔ. Na ami ni, líbo kalɛ na lɛya na bekyuli belie ngba geen na bakɛ bɔnwuna ƒui.
43010011	“Ami ndi baƒonu ɔdane ɔbuni ɔni nátuna ka ukpi na baƒonu bammɔ lili.
43010012	Ukyuli ɔni na kayu kenye na béti-nwu na úbo ɔɔbla kabla ni, uukeli si ɔ́nu ka kegiti kɔdubo. Na ɔda baƒonu bammɔ unyene. Ɔsika ɔɔɔdi baƒonu ɔdane. Na baƒonu bammɔ lɛnɔ baaadi nwuna badi. Anwuɔsu kegiti kɔmmɔ kuuƒie baƒonu bammɔ na kugyingya-ma ƒui.
43010013	Ukyuli ɔmɛni uukeli, ɔsika kayu kenye na béti-nwu na úbo ɔɔbla kabla. Na ɔɔɔdaku baƒonu bammɔ lɛda.
43010014	-
43010015	“Ami ndi baƒonu ɔdane ɔbuni. Na aani kalɛ na Ati ɔgyi-mi na ami lɛnɔ ngyi-nwu ni, lɛni kani na ngyi mina baƒonu, na ama lɛnɔ bagyi-mi. Na lɛ́tuna ka likpi na bana lili.
43010016	Mbo baƒonu babambadi na beeebo lɛƒonuyu lɛmɛni kemo tɔ. Na ɔlɛka lɛkpanku ama lɛnɔ liboku. Na badubunu-mi lɛdi. Na bana ƒui badubunwini baƒonu lisu linwi na baƒonu ɔdane unwi kalɔ.
43010017	Na Ati ɔɔyɔ́-mi, ɔsika lɛ́tuna ka likpi na bana lili. Ɔmmɔ kama na lɛsɔ linwini libo mbelie ngba.
43010018	Ɔɔɔdi ukyuli ɔdi ndubo-mi bɔkana bɔdu. Mmomu ami ɔlati nénu kalɔ ka likpi. Mbo ɔyikun na lɛkana likpi lɛni. Na mbo ɔyikun lɛnɔ na lɛkana na lɛsɔ linwini libo mbelie ngba. Ɔmɛni ndi lɛla lɛni na Ati úbo-mi ɔda ka mbabla.”
43010019	Na Yesu etemila amɛni ɔsu ni, bule bɔ́sɔ búduo Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ ƒui ntɛ.
43010020	Na bana akɔ pii básu banini, “Kɔyu kukpidi kɔsiaku ukyuli ɔmɛni, na uukpi libuo! Bi ɔsu na ɔlɛka binye biteenu ala ani na ɔɔsu?”
43010021	Nsu babambadi lɛnɔ básu banini, “Ukyuli ɔni na kɔyu kukpidi kɔsiaku ni, ulakana na wetemi lɛni! Dɛ na kɔyu kukpidi kɔdubɔya na ɔnumbwɛne ɔsɔ utaanu?”
43010022	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔdi kɔyɔ uwi ɔni na Yudaƒuɔ baadi bana limeyi lɛni baalɔ Kakpakɔ Bɔsɔku Teete Katɔti Limeyi.
43010023	Na Yesu ɔkɛ uusié taavi na kakpakɔ kaduli mmɔ kesii kani baalɔ Salomo lɛgbanya.
43010024	Mmɔ na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ bábaka bámana-nwu, na béye-nwu banini, “Uwi ɛlɛ geen na adubunye etédu asa na asu-bu nwaa si awɔ ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ?”
43010025	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lɛ́ɛsu-mii ɔmɛni ḿbavi, nsu bilaƒɔ-mi taadi. Na ala ani mɔɔbla ɔkɛnku mina Ɔti ɔyikun lɛlɔ muudie-mi kenye.
43010026	Nsu bilaƒɔ taadi, ɔsika bɛɛɛdi mina baƒonu bammɔ akɔ badi.
43010027	Mina baƒonu beenú-mi lɛla lɛni mɔɔsu-ma. Na ngyi-ma. Na ama lɛnɔ basiaku-mi.
43010028	Mɔɔyá na beelie ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii, na balayii ku udu. Na ukyuli biala ulakana-ma buƒie bɔƒɔ na mina kɔnu kemo.
43010029	Katɔti ɔni néti-ma úte-mi ni, úbomo útulo lɛla biala na ukyuli biala ulakana-ma buƒie bɔƒɔ na nwuna kɔnu kemo kudii.
43010030	Ati ku ami ƒui ni, bekyuli benwi na bɔdi.”
43010031	Mmɔ na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ básɔ bála atabi banii beebó Yesu.
43010032	Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Lɛ́bla kabla kabuni pii na bina akɔ, na amii alati bɛ́nu na adi kabla kani na Ati úti ɔ́kya-mi enu kemo ka mbabla. Na ala amɛni akɔ ɔmani lili ɔsu na bɛɛwia ka bibo-mi atabi?”
43010033	Mmɔ na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ básu banini, “Ɔɔɔdi ala abuni adi ɔsu na bɔɔwia ka buubó-ɔ atabi. Mmomu ɔni na eedumi Katɔti ɔsu! Ukyuli kani na adi, nsu aawia ka eti lɛlɔ enwini Katɔti!”
43010034	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bénweni na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Bise aani Katɔti.'
43010035	Na bɔgyi ka lɛla lɛni na bénweni bákya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ni, lɛdi litemi geen lɛni nse lísela uwi ƒui. Na mmɔ na Katɔti ɔ́lɔ bekyuli bani na ɔ́ya básu nwuna litemi buni ɔnii, 'Bise aani Katɔti.'
43010036	Nsu ami ni, bɔƒuna na Ati ɔ́ƒuna-mi ka libo kayawi kamɛni kemo. Na bi ɔsu na bɛɛsu bɛni muudumi Katɔti ka lɛ́su nnii ami ndi Katɔti Ubidi ɔsu?
