43010037	Na si ɔɔɔdi mina Ɔti kabla na mɔɔbla ni, bitaƒɔ-mi bitadi.
43010038	Nsu si anya na mɔɔbla bɔdi ni, si ina bilaƒɔ ami ɔlati taadi ni, ɔdi ka bɛƒɔ ala ani na mɔɔbla anya bɛdi. Na si bɛ́bla lɛni ni, bɛdubɔnu bɔti kɔnakunwi ka Katɔti uliku-mi na ami lɛnɔ nliku-nwu.”
43010039	Mɛni lɛnɔ ni, Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ básɔ báyɔ ka beƒie-nwu, nsu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́lɛ-ma enu kemo.
43010040	Ka Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ-ma kudɔ ni, ɔ́sɔ ɔ́via Yordan ketu na úsie útélie kesii kani na Yohane ɔ́kya útaakpila bekyuli ntu dii.
43010041	Na bekyuli pii bébo-nwu kudɔ. Na básu lɛlɔ banini, “Yohane útabla akɔla budie taatina bɔdi. Nsu lɛla biala na Yohane ɔ́su na ukyuli ɔmɛni lɛlɔ ni, líbo-nwu kemo lɛni.”
43010042	Na bekyuli pii báƒɔ Yesu bádi.
43011001	Na ɔma ɔni baalɔ Betania kemo ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya na baalɔ-nwu Lasaro. Ɔnana ɔmɛni úbo uuƒi. Na banwani belekubi inyɔ bani ndi Maria ku Marta lɛnɔ bákya ɔma ɔmmɔ.
43011002	Maria ɔmɛni ndi ɔni nébeti inɔmii bɔni muunwenyi ƒɛƒɛɛ úwi Blɔti Yesu lɛgba na ɔ́da nwuna lili linwini úni-nwu lɛgba. Na ɔnwani ndi Lasaro ɔni nébo uuƒi litemi na bɔɔsu ɔƒaani.
43011003	Lasaro banwani belekubi bamɛni básia Yesu kenye banini, “Blɔti ƒula ɔkpana ɔyɔne uuƒi.”
43011004	Ka Yesu únu kenye kamɛni ni, ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ɔlɛ ɔni na Lasaro uuƒi mɛni ni, ɔɔɔdi kukpi ndubɔdi-nwu kawɔlɔkɔ.
43011005	Mmomu ɔmɛni úbo úte lɛni kalɛ na Katɔti udie nwuna ɔyikun ɔtina. Na ɔkɛnku ɔmmɔ kani lɛlɔ na bekyuli bemwi ami Katɔti Ubidi.” Yesu ɔ́yɔ Lasaro ku Marta ku ɔnwani geen.
43011006	Nsu ɔni na kenye kamɛni kédu-nwu ni, ɔ́ƒɔ lɛlɔ ɔ́kya mmɔ emeyi anyɔ úbu.
43011007	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Bɛya na bɔsɔ bunwini busie Yudea.”
43011008	Amu na bédie kenye banini, “Nsu ala ɔtinane, uwi klukui ɔdi kani návi mɛni ka bekyuli bani nkya mmɔ báwia ka bebo-ɔ atabi! Amu na asɔ aakali ka bɔsɔ busie kama?”
43011009	Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Si kadi kégye ni, limeyi lɛdanku uwi akpa akpa leevu-inyɔ, munuu ɔkɔ mɔɔnyi? Anwuɔsu kadi bukeye bɔmmɔ ɔsu ni, ukyuli ɔni nkɛ ni, uletulo.
43011010	Nsu si usien na ɔkɛ bɔdi ni, ɔdubo butulo ɔsika bukeye bɔdi buuubo.”
43011011	Ka Yesu ɔ́su ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su úbunku ɔnini, “Bula ɔkpana Lasaro ɔ́ɔlɛɛ, nsu muusié ntágyila-nwu.”
43011012	Ka batɛyane bammɔ bénu lɛni ni, básu Yesu banini, “Blɔti, si bɔlɛɛ na ɔ́nya ɔda ni, ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔsa-nwu.”
43011013	Nsu bɔsu na Yesu ɔda ɔnii Lasaro úkpi, nsu nwuna batɛyane bákali ka lɛlɛɛ geen na ɔɔlɛɛ.
43011014	Anwuɔsu ɔ́su-ma nwaa ɔnini, “Lasaro úkpi.
43011015	Nsu amii ɔsu ni, ɔdia-mi ka liiibo mmɔ asa na úkpi kalɛ na ɔkɛnku ɔmɛni lɛlɔ ni, na bɛƒɔ-mi bɛdi. Anwuɔsu bɛya na buteesie-nwu kudɔ mmɔ.”
43011016	Amu na Toma ɔni baalɔ Nta Ubi mmɔ ɔ́su nwuna banwani batɛyane bakladi ɔnini, “Bɛya na bula ƒui bɔsiaku ala ɔtinane kalɛ na abu lɛnɔ bukpi ku-nwu!”
43011017	Uwi ɔni na Yesu útédu mmɔ ni, únu ka báava Lasaro na limeyi lɛmmɔ ndi limeyi linedi.
43011018	Ɔƒɛni ɔ́si Yerusalem úsie Betania mmɔ ni, ɔbla eluku anyɔ.
43011019	Na Yudaƒuɔ pii bésie mmɔ bátásia Maria ku Marta kɔnu ka bana ɔnwani úkpi ɔsu.
43011020	Ka Marta únu ka Yesu ɔ́si ɔdubo ni, úsie útásiaku-nwu. Na Maria anwu ɔkya ɔtɔ.
43011021	Mmɔ na Marta ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, si bɔkya na akya mɛni ni, nka mina ɔnwani útekpi!
43011022	Nsu ngyi ka ina ɔƒɛni muedi ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔbla lɛla biala na évele-nwu ute-ɔ.”
43011023	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ƒ^ɔnwani ɔdubɔta ulie ngba.”
43011024	Mmɔ ni, Marta údie kenye ɔnini, “Ngyi ka ɔdubɔta uwi ɔni na bekpine badubɔsɔ bata na limeyi likplodi lɛlɔ.”
43011025	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ami mɔɔyá na bekyuli basɔ baata teebelie ngba. Ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔƒɔ́-mi taadi ɔdubulie ngba si ina úkpi muedi.
43011026	Na ukyuli ɔni nli ngba si ɔ́ƒɔ-mi ɔ́di ni, ulekpi kudii. Áƒɔ ɔmɛni ádi?”
43011027	Ka Yesu úye-nwu lɛni ni, Marta údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɛɛn, Blɔti, lɛ́ƒɔ-ɔ lɛ́di ka awɔ ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni ndi Katɔti Ubidi ɔni na básu bése ka ɔdubo kayawi.”
43011028	Mmɔ ka Marta ɔ́su lɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, únwini úsie na útálɔ ɔnwani Maria úsienku kɔmadɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ala ɔtinane ɔmmɔ úubo mɛni na uuye-ɔ lili.”
43011029	Ka Maria únu ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́babla ɔlɛ úsie utásiaku-nwu.
43011030	Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, Yesu úteduo tɔ ɔma ɔmmɔ. Mmomu ɔ́mua unye likpo lɛni na Marta úbasiaku-nwu mmɔ.
43011031	Na Yudaƒuɔ bani nlie Maria kudɔ baasia-nwu kɔnu ni, ama lɛnɔ báta básiaku Maria kama uwi ɔni na ɔ́babala ɔ́lɛ mmɔ. Ɔsika bábu ka kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kudɔ na ɔ́sɔ úsela utéteewulo.
43011032	Uwi ɔmɛni lɛlɔ ni, Maria úubo úbedu Yesu kudɔ. Na uwi ɔni na ɔ́nu Yesu ni, mmɔ kani na ɔ́yu úwi Yesu lɛgba akɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Blɔti, si bɔkya na akya mɛni ni, nka mina ɔnwani útekpi.”
43011033	Yesu ɔ́nu kalɛ na Maria uuwulo na bekyuli bani nsiaku-nwu lɛnɔ beewulo. Nwuna kayi kékpoku-nwu na údumo. Na úye bekyuli bammɔ ɔnini,
43011034	“Wɛ na bɛ́va-nwu?” Amu na bédie kenye banini, “Blɔti, bo, na abanu.”
43011035	Mmɔ ni, Yesu úwulo.
43011036	Amu na bekyuli bammɔ básu lɛlɔ banini, “Bɛnu kalɛ na ɔɔyɔ́-nwu!”
43011037	Nsu bádi básu lɛlɔ banini, “Ɔ́bwi banumbwɛne na básɔ baanu. Nsu bi ɔsu na waya na Lasaro wekpi?”
43011038	Yesu ɔ́sɔ údumo geen, na úsie utédu kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kudɔ. Kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kadi lɛtabi ubu ɔni na béti lɛtabi bamba bábala-nwu kenye.
43011039	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su bekyuli bammɔ ɔnini, “Biliiku lɛtabi lɛmmɔ bidie ubu ɔmmɔ kenye.” Mmɔ ni, Lasaro ɔmmɔ ɔnwani Marta ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, ɔdubo buteenwenyi ɔƒɛni, ɔsika ɔmwi limeyi linedi ka báva-nwu!”
43011040	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su Marta ɔnini, “Ńtasu-ɔ nnii si áƒɔ-mi ádi ni, adubɔnu ɔyikun ɔni na Katɔti ubo ati?”
43011041	Amu na Bekyuli bammɔ béliiku lɛtabi lɛmmɔ bédie ubu ɔmmɔ kenye. Na Yesu ɔ́nu katɔ na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ati, mɔɔgyá-a enu, ɔsika aatuna teete-mi si lɛ́kpali-ɔ.
43011042	Na ngyi ka aatuna teete-mi uwi biala kemo. Nsu bekyuli bani nnye mɛni ɔsu na nsɔ mɔɔsu ɔmɛni kalɛ na baƒɔ badi ka awɔ nátala-mi.”
43011043	Ka ɔ́kpali katɔ ɔ́wɔlɔ lɛni ni, ɔ́va ɔ́kpali ɔnini, “Lasaro, lɛ bo mɛni!”
43011044	Na ukpine ɔmmɔ ɔ́ta úsie úbo-ma kudɔ mmɔ, na ukpine kɔvɔdi kɔmmɔ kúnyimi kɔda-nwu enu ku lɛgba. Na béeti kɔ́di kɔdi bényimi-nwu anumi. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛƒɛnimi adi ammɔ ƒui na nwuna lɛlɔ.”
43011045	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ka Yudaƒuɔ pii bani nébo Maria kudɔ mmɔ bánu lɛla lɛni na Yesu ɔ́bla ni, báƒɔ-nwu bádi.
43011046	Nsu badi bénwini bésie Ƒarisiƒuɔ kudɔ, na bátásu-ma lɛla lɛni na Yesu ɔ́bla.
43011047	Anwuɔsu Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku bakpane benengu bása ku Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune bammɔ na béye lɛlɔ banini, “Bi na ɔlɛka bɔbla? Bɛnu akɔla budie taatina ani udu na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔdaku bɔbla!
43011048	Si bunye bɔɔnu-nwu na ɔdaku ɔmɛni lɛni ni, ukyuli biala ɔdubo-nwu bɔƒɔ bɔdi. Na Romaƒuɔ lɛlɔ badine badubɔta na bebebo bula kakpakɔ kamɛni babwɛ na bekpo bula kalɔ ƒui.”
43011049	Amu na bana akɔ unwi ɔni ndi ɔkpane unengudi na lɛkwa lɛmmɔ kemo na baalɔ-nwu Kaiaƒa ni, ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Amii bɛɛɛgyi lɛla lɛni mɔɔlɛ́ mɛni kalɔ!
43011050	Bɛɛɛgyi bɛnii ɔdia ka ukyuli unwi ukpi na kadi ƒui lili utulo ka kadi ƒui bekyuli bayii ku udu?”
43011051	Nsu geen ni, ɔɔɔdi anwu ɔlati kasusu nwaa kemo na ɔ́su lɛla lɛmmɔ. Mmomu ni, ka anwu ndi ɔkpane unengudi na lɛkwa lɛmmɔ kemo ɔsu ni, Katɔti ɔkɛ-nwu lɛlɔ na ɔ́ya na ɔɔsu lɛla lɛni ndubo libalɛ use ka ni, Yesu ndubo ubekpi na Yudaƒuɔ ƒui lili.
43011052	Na ɔɔɔdi ama lɛti. Mmomu ku kalɛ na ɔsala Katɔti bekyuli bani négyingya bakya kayawi ekpo ekpo ƒui lɛlɔ na ɔbla-ma unwi.
43011053	Amu na ɔ́si limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune bammɔ bése kalɔ baawia lilu lɛni lɛlɔ na beƒie Yesu na badu-nwu.
43011054	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Yesu ɔsɔ ulavi ɔgbami na Yudaƒuɔ akɔ. Mmomu ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie utélie ɔma blii ɔdi nde ketele na baalɔ-nwu banii Eƒraim. Na anwu ku nwuna batɛyane bákya mmɔ.
43011055	Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Yudaƒuɔ Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi bɔdi ɔ́ɔkpɛ úde. Na bekyuli pii bási kalɔ kammɔ ekpo ƒui bésie Yerusalem bátátaabla lɛlɔ bɔƒɔ ɔdi ɔmmɔ batáklibi lɛlɔ bete limeyi lɛmmɔ bɔdi.
43011056	Na bekyuli bammɔ bákya bátaatɛ Yesu anu kpakplaa na kakpakɔ mmɔ ɔni na bábasa. Na beeye lɛlɔ banini, “Dɛ na awɔ aakali? Ami ngyi ka ulakana limeyi lɛmɛni kalɔ bubo. Munuu dɛ?”
43011057	Na uwi ɔmmɔ ni, bakpane benengu ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ béte bɔti ka si ɔdi ɔgyi kesii kani na Yesu ɔkya ni, na ubo ubasu-ma kalɛ na besie betéƒie-nwu.
43012001	Ka kébu emeyi aku na badi Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi ni, Yesu úsie Betania na kesii kani na Lasaro ɔni na ɔ́gyila ɔ́lɛku kekpine ɔkya.
43012002	Mmɔ ni, bánwa Yesu ebiti bɔkya adila na anwu ku nwuna badi bádi. Na Marta néti adila ammɔ útése-ma. Lasaro lɛnɔ ɔ́kya Yesu ku bani mɔɔdi mmɔ akɔ.
43012003	Amu na Maria úti inɔmii ƒɛƒɛɛ bɔdi bɔni náƒɔ kuye geen na baalɔ-mu nard úwi Yesu lɛgba, na ɔ́da nwuna lili linwini úni-nwu lɛgba. Na ɔnyi ƒɛƒɛɛ ɔ́ƒɔ ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ ƒui kemo.
43012004	Mmɔ ni, Yesu batɛyane akɔ unwi ɔni ndi Yuda Iskariot ɔni ndubɔkya Yesu kakya ni, útayɔ-nwu kaƒɔ na úye ɔnini,
43012005	“Bi ɔsu na nka búteti inɔmii bɔmɛni búteye na bɔkɛ aani nkyuli eti aku limeyi lɛyuƒɔla na buti egulabi ammɔ bute bawabane?”
43012006	Nsu ɔɔɔdi ɔni na bawaba baakywí-nwu kaƒɔ ɔsu na úye ɔmɛni. Mmomu ka ɔdi uyune na anwu kani mɔɔda bana kavumi, na ɔɔyɔ́ ka nka utaaƒana egulabi ammɔ adi teedie taabla nwuna lɛlɔ ala ɔsu.
43012007	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Nwuna lɛla biala litekpoku-ɔ. Ya na ɔbla lɛla lɛni na ubo use ute mina kukpi.
43012008	Bawabane bammɔ bakya-mii kudɔ uwi biala. Nsu ami lɛɛɛdubo-mii kudɔ bɔkya uwi biala.”
43012009	Ka Yudaƒuɔ pii bénu ka Yesu úsie ɔkya Betania ni, bésie mmɔ. Na ɔɔɔdi Yesu lɛti pɛ ɔsu. Mmomu kalɛ na banu Lasaro ɔni na Yesu ɔ́gyila ɔ́siku kekpine lɛnɔ ɔsu.
43012010	Anwuɔsu bakpane benengu bábla kasusu ka badu Lasaro lɛnɔ.
43012011	Ɔsika ɔkɛnku-nwu lɛlɔ ɔsu na Yudaƒuɔ pii baalɛ́ bakpane benengu bammɔ kama na basiaku Yesu ka báƒɔ-nwu bádi ɔsu.
43012012	Limeyi lɛni nsia ni, bekyuli lisu bonwu lɛni nébo Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi kadikɔ ni, bénu ka Yesu ɔ́si ɔdubo Yerusalem.
43012013	Anwuɔsu béti kuke na bálɛ bésie bátásiaku-nwu. Na baava taasu banini, “Hosiana! Bimwi anwu ɔni ndubo na Blɔti lɛnyi kemo! Bimwi Israelƒuɔ Ɔga!”
43012014	Na Yesu ɔ́nu ebuo ala utine ubi ɔdi na ulie-nwu lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔ́su ɔnini,
43012015	“Amii, Sion bekyuli, bitayia lɛla lɛdi! Bɛɛnu bina Ɔga ka ulie ebuo ala utine ubi lɛlɔ ɔdubo!”
43012016	Na nka Yesu batɛyane bétenu lɛla lɛmɛni kalɔ kudeedi. Nsu uwi ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́siku kekpine na úte-nwu ɔbu ni, mmɔ na bényimo ka Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔ́su ɔmɛni ɔ́siku-nwu lɛlɔ ka bekyuli bábla ala amɛni ƒui béte-nwu.
43012017	Bekyuli bani nnye baanu uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́kpali Lasaro na kaƒiɔtɔ kemo na ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́lɛku kekpine ni, bésie bátásu lɛla lɛni nálɛ mmɔ bávi.
43012018	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu na bekyuli pii bammɔ bésie bátásiaku-nwu, ɔsika bénu akɔla budie taatina bɔni na ɔ́bla.
43012019	Mmɔ na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ básu lɛlɔ banini, “Bɛnu ka bekyuli bammɔ bálɛ-bu kama! Kayawi bekyuli ƒui bétiku lɛlɔ bésie basiaku-nwu kama!”
43012020	Helaƒuɔ badi bakya bekyuli bani nésie Yerusalem batákpa na limeyi lɛmmɔ bɔdi kemo.
43012021	Amu na bésie Ƒilipo kudɔ ɔni nási Betsaida na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na básu-nwu banini, “Ati, bɔɔwia ka bɔnu Yesu.”
43012022	Mmɔ na Ƒilipo úsie útásu Andrea, na bana inyɔ bakɛ bésie bátásu Yesu.
43012023	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Uwi údu ka Katɔti ɔkɔliku ami nwuna Ubidi lɛnyi katɔ na bekyuli anumi.
43012024	Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, lɛntabi lilemomo teetulo linwi lɛni kani na lɛdi, amu ntu béti-ni bákya kalɔ na libu. Na si líbu lɛni ni, uwi ɔmmɔ kama asa na liimomo teenwini antabi pii.
43012025	Ukyuli ɔni na nwuna bɔdia lɛti pɛ na ulie ute na ngba bɔmɛni kemo ni, ɔdubɔyila lɛla biala. Nsu ukyuli ɔni néni anwu ɔlati lɛkɛ na uulie ngba taawia bekyuli bamba bɔdia ni, ɔɔkɛ́ ngba bɔmmɔ uwi ƒui.
43012026	Ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔwia ka ɔbla-mi kabla ni, ɔdi ka ɔsiaku-mi. Na kesii kani na nlie ni, mmɔ na mina kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ welie. Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔbla-mi kabla ni, mina Ɔti ɔdubute-nwu ɔbu.
43012027	“Ɔƒɛni ni, kayi keekpóku-mi. Nsu bi na ɔlɛka lɛsu? Bɔsu na lɛsu nnii, 'Ati, taya na lɛbibo lɛmɛni udu lɛsiaku-mi'? Oowo! Ɔmmɔ ɔsu geen na líbo kalɔ kamɛni lɛlɔ kalɛ na libo abi amɛni udu.
43012028	Anwuɔsu mɔɔsu nnii, 'Ati, ya na bekyuli bakɔliku ƒula lɛnyi katɔ.' ” Mmɔ ni, bénu butemi bɔdi bɔ́siku kayaa ka bɔɔsu bɔnini, “Lɛɛyá na bekyuli bákɔliku mina lɛnyi katɔ. Na nsɔ ndubo bɔya na bakɔliku-mi lɛnyi katɔ bebu.”
43012029	Ka bekyuli bani nnye mmɔ bénu lɛdi lɛmmɔ ni, básu ka ɔnantu muudu. Na babambadi banini, “Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi násu-nwu lɛla lɛdi.”
43012030	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔɔɔdi ami ɔsu na lɛdi lɛmmɔ lɛɛku, mmomu amii ɔsu.
43012031	“Ɔƒɛni na uwi údu ka Katɔti ɔdu kayawi kamɛni bekyuli kɔtɔ. Na Katɔti ɔdubɔbɔku kayawi kamɛni lɛlɔ ɔdine ɔlɛku nwuna lɛga kadikɔ.
43012032	Na si uwi ɔni na bekyuli bákɔliku-mi katɔ ni, ndubɔya na bekyuli ƒui bebo-mi kudɔ.”
43012033	Ka Yesu ɔ́su ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́tina ka badubo-nwu katɔ bɔkɔliku na ugyii lɛlɔ na ukpi.
43012034	Amu na bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ básu banini, “Na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ni, básu ka Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔsɔ ɔkya ngba uwi ƒui. Na dɛ na ɔ́bla na aasu ka bekyuli badubɔkɔliku Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔmmɔ katɔ lɛni? Ɔma ndi Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔmmɔ?”
43012035	Mmɔ ni, Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Uwi klukui ɔdi kani na bɛdubɔsɔ bɛnu Katɔti bukeye bɔmmɔ. Anwuɔsu ni, uwi ɔni na kadi kammɔ kamua keekeye ni, bɛkya ɔkplu na bisie anumi kalɛ na kadi kalása kalakya-mii. Ɔsika ukyuli ɔni nkɛ na lɛdisa kemo ni, ɔɔɔgyi kesii kani na úsela.
43012036	Anwuɔsu ni, biti bina anu ƒui bɛsia bukeye bɔmmɔ lɛlɔ uwi ɔni na bɛ́mua bɛɛnu bukeye. Na ɔmmɔ ndubɔya na binwini bukeye bɔmmɔ bekyuli.” Ka Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔmɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́gyu ɔ́tɔlɔ-ma kudɔ. Na ɔ́bɛla lɛlɔ na básɔ bátanu-nwu.
43012037	Na ina ka Yesu ɔ́bla akɔla budie taatina amɛni ƒui na bana anumi ni, bátaƒɔ-nwu bátadi.
43012038	Nsu ɔmɛni ɔ́lɛ lɛni kalɛ na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesaia lɛla lɛni na ɔ́su ka lɛdubɔlɛ libo-nwu kemo lɛni ɔnini, “Blɔti, ka búdie ƒula kenye kammɔ ni, ɔma náƒɔ-bu ɔ́di? Na ɔma bene na Blɔti údie nwuna ɔyikun ɔ́tina?”
43012039	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu na bátakana bɔ́ƒɔ bɔ́di, ɔsika Yesaia ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su ɔnini,
43012040	“Ami Katɔti lɛ́bala-ma anumi kalɛ na balanu lɛla lɛdi balati. Na lɛ́ya na bádɔlɔ kalɛ na belénu ala kalɔ. Ɔmmɔ ɔsu belénwini belebo-mii kudɔ kalɛ na lɛbwi-ma.”
43012041	Yesaia ɔ́nu ɔ́ti Yesu kenyekɔ ku ɔbu. Anwuɔsu na ɔ́su lɛla lɛmɛni ɔ́siku-nwu lɛlɔ ka badubuni-nwu.
43012042	Nsu ina ka use lɛni ni, Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune pii báƒɔ Yesu bádi. Mmomu ka baayia lɛla lɛni na Ƒarisiƒuɔ badubo-ma bɔbla ɔsu ni, bátakana na basu ɔmɛni nwaa. Ɔsika badubɔgya-ma balɛku bana kasala kemo.
43012043	Na baayɔ́ ɔbu ɔni nási bekyuli kudɔ teetulo ɔni nási Katɔti kudɔ.
43012044	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔni mɔɔƒɔ́-mi taadi ni, ɔɔɔdi ami lɛti na ɔ́ƒɔ ɔ́di. Mmomu ɔ́ƒɔ anwu ɔni nátala-mi lɛnɔ ɔ́di.
43012045	Na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔnu-mi ni, ɔɔnu anwu ɔni nátala-mi.
43012046	Líbo kayawi kamɛni kemo aani ukyuli ɔni mɔɔyá na bekyuli baanu bukeye kalɛ na ukyuli biala ɔni náƒɔ-mi ɔ́di ni, uláƒɔ lɛlɔ ulakya lɛdisa kemo.
43012047	“Si ukyuli ɔdi uunú litemi lɛni na mɔɔsu nsu uládi-ni lɛlɔ ni, lɛɛɛdubo-nwu kɔtɔ bɔdu. Ɔsika ńtebo nnii mbadu kayawi bekyuli kɔtɔ. Mmomu líbo nnii mbaƒɔ-ma ngba.
43012048	Ukyuli biala ɔni muuní-mi ni, na ulaƒɔ mina litemi taadi ni, lɛla lɛni madu-nwu kɔtɔ linye lɛgya-nwu. Na etemila ani na lɛ́su anya ndubo-nwu kɔtɔ bɔdu na limeyi likplodi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.
43012049	Ɔsika ɔɔɔdi ami ɔlati ɔyikun kemo na lɛ́tɛmi. Mmomu mina Ɔti ɔni nátala-mi nátina-mi lɛla lɛni na ɔdi ka lɛsu ku kalɛ na lɛsu-ni.
43012050	Na ngyi ka lɛla lɛni na ɔ́tala-mi ka mbasu mmɔ ni, ani mɔɔyá na bekyuli beelie ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii. Anwuɔsu lɛla lɛni na Ati ɔ́su-mi ka masu ni, ani kani na mɔɔsu.”
43013001	Amu na limeyi lɛni na kadi kégye ndi Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi lɛmmɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́ti ka uwi údu ka ɔtɔlɔ kayawi kamɛni lɛlɔ uteesie ɔti kudɔ. Na ka ɔɔyɔ́ ama bani náƒɔ-nwu bádi ƒui na kayawi kamɛni lɛlɔ ɔsu ni, ɔɔwia ka ɔtina-ma kalɛ na ɔɔyɔ́-ma geen.
43013002	Na useyi ɔmmɔ ka Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bésie belie kadikɔ badaku bɔdi ni, ukisine ɔmmɔ ɔ́ɔya na kasusu kekpidi kéduo Yuda ɔni ndi Simon Iskariot ubidi lili kemo kalɛ na ɔkya Yesu kakya.
43013003	Yesu ɔgyi nwaa ka Ɔti úti ɔyikun úte-nwu ka ɔdi ala ƒui lɛlɔ. Na ɔgyi ka Katɔti ɔmmɔ kudɔ na ɔ́si, na nwuna kudɔ kani na ɔdubɔsɔ unwini usie.
43013004	Anwuɔsu ɔ́ta únye na kadikɔ mmɔ, na údie nwuna awu gyɔlɔɔ ɔmmɔ úwi, na úti ɔsa ɔ́sabla kevobi.
43013005	Na údu ntu bɔdi úwi lɛkpibwi lɛdi kemo, na úse kalɔ ɔɔƒɔ nwuna batɛyane bammɔ lɛgba, na uuni-ma ku ɔsa ɔni ɔ́sabla mmɔ.
43013006	Ka Yesu úbo úbedu Simon Petro kudɔ ni, Petro úye-nwu ɔnini, “Blɔti, bɔƒɔ na adubo-mi lɛgba?”
43013007	Amu na Yesu údie kenye na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Elénu tɔ lɛla lɛni na mɔɔbla ɔƒɛni mɛni kalɔ. Nsu kama ni, adubunu-ni kalɔ.”
43013008	Mmɔ ni, Petro úni na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Kudii! Lɛɛɛdubo kalɔ bunu na aƒɔ-mi lɛgba uwi ɔdi.” Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Si étenu kalɔ na lɛƒɔ-ɔ lɛgba ni, agyi anii bɔsɔ buuubo kɔna kɔdi.”
43013009	Lɛla lɛmmɔ lɛ́gyu Petro ɔtɔtɔ! Anwuɔsu ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, si use lɛni ni, ɔɔɔdi mina lɛgba lɛti! Mmomu adubɔƒɔ mina enu ku lili lɛnɔ!”
43013010	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔni náakpi ntu ni, ɔ́lɛ bɔkpi. Anwuɔsu lɛgba kani na ɔlɛka ɔƒɔ. Bina ƒui bɛ́lɛ bɔkpi, amu ntu ukyuli unwi pɛ kani.”
43013011	Yesu ɔ́su ɔmɛni ɔsika ɔ́ɔti ukyuli ɔni ndubo-nwu kakya bɔkya. Anwuɔsu na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bina ƒui bɛ́lɛ bɔkpi, amu ntu ukyuli unwi pɛ kani.”
43013012	Ka Yesu ɔ́ƒɔ-ma lɛgba ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́sɔku nwuna awu ɔmmɔ ɔ́kya, na ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie útélie kalɔ. Amu na úye nwuna basiakune ɔnini, “Bínu lɛla lɛni na lɛ́bla mɛni kalɔ?
43013013	Bɛɛlɔ-mi bɛnii ala ɔtinane ku Blɔti, na ɔdi lɛni sɔsɔ. Ɔsika ukyuli ɔmmɔ na ndi.
43013014	Na ami ɔni ndi Blɔti ku ala ɔtinane ni, ami náƒɔ-mii lɛgba ɔƒɛni kani. Amii lɛnɔ lɛni na ɔdi ka bɛƒɔ bina bakpana lɛgba.
43013015	Lɛla lɛni na bɛnu bɛtɛya na bitaabla lɛnɔ ni, ani na lɛ́bla lɛ́tina-mii mɛni.
43013016	Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, kabla ɔblane ɔdi biala uletulo nwuna unwoti. Lɛni kani na ukyuli ɔni bátala uletulo ukyuli ɔni nátala-nwu.
43013017	Ka bɛ́ti litemi geen lɛmɛni ɔƒaani ɔsu ni, lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ-mii si bɛ́bla ala amɛni.
43013018	“Ɔɔɔdi bina ƒui litemi na ndaku bɔsu ɔƒaani. Ngyi bina akɔ bani na lɛ́ƒuna. Nsu ɔlɛka Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila ebo-nwu kemo lɛni kalɛ na bénweni bése banini, 'Ukyuli ɔni nákya ku-mi kɔnu lɛkyami kemo na bɔ́di ni, anwu nénwini únye-mi lɛlɔ.'
43013019	“Na mɔɔsu-mii ɔmɛni lise asa ubo ubalɛ, kalɛ na si úbo úbalɛ lɛni sɔsɔ ni, na bɛti ka ami ndi Anwu ɔni nkya ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ.
43013020	Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii ukyuli biala ɔni muugyingya enu taaƒɔ ukyuli ɔni na lɛ́tala ni, ami na ɔ́ƒɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni megyingya enu na waƒɔ-mi ni, anwu ɔni nátala-mi lɛnɔ na ɔ́ƒɔ.”
43013021	Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́su ɔmɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, kayi kékpoku-nwu geen. Amu na ɔ́su-ma nwaa ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka bina akɔ unwi ɔdubɔkya-mi kakya.”
43013022	Mmɔ ni, Yesu basiakune bammɔ bénwini bánu lɛlɔ anumi na béƒu, ɔsika baaagyi ukyuli ɔni na Yesu ɔda.
43013023	Na batɛyane bammɔ akɔ unwi ɔni na Yesu ɔɔyɔ́ ni, úlie ude Yesu.
43013024	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu Simon Petro ɔ́su ɔtɛyane ɔmmɔ kabɛsɛ kemo ɔnini, “Ye-nwu ukyuli ɔni na ɔda.”
43013025	Anwuɔsu anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́bu úsie Yesu kudɔ na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Blɔti, ɔma na ɔdi?”
43013026	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔni na ndubuti bodobodo ɔdi litu kutu lite ni, anwu na ɔdi.” Anwuɔsu Yesu ɔ́bwɛ bodobodo blii ɔdi útu kutu na úti úte Yuda ɔni ndi Simon Iskariot ubidi.
43013027	Na ɔni kani na Yuda ɔ́ƒɔ bodobodo ɔmmɔ ni, mmɔ kani na Satan ɔ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Babla ku lɛla lɛni na aayɔ́ ka abla.”
43013028	Nsu bakladi bani nlie kadikɔ mmɔ bétenu kalɔ lɛla lɛni ɔsu na Yesu ɔ́su Yuda lɛni.
43013029	Na ka Yuda ɔmɛni nda bana kavumi ɔsu ni, batɛyane bammɔ badi bákali ka bɔsu na Yesu ɔ́ɔsu-nwu ɔnii utéye ala ani na badubuti badi limeyi uboku iye utéte bawabane ala adi.
43013030	Amu ka Yuda ɔ́ƒɔ bodobodo ɔmmɔ ni, ɔ́vi ɔ́lɛ kɔnakunwi. Na kadi káasa uwi ɔmmɔ.
43013031	Uwi ɔni na Yuda ɔ́tɔlɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔƒɛni na Katɔti ɔdubɔkɔliku Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛnyi katɔ. Na ɔkɛnku Ubidi ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ lɛlɔ ni, bekyuli badubɔkɔliku Ɔti ɔmmɔ lɛnyi katɔ.
43013032	Na si ɔkɛnku Ubi lɛlɔ na bekyuli bákɔliku Ɔti lɛnyi katɔ ni, Katɔti lɛnɔ ɔdubɔya na bekyuli bakɔliku Ubi ɔmmɔ katɔ na nwuna anumi. Na ɔdubɔya na babla lɛni kɔnakunwi.
43013033	“Mina bebi, uwi blii ɔdi kani nébu na lɛkya-mii kudɔ. Bɛdubo-mi bɔwia, nsu mɔɔsu-mii lɛla lɛni na lɛ́su Yudaƒuɔ benengu nnii, 'Kesii kani na lísela ni, bilakana mmɔ bubo.'
43013034	“Na ɔƒɛni ni, muubó-mii ɔda ɔwɔdi. Bɛyɔ lɛlɔ! Na kalɛ na ami lɛ́yɔ-mii ni, lɛni kani na ɔlɛka amii lɛnɔ bɛyɔ lɛlɔ.
43013035	Na si bɛɛyɔ́ lɛlɔ lɛni ni, ukyuli biala ɔdubɔnu ɔti ka mina batɛyane na bɛdi.”
43013036	Mmɔ na Simon Petro úye-nwu ɔnini, “Blɔti, wɛ na ésela?” Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Kesii kani na lísela ni, alakana-mi bɔsiaku ɔƒaani. Nsu nwuna kama ni, adubɔsia-mi kama ebo mmɔ.”
43013037	Amu na Petro úye-nwu ɔnini, “Blɔti, bi ɔsu na naaakana-a bɔsiaku ɔƒaani? Nnye kagyumana ka likpi na ƒula lili!”
43013038	Mmɔ ni, Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Aaƒɔ́ taadi geen ka enye kagyumana ka ekpi na mina lili? Mɔɔsu-ɔ litemi geen nnii asa na akɔkɔ wete kenye ni, adubɔsu kɔtɛ sɔɔn anii aaagyi-mi.”
43014001	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛda kayi kemo bukpoku bɛya. Kalɛ kani na bɛɛƒɔ́ Katɔti taadi ni, bɛƒɔ ami lɛnɔ bɛdi.
43014002	Kuduokɔ pii kɔkya mina Ɔti kesii. Na lísela ntáklibi kuduokɔ kɔmmɔ lise-mii. Na si buse na uuuse lɛni ni, nka naaasu ɔmɛni.
43014003	Anwuɔsu si lísie ńtáklibi-ku lɛ́wɔlɔ ni, ndubɔsɔ linwini libo na mbakpanku-mii ntésie mina kudɔ na amii lɛnɔ bilie mmɔ.
43014004	Bɛgyi ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na baasia teesie kesii kani na lísela.”
43014005	Amu na Toma ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Blɔti, bɔɔɔgyi kesii kani na ésela. Anwuɔsu bulati ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na bɔdubɔsia asa na bubo-ɔ kudɔ.”
43014006	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Ami ndi ulu ɔmmɔ ku litemi geen lɛmmɔ ku ngba bɔmmɔ. Na ɔdi ulakana Katɔti kudɔ buduo, amu ntu mina lɛlɔ na ɔ́sia.
43014007	Na si bɛgyi-mi sɔsɔ ni, bɛdubɔti mina Ɔti lɛnɔ. Anwuɔsu ɔƒɛni ni, bɛgyi Katɔti ɔmmɔ na bɛ́ɛnu-nwu lɛnɔ.”
43014008	Amu na Ƒilipo ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, lɛla lɛni kani na bɔɔwia ndi ka edie Ƒ^ɔti ɔmmɔ atina-bu.”
43014009	Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Ɔ́si uwi gyɔlɔɔ ɔni ƒui na lɛ́ɛkya-mii kudɔ mɛni ni, bɔsu na amua ada anii aaagyi-mi? Ƒilipo, ukyuli ɔni náanu-mi dii ni, ɔ́ɔnu Ati lɛnɔ. Na bi ɔsu na asɔ aasu-mi anii, 'Tina-bu Ati ɔmmɔ'?
43014010	Átaƒɔ átadi ka ami nliku Katɔti, na anwu lɛnɔ uliku-mi? Ala ani ƒui na lɛ́su-mii ni, aaadi ami ɔlati etemila kani na adi. Mmomu adi Katɔti ɔni nliku-mi na ɔɔbla nwuna kabla ɔdi.
43014011	Bɛƒɔ-mi bɛdi si lɛ́su-mii nnii ami nliku Katɔti, na anwu lɛnɔ uliku-mi. Si alakana ɔmɛni bɔbla ni, ɔlɛka bɛƒɔ mina ala ani na mɔɔbla lɛti bɛdi.
43014012	Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔƒɔ́-mi taadi ni, ɔdubɔbla ala ani na mɔɔbla. Na ɔdubɔbla-nya utulo kalɛ na lɛ́bla. Ɔsika bɔtɔlɔ nda nteesie mina Ɔti kudɔ.
43014013	Na lɛla biala na bivele si bɛ́kpali-mi lɛnyi ni, ndubɔbla-ni lite-mii. Ɔmɛni ndubɔya na ɔkɛnku-mi lɛlɔ ni, bekyuli badubɔkɔliku mina Ɔti lɛnyi katɔ.
43014014	Bɛkpali-mi lɛnyi bivele lɛla biala, na ndubɔbla-ni lite-mii.
43014015	“Si bɛɛyɔ́-mi ni, bɛdubɔdi mina ɔda bubo lɛlɔ.
43014016	Na ndubuvele mina Ɔti na ute-mii Ubunkune ɔbambadi ɔni ndubuli-mii kudɔ uwi ƒui.
43014017	Anwu ndi Kɔyu kɔni muudie litemi geen lɛni ndanku Katɔti lɛlɔ taatina. Nsu kayawi bekyuli balakana enu bugyingya bɔƒɔ-nwu. Ɔsika balanu-nwu balati. Nsu amii ni, Kɔyu kɔmmɔ kuliku-mii na kɔdubɔƒɔ-mii lɛlɔ kemo ƒui.
43014018	Si lɛ́tɔlɔ-mii kudɔ ni, naaada-mii neeese aani bekpinebi. Mmomu ndubɔsɔ linwini libo-mii kudɔ.
43014019	Kébu blii na kayawi bekyuli basɔ balanu-mi. Nsu amii bɛdubo-mi bɔnu. Na ka nli ngba ɔsu ni, amii lɛnɔ bɛdubulie ngba.
43014020	Si limeyi lɛmmɔ lídu ni, bɛdubɔti ka ami nliku mina Ɔti, na amii biliku-mi aani kalɛ na ami lɛnɔ nliku-mii.
43014021	“Ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔdi mina ɔda bubo lɛlɔ ni, anwu mɔɔyɔ́-mi. Na mina Ɔti ɔdubɔyɔ ukyuli ɔni mɔɔyɔ́-mi. Na ami lɛnɔ ndubɔyɔ-nwu na lidie lɛlɔ lɛtina-nwu na ɔnu-mi.”
43014022	Amu na Yuda ɔni naaadi Iskariot ubidi ɔmmɔ úye Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, dɛ na ɔdubɔbla na abu kani na adubudie lɛlɔ atina, na bayawine balanu-ɔ?”
43014023	Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔyɔ́-mi ni, ɔdubɔdi mina ala ani mɔɔtina lɛlɔ. Na mina Ɔti ɔdubɔyɔ-nwu. Na ami ku mina Ɔti bɔdububo-nwu kudɔ na abu ku-nwu bɔsɔ bulie.
43014024	Na ukyuli ɔni naaayɔ-mi ni, uladi mina ala ani mɔɔtina lɛlɔ. Na ala ani bínu ka lɛ́su mɛni ni, ɔɔɔdi ami ɔlati kani náta mɔɔsu-nya. Mmomu mina Ɔti ɔni nátala-mi kudɔ na ási.
43014025	“Ala amɛni ƒui na lɛ́ɛsu-mii uwi ɔni na nkya-mii kudɔ.
43014026	Katɔti Kɔyu kɔni ndi Ubunkune ɔni na Katɔti ɔdubɔtala ɔkya-mii na mina lɛnyi kemo ni, anwu ndubɔtina-mii lɛla biala. Na ɔdubɔya na binyimo ala ani ƒui na lɛ́su-mii.
43014027	“Keyi buɛɛ na lɛ́da muusé-mii. Na mina keyi buɛɛ na líti muute-mii. Ɔɔɔdi aani kalɛ na bayawine beete ukyuli keyi buɛɛ kalɛ. Kayi ku kasusu ketekpoku-mii na ala ani ndubo bɔlɛ lɛlɔ. Na bitayia.
43014028	Bínu ka lɛ́su-mii nnii, 'Bɔtɔlɔ nda bina kudɔ, na ndubɔsɔ linwini libo-mii kudɔ.' Si bɛgyi ka bɛɛyɔ́-mi geen ni, kubiti kɔdubɔda-mii ka lísela Ati kudɔ. Ɔsika anwu utulo-mi.
43014029	Na lɛ́ɛsu-mii ɔmɛni líse asa na ala ammɔ ebo abalɛ kalɛ na si uwi ɔni na álɛ sɔsɔ ni, na bɛƒɔ bɛdi.
43014030	Nsɔ naaakana-mii bɔtɛmiku gyɔlɔɔ. Ɔsika ukyuli ɔni mɔɔdi kayawi kamɛni lɛlɔ ni, ɔ́si ɔdubo. Na uuubo ɔyikun ɔdi na mina lɛlɔ.
43014031	Nsu ɔlɛka bayawine bati ka mɔɔyɔ́ Ati, na mɔɔbla lɛla biala kalɛ kani na úbo-mii ɔda. “Amu bibo, na bɔgyu.”
43015001	Ami ndi kɔdingyii kɔbuni, na mina Ɔti ndi kugyii kɔmɛni lɛlɔ ɔnune.
43015002	Ɔɔmɛnɛ kagba biala kani naaakana bɔnwu teedie kɔgba kɔkladi akɔ. Na ɔɔƒiala kɔgba kɔni mɔɔnwu lɛnɔ kemo kalɛ na kuna akɔ kɔbla nwaa na kɔkana kutaanwu kaduɛ.
43015003	Lɛni kani na lɛ́ya na amii lɛnɔ bɛ́bla sɛɛn ɔkɛnku ala ani na lɛ́su-mii ɔsu.
43015004	Bɛsɔ biliku-mi, na ami lɛnɔ ndubuliku-mii. Kugyii kagba kadi kalatɛ sɛsɛɛ taanwu ebi aka lɛti. Ɔlɛka kada kugyii kɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Lɛni kani na amii lɛnɔ bilakana ebi adi bɔnwu, amu ntu bɛsɔ biliku-mi.
43015005	“Ami ndi kɔdingyii kɔmmɔ, na amii ndi kuna kɔgba. Ukyuli ɔni nliku-mi na ami lɛnɔ nliku-nwu ni, ɔɔnwu ebi pii. Ɔsika bilakana lɛla lɛdi bɔbla si liiibo-mii kemo.
43015006	Ukyuli biala ɔni neeeliku-mi ni, use aani kugyii kagba kani békulo bávaakun na kákwi. Na kɔgba kɔmmɔ udu ni, bɔsala na baasála-ku taakya ogya na kɔkywi.
43015007	Si biliku-mi na mina etemila ákɛ keliekɔ na bina lɛlɔ kemo ni, bivele lɛla biala na bɛɛwia, na ndubute-mii.
43015008	Na si bɛ́nwu ebi pii ni, ɔmɛni ɔɔyá na bekyuli baakɔliku mina Ɔti lɛnyi katɔ. Na ɔmmɔ ɔɔtina lɛnɔ ka bɛdi mina batɛyane.
43015009	Mɔɔyɔ́-mii kalɛ kani na mina Ɔti ɔɔyɔ́-mi. Anwuɔsu bɛsɔ biliku-mii na ntaayɔ-mii uwi biala.
43015010	Si bɛɛdi mina ɔda bubo lɛlɔ ni, bɛdubulieku-mi na ndubɔyɔ-mii uwi ƒui. Lɛni kani na lɛ́di mina Ɔti ɔda bubo lɛlɔ na nliku-nwu, na ɔɔyɔ́-mi uwi ƒui.
43015011	“Lɛ́ɛsu-mii ala amɛni ƒui kalɛ na ebiti ani na mɔɔkɛ́ ni, amii lɛnɔ bɛkɛ-nya na edu awɔlɔ.
43015012	Na ɔda ɔni na líbo-mii ndi ɔmɛni. Bɛyɔ lɛlɔ aani kalɛ kani na ńtaayɔ-mii.
43015013	Na bɔyɔ bunengudi bɔni kani na ukyuli ɔdubɔkana na ɔyɔ nwuna bakpana ndi ka uti nwuna ngba ute na bana lili.
43015014	Na amii ndi mina bakpana si bɛɛdi mina ɔda ɔni na líbo-mii lɛlɔ.
43015015	Nsɔ naaalɔ-mii mina kabla bablane ɔƒɛni, ɔsika ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla ukyuli bamba kabla ni, ɔɔɔgyi lɛla lɛni na nwuna unwoti ɔɔbla. Mmomu mɔɔlɔ-mii nnii bakpana. Ɔsika lɛla biala na línu lɛ́siku mina Ɔti kudɔ ni, ani na lɛ́su-mii.
43015016	Ɔɔɔdi amii náƒuna-mi. Mmomu ami náƒuna-mii. Na lɛ́ƒuna-mii lise ka bisie bitátaabla kabla kabuni kani ndi ebi pii ani na bɛdubɔnwu. Na abla ebi ani ndubutu uwi na elebie. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Katɔti ɔdubute-mii lɛla biala na bivele-nwu si bɛ́kpali-mi lɛnyi.
43015017	Anwuɔsu ɔda ɔni muubo-mi ndi ɔmɛni. Bɛyɔ lɛlɔ.
43015018	“Si kayawi bekyuli beekisi-mii ni, bɛti kɔnakunwi ka ami na báka bukisi lɛni.
43015019	Si bɛ́bla unwi ku kayawi bekyuli na bana ablala kemo ni, badubɔyɔ-mii aani bana badi. Nsu ami lɛ́ƒuna-mii lɛ́lɛku kayawi bekyuli bammɔ akɔ, na bɛsɔ bɛɛɛdi bana badi. Ɔmmɔ ɔsu na beekisi-mii.
43015020	Binyimo ka lɛ́su-mii nnii, 'Ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla ukyuli bamba kabla ni, uletulo nwuna unwoti.' Si bekyuli békpoku-mi ni, bɛti ka badubo amii lɛnɔ bukpoku. Si bádi ala ani na lɛ́tina-ma lɛlɔ ni, badubɔdi amii adi lɛnɔ lɛlɔ.
43015021	Nsu kayawi bekyuli badubo-mii bukpoku, ɔsika binye na mina lɛnyi kemo. Na baaagyi anwu ɔni nátala-mi lɛnɔ.
43015022	Si bubo na ńtebo ńtabasu-ma lɛla lɛdi ni, nka ukyuli ɔdi uládu-ma kɔtɔ ka bábla likpidi lɛdi. Nsu ɔƒɛni ni, basɔ balakana bɔsu banii bátati asa na bábla likpidi.
43015023	Na ukyuli biala ɔni muukisi-mi ni, uukisi mina Ɔti lɛnɔ.
43015024	Na si bubo na ńtebo ńtababla ala ani udu na ɔdi útabla kudii na bana akɔ ni, nka ukyuli ɔdi uládu-ma kɔtɔ ka bábla likpidi lɛdi. Nsu ɔƒɛni ni, bánu ala ani na lɛ́bla, nsu beekisi ami ku mina Ɔti.
43015025	Na ala amɛni ƒui ni, ɔlɛka ebo-nwu kemo lɛni kalɛ kani na bénweni bése na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo banini, 'Beekisi-mi keeke.'
43015026	“Katɔti Kɔyu kɔni ndi Ubunkune ɔ́si Katɔti kudɔ ɔdubo. Na anwu muudie litemi geen lɛni ndanku Katɔti lɛlɔ taatina. Ami ndubɔtala-nwu lɛsiku Katɔti kudɔ lɛkya-mii. Na ɔdubɔsu-mii ala ɔsiku-mi lɛlɔ.
43015027	Na amii lɛnɔ bɛsu bekyuli ala bɛsiku-mi lɛlɔ, ɔsika bɛ́ɛsiaku-mi kama ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui.”
43016001	“Lɛ́ɛsu-mii ɔmɛni kalɛ na enu alaƒɛ-mii na bina bɔƒɔtaadi kemo.
43016002	Badubo-mii bɔgya bɔlɛku Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ. Na uwi ɔdi lɛnɔ ɔdubo ubedu ɔni na bekyuli badubɔdu-mii. Na bani ndubɔbla lɛni ni, badubɔkali banii Katɔti kabla na baabla.
43016003	Bekyuli badubo-mii ɔmɛni bɔbla, ɔsika baaagyi ami iye Katɔti.
43016004	Mmomu lɛ́su-mii ɔmɛni kalɛ na si uwi ɔni na bábla ala amɛni údu ni, na binyimo lɛla lɛni na lɛ́su-mii. “Ńtasu-mii ala amɛni ńtasiku kalɔ kesekɔ, ɔsika nkya-mii kudɔ uwi ɔmmɔ.
43016005	Nsu ɔƒaani ni, bɔtɔlɔ na nda. Lísela mina Ɔti ɔni nátala-mi kudɔ. Nsu bina ɔdi úteye-mi ɔnii, 'Wɛ na ésela?'
43016006	Na ka lɛ́ɛya na bɛ́ti ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, bina lɛlɔ lɛ́bla-mii kɔnyana.
43016007	Nsu mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, si lɛ́tɔlɔ-mii kudɔ ni, ɔdia-mii utulo. Ɔsika si ńtatɔlɔ ni, Ubunkune ɔmmɔ ulebo-mii kudɔ. Nsu si lɛ́tɔlɔ ni, ndubɔtala-nwu lɛkya-mii.
43016008	Na si úbo ni, ɔdubo ubedie ɔtina kayawi bekyuli ƒui nwaa ka baabla likpidi, na baaasiaku ulu siin ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ, na benye Katɔti anumi kalɛ na ɔtɛku-ma litemi.
43016009	Na badubɔnu ka baabla likpidi, ɔsika bátaƒɔ-mi bátadi.
43016010	Na badubɔnu ka baaasiaku ulu siin ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ, ɔsika lísela mina Ɔti kudɔ na bɛsɔ bɛɛɛdubo-mi bɔnu.
43016011	Na badubɔnu ka Katɔti ɔɔtɛku bekyuli litemi, ɔsika Katɔti ɔ́ɔtɛku ukyuli ɔni mɔɔdi kayawi kamɛni lɛlɔ litemi kukuuku na ɔ́ɔdu-nwu kɔtɔ.
43016012	“Mbo ala pii na lɛsu-mii. Nsu adubo bumomo butulo-mii ɔƒɛni.
43016013	Nsu si uwi ɔni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔni muudie litemi geen lɛni ndanku Katɔti lɛlɔ mmɔ úbo ni, ɔdubo-mii bɔtɔnku kalɛ na bɛnu litemi geen lɛmmɔ ƒui bɛti. Na ulatɛmi na anwu ɔlati ɔyikun kemo. Mmomu lɛla lɛni na únu ni, ɔdubo-mii bɔsu na ɔsu-mii ala ani ndubo bɔlɛ.
43016014	Ɔdubɔya na bekyuli bakɔliku-mi lɛnyi katɔ, ɔsika lɛla lɛni na masu-nwu ni, ani na ɔdubuti ubasu-mii.
43016015	Ala ani ƒui nse Katɔti ni, adi ami adi. Anwuɔsu na lɛ́su nnii ala ani nse-mi ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kɔdubuti-nya ɔtina-mii.
43016016	“Kébu uwi blii ɔdi na bɛsɔ bilanu-mi. Na ɔmmɔ kama blii lɛnɔ ni, bɛdubɔsɔ bɛnu-mi.”
43016017	Amu na nwuna batɛyane badi béye lɛlɔ banini, “Lɛla lɛni na ɔɔsu kalɔ ndi bi? Ɔnii kébu uwi blii ɔdi na bɔsɔ bulanu-nwu. Na ɔmani kama blii lɛnɔ bɔdubɔsɔ bɔnu-nwu? Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-bu lɛnɔ ɔnii, 'Ɔsika lísela mina Ɔti kudɔ.'
43016018	Lɛla lɛni na ɔ́su ɔnii kébu uwi blii kalɔ ndi bi? Bɔɔɔgyi lɛla lɛni lɛlɔ na ɔɔtɛmi taasiku!”
43016019	Yesu ɔ́ti ka nwuna batɛyane bammɔ baayɔ́ beye-nwu lɛla lɛdi basiaku ɔmɛni lɛlɔ. Anwuɔsu na úye-ma ɔnini, “Lɛ́su nnii kébu uwi blii ɔdi na bɛsɔ bilanu-mi. Na ɔmmɔ kama blii lɛnɔ na bɛdubɔsɔ bɛnu-mi. Ɔmɛni lɛlɔ litemi na biiye lɛlɔ teenu?
43016020	Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii bɛdubo kɔnyana buwulo na biwulo keku. Nsu kayawi bekyuli badubo ebiti bɔkɛ mmomu. Na amii ni, bɛdubɔbla kɔnyana, nsu bina kɔnyana kɔdubunwini lɛlɔyɔ.
43016021	Si uleku ɔɔyɔ́ ɔwɔ ni, ubo kɔnyana, ɔsika uwi ɔni na uubo abi údu. Nsu si uwi ɔni na ɔ́wɔ ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔɔyiƒla abi ani na úbo. Ɔsika ɔɔkɛ́ ebiti ka ɔ́wɔ ubi ɔ́kya kayawi.
43016022	Lɛni geen na use ute amii lɛnɔ. Ɔƒaani ni, bina lɛlɔ libo kɔnyana. Nsu ndubɔsɔ mbanu-mii. Na mmɔ ni, lɛlɔyɔ lɛdubɔƒɔ-mii kayi kemo ƒui. Lɛlɔyɔ lɛmɛni udu na ukyuli ɔdi biala ulakana bɔƒɔ bɔsiku-mii kudɔ kudii!
43016023	“Si uwi ɔni na limeyi lɛmmɔ líbo líbedu ni, bileye-mi lɛla lɛdi. Ɔsika mɔɔsu-mii geen ka lɛla biala na bɛdubɔkpali-mi lɛnyi bivele mina Ɔti ni, ɔdubute-mii.
43016024	Úti úbedu uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, bítakpali-mi lɛnyi bítevele tɔ Katɔti lɛla lɛdi. Bivele-nwu na ɔdubute-mii, na bina ebiti adubudu awɔlɔ.
43016025	“Agba kemo sɔɔn na lɛ́su-mii ala amɛni ƒui. Nsu uwi ɔdubo ɔni na nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo agba bubo. Mmomu ndubo-mii bɔtɛmiku nwaa bɔsiku mina Ɔti lɛlɔ.
43016026	Na si limeyi lɛmmɔ lídu ni, bɛdubo-mi lɛnyi bɔkpali bivele-nwu ala. Naaasu nnii ami ndubo-nwu ala buvele bute-mii.
43016027	Ɔsika Ati ɔlati ɔɔyɔ́-mii. Ɔɔyɔ́-mii ɔsika amii lɛnɔ bɛɛyɔ́-mi, na bɛ́ƒɔ bɛ́di ka Katɔti kudɔ na lɛ́si líbo.
43016028	Sɔsɔ na ɔdi ka Ati kudɔ na lɛ́si líbo kayawi. Na ɔƒɛni mɔɔtɔlɔ kayawi kamɛni kemo nteesie Ati kudɔ.”
43016029	Mmɔ na Yesu batɛyane bammɔ básu-nwu banini, “Ɔƒɛni na aatɛmi nwaa, na asɔ elebo lɛgba.
43016030	Na ɔƒɛni na bɔ́ti ka agyi lɛla biala, na ɔ́sɔ útalɛka ukyuli ɔdi uye-ɔ litemi lɛdi. Ɔmɛni lɛti pɛ ɔ́ya na bɔ́ti ka Katɔti kudɔ na ási ébo.”
43016031	Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bɛ́ƒɔ bɛ́di ɔƒɛni kani?
43016032	Uwi ɔdubo, na úudu lɛnɔ ɔni na bɛdubo bugyingya bɛtɔlɔ-mi kudɔ, na ɔdi biala uteesie nwuna kaduli na bɛda ami lɛti binyene. Nsu geen ni, ɔɔɔdi ami lɛti nnye. Ɔsika mina Ɔti unye-mi kudɔ.
43016033	Ala amɛni na lɛ́su-mii kalɛ na kayi kasɔ kelékpoku-mii si biliku-mi. Kayawi bekyuli badubo bɔya na bibo abi. Nsu binye kpakplaa! Ɔsika lɛ́ɛdi kayawi kamɛni lɛbibo biala lɛlɔ.”
43017001	Ka Yesu ɔ́su-ma ala amɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́kɔliku anumi ɔ́nu katɔ na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ati, uwi ɔmmɔ údu. Kɔliku ami ƒ^ubidi katɔ kalɛ na ami lɛnɔ lɛ́kɔliku ƒula lɛnyi katɔ.
43017002	Ɔsika éti ɔyikun unengudi éte-mi na kayawi bekyuli ƒui akɔ kalɛ na lɛya na bani ƒui na éti éte-mi ni, belie ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
43017003	Na ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii mɛni kalɔ ndi ka bekyuli bamɛni bati awɔ, na bati ka awɔ lɛti pɛ ndi Katɔti geen ɔmmɔ, na bati ami Yesu Kristo ɔni na átala.
43017004	Lɛ́kɔliku ƒula lɛnyi katɔ na bekyuli akɔ na kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na lɛ́wɔlɔ kabla kani na éte-mi ka mbabla.
43017005	Ɔƒɛni ni, Ati, sɔ kɔliku mina lɛnyi katɔ na ƒula anumi aani kalɛ na nse ɔni na lɛ́kya-a kudɔ asa na édie kayawi.
43017006	“Lɛ́ɛya na bekyuli bani na áƒuna álɛku kayawi bekyuli akɔ éte-mi báti-ɔ. Awɔ ɔdi na badi, na éti-ma éte-mi. Bádi ƒula etemila ƒui lɛlɔ.
43017007	Na bagyi ɔƒɛni ka lɛla biala na éte-mi ni, ƒula kudɔ na lɛ́si.
43017008	Kenye kani na ásu-mi ka mabasu-ma ni, bégyingya enu báƒɔ-ka. Na bagyi ka sɔsɔ na ɔdi ka ƒula kudɔ na lɛ́si, na awɔ nátala-mi.
43017009	Mɔɔkpali katɔ na bana lili, na ɔɔɔdi kayawi bekyuli ƒui lili. Mmomu ɔdi bani na éti éte-mi lili, ɔsika awɔ ɔdi na badi.
43017010	“Bani ƒui na mbo ni, awɔ badi na badi. Na bani ƒui na ebo ni, ami badi na badi. Na bekyuli baakɔliku-mi lɛnyi katɔ ɔkɛnku ama ɔsu.
43017011	Na ɔƒɛni ni, lɛ́tɔlɔ ndubo-ɔ kudɔ. Na nsɔ lɛɛɛkya kayawi kamɛni kemo. Nsu ama bamua bakya kayawi. Ati Kedee, gyumana-ma ɔkɛnku ɔyikun ala ani mɔɔlɛ́ si bákpali-ɔ lɛnyi. Na lɛnyi lɛmmɔ kani na éti éte-mi. Ɔmɛni ndubɔya na babla unwi aani kalɛ na ami ku awɔ bɔdi benwi.
43017012	Uwi ɔni na nkya-ma kudɔ ni, lɛ́da-ma kɔkɔɔkɔ na lɛgyumana-ma ɔkɛnku ɔyikun ɔni nkya lɛnyi lɛni na éte-mi kemo. Ńtayila bana akɔ ɔdi, amu ntu anwu ɔni muusié na ayila-nwu udu. Ɔmɛni ndubɔya na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila ebo-nwu kemo kalɛ na básu.
43017013	“Na ɔƒaani ni, lɛ́tɔlɔ ndubo-ɔ kudɔ na muuvele-ɔ ɔmɛni lite-ma na kayawi kalɛ na mina ebiti aƒɔ-ma kayi kemo ƒui na edu awɔlɔ.
43017014	Líboku-ma ƒula linyesia na kayawi bekyuli békisi-ma, ɔsika ɔɔɔdi kayawi kamɛni ɔdi na badi kalɛ kani na ami lɛnɔ lɛɛɛdi kayawi kamɛni ɔdi.
43017015	“Na ɔɔɔdi buvele na nda-a nnii da-ma die kayawi kamɛni kemo. Mmomu buvele na nda-a ka agyumana-ma alɛku ukisine ɔmmɔ enu kemo.
43017016	Kalɛ kani na lɛɛɛdi kayawi kamɛni ɔdi ni, lɛni kani na ama lɛnɔ baaadi kayawi kamɛni badi.
43017017	Bla-ma kedee te ƒula lɛlɔ ɔkɛnku ƒula etemila geen ani na bénu lɛlɔ. Ɔsika ƒula litemi lɛdi litemi geen.
43017018	Lɛ́tala-ma mɔɔkya kayawi bekyuli aani kalɛ kani na átala-mi ákya kayawi bekyuli.
43017019	Na ama ɔsu ni, lɛ́bla lɛlɔ kedee lite-ɔ kalɛ na akana abla ama lɛnɔ kedee.
43017020	“Ɔɔɔdi ama lɛti lili na mɔɔkpali-ɔ teevele lɛla lɛdi. Mmomu ku bekyuli bani ƒui ndubɔƒɔ-mi badi ɔkɛnku ƒula litemi buni lɛni badubɔsu-ma kemo lili lɛnɔ na muuvele.
43017021	Ati, muuvele ka aya na bana ƒui babla unwi aani kalɛ kani na awɔ eliku-mi na ami lɛnɔ nliku-ɔ. Ya na belieku-bu kalɛ na kayawi bekyuli baƒɔ badi ka awɔ nátala-mi.
43017022	“Líte-ma lɛnyi buni lɛni na éte-mi kalɛ na bana ƒui babla unwi kalɛ kani na ami ku-ɔ bɔdi unwi.
43017023	Ami nliku-ma, na awɔ eliku-mi. Ya na babla unwi bawɔlɔ kalɛ na kayawi bekyuli banu bati ka awɔ nátala-mi, na aayɔ́-ma kalɛ kani na aayɔ́-mi.
43017024	“Ati, awɔ néti-ma éte-mi. Na mɔɔwia ka belie-mi kudɔ na kesii kani na nkya kalɛ na banu kalɛ na ákɔliku-mi lɛnyi katɔ. Ɔmɛni ndi lɛnyi lɛni na éte-mi. Ɔsika aayɔ́-mii kukuuku asa na édie kayawi ku kana lɛla biala.
43017025	“Ati, ese siin. Na kayawi bekyuli baaagyi-ɔ, nsu ami ngyi-ɔ. Na ƒula badi lɛnɔ bagyi ka awɔ nátala-mi.
43017026	Lídie-ɔ lɛ́tina-ma. Na ndubo butaabla lɛni kalɛ na bagyi ka aayɔ́-ma aani kalɛ na aayɔ́-mi, na bagyi ka nliku-ma.”
43018001	Ka Yesu ɔ́kpali katɔ lɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, anwu ku nwuna batɛyane bátɔlɔ mmɔ. Na bávia Kedron Obonka bétédu inɔ egyii kemo kadi. Na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane béduo kemo kammɔ kemo.
43018002	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, kakya ɔkyane Yuda Iskariot ɔgyi likpo lɛmmɔ. Ɔsika mmɔ na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bátaayɔ bɔsa bɔsa.
43018003	Anwuɔsu Yuda lɛnɔ útiku Romaƒuɔ bekpone ku kakpakɔ bagyumanane bani na bakpane benengu ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ bátala. Bekyuli bamɛni bada lɛlɔ ku ekpola ku lɛsogya ku likpo.
43018004	Na ka Yesu ɔ́ti ala ani ndubo-nwu bɔlɛku ɔsu ni, ɔ́lɛ úbo anumi na úye-ma ɔnini, “Ɔma na bɛɛwia?”
43018005	Amu na bédie kenye banini, “Yesu Nasareni bɔɔwia.” Mmɔ ni, Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bɛɛnu-mi mɛni.” Na kakya ɔkyane Yuda lɛnɔ unye-ma akɔ.
43018006	Na uwi ɔni na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bɛɛnu-mi mɛni” ni, bédi bésie kama na bébuli.
43018007	Amu na Yesu ɔ́sɔ úye-ma kunyɔdi ɔnini, “Ɔma na bɛɛwia?” Na ama lɛnɔ básɔ bédie kenye banini, “Yesu Nasareni.”
43018008	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lɛ́ɛsu-mii nnii bɛɛnu-mi mɛni.” Na Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si ami na bɛɛwia bɔdi ni, bɛya na bekyuli bakladi bamɛni batɔlɔ.”
43018009	Na Yesu ɔ́su ɔmɛni kalɛ na ala ani na ɔ́su úbavi ebo ete lɛni uwi ɔni na ɔ́su ɔnii, “Ati, bekyuli bani ƒui na éte-mi ni, ńtayila bana akɔ ɔdi.”
43018010	Na mmɔ ni, Simon Petro ɔda kewii kadi. Amu na ɔ́ni-ka ɔ́kpa livuo kemo, na ɔ́nwi ɔkpane unengudi kabla ɔblane kɔdianu kɔtu úkulo. Na kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ baalɔ Malkus.
43018011	Nsu Yesu ɔ́su Petro ɔnini, “Sɔku ƒula kewii kya livuo kemo! Aakali anii lɛbibo ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔni na mina Ɔti úte-mi ɔnii nni ni, naaani-nwu?”
43018012	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Romaƒuɔ bekpone ku bana ɔtɔnkune ku Yudaƒuɔ bagyumanane badi béƒie Yesu, na bényimi-nwu.
43018013	Na báka-nwu buti busienku Hana kudɔ. Na Hana ɔmɛni ɔdi Kaiaƒa ulekudi ɔti. Na Kaiaƒa ɔmɛni mɔɔbla ɔkpane unengudi kabla na lɛkwa lɛmmɔ kemo.
43018014	Na Kaiaƒa ndi anwu ɔni násu Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune bammɔ ka ɔdia ka ukyuli unwi ukpi na kadi ƒui lili.
43018015	Simon Petro ku ɔtɛyane ɔbambadi básiaku Yesu kama. Na ɔtɛyane ɔbambadi ɔmmɔ ni, ɔkpane unengudi ɔmmɔ ɔgyi-nwu, anwuɔsu na ɔ́siaku Yesu na bétéduo ɔkpane unengudi ɔmmɔ kaduli.
43018016	Nsu uwi ɔmmɔ ni, Petro anwu ɔsɔ unye kayakun. Amu na ɔtɛyane ɔmmɔ ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo úbatɛmiku ulekubi ɔni nnye ɔba kenye mmɔ, na ɔ́ya na Petro lɛnɔ uduo kaduli kammɔ.
43018017	Mmɔ na ulekubi ɔmmɔ úye Petro ɔnini, “Ɔɔɔdi ɔnana ɔmmɔ batɛyane akɔ unwi na adi?” Amu na Petro údie kenye ɔnini, “Oowo, lɛɛɛdi bana akɔ ɔdi.”
43018018	Ɔƒɛni ni, ka kɔyɔ kɔɔda-ma ɔsu ni, kabla bablane bammɔ ku bagyumanane bammɔ básala ogya ɔdi na benye baawaa. Na Petro lɛnɔ ɔ́gyu úsie unye-ma kudɔ mmɔ ɔɔwaa ogya ɔmmɔ.
43018019	Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, ɔkpane unengudi ɔkya uuye Yesu ala taasiku nwuna basiakune ku ala ani na ɔɔtina lɛlɔ.
43018020	Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Lɛ́tina ukyuli biala ala na kadi ƒui anumi uwi biala kemo. Na ala ani na lɛ́tina mmɔ lɛnɔ ni, Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ na lɛ́tina-nya na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ uwi ɔni na bana ƒui bábasa. Na ńtasu lɛla lɛdi na bɔbɛ kemo.
43018021	Na bi ɔsu na eeye-mi lɛla lɛdi na ɔmɛni lɛlɔ? Ye bekyuli bani nénu-mi. Ama ngyi ala ani na lɛ́su-ma.”
43018022	Ka Yesu ɔ́su-nwu lɛla lɛmɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, bagyumanane bammɔ akɔ unwi úbo-nwu kɔnu ɔtugya na úye Yesu ɔnini, “Ɔkpane Unengudi na eedie kenye lɛni?”
43018023	Amu na Yesu úye-nwu ɔnini, “Si lɛ́su lɛla lɛni naaadia ni, su ukyuli biala na mɛni lɛla lɛmmɔ. Na si ńtasu lɛla likpidi lɛdi bɔdi ni, bi ɔsu na ébo-mi kɔnu ɔtugya?”
43018024	Mmɔ na Hana úti Yesu ɔni na bámua bényimi bada úmene Ɔkpane Unengudi Kaiaƒa.
43018025	Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, Simon Petro ɔmua unye ogya kudɔ mmɔ ɔɔwaa ogya. Mmɔ na bekyuli bammɔ béye-nwu banini, “Ɔɔɔdi awɔ ndi ɔnana ɔmmɔ kama basiakune akɔ unwi iye?” Mmɔ ni, Petro ɔ́tuala ɔnini, “Oowo, lɛɛɛdi bana akɔ ɔdi!”
43018026	Amu na ɔkpane unengudi nwuna kabla ɔblane ɔdi ɔni na ɔnwani ndi okloƒu ɔni kɔtu na Petro ɔ́nwi ɔ́mami ni, úye Petro ɔnini, “Ɔɔɔdi awɔ na lɛ́nu na inɔ egyii kemo mmɔ ka enye-nwu kudɔ iye?”
43018027	Mɛni lɛnɔ ni, Petro ɔ́sɔ ɔtuala ɔnini, “Oowo!” Na mmɔ mmɔ ni, akɔkɔ úte kenye.
43018028	Amu na ɔtanta tutuutu ni, bákpanku Yesu básiku Kaiaƒa kudɔ mmɔ, na béti-nwu bésienku Romaƒuɔ aban unengudi kaduli. Nsu Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ béteduo mmɔ, ɔsika na bana ɔda bubo kenye ni, bátayɔ ka beduo mmɔ na ɔya bana lɛlɔ lise lɛlɔ ka badubo Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi bɔdi ɔsu.
43018029	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu Pilato ɔ́lɛ úbo-ma kudɔ na ɔba kenye mmɔ, na úye-ma ɔnini, “Likpidi lɛmani na ɔ́bla?”
43018030	Amu na bédie kenye banini, “Si ɔɔɔdi likpidi bonwu lɛdi na ɔ́bla ni, nka bulakpanku-nwu buleboku ƒula kudɔ.”
43018031	Anwuɔsu Pilato ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Amu na amii alati bitiku-nwu na bitátɛku-nwu litemi ɔkɛnku bina ɔda bubo lɛlɔ.” Mmɔ na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ bédie kenye banini, “Roma aban útete-bu kuƒi ka abu alati bɔdu ukyuli kukpi kɔtɔ.”
43018032	Na ala amɛni álɛ lɛni kalɛ na litemi lɛni na Yesu ɔ́su ɔ́siku kukpi kɔni udu na ɔdubo bukpi lɛlɔ ubo ute lɛni sɔsɔ.
43018033	Amu na Pilato únwini útéduo kaduli mmɔ, na ɔ́lɔ Yesu na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ ndi Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga?”
43018034	Mmɔ ni, Yesu únwini na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ ɔlati muuye-mi kenye kamɛni, munuu bekyuli bamba násu-ɔ banii ye-mi nu?”
43018035	Amu na Pilato údie kenye ɔnini, “Aabu anii Yudani na ndi? Awɔ ɔlati ƒula kadi bekyuli ku bakpane benengu néti-ɔ abakya-mi kɔnu. Bi na ábla?”
43018036	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Mina lɛga bɔdi bútasi kalɔ kamɛni lɛlɔ. Si banii kalɔ kamɛni lɛlɔ lɛga bɔdi na lɛdi ni, nka mina basiakune badubukpo bete-mi kalɛ na neeeduo Yudaƒuɔ benengu enu kemo. Nsu ni, ɔɔɔdi lɛni na use. Mina lɛga bɔdi lɛ́si kesii bamba.”
43018037	Ka ɔ́su-nwu lɛni ni, Pilato úye-nwu ɔnini, “Anwuɔsu ɔga na adi?” Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ mɔɔsu ka ɔga na ndi. Na ɔmɛni ɔsu geen na báwɔ-mi. Na líbo kalɔ kamɛni lɛlɔ kalɛ na mbedie litemi geen lɛtina. Na ukyuli biala ɔni nkɛnku litemi geen lɛmmɔ ni, uunú lɛla lɛni na mɔɔsu.”
43018038	Mmɔ ni, Pilato úye-nwu ɔnini, “Bi ndi litemi geen?” Mmɔ kani na Pilato ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie keyi na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ kudɔ na útásu-ma ɔnini, “Naaanu likpidi lɛni ɔsu na lɛdu ukyuli ɔmɛni kɔtɔ.
43018039	Nsu na bina ɔda bubo bɔni na bibo kenye ni, si údu Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi bɔdi uwi ni, uwi biala mɔɔnyonu batɔntɛne akɔ unwi. Anwuɔsu ni, bɛɛwia ka lɛnyonu Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga?”
43018040	Amu na bana ƒui báva básu banini, “Oowo! Ɔɔɔdi anwu, mmomu Baraba!” Na Baraba ɔmɛni ɔdi bekyuli ɔdune.
43019001	Anwuɔsu ni, Pilato ɔ́ya na bagyumanane béti kɔbuli kɔni na bélii básala na bébo Yesu kaduɛ.
43019002	Na bekpone bammɔ béti liyu kagba bédi kabwa na béti bébi-nwu lili. Na béti awu ugyiedi gyɔlɔɔ ɔdi aani ɔga kalɛ bákya-nwu.
43019003	Na beesié teebo-nwu kudɔ taabasu-nwu banini, “Yiidu! Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga ɔ́si ɔdubo o-o!” Na si básu-nwu lɛni ni, na bébo-nwu kɔnu ɔtugya.
43019004	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Pilato ɔ́sɔ ɔ́lɛ úbo bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ kudɔ úbasu-ma ɔnini, “Bɛnu! Ndubo-nwu bɔkpanku buboku bina anumi na mbatina-mi ka ńtanu likpidi lɛdi na nwuna lɛlɔ kalɛ na lɛdu-nwu kukpi kɔtɔ.”
43019005	Anwuɔsu Yesu ɔ́lɛ úbo keyi mmɔ, na liyu kabwa kammɔ kebi-nwu lili na ɔkya awu ugyiedi gyɔlɔɔ ɔmmɔ. Mmɔ ni, Pilato ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bɛnu! Ukyuli ɔmmɔ na ɔdi mɛni!”
43019006	Amu na uwi ɔni na bakpane benengu ku Yudaƒuɔ benengu bammɔ bánu-nwu ni, báva básu banini, “Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ! Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ!” Mmɔ ni, Pilato ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Amii biti-nwu na bitákana-nwu bɛmana ugyii lɛlɔ. Ami ńtanu likpidi lɛdi na nwuna lɛlɔ kalɛ na lɛdu-nwu kɔtɔ.”
43019007	Amu na bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ básu banini, “Bubo ɔda bubo bɔni mɔɔtina ka ɔlɛka ukpi. Ɔsika ɔ́su ɔnii ɔdi Katɔti Ubidi.”
43019008	Uwi ɔni na Pilato únu-ma kenye kamɛni ni, liƒu lɛ́sɔ lɛ́da-nwu libu.
43019009	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu ni, ɔ́sɔ únwini útéduo kaduli mmɔ na úye Yesu ɔnini, “Wɛ na ási?” Nsu Yesu útedie kenye kadi.
43019010	Amu na Pilato úye-nwu ɔnini, “Eledie lɛla lɛdi kenye alasu-mi? Aaagyi ka mbo kenyekɔ na lɛnyonu-ɔ, na mbo kenyekɔ na lɛya na bakana-a bamana ugyii lɛlɔ?”
43019011	Mmɔ ni, Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Nka alákɛ ɔyikun ɔdi na mina lɛlɔ si ɔɔɔdi Katɔti néte-ɔ kuƒi kɔmmɔ. Anwuɔsu ukyuli ɔni néti-mi ɔ́kya-a kɔnu kemo ni, ɔ́bla likpidi útulo-ɔ.”
43019012	Ka Pilato únu lɛla lɛmɛni ni, ɔ́wia ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔsia na ɔnyonu Yesu. Nsu bekyuli bammɔ bakya baava taasu banini, “Si ányonu-nwu ni, asɔ aaadi Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare kabla ɔblane! Na ukyuli biala ɔni meti lɛlɔ mabla ɔga ni, ɔ́ta únye Kaesare ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ!”
43019013	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu ka Pilato únu etemila amɛni ni, ɔ́kpanku Yesu ɔ́lɛku na útélie litemi bɔtɛ liboku lɛlɔ kesii kani baalɔ banii Atabi Kasalakɔ. Na Hebri lɛdi kemo banii Gabata.
43019014	Uwi ɔmmɔ ɔbla aani ɔƒiiwi. Na lɛdi limeyi lɛni kadi kegye ndi Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi lɛmmɔ. Na Pilato ɔ́su bekyuli bammɔ ɔnini, “Bɛɛnu bina Ɔga!”
43019015	Amu na báva básu banini, “Gyunku-nwu! Gyunku-nwu! Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ!” Mmɔ na Pilato úye-ma ɔnini, “Bɔkana na nkana bina Ɔga mmana ugyii lɛlɔ?” Amu na bakpane benengu bammɔ básu-nwu banini, “Buuubo ɔga ɔdi buuutulo Romaƒuɔ Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare!”
43019016	Ka básu lɛni ni, Pilato úti Yesu úte-ma ɔnii batákana-nwu bamana ugyii lɛlɔ.
43019017	Anwuɔsu bekpone bammɔ bákpanku Yesu bátɔlɔku. Na báya na anwu ɔlati uti ugyii ɔni lɛlɔ na badubo-nwu bɔkana bɔmana mmɔ. Na báyu ulu bésie kesii kani baalɔ banii Opokuo kalɔ. Na Hebri lɛdi kemo ndi Golgota.
43019018	Mmɔ na bákana-nwu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ. Na mmɔ lɛnɔ ni, bákana nkyuli inyɔ bamba badi bámana ligyii lɛlɔ na Yesu kɔmii ku kɔdianu.
43019019	Pilato ɔ́ya na bénweni ala adi básia kalɛkɛ kadi lɛlɔ na úti-ka ɔ́mana Yesu ugyii ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Na etemila ammɔ ndi amɛni. Yesu Nasareni, Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga.
43019020	Yudaƒuɔ pii báka ala amɛni, ɔsika kesii kani na bákana Yesu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ mmɔ ude ɔma unengudi ɔmmɔ. Na Pilato únweni ala ammɔ lɛnɔ na Hebri ku Roma ku Griki lɛdi kemo.
43019021	Lɛla lɛmɛni lítayɔ Yudaƒuɔ bakpane benengu bammɔ kaƒɔ. Anwuɔsu bátásu Pilato banini, “Útalɛka enweni anii Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga, mmomu ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔ́su ɔnii ɔdi Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga.”
43019022	Amu na Pilato údie kenye ɔnini, “Lɛla lɛni na línweni ni, líinweni lɛ́wɔlɔ.”
43019023	Uwi ɔni na bekpone bammɔ bákana Yesu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ báwɔlɔ ni, béti nwuna adala na béle-nya akpa ene. Na ɔdi biala úti lɛkpa linwi. Na Yesu awu gyɔlɔɔ ɔmmɔ ni, bétele-nwu. Na awu ɔmmɔ ni, bátaka-nwu kesii kadi, mmomu budi sɔɔn na bédi-nwu ɔ́si limɔ útédu lɛgba.
43019024	Na bekpone bammɔ básu lɛlɔ banini, “Buláni awu ɔmɛni bulabwɛ. Mmomu bɛya na bɔtu egulabi bɔnu bula akɔ ɔni menwini mewi na buti awu ɔmmɔ bute-nwu.” Na ɔkɛnku ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila ébo éte lɛni sɔsɔ uwi ɔni na básu bése banii, “Béle-mi lɛlɔ ala béte lɛlɔ. Na bátu egulabi na mina awu lɛlɔ.” Na lɛni geen lɛnɔ na bekpone bammɔ bábla.
43019025	Na Yesu ugyii ɔmmɔ kalɔ ni, Yesu uni ku uni ɔnwani ulekubi ku Klopa ulekudi Maria ku Maria Magdalene benye.
43019026	Yesu ɔ́nu uni ku nwuna ɔtɛyane ɔni na ɔɔyɔ́ geen ka benye. Anwuɔsu ɔ́su uni ɔnini, “Nna, aanu ƒ^ubidi.”
43019027	Amu na ɔ́su ɔtɛyane ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ ɔnini, “Aanu ƒ^ini.” Anwuɔsu ɔ́si uwi ɔmmɔ ni, ɔtɛyane ɔmmɔ ɔ́ƒɔ-nwu úsienku kaduli na ɔɔnu-nwu lɛlɔ.
43019028	Yesu ɔ́ti ka ɔƒaani ni, ɔ́ɔwɔlɔ lɛla biala na ɔlɛka ɔbla. Na kalɛ na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ala ani bénweni bése ebo ete lɛni ɔsu ni, Yesu ɔ́su ɔnini, “Utukwɛ ɔɔda-mi.”
43019029	Amu na kesii kani na ala amɛni aalɛ́ mmɔ ni, kalaku bonwu kadi kese na ntɛ bɔni nányi buwi. Anwuɔsu béti unwo bátu ugyii ɔdi baalɔ banii hisope lɛlɔ na bánwu bákya ntɛ bɔmmɔ kemo, na bákɔliku bátu-nwu kenye.
43019030	Ka Yesu ɔ́ni ntɛ bɔmmɔ ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ɔƒɛni kani ɔ́sa!” Ka ɔ́su lɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́kya lili kalɔ na ɔ́yula.
43019031	Amu na Yudaƒuɔ benengu bammɔ básu Pilato banii ute-ma kuƒi na bekyuli bani na bákana bámana ugyii lɛlɔ mmɔ ni, na bebo-ma lɛgba ekubi baƒɛ na baƒami-ma na ugyii lɛlɔ mmɔ. Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ báwia ka babla ɔmɛni ɔsika limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛdi Ƒida. Na bátayɔ ka bekyuli bammɔ ɔlɔna ɔƒa ligyii lɛlɔ mmɔ utédu kadi kégye kani ndi bana lɛnwunameyi. Na lɛnwunameyi lɛni ndubo mmɔ lɛnɔ lɛdi limeyi linengudi geen lɛni nse kedee ƒui lite-ma.
43019032	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu bekpone bammɔ bésie na nkyuli inyɔ bani na bákana bámana ugyii lɛlɔ bébunku Yesu mmɔ ni, bébo-ma lɛgba báƒɛ.
43019033	Nsu ka bébedu Yesu kudɔ ni, bánu ka úukpi. Anwuɔsu anwu ni, bátaƒɛ-nwu lɛgba.
43019034	Mmomu ukpone unwi ɔ́tu-nwu ɔƒɛnyi ɔ́ƒuala ku nwuna lɛtula. Na mmɔ mmɔ ni, ubugya ku ntu bɔ́lɛ.
43019035	Ukyuli ɔni nánu ala amɛni ni, anwu muunweni-nya kalɛ na amii lɛnɔ bɛƒɔ bɛdi. Na lɛla lɛni na ɔ́su lɛnɔ ni, sɔsɔ na ɔdi. Na ɔgyi nwaa ka litemi geen na ɔɔsu.
43019036	Bábla ala amɛni ƒui kalɛ na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila ebo ete lɛni ɔni na bénweni banini, “Nwuna likubi linwi muedi balaƒɛ-ni.”
43019037	Na bénweni lɛla bamba lɛnɔ banini, “Bekyuli badubɔnu anwu ɔni na bátu-nwu lɛtula ɔƒɛnyi mmɔ.”
43019038	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yoseƒ ɔni nási ɔma ɔni baalɔ banii Arimatea ni, úvele Pilato ɔnii ɔnyonu Yesu ukpine ute-nwu. Na Yoseƒ ɔmɛni ɔdi Yesu kama basiakune akɔ unwi. Nsu útabla na bekyuli bati, ɔsika ɔɔyia Yudaƒuɔ benengu bammɔ ɔsu. Na ka Pilato ɔ́tuna ni, úbo úbaƒɔ ukpine ɔmmɔ ɔ́tɔlɔku.
43019039	Na Nikodemo ɔni nábɛ útánu Yesu usien ɔdi ni, anwu lɛnɔ ɔsiaku Yoseƒ ɔmɛni. Na evogyii ani na beeti taaklibi ukpine ni, Nikodemo ɔ́ya na béti-nya pii geen basiaku-ma.
43019040	Amu na nkyuli inyɔ bamɛni béti Yesu ukpine ɔmmɔ na bátáwɛɛ-nwu evogyii ammɔ ƒui na béti adi aƒualadi abuni bényimi bada-nwu lɛlɔ ƒui aani kalɛ na Yudaƒuɔ baaklibi ukpine asa na baavá-nwu.
43019041	Na kesii kani na bádu Yesu mmɔ ni, likpo blii lɛdi lɛkya mmɔ. Na mmɔ ni, béku kaƒiɔtɔ kawɔdi kadi bése na bátava tɔ ukyuli kana kemo kudii.
43019042	Ɔƒɛni ka kadi kegye kani ndi lɛnwunameyi na kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ lɛnɔ kede mmɔ ɔsu ni, béti Yesu bátáva mmɔ.
43020001	Na Kwasida ɔtanta tutuutu uwi ɔni kemo na kadi kátabla tɔ nwaa ni, Maria Magdalene úsie kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kudɔ na útánu ka lɛtabi lɛni na béti bébi ubu ɔmmɔ kenye lɛsɔ liiibi.
43020002	Anwuɔsu úkeli úsie Simon Petro ku ɔtɛyane ɔni na Yesu ɔɔyɔ́ mmɔ kudɔ. Na útásu-ma ɔnini, “Bekyuli badi bétédie Blɔti na kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kemo bátɔlɔku. Na bɔɔɔgyi kesii kani na béti-nwu bétése!”
43020003	Amu na Petro ku ɔtɛyane ɔbambadi ɔmmɔ bátɔlɔ bésie kaƒiɔtɔ mmɔ.
43020004	Bana inyɔ ƒui bakɛ beekeli usi, nsu ɔtɛyane ɔbambadi ɔmmɔ ɔ́vi Petro na ɔ́ka-nwu kaƒiɔtɔ kudɔ mmɔ budu.
43020005	Úbo kalɔ na ɔ́nu adi aƒualadi abuni ammɔ, nsu úteduo kaƒiɔtɔ ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo.
43020006	Simon Petro ɔni nkpɛ kama lɛnɔ úubo úbeduo, na anwu ɔ́vi úduo kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kemo na ɔ́nu adi aƒualadi ammɔ ka ewi.
43020007	Na kɔdi kɔni na béti bamana Yesu lili lɛnɔ kɔtɛ mmɔ. Nsu kɔɔɔtɛ adi aƒualadi ammɔ kudɔ. Mmomu báƒɛ aku lɛti báva kɔmadɔ.
43020008	Mmɔ ni, ɔtɛyane ɔbambadi ɔni náka bukeli butédu kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kɔtu lɛnɔ úduo ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo. Na útánu ala ammɔ lɛni kani, na ɔ́ƒɔ ɔ́di.
43020009	Nsu úti úbeduku uwi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, bétenu tɔ kalɔ ka Yesu ɔdubɔta bɔlɛ kekpine aani kalɛ na bénweni na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo.
43020010	Amu na batɛyane bammɔ bénwini bésie kaduli.
43020011	Nsu Maria úbo unye kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ anumi na uuwulo. Nsu uwi ɔni na unye uuwulo ni, ɔ́sɔ úbo kalɔ ɔ́nu kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kemo.
43020012	Mmɔ ni, ɔ́nu Katɔti batu inyɔ badi ka bakya lɛwu lɛƒualadi belie mmɔ. Unwi ulie kesii kani na Yesu ɔ́tɛ lili kakɛ, na ɔkladi lɛnɔ ulie úsie lɛgba kakɛ.
43020013	Amu na béye-nwu banini, “Uleku, bi ɔsu na eewulo?” Mmɔ ni, Maria lɛnɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Bekyuli badi bébeti mina Ati bátɔlɔku. Na lɛɛɛgyi kesii kani na béti-nwu bésienku!”
43020014	Amu ka ɔ́tu únwini ni, ɔ́nu ka Yesu unye. Nsu Maria útati ɔnii Yesu na ɔdi.
43020015	Amu na Yesu lɛnɔ úye-nwu ɔnini, “Uleku, bi ɔsu na eewulo? Ɔma na aawia?” Nsu Maria ɔ́kali ɔnii anwu mɔɔnu kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ. Anwuɔsu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, buvele, si awɔ nédie-nwu átɔlɔku mɛni ni, na atina-mi kesii kani na éti-nwu étése, na lisie ntéti-nwu mmɔ.”
43020016	Amu na Yesu ɔ́kpali-nwu ɔnini, “Maria!” Mmɔ ni, Maria únwini ɔ́nu-nwu, na ɔ́su na Hebri lɛdi kemo ɔnini, “Rabuni!” Na nwuna kalɔ ndi Ala Ɔtinane.
43020017	Mmɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Tatu tada-mi, ɔsika ńtenwini tɔ ńtesie Katɔti kudɔ. Mmomu teesie mina banwani kudɔ na atásu-ma anii línwini lísela mina Ɔti ɔni ndi Katɔti kudɔ. Na anwu ndi amii lɛnɔ Ɔti ku bina Katɔti.”
43020018	Anwuɔsu ni, Maria Magdalene úsie na útásu batɛyane bammɔ ka anwu ɔ́nu Blɔti. Na lɛla lɛni na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ni, ɔ́sɔku-ni ɔ́su batɛyane bammɔ.
43020019	Na Kwasida kadi kammɔ useyi ni, batɛyane bammɔ básala na bákalɛ lɛlɔ bákya ɔtɔ kemo ka baayia Yudaƒuɔ benengu bammɔ ɔsu. Amu na Yesu úbo úbenye-ma ntɛ, na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-mii.”
43020020	Ka ɔ́su-ma ɔmɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, Yesu úti nwuna enu ku ɔƒɛnyi ɔ́tina-ma. Na lɛlɔ lɛ́yɔ batɛyane bammɔ ka bánu Blɔti ɔsu.
43020021	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-mii. Kalɛ na Ati ɔ́tala-mi ni, lɛni kani na ami lɛnɔ mɔɔtala-mii.”
43020022	Mmɔ ni, ɔ́nwuna úwi-ma na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛƒɔ Katɔti Kɔyu.
43020023	Na si bíti bekyuli ekpidi bɛ́kyiɛ-ma ni, ɔɔtina ka Katɔti lɛnɔ úti ɔ́kyiɛ-ma. Nsu si bíteti bítakyiɛ-ma ni, ɔɔtina ka Katɔti lɛnɔ úteti útakyiɛ-ma.”
43020024	Uwi ɔni na Yesu úbo-ma kudɔ mmɔ ni, batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ akɔ unwi ɔni baalɔ Toma na basɔ baalɔ-nwu Nta Ubi ni, uuubo-ma akɔ.
43020025	Anwuɔsu ka úbebo ni, batɛyane bakladi bammɔ básu-nwu banini, “Abu bɔ́ɔnu Blɔti!” Amu na Toma ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si ńtanu kɔbwɛlɛ eƒi lɛtaala na nwuna enu na liti mina lɛnimi lɛkya-nya kemo na liti mina kɔnu lɛkya-nwu ɔƒɛnyi ni, lɛɛɛdubo bɔƒɔ bɔdi.”
43020026	Amu na Kwasida unwi kama ni, batɛyane bammɔ básɔ bása belie ɔtɔ kemo, na Toma lɛnɔ ɔkya-ma akɔ. Básɔ bákalɛ ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ lɛni kani. Nsu Yesu úbo na úbenye-ma ntɛ, na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-mii.”
43020027	Amu na ɔ́su Toma ɔnini, “Bo, na ebeti ƒula lɛnimi akya mɛni. Na anu mina enu. Na eti ƒula kɔnu akya-mi ɔƒɛnyi. Na ada ƒula taƒɔ tadi aya. Na aƒɔ adi ɔƒɛni kani!”
43020028	Ka Yesu ɔ́su-nwu lɛni ni, Toma údie kenye ɔnini, “Mina Ati ku Katɔti!”
43020029	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Áƒɔ ádi ka ánu-mi ɔsu. Bekyuli bani náƒɔ bádi asa na bánu-mi ni, badubɔkɛ lɛlɔyɔ teetulo!”
43020030	Yesu ɔ́bla akɔla budie taatina pii na nwuna batɛyane anumi. Nsu ńtenweni-nya ńtakya ɔku ɔmɛni kemo.
43020031	Na amɛni kani na línweni líse kalɛ na bɛƒɔ bɛdi ka Yesu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ. Na anwu ndi Katɔti Ubidi ɔni na si bɛ́ƒɔ-nwu bɛ́di ni, na ɔya na bilie ngba na nwuna ɔyikun kemo.
43021001	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina nwuna batɛyane kunwi na Tiberia Ɛpu kudɔ. Na kalɛ na úbalɛ na ndubo bɔsu mɛni.
43021002	Limeyi lɛdi ni, Simon Petro ku Toma ɔni baalɔ Nta Ubi ku Natanael ɔni nási Kana na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ ku Sebedeo bebi ku Yesu batɛyane inyɔ babambadi badi benye.
43021003	Amu na Simon Petro ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lísela ntédie kɔbɛ.” Mmɔ kani na ama lɛnɔ básu-nwu banini, “Abu lɛnɔ bɔdubo-ɔ bɔsiaku.” Anwuɔsu bana ƒui béduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo na bátɔlɔ. Nsu usien umodi ɔmmɔ ni, bétedie kɔbɛ kɔdi.
43021004	Amu uwi ɔni na ɔƒɛ ɔ́tu ɔdubo ni, batɛyane bammɔ bánu ukyuli ɔdi ka unye ɛpu kɔtu. Nsu bátati banii Yesu na ɔdi.
43021005	Amu na ɔ́kpali-ma ɔnini, “Bakloƒu, bítedie kɔbɛ kɔdi?” Mmɔ na ama bédie kenye banii, “Oowo!”
43021006	Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biwi bina asawu ɔmmɔ na ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kɔdianu kakɛ. Na bɛdubɔkɛ lɛla lɛdi.” Anwuɔsu béwi asawu ɔmmɔ. Na bátakana-nwu bɔni bɔlɛku, ɔsika bédie kɔbɛ pii.
43021007	Amu na ɔtɛyane ɔni na Yesu ɔɔyɔ́ mmɔ ɔ́su Petro ɔnini, “Blɔti na ɔdi!” Ka Simon Petro únu ka ɔtɛyane ɔmmɔ ɔ́su ɔnii Blɔti na ɔdi ni, Petro úti nwuna awu gyɔlɔɔ ɔ́bala lɛlɔ, ɔsika ɔ́da-nwu údie. Na ɔ́ƒulu úduo ntu bɔmmɔ kemo, na úti úsela Blɔti kudɔ.
43021008	Na batɛyane bakladi béti ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ na básia ntu lɛlɔ bébedu ɛpu kɔtu. Na báni asawu ku kɔbɛ kɔmmɔ béboku. Na ɔ́si kesii kani na bédie kɔbɛ kɔmmɔ útédu ɛpu kɔtu ni, útagyu. Ɔ́bla aani lɛgba budie eti anyɔ.
43021009	Ka báyu ɔkɔlɔ kemo bébo kalɔ ni, bánu aƒɛ ogya ɔdi na ɔdaku bɔda. Na kɔbɛ kɔdi kɔsia ogya ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ, na bodobodo ɔdi lɛnɔ use mmɔ.
43021010	Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biti bina kɔbɛ kɔni na bídie ɔƒaani mmɔ kɔdi biboku.”
43021011	Amu na Simon Petro ɔ́kɔ úduo ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo, na ɔ́da asawu ɔmmɔ na ɔ́ni úbewi ɛpu kɔtu. Na kɔbɛ kubendi kúyi-nwu kemo tɛtɛɛtɛ. Na kɔbɛ kɔmmɔ ƒui bumomo bɔbla eti atɛ ku ɛtɛ. Nsu ina ka kɔbɛ kɔmmɔ kúmomo lɛni ni, asawu ɔmmɔ útabwɛ.
43021012	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bibo bibadi.” Nsu ɔni na ala amɛni ƒui aalɛ́ ni, ɔdi útakana kayi buse na uye-nwu ɔnii, “Ɔma na adi?” Ɔsika báti ka Blɔti na ɔdi.
43021013	Na ka Yesu ɔ́lɔ-ma ɔnii babadi ni, ɔ́kpɛ úde adila ammɔ na úti bodobodo ɔmmɔ na úti úte-ma. Lɛni kani na ɔ́bla kabɛ kammɔ lɛnɔ.
43021014	Na ɔmɛni ndi kɔtɛdi kɔni na Yesu údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina nwuna batɛyane ɔni na ɔ́ta ɔ́lɛ kekpine.
43021015	Uwi ɔni na bádi báwɔlɔ ni, Yesu úye Simon Petro ɔnini, “Simon, Yohane ubi, aayɔ́-mi geen teetulo batɛyane bakladi bamɛni?” Amu na údie kenye ɔnini, “Blɔti, ɛɛn! Awɔ ɔlati agyi ka mɔɔyɔ́-ɔ.” Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Taanu mina baƒonubi lɛlɔ.”
43021016	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ úye-nwu ɔnini, “Simon, Yohane ubidi, aayɔ́-mi geen?” Na Petro lɛnɔ ɔ́sɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Blɔti, agyi ka mɔɔyɔ́-ɔ.” Mmɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Taanu mina baƒonu lɛlɔ.”
43021017	Kɔtɛdi ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ úye Petro ɔnini, “Simon, Yohane ubidi, aayɔ́-mi?” Amu ka Yesu ɔ́sɔ úye-nwu kɔtɛdi ɔnii, “Aayɔ́-mi?” ɔsu ni, Petro lɛlɔ lɛ́bla anwu ɔlati kɔnyana, na ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, agyi lɛla biala. Na agyi lɛnɔ ka mɔɔyɔ́-ɔ!” Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Taanu mina baƒonu lɛlɔ.
43021018	Mɔɔsu-ɔ litemi geen ka ni, uwi ɔni kemo na adi ɔnamu ni, aata na aklibi lɛlɔ na esie kesii biala na aayɔ́. Nsu si uwi ɔni na ábi lɛlɔ ni, adubo enu bunene na ukyuli bamba maklibi-ɔ na ɔkpanku-ɔ usienku kesii kani na alawia ka esie.”
43021019	Lɛla lɛni na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu mɛni ni, bɔtina na ɔda Petro kukpi kɔni udu na ɔdubo bukpi na uti ɔkɔliku Katɔti lɛnyi katɔ. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Taasiaku-mi.”
43021020	Amu ka Petro ɔ́tu únwini ni, ɔ́nu ɔtɛyane ɔni na Yesu ɔɔyɔ́ mmɔ. Anwu ndi ɔtɛyane ɔni nábu úsie Yesu kudɔ uwi ɔdi návi ɔni na baadiku-nwu adila ekplodi na úye Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, ɔma ndubo-ɔ kakya bɔkya?”
43021021	Anwuɔsu uwi ɔni na Petro ɔ́nu-nwu ni, úye Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, na bi ndubo ƒula ɔtɛyane ɔmɛni anwu bɔlɛku?”
43021022	Amu na Yesu údie kenye na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Si mɔɔyɔ́ nnii anwu ɔsɔ ɔkya ngba wetédu uwi ɔni na masɔ mebo ni, bi nkɛ-ɔ? Awɔ ni, taasiaku-mi.”
43021023	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu ni, litemi lɛmɛni lígyingya lɛ́vi Yesu basiakune ƒui akɔ ka ɔnii ɔtɛyane ɔmɛni anwu ulekpi. Nsu ɔɔɔdi bɔsu na Yesu ɔ́su ɔnii ulekpi. Mmomu bɔsu na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Si mɔɔyɔ́ nnii anwu ɔsɔ ɔkya ngba wetédu uwi ɔni na masɔ mebo ni, bi nkɛ-ɔ?”
43021024	Ɔtɛyane ɔni lɛlɔ litemi na bɔɔsu mɛni ndi ami ɔni násu ala amɛni. Na línweni-nya líse lɛnɔ. Na baƒɔtaadine ƒui bagyi ka ala ani kenye na muudie mɛni adi litemi geen.
43021025	Na ala pii abambadi akya ani na Yesu ɔ́bla. Na si banii bénweni ala ani ƒui na ɔ́bla bése unwi unwi ni, nka kayawi bekyuli balákɛ lɛku lɛmmɔ kesekɔ.
44001001	-
44001002	Ɔnwa Tioƒilo, na mina ɔku udeedi kemo ni, línweni lɛ́su ala ani ƒui na Yesu ɔ́bla na ɔ́tina úti ɔ́si uwi ɔni na úse nwuna kabla kalɔ úti útédu uwi ɔni na Katɔti úti-nwu úsienku katɔ. Asa na ɔdubuti-nwu usienku katɔ ni, Yesu ɔkɛ Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun lɛlɔ ɔ́tina nwuna batalane ala.
44001003	Na emeyi aavlene kemo na nwuna kukpi kama ni, údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina-ma kɔlɛ kɔlɛ ɔni na ɔ́tina geen ka ɔ́kya ngba. Ama bani nánu-nwu ni, ɔ́tɛmiku-ma ɔ́siku nwuna Ɔti lɛga kadikɔ ala lɛlɔ.
44001004	Uwi ɔni na bábasa lisu ni, úbo-ma ɔda ɔnini, “Bitatɔlɔ Yerusalem, mmomu binye bɛgya Katɔti Kɔyu bubo bɔni lɛlɔ na lɛ́su-mii lɛ́siku ka mina Ɔti ɔ́su úse ka wete-mii.
44001005	Ɔsika Yohane anwu ni, ntu na úti ɔ́bla Katɔti ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmmɔ úte bekyuli. Nsu na emeyi klukui adi kemo ni, Katɔti ɔdubuti nwuna Kɔyu ɔkpila-mii.”
44001006	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ka batalane bamɛni ku Yesu básɔ bása ni, béye-nwu banini, “Unwoti, ɔƒaani na aawia ka asɔku Israel lɛga kadikɔ ese yoo?”
44001007	Na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Útalɛka bɛti uwi iye emeyi ani na mina Ɔti ɔ́su úse ka lɛla lɛdi lɛdubɔlɛ.
44001008	Nsu si uwi ɔni na Katɔti Kɔyu kúbo-mii kudɔ ni, kɔdubɔƒɔ-mii lɛlɔ kemo ƒui na kɔdubɔkya-mii ɔyikun na bɛdubɔsu-mi lɛlɔ litemi na Yerusalem ku Yudea ku Samaria wetéduku kalɔ kawɔkɔ.”
44001009	Na ɔmɛni bɔ́su kama ni, Katɔti úti-nwu ɔ́kɔliku katɔ na benye baanu-nwu útédu ka úduo uyɔlɔ kemo na ɔ́yii-ma anumi.
44001010	Na ɔni benye baanu kayaa ni, kɔnakunwi nkyuli inyɔ badi bani nnyimi ala aƒualadi bédie lɛlɔ bátina-ma,
44001011	na básu-ma banini, “Galileaƒuɔ, bi ɔsu na binye bɛɛnu katɔ lɛni? Yesu ɔni na Katɔti úti ɔ́siku-mii kudɔ úsienku katɔ mɛni ni, ɔsɔ ɔdubɔsi katɔ ubo-mii kudɔ aani kalɛ na bɛ́nu ka ɔ́si bina kudɔ úsie katɔ kalɛ kani.”
44001012	Nwuna kama ni, batalane bammɔ bénwini bási kɔbi kɔni baalɔ Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ mmɔ, bésie Yerusalem ɔmankemo. Na ɔ́si mmɔ útédu ɔmankemo mmɔ ni, wabla liluku linwi.
44001013	Ka bétéduo ɔmankemo ni, bésie bétéduo bana kakyakɔ. Na bekyuli bani nli mmɔ ndi Petro ku Yohane ku Yakobo ku Andrea ku Ƒilipo ku Toma ku Bartolomeo ku Mateo ku Yakobo ɔni ndi Alƒeo ubidi ku Simon ɔni basɔ baalɔ Selote ku Yakobo ubidi Yuda.
44001014	Bekyuli bamɛni bátaasala lɛlɔ taakpali katɔ uwi biala ku beleku badi ku Yesu uni Maria ku Yesu banwani bananabi.
44001015	Amu na emeyi ammɔ kemo kani ni, ama bani náƒɔ bádi mmɔ bábasa, na bana bumomo bɔbla aani nkyuli eti anyɔ ku aavlanyɔ. Na mmɔ Petro ɔ́ta únye na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini,
44001016	“Mina banwani, lɛla lɛni na bénweni na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ni, ɔlɛka libo-nwu kemo aani kalɛ na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́kɛnku Dawid lɛlɔ kútemi kɔ́siku Yuda ɔni nátɔnku bekyuli bani néƒie Yesu lɛlɔ.
44001017	Yuda ɔdi bula lɛkpa lɛmɛni kemo unwi, na Blɔti ɔ́ƒuna-nwu ka nka wabla batalane kabla.
44001018	“Nsu ɔ́bla likpidi na ɔ́ƒɔ egulabi ani na béti bétéye kalɔ kani lɛlɔ na útékpi. Mmɔ ka úbuli ni, ɔ́bwɛ na nwuna aƒɔla ƒui álɛ éwi keyi.
44001019	Nwuna kukpi kɔmɛni litemi líbegyingya na Yerusalem, na ukyuli biala únu nwuna kukpi kɔmɛni lɛlɔ litemi. Anwuɔsu ni, kesii kani na úkpi mmɔ na baalɔ Hakeldamak ɔni kalɔ ndi Ubugya Lɛku.”
44001020	Amu na Petro ɔ́su lɛnɔ ɔnini, “Bénweni na Dawid kɔgya ɔku kemo banini, 'Bɛsia nwuna liku mmɔ kɔnu bise, na ɔdi biala utelie mmɔ.' Básɔ bénweni banii, 'Bɛya na ukyuli bamba unye nwuna kalabla kenye.'
44001021	-
44001022	Anwuɔsu ni, ɔlɛka ukyuli ɔdi uduo-bu akɔ aani litemi kama unyene kalɛ ute Blɔti Yesu bɔta bɔlɛ bekpine akɔ. Na ɔlɛka ɔbla ukyuli ɔni nákya bula lɛkpa lɛmɛni kemo na uwi ɔni kemo ƒui na abu ku Yesu bɔkɛ, na ɔ́si uwi ɔni na Yohane ɔ́kɔ lɛsa na Katɔti ntu bɔkpila ɔdi lɛlɔ útédu uwi ɔni na Katɔti úti Yesu úsienku katɔ.”
44001023	Anwuɔsu bédie nkyuli inyɔ bani ndi Matia ku Yoseƒ ɔni baalɔ Barsaba na basɔ baalɔ-nwu Yusto.
44001024	-
44001025	Na bákpali katɔ banini, “Blɔti, awɔ ngyi ukyuli biala kasusu kemo. Anwuɔsu tina-bu nkyuli inyɔ bamɛni akɔ unwi ɔni na áƒuna, ka unye ɔtalane kenyekɔ kani na Yuda ɔ́da úse na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie kesii kani néduku-nwu.”
44001026	Na ka bátu egulabi bánu na nkyuli inyɔ bamɛni lɛlɔ ni, Matia ɔdi nénwini úwi na béti-nwu bébunku nkyuli leevu-unwi bammɔ.
44002001	Amu ka limeyi lɛni baalɔ Pentekoste limeyi lídu ni, baƒɔtaadine bammɔ ƒui bátása na likpo linwi pɛ.
44002002	Kɔnakunwi ni, bénu kɔku kɔdi aani ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ubendi ɔdi muukpó. Na kɔku kɔmɛni kúbeyi ɔtɔ ɔni kemo na bákya mmɔ.
44002003	Na lɛla lɛdi lígyingya aani agyakpabi kalɛ, na líbelie-ma lɛlɔ.
44002004	Na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-ma lɛlɔ kemo ƒui, na bése kalɔ baasu bumwi etemila na adi lidu kemo aani kalɛ na kúte-ma kalɛ.
44002005	Amu na uwi ɔmɛni kemo kani ni, Yudaƒuɔ bani nási kayawi ekpo ƒui ni, bébo bakya Yerusalem.
44002006	Amu ka bénu kɔku bonwu kɔmɛni ni, bekyuli pii békeli bésie mmɔ. Na ka bénu ka baƒɔtaadine bamɛni benye beetemi kadi biala ɔma lɛdi ɔsu ni, ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye!
44002007	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́gyu-ma, na béƒu na bése kalɔ beeye lɛlɔ banini, “Bekyuli bamɛni ƒui ni, ɔɔɔdi Galileaƒuɔ badi yoo?
44002008	Na dɛ na ɔ́bla na buunú bana butemi na bula kɔlɔ adi kemo?
44002009	-
44002010	Abu bɔdi Partiƒuɔ ku Mediaƒuɔ ku Elamƒuɔ ku bani nási Mesopotamia ku Yudea ku Kapadokia ku Ponto ku Asia ku Ƒrigia ku Pamƒilia ku Egyipte ku Libia ɔvi ɔni nkya Kirene ku baƒɔ bani nási Roma na badi Yudaƒuɔ ku bekyuli bani néduo Yudaƒuɔ lɛkpa kemo
44002011	ku Kretaƒuɔ ku Arabiƒuɔ. Na bula ƒui buunú ka beebó Blɔti ablala ebendi kudu na bula adi kemo.”
44002012	Amu ka béƒu benye mmɔ ni, bakya beeye lɛlɔ banini, “Bi litemi, lɛdi mɛni?”
44002013	Amu na ama bani nnye mmɔ badi básu banini, “Ntɛ mɔɔda-ma, ɔɔɔdi lɛla lɛdi biala lɛdi.”
44002014	Mmɔ na Petro ɔ́ta únye na bana leevu-unwi bammɔ akɔ na ɔ́talaku lɛdi katɔ ɔnini, “Amii Yudaƒuɔ ku amii bani nli Yerusalem ƒui, mɔɔyɔ́ ka lidie ala amɛni ƒui kalɔ, anwuɔsu binu kaduɛ.
44002015	Ɔɔɔdi ntɛ mɔɔda bekyuli bamɛni. Amii ɔlati bɛɛnu ka ɔtanta lɛdɔ yaalenwi kemo kani bɔkya mɛni.
44002016	Mmomu lɛla lɛni na bɛɛnu mɛni ni, ani ndi lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yoel ɔ́su úse kukuuku.
44002017	Ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Unwoti ɔ́su ɔnii, “ ' “Na emeyi ekplodi kemo ni, Ndubɔtala mina Kɔyu na kɔƒɔ mina bekyuli ƒui lɛlɔ kemo. Na bina bebi badubudie-mi kenye, na bina bakloƒu badubɔnu katɔ abɛla, na bina benengu lɛnɔ badubo ana buteegye.
44002018	Sɔsɔ ni, mina Kɔyu kɔdubɔƒɔ bina kɔduli beleku ku banana ƒui lɛlɔ kemo. Na emeyi ammɔ kemo ni, badubudie-mi kenye.
44002019	Na ndubɔya akɔla budie taatina ataalɛ na kayaa ku kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui. Bɛdubɔnu ubugya ku ogya ku uyɔ pii.
44002020	Ɔƒɛ ɔdubɔbla suu, na kɔbuli anumi adubugyie aani ubugya, asa na Katɔ Ɔyikune limeyi bonwu lɛmmɔ lɛdubo.
44002021	Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ukyuli biala ɔni makpali Blɔti na wevele-nwu kɔnyana bɔnu ni, ɔdubɔkɛ ngba.” ' ”
44002022	“Ati bene biinú? Yesu Nasareni ɔdi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni lɛlɔ na Katɔti ɔkɛ údie nwuna ɔyikun ku akɔla bɔbla keyi ɔ́tina-mii aani kalɛ na amii alati lɛnɔ bɛgyi.
44002023	Nsu na Ɔti bɔyɔ ku kakali kemo ni, ɔ́nyonu-nwu úte-mii na bɛ́kɛ ekpidi bablane lɛlɔ na bɛ́du-nwu uwi ɔni na bɛ́kana-nwu bɛ́mana ugyii lɛlɔ.
44002024	Nsu Katɔti ɔ́sɔ ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́lɛku bekpine akɔ na ɔ́lɛ kukpi enu kemo, ɔsika kukpi kulakana-nwu lɛkpu bubo buse.
44002025	Na Ɔga Dawid ɔ́su úse ɔ́siku-nwu lɛlɔ ɔnini, 'Lɛ́nu ka Unwoti unye-mi anumi uwi ƒui. Na ka unye-mi kɔdianu aani mina lɛkpa kalɛ ɔsu ni, lɛɛɛdubo bɔgbanta.
44002026	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, mina kayi kemo kéyi ku lɛlɔyɔ, na ndubuti kenye nteemwi-nwu uwi ƒui! Ina ka ɔlɔna ndi muedi ni, ndubulie na lɛnunsia kemo.
44002027	Na alanyonu mina kɔyu alakya kekpine. Na lɛnɔ ni, alaya ƒula Ubi Kedee ɔlɔna webu.
44002028	Átina-mi ƒula ngba lilu, na ƒula kudɔ bɔkya bɔya na mɔɔkɛ́ ebiti geen.'
44002029	“Anwuɔsu ni, banwa, mɔɔsu-mii nwaa ka ni, bula Nana Dawid úkpi, na báva-nwu, na nwuna kaƒiɔtɔ kamua kakya bula akɔ mɛni ɔmwi ɔmwi.
44002030	Nsu ɔdi Katɔti kenye udiene. Na Unwoti ɔ́lɛ ugyii úse ka wabla Dawid kaba kemo ubi na wadi lɛga aani Dawid ɔmmɔ kalɛ kani.
44002031	Ka Dawid ɔgyi ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, ɔ́su úse ka ni, Kristo ɔdubɔta ɔlɛ bekpine akɔ. Ɔ́su ɔnii balada-nwu balakya kekpine, na nwuna ɔlɔna lɛnɔ ulebu na kaƒiɔtɔ kemo.
44002032	Yesu ɔmɛni na Katɔti ɔ́gyila ɔ́lɛku bekpine akɔ, na litemi geen lɛmɛni lɛlɔ ɔsu na bɔdi kenye bediene.
44002033	Na ɔƒaani ni, Katɔti úte-nwu kenyekɔ kenengudi na nwuna kɔdianu, na úti nwuna Kɔyu úte-nwu aani kalɛ na ɔ́su úse. Lɛni na anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́tala-ku ɔ́kya-bu. Anwuɔsu na bɛɛnu na biinú lɛla lɛni mɔɔlɛ́ mɛni.
44002034	-
44002035	Ɔɔɔdi Dawid náta úsie katɔ mmɔ. Mmomu ni, ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Unwoti ɔ́su mina Unwoti ɔnii, “Sɔ lie-mi kɔdianu kakɛ wetédu uwi ɔni na meti ƒula bekisine makya-a lɛgba kalɔ.” '
44002036	Anwuɔsu mɔɔyá na amii Israelƒuɔ bɛti ka ni, Katɔti nábla Yesu ɔni na amii bɛ́du mɛni ɔnii unwini Blɔti ku Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi.”
44002037	Amu ka bekyuli bamɛni bénu Petro etemila amɛni ni, ékpoku-ma na kayi kemo. Anwuɔsu béye-nwu ku batalane bakladi banii, “Banwa, bi na ɔlɛka bɔbla?”
44002038	Amu na Petro ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔlɛka bina akɔ ɔdi biala ɔda ekpidi bɔbla ɔya na unwini ubo Blɔti kudɔ, na ɔƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi na Yesu Kristo lɛnyi kemo kalɛ na Katɔti uti nwuna ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-nwu, na ukyuli ɔmmɔ wakɛ Katɔti Kɔyu aani kalɛ na Blɔti ɔ́su úse.
44002039	Ɔsika linyese lɛmɛni lise lite amii ku bina bebi ku bani nási ɔgyu ku bekyuli bani ƒui na Katɔti walɔ weboku nwuna kudɔ.”
44002040	Amu na Petro ɔ́tɛmiku-ma laa na ɔ́lɛ-ma ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bɛda lɛlɔ bidie kɔtu bɔni bɔmɛni kemo, bɔni mebo bekyuli bekpidi bamɛni ɔnwa lɛlɔ.”
44002041	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, bana akɔ pii báƒɔ Petro litemi bádi, na bákpila-ma ntu na Yesu lɛnyi kemo, na bana bumomo bɔbla aani nkyuli mpimu ɛtɛ. Na ama lɛnɔ béti lɛlɔ bebunku baƒɔtaadine bammɔ limeyi lɛmmɔ.
44002042	Amu na béti bana uwi ƒui béte batalane bammɔ, na baatina-ma ala, na baakpali katɔ, na baadi taasala lɛnɔ.
44002043	Amu na ka batalane bammɔ bábla akɔla budie taatina pii ɔsu ni, ɔ́bla bekyuli bammɔ ƒui yaa na béti ɔbu béte Unwoti.
44002044	Na baƒɔtaadine bamɛni bátaasa uwi ndi uwi na beele bana lɛlɔ ala.
44002045	Na si béti bana lɛlɔ ala adi béye ni, beeti egulabi ammɔ teele kalɛ na ɔdi biala ɔɔwia.
44002046	Na béteesie Katɔti kakpakɔ limeyi ndi limeyi, na bátaasa esu esu lɛnɔ taadi na bana kɔduli na kubiti ku lɛlɔyɔ kemo.
44002047	Na baagyá Blɔti enu na beemwi-nwu lɛnɔ. Na bekyuli ƒui baabu-ma. Na limeyi biala ni, Unwoti uuti bekyuli babambadi bani na ɔɔƒɔ́ teebunku-ma lɛlɔ.
44003001	Limeyi lɛdi ni, Petro ku Yohane bésie Katɔti kakpakɔ uwi ɔni na Yudaƒuɔ beesié taatákpali katɔ. Ɔbla aani lɛdɔ ɛtɛ kemo.
44003002	Ka bédu kakpakɔ mmɔ na kayakun kani baalɔ banii Kayakun Buni kenye ni, mmɔ na bánu ɔnana ɔdi, ɔni náƒɛ uwi kalɔ ɔ́si nwuna bɔwɔ. Na nwuna bekyuli beeti-nwu taabava mmɔ limeyi ndi limeyi kalɛ na uteevele bekyuli bani muusié mmɔ egulabi.
44003003	Ɔni na Petro ku Yohane bási baaví ni, úye-ma ɔnii bete-nwu egulabi adi.
44003004	Amu na bédi bénye na bánu-nwu kpoo, na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Nu mɛni!”
44003005	Amu na ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔ́talaku anumi ɔɔnu-ma, na ɔ́bla kasusu ka badubo-nwu lɛla lɛdi bute.
44003006	Amu na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ami liiibo egulabi adi na mete-ɔ! Nsu ni, ndubute-ɔ lɛlɛni nse-mi! Mɔɔsu-ɔ na Yesu Kristo Nasareni lɛnyi kemo ka ni, ta na esie!”
44003007	Na Petro ɔ́da ukyuli ɔmɛni kɔdianu na ɔ́ya na ɔ́ta únye. Amu na nwuna lɛgba ku kasoma ekubi ƒui áyu ɔkplu!
44003008	Na ɔ́ba lɛgyu ɔ́kɔ katɔ na úbenye lɛgba lɛlɔ. Na úse kalɔ uusié taavi na ɔɔba agyu na uumwi Blɔti. Na ɔ́siaku-ma útéduo kakpakɔ mmɔ.
44003009	Na bekyuli bani nkya mmɔ ni, bánu-nwu na bénu kalɛ na ɔkya uumwi Unwoti.
44003010	Ka bábanu-nwu báti ka anwu mɔɔyɔ́ Kayakun Buni kudɔ bulie mmɔ ni, útakɔsi na ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye.
44003011	Amu na bekyuli pii békeli bésie-ma kudɔ na kesii kani baalɔ banii Ɔga Salomo lɛgbanya kemo na Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ. Bébo bábanu ka ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔ́tu ɔda Petro ku Yohane kpakplaa na nwuna bɔbwi bɔ́bla-ma kalɛ kadi!
44003012	Amu ka Petro ɔ́nu bekyuli bammɔ ni, ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Israelƒuɔ, bi mɔɔbla-mii dɛye dɛye pii taasiku lɛla lɛmɛni lɛlɔ lɛni? Na bi ɔsu na bɛɛnu-bu aani bekyuli kedee badi na bɔdi. Bitakali bɛnii abu alati ɔyikun kemo na búti bɔ́bwi ukyuli ɔmɛni!
44003013	Ɔsika Unwoti úti ɔbu úte Ubidi Yesu. Na Unwoti ɔmɛni ndi Abraham ku Isak ku Yakob lɛnɔ Ɔti. Na anwu kani ndi bula bati kuuku lɛnɔ Unwoti. Ubidi Yesu ɔmmɔ na amii bíti bíte bɛnii badu. Na bíni-nwu na Pilato anumi bɛnii bɛɛɛgyi-nwu ina ka Pilato ɔ́yɔ ka ɔnyonu-nwu.
44003014	Bíni ukyuli ɔbuni mmomu, na bɛ́tuna bɛnii ɔnyonu bekyuli ɔdune na ukyuli ɔbuni ɔmmɔ kenye.
44003015	Amii bɛ́ya na bádu ukyuli ɔni muute bekyuli ngba. Nsu Unwoti ɔ́sɔ ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́lɛku bekpine akɔ! Na abu alati bɔ́nu-nwu ku bula anumi!
44003016	Ɔkɛnku Yesu lɛnyi kemo ɔsu na ɔnana ɔni na bɛgyi na bɛɛnu mɛni ɔ́kɛ lɛlɔkplu. Na ka ɔ́ƒɔ Yesu ɔ́di ɔsu ni, Blɔti ɔ́bwi-nwu na bina anumi.”
44003017	“Banwa, ngyi ka tati tati ɔsu na amii ku bina benengu bɛ́bla lɛla lɛmɛni udu.
44003018	Nsu ni, Unwoti ɔ́su ka nwuna Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi webo abi lɛni. Na ɔmɛni ndi kalɛ na ɔ́ya na nwuna kenye bediene linyese líbo líte.
44003019	-
44003020	Anwuɔsu ni, binwini kama bɛkya ekpidi bɔbla na biti anumi bɛsia Unwoti lɛlɔ, kalɛ na waƒɔ bina ekpidi wedie-mii lɛlɔ na bɛkɛ bɔnwuna buɛɛ na Blɔti kudɔ, kalɛ watala Kristo Yesu wakya-mii aani bina Ɔƒɔne kalɛ.
44003021	Ɔlɛka Yesu ɔƒɔ lɛlɔ ɔkya katɔ mmɔ wetédu uwi ɔni na Ɔti wasɔku lɛla biala webese ligeen aani kalɛ na nwuna kenye bediene básu bése.
44003022	Ɔsika Mose ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Bina Unwoti Katɔti ɔdubudie kenye udiene ɔdi ɔlɛku bina akɔ aani ami kalɛ. Anwuɔsu binu litemi biala lɛni na wasu-mii.
44003023	Na ukyuli biala ɔni naaadubo nwuna litemi bunu ni, ɔdubukulo kɔna kɔni nkya anwu ku Blɔti bekyuli ntɛ.'
44003024	“Sɔsɔ geen ni, Katɔti kenye bediene ƒui ɔ́si Samuel úsela ni, básu ala ani mɔɔlɛ́ ɔmwi mɛni bése kukuuku.
44003025	Unwoti nényimi kenye kamɛni ku bina bati ɔkɛ nwuna kenye bediene lɛlɔ. Na amii ndi bunyimi bɔmɛni ala badine. Ɔ́su Abraham ɔnii ɔkɛ nwuna kaba kemo ni, ɔdubute kayawi ƒui bɔnwuna.
44003026	Anwuɔsu ka Katɔti ɔ́gyila Ubidi ni, ɔ́tala-nwu ɔnii ɔka-mii kudɔ bubo bubebunku-mii kalɛ na bɛkana kama bunwini bɔkya bina ekpidi.”
44004001	Amu uwi ɔni na Petro ku Yohane benye baatɛmi ku bekyuli bammɔ ni, Yudaƒuɔ bakpane badi ku kakpakɔ bagyumanane benengu ku Sadukiƒuɔ lɛnɔ bébo mmɔ.
44004002	Ka bénu ka Petro ku Yohane bakya baasu ala taasiku Yesu bɔta lɛlɔ ɔni mɔɔtina ka ukpine ɔdubo bɔta bulie ngba ni, béti kɔnyi geen!
44004003	Anwuɔsu béƒie-ma. Na ka kadi kábɔyu ɔsu ni, bákya-ma ɔtɔ útédu lɛdigye.
44004004	Nsu bekyuli pii bani nénu bana etemila amɛni kemo ni, báƒɔ litemi buni lɛmɛni bádi. Na bana bumomo bɔbla aani banana mpimu ɛlɔ.
44004005	Amu ka kadi kégye ni, úbebo úte ka Yudaƒuɔ kadi lɛlɔ badine ku kadi benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane badi bása na Yerusalem.
44004006	Bábasala ku Ɔkpane Unengudi Hana ku Kaiaƒa ku Yohane ku Aleksandro ku Ɔkpane Unengudi lɛlɔ bekyuli badi lɛnɔ.
44004007	Na bédie batalane bamɛni béboku bana anumi mmɔ. Na béye-ma banini, “Ulu ɔmani lɛlɔ na bɛ́bla ɔmɛni? Ɔma lɛnyi ku ɔyikun kemo na bɛ́bla ala amɛni udu?”
44004008	Mmɔ kani ni, Petro ɔ́ta na Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun kemo na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bula batɔnkune ku ɔma benengu,
44004009	si bɛɛwia kenye budie na lɛla lɛbuni lɛni na bɔ́bla búte ukyuli ɔni náƒɛ uwi kalɔ mɛni ku kalɛ na búti bɔ́bwi-nwu ni,
44004010	bite-mi kuƒi na lɛsu amii ku Israel kalɔ lɛlɔ bekyuli ƒui lɛla lɛdi. Ɔkɛ Yesu Kristo ɔni nási Nasaret lɛnyi kemo ɔni na amii bɛ́ya na bákana bámana ugyii lɛlɔ na Unwoti ɔ́sɔ ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́lɛku kekpine ɔsu na ukyuli ɔmɛni lɛlɔ lɛ́yu ɔkplu.
44004011	Na Yesu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ na Bunweni Kedee bɔɔsu taasiku bɔnii, 'Lɛtabi lɛni na amii batune bíni bɛ́va ni, ani nébo líbenwini lɛtabi lɛni náƒɔ kuye lítulo na atabi ƒui akɔ.'
44004012	Anwu lɛti ndi bekyuli Ɔƒɔne, ɔsika anwu kani na Unwoti úte lɛnyi ku ɔyikun na bekyuli ƒui akɔ ɔni makana waƒɔ-bu ngba.”
44004013	Ka lɛlɔ badine ku benengu bammɔ bánu kalɛ na Petro ku Yohane bábla kayi ku ɔtɔtɔ ku kalɛ na lɛkpaklɔ bekyuli badi na beeebo kenyekɔ kadi lɛnɔ na kadi akɔ ɔsu ni, ɔ́bla-ma kalɛ kadi. Na bánu báti ka ama ku Yesu ni, bavinkpana na badi.
44004014	Nsu ka bánu ukyuli ɔni na bábwi na bana anumi mmɔ ɔsu ni, bátakana lɛla lɛdi bɔsu.
44004015	Amu na báda-ma bédie kasalakɔ mmɔ, na ama lɛti lɛti bakya beeye lɛlɔ kasusu.
44004016	Badi béye banii, “Bi na ɔlɛka bɔbla ku bekyuli bamɛni? Bulakana buni bɔnii lɛla lɛni na bábla mɛni lɛɛɛdi akɔla budie taatina, ɔsika ukyuli biala na Yerusalem ɔgyi na únu litemi lɛmɛni.
44004017	Mmomu bɛya bubo-ma ɔda na bada litemi lɛmɛni bugyingya baya kalɛ na basɔ balasu ukyuli ɔdi litemi lɛdi na Yesu lɛnyi kemo.”
44004018	Na básɔ bálɔ-ma béboku bana kasalakɔ mmɔ na bábala-ma ka ɔ́si ɔƒɛni ni, basɔ batasu ukyuli ɔdi litemi na Yesu lɛnyi kemo.
44004019	Amu na Petro ku Yohane bédie kenye banini, “Amii alati bɛbu bɛnu. Bi mada Unwoti kubiti? Si bunu bina ɔda bubo munuu Unwoti bɔdi?
44004020	Lɛla lɛni na bɔ́nu na búnu ni, bulakana kenye bubile na bɔsɔ bulie kpoo.”
44004021	Amu na kasalakɔ benengu bammɔ bádɔnku-ma kaduɛ na báda-ma bányonu. Na ka bekyuli bammɔ ƒui bakya beemwi Unwoti na nwuna ablala ɔsu ni, bátakɛ lɛkwɛ lɛni lɛlɔ basia bani-ma kɔtu.
44004022	Na ukyuli ɔni na bábwi mmɔ ɔdubɔƒɔ utulo akwa aavlene.
44004023	Uwi ɔni na bánya báda-ma bányonu ni, Petro ku Yohane bésie bana badi bammɔ kudɔ na básu-ma kalɛ na kasalakɔ kammɔ bekyuli básu-ma.
44004024	Amu na baƒɔtaadine bamɛni ƒui bása lisu na bákpali Unwoti banii, “O Ati, awɔ nédie katɔ ku kalɔ ku ɛpu ku ala ani ƒui nkya-nya kemo.
44004025	Akɛnku Katɔti Kɔyu lɛlɔ na étemi ásiaku ƒula kabla ɔblane Dawid lɛlɔ anini, 'Bi ɔsu na bayawine baakya lɛsɛ, na bekyuli baasa lili kekeeke?
44004026	Kayawi baga bábla unwi na benye beekpóku awɔ ku ƒula Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi.'
44004027	Ɔdi litemi geen ka Herode ku Pontio Pilato ku Israelƒuɔ ku bani naaadi Israelƒuɔ básala lɛlɔ na ɔma ɔmɛni kemo, na báta bénye ƒ^ubidi Yesu ɔni ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi Kedee ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.
44004028	Nsu, awɔ, na ƒula ɔyikun ku lɛnunda kemo ni, énye ánu na básala bábla ala ani na ásu ése.
44004029	Na ɔƒaani ni, O Ati, nu liƒu lɛni na badaku-bu bɔkya, na ete abu, ƒula kabla bablane, kayi buse na bɔkana litemi buni lɛmɛni bɔsu.
44004030	Tuku bekyuli na abwi-ma, na abla akɔla pii ebu na ƒ^ubidi Yesu Kedee lɛnyi kemo.”
44004031	Ka bévele Unwoti ɔmɛni báwɔlɔ ni, ɔtɔ ɔni kemo na bakya mmɔ ɔ́kunku na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ bana ƒui lɛlɔ kemo, na bése kalɔ baasu litemi buni lɛmɛni ku kayi buse.
44004032	Na emeyi amɛni kemo ni, baƒɔtaadine bamɛni ƒui bábla unwi na udu ku kasusu kemo, na bana akɔ ɔdi biala útasusu anwu lɛti lɛkɛ. Mmomu ni, bana lɛla biala lɛdi bana ƒui lɛdi.
44004033	Na batalane bamɛni bákɔ Unwoti litemi lɛsa ku kayi geen básiku Blɔti Yesu bɔta bɔlɛ bekpine akɔ lɛlɔ. Na Unwoti keyi buɛɛ ku kusɛ kusɛ ɔkya-ma akɔ.
44004034	Na ɔdi biala ɔɔɔdi ɔwabane, ɔsika ama bani mbo lɛtɔ ku kɔlɔ ni, béti ala amɛni béye.
