44004035	Na béti egulabi amɛni bátákya batalane bammɔ lɛkɔkɔ na béle-nya béte bana akɔ ɔdi biala kalɛ na ɔɔwia.
44004036	Amu na ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni baalɔ Yoseƒ na ɔ́si Lewi kaba kemo na Kipro kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na batalane bamɛni básia-nwu lɛnyi banii Barnaba ɔni kalɔ ndi Ogya Ɔkyane.
44004037	Anwu lɛnɔ úti nwuna kalɔ úye na úti egulabi ammɔ úboku batalane bammɔ.
44005001	Amu na ɔnana ɔdi lɛnɔ ɔ́kya ɔni baalɔ Anania, na ulekudi ndi Saƒira. Ama lɛnɔ béti bana kalɔ kadi béye.
44005002	Na béti egulabi ammɔ adi bábala, na béti akladi béboku batalane bammɔ. Na ulekudi Saƒira lɛnɔ ɔgyi, na ɔ́tuna ka babla lɛni. Na Anania úti egulabi amɛni úboku úbakya batalane lɛkɔkɔ.
44005003	Amu na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Anania, bi ɔsu na áya na Satan ɔdi-ɔ lɛlɔ, na ɔ́ya-a na aanyi ɔkɔ taatɔlɔ Katɔti Kɔyu? Na ébu ƒula kalɔ kani na éti éye mmɔ egulabi adi ése éte lɛlɔ?
44005004	Awɔ mbo kalɔ kammɔ asa néti-ka éye, na egulabi ani na báƒɔ-ɔ kayu mmɔ lɛnɔ adi ƒ^ɔdi. Bi náya-a na ábla kakali kekpidi kamɛni udu? Ɔɔɔdi abu bekyuli na ányi ɔkɔ átina, mmomu Katɔti!”
44005005	Amu ka Anania ɔ́nya únu litemi lɛmɛni ni, anwu kani na úbuli ɔ́tɛ kalɔ, na úkpi! Na ɔmɛni ɔ́da bekyuli bani nánu ƒui liƒu.
44005006	Amu na bakloƒu bani nkya-ma akɔ mmɔ béti kɔdi bébi-nwu lɛlɔ na bágyu-nwu bátáva.
44005007	Amu na uwi klukui ɔdi kama ni, ulekudi lɛnɔ ɔ́da úbalɛ mmɔ ɔni na anwu ɔɔɔgyi lɛla lɛni nálɛ.
44005008	Amu na Petro úye-nwu ɔnini, “Ɔni na awɔ ku ƒ^ɔgyani bíti bina kalɔ bíye ni, egulabi ani na báƒɔ-mii kayu ƒui na adi mɛni?” Amu na uleku ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɛɛn, ana ƒui mmɔ.”
44005009	Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na awɔ ku ƒ^ɔgyani bɛ́kana bɛ́sa kenye bɛnii bɛɛsɔ Blɔti Kɔyu bɛnu? Aanu bakloƒu bani néti ƒ^ɔgyani bátáva. Ama kani ndubo-ɔ bɔgyu bɔlɛku.”
44005010	Kɔnakunwi ni, anwu lɛnɔ úbuli ɔ́tɛ kalɔ, na úkpi. Amu ka bakloƒu bammɔ bébo bábanu ka úkpi ɔ́tɛ ni, bágyu anwu lɛnɔ bálɛku bátáva ɔgyani kudɔ mmɔ kani.
44005011	Anwuɔsu liƒu líduo baƒɔtaadine bammɔ ku bekyuli bani nénu lɛla lɛni nálɛ na mmɔ ƒui akɔ.
44005012	Amu na uwi ɔmɛni ƒui ni, batalane bamɛni bátaabla akɔla pii na bekyuli bammɔ akɔ. Baƒɔtaadine bamɛni ƒui baasa na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ na kesii kani baalɔ banii Salomo lɛgbanya kemo.
44005013	Nsu anumi lɛlɔ baƒɔtaadine babambadi bátakana-ma kudɔ bɔkpɛ bude, ina ka baabu baƒɔtaadine bammɔ.
44005014	Na bekyuli pii, banana ku beleku, bénwini kama bákya bana alaekpidi bɔbla na báƒɔ Blɔti lɛnyi bádi.
44005015	Na bana badi béti balɛne bátáva atala lɛlɔ na keyi, kesii kani na báƒɔ bádi ka si Petro ɔ́si ɔɔví na nwuna kɔyu kúwi balɛne bamɛni lɛlɔ ni, ɔlɛ ɔni beeƒi waba-ma!
44005016	Amu na béti balɛne ku bekyuli bani na ayu ekpidi eekpóku-ma ƒui básiku lɛma lɛni nkya Yerusalem amadɔ béboku-ma kudɔ na bábwi-ma ƒui.
44005017	Amu na Yudaƒuɔ ɔkpane unengudi ku nwuna lɛlɔ bekyuli bani nási lɛkpa lɛni baalɔ banii Sadukiƒuɔ kemo ni, bése kalɔ beekpóku batalane bammɔ kogyulo.
44005018	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, béƒie-ma na béti-ma bátákya ɔtɔ.
44005019	Nsu usientɛ ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi úbalɛmi ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kayakun na ɔ́da-ma údie.
44005020	Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biteesie Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ na bitátaasu etemila taasiku ngba bɔwɔdi bɔmɛni lɛlɔ!”
44005021	Amu ka kadi kégye ni, bésie bétéduo kakpakɔ mmɔ na bése kalɔ ku ala bɔtina. Anwuɔsu uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔkpane unengudi ku nwuna babune bálɔ lɛlɔ ku Yudaƒuɔ kadi benengu ƒui básala, na bátala bagyumanane banii betédie batalane bammɔ na ɔtɔ katɛnkɔ beboku.
44005022	Nsu uwi ɔni na bésie mmɔ ni, bátatánu-ma! Anwuɔsu básɔ bénwini bábasu-ma banini,
44005023	“Ka búsie ni, bábala ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ bényene, na bagyumanane benye kayakun. Nsu ka bálɛmi ni, ukyuli biala ɔdi uuubo ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo!”
44005024	Uwi ɔni na kakpakɔ bagyumanane unengu ku bakpane benengu bamɛni bénu litemi lɛmɛni ni, ɔƒɛ ɔ́da-ma geen sɔsɔ, ɔsika baaagyi lɛla lɛni nsɔ mebo.
44005025	Amu na ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́si úbo na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bekyuli bani na béƒie bákya ɔtɔ ni, aanu-ma nkya kakpakɔ baatina ala.”
44005026	Mmɔ mmɔ na bagyumanane unengu ku nwuna badi báta bésie kakpakɔ mmɔ bétéƒie-ma béboku. Nsu ka baayia ka bekyuli badubo-ma atabi bubo ɔsu ni, bátani-ma ku ɔkplu.
44005027	Amu ka béti batalane bammɔ bébenyene-ma anumi ni,
44005028	ɔkpane unengudi úye-ma ɔnini, “Bútasu-mii bɔnii bɛsɔ bitasu litemi lɛdi bitasiku Yesu ɔmɛni lɛlɔ iye? Nsu bíigyingya etemila amɛni bíyile Yerusalem ƒui. Na bɛɛwia ka biti nwuna kukpi kɔtu bɔni bɛsia-bu lɛlɔ!”
44005029	Mmɔ na Petro ku batalane bammɔ bédie kenye banini, “Ɔlɛka bɔka Unwoti bɔbu asa bɔbu bekyuli bayawine.
44005030	Yesu ɔni na amii bɛ́ya na bákana bámana ugyii lɛlɔ na úkpi ni, bula bati kuuku Katɔti ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́lɛku kekpine na ɔ́sɔ úbo uli ngba.
44005031	Katɔti úte-nwu kenyekɔ kenengudi na nwuna kɔdianu. Na úti-nwu ɔ́bla Ɔgadine ku Ɔƒɔne kalɛ na Israelƒuɔ bakɛ kuƒi benwini bana kɔyi, na bakɛ ekpidi butitaakyiɛ.
44005032	Na abu ku Katɔti Kɔyu kɔni na Katɔti uuti teete bekyuli bani mɔɔbu-nwu ni, abu ndi ala amɛni kenye bediene.”
44005033	Ka bénu kenye kamɛni ni, ɔ́ya na básɔ bákɛ kɔnyi geen, na bábla kasusu ka badu batalane bammɔ.
44005034	Nsu Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ kemo unwi ɔni na baalɔ Gamaliel ɔ́bala-ma. Baaƒalɛ ukyuli ɔmɛni kaduɛ, ɔsika ɔdi Mose ɔda bubo ala ɔtinane. Anwu náta únye na ɔ́su ɔnii bada-ma bedie mmɔ asa na ama bakladi bataatɛmi.
44005035	Anwuɔsu ɔ́tɛmi úte-ma ɔnini, “Israelƒuɔ, bɛnu kaduɛ na ala ani na bɛɛyɔ́ ka bɛbla bekyuli bamɛni lɛlɔ!
44005036	Uwi ɔdi nábavi ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni na baalɔ Teuda ɔni nábla lɛlɔ aani si ukyuli unengudi ɔdi na ɔdi. Nkyuli eti maane básiaku-nwu kama. Amu ka bádu-nwu ni, nwuna kama basiakune bamɛni bégyingya na nwuna kasala kammɔ káyii udu.
44005037	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, na bekyuli bɔka lebo ni, Yuda ɔni nási Galilea ɔ́kpanku bekyuli badi úbunku lɛlɔ aani nwuna kama basiakune. Na anwu lɛnɔ úbekpi na nwuna kama basiakune bamɛni bégyingya.
44005038	Anwuɔsu lɛla lɛni na ami mɔɔsu-mii ndi ka ni, bɛnyonu bekyuli bamɛni. Si ala ani baatina ku ala ani baabla adi ama ɔlati adi ni, uwi uletu asa na ala amɛni adubugyingya.
44005039	Nsu si Katɔti ablala na adi ni, bulakana-ma bɔbala. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, diɛdi bɛdubɔnu ka bunye buukpóku Katɔti ɔlati!”
44005040	Na kasalakɔ bekyuli bammɔ báƒɔ Gamaliel litemi lɛmɛni. Anwuɔsu ni, bálɔ batalane bamɛni béboku bana akɔ, na bébo-ma. Na básu-ma banii basɔ batasu litemi biala batasiku Yesu lɛlɔ kudii. Amu na bányonu-ma.
44005041	Na ka bésela ni, kubiti kɔ́da-ma kaduɛ, ɔsika bánu ka Katɔti ɔ́ka-ma ɔ́kya bekyuli bani muubó abi ku kɔƒa na Yesu ɔsu.
44005042	Na ɔmɛni kama ni, limeyi biala bátaasu ka Yesu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ ku bekyuli kɔduli.
44006001	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ɔni na batɛyane bamɛni beemomo teebu ni, unyeƒi úbebo Yudaƒuɔ bani na beetemi Griki lɛdi ku Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ geen ntɛ. Ɔsika si béle adila ni, eledu Grikiƒuɔ bekpinele.
44006002	Ɔmɛni ɔsu leevu-inyɔ bammɔ bálɔ batɛyane bammɔ ƒui na básu-ma banini, “Ɔlɛka buti bula uwi bute litemi buni bɔsu, na ɔɔɔdi adila bɔdi etemila lɛlɔ.
44006003	-
44006004	Na ɔƒaani ni, banwa, bɛnu bɛmana na bidie nkyuli maatɛ bani náda anu na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-ma lɛlɔ kemo ƒui. Na bɔdubuti-ma buse kabla kamɛni kenye kalɛ na abu bɔkɛ uwi bute Katɔti bɔkpali ku litemi buni bɔsu ku ala bɔtina.”
44006005	Litemi lɛmɛni lɛ́dia bana ƒui bunu, anwuɔsu bédie Steƒano ɔni ndi ukyuli ɔni mbo bɔƒɔtaadi na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui. Na bédie Ƒilipo ku Prokoro ku Nikanor ku Timon ku Parmena ku ɔƒɔ ɔni nénwini Yudani ɔni baalɔ Nikolao ɔni nási Antiokia lɛnɔ bébunku-nwu.
44006006	Nkyuli maatɛ bamɛni na bédie bátina batalane bamɛni. Na ama lɛnɔ bákpali katɔ na bana lili. Na béti enu básia-ma lɛlɔ bévele keyi buɛɛ béte-ma.
44006007	Amu na bekyuli pii báƒɔ Katɔti litemi buni. Na baƒɔtaadine lɛnɔ bémomo na Yerusalem bébu. Na Yudaƒuɔ bakpane pii badi lɛnɔ bénwini basiaku bɔƒɔtaadi bɔmmɔ kama.
44006008	Amu na Steƒano ɔni na Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun ɔ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui mɛni ni, ɔ́bla akɔla budie taatina pii na bekyuli akɔ.
44006009	Amu na Yudaƒuɔ bani nálɛ bekyuli bamba kabla bɔbla kalɔ na bási Kirene ku Aleksandria ku bani nási Kilikia ku Asia bákya ku Steƒano unyeƒi.
44006010	Nsu bana akɔ ɔdi biala útakana-nwu kenye bunye ɔ́si nwuna lɛnunda ku litela lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kúte-nwu ɔsu.
44006011	Anwuɔsu bátása lili ku bekyuli badi banii babanyi ɔkɔ basia-nwu basu banii, “Búnu ka Steƒano uutemi taata teenye Mose ku Katɔti lɛnɔ muedi lɛlɔ.”
44006012	Linyeda lɛmɛni lɛ́ya na bekyuli bamɛni bébeti kɔnyi geen. Na ɔmɛni ɔsu Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune béƒie-nwu na béti-nwu bésienku bana kasalakɔ.
44006013	Amu na bekyuli bani náda-nwu kenye mɛni básɔ bábada Steƒano kenye ka ni, “Uutemi teewi kakpakɔ kamɛni uwi biala ku Mose ɔda bubo lɛlɔ.
44006014	Na búnu ka ɔ́su lɛnɔ ɔnii ukyuli ɔni nási Nasaret na baalɔ-nwu banii Yesu mmɔ ni, ɔdubɔƒɛ Katɔti ɔtɔ ɔmɛni na wavumana Mose ɔda bubo bɔni na úte-bu.”
44006015	Na uwi ɔmmɔ ni, bekyuli bani nnye mmɔ bánu ka Steƒano anumi eekeye aani Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi kalɛ.
44007001	Amu na ɔkpane unengudi úye Steƒano ɔnini, “Ala ani na básu básiku-ɔ lɛlɔ mɛni ni, sɔsɔ na adi?”
44007002	Amu na Steƒano údie kenye ɔnini, “Ati bene ku mina banwa, binu kaduɛ ka ni, Katɔti údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina bula Nana Abraham na Mesopotamia kalɔ lɛlɔ asa na ɔ́ta mmɔ úsie kalɔ kani baalɔ Haran lɛlɔ.
44007003	Mmɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ta na atɔlɔ ƒula bekyuli akɔ ku ƒula kalɔ lɛlɔ na eteesie kesii kani na matina-a!'
44007004	“Anwuɔsu ɔ́ta ɔ́lɛ Kaldea kalɔ lɛlɔ na úsie útélie Haran útédu uwi ɔni na ɔti úkpi. Amu na Katɔti útiku-nwu úboku kesii kani bilie ɔmwi mɛni.
44007005	Katɔti útete Abraham kadikɔ kadi mmɔ, ina kalɔ blii suɛ muedi. Nsu ni, ɔ́su-nwu úse ka kalɔ kammɔ kadubɔbla anwu ku nwuna bawɔ bawɔ kadi diɛdi, ina ka útawɔ tɔ ubi ɔdi úti úbedu ku uwi ɔmmɔ kemo!
44007006	Lɛni na Katɔti ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-nwu úse ka ni, nwuna bawɔ ƒui badubo baƒɔ bunwini na bekyuli badi kalɔ lɛlɔ, ɔni na badubunwini bekyuli bammɔ kabla bablane na bakya-ma kalɔ na lɛbibo kemo akwa eti maane sɔɔn.
44007007	Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ndubɔtɛku bekyuli bani kalɔ na bakya baabla-ma kabla mmɔ litemi. Na nwuna kama ni, badubɔlɛ kalɔ kammɔ kemo na badubɔkpa-mi na kalɔ kani bulie mɛni lɛlɔ.'
44007008	Amu na Katɔti úti lego bukulo linyese úte Abraham uwi ɔmmɔ kemo aani lɛla lɛni makya anwu Katɔti ku Abraham bawɔ ntɛ. Na Abraham úbawɔ Isak na úkulo-nwu lego uwi ɔni na ɔ́ƒɔ emeyi maane. Isak lɛnɔ úbawɔ Yakob, na Yakob lɛnɔ ɔ́wɔ bebi leevu-inyɔ bani nábawɔ Yudaƒuɔ adua leevu-anyɔ ammɔ ƒui.
44007009	“Yakob bebi bamɛni anumi égyie na bana ɔnwani Yoseƒ lɛlɔ. Na béƒie-nwu béye béte bekyuli bani néti-nwu bésienku Egyipte kalɔ lɛlɔ. Nsu ni, Katɔti ɔ́siaku-nwu,
44007010	na únyeku-nwu na ɔ́da-nwu údie nwuna lɛbibo ku kɔnyana buwulo kemo. Katɔti úte-nwu lɛnunda bonwu. Anwuɔsu Egyipte Ɔga Ƒarao ɔ́yɔ-nwu litemi na úti-nwu ɔ́bla Egyipte kalɔ ƒui lɛlɔ ɔnune ku nwuna kaduli ƒui ala lɛlɔ ɔnune lɛnɔ.
44007011	“Uwi ɔdi kemo ni, kɔka kubendi kɔdi kɔ́kya na Egyipte ku Kanaan kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui, na kɔnyana buwulo geen búbo bula bati bene lɛlɔ.
44007012	Uwi ɔni na bana adila áasa ƒui ni, Yakob únu ka adila adi akya Egyipte, anwuɔsu ɔ́tala nwuna bebi ɔnii besie betéye adi beboku-nwu.
44007013	Na ka Yakob bebi básɔ bésie mmɔ kunyɔdi banii betéye adila ni, Yoseƒ údie nwuna lɛlɔ ɔ́tina-ma, na údie-ma ɔ́tina Ɔga Ƒarao.
44007014	Amu na Yoseƒ ɔ́kada-ma ɔnii si bésie ni, na betiku ɔti Yakob ku Yoseƒ banwani ƒui ku bana lɛlɔ bekyuli beboku Egyipte. Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, bana ƒui bumomo bɔbla liti ku aavlanyɔ-ɛlɔ.
44007015	Anwuɔsu Yakob ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Egyipte na úlie mmɔ útédu uwi ɔni na úkpi. Na nwuna bebi bananabi lɛnɔ bélie mmɔ bétédu uwi ɔni na békpi.
44007016	Na básɔku bana ƒui bésienku ɔma ɔni baalɔ Sekem. Na bátáva-ma mmɔ na kaƒiɔtɔ kani na Abraham úye ɔ́siku Hamor kaba kudɔ kemo.
44007017	“Uwi ɔni na linyese lɛni na Katɔti úse úte Abraham lɛdaku budu ni, bula kadi bekyuli béemomo na Egyipte.
44007018	Úbebo lɛnɔ ka Ɔga Ƒarao ɔwɔdi ɔni mɔɔdi Egyipte lɛlɔ ni, ɔɔɔgyi Yoseƒ.
44007019	Ƒarao ɔmɛni ɔ́bla bula kadi bekyuli bamɛni kalala na únye-ma lɛlɔ na beeti bana bebiwɔ teetévaakun na beekpi.
44007020	“Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo kani na báwɔ Mose. Na bánu ka ɔdi ubi ɔni ndia geen. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, nwuna bawɔne béti-nwu bábala na kaduli abuli atɛ sɔɔn.
44007021	Na uwi ɔni na basɔ balákana-nwu bɔbala ni, ɔlɛka bada-nwu bedie bana kudɔ. Amu na Ƒarao ubidi ulekubi útákɛ-nwu na úti-nwu ɔ́bla aani nwuna kaƒɔ ubi.
44007022	Ɔ́da-nwu na ɔ́tina-nwu Egyipteƒuɔ ala bɔbla ku bana kɔkwɛ ƒui, na ɔ́lɛ lili úbabla ukyuli geen na butemi ku kabla lidu pii kemo.
44007023	“Na ka ɔ́ƒɔ akwa aavlene ni, úbo-nwu kasusu kemo ka ɔlɛka usie utégyele nwuna banwani Israelƒuɔ.
44007024	Amu na uwi ɔni na úsie mmɔ ni, ɔ́nu Egyipteni ɔdi ka ɔkya ɔɔbla Israelni ɔdi kalala. Na Mose ɔ́du Egyipteni ɔmɛni.
44007025	Mose ɔ́kali ka nwuna banwani badubɔkali banii Katɔti nátala-nwu ɔni ubebunku-ma, nsu bátakali lɛni.
44007026	Amu ka kadi kégye ni, ɔ́sɔ úsie-ma kudɔ na útánu Israelƒuɔ inyɔ ka bakya beekpó. Úsie útáda-ma na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Ati bene, banwani na bɛdi, anwuɔsu útalɛka biteekpoku lɛlɔ.'
44007027	“Nsu ukyuli ɔni náƒiɔ na nkyuli inyɔ bamɛni kemo ni, údi Mose na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Taatɛku awɔ lɛdi! Ɔma nédie-ɔ bula lɛlɔ ɔdine ku bula litemi ɔtɛne?
44007028	Munuu aayɔ́ ka adu-mi aani kalɛ na ádu Egyipteni ɔni kamaadi kalɛ?'
44007029	Ka Mose únu litemi lɛmɛni ni, liƒu lɛ́da-nwu geen. Anwuɔsu úkeli útábɛ na Midian kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na mmɔ na ɔ́wɔ nwuna bebi bananabi inyɔ.
44007030	“Akwa aavlene kama ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina-nwu na ogya ɔni mɔɔda na liyu kugyii blii kɔdi lɛlɔ na Sinai Kɔbi ketele kemo.
44007031	Ka Mose ɔ́nu ɔmɛni ni, útati lɛla lɛni na lɛdi. Na uwi ɔni na úsela ɔnii utánu lɛla lɛni lɛdi ni, Unwoti ɔ́lɔ-nwu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini,
44007032	'Ami ndi ƒula bati kuuku Abraham ku Isak ku Yakob bene Unwoti.' Amu na lɛlɔ lɛ́tɔ Mose ku bɔyia ɔni na ɔsɔ útakana mmɔ bɔnu.
44007033	“Amu na Unwoti ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Da ƒula lɛgbanvuo die! Ɔsika kalɔ kedee lɛlɔ na enye.
44007034	Sɔsɔ ni, lɛ́nu lɛbibo lɛni kemo na mina bekyuli bakya na Egyipte kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na muunú bana keku kani na beewulo taakpali-mi. Anwuɔsu lɛ́yu líbo nnii medie-ma. Bo, na lɛtala-a Egyipte.'
44007035	“Mose ɔmɛni ndi ukyuli ɔni na bátu kenye banii, 'Ɔma nédie-ɔ bula lɛlɔ ɔdine ku bula litemi ɔtɛne?' Anwu Mose ɔmmɔ kani na Katɔti ɔ́tala ɔnii usie na utábla bana lɛlɔ ɔdine ku bana ɔƒɔne ɔkɛnku Katɔti ɔtu ɔni na ɔ́nu na ketele kemo mmɔ kebunku lɛlɔ.
44007036	Anwu nédie-ma na Egyipte ɔkɛ akɔla budie taatina pii kemo ani na ɔ́bla na Egyipte mmɔ ku Ɛpu Ugyiedi kɔtu ku uwi ɔni na bakɛ ketele kemo akwa aavlene sɔɔn.
44007037	“Mose ɔmmɔ ɔlatidi násu Israelƒuɔ ɔnini, 'Katɔti ɔdubudie kenye udiene ɔdi aani ami kalɛ, na ɔdubudie-nwu ɔlɛku bina kaba kemo.'
44007038	Mose ndi ukyuli ɔni násala bula bati kuuku uwi ɔni na Israelƒuɔ bákya ketele mmɔ. Na anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni na Katɔti ɔtu ɔ́tɛmiku na Sinai Kɔbi lɛlɔ. Na anwu náƒɔ Unwoti litemi lɛni muute ngba úboku-bu.
44007039	“Nsu ni, bula bati bénwini kama bákya Mose ɔni na báyɔ ka basɔ benwini beteesie Egyipte kalɔ lɛlɔ.
44007040	Amu na bana ƒui básu Mose ɔnwani Aaron banini, 'Bla baƒiɔ bani matɔnku-bu te-bu, ɔsika bɔɔɔgyi lɛla lɛni nálɛku Mose ɔni nákpanku-bu ɔ́siku Egyipte.'
44007041	Anwuɔsu bábla baƒiɔ badi aani akɔ ubi, na baakpá-nwu, na bádi limeyi ku ebiti na lɛla lɛni na bábla mɛni ɔsu.
44007042	Ɔmɛni ɔsu na Katɔti únwini kama ɔ́kya-ma, na ɔ́nyonu-ma. Na bákya bátaakpa ɔƒɛ ku kɔbuli ku ayabi. Ɔmɛni ndi lɛla lɛni na Katɔti kenye bediene bénweni bákya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo banini, 'Israelƒuɔ, ɔɔɔdi ami na bíti bebuo ku baƒonu bɛ́bla akpala bíte akwa aavlene ani na bɛ́kya ketele kemo mmɔ.
44007043	Mmomu bíti Molok lɛbi ku Romƒa ayabi ani ndi baƒiɔ bani na bɛ́vɔ bíse bɛnii bitaakpa. Anwuɔsu ndubɔya na beƒie-mii besienku ɔgyu kakaaka na Babilon kama ngye ƒui.'
44007044	“Bula bati kuuku bágyu Katɔti kevo béti na ɔ́tɔnku-ma na ketele kemo. Bátu ɔtɔ ɔmɛni aani kalɛ na Katɔti údie ɔ́tina Mose mmɔ kalɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
44007045	Na akwa pii kama ni, Yosua ɔ́tɔnku bula bati bani nágyu kevo kamɛni béti na bétékpo-ku bekyuli bani na Katɔti ɔ́bɔku ɔ́lɛku kɔlɔ kɔmɛni lɛlɔ. Mmɔ na kevo kamɛni káƒɔ lɛlɔ kése úti útédu Ɔga Dawid uwi.
44007046	Katɔti úbunku Dawid kaduɛ. Anwuɔsu Dawid úye Unwoti ɔnii nka ute-nwu kuƒi na ɔtu keliekɔ geen use ute anwu ɔni ndi Yakob Katɔti.
44007047	Nsu ni, Salomo geen nátu keliekɔ kammɔ.
44007048	“Nsu Katɔti ulélie ɔtɔ ɔni na bekyuli bayawine bátu kemo. Unwoti ɔ́kɛnku nwuna kenye bediene lɛlɔ ɔ́su ɔnini,
44007049	'Katɔ ndi mina lɛgaboku, na kalɔ ndi mina lɛgba kanyakɔ. Na bi ɔtɔ udu na bɛdubɔkana-mi bɔtu bute, munuu mɔɔyaki keliekɔ kadi?
44007050	Ɔɔɔdi ami nédie ala amɛni ƒui yoo?' ”
44007051	Amu na Steƒano ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Batuɔkplune geen bɛdi! Amii lɛnɔ bɛɛda atu teedie Katɔti litemi lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na bina bati bábla kalɛ. Uwi ndi uwi bɛɛta teenye Katɔti Kɔyu lɛlɔ.
44007052	Katɔti kenye udiene ɔmani na bina bati kuuku bátawia ka badu? Bádu Katɔti kenye bediene bani muedi násu ka Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni nse siin webo. Na Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ bídie-nwu bíte na bádu.
44007053	Sɔsɔ na ɔdi ka bɛgyi ƒui na bíni Katɔti ɔda bubo bɔni na bɛ́ƒɔ bɛ́siku Unwoti ɔtu enu kemo.”
44007054	Ka bénu etemila ani na Steƒano ɔ́su ɔ́siku-ma lɛlɔ ni, ɔƒɛ ɔ́da-ma geen na ɔ́ya bákya baadu anyi ku kɔnyi.
44007055	Nsu ka Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ Steƒano lɛlɔ kemo ƒui ɔsu ni, ɔ́talaku anumi ɔ́nu katɔ laa, na ɔ́nu Katɔti bukeye ku Yesu ɔni nnye-nwu kɔdianu.
44007056	Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛnu! Mɔɔnu ka katɔ kébimi na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi unye Katɔti kɔdianu!”
44007057	Amu na báyoli momoomo na bétile bana atuƒi, na békeli bétéƒie-nwu.
44007058	Na bákpɛ-nwu bálɛku ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo, na bákya-nwu anumi ku atabi bubo. Na bekyuli bani nákpɛ-nwu bálɛku ni, bédie bana lɛwu béti béwi okloƒu ɔkɔdi ɔni baalɔ Saulo lɛgba lɛlɔ.
44007059	Na uwi ɔni na bakya beebó-nwu atabi ni, Steƒano ɔ́kpali katɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, “Blɔti Yesu, ƒɔ mina kɔyu.”
44007060	Amu na ɔ́lɛ akɔnkɔ na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kpali katɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, “Unwoti, teti bɔƒiɔ bɔmɛni tete-ma, énu!” Na ka útemi ɔ́su lɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́lɛ úbo kalɔ na ɔ́yula.
44008001	Na uwi ɔni na bakya baadú Steƒano ni, Saulo ɔ́kya-ma ogya. Na ɔ́si limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, bése kalɔ beekpóku baƒɔtaadine bamɛni na Yerusalem. Amu na bana ƒui békeli bésie Yudea ku Samaria. Nsu batalane ama bébu bakya mmɔ.
44008002	Amu na Yesu basiakune badi béti Steƒano bátáva ku keku.
44008003	Amu na Saulo úti ɔ́sia lɛlɔ na uukpóku baƒɔtaadine bammɔ na ɔkɛ kɔduli uuƒie banana ku beleku taavinku-ma taatákya ɔtɔ.
44008004	Nsu baƒɔtaadine bani nékeli bási Yerusalem mɛni ni, bakɛ baaví kesii biala taasu Blɔti litemi buni.
44008005	Na Ƒilipo anwu ni, úsie Samaria útásu bekyuli litemi buni lɛmmɔ ɔ́siku Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi lɛlɔ.
44008006	Na bekyuli pii bénu etemila ani na ɔɔsu ɔ́si akɔla budie taatina pii ani na ɔ́bla na bánu ɔsu.
44008007	Ɔ́bɔku ayu ekpidi pii ɔ́lɛku bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo, na ayu ekpidi amɛni áva momoomo asa na ávi álɛ-ma lɛlɔ kemo. Amu na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́bwi bani na lɛlɔ kakɛ kenwi kékpi-ma ku ama bani náƒɛ bewi kalɔ lɛnɔ.
44008008	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, kubiti kɔ́kya Samaria ɔma ɔmɛni kemo geen!
44008009	Ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya Samaria ɔni baalɔ Simon, na ɔdi ukyuli ɔni mɔɔƒɛ evo. Na nwuna evo bɔbla útaabla bekyuli kalɛ kadi. Na úteeƒu ɔnii ɔdi ukyuli ɔdi na nwuna ala bɔnu taasu ɔsu.
44008010	Samariaƒuɔ banana ku beleku ƒui baabu-nwu ɔ́si nwuna lɛlɔ bɔtina kabla kamɛni ɔsu. Anwuɔsu básu básiku-nwu lɛlɔ banini, “Anwu ndi katɔ ɔyikun ɔni baalɔ banii Ɔyikun Unengudi.”
44008011	Amu ka nwuna evo bɔbla áƒɔ-ma anu ɔsu ni, béteenu-nwu litemi.
44008012	Nsu ɔƒaani ni, báƒɔ Ƒilipo kenye bɔsu mmomu bádi ɔ́si Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ ku Yesu lɛlɔ. Na banana ku beleku pii báƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi na Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛnyi kemo.
44008013	Amu na Simon ɔmɛni ɔlati lɛnɔ ɔ́ƒɔ ɔ́di. Na ka ɔ́ƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmɛni ni, útaasiaku Ƒilipo kesii biala na úsela. Na ɔkɛnku akɔla budie taatina ani na ɔ́bla ɔsu ni, ɔ́bla-nwu dɛye dɛye!
44008014	Amu na uwi ɔni na batalane bani nkya Yerusalem bénu ka Samariaƒuɔ báƒɔ Katɔti litemi bádi ni, bátala Petro ku Yohane na bana kudɔ.
44008015	Ka bétéduo ni, bákpali katɔ béte Kristoƒuɔ bawɔdi bamɛni kalɛ na baƒɔ Katɔti Kɔyu.
44008016	Ɔsika úbalɛ uwi ɔmmɔ ni, bátaƒɔ tɔ Katɔti Kɔyu. Na ntu kani na bákpila-ma na Blɔti Yesu lɛnyi kemo.
44008017	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Petro ku Yohane béti enu básia-ma eli, na ama lɛnɔ báƒɔ Katɔti Kɔyu.
44008018	Ka Simon ɔ́nu ka si batalane bamɛni béti enu básia-ma eli na baaƒɔ́ Katɔti Kɔyu ni, úti egulabi ɔnii uute batalane bamɛni na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini,
44008019	“Bɛya na ami lɛnɔ lɛkɛ ɔyikun ɔmɛni ɔdi kalɛ na si líti enu lɛ́sia ɔdi biala lɛlɔ ni, na ɔƒɔ Katɔti Kɔyu.”
44008020	Amu na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ ku ƒula egulabi ƒui bɛdubɔnuku-ni. Takali anii adubɔkana Unwoti litela buye ku egulabi.
44008021	Alakana kalabla kamɛni kemo bɔkya, ɔsika ƒula kayi keeese siin na Katɔti anumi.
44008022	Da anumi die kasusu kekpidi kamɛni lɛlɔ na akpali katɔ. Ɔƒaalɛ Katɔti ɔdubuti ƒula likpidi ɔkyiɛ-ɔ na ƒula kasusu kekpidi kamɛni lɛlɔ.
44008023	Ɔsika ni, mɔɔnu ka ebo lɛnungyie likpidi, na likpidi bɔbla lɛnɔ lɛ́di-ɔ lɛlɔ!”
44008024	Amu na Simon ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Biveleku-mi kalɛ na ɔgbankpi ubendi ɔmɛni udu ulálɛku-mi.”
44008025	Amu uwi ɔni na Petro ku Yohane bédie Unwoti kenye na básu-ma litemi buni lɛmmɔ na Samaria ni, básɔ bénwini bésie Yerusalem, na bakɛ beedí teenye na lɛma lɛni nde Samaria kemo taasu-ma litemi buni.
44008026	Nsu Ƒilipo anwu ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi úbasu-nwu ɔnini, “Teesie na atásia ketele ulu ɔni nási Yerusalem ɔ́yu úsie Gasa mmɔ.”
44008027	Na ɔ́ta útásia ulu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Ka úsela ni, útásiaku ukyuli ɔdi ka ɔ́si ɔdubo. Ukyuli ɔmɛni ndi egulabi lɛlɔ ɔnune unengudi na Etiopia Uleku Ɔga ɔni baalɔ Kandake lɛga kadikɔ. Unengu ɔmɛni ɔ́si Yerusalem kesii kani na útákpali katɔ.
44008028	Na únwini ɔdubo na ɔpɔnkɔ kɛɛkɛ kemo, na ɔkɛ ɔɔká Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔni na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesaia únweni.
44008029	Amu na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́su Ƒilipo ɔnini, “Teesie na atásiaku ɔpɔnkɔ kɛɛkɛ ɔmɛni.”
44008030	Ƒilipo úkeli úsie-nwu kudɔ na uunú ka unengu ɔmmɔ ɔɔká Yesaia ɔku. Amu na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Eenú lɛla lɛni na aaká mɛni kalɔ?”
44008031	Amu na unengu ɔmɛni údie kenye ɔnini, “Oowo, dɛ na mabla asa na menu kalɔ ka ukyuli ɔdi uuubo na udie kalɔ ɔtina-mi?” Amu na úvele Ƒilipo ɔnii ubeduo kɛɛkɛ kemo na ɔsɔ ulie-nwu kudɔ.
44008032	Na etemila ani na ɔkya ɔɔká na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ndi ɔnii, “Báda-nwu béselaku aani koƒonu kɔni béti batádu. Na ɔkɛ aani koƒonu kɔni naaadaku-ni si beekúlo-ku linwini, na útebimi kenye lɛnɔ.
44008033	Bákya-nwu kɔƒa na útakɛ ukyuli ɔni náƒɔ-nwu kenye. Údie kaba kadi? Bi na ɔ́bla úse asa baadú-nwu na kayawi kamɛni kemo?”
44008034	Amu na unengu ɔmmɔ úye Ƒilipo ɔnini, “Yesaia ni, anwu ɔlati lɛlɔ na uutemi taasiku, munuu ukyuli bamba ɔdi lɛlɔ na uutemi taasiku?”
44008035	Amu na Ƒilipo úse kalɔ na úti Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔmmɔ na uudie litemi buni lɛmmɔ kalɔ taatina-nwu ɔ́si Yesu lɛlɔ.
44008036	-
44008037	Amu na uwi ɔni na bakɛ bésela ni, bátánu ntu bɔdi ka bunye likpo lɛdi na ulu kudɔ mmɔ. Na unengu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su Ƒilipo ɔnini, “Aanu ntu bɔdi. Bi ɔsu na naaakana Katɔti ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmmɔ bɔƒɔ?” Amu na Ƒilipo ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Si áƒɔ ádi ku ƒula kayi ƒui ni, adubɔkana.”
44008038	Amu na unengu ɔmɛni ɔ́su ɔnini, “Lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́di ka Yesu Kristo ndi Katɔti Ubidi.” Na ɔ́ya na bédi ɔpɔnkɔ kɛɛkɛ ɔmɛni bényene na báyu bétéduo ntu bɔmɛni kemo, na Ƒilipo ɔ́kpila-nwu ntu na Yesu Kristo lɛnyi kemo.
44008039	Amu na uwi ɔni na bávi bálɛ ntu bɔmɛni kemo ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kúti Ƒilipo kɔ́tɔlɔku, na unengu ɔmɛni ɔ́sɔ útanu-nwu. Na anwu lɛti ɔ́tɔlɔ ku kubiti.
44008040	Ɔmɛni kama ni, Ƒilipo ɔ́nu ɔ́ti ka unye Asoto ɔmankemo. Na ɔ́su litemi buni lɛmɛni na mmɔ bene ku lɛma lɛni nkya ulu lɛlɔ ƒui. Na úsie laa útédu Kaesarea ɔma lɛnɔ.
44009001	Lebo lɛmmɔ kemo ƒui ni, Saulo ɔ́bi ɔ́siaku Blɔti basiakune bammɔ ku lɛnungyie ɔnii ɔɔdú-ma. Na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Yudaƒuɔ ɔkpane unengudi kudɔ.
44009002	Mmɔ na úvele-nwu ɔnii ute-nwu ɔku na uti usienku Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ na Damasko kalɛ na ɔkɛ ɔyikun na uƒie banana ku beleku bani ƒui nsiaku bɔƒɔtaadi bɔwɔdi bɔmmɔ usienku Yerusalem.
44009003	Amu na uwi ɔni na ɔ́kpɛ uudé Damasko na kasusu kamɛni lɛlɔ ni, kɔnakunwi bukeye bɔdi búkeye bɔ́si katɔ na búbewi-nwu lɛlɔ.
44009004	Na ɔ́lɛ úbo kalɔ na únu ka lɛdi lɛdi lɛɛsu-nwu lɛnini, “Saulo, Saulo, bi ɔsu na eekpóku-mi lɛni?”
44009005	Amu na Saulo úye ɔnini, “Ati, ɔma na adi?” Amu na lɛdi lɛmɛni lídie kenye ɔnini, “Ami ndi Yesu ɔni na eekpóku kpakplaa.
44009006	Ɔƒaani ni, ta na eteesie ɔmankemo. Badubɔsu-ɔ lɛla lɛni na ɔlɛka abla.”
44009007	Amu na bekyuli bani na ama ku Saulo bakɛ mmɔ bágyini. Bénu butemi bɔmɛni, nsu bátanu ukyuli ɔdi.
44009008	Amu ka Saulo ɔ́ta únye na úbimi anumi ni, ɔ́sɔ ulanu. Amu na bákpanku-nwu bétéduoku Damasko ɔmankemo.
44009009	Na úlie mmɔ emeyi atɛ ɔni na ulánu, uládi na ulani lɛnɔ.
44009010	Amu na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔƒɔtaadine ɔdi ɔkya Damasko ɔni baalɔ Anania. Na Blɔti údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina-nwu na ɔ́lɔ-nwu ɔnii, “Anania!” Amu na ɔ́tuna-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, ami mɛni!”
44009011	Amu na Blɔti ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ta, na asia ulu ɔni baalɔ banii Ligeen lɛlɔ, na esie Yuda kesii na etéye Tarsoni ɔni baalɔ Saulo lɛlɔ. Ɔkya mmɔ ɔɔkpali katɔ teevele-mi.
44009012	Ɔsika líidie lɛ́tina-nwu ka ukyuli ɔni baalɔ Anania ɔdubo ubeti enu ɔsia-nwu lɛlɔ na ɔsɔ utaanu.”
44009013	Mmɔ na Anania údie kenye ɔnini, “Blɔti, línu na kesii biala kalala kani udu na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔɔbla baƒɔtaadine na Yerusalem!
44009014	Na búunu ka ɔ́ƒɔ ɔku ɔ́siku ɔkpane unengudi kudɔ banii ubeƒie baƒɔtaadine bani nkya Damasko ƒui!”
44009015	Nsu Blɔti ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Teesie, na atábla kalɛ na lɛ́su-ɔ. Ɔsika ami lɛ́ɛƒuna Saulo aani mina ukyuli ɔni meti mina litemi buni lɛmɛni mesienku ama bani naaadi Israelƒuɔ ku baga anumi ku Israelƒuɔ ƒui kudɔ.
44009016	Na ndubɔtina-nwu kalɛ na ɔlɛka ubo abi na ami ɔsu.”
44009017	Anwuɔsu Anania úsie na útánu Saulo na úti enu ɔ́sia-nwu lɛlɔ, na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ɔnwa Saulo, Blɔti Yesu ɔni nédie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina-a na ulu lɛlɔ ni, anwu nátala-mi ɔ́kya-a kalɛ na asɔ ataanu na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔƒɔ-ɔ lɛlɔ kemo ƒui.”
44009018	Kɔnakunwi ni, ɔ́bla Saulo aani si akpa adi ámami ási nwuna anumi lɛlɔ na ɔ́sɔ ɔɔnu. Na ɔ́ta na ɔ́ya na bákpila-nwu ntu.
44009019	Na ka ɔ́di adila adi ni, ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kɛ ɔyikun. Amu na Saulo úlie baƒɔtaadine bani nkya Damasko mmɔ kudɔ emeyi adi.
44009020	Na uwi ɔmmɔ kani na úsie Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ útásu Yesu lɛlɔ litemi ka Katɔti Ubidi na ɔdi.
44009021	Amu na bekyuli bani ƒui nénu-nwu litemi lɛmɛni ni, ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye. Na béye lɛlɔ banini, “Ɔɔɔdi ukyuli ɔmɛni nkɛ mɔɔdú Yesu kama basiakune na Yerusalem uwi ɔni yoo? Na búnu lɛnɔ ka nka baƒɔtaadine na úbo úbeƒie úsienku bakpane benengu.”
44009022	Amu na Saulo úsie anumi geen na nwuna litemi bɔsu kemo. Na Yudaƒuɔ bani nkya Damasko mmɔ ɔdi biala útakana lɛla lɛdi bɔsu. Na údie kalɔ ɔ́tina-ma ka Yesu ndi Kristo.
44009023	Emeyi adi kama ni, Yudaƒuɔ bása na bábla kasusu ka badubadu-nwu.
44009024	Nsu bekyuli badi bábasu Saulo ka baawia-nwu badu. Ɔmɛni ɔsu bekisine bamɛni baagyumana kɔyakun kɔni baasia taalɛ na beeduo ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo kalɛ na bakɛ-nwu badu.
44009025	Amu na nwuna badi bani ndi baƒɔtaadine mmɔ béti-nwu bákya kagyigyɛ kemo na báyula-nwu básiku kowodu liƒi na ɔ́lɛ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo usientɛ!
44009026	Amu na ɔni na útéduo Yerusalem ni, ɔ́wia ka nka uduo baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ akɔ. Nsu ama lɛnɔ báyia-nwu. Bábu ka bɔtɔlɔ na ɔda-ma.
44009027	Amu na Barnaba útiku-nwu úsienku batalane bamɛni kudɔ na ɔ́su-ma kalɛ na Saulo ɔ́nu Blɔti ɔni na úsela Damasko. Ɔ́su-ma litemi lɛni na Blɔti ɔ́su-nwu ku litemi buni lɛni na ɔ́su ku kayi buse na Yesu lɛnyi kemo na Damasko.
44009028	Amu na báƒɔ-nwu bákya bana akɔ. Na ɔ́si uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔ́kya-ma akɔ uwi biala na ɔɔsu Blɔti lɛlɔ litemi na Yerusalem.
44009029	Amu na Yudaƒuɔ banii muutemi Griki na baalɔ-ma banii Helaƒuɔ badi ku Saulo bákya unyeƒi ɔdi na báyɔ ka badu-nwu.
44009030	Amu na uwi ɔni na baƒɔtaadine bamɛni badi bénu ka bekyuli bamɛni baawia-nwu badu ni, bétiku-nwu bésienku Kaesarea na bávinku-nwu bésienku nwuna ɔma ɔni ndi Tarso.
44009031	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, baƒɔtaadine bani nkya Yudea ku Galilea ku Samaria kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, bákɛ bɔnwuna na basɔ balayia. Bákɛ kayi buse ku ɔkplu bɔkya ɔkɛnku Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun lɛlɔ. Na bémomo bébu na béteeti ɔbu teete Blɔti.
44009032	Amu ka Petro ɔkɛ ɔɔví taatánu Kristoƒuɔ bani ƒui na nwuna bɔvi kemo ni, úsie útánu baƒɔtaadine bani nkya ɔma ɔni baalɔ Lida.
44009033	Amu na útánu ɔnana ɔdi na ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo ɔni baalɔ Enea ka ɔ́ƒɛ uwi kalɔ akwa maane sɔɔn.
44009034	Na ka Petro ɔ́nu-nwu ni, ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Enea, nu! Yesu Kristo ɔ́bwi-ɔ! Ta nye! Na abuma ƒula atɛla.” Na mmɔ kani na ɔ́ta únye ku ɔlɔkplu.
44009035	Na ka bánu ka Enea ɔkɛ uusié taavi ɔsu ni, Lida ku Saron lɛma kemo bekyuli ƒui béti lɛlɔ béte Blɔti.
44009036	Ɔmɛni kama ni, uleku ɔdi ɔkya Yopa ɔni baalɔ Tabita. Na Griki lɛdi kemo ni, anwu baalɔ banii Dorka na nwuna kalɔ ndi kaƒɛ. Ɔdi ɔƒɔtaadine ɔni na útaabla lɛƒɔndia teete nwuna bakpana uwi pii.
44009037	Amu na ɔlɛ úbebo-nwu na úkpi. Amu na nwuna bakpana bákpila-nwu na báklibi-nwu béti bétése katu taasia ɔtɔ ɔtɔdi ɔdi kemo.
44009038	Amu na uwi ɔni na bénu ka Petro úbo ɔkya Lida ni, na ka Lida ude Yopa ɔsu ni, bátala nkyuli inyɔ badi banii betévele-nwu na ɔsiaku-ma lɛgba lɛgba na ubo Yopa.
44009039	Amu na anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́ta ɔ́siaku-ma, na ka ɔ́nya úbeduo ni, bétiku-nwu bésienku kesii kani na Dorka ɔtɛ. Na bekpinele bani nkya mmɔ ƒui bábaka bámana-nwu na beewulo. Na bada lɛwu lɛni na Dorka ɔ́ka úte-ma baatina Petro.
44009040	Amu na Petro ɔ́su bana ƒui ɔnii bavi balɛ ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo, na ɔ́lɛ akɔnkɔ na ɔ́kpali katɔ. Amu na únwini anumi ɔ́tina Dorka na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Dorka, ta!” Mmɔ kani na úbimi anumi. Na ka ɔ́nya ɔ́nu Petro ni, ɔ́ta úlie.
44009041	Amu na Petro úte-nwu kɔnu na anwu lɛnɔ úƒie-ku ɔ́da na ɔ́ta únye. Amu na Petro ɔ́sɔ ɔ́lɔ baƒɔtaadine ku bekpinele bammɔ ƒui úboku. Na úti-nwu ɔ́kya-ma lɛkɔkɔ.
44009042	Amu na litemi lɛmɛni lígyingya lɛ́kya ɔmankemo ƒui, na bekyuli pii báƒɔ Blɔti bádi.
44009043	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Petro úlie Yopa ɔma ɔmɛni kemo útu uwi na Simon ɔni mɔɔbla bebuo lɛku lɛlɔ kabla mmɔ kudɔ.
44010001	Lebo lɛmmɔ ni, ɔnana ɔdi úlie Kaesarea ɔma kemo ɔni baalɔ banii Kornelio. Ɔdi unengu úte Romaƒuɔ bekpone.
44010002	Ɔdi ukyuli ɔbuni, na anwu ku nwuna kaduli bekyuli ƒui beeti ɔbu teete Katɔti. Ukyuli ɔmɛni úteete bekyuli ala ku nwuna kayi ƒui, na ɔɔyɔ́ katɔ bɔkpali lɛnɔ.
44010003	Limeyi lɛdi ɔƒiiwi lɛdɔ ɛtɛ kemo ni, ɔ́nu budie bɔtina bɔdi. Na budie taatina bɔmɛni kemo ni, ɔ́nu ka Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi ɔ́si úbo-nwu kudɔ. Na ɔ́lɔ-nwu ɔnini, “Kornelio.”
44010004	Amu ka Kornelio ɔ́nu-nwu ni, liƒu lɛ́da-nwu geen. Amu na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, bi na aawia?” Amu na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmɛni ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ƒula bekyuli ala bute ku ƒula katɔ bɔkpali ni, búduo Katɔti kudɔ.
44010005	Tala bekyuli badi na besie Yopa na batákpanku ɔnana ɔni baalɔ Simon Petro beboku.
44010006	Uli Simon ɔni nli ɛpu kudɔ na ɔɔbla bebuo lɛku lɛlɔ kabla mmɔ kudɔ.”
44010007	Amu ka Katɔti ɔtu ɔmɛni ɔ́tɔlɔ ni, Kornelio ɔ́lɔ nwuna kaduli nkyuli inyɔ ku bekpone bani mɔɔgyumana-nwu mmɔ akɔ unwi ɔni lɛnɔ ndi ukyuli ɔbuni.
44010008	Na ɔ́su-ma lɛla lɛni nálɛ, na ɔ́tala-ma ɔnii beteesie Yopa.
44010009	Amu ka kadi kégye na bakɛ bésela na badaku ɔma ɔmɛni bɔkpɛ bude ni, Petro ɔ́kɔ úsie nwuna lɛsa lili ɔnii utákpali katɔ ɔƒiiwi.
44010010	Kɔka kúbo kɔɔda-nwu, nsu uwi ɔmmɔ na benye baanwá adila. Amu na ɔ́bla aani lɛlɛɛ kemo na úduo.
44010011	Mmɔ na ɔ́nu ka kayaa kébimi, na ɔ́nu kɔdi bonwu kɔdi ka bada kuna ekpo ene ani ƒui na kɔ́si kɔɔyu kalɔ.
44010012	Na kɔdi kɔmɛni kemo ni, bebuo lidu lidu pii ku balakpi ku baasɛ lɛnɔ bakya.
44010013	Amu na únu ka lɛdi lɛdi lɛɛsu-nwu lɛnini, “Petro, ta, na adu akun.”
44010014	Amu na Petro ɔ́su ɔnini, “Oowo! Kudi kudii! Blɔti, ńteti bebuo bani abu Yudaƒuɔ bukisi ńtetuku kenye kudii!”
44010015	Lɛdi lɛmɛni lɛ́sɔ lɛ́su-nwu lɛnini, “Lɛla lɛni lɛlɔ na Katɔti úveli ɔ́bla kede kede ni, tasu anii liisé lɛlɔ!”
44010016	Ɔ́nu búdie bɔtina bɔmɛni kɔtɛ sɔɔn. Na kɔtɛdi kɔmɛni kama ni, béti kɔdi kɔmɛni bésienku katɔ.
44010017	Amu na uwi ɔmmɔ ni, lɛla lɛmɛni lɛkya lɛɛbla Petro dɛye dɛye, na úye lɛlɔ ɔnii, “Bi na ɔmɛni ɔɔtina?” Mmɔ kani na bekyuli bani na Kornelio ɔ́tala mmɔ bébeduo ɔma ɔmɛni kemo. Na ka bánu kaduli kani baawia ni, bébo bébenye kayakun.
44010018	Na benye beeye kesii kani na Simon Petro uli.
44010019	Amu na ɔni na Petro ulie ɔɔkali nwuna budie bɔtina bɔmɛni lɛlɔ na ulati lɛla lɛni na lɛdi ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́su-nwu kɔnini, “Nkyuli ɛtɛ bébo baawia-a.
44010020	Ta, na esie atánu-ma. Tayia ka asiaku-ma eteesie. Ami nátala-ma.”
44010021	Amu na Petro úsie útánu-ma na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ami ndi ukyuli ɔni na bɛɛwia. Bi nébo?”
44010022	Amu na básu-nwu banini, “Batu na bɔdi, bɔ́si Kornelio ɔni ndi Romaƒuɔ kekpo unengu kudɔ. Ɔdi ukyuli ɔbuni na ɔɔbu Katɔti. Na Yudaƒuɔ ƒui baayɔ́-nwu litemi geen. Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi násu-nwu ɔnii ɔtala na babalɔ-ɔ na unu ƒula kenye kemo litemi.”
44010023	Anwuɔsu Petro ɔ́ya bébeduo-nwu kudɔ na ɔ́ƒɔ-ma aani nwuna baƒɔ kalɛ. Ka kadi kégye ni, anwu ku baƒɔtaadine badi bani nási Yopa básiaku-ma bátɔlɔ.
44010024	Amu na bétéduo Kaesarea limeyi lɛmmɔ kadi kegye. Amu na uwi ɔmɛni ni, Kornelio ɔ́sala nwuna kaduli bekyuli lisu ku nwuna bakpana badi na belie bagya Petro bubo.
44010025	Amu ka Petro ɔ́nya úbeduo nwuna kaduli ni, Kornelio ɔ́lɛ akɔnkɔ na Petro anumi na úboku lili kalɔ.
44010026	Amu na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ta nye! Ami lɛnɔ ukyuli na ndi.”
44010027	Na ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, ɔ́ta únye. Na ka bátɛmi blii ni, Kornelio útiku-nwu úsienku kesii kani na bekyuli bakladi bása belie.
44010028	Na Petro ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛgyi ka bula Yudaƒuɔ ɔda bubo útete-mi kuƒi ka nka liduo ukyuli ɔni naaadi bula kadi ukyuli ɔdi kesii iye liti lɛlɔ lɛmana-nwu lɛlɔ. Nsu Katɔti údie ɔ́tina-mi ka ntanu ukyuli ɔdi aani ukyuli keeke.
44010029	Anwuɔsu ka bánya bábalɔ-mi kani na lɛ́ta líbo. Na bi ɔsu na bɛɛwia-mi?”
44010030	Na ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Kornelio ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ɔbla emeyi ene mɛni aani uwi ɔmɛni kemo ka nkya mɔɔkpali katɔ ɔƒiiwi aani kalɛ na mɔɔyɔ́ bɔbla uwi ndi uwi. Na kɔnakunwi ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́si úbenye-mi anumi, na ɔkya awu ɔni muukeye na ɔɔtu anumi!
44010031	-
44010032	Ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, 'Kornelio, ƒula lɛƒɔndia ku ƒula katɔ bɔkpali ƒui uudú Katɔti kudɔ! Na ɔƒaani ni, tala bekyuli badi na besie Yopa na batálɔ Simon Petro ɔni nli Simon ɔni mɔɔbla bebuo lɛku kabla na uli ɛpu kudɔ.'
44010033	Ɔmɛni ɔsu na lɛ́tala lɛni babalɔ-ɔ, na awɔ lɛnɔ ábla kaduɛ ka áta lɛgba lɛgba ébo. Anwuɔsu na bulie bɔgya-a na Unwoti anumi ka abasu-bu litemi lɛni na ɔ́su-ɔ ɔnii su-bu.”
44010034	Amu na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Lɛ́nu lɛ́ti nwaa ka Blɔti ulánu bekyuli anumi.
44010035	Mmomu kalɔ biala lɛlɔ ukyuli ɔni muuboku lɛlɔ kalɔ teete-nwu na ɔɔbla nwuna lɛyɔla ni, anwu na ɔɔƒɔ́.
44010036	Lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́di ka bínu litemi buni lɛni na básu béte Israelƒuɔ ka ni, ɔkɛ Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ ni, badubɔkɛ keyi buɛɛ. Na anwu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni lɛnɔ ndi bayawine ƒui Ɔti.
44010037	Na bɛgyi ala enengudi ani nálɛ na Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui ani nése kalɔ ási Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ uwi ɔni na Yohane ɔ́kɔ lɛsa ɔ́si ntu bɔkpila ɔdi lɛlɔ kama.
44010038	Na bínu lɛnɔ kalɛ na Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna Yesu ɔni nási Nasaret ɔni na úti nwuna Kɔyu úse-nwu likpo na úti ɔyikun lɛnɔ úte-nwu. Na ɔ́kɛ útaavi taabla lɛbuni na útaabwi bani ƒui na ayu ekpidi eekpóku, ɔsika Katɔti ɔsiaku-nwu.
44010039	Abu muudie kenye na ala ani na úbabla na Israel ku Yerusalem. Mmɔ na bádu-nwu na ugyii lɛlɔ.
44010040	Nsu ni, Katɔti ɔ́sɔ ɔ́ya na ɔ́ta ɔ́si kekpine na limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛlɔ, na ɔ́ya na bekyuli bánu-nwu.
44010041	Nsu ni, ɔɔɔdi bekyuli ƒui nánu-nwu. Mmomu abu bani na ɔ́ƒuna ni, abu bɔ́nu-nwu. Na bɔ́di na bɔ́niku-nwu lɛnɔ na nwuna bɔsɔ bɔta kama.
44010042	Na abu na ɔ́tala ɔnii bɔsu litemi buni lɛmɛni na kesi kesii. Na budie kenye ka ni, Katɔti néti Yesu ɔ́bla bekpine ku bayawine ƒui litemi ɔtɛne.
44010043	Na Katɔti kenye bediene bénweni básiku-nwu lɛlɔ ka ukyuli biala ɔni maƒɔ-nwu madi ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ nwuna ekpidi udie-nwu lɛlɔ na anwu Yesu lɛnyi kemo.”
44010044	Amu na uwi ɔni na Petro unye ɔɔsu etemila amɛni ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́yu na kɔ́ƒɔ bani nlie muunú Petro litemi mmɔ ƒui lɛlɔ kemo!
44010045	Yudaƒuɔ baƒɔtaadine bani násiaku Petro bébo mmɔ ni, litemi lɛmɛni lítakɔsi na lɛ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye! Ɔsika Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́yu kubo bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ lɛnɔ lɛlɔ.
44010046	Nsu balakana ɔkɔ bɔsia, ɔsika beenú ka beetemi adi lidu lidu na beemwi Blɔti. Amu na Petro úye ɔnini,
44010047	“Ka báƒɔ Katɔti Kɔyu aani kalɛ na abu lɛnɔ bɔ́ƒɔ ni, bulakana buni bɔnii bulakpila-ma ntu.”
44010048	Anwuɔsu ɔ́ya na bákpila-ma ntu na Yesu Kristo lɛnyi kemo. Ɔmɛni kama ni, bévele Petro banii ulie-ma kudɔ emeyi adi.
44011001	Uwi útetu asa na batalane ku baƒɔtaadine bakladi na Yudea bénu ka kadi bamba bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ lɛnɔ báƒɔ Blɔti litemi lɛmmɔ.
44011002	Anwuɔsu ka Petro únwini úsie Yerusalem ni, Yudaƒuɔ baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ bátatunaku-nwu, na básu-nwu banini,
44011003	“Awɔ ábla unwi ku baƒɔ bani naaasiaku Yudaƒuɔ ala bɔtina, na bɛ́kya kɔnu bɛ́di na lɛkyami linwi kemo!”
44011004	Amu na Petro údie etemila amɛni ƒui kalɔ ɔ́tina-ma na ɔ́su ɔnini,
44011005	“Uwi ɔni na nkya Yopa na mɔɔkpali katɔ ni, lɛ́nu ala budie bɔtina bɔdi. Mmɔ na lɛ́nu kɔdi bonwu kɔdi ka báda kuna ekpo ene na kɔ́si katɔ kúbayu.
44011006	Bebuo lidu lidu ƒui bakya kɔdi bonwu kɔmɛni kemo, bebuo bani mbo agyobi ku bebuo bani mɔɔkpɛ́ kalɔ ku baasɛ bekpidi lɛnɔ.
44011007	Na línu ka lɛdi lɛdi lɛɛsu-mi lɛnii, 'Petro! Du bana akɔ ɔdi biala na akun.'
44011008	Amu na lídie kenye nnini, 'Oowo! Kudi kudii! Ńtakun lɛla lɛni na Yudaƒuɔ bukisi kudii.'
44011009	Nsu lɛdi lɛmɛni lɛ́sɔ lɛ́su lɛnini, 'Lɛla lɛni na Katɔti úveli ɔ́bla kede kede ni, tasu anii liisé lɛlɔ.'
44011010	Ɔmɛni ɔ́lɛ kɔtɛ sɔɔn. Na nwuna kama ni, kɔdi bonwu kɔmɛni ku bebuo bani nkya-ku kemo mmɔ ƒui báta bákɔ katɔ na bátáyii bákya na kayaa.
44011011	Na uwi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ kani ni, nkyuli ɛtɛ bani bátala banii bebetiku-mi besienku Kaesarea mmɔ bébeduo kaduli kani kemo na nli.
44011012	Amu na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́su-mi kɔnii nsiaku-ma nteesie, na ntayia. Mina banwani ɛku bamɛni básiaku-mi, na búsie bútéduo ɔnana ɔni nátala batu ɔ́kya-mi mɛni kudɔ.
44011013	Anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́su-bu kalɛ na Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina-nwu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Wia Simon Petro.
44011014	Na anwu matina kalɛ na wabla na awɔ ku ƒula kaduli bekyuli ƒui bɛdubɔkɛ bɔƒɔ.'
44011015	Na ɔmɛni kama ni, líse kalɔ mɔɔsu-ma litemi buni lɛmɛni. Nsu asa na meduo litemi buni lɛmɛni ɔlati kemo ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kúbo na kɔ́ƒɔ-ma lɛlɔ kemo ƒui aani kalɛ na kɔ́ƒɔ abu lɛnɔ lɛlɔ kemo ƒui na kalɔ kesekɔ!
44011016	Amu na líti kasusu lísienku uwi ɔni na Blɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Sɔsɔ ni, Yohane úti ntu ɔ́kpila bekyuli. Nsu ni, Katɔti ɔdubuti nwuna Kɔyu ɔkpila-mii.'
44011017	Na ka Unwoti néte bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ litela lɛmɛni aani kalɛ na úti úte-bu uwi ɔni na bɔ́ƒɔ Blɔti Yesu Kristo bɔ́di ni, naaakana Katɔti ulu butile.”
44011018	Uwi ɔni na bénu etemila amɛni ni, báda bana unyeƒi báya na bése kalɔ beemwi Unwoti. Na básu banini, “Sɔsɔ ni, Katɔti úte bekyuli bamba lɛnɔ kuƒi ka benwini bebo-nwu kudɔ na bakɛ ngba.”
44011019	Na uwi ɔni na ala amɛni aalɛ́ ni, baƒɔtaadine bani nékeli na lɛbibo lɛni nébo-ma lɛlɔ na Steƒano bɔdu ɔsu ni, bésie bétédu Ƒoinike ku Kipro ku Antiokia lɛma kemo. Na bakɛ baasu litemi buni lɛmmɔ, nsu ɔɔɔdi bekyuli ƒui, mmomu Yudaƒuɔ lɛti.
44011020	Nsu ni, baƒɔtaadine bani nási Kipro ku Kirene bésie Antiokia bátásu Blɔti Yesu lɛlɔ litemi béte Grikiƒuɔ.
44011021	Na ka Blɔti ɔyikun ɔkya-ma akɔ ɔsu ni, baƒɔtaadine bammɔ bémomo bébu.
44011022	Uwi ɔni na baƒɔtaadine bani nkya Yerusalem bénu lɛla lɛni nébo na mmɔ ni, bátala Barnaba banii uteesie Antiokia.
44011023	Ka útéduo mmɔ na ɔ́nu kalɛ na Katɔti úbunku-ma ni, ebiti áda-nwu geen na ɔ́kya-ma ogya úbu ɔnii benye Blɔti kama kpakplaa ku bana kayi ƒui.
44011024	Barnaba ɔdi ukyuli ɔbuni ɔni mbo bɔƒɔtaadi, na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui. Nwuna kebunku ɔsu ni, baƒɔtaadine bammɔ bémomo bébu.
44011025	Amu na Barnaba úsie Tarso ɔnii utáwia Saulo na mmɔ.
44011026	Uwi ɔni na ɔ́nu-nwu ni, úti-nwu úboku Antiokia na bana inyɔ ƒui bélie mmɔ lɛkwa limodi. Mmɔ na bakya baatina bekyuli pii ala. Amu na Antiokia mmɔ ni, bése kalɔ baalɔ baƒɔtaadine banii Kristoƒuɔ.
44011027	Uwi ɔmɛni kani kemo ni, Katɔti kenye bediene badi bási Yerusalem bébo Antiokia.
44011028	Amu na bana akɔ unwi ɔni baalɔ Agabo ni, ɔ́ta únye na Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun kemo na ɔ́su ɔnii kɔka kubendi kɔdi kɔdubo kayawi ƒui lɛlɔ. Ɔmɛni úbebo uwi ɔni na Klaudio ɔɔdi lɛga.
44011029	Anwuɔsu baƒɔtaadine bamɛni bábla kasusu ka beyi ala bemene banwa bani nkya Yudea. Na bana akɔ ɔdi biala úte kalɛ na wakana.
44011030	Ka béyi ala amɛni ni, béti-nya béte Barnaba ku Saulo na béti bésienku Yudea baƒɔtaadine benengu bammɔ.
44012001	Amu na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Ɔga Herode úƒie baƒɔtaadine badi kalɛ na ɔdu-ma.
44012002	Amu na ɔ́ya na békulo Yakobo lili ɔni ndi Yohane ɔnwani.
44012003	Na ka ɔ́nu ɔ́ti ka ebiti áda Yudaƒuɔ na lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla mɛni ɔsu ni, úƒie Petro lɛnɔ na uwi ɔni kemo na baadi bodobodo ɔni néteƒu.
44012004	Na béti-nwu bákya ɔtɔ kesii kani na bagyumanane ine akpa ene baavumanaku lɛlɔ na baagyumana-nwu. Herode kasusu ndi ka nka udie-nwu ute kadi na bana limeyi bamba lɛni baalɔ Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi bɔdi kama.
44012005	Anwuɔsu bagyumanane bamɛni bágyumana-nwu na ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo kaduɛ. Nsu ni, baƒɔtaadine bákpali katɔ na bévele nwuna lili kpakplaa.
44012006	Amu na uwi ɔni na Herode ɔ́kali ka ɔdubudie Petro ute kadi si kadi kégye ni, Petro ɔtɛ ɔɔlɛɛ na bagyumanane inyɔ ntɛ. Na bébo-nwu kɔgba báda-ma. Na bagyumanane babambadi benye baagyumana kayakun.
44012007	Kɔnakunwi ni, bukeye bɔdi búbewi ɔtɔ mmɔ. Na Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi úbenye Petro kudɔ. Amu na ɔ́lɛ-nwu kɔnu lɛmangba buɛɛ, na ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔnini, “Babla, na ata!” Na kɔgba kɔmmɔ kɔ́lɛ-nwu enu kúwi kalɔ.
44012008	Amu na ɔtu ɔmɛni ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ti ƒula lɛwu ku lɛgbanvuo kya.” Amu na Petro ɔ́bla lɛni. Na ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ti kɔdi bi lɛlɔ, na asiaku-mi.”
44012009	Na Petro ɔ́ta ɔ́siaku-nwu, na ɔ́vi ɔ́lɛ ɔtɔ ɔmɛni kemo. Uwi ɔmɛni ƒui kemo ni, ɔ́kali ɔnii kɔna na uugyé.
44012010	Amu na bávi bálɛ kayakun kedeedi ku kanyɔdi lɛnɔ. Na ka bétédu lɛbuala kayakun kenengudi kani nkya késie ɔma kakɛ ni, aka ɔlatidi kálɛmi. Na bávi aka lɛnɔ. Na ka bésie anumi blii ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́da-nwu ɔ́nyonu.
44012011	Na ɔmmɔ kama ni, Petro úbati lɛla lɛni nébo. Na ɔ́su lɛlɔ ɔnini, “Sɔsɔ geen na ɔdi ka ni, Unwoti nátala ɔtu ɔmɛni ɔnii ubedie-mi ɔsiku Herode enu kemo ku ala ani na Yudaƒuɔ baasusu ka badubɔbla-mi lɛnɔ kemo!”
44012012	Na ka úti kasusu blii ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Maria ɔni ndi Yohane Marko uni kesii. Mmɔ na baƒɔtaadine pii bása bewi baakpali katɔ.
44012013	Amu ka únye kayakun kani nkya ulu kenye mmɔ ɔ́kpali ni, ulekubi ɔni baalɔ Rode úbo ɔnii ubalɛmi.
44012014	Na ka únu Petro lɛdi ɔ́ti ni, ebiti áda-nwu ávili! Útalɛmi ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ, mmomu úkeli úsie nwuna badi akɔ na útásu-ma ka Petro úbo unye kegbuta kama.
44012015	Nsu bátaƒɔ bátadi na básu-nwu banini, “Tabatɔlɔ-bu mɛni!” Amu na ɔ́mua unye kpakplaa ka sɔsɔ na ɔdi. Amu na básu lɛlɔ banini, “Ɔƒaalɛ nwuna ukpine nébo unye mmɔ.”
44012016	Amu na uwi ɔmɛni kemo ƒui ni, Petro ɔ́mua unye uubó kegbuta kɔnu. Na ka bésie bátálɛmi na bánu-nwu ni, ebiti átakɔsi na áda-ma.
44012017	Amu na ɔ́ya na bába lɛsɛ. Na ɔ́su-ma ala ani nébo ku kalɛ na Unwoti úbedie-nwu ɔ́lɛku ɔtɔ kemo. Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii basu Yakobo ku bakladi lɛla lɛni nálɛ. Ɔmɛni kama ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ mmɔ úsie kesii bamba.
44012018	Amu na kadi bugye kemo ni, owogyo ubendi ɔdi ɔ́ƒɔ bagyumanane ɔtɔ katɛnkɔ mmɔ. Na béye lɛlɔ banii, “Wɛ geen na Petro ɔ́vi ɔƒɛni?”
44012019	Amu uwi ɔni na Herode ɔ́wia Petro bɔyii kalɔ na útabla-nwu nwaa ni, ɔ́ya na bétéƒie bagyumanane leevu-ɛku bammɔ béboku. Na ɔ́tɛku-ma litemi na ɔ́du-ma kukpi kɔtɔ, na bádu-ma. Na ɔmmɔ kama ni, Herode ɔ́tɔlɔ Yudea úsie Kaesarea útélie mmɔ uwi ɔdi.
44012020	Uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, Herode úti kɔnyi kati kati kɔdi ɔ́kya Tiro ku Sidonƒuɔ. Amu na batu badi bási Tiro ku Sidon mmɔ bébo-nwu kudɔ banii babanu-nwu. Amu na békeli bátátua Blasto ɔni ndi Herode kaduli lɛlɔ ɔnune banii utévele Herode na ɔya na unwi bɔbla bubo bana lɛma inyɔ bɔmɛni ku Herode ntɛ. Ɔsika Herode kalɔ lɛlɔ na baakɛ́ bana adila taasiku.
44012021	Amu na limeyi lɛni na Ɔga Herode úte-ma ni, ɔ́kya nwuna agala na útélie nwuna lɛgaboku lɛlɔ na úse kalɔ ku butemi.
44012022	Na nwuna butemi bɔwɔlɔ ni, bekyuli bamɛni bémwi-nwu ku bɔva na básu banini, “Unwoti Ɔyikune geen muutemi! Na ɔɔɔdi ukyuli ɔyawine!”
44012023	Kɔnakunwi ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi úbo Herode ɔ́ƒiɛmi kalɔ, ɔsika anwu úteti bumwi útete Katɔti. Na beklubi béyi-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui, na úkpi.
44012024	Amu na Blɔti litemi buni lɛmɛni lígyingya geen, na baƒɔtaadine lɛnɔ bémomo bébu.
44012025	Amu uwi ɔni na Barnaba ku Saulo báwɔlɔ bana kabla kani bátala-ma bɔbla ni, bénwini bási Yerusalem na béti Yohane ɔni mɔɔdi ɔti lɛnyi Marko bébunku lɛlɔ.
44013001	Na Antiokia ni, Blɔti kenye bediene ku ala batinane badi bakya baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa lɛmmɔ kemo. Na ama ndi Barnaba ku Simeon ɔni bátaalɔ Ukyuli Otondi ku Lukio ɔni nási Kirene ku Manaen ɔni ndi Ɔga Herode ɔvinkpana ɔ́si lɛnamu uwi ku Saulo.
44013002	Amu ka bakya beemwi Blɔti na beelie kɔka ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kútemiku-ma na kɔ́su kɔnini, “Bidie Barnaba ku Saulo bise bite kabla kani ɔsu na lɛ́lɔ-ma.”
44013003	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ka benengu bammɔ bélie kɔka na bákpali katɔ na bana lili ni, bédie-ma ulu.
44013004	Na ka Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́tina-ma ulu ni, bésie ɔma ɔni baalɔ Seleukia. Mmɔ na béti ɔkɔlɔ bávia bésie ntu ntɛ kalɔ kani baalɔ Kipro.
44013005	Na ka bétéduo ɔma ɔni baalɔ Salami kemo ni, bésie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ bátásu Blɔti litemi. Na Marko Yohane lɛnɔ ɔ́siaku-ma aani bana ubunkune kalɛ.
44013006	Na ɔmɛni kama ni, bávi bétédu ɔma ɔni baalɔ Paƒo. Na mmɔ bátánu Yudani ɔni mɔɔƒɛ evo na úti lɛlɔ ɔ́bla ɔkɔ kenye udiene ɔni baalɔ Bar-Yesu.
44013007	Na uvone ɔmɛni ku aban ɔgadine ɔnundane ɔni baalɔ Sergio Paulo badi bakpana. Na ɔgadine ɔmɛni ɔ́lɔ Barnaba ku Saulo ɔnii bebo babanu-nwu, ɔsika ɔɔwia ka unu Blɔti litemi.
44013008	Nsu ka bésie ni, uvone ɔmmɔ ɔni na baalɔ lɛnɔ banii Elima na Griki lɛdi kemo ni, ɔ́kyaku-ma unyeƒi. Na ɔ́wia ka unwini ɔgadine ɔmɛni kasusu udie litemi lɛni na Saulo ku Barnaba baasu lɛlɔ.
44013009	-
44013010	Nsu Saulo ɔni lɛnɔ baalɔ banii Paulo ni, ɔ́nu uvone ɔmɛni ku livoƒi, na údie lɛdi ɔ́kya-nwu ku Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun ɔnini, “Awɔ Satan ubidi, éyi ku katɔlɔ ku lɛkwɛnkpi, na ekisi lɛbuni bɔbla, na aatu Blɔti litemi teenwini. Adubɔnuku-ni!
44013011	Unwoti ɔdubɔya na anumi abwɛ-ɔ, na asɔ alanu ɔƒɛ weti wetédu uwi ɔdi!” Mmɔ kani na nwuna anumi ábla suu, na ɔsɔ ulánu. Na úse kalɔ ɔɔka taamana mmɔ, na uuvele bekyuli ɔnii bada-nwu kɔnu.
44013012	Uwi ɔni na aban ɔgadine ɔmɛni ɔ́nu lɛla lɛmɛni ni, ɔ́bla-nwu kalɛ kadi, na ɔ́ƒɔ Blɔti litemi lɛmɛni ɔ́di.
44013013	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Paulo ku bani nsiaku-nwu béduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo na bátɔlɔ Paƒo bésie Perge ɔni nkya Pamƒilia. Mmɔ na Marko Yohane ɔ́da-ma ɔ́nyonu, na ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie Yerusalem.
44013014	Ka bási Perge ni, bátɔlɔ bésie Antiokia na Pisidia ɔmii lɛlɔ. Na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ni, bésie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ na betélie kalɔ na bekyuli bammɔ akɔ.
44013015	Na uwi ɔni na báka ala básiku Mose ɔda bubo ɔku ku Katɔti Kenye bediene bunweni kemo bawɔlɔ ni, kasalakɔ batɔnkune bammɔ básu banini, “Banwa, si bina akɔ ɔdi ubo litemi lɛni mɔɔkya ɔkplu na wasu ni, na ubo ubasu.”
44013016	Amu na Paulo ɔ́ta na ɔ́talaku kɔnu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii baba lɛsɛ, na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Israelƒuɔ ku amii bani naaadi Israelƒuɔ ƒui na bɛnii bɛɛbu Katɔti ni, bise atu na binu!
44013017	Katɔti ɔni na Israelƒuɔ baabu ni, ɔ́ƒuna bula bati kuuku na úte-ma kusɛ kusɛ. Na anwu ɔlati ɔ́tɔnku-ma ɔ́lɛku bekyuli kalɔ bɔkya kemo na Egyipte ku nwuna ɔyikun.
44013018	Na ɔ́nu-ma lɛlɔ na ketele kemo ɔni na bákɛ baaví laa na akwa aavlene kemo.
44013019	Na ɔ́kyula kɔlɔ akpa maatɛ bekyuli na Kanaan, na úti bana kɔlɔ kɔmɛni úte Israelƒuɔ aani bana kadikɔ.
44013020	Na ala amɛni ƒui álɛ na akwa eti yaalenwi kemo. “Na nwuna kama ni, Katɔti úte-ma litemi batɛne bani nádi-ma lɛlɔ útédu Kenye Udiene Samuel uwi.
44013021	Amu na bévele-nwu banii use ɔga ute-ma. Na Katɔti úte-ma Kis ubidi Saul ɔni nási Benyamin kaba kemo, na ɔ́di lɛga akwa aavlene.
44013022	Nsu Katɔti ɔ́da-nwu údie liboku lɛlɔ na úti Dawid úse lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ. Dawid ɔmɛni ɔdi ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Yese ubidi Dawid ɔdi ukyuli ɔni na mina kayi kaayɔ́, ɔsika anwu ɔdubɔbu-mi.'
44013023	“Na ɔ́si Dawid kaba kemo ni, Katɔti údie Ɔƒɔne ɔni ndi Yesu úte Israelƒuɔ aani kalɛ na úse-bu kenye.
44013024	Na asa na Yesu webo ni, Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane úbo úbasu ukyuli biala ka unwini kama ɔkya nwuna ekpidi na uti anumi ɔsia Katɔti lɛlɔ na bakpila-nwu ntu.
44013025	Uwi ɔni na Yohane kabla kadaku kawɔlɔkɔ budu ni, úye ɔnii, 'Bɛɛbu ka ami ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ? Oowo! Nsu ni, ɔkpɛ-mi kama ɔdubo, na ami ńtedu ka lɛbla kabla kadi lite-nwu muedi.'
44013026	“Banwa, amii bani ndi Abraham bebi ku amii bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ nsu bɛɛbu Katɔti ni, bɔƒɔ bɔmɛni búse búte bula ƒui!
44013027	Bekyuli bani nkya Yerusalem ku bana benengu bátanu Yesu bátati banii anwu ndi Ɔƒɔne ɔmmɔ. Nsu na nwuna bɔdu kemo ni, báya na Katɔti kenye bediene linyese lɛni na baaká na lɛnwunameyi biala lɛlɔ líbo lɛni.
44013028	Bátanu bɔƒiɔ bɔdi bátasiku-nwu lɛlɔ, nsu básu Pilato bani ɔya na badu-nwu.
44013029	Uwi ɔni na bábla ala ani na Katɔti Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔ́su na nwuna kukpi lɛlɔ báwɔlɔ ni, bámami-nwu básiku ugyii lɛlɔ bátáva na kaƒiɔtɔ kemo.
44013030	Nsu Katɔti ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́lɛku kekpine na ɔ́sɔ úbo uli ngba.
44013031	Emeyi ammɔ kemo ni, bekyuli bani na anwu ku-ma bási Galilea bésie Yerusalem ni, bánu-nwu uwi pii. Na ama ndi bekyuli bani muudie-nwu kenye na Israelƒuɔ anumi.
44013032	-
44013033	“Na ni, abu búbo mɛni bɔnii buuti litemi buni lɛmɛni buboku-mii, ka ni, Katɔti kenye kani na ɔ́su úse na bula banana bene uwi ni, kébo kéte lɛni na bula uwi lɛlɔ. Na aka ndi ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́ya na Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́ta úbo uli ngba. Ɔmɛni ndi lɛla lɛni lɛlɔ na Dawid únweni na nwuna kɔgya kunyɔdi kemo. Mmɔ ni, Katɔti ɔɔsu taasiku Yesu lɛlɔ ɔnini, 'Awɔ ndi mina ubi. Na ɔmwi ni, línwini-ɔ ɔti.'
44013034	Na Katɔti úse kenye úse ɔnii wagyila-nwu wasiku kekpine na wasɔ webelie ngba na ɔsɔ ulekpi kudii. Bénweni ɔmɛni bákya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo na kesii kani na Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Ndubute-ɔ kusɛ kusɛ kedee ɔni na líse kenye ka mete Dawid.'
44013035	Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su na Dawid kɔgya kɔbambadi kemo lɛnɔ ɔnini, 'Aláya na ƒula ukyuli kedee ɔmɛni webu na kaƒiɔtɔ kemo.'
44013036	“Litemi lɛmɛni lɛɛɛdanku Dawid, ɔsika úlie ɔ́bla Unwoti kabla na nwuna ngba bulie uwi ƒui aani kalɛ na Katɔti ɔlati ɔɔyɔ́, na úbekpi na báva-nwu na úbu lɛnɔ.
44013037	Nsu ukyuli ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́gyila ɔ́siku kekpine anwu ni, nwuna ɔlɔna útebu.
44013038	“Banwa, binu! Na Yesu ɔmɛni lɛnyi kemo ni, Katɔti ɔdubuti bina ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-mii.
44013039	Ukyuli biala ɔni náƒɔ Yesu ɔ́di ni, Katɔti ɔdubute-nwu ubo. Ɔmɛni ndi lɛla lɛni na Mose ɔda bubo bútakana bɔbla kudii.
44013040	Anwuɔsu bɛnu kaduɛ! Bitaya na Katɔti kenye bediene etemila ani básu alɛku-mii.
44013041	Ɔsika Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Amii bani naaabu mina litemi ni, bɛnu kaduɛ! Ɔsika ndubo lɛla lɛdi bɔbla na bina uwi lɛni na si ina bínu ka baasu-ni muedi ni, biláƒɔ biladi.' ”
44013042	Uwi ɔni na bási baalɛ kasalakɔ mmɔ ni, bekyuli bamɛni básu Paulo ku Barnaba banii si ɔbla na basɔ bebo bebetemi bete-ma na lɛnwunameyi lɛni nsia lɛlɔ.
44013043	Na ka bégyingya ni, Yudaƒuɔ pii ku bani nénwini Yudaƒuɔ na baayia Katɔti na kasalakɔ mmɔ básiaku Paulo ku Barnaba, na bákɛ beenú batalane bamɛni bɔlɛ ka benye lɛƒɔndia lɛni na Katɔti úti uute-ma mɛni kemo kpakplaa.
44013044	Lɛnwunameyi lɛni násia lɛmmɔ kama ni, kebu blii nka ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo bekyuli ƒui bésie kasalakɔ mmɔ béténu Blɔti litemi lɛni na baasu.
44013045	Na uwi ɔni na Yudaƒuɔ benengu bánu bekyuli lisu lɛni nébo kasalakɔ mmɔ ni, anumi égyie-ma, na bákyaku Paulo unyeƒi na bédumi-nwu.
44013046	Amu na Paulo ku Barnaba bése kayi na básu-ma banini, “Ɔlɛka bɔsu Katɔti litemi buni lɛmɛni buti bute Yudaƒuɔ kudeedi. Na ka bíni litemi lɛmɛni na bɛ́su bɛnii bilayɔ ngba bɔƒɔ bɔmɛni ɔsu ni, búti-ni búselaku bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ.
44013047	Ɔmɛni ndi bɔkada bɔni na Katɔti úti úte-bu ɔnii, 'Lɛ́bla-mii aani bukeye líte bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ kalɛ na biti bɔƒɔ biboku kayawi ɔkɔkɔ biala.' ”
44013048	Amu ka bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ bénu lɛla lɛni básu mmɔ ni, kubiti kɔ́da-ma, na bémwi Katɔti. Na bani ƒui na Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna úte ngba bɔƒɔ ni, bénwini baƒɔtaadine.
44013049	Na Katɔti litemi lígyingya lɛ́kya kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ƒui.
44013050	Amu na Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune bénwini bekyuli badi kasusu na Paulo ku Barnaba lɛlɔ. Na beleku bani lɛlɔ mbo ɔbu ku ɔma benengu ƒui bétiku otogyi na báta békpoku-ma na bágya-ma bálɛku ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo.
44013051	Nsu uwi ɔni na baalɛ́ ɔma ɔmɛni kemo ni, béveli bana lɛgba kalɔ ɔtumu béwi ɔma ɔmmɔ béti bátina ka ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli béni-ma. Ɔmɛni kama ni, bátɔlɔ bésie Ikonion.
44013052	Na bana kama basiakune ama ni, bákɛ lɛlɔyɔ básiku Katɔti Kɔyu kudɔ geen!
44014001	Amu ka bédu Ikonion lɛnɔ ni, Paulo ku Barnaba bésie kasalakɔ mmɔ. Na ka básu Yudaƒuɔ ku Grikiƒuɔ litemi buni lɛmmɔ ni, bana akɔ pii báƒɔ bádi.
44014002	Amu na Yudaƒuɔ bani nátaƒɔ Blɔti litemi lɛmɛni bátadi ni, béti unyeƒi ɔdi bákya bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ ku Paulo ku Barnaba ntɛ.
44014003	Nsu batalane bammɔ bákya ɔma ɔmɛni kemo bétu uwi básu litemi buni lɛmɛni ku ogya. Na Blɔti lɛnɔ údie nwuna bɔyɔ ɔ́tina geen na akɔla pii ani na bábla kemo.
44014004	Amu na ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo bekyuli béle akpa anyɔ, na badi básiaku Yudaƒuɔ kama, na badi lɛnɔ básiaku batalane bammɔ kama.
44014005	-
44014006	Uwi ɔni na ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli badi ku Yudaƒuɔ ku bana batɔnkune ƒui báta banii bebebo-ma atabi ni, batalane bammɔ bénu na békeli bátɔlɔ bésie Listra ku Derbe ku lɛma lɛni nkya amadɔ mmɔ.
44014007	Na básu litemi buni mmɔ.
44014008	Ka bésie Listra ni, bátánu ɔnana ɔni náƒɛ uwi kalɔ ɔ́si uwi ɔni na báwɔ-nwu. Na útata útesie kudii.
44014009	Úlie mmɔ uunú litemi buni lɛni na Paulo unye ɔɔsu. Na ka Paulo ɔ́nu-nwu ɔ́ti kaduɛ ka ɔ́ƒɔ ɔ́di ka nwuna ɔlɛ ɔdubɔba-nwu ɔsu ni,
44014010	Paulo ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ta nye ƒula lɛgba lɛlɔ!” Na ɔnana ɔmɛni úmi ɔ́ta na úse kalɔ ɔkɛ uusié.
44014011	Ka bekyuli bani nnye beenú litemi mɛni bánu lɛla lɛni na Paulo ɔ́bla ni, báva momoomo na Likaonia lɛdi kemo básu banini, “Baƒiɔ badi! Bébo-bu kudɔ aani bekyuli kalɛ!”
44014012	Anwuɔsu básia Barnaba lɛnyi banii Seus. Na básia Paulo lɛnɔ banii Herme, ɔsika anwu nnye muutemi.
44014013	Amu na Seus ɔkpane ɔni koƒiodu nde kabanye mmɔ ni, úti ɔmantɛ bakɔ ku anwula úboku ɔnii anwu ku kadi baakpá bete batalane bammɔ.
44014014	Na uwi ɔni na Paulo ku Barnaba bénu lɛla lɛni na báyɔ ka babla ni, báni bana lɛwu bábwɛ, ɔsika bátayɔ ka bekyuli bammɔ babla lɛni. Anwuɔsu békeli béduo bekyuli bammɔ akɔ. Mmɔ na báva
44014015	básu banini, “Ati bene, bi na bɛɛbla mɛni? Abu lɛnɔ bekyuli bayawine kani na bɔdi aani amii kalɛ. Búbo mɛni bɔnii buuti litemi buni lɛmɛni buboku-mii. Bɛda ala keeke amɛni udu kama bɔsiaku bɛya na binwini biteemwi Blɔti ɔni mbo ngba. Anwu nédie katɔ ku kalɔ ku ɛpu ku ala ani nkya-nya kemo ƒui!
44014016	Kukuuku ni, údie bayawine ƒui atu na baabla lɛla lɛni na baayɔ́.
44014017	Nsu úteedie lɛlɔ taatina-bu na nwuna ala abuni bɔbla ani mɔɔtina ka ɔkya sɔsɔ. Na uwi ndi uwi ni, ubo lɛla lɛni muunyimene-bu na nwuna ala abuni lɛlɔ. Uute-bu ɔnantu uwi ndi uwi ku edula abuni ku adila ku ebiti lɛnɔ.”
44014018	Na ina ka básu ala amɛni ƒui ni, úde bekyuli bamɛni asa báda bana akpala amɛni buti bɔkpa bute-ma báya.
44014019	Na Yudaƒuɔ badi bási Antiokia na Pisidia ɔmii lɛlɔ ku Ikonion bébo bábavumana bekyuli bamɛni kasusu, na báya bébo Paulo atabi na bákpɛ-nwu kalɔ bálɛku ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo, na bákali banii úkpi.
44014020	Nsu ka baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ bátáka bámana-nwu mmɔ ni, ɔ́ta na ɔ́sɔ únwini úbeduo ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo. Na ka kadi kégye ni, anwu ku Barnaba bátɔlɔ bésie Derbe.
44014021	Amu na bátásu litemi buni lɛmɛni na Derbe. Na ka bákɛ baƒɔtaadine badi na mmɔ ni, básɔ bénwini bésie Listra ku Ikonion ku Antiokia.
44014022	Mmɔ na bákya baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ ɔkplu banii benye kpakplaa na bana bɔƒɔtaadi kemo. Na básu-ma lɛnɔ banini, “Ɔlɛka bubo abi pii asa na bɔkɛ lɛlɔyɔ na Blɔti lɛga bɔdi kemo.”
44014023	Amu na Paulo ku Barnaba lɛnɔ bédie batɔnkune béte baƒɔtaadine akpa akpa ƒui, na bákpali katɔ na bélie kɔka na béti-ma bákya Blɔti ɔni na báƒɔ bádi lɛkɔkɔ.
44014024	Na ka bási lɛma lɛni nkya Pisidia ni, básɔ bébo Pamƒilia kalɔ lɛlɔ.
44014025	Na básu litemi buni na Perge asa na bávi bésie Atalia.
44014026	Mmɔ na básia ntu anumi bávi bésie Antiokia, na béti-ma bákya Blɔti lɛkɔkɔ ute kabla kani na bábla báawɔlɔ.
44014027	Ka bánya bétéduo Antiokia ni, bálɔ baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ ƒui básala lisu na bédie bana ulu busie kemo bátina-ma. Na básu-ma ala ani ƒui na Blɔti ɔ́kɛ-ma lɛlɔ ɔ́bla ku kalɛ na ɔ́lɛmi bɔƒɔtaadi ulu úte bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ.
44014028	Amu na bélie Antiokia baƒɔtaadine bamɛni kudɔ bétu uwi.
44015001	Uwi ɔni na Paulo ku Barnaba bakya Antiokia ni, bekyuli badi bási Yudea bébo na bátina baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ ala básu banini, “Amu ntu ukyuli biala ɔ́ƒɔ lego bukulo ɔdi ɔmmɔ aani kalɛ na Mose ɔda bubo bɔɔtina asa na wakɛ bɔƒɔ.”
44015002	Nsu Paulo ku Barnaba ku bekyuli bamɛni báni litemi lɛmɛni bénene kaduɛ. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, báya na baƒɔtaadine badi básiaku-ma na bésie Yerusalem kalɛ na ama ku baƒɔtaadine bani nkya Yerusalem mmɔ batátɛmi basiku ɔlɔna bukulo kɔtɛ kɔmɛni lɛlɔ.
44015003	Anwuɔsu ka baƒɔtaadine bamɛni ƒui bésie-ma ulu bétédu kabanye ni, bátɔlɔ bésie Ƒoinike ku Samaria lɛma kemo na bátávi baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ lɛlɔ. Na básu-ma ka ɔƒaani ni, ama bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ lɛnɔ béti lɛlɔ béte Blɔti. Na litemi lɛmɛni lɛ́ya na bana ƒui bákɛ ebiti geen.
44015004	Amu ka bétédu Yerusalem ni, baƒɔtaadine ku batalane ku bana benengu ƒui báƒɔ-ma kaduɛ. Na Paulo ku Barnaba béti bana ulu busie litemi báva-ma anumi ɔ́si ala ani ƒui na Katɔti ɔ́bla ɔ́kɛnku-ma lɛlɔ.
44015005	Nsu ni, Ƒarisiƒuɔ lɛkpa lɛni nénwini kayi mmɔ badi báta bénye-ma akɔ na básu banii, “Ɔlɛka banwa bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ na bakya-bu akɔ mɛni lɛnɔ bekulo lego na basiaku Mose ɔda bubo kama.”
44015006	Anwuɔsu bana benengu ku batalane bátásala lisu na béti litemi lɛmɛni lɛlɔ kasusu.
44015007	Na kasalakɔ kamɛni kalɔ ni, uwi ɔni na báatɛmi na ala pii lɛlɔ ni, Petro ɔ́ta únye na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Banwa, amii alati bɛgyi ka Katɔti náƒuna-mi ɔ́siku bina akɔ ɔnii mbasu bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ lɛnɔ litemi buni lɛmɛni kalɛ na ama lɛnɔ baƒɔ badi.
44015008	Na Katɔti ɔni ngyi bekyuli kɔyi kemo ni, údie ɔ́tina ka ɔ́ƒɔ-ma na úte-ma nwuna Kɔyu aani kalɛ na úti úte abu lɛnɔ.
44015009	Útakya kavumana kadi na abu ku-ma ntɛ, ɔsika ɔ́ƒɔ-ma na bana bɔƒɔtaadi ɔsu. Na úti bana ekpidi ɔ́kyiɛ-ma aani abu kalɛ.
44015010	Na ɔƒaani ni, bi ɔsu na bɛɛkɔ́ku Blɔti lɛni? Abu ku bula bati kuuku bútakana etila amɛni udu buti! Bi ɔsu na biiti-nya taasia baƒɔtaadine bamɛni lɛlɔ?
44015011	Oowo! Bɔƒɔ bɔni na bɔ́ƒɔ bɔ́di ɔsu na Katɔti úti Blɔti Yesu kɔnyana bɔnu ɔ́ƒɔ-bu ngba aani kalɛ kani na ama lɛnɔ báƒɔ bádi.”
44015012	Amu na bana ƒui báda butemi báya na bélie beenú akɔla ani na Paulo ku Barnaba baasu ka Blɔti ɔkɛ bana lɛlɔ ɔ́bla úte ama bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ.
44015013	Uwi ɔni na ama báwɔlɔ ni, Yakobo lɛnɔ ɔ́ta únye na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Banwa, bɛkywɛ atu na binu.
44015014	Simon Petro únyimene-bu kudeedi kɔni na Katɔti údie nwuna bɔyɔ ɔ́tina bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ na ɔ́ƒuna bana akɔ badi.
44015015	Na litemi lɛni na nwuna kenye bediene básu bése líbo lɛni aani kalɛ na bénweni ka Unwoti ɔ́su ɔnini,
44015016	'Nwuna kama ni, ndubɔsɔ libo na mbasɔku Dawid lɛga kadikɔ lise na lɛklibi ala ani néebie mmɔ, na asɔ atɛ kaduɛ.
44015017	Mmɔ asa na bekyuli bani nébu ku ama bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ ƒui bani na lɛ́lɔ aani mina badi badubɔwia-mi kama ulu. Lɛni na Unwoti ɔni mɔɔbla ala amɛni ƒui ɔ́su úse.
44015018	Katɔti ɔgyi nwuna ablala ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui.'
44015019	“Anwuɔsu ami Yakobo mɔɔsu-mii ka bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ mɛni na béti lɛlɔ béte Katɔti ni, utalɛka butile-ma ala bɔgya.
44015020	Mmomu bɛya bunweni-ma ɔku na bada ala aani béti bákpa béte baƒiɔ na aayá na beesé lɛlɔ bɔbla baya ku kɔsɔnɔ bɔdi ku bebuo bani bélii-ma amɔ bádu bɔkun ku ubugya bɔni baya.
44015021	Ɔsika ɔ́si kuuku ni, ala ani na Mose únweni úse mɛni ni, anya na baaká na baasu na Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ na lɛnwunameyi biala na lɛma biala kemo.”
44015022	Amu na batalane ku benengu bani nábasa mmɔ ƒui bátuna, na bédie bekyuli badi banii basiaku Paulo ku Barnaba na besie Antiokia. Nkyuli inyɔ bani na bédie mmɔ badi baƒɔtaadine bammɔ benengu inyɔ. Ama ndi Yuda ɔni na basɔ baalɔ Barsaba ku Silas.
44015023	Na ɔku ɔni na bada bésienku mmɔ kemo etemila aasu anii Ɔmɛni ɔ́si abu batalane ku benengu ku banwa bani nkya Yerusalem kudɔ. Bɔnii buugyele amii banwa bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ na bɛ́si Antiokia ku Siria ku Kilikia.
44015024	Búnu ka baƒɔtaadine badi bási bula akɔ mɛni, na bébo mmɔ bábakyaku-mii unyeƒi na bula Yudaƒuɔ ɔlɔna bukulo ɔdi lɛlɔ. Nsu ni, bútatala-ma bɔnii babasu-mii ala amɛni udu.
44015025	-
44015026	Anwuɔsu ka bɔ́sala eli ni, bɔ́tala bula akɔ benengu inyɔ bamɛni bɔnii basiaku bula banwa bayɔne Paulo ku Barnaba bani néti bana ngba bákpa béte Blɔti Yesu Kristo bɔnii bebo-mii kudɔ.
44015027	Yuda ku Silas ni, ama lɛnɔ badubɔsu-mii ala ani na búnweni mɛni lɛlɔ.
44015028	Ɔsika ɔdi Katɔti Kɔyu lɛƒɔyɔ ku abu lɛnɔ ka utalɛka buti Yudaƒuɔ ɔda bubo etila butile-mii bɔgya butulo ala amɛni.
44015029	Bini ala ani na béti bákpa béte baƒiɔ ku ubugya bɔni ku bebuo bani na bélii-ma amɔ bádu bɔkun ku kɔsɔnɔ bɔdi. Si bɛda lɛlɔ lɛni ni, keyi kadubɔyɔku-mii. Bɛkya kpoo.
44015030	Anwuɔsu batu bamɛni ƒui bátɔlɔ bésie Antiokia. Na bana mmɔ buduo ni, bálɔ baƒɔtaadine bamɛni ƒui na bábasa. Na béti ɔku ɔni bada básiku Yerusalem mmɔ béte-ma.
44015031	Na ama bani nkya mmɔ ƒui bákɛ ebiti ɔ́si etemila ani na báka na ɔku ɔmmɔ kemo ɔsu.
44015032	Amu ka Yuda ku Silas ƒui badi Katɔti kenye bediene ɔsu ni, bédie ala kalɔ béte-ma bébu uwi gyɔlɔɔ, na bákya-ma ogya ku ɔyikun.
44015033	Amu ka bélie mmɔ emeyi alɛɛ adi ni, bédie Yuda ku Silas ulu ka basɔ benwini besie Yerusalem.
44015034	Nsu Silas ni, anwu ɔ́lɛ ugyii ka ɔƒɔ lɛlɔ ɔkya mmɔ.
44015035	Amu na Paulo ku Barnaba básɔ bákya Antiokia mmɔ, na ama ku badi pii bakya baatina ala na baasu litemi buni lɛmmɔ.
44015036	Amu na emeyi adi kama ni, Paulo ɔ́su Barnaba ɔnini, “Ya na bɔsɔ butánu bula banwa bani nkya lɛma lɛni kemo na bɔ́su litemi buni lɛmɛni bɔ́vi, na bɔnu kalɛ na badaku.”
44015037	Barnaba ɔ́tuna na ɔ́wia ka nka utiku Yohane ɔni baalɔ Marko ɔda.
44015038	Nsu Paulo anwu útayɔ lɛni munu munu! Ɔsika uwi ɔni na ama ku-nwu bésie Pamƒilia ni, Marko Yohane útáda-ma ɔ́nyonu na mmɔ.
44015039	Amu na bana inyɔ bamɛni báni Marko Yohane lɛlɔ litemi lɛmɛni bénene laa ɔni náya na bégyingyaku lɛlɔ. Barnaba útiku Marko na básia ntu anumi na bátɔlɔ bésie Kipro.
44015040	Nsu Paulo anwu útiku Silas, na baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ béti-ma bákya Blɔti lɛkɔkɔ na bátɔlɔ.
44015041	Amu na bátásia Siria ku Kilikia na bákya baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ bene ɔkplu.
44016001	Amu na Paulo ku Silas bátɔlɔ bésie ɔma ɔni baalɔ Derbe, na bákɛ mmɔ bávi bésie Listra. Na mmɔ na bésie bátánu ɔƒɔtaadine ɔni baalɔ Timoteo. Na uni ɔdi Yudani, na anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́ƒɔ Kristo ɔ́di. Nsu ɔti ɔdi Grikini.
44016002	Na baƒɔtaadine bani ƒui nkya Listra ku Ikonion ni, baabu Timoteo kaduɛ.
44016003	Anwu geen na Paulo ɔ́wia ka utiku na ɔsiaku-nwu. Anwuɔsu ɔ́bla-nwu Yudaƒuɔ ɔlɔna bukulo ɔdi, ɔsika Yudaƒuɔ bani nkya amadɔ mmɔ ƒui bagyi ka ɔti ɔdi Grikini.
44016004	Na ka báta ni, bakɛ baaví lɛma lɛni ƒui kemo, na baasu lɛla lɛni na Yerusalem benengu básu. Na básu-ma banii badi-nya lɛlɔ.
44016005	Anwuɔsu bekyuli bammɔ bémomo bébu, na lɛni kani na bana bɔƒɔtaadi lɛnɔ bɔ́yu ɔkplu búbu.
44016006	Na nwuna kama ni, bávi bésie Ƒrigia ku Galatia, ɔsika Katɔti Kɔyu kútete-ma kuƒi ka basu litemi buni na Asia kalɔ lɛlɔ.
44016007	Na ka bétédu Misia ni, báwia ka batávi Bitinia kalɔ lɛlɔ. Nsu mɛni lɛnɔ ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kútatuna ka besie mmɔ.
44016008	Anwuɔsu básɔ bénwini básia Misia kalɔ na bétédu ɛpu kudɔ na ɔma ɔni baalɔ Troa.
44016009	Usien ɔmmɔ ni, Paulo ɔ́nu budie bɔtina bɔdi na kɔna kemo. Na kɔna kɔmɛni kemo ni, ɔ́nu ɔnana ɔdi ɔni nási Makedonia na unye uuvele-nwu ɔnini, “Via bo Makedonia mɛni na ebebunku-bu o-o!”
44016010	Amu na budie bɔtina bɔmɛni ɔsu ni, bɔ́klibi lɛlɔ na bɔ́tɔlɔ búsie Makedonia. Ɔsika ɔmɛni ɔɔtina-bu ka Blɔti ɔɔwia ka ɔtala-bu na busie butásu litemi buni lɛmɛni na mmɔ.
44016011	Amu na bútélie ɔkɔlɔ ɔdi kemo na Troa, na bɔ́via búsie Samotrake. Na ka kadi kégye ni, búsie bútéduo Neapoli.
44016012	Ka bɔ́si mmɔ ni, bútéduo Ƒilipi ɔni ndi Makedonia ɔma udeedi. Na mmɔ lɛnɔ ɔdi Romaƒuɔ kalɛkɛ. Na búlie mmɔ emeyi adi.
44016013	Amu na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ni, bɔ́vi bɔ́lɛ ɔma ɔmɛni kemo na búsie ketu kadi kudɔ na kesii kani na bɔ́kali ka mmɔ na bekyuli beesié taatákpali katɔ. Na búlie mmɔ bɔ́su beleku bani nébo mmɔ Blɔti litemi.
44016014	Na bana kemo unwi baalɔ banii Lidia. Uuyé adi agyiedi na Tiatira, na ɔdi ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbu Katɔti geen. Na uwi ɔni na ɔkya uunú bula butemi bɔmɛni ni, Blɔti úbimi-nwu kasusu na ɔ́ƒɔ etemila ani na Paulo ɔ́su mɛni ƒui.
44016015	Amu ka anwu ku nwuna kaduli bekyuli ƒui báƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ni, úvele-bu ɔnini, “Si bɛ́tuna bɛnii ndi ɔƒɔtaadine geen nte Blɔti ni, na bibeduo-mi kudɔ.” Na ɔ́ni litemi lɛmɛni úneneku-bu útédu ka búsie bútéduo-nwu kudɔ.
44016016	Amu na limeyi lɛdi uwi ɔni na búsela butákpali katɔ ni, bɔ́siaku ugblebi ɔdi ɔni lɛlɔ na kɔyu kukpidi kulie na uubó like. Na ɔɔbla egulabi kaduɛ teete nwuna benwoti.
44016017	Amu na ugblebi ɔmɛni ɔ́siaku abu ku Paulo kama na ɔɔva taasu ɔnini, “Bekyuli bamɛni badi Katɔti kabla bablane, na bébo mɛni bani babatina-mii ngba bɔƒɔ ulu!”
44016018	Amu na lɛla lɛmɛni lísie anumi emeyi pii. Na ka Paulo ɔ́nɔ bɔnu ni, únwini na ɔ́su kɔyu kɔni nsiaku ugblebi ɔmɛni ɔnini, “Mɔɔbɔku-ɔ na Yesu Kristo lɛnyi kemo nnii vi lɛ-nwu lɛlɔ!” Na kɔnakunwi ni, kɔyu kukpidi kɔmɛni kɔ́vi kɔ́lɛ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo!
44016019	Amu ka nwuna benwoti bánu ka bana lɛlakɛ lɛ́yii ɔsu ni, béƒie Paulo ku Silas na báni-ma bésienku litemi katɛkɔ benengu na kuyentɛ.
44016020	Na básu na kuye mmɔ banini, “Bekyuli bamɛni badi Yudaƒuɔ, na bakya beebile bula ɔma.
44016021	Bakya baatina bekyuli ala ani na muunye teetile Romaƒuɔ ɔda bubo lɛlɔ.”
44016022	Na bekyuli pii bábaka bámana-ma, na benye beedí Paulo ku Silas teete lɛlɔ. Na litemi batɛne bamɛni báya na báni-ma lɛwu bábwɛ, na béte kuƒi banii bebo-ma kugyiimi.
44016023	Amu ka ebola éduo-ma lɛlɔ kaduɛ ni, béti-ma bátákya aban ɔtɔ. Na básu ukyuli ɔni mɔɔnu ama bani ntɛ ɔtɔ mmɔ lɛlɔ banii ɔda Paulo ku Silas kaduɛ.
44016024	Na ka bébo-nwu ɔda lɛni ɔsu ni, úti-ma útákya kasuudikɔ ƒui na bébo-ma kɔgba.
44016025	Amu na usientɛ uwi ɔni na Paulo ku Silas bakya baakpali katɔ na beedie lɛnu teete Katɔti ni, bani ntɛ ɔtɔ mmɔ bakya beenú.
44016026	Kɔnakunwi ni, kalɔ kákunku momoomo, na ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ ƒui lɛnɔ ɔ́kunku ɔni na ɔtɔ kɔyakun ƒui kɔ́lɛmi, na kɔgba kɔni bébo báda batɔntɛne bammɔ ƒui kɔ́ƒɛ.
44016027	Amu na bana lɛlɔ ɔnune úkeyi lɛlɔ ɔ́gyinya na ɔ́nu ka ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kɔyakun ƒui kɔ́lɛmi kuwi. Na ka ɔ́kali ɔnii ɔtɔ batɛne bammɔ ƒui békeli ɔsu ni, ɔ́kpa nwuna kewii ɔnii ɔɔdú lɛlɔ.
44016028	Nsu ka Paulo ɔ́nu ɔ́ti lɛla lɛni na ɔ́yɔ ka ɔbla lɛlɔ ɔsu ni, ɔ́kpali-nwu ɔ́su ɔnini, “Tabla! Bula ƒui bɔkya mɛni.”
44016029	Amu na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔ́lɔ ɔnii beti ukpo beboku. Na lɛlɔ bɔtɔ kemo ni, úbalɛ akɔnkɔ na Paulo ku Silas anumi.
44016030	Na ka ɔ́da-ma údie ɔtɔ ɔmɛni kemo ni, úye-ma ɔnini, “Ati bene, bi na ɔlɛka lɛbla asa na lɛkɛ bɔƒɔ?”
44016031	Amu na básu-nwu banini, “Ƒɔ Blɔti Yesu Kristo di, na adubɔkɛ bɔƒɔ, awɔ ku ƒula kaduli bekyuli ƒui.”
44016032	Na bésie bátásu anwu ku nwuna kaduli bekyuli ƒui Blɔti lɛlɔ litemi buni lɛmɛni.
44016033	Na usien ɔmmɔ kani na ɔ́mana-ma alɛbi ani nsia-ma lɛlɔ, na anwu ku nwuna kaduli bekyuli ƒui báƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi.
44016034	Amu na béduo ɔtɔ na úte-ma lɛla lɛdi bádi. Na nwuna kaduli bekyuli ƒui bákɛ ebiti geen, ɔsika báƒɔ Katɔti bádi.
44016035	Amu na kadi kégye ni, ɔma ɔmmɔ litemi batɛne bátala beƒiene banii bátásu ukyuli ɔni mɔɔnu batɔntɛne lɛlɔ mmɔ banii, “Nyonu baƒɔ bammɔ na beteesie.”
44016036	Amu na bana lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmɛni ɔ́su Paulo ku Silas ɔnini, “Litemi batɛne banii nnyonu-mii na biteesie. Anwuɔsu biteesie ku keyi buɛɛ.”
44016037	Amu na Paulo ɔ́su beƒiene bammɔ ɔnini, “Bébo-bu na bekyuli ƒui anumi ɔni bátatɛku-bu litemi lɛdi asa na béti-bu bátákya aban ɔtɔ kemo. Nsu ni, Romaƒuɔ na bɔdi! Na ɔƒɛni na baawia ka bɔbɛ bɔtɔlɔ? Kudii! Ya ama alati bebo bebedie-bu!”
44016038	Amu na beƒiene bamɛni bénwini bésie bátásu litemi batɛne kenye kamɛni. Na ka bénu ka Paulo ku Silas badi Romaƒuɔ ni, liƒu lɛ́da-ma geen!
44016039	Ɔmɛni ɔsu bésie bétékpi-ma kɔtɔ, na bákpanku-ma bálɛku aban ɔtɔ. Na bévele-ma banii batɔlɔ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo na beteesie likpo bamba.
44016040	Amu na Silas ku Paulo bátɔlɔ bésie Lidia kesii. Na mmɔ na bátánu baƒɔtaadine bakladi. Na básɔ bákya-ma ogya bébu asa na bátɔlɔ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo.
44017001	Amu ka bésie bátásia Amƒipoli ku Apolonia ni, bétédu Tesalonika. Na mɛni na Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ kadi kákya.
44017002	Amu na aani kalɛ na Paulo ɔɔyɔ́ bɔbla ni, úsie mmɔ ɔnii utétemi ute-ma na kasalakɔ mmɔ. Na anwunameyi atɛ sɔɔn ni, útaatina Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila.
44017003	Na uudie lɛbibo lɛni na básu bése ka Kristo ɔdubo bɔnu ku kalɛ na ɔsɔ ɔdubɔta na ulie ngba ɔni na ɔsɔ ulekpi. Paulo ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, “Ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ litemi mɔɔsu-mii mɛni ndi Yesu ɔni ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ.”
44017004	Etemila ani na údie kalɔ ɔ́tina-ma mɛni énwini bekyuli bamɛni badi kasusu, na báƒɔ bádi na básiaku Paulo ku Silas. Na Grikiƒuɔ bani nda lɛlɔ na Katɔti bɔyia kemo pii ku beleku bani lɛlɔ mbo ɔbu pii lɛnɔ bénwini kayi na ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo.
44017005	Nsu anumi égyie Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune na bana lɛlɔ. Anwuɔsu bátáwia bekyuli basa basa badi na ɔmankemo banii batákya ɔma bekyuli ogya. Na básala otogyi bákya lɛsɛ lɛmɛni na bésie bátáka bámana Yason kaduli banii betéƒie Paulo ku Silas besienku ɔma ɔmmɔ kasalakɔ.
44017006	Nsu ka bátanu-ma ɔsu ni, béƒie Yason ku baƒɔtaadine badi na báni-ma bésienku kasalakɔ. Mmɔ na baava taasu banini, “Bekyuli badi bakɛ baakya lɛsɛ likpo biala, na bébo mɛni lɛnɔ baakya lɛsɛ lɛmmɔ.
44017007	Na anwu Yason lɛnɔ ɔ́ƒɔ-ma ɔ́kya nwuna kaduli. Na bekyuli bammɔ báta bénye Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare ɔda bubo lɛlɔ. Na baatina ka ɔnana ɔni baalɔ Yesu ndi Ɔga!”
44017008	Amu ka bénu ɔmɛni ni, ɔƒɛ ɔ́da otogyi ɔmmɔ ku ɔma benengu.
44017009	Na báya na Yason ku nwuna badi báƒɔ kɔtu bɔni kayu asa na bányonu-ma.
44017010	Nsu usien ɔmmɔ kani ni, baƒɔtaadine bani nkya ɔma ɔmmɔ bétiku Paulo ku Silas békeliku bésienku Beroia. Na ka bétéduo mmɔ ni, bésie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ batásu litemi buni lɛmɛni.
44017011	Na Beroiaƒuɔ ni, bana kasusu kébimi kétulo Tesalonikaƒuɔ kadi. Na bése atu na bénu bana butemi. Na limeyi ndi limeyi ni, bátaawia Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila taanu si Paulo ala ani na ɔ́su adi sɔsɔ.
44017012	Anwuɔsu bana akɔ pii báƒɔ bádi. Grikiƒuɔ beleku bani lɛlɔ mbo ɔbu pii bénwini kayi ku banana pii lɛnɔ.
44017013	Nsu uwi ɔni na Yudaƒuɔ bani nkya Tesalonika bénu ka Paulo ɔkya ɔɔsu litemi buni na Beroia ni, bávi bésie mmɔ bátákya kadɔ na ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo.
44017014	Nsu baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ ni, báta kɔnakunwi na bétiku Paulo bésienku ɛpu kudɔ. Na Silas ku Timoteo báƒɔ lɛlɔ bákya kama.
44017015	Ama bani nsiaku Paulo mmɔ béti-nwu bétédu Atene. Na mmɔ na ama básɔ bénwini na Paulo ɔ́sia-ma kenye ɔnii batásu Silas ku Timoteo na bekeli babasiaku-nwu.
44017016	Uwi ɔni na Paulo ɔ́kya Atene na unye ɔgya Silas ku Timoteo bene ni, úduo kɔnyana ɔni na ɔ́nu kalɛ na kadi kammɔ bekyuli béti lɛlɔ béte lɛƒiɔkpa, na ɔma ɔmmɔ úyi ku baƒiɔ ala.
44017017	Anwuɔsu úsie útátɛmiku Yudaƒuɔ ku bekyuli bamba lɛnɔ na bana kasalakɔ. Na limeyi ndi limeyi ni, útaatɛmiku bani lɛnɔ na ɔ́nu na kuye.
44017018	Amu na uwi ɔdi ni, anwu ku bekyuli lisu lɛdi bani ndi Epikuroƒuɔ ku Stoaƒuɔ bani nlie nte kayawi lɛnunda bákya ku Paulo unyeƒi na básu banini, “Bi na ɔnana ɔmɛni uutemi taasu?” Amu na babambadi lɛnɔ básu banini, “Use aani kalɔ bamba baƒiɔ badi lɛlɔ kɔtɛ na ɔɔtɛmi.” Na bekyuli bammɔ básu lɛni ɔsika bénu ka Paulo ɔ́su litemi buni ɔ́siku Yesu ku nwuna bɔsɔ taata lɛlɔ ɔsu.
44017019	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, béti-nwu bésienku kesii kani na baatɛ etemila na Areopago benengu kasalakɔ, na básu banini, “Bɔwia bɔti lɛla lɛni na ala awɔdi ani na aatina mɛni adanku.
44017020	Ɔsika ala ani na aasu ni, eeese-bu nwaa. Anwuɔsu bɔɔyɔ́ bunu-nya kalɔ.”
44017021	Na Ateneƒuɔ ƒui ku baƒɔ bani nkya kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ƒui ni, bebo kɔnu bete kɔtɛ keeke ku ala awɔdi bugyeli.
44017022	Amu na Paulo ɔ́ta únye kasalakɔ bekyuli bammɔ anumi, na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Na ulu biala lɛlɔ ni, lɛ́nu ka amii Ateneƒuɔ ni, bɛɛsia lɛkpa anu geen.
44017023	Ɔsika ɔni na nkɛ mɔɔví na lɛ́nu bina kɔkpakɔ ni, lɛ́nu lɛkpatabi lɛdi lɛlɔ ka bénweni básia-ni lɛlɔ banii, 'Amɛni búti buute Bula Ɔti ɔni na bɔɔɔgyi.' Na Ati ɔni na bɛɛɛgyi asa na bɛɛkpá-nwu mɛni ni, nwuna lɛlɔ litemi mɔɔyɔ́ ka lɛsu-mii ɔƒɛni.
44017024	“Ati ɔmɛni ndi ala ƒui Ɔti ɔni nédie katɔ ku kalɔ ku ala ani nkya-nya kemo ƒui. Na ulélie ɔtɔ ɔni na ukyuli ɔyawine enu ábla kemo.
44017025	Na ulawia bɔdi lɛnɔ taasiku bayawine enu kabla kadi lɛnɔ kemo, ɔsika anwu ɔlati muute ukyuli biala ngba ku lɛkɛ.
44017026	Údie bayawine ƒui ɔ́siku ukyuli unwi lɛlɔ ɔnii bulie aani ubugya unwi bebi na kayawi ƒui lɛlɔ. Anwu ɔlati nése uwi ku kadikɔ úse úte ɔdi biala.
44017027	Na bula Ɔti ɔ́bla ɔmɛni úte abu bekyuli kalɛ na bɔwia-nwu kama ulu na bɔnu-nwu, ina ka nka utagyunku-bu.
44017028	Ɔsika aani kalɛ na bina agyangba bediene básu ni, 'Anwu nli na buli, na bɔdubɔsiaku-nwu na bɔtɛ bɔlɛɛ.' Na básu lɛnɔ banini, 'Bɔdi nwuna kaba.'
44017029	“Na ka bɔdi Katɔti bebi ɔsu ni, utalɛka bɔkali bɔnii Katɔti ɔmɛni use aani lɛla lɛni na abu bayawine néti enu bɔ́bla aani sika ugyiedi iye ɔƒualadi iye ugyii iye lɛtabi iye ala anwidi lɛnɔ kalɛ.
44017030	Na ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ úti úbedu uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, Katɔti útani bekyuli kɔtu ɔsika bátati-nwu. Nsu ɔƒaani ni, úbo-bu ɔda ɔnii bɔda anumi budie ala amɛni bene lɛlɔ na bunwini anumi buboku-nwu kudɔ.
44017031	Ɔsika anwu údie limeyi lɛdi úse lɛni lɛlɔ na ukyuli ɔni na ɔ́ƒuna úse wabatɛku-bu litemi ɔ́si bula ɔbladu lɛlɔ. Na údie Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmɛni ɔ́tina-bu nwaa ɔ́si ɔni na ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́siku kekpine na ɔ́sɔ úbo úbelie ngba.”
44017032	Nsu uwi ɔni na bénu ka Paulo ɔ́tɛmi ɔ́siku bɔsɔ taata lɛlɔ ni, bana akɔ badi báma-nwu. Na badi lɛnɔ básu banini, “Bɔsɔ bɔɔyɔ́ ka bunu etemila adi bɔsiku ukyuli bɔsɔ taata lɛlɔ.”
44017033	Amu ka úbo úte lɛni ni, Paulo ɔ́tɔlɔ-ma kudɔ.
44017034	Nsu bekyuli badi bábasiaku-nwu na bénwini baƒɔtaadine. Na bana akɔ ɔdi ndi Areopago unengu ɔni baalɔ Dionisio ku uleku ɔni baalɔ Damari ku badi lɛnɔ.
44018001	Amu na ɔmmɔ kama ni, Paulo ɔ́tɔlɔ Atene úsie Korinto.
44018002	Mmɔ na útánu Yudani ɔni baalɔ Akwila, na báwɔ-nwu na Ponto. Anwu ku ulekudi Priskila bási Italia bébo mmɔ uwi útetu tɔ, ɔsika kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ɔdine ɔni baalɔ Klaudio ɔ́su ka Yudaƒuɔ ƒui balɛ Roma. Paulo úsie útanu-ma,
44018003	na ɔ́kya-ma kudɔ úteebunku-ma na bebuo lɛku bɔka kabla kani na anwu lɛnɔ ɔɔbla taadi kemo.
44018004	Amu na lɛnwunameyi biala ni, Paulo uusié Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ teetédie ala kalɔ teete Yudaƒuɔ ku Grikiƒuɔ ƒui kalɛ benwini kayi.
44018005	Amu na uwi ɔni na Silas ku Timoteo bási Makedonia bébo ni, Paulo ɔ́kɛ uwi kaduɛ úti úte litemi buni bɔsu ku kalɔ budie taatina Yudaƒuɔ ka ni, Yesu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ geen.
44018006	Amu uwi ɔni na Yudaƒuɔ bamɛni báta bénye-nwu lɛlɔ na beetemi enyekpi taasiku Yesu lɛlɔ ni, Paulo úveli enu úwi-ma, na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si bɛ́yii ni, mina kɔnu, mina ɔgba uuubo-nwu kemo. Ɔ́si ɔƒaani ni, lísela bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ kudɔ ntásu-ma litemi buni lɛmɛni.”
44018007	Na ka ɔ́gyu-ma kudɔ ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ útákya ɔnana ɔdi ɔni naaadi Yudani na baalɔ-nwu banii Tito Yusto kudɔ ɔni mɔɔbu Blɔti na ulie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ kudɔ.
44018008	Amu na kasalakɔ kammɔ unengu ɔni baalɔ Krispo ku nwuna kaduli bekyuli ƒui báƒɔ Blɔti bádi, na bákpila-ma ntu. Lɛni kani na bákpila babambadi bani náƒɔ bádi lɛnɔ ntu na Korinto mmɔ.
44018009	Amu na limeyi lɛdi usientɛ ni, Blɔti ɔ́su Paulo na kɔna kemo ɔnini, “Tayia! Na tada litemi lɛmɛni bɔsu taya.
44018010	Ɔsika nsiaku-ɔ, na ukyuli ɔdi ulákana-a likpidi lɛdi bɔbla. Bekyuli pii bakya ɔma ɔmɛni kemo bani ndi mina badi.”
44018011	Anwuɔsu Paulo úlie ɔma ɔmɛni kemo lɛkwa linwi ku kakɛ ɔ́su Blɔti litemi lɛmɛni ɔ́tina bekyuli.
44018012	Nsu uwi ɔni na bése Galio Roma aban lɛga na Akaia kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, Yudaƒuɔ badi bábla lɛkpa lɛdi na bánwi litemi bámana Paulo lɛlɔ na béƒie-nwu bésienku litemi katɛkɔ.
44018013	Amu na básu ɔga ɔmmɔ banini, “Ukyuli ɔmɛni uunwíni bekyuli kasusu ɔnii bataakpa Katɔti na ulu ɔni náta únye bula ɔda bubo lɛlɔ.”
44018014	Nsu uwi ɔni kani na Paulo úse kalɔ ɔnii uteedie kenye ni, aban lɛga ɔdine Galio ɔmɛni útemi na ɔ́su Yudaƒuɔ bamɛni ɔnini, “Amii Yudaƒuɔ binu! Si litemi lɛni bɛda bíboku mɛni lɛdi bɔƒiɔ bubendi bɔdi ni, ndubɔkɛ kayi na linu bina litemi.
44018015	Nsu ka unyeƒi ukpludi na bɛɛkya na bina etemila ku ɔda bubo lɛlɔ ɔsu ni, amii alati bitásu-ni. Ɔɔɔdi ami mabla litemi ɔtɛne mete-mii na ala amɛni lɛlɔ.”
44018016	Anwuɔsu ɔ́bɔku-ma ɔ́lɛku nwuna litemi katɛkɔ mmɔ.
44018017	Amu na bekyuli lisu lɛmɛni béƒie Sostene ɔni ndi bana kasalakɔ kammɔ ɔtɔnkune na bétébo-nwu na litemi katɛkɔ kamɛni kudɔ. Nsu Galio útakpete-ma.
44018018	Amu na Paulo úlie Korinto ɔma ɔmɛni kemo emeyi pii. Na nwuna kama ni, ɔ́kada baƒɔtaadine bamɛni na anwu ku Akwila ku Priskila básia ntu anumi bésie Siria. Nsu asa na watɔlɔ ni, Paulo ɔ́ya na békpeyi-nwu lili na Kenkrea na Yudaƒuɔ ɔdi lɛlɔ ɔ́si kenye kani na úse ɔsu.
44018019	Ka úbayu na Eƒeso ni, ɔ́da Priskila ku Akwila ɔ́kya ɔkɔlɔ kemo mmɔ. Nsu anwu ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ ɔnii utéduoku Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ ala adi kemo.
44018020	Amu na bévele-nwu banii ulie-ma kudɔ ubu, nsu ɔ́nu ka uuubo uwi.
44018021	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ka ɔɔtɔlɔ ni, ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si Blɔti ɔ́tuna ni, ndubɔsɔ linwini libo-mii kudɔ.” Na ɔ́sɔ útéduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo na ɔ́tɔlɔ Eƒeso.
44018022	Na ka útéduo Kaesarea ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Yerusalem na útákya baƒɔtaadine bammɔ kenye. Na ɔ́sɔ úbavi ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Antiokia.
44018023	Na ka ɔ́kya mmɔ uwi ɔdi ni, ɔ́sɔ ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie útásia Galatia ku Ƒrigia kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na uwi ɔmɛni ƒui ni, ɔkɛ ɔɔví taanu baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ bene, na ɔɔkya-ma ɔkplu.
44018024	Amu na Yudani ɔdi úbo Eƒeso. Anwu baalɔ Apolo, na báwɔ-nwu na Aleksandria. Ɔdi ukyuli ɔni na kenye káda-nwu, na ɔgyi Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila lɛnɔ.
44018025	Na ina ka únu Blɔti lɛlɔ litemi na uutemi ku ogya ni, Yohane ntu bɔkpila lɛlɔ ala kani na ɔgyi.
44018026	Amu ka unye uutemi ku kayi buse na kasalakɔ mmɔ na Priskila ku Akwila bénu ni, bákpanku-nwu bésienku kaduli na bédie Blɔti etemila kemo bátina-nwu kaduɛ bébu.
44018027	Amu na ka Apolo ɔ́bla kasusu ka usie Akaia ni, Eƒesoƒuɔ baƒɔtaadine bébebunku-nwu na bénweni ɔku béte baƒɔtaadine bani nkya Akaia mmɔ banii si úbeduo mmɔ ni, na baƒɔ-nwu kaduɛ. Na uwi ɔni na útéduo mmɔ ni, úbunku bekyuli pii bani nébenwini kayi na Blɔti kɔnyana bɔnu ɔsu.
44018028	Na nwuna etemila ammɔ ádi Yudaƒuɔ lɛlɔ, ɔsika úti Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila údie ɔ́tina nwaa ka Yesu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ.
