52002016	Béti básia lɛlɔ banii butasu bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ litemi buni lɛmɛni kalɛ na bakɛ ngba ƒui. Na baatɛ ekpidi etila taasia ekpidi kama teete lɛlɔ ani nédu kesii kani na Katɔti kɔtu bɔni bubo-ma lɛlɔ.
52002017	Banwa uuduo-bu geen ka bɔ́di emeyi alɛɛ na bɔ́sɔ bútasa tɔ anumi ku anumi. Nsu bɛkya-bu kayi kemo. Na bɔ́ɔkya kɔkwɛ kɔni ƒui bɔ́nɔ.
52002018	Anwuɔsu bɔ́yɔ ka bɔsɔ bubo bubanu-mii. Na ami Paulo geen ni, lɛ́wia ulu kɔlɛ kɔlɛ ka libo. Nsu ukisine ɔmmɔ únye útile ulu.
52002019	Mɔɔwia geen ka mbanu-mii, ɔsika amii ndi bula lɛnumi. Na bɛɛda-bu kubiti, ɔsika amii ku baƒɔtaadine bakladi ndi bula kɔsia kɔni ɔsu na bɔdubuƒu uwi ɔni na Blɔti Yesu wasɔ webo.
52002020	Sɔsɔ ni, amii mɔɔyá lɛlɔ lɛɛyɔ́-bu, na buuƒú lɛnɔ na amii ɔsu.
52003001	Na ka bina takana tɔ bɔnu lɛƒɛda lítulo-bu ɔsu ni, bɔ́tuna bɔnii bula inyɔ bɔɔsɔ bɔkya Atene.
52003002	Na bɔtala Timoteo na ubo ubakya-mii ɔkplu, na ubunku-mii na bina bɔƒɔtaadi kemo. Anwu ndi bula ɔnwa ɔni muubunku-bu na Katɔti kabla ku Kristo litemi buni lɛmɛni bɔsu kemo.
52003003	Bɔ́bla lɛni ɔsika buláwia ka bukpoku bɔmɛni bɔƒɛ ɔdi enu. Amii alati bɛgyi bise ka bukpoku bɔmɛni buse bute Kristo kama basiakune ƒui.
52003004	Bɛdubunyimo ka uwi ɔni na bɔkya-mii kudɔ ni, bɔ́lɛ-mii ɔmɛni lɛlɔ búse ka bukpoku bɔmɛni bɔdububo. Na aani kalɛ bɛgyi ni, úbo lɛni sɔsɔ.
52003005	Ala amɛni ɔsu na lɛ́tala Timoteo nnii ubanu si bɛmua bɛda bɔƒɔtaadi bɔmmɔ kpakplaa. Ɔsika litemi lɛmɛni liléte-mii bɔlɛɛ. Na mɔɔyia ka ɔƒɛni kalɛ ukisine ɔmmɔ úbo úbeƒu-mii kasusu na bula lɛbibo ƒui lɛ́bla keeke.
52003006	Nsu Timoteo ɔ́sɔ úbo ku kubiti úbasu-bu ka bina bɔƒɔtaadi ku bina bakpana bɔyɔ bútavumana. Mmomu bɛɛkali-bu geen na binye kuƒi bɛɛyɔ́ ka bɛnu-bu aani kalɛ abu lɛnɔ bɔɔwia-mii bɔnu.
52003007	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, banwa, ina ka buubó abi na ala amɛni ényimi-bu muedi ni, bina bɔƒɔtaadi bɔɔkya-bu kubiti na kayi kaayɔ́-bu.
52003008	Ɔƒɛni na bula ngba bulie bɔ́sɔ bɔ́bla ɔwɔdi, ɔsika búnu kalɛ na binye kpakplaa na Blɔti bɔƒɔtaadi lɛlɔ.
52003009	Bulakana Katɔti enu bɔgya na bina lili na wedu ebiti ani na úte-bu na amii ɔsu.
52003010	Buuvele Blɔti kpakplaa usien ku ɔƒɛ bɔnii ɔya na bɔsɔ bɔsa na bɔkya-mii bɔƒɔtaadi unu.
52003011	Na ɔƒɛni ni, Unwoti Katɔti ɔlati ku Blɔti Yesu balɛmi ulu bete-bu na bubo-mii kudɔ.
52003012	Na Blɔti ɔya na bina bɔyɔ bɔni bibo bite lɛlɔ bumomo bubu. Na bɛyɔ bekyuli bamba lɛnɔ aani kalɛ na bɔɔyɔ́-mii.
52003013	Ɔmɛni ndubɔya na Unwoti Katɔti ɔkya-mii ɔkplu na uveli-mii lɛlɔ ekpidi ƒui na ɔbla-mii kedee na nwuna anumi ute limeyi lɛni na Blɔti Yesu Kristo wasɔ webo kayawi kamɛni ku nwuna badi kedee.
52004001	Banwa, mina lɛla likplodi lɛni muuvele-mii ndi ka ni, bilie ngba bɔni mɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti kaƒɔ aani kalɛ na bɔ́tina-mii. Bɛdaku ɔkplu bɔkya bɔdi, nsu bɔɔkya-mii ogya na Blɔti Yesu lɛnyi kemo bɔnii bɛbla bitulo lɛni.
52004002	Ɔsika bɛgyi ala ani na bɔ́tina-mii ɔkɛnku Blɔti Yesu ɔyikun kemo.
52004003	Katɔti ɔɔwia ka bɛbla lɛlɔ kedee na bɛda lɛlɔ bidie lɛsɔnɔdi kemo ƒui.
52004004	Ɔnana biala ku ulekudi bati lɛlɔ bɔda kaduɛ na belie ngba kedee.
52004005	Na bitasiaku ɔlɔna emini kama aani bekyuli bani naaayia Katɔti kalɛ.
52004006	Ɔkɛnku ɔmɛni lɛlɔ ni, ɔdi biala lɛnumi litegyie na ɔnwani ulekudi lɛlɔ kalɛ na waƒiɔ-nwu. Bɔ́su-mii na bɔ́lɛ-mii na ɔmɛni lɛlɔ búse kpakplaa ka ni, Blɔti ɔdubɔni bani mɔɔbla ala amɛni kɔtu geen.
52004007	Katɔti ɔ́lɔ-bu ka bɔbla bekyuli kedee. Anwuɔsu bɛya bɔda lɛlɔ budie kɔbɔ ala bɔbla kemo.
52004008	Anwuɔsu si bina akɔ ɔdi útadi ɔmɛni lɛlɔ ni, ɔɔɔdi bekyuli lɛlɔ na ɔ́ta únye. Mmomu Katɔti ɔni néti nwuna Kɔyu úte-mii lɛlɔ na ɔ́ta únye.
52004009	Na bina banwa baƒɔtaadine lɛlɔ bɔyɔ ni, útalɛka bunweni-mii lɛla lɛdi na ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔsika Katɔti ɔ́tina-mii ɔmɛni ƒui.
52004010	Na sɔsɔ ni, ɔdi litemi geen ka bɛɛyɔ́ bina banwa baƒɔtaadine bani nkya Makedonia. Nsu bɔsɔ buuvele-mii bɔnii bɛbla bitulo lɛni!
52004011	Bilie ngba ku lɛlɔ kalɔ buboku, na ɔdi biala anu asia nwuna kabla lɛlɔ, na biti bina enu bɛwia bina lɛdila aani kalɛ kani na bɔ́su-mii.
52004012	Ɔmɛni ndubɔya na bani nátaƒɔ bátadi bataaƒalɛ-mii na bilayaki lɛla lɛdi.
52004013	Banwa, bɔɔyɔ́ ka bɔsu-mii lɛla lɛni ndubɔlɛku bekyuli bani néekpi, kalɛ na biléteewulo kɔnyana aani bekyuli bani neeebo lɛnunsia.
52004014	Bɔ́ƒɔ bɔ́di ka Yesu úkpi na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́ta uli ngba na ɔdubɔsɔ ɔsi katɔ mmɔ ubo lɛnɔ. Anwuɔsu bɔ́ƒɔ bɔ́di ka baƒɔtaadine bani ƒui nékpi ni, badubɔsɔ bata. Na Katɔti ɔdubɔsia Yesu ɔmmɔ kani lɛlɔ na ɔƒɔ-ma na bebelieku-nwu ngba.
52004015	Lɛla lɛni na Blɔti ɔɔtina ni, nina lɛlɔ na bunye bɔɔsu-mii ka ni, abu bani nli ngba na Blɔti bɔsɔ bubo kemo ni, bulaka bani néekpi katɔ busie.
52004016	Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, bɔdubunu Blɔti bubo kɔku ku kudu kubendi. Bɔdubunu Katɔti ɔtu unengudi lɛdi. Na Katɔti kakpɛɛ kadubɔku. Na Blɔti ɔlati ɔdubɔda ɔlɛ kayaa. Na bekyuli bani náƒɔ Kristo bádi asa na békpi ni, badubɔka bɔta buli ngba.
52004017	Ɔmɛni kama ni, Katɔti ɔdubutiku abu bani nébu buli ngba na uti-bu utásalaku bekyuli bani náta na butásiaku Blɔti na kayaa. Na bɔdubulieku Blɔti uwi ƒui.
52004018	Anwuɔsu biti etemila amɛni bitaasia lɛlɔ kɔnu.
52005001	Banwa, útalɛka linweni-mii lɛla lɛdi ɔ́si uwi iye emeyi ani na ala amɛni adubɔlɛ lɛlɔ.
52005002	Ɔsika amii alati bɛgyi geen ka Blɔti limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛdububo aani kalɛ na uyune uuyú ukyuli taatu usien.
52005003	Na uwi ɔni kemo na bekyuli baasu banii lɛla biala lɛ́ɛtɛ ni, uwi ɔmmɔ geen na ɔgbankpi adubɔlɛku-ma ɔni na baaagyi beeese. Ɔdububo aani kalɛ na kawɔƒɔ kaadu ɔƒɔdane. Na kekelikɔ kadi keeebo.
52005004	Nsu ni, banwa, amii bɛɛɛkya lɛdisa kemo. Anwuɔsu limeyi libendi lɛmmɔ liléyu-mii lilatu aani uyune kalɛ.
52005005	Ɔsika bina ƒui bɛkya bukeye kemo. Na bɔɔɔdi aani bekyuli bani náƒɔ lɛlɔ bákya likpidi kemo na baabla ala taabɛ.
52005006	Anwuɔsu bitaya na bɔlɛɛ na budie lɛlɔ atu aani ama bani naaagyi Blɔti. Mmomu bɛya bunye kagyumana na bɔda lɛlɔ kaduɛ.
52005007	Ɔsika ama bani mɔɔlɛɛ ni, usien na baalɛɛ. Na ama bani muukpi ntɛ ni, usien na beekpi-mu.
52005008	Nsu abu bani nkya bukeye kemo ni, bɛya na bɔda lɛlɔ kaduɛ. Na buti bula bɔƒɔtaadi ku bula bɔyɔ butaagyumana lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na kekpo adala aagyumana ukpone. Na butaasia anu ka Blɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ-bu, aani kalɛ na kekpo kabwa kaagyumana ukpone lili.
52005009	Ɔsika Katɔti útedie-bu ɔnii nwuna kɔnyi kubo-bu lɛlɔ. Mmomu ɔnii bɔsia Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ na bɔkɛ bɔƒɔ.
52005010	Yesu ɔmɛni nékpi na bula lili ɔni na si bulie o-o, si bukpi o-o ni, bɔdubulie ku Blɔti na nwuna bɔsɔ bubo kemo.
52005011	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, bitaakya lɛlɔ ogya na biteebunku lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na biwi-nwu lɛlɔ ɔƒaani.
52005012	Banwa, buuvele-mii bɔnii biti ɔbu geen bite bina batɔnkune bani mɔɔtina-mii Kristo ngba bulie ala lɛlɔ.
52005013	Bɛyɔ-ma na bɛbu-ma kaduɛ na bana ulu ɔbuni ɔni na béti-mii baasiaku ɔsu. Na bilieku lɛlɔ ku keyi buɛɛ.
52005014	Lɛnɔ ni, banwa, bɔɔwia kpakplaa ka bɛkɛ litemi bɛsu bakɔsɔne. Na bɛkya bani na liƒu lɛɛda ɔkplu. Na bibunku bani mɔɔwia kebunku. Na bɛkɛ kayi buɛɛ bite ukyuli biala.
52005015	Bɛnu kaduɛ na ɔdi uteti likpidi utaƒɔ likpidi kayu. Mmomu uwi biala kemo ni, bitaabla lɛbuni teete lɛlɔ ku bekyuli ƒui.
52005016	Bɛya na lɛlɔ litaayɔ-mii uwi biala.
52005017	Bitaya na enu aƒɛ-mii na katɔ bɔkpali kemo.
52005018	Na biti enugya bite Blɔti na lɛla biala kemo. Ɔsika amɛni ndi ala ani na Katɔti ɔɔwia taasiku amii bani ƒui nsiaku Yesu Kristo kama.
52005019	Bitetile Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun ulu na bina akɔ.
52005020	Biteni Katɔti kenye bediene ala kalɔ budie aani lɛla keeke.
52005021	Mmomu bɛwia lɛla biala kalɔ binu na bɛsiaku lɛbuni kama.
52005022	Bɛda lɛlɔ bidie likpidi ulu biala lɛlɔ.
52005023	Na buuvele Katɔti ɔni muute-bu keyi buɛɛ bɔnii ɔbla-mii kedee na ulu biala lɛlɔ. Na ɔgyumana bina kɔyu ku kasusu ku ɔlɔna ƒui kalɛ na bɛlɛ kɔtɔ bɔdu kemo uwi ɔni na Blɔti Yesu Kristo wasɔ webo.
52005024	Na Katɔti ɔni nálɔ-mii ɔnii binwini nwuna bekyuli ni, ɔdububunku-mii utédu kawɔlɔkɔ. Ɔsika lɛla lɛni na ɔ́nya ɔ́su ka wabla ni, ani kani na ɔdubɔbla.
52005025	Banwa, bitaakpali katɔ na bula lili.
52005026	Bɛkya lɛlɔ kɔgbu na bigyele lɛlɔ ku kaƒɔ ƒaa.
52005027	Mɔɔsu-mii kpakplaa aani Blɔti Yesu Kristo kenye unyene nnii bɛka ɔku ɔmɛni bite baƒɔtaadine bammɔ ƒui.
52005028	Muuvele Blɔti Yesu Kristo nnii ɔda-mii kɔkɔɔkɔ na nwuna lɛƒɔndia kemo.
53001001	Ami Paulo ku Silvano ku Timoteo búnweni ɔku ɔmɛni buute amii bani ndi bula Unwoti Katɔti ku Blɔti Yesu Kristo badi na Tesalonika.
53001002	Na buuvele bɔnii bɛkɛ Unwoti Katɔti ku Blɔti Yesu Kristo keyi buɛɛ ku lɛƒɔndia.
53001003	Banwa, bɔda Katɔti enugya kayu uwi ƒui na amii ɔsu. Na ɔdia ka butaaƒɔ-ka, ɔsika bina bɔƒɔtaadi bɔɔkɔ́ katɔ, na bina lɛlɔ bɔyɔ lɛnɔ buusié anumi teebu ɔsu. Ɔmɛni ɔsu na bɔɔlɔ-mii lɛnyi buni na Katɔti baƒɔtaadine akɔ.
53001004	Na bɔɔtalaku bina lɛnyi katɔ ɔsika binye bina bɔƒɔtaadi lɛlɔ kpakplaa na bɛɛkya ɔkplu ina ka beekpóku-mii na biibó abi.
53001005	Ɔmɛni ɔɔtina-bu ka Katɔti ɔɔtɛ litemi siin. Na ɔdubute-mii keliekɔ na nwuna lɛga kadikɔ kani ɔsu na biibó abi.
53001006	Katɔti ɔdubɔtɛ litemi na ulu lɛlɔ. Na ɔdubɔni bani muukpóku-mii ƒui kɔtu.
53001007	Na ɔdubɔya na abu ku amii bani ƒui muubó abi bɔkɛ bɔnwuna. Katɔti ɔdubɔbla ala amɛni uwi ɔni na Blɔti Yesu ku Katɔti batu badubɔda bɔlɛ kayaa na ɔyikun kemo ku ogya.
53001008	Na bekyuli bani naaabu Katɔti na bátaƒɔ Blɔti Yesu Kristo litemi buni bátadi ni, ɔdubɔni-ma kɔtu na lɛgyavonku kemo.
53001009	Lɛni na Blɔti ɔdubɔgya-ma ɔlɛku nwuna anumi. Na balanu nwuna bukeye ku ɔyikun. Na ɔdubɔyila-ma ku udu.
53001010	Ala amɛni adubɔlɛ na limeyi libendi lɛni lɛlɔ na Yesu wasɔ webo. Na limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, nwuna baƒɔtaadine ƒui badubɔsiaku-nwu ku bumwi kudu. Na amii lɛnɔ bɛdubɔkya-ma akɔ, ɔsika bɛ́ƒɔ nwuna litemi buni lɛni bɔ́su-mii mmɔ bɛ́di.
53001011	Ɔmɛni ɔsu na bɔɔkpali katɔ na bina lili uwi ndi uwi. Na buuvele bula Katɔti bɔnii bina ɔbladu ɔmanku bɔlɔ bɔni na ɔ́lɔ-mii. Na nwuna ɔyikun ubunku-mii na ɔkya bina kasusu buni biala ogya kalɛ na lɛla biala lɛni na bɛdubɔbla na anwu ɔsu lɛtɛ.
53001012	Buuvele ala amɛni teete-mii kalɛ na bakɔliku Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛnyi katɔ na amii ɔsu. Na anwu lɛnɔ wakɔliku-mii lɛnyi katɔ na anwu ku Katɔti lɛƒɔndia ɔsu.
53002001	Banwa, bɔɔyɔ́ ka bɔsu-mii lɛla kpakplaa lɛdi na Blɔti Yesu Kristo bɔsɔ bubo ku bula bɔsala na nwuna kudɔ lɛlɔ.
53002002	Si bínu bɛnii Blɔti bubo limeyi lɛmmɔ líbo líbavi ni, buláwia ka bina kasusu keƒu iye ɔtɔtɔ ɔgyu-mii. Ɔƒɛni kalɛ ɔdubɔbla-mii aani ka abu násu ɔmɛni uwi ɔni na buudie Katɔti kenye iye bɔɔkɔ́ litemi lɛmmɔ lɛsa iye búnweni ɔku ɔdi búmene-mii.
53002003	Bitaya na ukyuli ɔdi ɔtɔlɔ-mii na ulu biala lɛlɔ. Ɔsika Blɔti limeyi lɛmmɔ lilebo tɔ utédu uwi ɔni na bekyuli pii badubuni Katɔti asa na ukyuli ukpidi ɔmmɔ ɔni na Katɔti údie úse ka ɔkyula ɔda ɔlɛ.
53002004	Na ɔdubɔta unye utile kɔyu ɔyikun biala ulu na ɔtina ka anwu lɛti ndi ayu ƒui utulone. Na ɔdubo bɔta muedi butélie Katɔti kakpakɔ na ɔbla lɛlɔ aani anwu ndi Katɔti ɔmmɔ.
53002005	Binyimo ka uwi ɔni na lɛ́kya-mii kudɔ ni, lɛ́su-mii ala amɛni ƒui.
53002006	Nsu ni, ɔyikun ɔdi uutile ala ammɔ kuƒi ka alɛ ɔƒɛni. Na amii alati bɛ́gyi lɛla lɛni na lɛdi. Na ukyuli ukpidi ɔmmɔ ɔdubudie lɛlɔ keyi si nwuna uwi údu.
53002007	Na likyulikpi ala ani baabla taabɛ éese kalɔ aalɛ́. Na ala ani ndubɔlɛ ni, aaadubo bɔlɛ tɔ wetédu ka Katɔti ɔ́da ukyuli ɔni muutile ukyuli ukpidi ɔmmɔ ulu údie.
53002008	Na ɔmɛni kama ni, Katɔti ɔdubudie ukyuli ukpidi ɔmmɔ keyi ɔtina. Na si uwi ɔni na Blɔti Yesu Kristo úbo ni, ɔdubuti nwuna kenye ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ku bukeye ɔkyula-nwu na ɔyila-nwu udu ƒui.
53002009	Na ukyuli ukpidi ɔmmɔ ɔdububo ku Satan ɔyikun, na ɔdubudie ɔkɔ akɔla budie taatina lidu lidu ɔtina.
53002010	Na bekyuli bani ƒui ndubo bɔyii ku udu ni, ɔdubɔsia likyulikpi katɔlɔ ulu biala lɛlɔ na ɔtɔlɔ-ma. Badubo bɔyii ɔsika bátaƒɔ litemi buni lɛmmɔ bátadi na Katɔti ɔƒɔ-ma ngba.
53002011	Ɔmɛni ɔsu na Katɔti ɔdubɔnyonu-ma kalɛ na baƒɔ ɔkɔ badi.
53002012	Kawɔlɔkɔ ƒui ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔdu-ma kɔtɔ, ɔsika bátaƒɔ litemi buni bátadi. Mmomu bátaakɛ ebiti na ekpidi bɔbla kemo.
53002013	Nsu ni, banwa, bɔda Katɔti enugya kayu uwi ƒui na amii ɔsu. Bɔgyi ka ɔɔyɔ́-mii sɔsɔ. Ɔsika ɔ́ƒuna-mii ɔnii bɛkɛ bɔƒɔ. Na ɔ́bla-mii nwuna badi ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ uwi ɔni na Katɔti Kɔyu kúveli bina ekpidi údie-mii lɛlɔ ɔsika bɛ́ƒɔ litemi buni lɛmmɔ bɛ́di ɔsu.
53002014	Na ɔkɛnku bula litemi buni lɛmɛni bɔsu kemo ni, Katɔti ɔ́lɔ-mii ɔnii bibo na bɛƒɔ lɛnyi aani kalɛ na Blɔti Yesu Kristo ubo lɛnyi.
53002015	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, banwa, binye kpakplaa na biƒie etemila ani na bɔ́tina-mii na bula lɛku bunweni ku bɔtɛmi kemo bɛda.
53002016	Na buuvele kebunku taasiku Blɔti Yesu Kristo ku bula Unwoti Katɔti kudɔ ɔni mɔɔyɔ́-bu, na úti kayi buse ku lɛnunsia úte-bu ɔ́si nwuna lɛƒɔndia ɔsu.
53002017	Buuvele-nwu bɔnii, ute-mii ɔyikun na ɔkya-mii kayi ogya kalɛ na bɛsu na bɛbla ala abuni ƒui lɛnɔ.
53003001	Asa na mawɔlɔ ni, banwa, binyimo na bitaakpali katɔ na bula lili kalɛ na Blɔti litemi lɛmɛni liteegyingya teesie kesi kesii ku ɔbu aani kalɛ na amii lɛnɔ bɛ́ƒɔ-ni.
53003002	Na bivele lɛnɔ kalɛ Blɔti wada-bu wedie na bekyuli bekpidi enu kemo, ɔsika ɔɔɔdi bekyuli ƒui náƒɔ nwuna litemi lɛmmɔ bádi.
53003003	Nsu Blɔti unye-mii kama, na ɔdubɔkya-mii ɔkplu na wanu-mii lɛlɔ kalɛ na ukisine ɔmmɔ uladi-mii lɛlɔ.
53003004	Blɔti ɔ́ya na bubo lɛnunsia na bina lɛlɔ ka bɛɛbla ala ani na bɔ́tina-mii, na bɔgyi ka bɛdubɔkana-nya butaabla.
53003005	Buuvele Blɔti bɔnii ubimi-mii anumi na bɛnu bɛti kalɛ na anwu Kristo ɔɔkɛ́ kayi teete-bu ku kalɛ na Katɔti ɔɔyɔ́-bu.
53003006	Banwa, bɔɔlɛ-mii geen na Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛnyi kemo bɔnii bɛda lɛlɔ bɛmami baƒɔtaadine bakɔsɔne bani neeeti bula ala bɔtina lɛlɔ.
53003007	Amii alati bɛgyi kaduɛ ka ɔdi ka bɛbla kabla aani kalɛ kani na abu lɛnɔ bɔ́bla, ɔsika bútabla kɔkɔsɔ uwi ɔni na bɔ́kya-mii kudɔ.
53003008	Búteti bula etila bútasia ɔdi lɛlɔ. Na mmomu bɔ́bla kabla kpakplaa usien ku ɔƒɛ ɔni na ɔdi útebo bula lɛlɔ bɔnu kayu.
53003009	Bubo ɔyikun ka nka buti bula etila bɔsia-mii lɛlɔ. Nsu ka bɔɔyɔ́ ka bɛtɛya kalɛ na beenye kabla lɛlɔ ɔsu ni, bútabla lɛni.
53003010	Bɛdubunyimo ka uwi ɔni na bɔ́kya-mii kudɔ ni, bɔ́su-mii geen bɔnii ukyuli ɔni muuní kabla ni, bitete-nwu lɛla lɛdi na ɔdi.
53003011	Bɔɔsu ala amɛni ɔsika buunú ka bakɔsɔne badi bakya-mii akɔ na bana bakpana lɛlɔ etemila kani na bakɛ baasu taavi.
53003012	Buubó bekyuli bamɛni ɔda kpakplaa na Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛnyi kemo bɔnii bada ngba kaduɛ na beti bana enu bawia bana lɛdila.
53003013	Nsu amii ni, banwa, bitaya na enu aƒɛ-mii na lɛbuni bɔbla kemo.
53003014	Na si ukyuli ɔdi ulábla taasiaku litemi lɛni na bɔ́su-mii na ɔku ɔmɛni kemo lɛlɔ ni, bise-nwu likpo na bɛda lɛlɔ bɛmami-nwu lɛlɔ na kɔƒa kukpo-nwu.
53003015	Nsu bitekisi ukyuli ɔmmɔ. Mmomu bɛlɛ-nwu aani bina ɔnwani kalɛ.
53003016	Buuvele Blɔti ɔlatidi ɔni muute keyi buɛɛ bɔnii ute-mii keyi buɛɛ na bina ngba bulie ƒui kemo. Blɔti ɔda bina ƒui na ulu biala lɛlɔ.
53003017	Ami Paulo muunweni bɔkada bɔmɛni ku ami ɔlati mina kɔnu aani likpose lɛni mɔɔtina ka ami na ɔdi. Lɛni na muunweni na mina lɛku ƒui kemo.
53003018	Buuvele bɔnii Blɔti Yesu Kristo ɔda bina ƒui na nwuna lɛƒɔndia kemo.
54001001	Ami Paulo ɔni ndi Yesu Kristo ɔtalane ɔkɛ bula Ɔƒɔne Katɔti ku Kristo Yesu ɔni lɛlɔ na bɔsia anu na muunweni ɔmɛni.
54001002	Na líti muute awɔ Timoteo. Agyi ka ubi na adi-mi na bɔƒɔtaadi kemo. Na muuvele Unwoti Katɔti ku Blɔti Yesu nnii bana lɛƒɔndia lɛsiaku-ɔ na banu-ɔ kɔnyana na bete-ɔ keyi buɛɛ.
54001003	Na ɔƒɛni ni, mɔɔwia ka asɔ akya Eƒeso mmɔ aani kalɛ na lɛ́su-ɔ uwi ɔni na lɛ́si mmɔ lísela Makedonia. Ɔsika agyi ka bekyuli badi bakya bani mɔɔtina ala ani muuƒú bula ala bɔtina na Kristo bɔƒɔtaadi lɛlɔ. Ɔlɛka abɔku bekyuli bamɛni na bada udu ɔmmɔ baya.
54001004	Su-ma na bada kuuku atɛ bɔnwi ku kaba kasikɔ lɛmɛnɛ bɔkun baya. Ala amɛni udu muuti unyeƒi taakya bekyuli akɔ. Na aaakɛnku Katɔti kasusu lɛlɔ. Kasusu kani na ɔkɛnku bɔƒɔtaadi lɛlɔ kani na bɔdubɔnu bɔti.
54001005	Na lɛla lɛni ɔsu na líti kabla kamɛni lɛ́kya-a enu kemo ndi ka bɔyɔ bula baƒɔtaadine bakpana ku kaƒɔ ƒaa ku kayi kani naaadu-bu kɔtɔ na likpidi lɛdi bɔbla kemo. Na bula Kristo bɔƒɔtaadi lɛnɔ bɔbla ɔbuni ɔmmɔ geen.
54001006	Nsu bekyuli badi bénwini kama bákya ala amɛni. Anwuɔsu báyila ulu ɔbuni ɔmɛni. Na baakya kɔdɔlɔ unyeƒi.
54001007	Baawia ka benwini Mose ɔda bubo ala batinane. Nsu ni, belenu ama alati etemila muedi kalɔ. Baasu ala kpakplaa taasiku ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ lɛlɔ, nsu ama alati belenu-nya kalɔ.
54001008	Bula ƒui bɔgyi ka Mose ɔda bubo bɔdia, nsu ɔlɛka bɔdi ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na bɔɔtina.
54001009	Na ɔlɛka buteenyimo lɛnɔ ka ni, ɔɔɔdi bekyuli babuni na bébo ɔda béte, mmomu batuɔkplune bani mɔɔƒiɔ́ Katɔti ɔda bubo ku bakantankpine ku bana udu bani ngba néyi ku ekpidi bɔbla. Badi bekyuli bani naaasiaku bɔƒɔtaadi bɔdi kama ku bani mɔɔdú bana bati ku beni ku bekyuli badune babambadi lɛnɔ.
54001010	Na badi bekyuli bani mɔɔdi kɔsɔnɔ ku banana bani mɔɔtɛnku lɛlɔ. Badi bekyuli bani muuyú bekyuli teetéye ku ɔkɔ banyine ku ama bani mɔɔnyi ɔkɔ taakpali ala. Na ama bani ƒui naaasiaku ala bɔtina bɔbuni kama ni, ama na bébo ɔda ɔmɛni béte.
54001011	Na Katɔti litemi buni lɛni bɔsu na úti ɔ́kya-mi enu kemo ni, nina kemo kani na bɔdubɔkɛ ala bɔtina bɔbuni bɔmmɔ bɔni nási Katɔti ɔmmɔ ɔlati bukeye kemo. Na anwu na bɔɔgyá enu.
54001012	Naaakana Blɔti Yesu Kristo enu bɔgya na ɔyikun ɔni na úte-mi ɔnii ntaabla kabla kamɛni ɔsu. Na sɔsɔ ni, úti-ka ɔ́kya-mi enu kemo. Ɔsika ɔ́nu-mi ɔ́ti ka naaalɛ-nwu kama.
54001013	Ina ka líkpoku-nwu na lɛ́tɛmi enyekpi ku edumi na nwuna lɛlɔ dii asa na ḿbenwini kayi ni, Katɔti ɔ́nu-mi kɔnyana. Ɔsika uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ńtaƒɔ-nwu tɔ ńtadi na ńtati lɛla lɛni lɛnɔ na ńtaabla.
54001014	Mina tati tati ɔ́ya na lɛ́du-nwu kaƒɔ, na ɔ́ya na lɛ́nu Kristo Yesu lɛ́ti na lɛ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛ́di na lɛ́blaku-nwu unwi. Ɔmɛni ɔsu na ami lɛnɔ mɔɔyɔ́ bekyuli.
54001015	Kenye kani na ndubo bɔsu mɛni kadi litemi geen, na ɔlɛka ukyuli biala ɔƒɔ-ka ɔdi. Yesu ɔni ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi úbo kayawi kamɛni kemo ɔnii ubedie bekyuli ɔlɛku bana ekpidi ani na baabla kemo. Na ala ekpidi bablane bammɔ ƒui akɔ ni, ami ntulo.
54001016	Ɔmɛni ɔsu geen na Katɔti ɔ́nu-mi kɔnyana kalɛ na ɔkɛnku ami ɔni ntulo-ma akɔ ƒui lɛlɔ ni, Kristo Yesu ɔdubɔya na bekyuli banu kalɛ na ubo bɔyɔ bɔni muuti taakyiɛ ute ekpidi bablane bani maƒɔ-nwu madi. Na ɔdubute-ma ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa lɛnɔ kudii.
54001017	Anwuɔsu ni, bɛya na buteemwi bula Katɔ Ɔga ɔni na bulánu ku bula anumi na uli ngba úsela ƒui. Na butaakɔliku anwu ɔni neeekpi kudii lɛnyi katɔ uwi ƒui. Ɔsia lɛni.
54001018	Mina ubi Timoteo, kabla ku ɔda bubo bɔni na líti muute-ɔ mɛni ni, kadanku ala ani na bula kenye bediene básu básiku-ɔ lɛlɔ. Ƒie etemila amɛni da na adubɔdi likpidi lɛlɔ na Blɔti kekpo kamɛni kemo.
54001019	Da ƒula bɔƒɔtaadi kaduɛ kalɛ na ƒula kayi kaládu-ɔ kɔtɔ. Ɔsika bekyuli bani na bétenu bana kayi bɔlɛ ni, bayii bana bɔƒɔtaadi ulu.
54001020	Na bana akɔ badi ndi Himeneo ku Aleksandro. Lɛ́ni-ma kɔtu na líti-ma líte ukisine ɔmmɔ kalɛ na bebo abi na nwuna enu kemo. Ɔmɛni ndubɔya na batɛya lɛla na bada enyekpi bɔtɛmi taasiku Katɔti lɛlɔ baya.
54002001	Lɛla lideedi lɛni na mɔɔyɔ́ ka bɛti ndi ka bitaakpali katɔ na biteevele na bekyuli ƒui lili. Na biteeti amii ku-ma ƒui awiala taava Katɔti anumi.
54002002	Na bitaakpali katɔ teete baga ku bekyuli bani ƒui mɔɔdi bekyuli lɛlɔ kalɛ na bula ƒui bɔkɛ atu bɔyɔ ku keyi buɛɛ. Na buboku lɛlɔ kalɔ bute Katɔti na buti ɔbu bute ukyuli biala.
54002003	Katɔ bɔkpali bɔmɛni mɔɔyɔ́ bula Ɔƒɔne Katɔti kaƒɔ.
54002004	Ɔsika ɔɔwia ka ukyuli biala ɔnu nwuna litemi geen lɛmmɔ ɔti kalɛ na ɔƒɔ-nwu ngba.
54002005	Sɔsɔ ni, Katɔti unwi kani nkya. Na kɔnu ɔsiane lɛnɔ unwi kani nkya. Anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni baalɔ banii Kristo Yesu. Anwu mɔɔklibi abu ku Katɔti ntɛ.
54002006	Anwu néti lɛlɔ ɔ́kpa na bayawine ƒui lili. Na Yesu ɔ́bla ɔmɛni na uwi ɔni lɛlɔ geen na Katɔti úse ka udie nwuna bekyuli bɔƒɔ keyi ɔtina bayawine ƒui.
54002007	Na ɔmɛni ɔsu na Katɔti ɔ́bla-mi lɛsa ɔkɔne ku ɔtalane. Na ɔɔɔdi ɔkɔ na mɔɔnyi. Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii údie-mi aani ala ɔtinane ɔnii mbedie bɔƒɔtaadi kenye ntina bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ.
54002008	Na baƒɔtaadine kasalakɔ biala ni, mɔɔwia ka banana bataakpali katɔ ku kayi kedee kalɛ na si Katɔti ɔɔnu bina enu katɔ ni, na ɔti ka bɛ́da lɛlɔ bídie likpidi kemo. Na kɔnyi iye unyeƒi ɔdi uuubo-mii akɔ.
54002009	Mɔɔwia lɛnɔ ka beleku banu kaduɛ na bana adala lɛlɔ, na batina ka beeboku lɛlɔ kalɔ. Ɔɔɔdi ka beteenyimi lili ku kunweni lidu lidu ku sika ugyiedi adala lidu lidu ani náƒɔ kuye na aatina ka baakɔliku lɛlɔ katɔ.
54002010	Mmomu ni, bana ɔbladu ɔbuni udie-ma ɔtina aani beleku bani mɔɔsu banii basiaku Blɔti.
54002011	Na uleku biala uboku lɛlɔ kalɔ na ɔtɛya ala, na utakya lɛsɛ.
54002012	Ńtete-ma kuƒi nnii batina banana ala iye badi banana lɛlɔ. Mmomu ɔlɛka bada bana inye.
54002013	Ɔsika Adam na Katɔti ɔka budie asa na údie Eva.
54002014	Na ɔɔɔdi Adam na ukisine ɔmmɔ ɔ́tɔlɔ, mmomu uleku na ɔ́tɔlɔ. Na ɔ́ya na ɔ́bla likpidi.
54002015	Nsu si uleku wenye kpakplaa na nwuna bɔƒɔtaadi kemo ku bɔyɔ na wada lɛlɔ kedee na weboku lɛlɔ kalɔ ni, ɔdubɔvi nwuna kɔwɔ lɛbibo kemo buɛɛ.
54003001	Lɛsugba lɛmɛni lɛdi litemi geen ka ni, si ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔwia ka unwini baƒɔtaadine ɔtɔnkune ni, ɔɔwia kabla kabuni.
54003002	Na baƒɔtaadine ɔtɔnkune ni, ɔlɛka ɔbla ukyuli ɔni na litemi lɛdi lɛɛɛda-nwu, na úti uleku unwi, na ɔ́da anu, na ɔda lɛlɔ, na bekyuli baabu-nwu. Ɔɔbla lɛƒɔ na ɔdi ala ɔtinane buni.
54003003	Utalɛka utaani ntɛ teekpi, na ulekpo udi. Mmomu ɔlɛka ɔbla ukyuli ɔni nse buɛɛ, na ulayɔ kadɔ, na uuubo sika lɛnungyie lɛnɔ.
54003004	Ɔlɛka ɔkana nwuna kaduli bekyuli bɔda, na ɔya na nwuna bebi beteenu litemi na ulu biala lɛlɔ.
54003005	Na si ukyuli ɔdi ɔkya na ulákana nwuna kaduli bekyuli lɛlɔ bɔnu ni, agyi anii ulakana na watɔnku Katɔti baƒɔtaadine.
54003006	Utalɛka ɔbla ɔƒɔtaadine ɔwɔdi kalɛ na ulatalaku lɛlɔ katɔ, na ɔkɛnku lɛlɔ bɔtina bɔmmɔ ɔsu na webuli, na Katɔti wani-nwu kɔtu aani kalɛ na ɔ́ni ukisine ɔmmɔ kɔtu.
54003007	Ɔlɛka ɔbla ukyuli ɔni na ubo lɛnyi buni na bekyuli bani naaadi baƒɔtaadine lɛnɔ anumi, kalɛ na balasu lɛla likpidi lɛdi na nwuna lɛlɔ na weduo ukisine ɔmmɔ kakpagyuɛ kemo.
54003008	Na baƒɔtaadine kasala bebunkune ni, ama lɛnɔ ɔlɛka babla bekyuli bani nda udu buni, na bada kabla kammɔ lɛnɔ kpakplaa. Na badi bekyuli bani naaani ntɛ teekpi, na anumi elégyie-ma na egulabi lɛlɔ.
54003009	Na ɔlɛka bada bɔƒɔtaadi litemi buni lɛni na bédie keyi mɛni kpakplaa ku kayi kani naaadu-ma kɔtɔ.
54003010	Na ɔdi ka bɛka-ma udu bɔkɔku bɔnu. Na si bana lɛlɔ liiibo litemi lɛdi ni, bɛya-na benwini baƒɔtaadine bebunkune.
54003011	Bana beleku lɛnɔ ni, ɔlɛka babla beleku bani nda udu buni, na baaadi bekyuli lɛlɔ atɛ batɛmine. Mmomu ɔlɛka babla beleku bani náda anu, na baabla lɛla biala kaduɛ.
54003012	Bɛnu ka bebunkune bamɛni ɔdi biala úti uleku unwi, na ɔɔnu nwuna bebi ku kaduli bekyuli ƒui lɛlɔ kaduɛ.
54003013	Na bebunkune bani mɔɔda bana kabla kaduɛ ni, ama alati bebo kenyekɔ kabuni na Katɔti anumi. Na baakana na beesé kayi taasu bana bɔƒɔtaadi etemila ɔ́si Yesu Kristo bɔƒɔtaadi lɛlɔ.
54003014	-
54003015	Na nsia lɛnu ka ndububo uwi klukui kemo mbanu-ɔ. Nsu muunweni ala amɛni lite-ɔ kalɛ na si mɔɔkpɛ kama ni, na ebunku-ɔ na ati kalɛ na ada ƒula lɛlɔ aani ɔtɔnkune na Katɔti ɔtɔ bebi akɔ. Na ngba ƒui Katɔti ɔtɔ bebi bani ndi baƒɔtaadine kasala ni, baagyumana nwuna litemi geen.
54003016	Katɔti litemi kedee lɛni na bédie keyi ni, lɛ́ƒɔ kuye geen na ukyuli biala ulakana na weni-ni. Ani ndi ka, “Blɔti úbo aani ɔyawine ubi. Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́gyila-nwu na kúte-nwu ubo. Na katɔ batu bánu-nwu. Na bekyuli bákɔ-nwu lɛlɔ lɛsa na kadi ƒui akɔ. Bekyuli pii báƒɔ-nwu bádi na kayawi. Na Katɔti úti-nwu úsienku katɔ.”
54004001	Katɔti Kɔyu kuudie taasu-bu nwaa ka ni, asa na emeyi ekplodi adubudu ni, bekyuli badi badubɔlɛ bɔƒɔtaadi litemi geen lɛmɛni kama na basiaku ayu ekpidi katɔlɔ ku bani néti lɛlɔ béte ukisine ɔmmɔ ala bɔtina kama.
54004002	Bekyuli bamɛni mɔɔtina ɔkɔ ala, na baabɛla ama alati bana likyulikpi, ɔsika bana kayi kaladu-ma kɔtɔ.
54004003	Na baatina banii utalɛka bekyuli beti beleku. Na baasu banii batadi adila lidu lɛdi bene lɛnɔ. Nsu Katɔti nédie adila ƒui úse kalɛ na bani náƒɔ-nwu litemi geen bádi na basiaku-nwu kama ni, badi-nya ku linugya.
54004004	Na sɔsɔ ni, lɛla biala na Katɔti údie ni, lɛdia. Anwuɔsu útalɛka bekyuli beni lɛdila lɛdi. Mmomu ɔlɛka baka Katɔti enu bɔgya na ana lili.
54004005	Ɔsika Katɔti litemi ku bula linugya lɛ́bla adila ammɔ kedee.
54004006	Si átina ƒula banwa ala amɛni ni, mmɔ na adubɔbla Yesu Kristo kabla ubunkune buni. Na bɔƒɔtaadi etemila amɛni ku bula ala bɔtina bɔni kama na asia ni, anya muute-ɔ kenyekɔ kamɛni.
54004007	Anwuɔsu da lɛlɔ mami kɔbɔ ala batɛmine ku atɛ keeke ani neeebo kɔsia lɛlɔ. Na ataatɛya Katɔti etemila na asiaku-nya kama kpakplaa, na elie ngba buni aani ɔƒɔtaadine kalɛ.
54004008	Ɔlɔna lɛlɔ ɔkplu ɔdia bɔdi, nsu kalɛ na baatɛya Katɔti etemila kama bɔsiaku bubo kɔsia butulo ƒui. Ɔsika uute-ɔ kɔsia na ngba bɔmɛni ku kekpima ngba lɛnɔ kemo.
54004009	Ɔmɛni ɔdi litemi geen lɛni na ɔlɛka ukyuli biala ɔƒɔ ɔdi.
54004010	Ɔmɛni ɔsu na bunye kabla lɛlɔ kpakplaa na buubó abi. Ɔsika bula anu asia ngba ƒui Katɔti ɔni ndi bekyuli ƒui Ɔƒɔne lɛlɔ. Na bani geen na ɔdubo bɔƒɔ ndi bani náƒɔ-nwu bádi.
54004011	Na ala amɛni na ɔlɛka atina-ma.
54004012	Taya na ukyuli ɔdi ɔnu-ɔ ɔnii ásɔ ka adi ɔnamu ɔsu. Mmomu ni, nwini kanu te baƒɔtaadine bammɔ ƒui na ƒula kɔtɛ ku udu ku ƒula bekyuli bɔyɔ ku bɔƒɔtaadi kemo ku ƒula kedee bulie lɛnɔ kemo.
54004013	Nye kpakplaa na ataaka Katɔti litemi lɛmmɔ na ataakɔ-ni lɛsa teete baƒɔtaadine ƒui. Na eteedie-ni kalɔ na ataatina-ma ala ammɔ wetédu uwi ɔni na mebo.
54004014	Na Katɔti Kɔyu kemo kabla etela ani na úti ɔ́kya-a lɛlɔ kemo ɔkɛnku nwuna kenye bediene ku baƒɔtaadine benengu bani néti enu básia-a lɛlɔ ni, tada-nya aya.
54004015	Ya na ƒula kasusu kasia ɔmɛni lɛlɔ, na ataabla-nya taasia kama kalɛ na bekyuli ƒui banu ƒula ngba buni bulie lɛtɔtɔ busie bati.
54004016	Da lɛlɔ kaduɛ ku ala ani na aatina. Nye kabla kammɔ lɛlɔ kpakplaa. Ɔsika si ábla lɛni ni, adubudie awɔ ku bekyuli bani ƒui muunú ƒula litemi lɛmmɔ alɛku kɔtu bɔni kemo.
54005001	Tadɔnku ukyuli ɔni nábi lɛlɔ utulo-ɔ momoomo. Mmomu die ala kalɔ te-nwu ku kayi buɛɛ aani ƒula ɔti kalɛ. Na ada bakloƒu aani banwani kalɛ.
54005002	Da beleku bani nábi lɛlɔ bétulo-ɔ aani ƒula beni kalɛ. Na ada begblebi lɛnɔ aani ƒula banwani belekubi, na ataabla lɛlɔ kedee.
54005003	Bekpinele bani neeebo bebunkune ni, da-ma kaduɛ ku ɔbu.
54005004	Nsu si ukpinele ɔdi ubo bebi iye bawɔ ni, bebi bammɔ bese kalɔ bataatɛya bana kaduli bekyuli bɔda ku bana bawɔne bɔda aani bana bɔƒɔtaadi kabla kalɛ. Ɔmmɔ mɔɔtina ka beesé bana bawɔne kɔdɛ. Ɔmɛni mɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti kaƒɔ.
54005005	Na ukpinele ɔni neeebo ubunkune ni, uuti nwuna anu ƒui taasia Katɔti lɛlɔ na ɔɔkpali Katɔti usien ku ɔƒɛ ka ɔɔwia-nwu kebunku ɔsu.
54005006	Nsu ukpinele ɔni mɔɔbla lɛyalɛ ni, uuubo ngba na Katɔti anumi ina ka uli ngba.
54005007	Bo-ma ɔda na ala amɛni lɛlɔ kalɛ na beletemi belewi-ma.
54005008	Na si bina akɔ ɔdi úni na uláda nwuna kaduli bekyuli kaduɛ ni, agyi anii ɔɔɔsiaku bɔƒɔtaadi bɔmmɔ kama, na nwuna litemi líbie litulo ukyuli ɔni nátaƒɔ útadi.
54005009	Teti ukpinele ɔni nátaƒɔ tɔ akwa liti ku leevu lɛnyi tebunku bekpinele lɛkpa lɛni nkya baƒɔtaadine bammɔ akɔ. Na ɔni nsia ni, ukpinele ɔni néduo lɛkpa lɛmmɔ kemo ɔlɛka ɔbla uleku ɔni nélie kɔgya kunwi.
54005010	Ɔlɛka bekyuli bataalɔ-nwu lɛnyi lɛbuni na nwuna ala abuni bɔbla ɔsu. Na ɔdi uleku ɔni nányuɛ nwuna bebi kaduɛ na ɔɔƒɔ́ baƒɔ. Ɔlɛka ɔbla uleku ɔni na ubo kɔnu ute nwuna baƒɔtaadine bakpana. Na uute bekyuli ƒui kebunku na bana lɛbibo kemo. Na sɔsɔ ni, úti nwuna ngba bulie ƒui úte lɛbuni bɔbla.
54005011	Bekpinele bani nétedu tɔ akwa liti ku leevu ni, teti bana anyi tebunku bekpinele lɛkpa lɛmɛni. Ɔsika si ɔlɔna kɔgya bulie emini eekpóku-ma ni, badubɔlɛ Kristo kama na betélie agya bamba.
54005012	Na ɔmɛni ɔdubɔya na baƒiɔ linyese lɛni nkya ama ku Katɔti ntɛ na ɔdu-ma kɔtɔ.
54005013	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, badububile uwi na bakɛ kɔnu bete bekyuli kɔduli bɔvi bataatɛmi atɛ keeke. Na ukpidi ƒui ndi ka ni, badubutaalɔ bekyuli anyikpi na beteekeyi atɛ. Na bataatɛmi bekyuli lɛlɔ kɔtɛ ku ala abambadi ani na útalɛka basu.
54005014	Anwuɔsu ni, mɔɔyɔ́ ka bekpinele bamɛni udu belie agya na bawɔ bebi na bataanu bana kɔduli ala lɛlɔ mmomu. Ɔmɛni ɔdubɔya na balabla ala ani nátamanku na wete bula bekisine kuƒi na bataasu ala taasiku-bu lɛlɔ.
54005015	Ɔsika bekpinele badi bénwini basiaku Satan kama.
54005016	Si ukpinele ɔdi ɔkya ɔƒɔtaadine ɔdi kaduli ni, anwu ɔnu-nwu lɛlɔ kalɛ na etila ammɔ asɔ alasia Katɔti baƒɔtaadine lɛlɔ. Na ɔya na baƒɔtaadine bamɛni bataanu bekpinele bakladi bani neeebo bebunkune lɛlɔ.
54005017	Na baƒɔtaadine batɔnkune bani mɔɔtɔnku bekyuli kaduɛ ni, ɔlɛka bakɛ lɛyuƒɔla lɛni nésie anumi. Na ɔni ntulo ƒui ndi bani mɔɔtina ala na baasu litemi buni lɛnɔ.
54005018	Ɔsika básu na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo banini, “Tenyimi ebuo ɔni muuwile edula teete-ɔ kenye si unye kabla lɛlɔ.” Lɛnɔ ni, “Ɔlɛka kabla biala ɔblane ɔkɛ nwuna kabla lɛlɔ lɛyuƒɔla.”
54005019	Si ukyuli ɔdi úbo ɔɔdá ɔtɔnkune ɔdi kenye ni, taƒɔ taadi si bétedu nkyuli inyɔ ku kama.
54005020	Na bekyuli bani nli nte ekpidi bɔbla ni, ɔlɛka edie alɛ-ma na adɔnku-ma na baƒɔtaadine ƒui anumi. Na ɔmɛni ɔdubɔkya bakladi liƒu.
54005021	Anwuɔsu mɔɔlɛ-ɔ na Katɔti ku Kristo ku Katɔti batu ƒui anumi nnii sia ala amɛni anu kaduɛ na alanu ukyuli ɔdi anumi alabla lɛla lɛdi.
54005022	Wi lɛlɔ buɛɛ na tababla eti enu asia ɔdi lɛlɔ na ese-nwu likpo ete Katɔti kabla. Na tenye ekpidi bablane kama, mmomu da lɛlɔ sɛɛn.
54005023	Na ƒula kaƒɔ ɔlɛ ɔsu ni, tasu anii ataani ntu lɛti. Ɔdia ka ataani ntɛ blii blii kuvo kalɛ.
54005024	Bekyuli badi ekpidi eeebo ɔbɛ ɔni na anya alati áaka bana litemi kɔtɔ bɔdu budie bɔtina. Nsu badi ama ni, kama kama asa na ama adi lɛnɔ aalɛ́ keyi.
54005025	Lɛni kani na ala abuni adi bɔbla lɛnɔ eeebo ɔbɛ, na ani nábɛ lɛnɔ adubɔlɛ keyi.
54006001	Su baƒɔtaadine bani mɔɔbla bekyuli bamba kabla ƒui anii ɔlɛka beboku lɛlɔ kalɔ bete bana benwoti na kabla biala kemo, kalɛ na bekyuli bamba balatɛmi kɔbɔ ala balásiku Katɔti ku bula bɔƒɔtaadi ulu ala bɔtina lɛlɔ.
54006002	Na bekyuli bani mɔɔbla kabla teete benwoti bani ndi baƒɔtaadine ni, beteti bana bɔƒɔtaadi kɔnwa bɔdi batata betenye bana benwoti lɛlɔ. Mmomu ɔlɛka beboku lɛlɔ kalɔ na bete-ma kebunku bebu. Ɔsika bekyuli bani na beete kebunku mɛni ni, basiaku Yesu kama. Na ama ku-ma ƒui badi nwuna ala badine bani na ɔɔyɔ́ geen. Ɔmɛni na ɔlɛka atina-ma anii babla na akya-ma ogya.
54006003	-
54006004	Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔtina ala bamba ani naaasiaku bula bɔƒɔtaadi ulu ɔni nkɛnku Blɔti Yesu Kristo litemi geen lɛlɔ ni, ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔɔtalaku lɛlɔ katɔ na ɔɔɔgyi lɛla lɛdi. Unyeƒi ukpludi ku kadɔ kani na ɔɔkya. Ɔmɛni ɔɔyá na anumi ekpidi eegyie bekyuli, na baadɔ, na beedumi lɛlɔ, na beeti lɛlɔ kasusu kekpidi.
54006005	Na baaní ala teenene uwi biala. Bekyuli bamɛni kasusu kékpi-ma na báyila litemi geen lɛmmɔ. Baakali banii badubɔsia bɔƒɔtaadi ulu lɛlɔ na beyile bana aƒo.
54006006	Nsu ni, si anumi eegyie ukyuli na Katɔti kama bɔsiaku kemo na ala ani na ubo aaƒɔ́-nwu anu ni, uunwíni ɔlakɛne.
54006007	Ɔsika ɔni na báwɔ-bu ni, bɔɔɔda lɛla lɛdi búteboku kayawi. Na si búkpi lɛnɔ ni, buleti lɛla lɛdi bulatɔlɔku.
54006008	Anwuɔsu bɛya na bula adala ku adila ani bubo emo-bu.
54006009	Nsu bekyuli bani na anumi eegyie-ma na lɛkɛ lɛlɔ ni, baanú kakpagyuɛ kani na Satan ɔ́kywɛ-ma. Na beeduo adɔlɔla bɔbla kemo, na ɔlɔna alaekpidi ala bɔbla aada-ma ɔkwɛ na eebile bana ngba keliela na beekpi taayii ku udu.
54006010	Ɔsika sika lɛnungyie kemo na ekpidi lidu lidu lɛɛkwɛ́ taasi. Ɔmɛni ɔsu na bekyuli badi báyila bɔƒɔtaadi ulu geen ɔmmɔ. Na bana ngba ƒui búduo lɛbibo kemo.
54006011	Nsu ka adi ukyuli ɔni na éti lɛlɔ éte Katɔti ɔsu ni, die ala amɛni ƒui atu na eti ƒula anu asia lɛbuni bɔbla lɛlɔ. Sia Blɔti kama na bɔƒɔtaadi ku bɔyɔ kemo. Kɛ kayi na ada bekyuli buɛɛ.
54006012	Nye bɔƒɔtaadi kabla lɛlɔ kpakplaa na adi lɛlɔ na akɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔyii kudii. Ngba bɔmɛni ɔsu na Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna-a uwi ɔni na édie ƒula lɛlɔ kalɔ na baƒɔtaadine bakladi anumi.
54006013	Na Katɔti ɔni nédie lɛla biala ku Yesu Kristo ɔnii nése kayi na údie nwuna bɔƒɔtaadi keyi na Pontio Pilato anumi muudie-mi kenye ka muute-ɔ ɔda bubo bɔmɛni.
54006014	Na mɔɔsu-ɔ nnii da ala amɛni kaduɛ kalɛ na ukyuli ɔdi ulasu lɛla likpidi lɛdi na ƒula lɛlɔ wetédu uwi ɔni na Yesu Kristo wasɔ webo.
54006015	Na Katɔti ɔdubɔya na Yesu Kristo wasɔ webo na uwi ɔni námanku lɛlɔ. Katɔti Ɔyɔne ɔmɛni lɛti mɔɔdi lɛla biala lɛlɔ, na anwu ndi bagadine ƒui Ɔga. Na lɛla biala lɛɛlɔ-nwu lɛnii Unwoti.
54006016	Anwu lɛti nli ngba ɔni na ulekpi kudi kudii. Na uukeye ɔni na ukyuli ɔdi ulakana-nwu anumi bɔda bɔlɛ. Ukyuli ɔdi útanu-nwu kudii na ɔdi lɛnɔ ulakana-nwu bɔnu. Na bumwi ku ɔyikun ɔdi anwu ɔdi úsela ƒui. Ɔsia lɛni.
54006017	Su ama bani mbo kayawi ala pii anii batatalaku lɛlɔ katɔ na beteti bana anu batasia ala ani udu naaakana-ma bɔƒɔ lɛlɔ. Mmomu beti bana anu basia Katɔti lɛlɔ. Anwu muute-bu lɛla biala ku kaƒɔ ƒaa kalɛ na bɔkɛ lɛlɔyɔ.
54006018	Su-ma anii bataabla lɛbuni kalɛ na benwini balakɛne na lɛƒɔndia bɔbla kemo. Na beteete bekyuli ala ku kaƒɔ ƒaa.
54006019	Si bábla lɛni ni, badubɔkɛ ala ani naaayii udu bese lɛlɔ kama. Na badubuƒie ngba geen bɔmmɔ bada.
54006020	Timoteo, nu ka ágyumana ala ani na béti béte-ɔ bɔda kaduɛ. Takya atɛ keeke ku kɔdɔlɔ unyeƒi kenye. Anya na bekyuli badi beeti taatɔlɔ bekyuli banii lɛlati lɛdi kenye.
54006021	Ɔsika badi baasu banii bagyi ala amɛni. Nsu ɔkɛnku ɔmɛni ɔsu na báyila bɔƒɔtaadi ulu ɔmmɔ. Muuvele Katɔti nnii ɔda-mii kaduɛ na nwuna lɛƒɔndia kemo.
55001001	Ami Paulo ɔni nkɛnku Katɔti lɛƒɔyɔ lɛlɔ na ndi Yesu Kristo ɔtalane ni, ami muunweni-ɔ ɔku ɔmɛni taasiku ngba bɔni na bɔdubɔkɛ na Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ na abu ku-nwu unwi bɔbla kemo.
55001002	Mina ubi ɔyɔne Timoteo, muuvele Katɔti ku Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛƒɔndia nnii lɛsiaku-ɔ na lɛnu-ɔ kɔnyana na lite-ɔ keyi buɛɛ.
55001003	Mɔɔgyá Katɔti ɔni na mɔɔkpá enu aani kalɛ kani na mina bati kuuku bátaabla. Na mɔɔbla lɛni na kayi kani naaadu-mi kɔtɔ kemo. Lɛnɔ ni, mɔɔgyá-nwu enu usien ku ɔƒɛ na muuvele na ƒula lili si mɔɔkpali katɔ.
55001004	Na mɔɔkali taanu ƒula keku kani na éwulo na mɔɔwia geen ka lɛnu-ɔ kalɛ na ebiti ada-mi.
55001005	Mɔɔkali taanu ƒula bɔƒɔtaadi kpakplaa bɔni na ebo. Bɔƒɔtaadi bɔmmɔ nákya ƒ^inieku Lois ku ƒ^ini Eunike alati kemo. Lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́di ka awɔ lɛnɔ ebo-mu.
55001006	Kasusu kamɛni geen ɔsu na muunyimene-ɔ kalɛ na ada litela lɛni na Katɔti úte-ɔ kpakplaa uwi ɔni na líti mina enu lɛ́sia-a lɛlɔ na lɛ́kpali katɔ.
55001007	Ɔsika Katɔti úteti kɔyu kɔni náya na liƒu litaada-bu útete-bu. Mmomu ni, úte-bu Kɔyu kɔni mɔɔyá na bɔɔkɛ́ ɔyikun, na bɔɔyɔ́ lɛlɔ, na bɔɔkana na bɔɔtí lɛlɔ bɔda lɛnɔ.
55001008	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, taya na kɔƒa kukpo-ɔ ka enye Blɔti litemi kama, iye kɔƒa kukpo-ɔ na mina lɛlɔ aani ɔtɔntɛne kalɛ na Kristo ɔsu. Mmomu ni, awɔ lɛnɔ nye lɛbibo lɛmmɔ kenye kpakplaa na eteedie Blɔti litemi buni lɛmmɔ keyi. Ɔsika Katɔti úte-ɔ ɔyikun kalɛ na akana na abla ɔmɛni.
55001009	Blɔti ɔmmɔ náƒɔ-bu ngba na ɔ́lɔ-bu ɔnii bunwini nwuna bekyuli. Ɔɔɔdi bula lɛbuni lɛni na bɔ́bla ɔsu. Mmomu ni, Katɔti ɔmmɔ ɔlati kasusu ku lɛƒɔndia lɛni na ubo ute-bu ɔsu. Na ɔkɛ Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ na bɔ́kɛ Katɔti lɛƒɔndia lɛmɛni asa na údie kayawi.
55001010	Nsu ɔƒɛni na Katɔti údie ɔmɛni ɔ́tina-bu nwaa na Blɔti Yesu Kristo ɔmɛni bubo kemo. Anwu nádi kukpi ɔyikun lɛlɔ. Na ɔkɛ nwuna litemi buni lɛlɔ ni, údie ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii keyi.
55001011	Katɔti úti-mi ɔ́bla lɛsa ɔkɔne ku ɔtalane ku nwuna litemi buni lɛmɛni ala ɔtinane.
55001012	Na ɔkɛ ɔmɛni lɛlɔ ɔsu muubó abi na kɔƒa kulekpo-mi. Ɔsika lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́di geen, na ngyi ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na mina anu asia. Na ngyi lɛnɔ ka ɔdubɔgyumana-mi na lɛda lɛla lɛni na úti ɔ́kya-mii enu kemo kaduɛ wetédu limeyi lɛkladi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.
55001013	Da etemila geen ani na lɛ́tina-a ƒui kaduɛ na abla asiaku-nya lɛlɔ. Nye bɔƒɔtaadi bɔmmɔ lɛlɔ kpakplaa na abla unwi ku Blɔti Yesu Kristo na bɔyɔ kemo.
55001014	Na ɔkɛ Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun ɔni nkya-bu lɛlɔ kemo ɔsu ni, da ala abuni ani ƒui na Blɔti úti ɔ́kya-a enu kemo kaduɛ.
55001015	Agyi ka Asiaƒuɔ baƒɔtaadine ƒui bálɛ-mi kama, na Ƒigelo ku Hermegene lɛnɔ báda-mi bése.
55001016	Muuvele Katɔti nnii ɔnu Onesiƒoro ku nwuna kaduli bekyuli kɔnyana, ɔsika kɔƒa kútekpo-nwu na mina lɛlɔ aani ɔtɔntɛne kalɛ. Mmomu ɔ́kya-mi lɛlɔ na úbunku-mi kaduɛ.
55001017	Na uwi ɔni na Onesiƒoro úbo Roma ni, ɔwia-mi ɔ́vi laa útédu uwi ɔni na ɔ́nu-mi.
55001018	Na muuvele Katɔti nnii ɔnu-nwu kɔnyana na Litemi Bɔtɛ Limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔsika awɔ ɔlati agyi kɔlɛ kɔlɛ kɔni na úbunku-mi na Eƒeso.
55002001	Na awɔ, mina ubi, kya ɔkplu na bula unwi bɔbla ku Kristo na nwuna lɛƒɔndia lɛni na ubo ute-bu kemo.
55002002	Na ala ani na énu ka lɛ́tina bekyuli pii anumi ni, anya kani na ɔlɛka eti akya bekyuli bani náƒɔ bádi enu kemo na beti-nya batina bekyuli bamba lɛnɔ.
55002003	Nye lɛbibo lɛmmɔ kenye kpakplaa aani ukpone ɔbuni ɔni nnye ute Yesu Kristo.
55002004	Ɔsika ukpone ɔni nnye nwuna kabla lɛlɔ geen ni, ɔɔwia ka nwuna ablala ada nwuna ɔtɔnkune ebiti. Anwuɔsu ɔsɔ ulakya bekyuli bani naaadi bekpone ablala kenye.
55002005	Lɛni kani na asa na usi ukeline ɔni lɛnɔ nnye lɛlɔ kakukɔ wadi lɛlɔ ni, ɔlɛka ɔbla ɔsiaku nwuna ɔda bubo lɛlɔ kaduɛ.
55002006	Umonsene ɔni nábla kogyoklo geen na nwuna kemo ni, anwu mɔɔka edula edeedi bɔdi.
55002007	Kali ala ani mɔɔsu-ɔ mɛni ƒui nu, ɔsika ngyi nnii Blɔti ɔdubɔya na enu ana ƒui kalɔ.
55002008	Nyimo Yesu Kristo ɔni ndi Dawid kaba kemo ubi ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́gyila ɔ́lɛku bekpine akɔ aani kalɛ na litemi buni lɛni mɔɔsu mɛni lɛɛtina.
55002009	Muubó abi na litemi buni lɛni mɔɔsu ɔsu. Na bébo-mi lɛkpu muedi aani ukyuli ɔni na ubo lɛkanta likpidi. Nsu Katɔti litemi ni, bétebo-ni lɛkpu!
55002010	Ɔmɛni ɔsu na mɔɔƒɔ́ lɛla biala teebweli na Katɔti bekyuli baƒunadi ɔsu, kalɛ na ama lɛnɔ bakɛ bɔƒɔ bɔni na Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ kani na bɔɔsia na buuti ngba ƒui lɛlɔ bɔyɔ teete-bu.
55002011	Kenye kamɛni kadi litemi geen ka ni, “Si bɔ́bla unwi ku Blɔti na nwuna kukpi kemo ni, bɔdubɔsɔ bɔta buliku-nwu ngba.
55002012	Si bɔ́kana na bunye kpakplaa na lɛbibo biala kemo ni, abu ku-nwu bɔdubɔdi lɛga. Na si buuní-nwu ni, anwu lɛnɔ ɔdubuni-bu.
55002013	Si ina bɔlɛ bula bɔƒɔtaadi kama muedi ni, anwu ulálɛ nwuna linyese kama. Ɔsika ulakana na walɛ anwu ɔlati lɛlɔ kama kudii.”
55002014	Ya na beteenyimo ala amɛni na alɛ-ma kpakplaa na Katɔti anumi anii batataakya unyeƒi. Ɔsika kɔsia kɔdi kulálɛ ɔmmɔ kemo. Mmomu ɔdubɔya na bekyuli bani muunú ala ammɔ bɔƒɔtaadi bɔyuɛ.
55002015	Da lɛlɔ kaduɛ na ulu biala lɛlɔ na Katɔti uwi-ɔ livo. Taya na kɔƒa kuteekpo-ɔ na ƒula kabla lɛlɔ. Mmomu bla ukyuli ɔni mɔɔtina Katɔti litemi lɛmmɔ geen.
55002016	Die lɛlɔ na kɔbɔ ala ku kɔdɔlɔ atɛ bɔtɛmi kemo. Ɔsika bekyuli bani na baabla ala amɛni udu ni, uudie bana kasusu na Katɔti kudɔ teesienku ɔgyu kakaaka.
55002017	Ala ammɔ udu bɔtina ese aani lɛnyama lɛni mɔɔnyi. Na nkyuli inyɔ bani nátina ala ammɔ udu ndi Himeneo ku Ƒileto.
55002018	Bénwini kama bákya litemi geen lɛmmɔ na bakya beeƒú baƒɔtaadine badi kasusu banii bula ngba bɔsɔ bɔta bubelie ku Katɔti búubo búbavi.
55002019	Nsu ni, Katɔti ɔtɔ kalɔ lɛtabi lɛni na ɔ́kya ni, lɛla biala lilakana-ni bɔkunku. Na lɛtabi lɛmɛni lɛlɔ ni, únweni etemila amɛni ɔ́sia ɔnini, “Blɔti ɔgyi bekyuli bani ndi anwu badi,” ku “Ukyuli ɔni masu ɔnii ɔsiaku Blɔti ni, ɔlɛka unwini kama ɔkya ekpidi bɔbla.”
55002020	Na ɔlakɛne ɔtɔ ni, akyami lidu lidu liisé. Na adi adi sika ugyiedi ku ɔƒualadi. Na adi lɛnɔ adi kavɔ ku kanwi akyami. Na akyami amɛni lɛlɔ kabla ni, adi ese ete emeyi buni bɔdi. Na adi lɛnɔ emeyi keeke bɔƒuƒuɛ na ese ete.
55002021	Anwuɔsu si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́da lɛlɔ údie likpidi kemo na ɔ́bla lɛlɔ sɛɛn ni, anwu náƒɔ Blɔti kuye aani akyami ani nse nte emeyi buni bɔdi. Na ɔ́manku ute ka ɔbla kabla kabuni.
55002022	Da atu die lɛkloƒu bɔdi ala keeke kama bɔsiaku kemo. Na abla lɛla biala ulu lɛlɔ, na elie ɔƒɔtaadine ngba buni, na ataayɔ bekyuli, na elieku-ma ku keyi buɛɛ. Siaku ala amɛni ku bekyuli bani ƒui mɔɔkpali Katɔti na kayi sɛɛn kama.
55002023	Da lɛlɔ mami kɔbɔ ala ku kɔdɔlɔ atɛ batɛmine lɛlɔ, ɔsika kadɔ na ala ammɔ udu eeboku.
55002024	Na utalɛka ukyuli ɔni na ɔɔtɔnku Blɔti bekyuli utaadɔ. Mmomu ɔdi ka utaabla lɛƒɔndia teete ukyuli biala, na ɔkana ala butaatina, na ɔbla ukyuli ɔni na use buɛɛ.
55002025	Na bekyuli bani ƒui mɔɔta teenye litemi buni lɛmɛni lɛlɔ ni, ɔlɛka udie ala kalɔ ute-ma ku kayi buɛɛ. Na ɔƒɛni kalɛ Katɔti ɔdubɔya na benwini kayi na banu litemi geen lɛmmɔ bati.
55002026	Ɔmɛni ɔsu bana kasusu kadubɔlɛmi na balɛ Satan ɔni néti-ma únwini nwuna lɛƒɔyɔ bablane kakpagyuɛ kemo.
55003001	Se ɔmɛni likpo ka ni, na emeyi ekplodi kemo ni, likyulikpi lɛdubɔya na keliela kayu ɔkplu.
55003002	Bekyuli badubɔyɔ bana lɛlɔ lɛti bɔdia na bayɔ egulabi. Badubo lɛmɛnɛ butaakun na bataatalaku lɛlɔ katɔ. Ama ndi bekyuli bani muudumi bekyuli, ku bani naaabu bana bawɔne. Na belese kɔdɛ, ku bekyuli bani naaasiaku bɔƒɔtaadi bɔmmɔ kama.
55003003	Badi bekyuli bani na ukyuli bamba lɛlɔ lilakywi-ma kaƒɔ, ku bani naaanu kɔnyana. Badi bekyuli bani mɔɔnyi ɔkɔ taada litemi taasia bekyuli lɛlɔ, ku bekyuli bani mbo kalala. Na bana anumi eeese buɛɛ. Na badi bekyuli bani nkisi lɛla lɛbuni.
55003004	Badi bekyuli bani mɔɔkya bana bakpana kakya. Na badi bekyuli bani nábi basiaku bana lɛnunsia kama, ku bekyuli bani mɔɔkali banii ama kani ntulo ku bekyuli bani mɔɔyɔ́ kayawi ebiti teetulo Katɔti.
55003005	Bekyuli bamɛni udu mɔɔtina ku kenyekplu ka badi bekyuli babuni, nsu beení Katɔti ɔyikun ka ɔdi-ma lɛlɔ na bana keliela kemo. Da lɛlɔ mamiku bekyuli bamɛni lɛlɔ
55003006	Ɔsika bekyuli bamɛni udu ni, baabɛ́ teeduo bekyuli kɔduli na baadi beleku bani naaakana bana lɛlɔ bɔda lɛlɔ, ɔsika ekpidi lidu lidu bɔbla bɔ́ya na beeebo bunwini teewi.
55003007	Beleku bamɛni baatɛya ala uwi ƒui, nsu belenu etemila geen ammɔ kalɔ kudii.
55003008	Na aani kalɛ na Yane ku Yambri báta bénye Mose lɛlɔ dii ni, lɛni kani na ɔkɔ ala batinane bamɛni lɛnɔ baata teenye litemi geen lɛmɛni lɛlɔ. Bekyuli bamɛni badi bekyuli bani na likpidi bɔbla bɔ́ƒɔ-ma kasusu ƒui, na báyila baƒɔtaadine geen bɔmmɔ ulu.
55003009	Nsu ni, bekyuli bamɛni belésie ɔgyu, ɔsika bana kɔkwɛ kukpidi kɔdubɔlɛ keyi na bekyuli ƒui anumi aani bani nábla udu ɔmɛni bávi kalɛ kani.
55003010	Nsu awɔ ni, áanu mina ala bɔtina áti ku mina ngba keliela ku mina kasusu ku mina bɔƒɔtaadi ku kalɛ na muuwi lɛlɔ ku kalɛ mɔɔyɔ́ bekyuli ku kalɛ na mɔɔkya ɔkplu na lɛbibo kemo.
55003011	Agyi kalɛ na básiaku-mi na békpoku-mi ku abi ani na líbo na Antiokia ku Ikonion ku Listra. Kali nu bukpoku bɔni kemo na línye kpakplaa. Nsu na ɔna ƒui kemo ni, Blɔti údie-mi.
55003012	Sɔsɔ na ɔdi ka ni, bekyuli bani ƒui melie ngba buni na Kristo kemo ni, badububo abi na bekpoku-ma.
55003013	Nsu bekyuli bekpidi ku ɔkɔ ala batinane ama ni, bubie bɔmmɔ bɔdubɔkɔ-ma katɔ bubu na bataatɔlɔ bekyuli. Na bana ɔbladu ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔtɔlɔ ama alati lɛnɔ.
55003014	Nsu awɔ ni, mɔɔwia ka enye ala ani na atɛya na áƒɔ ádi lɛnɔ lɛlɔ kpakplaa. Ɔsika agyi bekyuli bani kudɔ na átɛya-nya.
55003015	Ka ɔ́si-ɔ lɛnamu uwi ni, áti Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila ani náya-a na áda anu na ebo ngba bɔƒɔ etemila ɔkɛ Kristo bɔƒɔtaadi lɛlɔ.
55003016	Katɔti ɔyikun lɛlɔ na bɔ́sia bɔ́kɛ ala ani ƒui bénweni na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo. Na ɔdia ute ukyuli bɔdɔnku ku bɔklibi ku bɔnyuɛ na ngba buni bulie kemo.
55003017	Bénweni-nya kalɛ na ukyuli biala ɔni néti lɛlɔ úte Katɔti wamanku na ɔklibi-nwu ute ala abuni bɔbla.
55004001	Nnye Katɔti ku Kristo ɔni ndubɔsɔ ubo ubatɛku bayawine ku bekpine litemi anumi. Na ka ɔdubɔsɔ ubo na nwuna lɛga bɔdi kemo ɔsu ni, mɔɔlɛ-ɔ kpakplaa nnii
55004002	si bebo kɔnu o-o, iye beeebo kɔnu o-o ni, die litemi buni lɛmmɔ kenye. Klibi-ma, na adɔnku-ma, na akya-ma ogya. Na si eedie ala kalɔ taatina-ma ni, na ewi lɛlɔ na akɛ ku-ma kayi geen.
55004003	Ɔsika uwi ɔdi ɔdubo ɔni na bekyuli basɔ baaadubo litemi buni lɛmɛni bɔda. Mmomu badubɔwia ala bamba batinane bete lɛlɔ na bataasu-ma ala ani udu na baawia beteenu.
55004004	Badubo kama bunwini bɔkya litemi buni lɛmɛni na basiaku etemila anwidi kama.
55004005	Na awɔ ni, da lɛlɔ kaduɛ na ulu biala lɛlɔ, na ataakya ɔkplu na lɛbibo biala kemo. Na abla kabla aani litemi buni lɛmɛni lɛsa ɔkɔne. Na abla ƒula baƒɔtaadine ɔtɔnkune kabla ƒui kaduɛ.
55004006	Ɔsika ami ni, mina ngba bɔdaku kalɔ buwi aani ntɛ lɛkpa. Na uwi lɛnɔ úudu ka lɛtɔlɔ kayawi kamɛni kemo.
55004007	Líkpo kekpo kabuni na lɛ́wɔlɔ mina kabla aani usi ukeline buni kalɛ. Na lɛ́da mina bɔƒɔtaadi na Kristo kemo útédu kawɔlɔkɔ.
55004008	Na ɔ́si ɔƒɛni ni, Katɔti ɔ́ɔklibi mina kagabwa kani mɔɔtina ka lílie ɔƒɔtaadine ngba ulu lɛlɔ úse-mi. Ɔdi kagabwa kani na Blɔti ɔni mɔɔtɛ bula ƒui litemi ulu lɛlɔ ɔdubo-mi bute limeyi likplodi lɛmmɔ. Na ɔɔɔdi ami lɛti pɛ ndubɔkɛ-ka, mmomu ami ku bekyuli bamba bani ƒui lɛnɔ nsia anu bete Blɔti bɔsɔ bubo bɔmmɔ.
55004009	Sia ulu biala lɛlɔ na eyile-mi bubanu.
55004010	Ɔsika Dema ɔ́tɔlɔ-mi kudɔ na ɔsiaku kayawi ala kama úsie Tesalonika. Na Kreske anwu ni, úsie Galatia, na Tito úsie Dalmatia.
55004011	Luka lɛti nébu ɔkya-mi kudɔ. Anwuɔsu tiku Marko na bibo, ɔsika ɔdi-mi ubunkune geen.
55004012	Lɛ́tala Tihiko na Eƒeso.
55004013	Na si adubo ni, ti mina kɔyɔ awu gyɔlɔɔ ɔni na lɛ́da líse Karpo kudɔ na Troia boku-mi. Na eti mina lɛku ku kɔkunkɛ kɔni na mɔɔwia teetulo lɛnɔ boku-mi.
55004014	Aleksandro ɔni ndi ɔkywɛne ɔ́bla-mi kalala geen. Na Blɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ-nwu lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla kayu.
55004015	Anwuɔsu awɔ lɛnɔ nye kagyumana te-nwu, ɔsika ɔ́ta únye bula ala ani na bɔɔtina lɛlɔ geen.
55004016	Kudeedi kɔni na bátɛku-mi litemi ni, ɔdi biala útakana na ubo ubenye-mi litemi kama, mmomu béni-mi bése. Nsu muuvele Katɔti nnii utani-ma kɔtu na ɔmɛni lɛlɔ.
55004017	Nsu ni, Blɔti únyeku-mi na ɔ́kya-mi ɔyikun na lɛ́kana lɛ́su Blɔti litemi lɛmmɔ kaduɛ lite bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ na mmɔ. Na Blɔti údie-mi kukpi kemo.
55004018	Blɔti ɔdubudie-mi na ɔgbankpi biala kemo, na ɔdubo-mi bɔkpanku buɛɛ buɛɛ na liduo Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma. Bumwi na buute Katɔti ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ƒui. Ɔsia lɛni.
55004019	Muugyele Priska ku Akwila ku Onesiƒoro kaduli bekyuli ƒui.
55004020	Erasto ɔmua ɔkya Korinto, na Troƒimo anwu uuƒi ɔsu lɛ́da-nwu lɛ́kya Mileto.
55004021	Kya ɔkplu na ebo ebeduo mɛni asa udu kɔyɔ uwi. Eubulo ku Pude ku Lino ku Klaudia ku baƒɔtaadine banwa bakladi ƒui beegyele-ɔ o-o!
55004022	Blɔti ɔda-a kɔyu, na muuvele-nwu nnii ɔda-mii kaduɛ na nwuna lɛƒɔndia kemo.
56001001	Ami Paulo ɔni ndi Katɔti kabla ɔblane ku Blɔti Yesu Kristo ɔtalane ni, ami muunweni-ɔ ɔku ɔmɛni. Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna-mi na ɔ́tala-mi ɔnii mbunku nwuna bekyuli baƒunadi bɔƒɔtaadi na lɛtɔnku-ma na banu litemi geen lɛni na bula bɔƒɔtaadi ulu ɔɔtina bati.
56001002	Ulu ɔmɛni ndanku ngba ƒui lɛnunsia lɛni bɔƒɔtaadi na bubo lɛlɔ. Na Katɔti ɔni naaanyi ɔkɔ ɔlati nése-bu kenye kamɛni úse asa na údie kayawi.
56001003	Údie ngba ƒui litemi ɔ́tina-bu na nwuna litemi lɛni mɔɔsu mɛni kemo na uwi ɔni lɛlɔ na anwu ɔlati úse úse lɛlɔ. Ɔmɛni na úti ɔ́kya-mi enu kemo na mɔɔkɔ́-ni lɛsa teete kadi. Na Blɔti ɔni ndi bula Ɔƒɔne násu-mi ɔnii nkɔ lɛsa lɛmɛni.
56001004	Ɔyɔne Tito, muunweni-ɔ ɔku ɔmɛni ka adi-mi ubi geen na bɔƒɔtaadi bɔni kemo bɔkya ɔsu. Na muuvele Katɔti ku Yesu Kristo ɔni ndi bula Ɔƒɔne nnii ɔda-a na nwuna lɛƒɔndia kemo na ute-ɔ keyi buɛɛ.
56001005	Lɛ́ya-a na ásɔ akya Kreta kalɛ na aklibi ala ani nébu bɔklibi. Na ɔma biala kemo ni, die benengu bani menye baƒɔtaadine kenye aani kalɛ na lɛ́su-ɔ nnii bla.
56001006	Ɔƒɔtaadine unengu ni, útalɛka litemi lɛdi lɛda-nwu. Na ɔdi ukyuli ɔni na úti uleku unwi. Na nwuna bebi lɛnɔ badi bebi bani nda bɔƒɔtaadi kaduɛ, na beeebo atuɔkplu, na baabu bana bawɔne.
56001007	Na ɔƒɔtaadine ɔtɔnkune ɔni mɔɔnu Katɔti kabla lɛlɔ ni, utalɛka litemi lɛdi lɛda-nwu iye utaakɔliku lɛlɔ katɔ iye uteeti kɔnyi buti buti. Na ɔɔɔdi ka utaani ntɛ teekpi, na ulekpo udi, iye anumi lɛnɔ elégyie-nwu na egulabi lɛlɔ.
56001008	Ɔlɛka utaaƒɔ baƒɔ na utaayɔ lɛbuni na ɔda lɛlɔ kaduɛ. Na ɔbla ukyuli ɔni na ubo udu, na use kedee, na ɔɔkana anwu ɔlati lɛlɔ lɛnɔ bɔdi.
56001009	Ɔdi ka uƒie litemi geen lɛmmɔ ɔda kpakplaa aani kalɛ na bɔƒɔtaadi ulu ɔmmɔ ɔɔtina. Na ulu ɔmɛni lɛlɔ kani na ɔdubɔkana bɔsia na ɔkya bekyuli bamba lɛnɔ ogya na udie bani mɔɔta teenye litemi lɛmɛni lɛlɔ bɔƒiɔ ɔtina-ma.
56001010	Ɔsika bekyuli pii bakya baatɔ́lɔ bekyuli na baata teenye litemi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ku bana kɔdɔlɔ ala. Na bani mɔɔbla ala ammɔ ketulodikɔ badi Yudaƒuɔ.
56001011	Ɔdi ka enye etile bana ala ammɔ udu bɔtina lɛlɔ, ɔsika ala ammɔ mɔɔyá na kɔduli bekyuli ƒui beeƒú bana bɔƒɔtaadi. Na ala batinane bammɔ lɛkɛ likpidi lɛni baawia ɔsu na baatina ala ekpidi amɛni.
56001012	Na Kretani ɔdi ɔni ndi kenye udiene ɔ́su ɔnini, “Kretaƒuɔ ni, ɔkɔ kani na baanyi uwi biala na bebo kalala kekpidi, na baadi ɔdivo, na bebo kɔkɔsɔ lɛnɔ.”
56001013	Lɛla lɛni na kenye udiene ɔmmɔ ɔ́su ɔdi sɔsɔ. Anwuɔsu bɔku-ma na bada udu ɔmɛni baya kalɛ na bakɛ bɔƒɔtaadi geen bɔmmɔ.
56001014	Ɔmɛni ɔdubɔya na bada atu bedie Yudaƒuɔ atɛ anwidi ku bekyuli bani néni litemi geen lɛmmɔ ala bɔtina kudɔ.
56001015	Lɛla biala lise kedee lite bekyuli bani alati nse kedee. Nsu bekyuli bani ndi bekyuli bekpidi na balaƒɔ taadi ni, lɛla biala liiise kedee, ɔsika bana kasusu kemo kéyi ku ala ekpidi, na basɔ balanu lɛbuni ku likpidi taati.
56001016	Ama alati baasu banii baabu Katɔti, nsu bana ablala alátina lɛni. Badi bekyuli bani muusé lɛlɔ na balábu lɛla lɛdi na bátamanku lɛbuni lɛdi lɛnɔ bɔbla.
56002001	Nsu awɔ ni, tina ala ani nkɛnku bɔƒɔtaadi ulu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.
56002002	Tina benengu bammɔ ƒui anii ɔdi ka babla anumi ku kasusu nwaa uwi biala. Na bada lɛlɔ kaduɛ ku bana bɔƒɔtaadi, na bataayɔ lɛlɔ, na bataakya ɔkplu lɛnɔ.
56002003	Lɛni kani na beleku benengu bammɔ lɛnɔ ni, tina-ma anii belie ngba bɔni námanku beleku bani nse kedee ka belie. Na batataalɔ bekyuli anyikpi. Na ntɛ bɔni lɛnɔ butadi-ma lɛlɔ. Mmomu batina bekyuli udu buni.
56002004	Na batina begblebi bani nlie agya ala kalɛ na bataayɔ bana bagya ku bana bebi lɛnɔ.
56002005	Na bati lɛlɔ bɔda, na babla lɛlɔ kedee, na babla agya beliene babuni bani muuboku lɛlɔ kalɔ teete bana bagya. Ɔmɛni ndubɔya na ukyuli ɔdi ulasu lɛla likpidi lɛdi ulásiku linyesia lɛni nási Katɔti kudɔ lɛlɔ.
56002006	Ulu ɔmɛni kani lɛlɔ na ɔlɛka eti akya bakloƒu lɛnɔ ɔkplu kalɛ na bada lɛlɔ kaduɛ.
56002007	Na ala amɛni ƒui kemo ni, awɔ ɔlati ɔlɛka enwini ukyuli ɔni na ɔlɛka banu batɛya. Na enye momoomo na atina ala kaduɛ.
56002008	Ti kalɛ na atɛmiku bekyuli ku etemila ani mbo ɔbu kalɛ na beledie-ɔ bɔƒiɔ bɔdi, na ƒula bekisine lɛnɔ balasu lɛla lɛdi balásiku-bu lɛlɔ, mmomu na kɔƒa kukpo-ma.
56002009	Bekyuli bani mɔɔbla bekyuli bamba kabla beboku lɛlɔ kalɔ bete bana batɔlati. Na bana ablala ataada bana batɔlati ebiti na lɛla biala kemo. Na batakyaku-ma unyeƒi.
56002010	Beteyu-ma lɛnɔ, mmomu batina-ma ka badi bekyuli babuni na baabla ala ulu lɛlɔ teete-ma. Ɔmɛni ndubɔya na banu bati ka bula ala ani na bɔɔtina na Blɔti ɔni ndi bula Ɔƒɔne lɛlɔ ni, adi ala abuni.
56002011	Ɔsika Katɔti údie nwuna lɛƒɔndia ɔ́tina-bu na ngba bɔƒɔ bɔni na ubo ute bekyuli bayawine ɔsu.
56002012	Lɛƒɔndia lɛmmɔ mɔɔtina-bu ka ɔlɛka bɔda atu budie ngba bukpidi bulie kemo ku kayawi ala keeke kama bɔsiaku. Na bɔda lɛlɔ kaduɛ, na bulie ngba bɔbuni, na bɔbla lɛlɔ kedee na kayawi kamɛni kemo.
56002013	Lɛni na bɔdubuti butaanu ulu bute limeyi libendi lɛni lɛlɔ na bɔsia anu. Limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ na Utulone Blɔti, bula Ɔƒɔne, Yesu Kristo bukeye bɔdubɔda bɔlɛ.
56002014	Úti lɛlɔ úte na bula lili kalɛ na udie-bu na likpidi biala kemo na bɔbla bekyuli kedee bani ndi nwuna badi kani, na baawia ka bataabla lɛbuni.
56002015	Tina ala amɛni ku kenyekɔ kani na Katɔti úte-ɔ, na akya bekyuli bani ƒui muunú-ɔ litemi ɔkplu, na abɔku bani naaabla taasiaku ulu lɛlɔ lɛnɔ. Na taya na ɔdi ɔnu-ɔ ɔnii ásɔ.
56003001	Na aya na bana ƒui benyimo na beboku lɛlɔ kalɔ bete bana batɔnkune ku lɛlɔ badine, na benu-ma litemi, na bataabla lɛbuni na ulu biala lɛlɔ.
56003002	Na asu-ma anii batalɔ ukyuli ɔdi lɛnyikpi. Mmomu badi kɔnwa na belie ku keyi buɛɛ. Na bataabu bekyuli na ulu biala lɛlɔ.
56003003	Ɔsika abu alati lɛnɔ bɔ́bla adɔlɔla ku atuɔkplu, na bɔ́ƒiɔ dii. Na ɔlɔna kemo ala ekpidi áda-bu ɔkwɛ lɛnɔ dii. Na búti bula uwi búte kalala bɔbla ku lɛnungyie, na bekyuli békisi-bu na abu lɛnɔ búkisi-ma.
56003004	Nsu uwi ɔni na Blɔti, bula Ɔƒɔne, údie nwuna lɛƒɔndia ku bɔyɔ ɔ́tina-bu ni,
56003005	ɔ́ƒɔ-bu. Ɔɔɔdi banii bula lɛbuni lɛni na bɔ́bla ɔsu, mmomu Katɔti ɔkɛ anwu ɔlati kɔnyana bɔnu ɔsu na ɔ́ya na nwuna Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-bu. Kɔyu kɔmmɔ mɔɔsɔku-bu taawɔ na kuute-bu ngba bɔwɔdi, na kɔɔyá na bɔɔbla kedee.
56003006	Katɔti úti nwuna Kɔyu úte-bu ku kuna ɔyikun pii ɔ́siaku bula Ɔƒɔne Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ.
56003007	Na ɔkɛ nwuna lɛƒɔndia ɔsu ni, abu ku-nwu ntɛ bɔ́dia kalɛ na abu lɛnɔ bɔ́kɛ ngba ƒui bɔni lɛlɔ na bula anu asia.
56003008	Litemi lɛmmɔ lɛdi litemi geen. Na mɔɔwia ka asia-ni lɛkpuna. Na bekyuli bani náƒɔ Katɔti bádi ni, ɔdi ka beti bana uwi bete na bataabla lɛbuni lɛni malɛ kɔsia mete bekyuli ƒui.
56003009	Na takyaku ukyuli ɔdi kɔdɔlɔ unyeƒi. Tebile uwi tete kaba bekyuli bɔka bɔdi, tadɔ na ataakya Mose ɔda bubo etemila lɛlɔ unyeƒi ɔdi. Ala amɛni ƒui eeebo kɔsia kɔdi.
56003010	Bɔku ukyuli ɔni muuƒú bekyuli kasusu na bɔƒɔtaadi litemi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ kunyɔ. Na ɔmmɔ kama ni, na ada atu edie-nwu lɛlɔ.
56003011	Agyi anii ukyuli ɔmmɔ udu ni, likpidi lɛdi-nwu lɛlɔ na nwuna ekpidi muudie nwuna kɔtɔ bɔdu taatina.
56003012	Si lɛ́tala Artema iye Tihiko lɛ́kya-a ni, kya ɔkplu na ebo-mi kudɔ na Nikopoli. Ɔsika mmɔ na lɛ́bla kasusu ka ndubɔkya na kɔyɔ uwi.
56003013	Kya ɔkplu na ebunku Sena ɔni mɔɔtɛ litemi teedie bekyuli ku Apolo na bataaklibi lɛlɔ teete bana ulu busie. Na anu ka bákɛ lɛla biala lɛni baawia.
56003014	Ɔdi ka baƒɔtaadine batɛya kalɛ na beeti bana uwi ƒui taabla lɛbuni lɛni malɛ kɔsia. Na bakana bekyuli bamba lɛnɔ buteebunku na ɔɔɔdi ka bataabla kɔkɔsɔ.
56003015	Banwa bani nkya-mi kudɔ mɛni ƒui banii beegyele-mii o-o! Awɔ lɛnɔ gyele banwa baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ te-bu. Katɔti ɔda bina ƒui na nwuna lɛƒɔndia kemo.
57001001	Ami Paulo ɔni ntɛ aban ɔtɔ ka mɔɔkɔ́ Kristo Yesu lɛsa ɔsu ku Ɔnwa Timoteo muunweni ɔku ɔmɛni. Na líti muumene awɔ Ƒilemon bula kabla kamɛni ɔblane ɔkpana ɔni na bɔɔyɔ́ geen.
57001002	Buugyele baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa lɛni mɔɔsa na ƒula kaduli ku Ɔnwa Uleku Apia ku Arkipo ɔni nnyeku-bu na Blɔti kabla kamɛni kenye kpakplaa aani ukpone kalɛ.
57001003	Na buuvele Katɔti ɔni ndi bula Ɔti ku Blɔti Yesu Kristo bɔnii lɛƒɔndia ku keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-mii.
57001004	Ɔnwa Ƒilemon, uwi biala na mɔɔkpali katɔ ni, muunyimo taalɔ-ɔ lɛnyi na mɔɔgyá Katɔti enu na ƒula lili.
57001005	Ɔsika muunú kalɛ na aayɔ́ Katɔti bekyuli ku kalɛ na áƒɔ Blɔti Yesu ádi.
57001006	Bubo ala abuni ani na Kristo ɔsu. Na mɔɔkpali katɔ nnii Katɔti ɔya na ama bani náƒɔ Kristo bádi aani ƒula kalɛ ni, benu ala amɛni kalɔ kaduɛ ɔkɛnku ƒula lɛlɔ.
57001007	Ɔnwa, lɛlɔ lɛ́yɔ-mi geen na ákya-mi ogya na ƒula bekyuli bɔyɔ ɔsu. Ɔsika ánu Katɔti bekyuli lɛlɔ.
57001008	-
57001009	Na ina ka lɛkana lise kayi aani ƒula unengu na Kristo kemo na lɛsu-ɔ nnii bla lɛla lɛni na ɔlɛka abla ni, mɔɔyɔ́ ka livele-ɔ mmomu. Ami Paulo ɔni náabi mɛni na nsɔ ndi ɔtɔntɛne lɛnɔ na Kristo Yesu ɔsu ni, muuvele-ɔ na ƒula bɔyɔ bɔmɛni ɔsu.
57001010	Muuvele-ɔ na Onesimo lili ɔni nébenwini mina ubidi na Kristo kemo uwi ɔni na nkya kɔgba kemo.
57001011	Ina ka nwuna lɛnyi kalɔ ndi ubunkune ni, kubunku kani na ɔlɛka ute-ɔ ni, áyila-ka ka úkeli-ɔ kudɔ ɔsu. Nsu ɔƒɛni ni, úbo-mi kudɔ na ɔ́sɔ únwini ami ku awɔ ƒui ubunkune.
57001012	Lɛ́sɔku-nwu muumene-ɔ na anwu ndi mina lɛnumi.
57001013	Na ɔƒaani ɔni na ntɛ kɔgba kɔmɛni kemo na litemi buni ɔsu ni, mɔɔyɔ́ ka nka ɔsɔ ɔkya-mi kudɔ na unye-ɔ kenye uteebunku-mi.
57001014	Nsu ni, naaayɔ ka lɛlɛ-ɔ kama lɛbla lɛla lɛdi kalɛ na kebunku biala na eete-mi ni, ulabla aani si bɔnya na nda-a lɛmana, mmomu kalɛ na abla-ni ku kaƒɔ ƒaa.
57001015	Ɔƒaalɛ Katɔti ɔ́ya na Onesimo ɔ́tɔlɔ-ɔ kudɔ uwi klukui ɔmɛni kemo kalɛ na ɔsɔ unwini ubo ubakya-a kudɔ uwi ƒui.
57001016	Na ɔƒɛni ni, ɔɔɔdubo-ɔ kudɔ aani ukyuli bamba kabla ɔblane kani. Mmomu ɔdi bula ɔnwa ɔyɔne na Kristo kemo. Ɔ́ƒɔ-mi kuye geen! Nsu awɔ ni, ɔdubɔƒɔ-ɔ kuye utulo-mi. Ɔsika ɔdubo aani ƒula kabla ɔblane ku ƒula ɔnwani na Blɔti kemo lɛnɔ.
57001017	Anwuɔsu si aanu-mi aani ƒula kabla ɔblane ɔkpana ni, gyingya enu na aƒɔ-nwu aani kalɛ na adubɔƒɔ-mi na ɔsɔ ɔkya-a kudɔ.
57001018	Si ɔ́ƒiɔ-ɔ iye ɔda-a kayu kadi ni, ti-ka kya mina akunta kemo.
57001019	Ami Paulo ɔlati néti mina kɔnu línweni ɔmɛni. Na ndubɔƒɔ kayu biala nkya. Nsu ni, ɔɔɔdi bɔsu nda-a nnii awɔ ada-mi ƒula ngba kayu na Kristo kemo.
57001020	Anwuɔsu ɔnwa, mɔɔwia ka ete-mi kebunku kamɛni na Blɔti ɔsu. Bla ɔmɛni kalɛ na kubiti kɔda-mi na mina kayi kemo.
57001021	Líti ɔku ɔmɛni muumene-ɔ na lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́di ka adubɔbla lɛla lɛni na muuye-ɔ mɛni. Na ngyi geen ka adubɔbla etulo kalɛ na muuye-ɔ mɛni muedi.
57001022	Lɛnɔ ni, klibi keduokɔ kadi se-mi. Ɔsika mɔɔƒɔ́ taadi ka Katɔti ɔdubunu ƒula katɔ bɔkpali na banyonu-mi na lɛsɔ libo-ɔ kudɔ.
57001023	Epaƒra, ɔni na ami ku-nwu bɔtɛ aban ɔtɔ na Kristo Yesu ɔsu, ɔɔkya-a kenye o-o!
57001024	Marko ku Aristarko ku Dema ku Luka bani ndi mina bebunkune na kabla kamɛni kemo lɛnɔ beegyele-ɔ.
57001025	Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛƒɔndia lɛsiaku-ɔ na ƒula kayi kemo.
58001001	Na uwi ɔni návi kemo ni, Katɔti ɔ́sia nwuna kenye bediene lɛlɔ ɔ́tɛmiku bula bati kuuku kɔlɛ kɔlɛ na lilu bun bun lɛlɔ.
58001002	Nsu na uwi ukplodi ɔmɛni kemo ni, Katɔti ɔ́tɛmiku-bu ɔ́siaku Ubidi lɛlɔ. Ubi ɔmmɔ na ɔ́ƒuna úse ka ɔbla nwuna ala ƒui ɔdine. Na nwuna lɛlɔ kani na ɔ́sia údie kayawi ƒui.
58001003	Ubi ɔmmɔ ndi Katɔti bukeye bɔni mɔɔsí Katɔti ɔni nse kede kede lɛlɔ. Na ɔdi Katɔti ukyuli udu ɔmmɔ geen. Na ɔkɛnku nwuna litemi lɛni mbo ɔyikun lɛlɔ ɔsu na lɛla biala linye nina kenyekɔ na kayawi. Na uwi ɔni na úti lɛlɔ ɔ́kpa kalɛ na Katɔti uti bayawine ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-ma ni, úsie útélie keliekɔ kenengudi ƒui na Katɔti kɔdianu kakɛ.
58001004	Ɔmɛni ɔsu na ubo kenyekɔ utulo Katɔti batu. Na lɛni kani na lɛnyi lɛni na ubo lɛnɔ lɛ́ƒɔ kuye litulo ama lɛdi.
58001005	Ɔsika ni, Katɔti útasu nwuna ɔtu ɔdi dii ɔnini, “Awɔ ndi mina ubi. Na ɔmwi ni, línwini-ɔ ɔti.” Na ɔ́sɔ útasu ɔtu ɔdi ɔnini, “Ami madi-nwu kɔti, na anwu wadi mina ubi.”
58001006	Uwi ɔni na Katɔti Ubi ɔni ntɔ ala ƒui úbo kayawi kamɛni lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bɛya na Katɔti batu ƒui bakɔliku-nwu lɛnyi katɔ.”
58001007	Na etemila ani ndanku Katɔti batu lɛlɔ ni, ɔ́su ɔnini, “Lɛ́bla mina batu na bese aani ɔƒɛƒɛɛ. Na ama bani mɔɔbla mina kabla ni, lɛ́bla-ma na bese aani ogya linyemi.”
58001008	Nsu na Ubidi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ati, awɔ ni, ƒula lɛga kadikɔ kadubo buse uwi ƒui. Na adubɔdi ƒula bekyuli lɛlɔ na ulu siin lɛlɔ.
58001009	Awɔ mɔɔyɔ́ lɛla lɛni nse siin, na ekisi ala ani naaakɛ ulu lɛlɔ. Anwuɔsu ni, ami ƒula Katɔti lɛ́ƒuna awɔ, Ati, ka akɛ kenyekɔ etulo na bakladi ƒui akɔ. Na lɛ́ya-a na ákɛ lɛlɔyɔ na uwi ɔni na líti inɔmii líwi-ɔ aani likpose.”
58001010	Katɔti ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, “O Blɔti, na kalɔ kesekɔ ni, awɔ nédie kayawi kamɛni ƒui, na éti ƒula enu ábla kayaa.
58001011	Ala amɛni ƒui adubɔyii udu. Nsu awɔ ni, adubulie uwi ƒui. Ala ammɔ ƒui adubɔtɔ aani adala kalɛ.
58001012	Adubɔƒɛ-nya asala aani kalɛ na baaƒɛ awu. Na aani kalɛ na baavumana adala ni, lɛni kani na Katɔti ɔdubo ala ammɔ bɔvumana. Nsu kalɛ kani na awɔ ese ni, lɛni na adubo buse. Na ƒula akwa alása kudii.”
58001013	Ɔɔɔdi Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi na Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, “Sɔ lie keliekɔ kani náƒɔ kuye ketulo ƒui na mina kɔdianu kakɛ wetédu uwi ɔni na meti ƒula bekisine makya-a lɛgba kalɔ.”
58001014	Na nwuna batu ƒui ama ni, ɔɔɔdi ayu ani muusié-nwu bɔtala ka beteebunku bekyuli bani na Katɔti ɔdubɔya na bakɛ bɔƒɔ na badi yoo?
58002001	Ɔmɛni ɔsu na ɔdi ka bɔbla bɔsiaku ala ani na búnu lɛlɔ kaduɛ na bɔda-nya kpakplaa kalɛ na bulayii ulu geen ɔmmɔ.
58002002	Na ɔƒɛni ni, si kenye kani na Katɔti batu básu bula bati kuuku kábala-ma na Katɔti ɔ́ni ɔdi biala kɔtu kɔni námanku si báƒiɔ ni,
58002003	dɛ na bɛɛkali bɛnii bɔdubɔkana na bukeli kɔtu bɔni bɔni nse nte-bu si búni ngba bɔƒɔ bonwu bɔmɛni? Bɔƒɔ bɔmɛni lɛsa na Blɔti ɔ́ka bɔkɔ bute-bu. Na bekyuli bani ƒui nénu lɛsa lɛmɛni ni, básia kama na bédie-ni básu-bu nwaa.
58002004	Katɔti ɔlati lɛnɔ údie ɔ́tina-bu nwaa ka litemi lɛmɛni lɛdi litemi geen ɔkɛnku akɔla budie taatina lidu lidu ku Katɔti Kɔyu etela lidu lɛni na úle ɔ́kya bekyuli kemo na nwuna bɔyɔ kenye.
58002005	Ɔɔɔdi Katɔti batu na Katɔti ɔ́su ka badubɔdi kayawi kani litemi na bɔɔsu ka kadububo mɛni lɛlɔ.
58002006	Nsu likpo lɛdi lɛkya na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo na básu Katɔti banii, “Bi na ukyuli ɔdi, ɔsu na aasia-nwu anu lɛni? Na bi na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔdi, ɔsu na aanu-nwu lɛlɔ lɛni?
58002007	Na áya na úbo úbenye kenyekɔ kani náyu kalɔ blii kétulo Katɔti batu bammɔ kadi. Na áya na uukeye na bekyuli baabu-nwu.
58002008	Na éti lɛla biala ákya-nwu kalɔ.” Ka Katɔti úti lɛla biala ɔ́kya-nwu kalɔ ɔsu ni, lɛla lɛdi lɛsɔ liiibo na lɛɛɛkya-nwu kalɔ. Nsu ɔƒɛni ni, bulánu taati si lɛla biala lɛkya-nwu kalɔ.
58002009	Nsu bɔɔnu Yesu ɔni na úbenye kenyekɔ kani náyu kalɔ blii kétulo batu bammɔ kadi ka uukeye na bekyuli baabu-nwu ɔƒɛni, ɔsika úbo kukpi abi. Na Katɔti úte-nwu ɔyikun ka ukpi na bekyuli ƒui lili.
58002010	Ɔdi lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔni nédie ala ƒui na ɔɔnu-nya lɛlɔ ɔ́nu ka lɛdia ka ukyuli ɔni mɔɔtɔnku bekyuli pii teeduoku bukeye kemo ni, ɔka abi bubo kalɛ na ɔwɔlɔ nwuna kabla na ɔƒɔ-ma.
58002011	Anwu ɔni nábla bekyuli kedee ku bekyuli bani na ɔ́bla kedee ƒui ni, badi bekyuli benwi. Ɔmɛni ɔsu na kɔƒa kulekpo Yesu ka ɔlɔ-ma ɔnii banwa.
58002012	Ɔɔsu Katɔti ɔnini, “Ndububo ƒula lɛnyi kudu bubo bute mina banwa. Na ndubumwi-ɔ lɛnyi kedee na baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa ƒui anumi.”
58002013	Na ɔɔsu lɛnɔ ɔnini, “Ndubuti mina anu ƒui lɛsia Katɔti lɛlɔ.” Na ɔsɔ ɔɔsu ɔnini, “Aanu ami ku bebi bani ƒui na Katɔti úti úte-mi.”
58002014	Ka bekyuli bamɛni badi ɔlɔna ku ubugya ɔsu ni, anwu lɛnɔ úti ukyuli udu kalɛ na ɔkɛnku nwuna kukpi lɛlɔ ni, na wadi ukyuli ɔni nda kukpi ɔyikun lɛlɔ. Na ukyuli ɔmɛni ndi ukisine ɔmmɔ.
58002015	Na ɔkɛnku ɔmɛni lɛlɔ na udie bani ƒui na kukpi liƒu líbo-ma lɛkpu líse bana ngba ƒui kemo.
58002016	Ɔsika geen ni, ɔɔɔdi Katɔti batu na uubunku, mmomu Abraham kaba kemo bebi.
58002017	Ɔmɛni ɔsu na Katɔti ɔ́bla-nwu aani nwuna banwa kalɛ na ulu biala lɛlɔ. Ɔ́bla lɛni kalɛ na unwini ɔkpane unengudi ɔni mɔɔnu kɔnyana na ɔɔbla lɛla biala ulu lɛlɔ teete Katɔti, na uti nwuna ngba ɔkpa kalɛ na Katɔti uti bekyuli ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-ma.
58002018	Na ka ala lidu lidu ékpoku anwu ɔlati na úbo abi ni, ɔɔkana na uubunku bekyuli bani ƒui na ala ammɔ eekpóku.
58003001	Anwuɔsu ni, banwa kedee bani na Katɔti ɔ́lɔ ka bɛdi Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ala, biti bina anu bɛsia Yesu ɔni ndi ɔtalane ku ɔkpane unengudi ɔni kenye na buudie lɛlɔ.
58003002	Ɔ́bla ala ulu lɛlɔ úte ukyuli ɔni náƒuna-nwu úse aani kalɛ na Mose ɔ́bla ala ulu lɛlɔ na Katɔti kaduli.
58003003	Yesu ɔ́manku ɔbu útulo Mose aani kalɛ kani na ukyuli ɔni nátu ɔtɔ ɔ́ƒɔ lɛnyi útulo ɔtɔ ɔni na ɔ́tu mmɔ.
58003004	Ɔsika ɔtɔ biala ubo ukyuli ɔni nátu-nwu. Nsu Katɔti nátu lɛla biala.
58003005	Mose ɔ́bla lɛla biala ulu lɛlɔ na Katɔti kaduli aani kabla ɔblane. Na údie ala ani na Katɔti ɔdubo ubasu ɔ́tina.
58003006	Nsu Kristo anwu ni, ɔ́bla ala ulu lɛlɔ aani ubi ɔni ntɔnku Katɔti kaduli. Na abu ndi nwuna ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ si búse kayi na búƒie lɛnunsia lɛni kudu na buubó bɔ́da kpakplaa.
58003007	Anwuɔsu na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́su kɔnini, “Si bínu Katɔti lɛdi ɔmwi ni,
58003008	bitabla atuɔkplu aani kalɛ na bɛ́bla uwi ɔni kemo na bɛ́ta bínye-mi lɛlɔ na bɛ́kɔku-mi bɛ́nu na ketele mmɔ.
58003009	Mmɔ na bina bati kuuku bákɔku-mi bánu banii baanu lɛla lɛni mabla ina ka bánu ala ani na lɛ́bla na akwa aavlene kemo.
58003010	Ɔmmɔ ɔsu na líti kɔnyi lɛ́kya kaba kammɔ. Na lɛ́su nnini, 'Bana kayi ƒui kakɛ ulu bamba lɛlɔ, na bátanu mina lilu bátati kudii.'
58003011	Anwuɔsu na lɛ́kpali lɛlɔ lɛ́su na mina kɔnyi kemo nnii baláni beléde-mi na bakɛ bɔnwuna kudii!”
58003012	Banwa, bɛnu lɛlɔ kemo kaduɛ kalɛ na ɔdi uleti likpidi kasusu na kayi kemo na unwini ukyuli ɔni naaaƒɔ taadi na walɛ Katɔti ɔni muute ngba kama.
58003013	Mmomu bɛkya lɛlɔ ogya limeyi ndi limeyi si kadi biala kégye-mii na baalɔ-ka banii ɔmwi. Ɔmmɔ ndubɔya na likpidi lilátɔlɔ ɔdi na wenwini ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla atuɔkplu.
58003014	Bubo kadikɔ ɔkɛnku Kristo lɛlɔ si búƒie-nwu bɔ́da kpakplaa na búti bula lɛlɔ ƒui bɔ́sia-nwu lɛlɔ útédu kawɔlɔkɔ.
58003015	Lɛni na básu bábavi ɔƒɛni banini, “Si bínu Katɔti lɛdi ɔmwi ni, bitabla atuɔkplu aani kalɛ na bɛ́bla uwi ɔni na bɛ́ta binye Katɔti lɛlɔ.”
58003016	Na ɔma bene na bɛɛkali ka ama nénu na báta bénye Katɔti lɛlɔ mmɔ? Ɔɔɔdi bekyuli bani ƒui na Mose ɔ́tɔnku ɔ́lɛku Egyipte kalɔ lɛlɔ mmɔ badi yoo?
58003017	Na ɔma bene na Katɔti úti kɔnyi ɔ́kya akwa aavlene sɔɔn mmɔ? Ɔɔɔdi bekyuli bani nábla ala ekpidi na Katɔti ɔ́yila-ma udu na ketele kemo mmɔ badi yoo?
58003018	Na ɔma bene na Katɔti ɔ́kpali lɛlɔ ɔ́su ka baláni beléde-nwu na bakɛ bɔnwuna si ɔɔɔdi bekyuli bani nétenu-nwu litemi mmɔ.
58003019	Anwuɔsu bɔ́nu bɔ́ti ka ɔni na bátaƒɔ-nwu bátadi ɔsu na bátakana-nwu bɔni bude na bakɛ bɔnwuna.
58004001	Anwuɔsu ka linyese lɛni na úte-bu ka buduo nwuna bɔnwuna ƒui kemo kamua kese kéte-bu ɔsu ni, bɛya na bɔnu lɛlɔ kemo kaduɛ kalɛ na ɔdi ulásɔ na kenye kammɔ lɛlɔ.
58004002	Ɔsika básu abu lɛnɔ litemi buni lɛmmɔ aani kalɛ kani na básu ama lɛnɔ. Nsu litemi lɛni bénu kátalɛ kɔsia kɔdi kétete-ma. Ɔsika ama bani nénu kenye kammɔ ni, bátaƒɔ-ka bátadi.
58004003	Nsu abu bani mɔɔƒɔ́ taadi ni, bɔdubɔkɛ bɔnwuna bɔmmɔ. Na bani nátaƒɔ bátadi ni, bátakɛ-mu aani kalɛ kani na Katɔti ɔ́su lebo lɛni na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Anwuɔsu lɛ́kpali lɛlɔ lɛ́su na kɔnyi kemo nnini, 'Baláni beléde-mi na bakɛ bɔnwuna kudii!' ” Katɔti ɔ́su ɔmɛni ina ka úte kuƒi úse uwi ɔni na ɔ́wɔlɔ kayawi budie.
58004004	Ɔsika na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ni, bénweni lɛla lɛdi na limeyi maatɛdi lɛlɔ banini, “Na limeyi maatɛdi lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti ɔ́da kabla ƒui ɔ́ya na ɔ́nwuna.”
58004005	Na litemi lɛni bɔ́su bɔ́vi mɛni kemo ni, Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, “Baláni beléde-mi na bakɛ bɔnwuna kudii!”
58004006	Litemi lɛmɛni lɛmua lise lɛni ka badi badubɔkɛ bɔnwuna bɔmmɔ. Na bani na báka lɛsa lɛmmɔ bɔkɔ bute ni, ama mmomu néteduo bɔnwuna bɔmmɔ kemo ɔ́si bana atuɔkplu ɔsu.
58004007	Ɔmɛni ɔsu na Katɔti ɔ́sɔ úse limeyi lɛbambadi lɛni na ɔɔlɔ ɔnii ɔmwi úse uwi ɔni na ɔ́tɛmiku kuuku bekyuli ɔkɛnku Ɔga Dawid lɛlɔ lɛni na bɔ́su búbavi bɔnini, “Si bínu Katɔti lɛdi ɔmwi ni, bitabla atuɔkplu.”
58004008	Ɔsika bɔya na si Yosua ɔ́ya na bákɛ bɔnwuna ni, nka Katɔti ɔ́sɔ útasu lɛla lɛdi útasiku limeyi lɛbambadi lɛdi lɛlɔ.
58004009	Ɔmɛni ɔsu na lɛnwunameyi lɛmua lise lite Katɔti bekyuli.
58004010	Ɔsika ukyuli biala ɔni muuduo Katɔti bɔnwuna kemo ni, ɔɔda nwuna kabla ƒui taaya na ɔɔnwuna aani kalɛ kani na Katɔti ɔ́bla.
58004011	Anwuɔsu bɛya bɔkya ɔkplu biala na buduo bɔnwuna bɔmmɔ kemo. Na ɔdi biala uláwɔ ulu ka ɔsiaku bana atuɔkplu bɔbla kama ɔsu.
58004012	Katɔti litemi lɛdi lɛla lɛni mbo ngba na lɛɛbla kabla pla pla teetulo kewii kani na bádɔ-ka lɛvi inyɔ. Na liiduo ukyuli kasusu ku kɔyu ntɛ. Na lɛɛbla lɛni aani kalɛ na kewii keele ɔlɔna ku ekubi ntɛ. Litemi lɛmmɔ lɛɛnu lɛla biala lɛni nkya ukyuli kasusu ku kayi kemo taatina-nwu.
58004013	Ala ani ƒui na Katɔti údie lítabɛ-nwu. Na ɔɔnu lɛla biala kalɛ na lise. Na nwuna anumi na bɔdubo bula akunta ƒui bɔbu.
58004014	Anwuɔsu ka bubo ɔkpane unengudi ɔbuni ƒui ɔni ndi Katɔti Ubidi Yesu ɔni nkya-nwu kudɔ na katɔ mmɔ ɔsu ni, bɛya na buƒie bɔƒɔtaadi bɔni kenye na buudie mɛni bɔda kpakplaa.
58004015	Ɔɔɔdi ɔkpane unengudi ɔni na bula lɛlɔ lilakywi-nwu kaƒɔ na bula kpɛtɛ kpɛtɛ bɔbla kemo. Mmomu ɔdi ukyuli ɔni na ala ékpoku-nwu ánu na ulu biala lɛlɔ aani bula kalɛ kani. Nsu útabla likpidi lɛdi.
58004016	Anwuɔsu bɛya na buti bula lɛlɔ ƒui bute-nwu na bɔkpɛ bude-nwu na nwuna lɛgaboku kudɔ ku kayi buse ka ubo lɛƒɔndia ɔsu. Na ɔkɛnku nwuna lɛƒɔndia ɔsu ni, ɔdubɔnu-bu kɔnyana na ubunku-bu uwi biala na búvele-nwu lɛla lɛdi.
58005001	Ɔkpane unengudi biala ni, bekyuli akɔ na baaƒuna-nwu taalɛku. Na anwu muunye bekyuli bammɔ kenye na ala ani ƒui ndanku Katɔti lɛlɔ. Na uuti etela ku akpala teete Katɔti na bana ƒui ekpidi lili.
58005002	Na bekyuli bani naaagyi ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ na báyii ulu ni, ɔkpane ɔmmɔ ɔgyi kalɛ na ɔbla bana litemi buɛɛ. Ɔsika anwu lɛnɔ ulákana ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ ƒui lɛlɔ bɔdi.
58005003	Lɛni ɔsu na ɔlɛka ɔbla akpala na anwu ɔlati ekpidi ku bekyuli bammɔ ƒui ekpidi lili.
58005004	Ukyuli ɔdi ulakana ɔkpane unengudi kenyekɔ kamɛni bɔƒuna bute lɛlɔ. Mmomu ɔdi ka Katɔti náƒuna-nwu aani kalɛ na ɔ́ƒuna Aaron.
58005005	Lɛni kani na Kristo lɛnɔ útaƒuna ɔkpane unengudi kenyekɔ kamɛni útete lɛlɔ kalɛ na bekyuli babu-nwu. Mmomu Katɔti ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ ndi mina ubi. Na ɔmwi ni, línwini-ɔ ɔti.”
58005006	Na likpo bamba ni, ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, “Adi ɔkpane úsela uwi ƒui na Melkisedek ɔkpane bɔdi ulu lɛlɔ.”
58005007	Uwi ɔni na Yesu úlie ngba na kayawi kamɛni lɛlɔ ni, ɔ́kpali katɔ úvele Katɔti ɔni kani ndubɔkana na udie-nwu na kukpi kemo ku kɔvanu momoomo ku imii. Na Katɔti únu-nwu bɔkpali, ɔsika úboku lɛlɔ kalɔ úte-nwu na ɔɔbu-nwu ɔsu.
58005008	Na ina ka ubidi na ɔdi ni, ɔ́tɛya abi ani na ɔdi ka ukyuli ubo si uunú Katɔti litemi.
58005009	Na ka Katɔti ɔ́ya na ɔ́bla nwuna kabla ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, únwini ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na bekyuli bani muunú-nwu litemi ƒui baasia taakɛ ngba bɔƒɔ.
58005010	Na Katɔti nédie-nwu ka unwini ɔkpane unengudi na Melkisedek ɔkpane bɔdi ulu lɛlɔ.
58005011	Bubo ala pii na bɔsu bɔsiku ɔmɛni lɛlɔ, nsu ka bilákana ala buƒie taakya lili kemo pla pla ɔsu ni, nwuna kalɔ budie bubo ɔkplu.
58005012	Sɔsɔ ni, ɔƒɛni kalɛ bene nka bɛdi ala batinane muedi. Nsu bɛsɔ bɛɛwia ukyuli ɔni nsɔ medie Katɔti litemi buni lɛmmɔ ala kalɔ kesekɔ mete-mii. Ɔni na bɛwia adila geen kama ni, bɛɛwia lɛnyi ntu mmomu.
58005013	Na ukyuli ɔni na lɛnyi ntu kani na ɔɔnyimi ni, ɔmua ɔdi ɔnamu na útedu ka unu ala bɔtina bɔni ndanku ukyuli lɛlɔ bɔbla siin kalɔ.
58005014	Nsu adila geen ani mbo unu ni, ese ete bekyuli bani náabi lɛlɔ. Lɛni kani na bekyuli bani náabi lɛlɔ ni, báanyuɛ lɛlɔ na báti kavumana kani nkya lɛbuni ku likpidi ntɛ.
58006001	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, bɛya na busie anumi, na bulasɔ bulakya lɛnamu uwi kalɔ kesekɔ ala ani na bɔ́tɛya na Kristo mmɔ kani lɛlɔ kemo. Bitaya na bɔsɔ butése kalɔ kesekɔ ala bɔtɛya kalɔ. Ala amɛni adanku kayi bunwini na ala ekpidi lɛlɔ ku kalɛ na bɔƒɔ Katɔti bɔdi lɛlɔ.
58006002	Na adanku lɛla lɛni ɔsu na beeti ntu taabla ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ku enu lili bɔsia ku kalɛ na bekpine badubɔsɔ bata balɛ bekpine akɔ ku Katɔti litemi lɛni na ɔdubɔtɛku-bu na ɔsɔ ulavumana-ni kudii lɛlɔ.
58006003	Anwuɔsu bɛya na busie anumi. Na si Katɔti ɔ́tunaku-bu ni, ulu ɔmɛni lɛlɔ na bɔdubɔsia.
58006004	Na bekyuli bani nánu bukeye dii na bákɛ Katɔti lɛƒɔndia na bákɛ kɔsia kɔdi ɔkɛnku Katɔti Kɔyu lɛlɔ,
58006005	na bánu lɛbuni lɛni nkya Katɔti litemi buni lɛmmɔ kemo báti ku ɔyikun ɔni ndanku Katɔti lɛga bɔdi bɔni mebo lɛnɔ lɛlɔ
58006006	si béni bana bɔƒɔtaadi na Katɔti lɛlɔ ni, basɔ balakana na benwini kayi. Ɔsika basɔ baaka Katɔti Ubidi ɔmmɔ taamana ugyii lɛlɔ na baakya-nwu kɔƒa na kadi ƒui anumi.
58006007	Kalɔ kani mɔɔƒɔ́ ntu si ɔnantu ɔ́na na kaadia edula abuni teete bemonsene ni, Katɔti kusɛ kusɛ ɔɔsiáku-ka.
58006008	Nsu kalɔ kani na liyu na alakpi mɔɔkwɛ́-ka lɛlɔ ni, kadanku ewida na keeebo kɔsia kɔdi. Na kasɔ kaladia lɛla lɛdi bɔbla lɛnɔ. Na kawɔlɔkɔ ni, kadubɔkywi.
58006009	Bayɔne, ina ka bɔɔsu ala amɛni ƒui ni, bɔsia anu ka ala abuni ani ndanku ngba bɔƒɔ adubɔsiaku amii ƒui.
58006010	Katɔti ɔɔbla lɛla biala ulu lɛlɔ. Na uláyiƒla bina ala ani na bɛ́bla. Ɔgyi ka bɛɛyɔ́-nwu ɔkɛnku kalɛ na bíbunku nwuna bekyuli. Na bɛmua biibunku-ma úbedu ɔƒɛni.
58006011	Lɛni na bɔɔwia ka bina akɔ ɔdi biala ɔda lɛlɔ ku udu buni ɔmɛni kaduɛ utédu kawɔlɔkɔ kalɛ na bina lɛnunsia lɛlɛ-mii kɔsia.
58006012	Buláwia ka bitaabla kɔkɔsɔ. Mmomu bɛtɛya bekyuli bani nákɛ kayi buɛɛ na báƒɔ bádi ɔsu na kɔnu kútuku-ma linyese lɛni na Katɔti úse-ma mmɔ.
58006013	Uwi ɔni na Katɔti úse Abraham kenye ni, ɔ́kpali lɛlɔ úse kenye kammɔ, ɔsika lɛla lɛdi liiibo na litulo anwu Katɔti.
58006014	Na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Geen ni, ndubute-ɔ kusɛ kusɛ. Na ndubɔya na edie kaba pii.”
58006015	Na ɔmmɔ kama ka Abraham ɔ́kɛ kayi buɛɛ na ɔ́sia Katɔti anu ɔsu ni, kɔnu kútuku-nwu kenye kani na Katɔti úse-nwu mmɔ.
58006016	Bekyuli baakpali ala ani ntulo-ma teese kenye taatina ka lɛla lɛni baasu lɛdi litemi geen, na unyeƒi ɔdi uuubo-nwu kemo.
58006017	Na ka Katɔti ɔɔwia ka bekyuli bani na úse kenye ƒui bati nwaa ka kavumana kadi kelebo nwuna linyese kemo ɔsu ni, ɔ́kpali lɛlɔ úse kenye kammɔ.
58006018	Katɔti ɔ́bla ɔmɛni ɔkɛnku alakpa anyɔ ani naaavumana lɛlɔ. Na Katɔti lɛnɔ ulakana ɔkɔ bɔnyi. Na ɔmɛni ɔdubɔya na abu bani nékeli bɔ́tamiku-nwu ni, enu alaƒɛ-bu na lɛnunsia lɛni na úti ɔ́kya-bu lɛlɔ kemo ɔsu.
58006019	Bula lɛnunsia lɛmɛni mɔɔyá na bɔda Katɔti kpakplaa na bula kayi kemo aani kalɛ na kugyii lidu lɛɛda kalɔ geen. Na bɔsia Yesu anu. Anwu néduo katɔma kedee kani kenye na lɛdiku lɛƒa kemo.
58006020	Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́gyu ɔtɔ útéduo na abu ɔsu. Na únwini ɔkpane unengudi úte uwi ƒui na Melkisedek ɔkpane bɔdi ulu lɛlɔ.
58007001	Melkisedek ɔmɛni ɔ́di lɛga na Salem, na ɔ́bla ɔkpane kabla úte Katɔti ɔni ntulo ƒui. Uwi ɔni na Abraham ɔ́si kekpokɔ útádi baga bani nkya amadɔ mmɔ lɛlɔ ɔdubo ni, Melkisedek ɔmɛni útásiaku-nwu na úte-nwu kusɛ kusɛ.
58007002	Na Abraham úti nwuna ala ƒui lɛkpa leevudi úte-nwu. Kudeedi ni, Melkisedek lɛnyi kalɔ ndi Siin Bɔbla Ɔga. Na ɔmmɔ kama ni, Salem Ɔga kalɔ budie ndi Keyi Buɛɛ Ɔga.
58007003	Na bétenweni lɛla lɛdi bátasiaku ɔti iye uni, iye kaba lɛlɔ, iye nwuna bɔwɔ iye kukpi lɛlɔ. Na Katɔti ɔ́ya na use aani anwu Katɔti Ubidi, ɔsika ɔdi ɔkpane ute uwi ƒui.
58007004	Bɛnu kalɛ na Melkisedek ɔmɛni ɔ́ƒɔ kuye geen. Abraham ɔni ndi bula nana ɔni nédie bula kaba kamɛni muedi úti ala ani na úkpo ɔ́ƒɔ na kekpokɔ mmɔ lɛkpa leevudi úte-nwu!
58007005	Na ɔƒɛni ni, ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ búte Lewi kaba kemo bebi bani nébenwini bakpane ka baƒɔ ala lɛkpa leevudi basiku bekyuli kudɔ ina ka bekyuli bamɛni badi bana banwani bani nási Abraham ɔmmɔ kaba kemo.
58007006	Melkisedek ɔmɛni útasi Lewi kaba kemo, nsu ɔ́ƒɔ ala lɛkpa leevudi ɔ́siku Abraham ɔni na Katɔti úse-nwu kenye úse mmɔ kudɔ, na Melkisedek ɔmmɔ úte-nwu kusɛ kusɛ.
58007007	Na ɔkɔ ɔdi uuubo-nwu kemo ka ni, ukyuli ɔni muute kusɛ kusɛ utulo ukyuli ɔni na béte kusɛ kusɛ mmɔ.
58007008	Na bekyuli bani mɔɔƒɔ́ ala lɛkpa leevudi ni, badi bakpane bani muukpi. Nsu na Melkisedek kakɛ anwu ni, ɔ́ƒɔ lɛkpa leevudi lɛmmɔ aani ɔkpane ɔni nli ngba aani kalɛ na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔɔsu.
58007009	Na bɔkana na bɔsu muedi bɔnii Lewi ɔni mɔɔƒɔ́ ala lɛkpa leevudi lɛnɔ ɔ́sia Abraham lɛlɔ úte Melkisedek ala lɛkpa leevudi lɛmmɔ.
58007010	Ɔsika uwi ɔni na Abraham ɔ́siaku Melkisedek na uute-nwu ala lɛkpa leevudi lɛmɛni ni, na Lewi ɔmua ɔkya bana nana bene ubugya kemo.
58007011	Katɔti úte kadi ƒui bekyuli ɔda bubo bɔni nkɛnku Lewi ɔkpane bɔdi kabla ulu lɛlɔ. Na si bɔbla na bábla bana kabla na kédu káwɔlɔ ni, bi ɔsu na Katɔti ɔ́sɔ ɔ́ƒuna ɔkpane ɔbambadi ka ubo ɔsiaku Melkisedek ɔkpane bɔdi ulu lɛlɔ na ɔɔɔdi aani kalɛ na ɔ́ƒuna Lewi bebi bani ndi Aaron kaba?
58007012	Anwuɔsu si kavumana kadi kébo na ɔkpane bɔdi ulu ɔdi lɛlɔ ni, na agyi anii ɔdi ka kavumana kadi kebo na ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ lɛnɔ kemo.
58007013	Na ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na básu ala amɛni ƒui básiku ni, ɔ́si kaba bekyuli babambadi akɔ. Na kaba kammɔ bekyuli akɔ ɔdi útabla ɔkpane kabla na lɛkpabi lɛlɔ kudii.
58007014	Ɔsika bɔgyi kede kede ka Yesu ni, Yuda kaba kemo na báwɔ-nwu básiku. Na kaba kammɔ lɛlɔ ni, Mose útasu lɛla lɛdi útasiku bakpane lɛlɔ.
58007015	Na ɔƒɛni ɔni na ɔkpane ɔbambadi ɔdi ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ aani Melkisedek kalɛ ni, lɛla lɛni na bɔ́su mɛni lɛdubɔbla-mii nwaa libu.
58007016	Ɔdi ukyuli ɔni nébenwini ɔkpane na ɔɔɔkɛnku ɔda bubo bɔni ndanku kaba kemo ɔkpane bɔdi ulu lɛlɔ. Mmomu únwini ɔkɛnku ɔkpane ɔyikun ɔni nkya nwuna ngba bɔni naaadubo bɔsa kudii kemo.
58007017	Ɔsika Katɔti ɔ́su nwaa ɔnini, “Adi ɔkpane úsela uwi ƒui na Melkisedek ɔkpane bɔdi ulu lɛlɔ.”
58007018	Béliiku ɔda bubo bɔkukudi bése kɔmadɔ, ɔsika buuubo ɔyikun na buuubo kɔsia kɔdi lɛnɔ.
58007019	Ɔsika ɔda bubo bɔni na Katɔti úte-bu ɔkɛnku Mose lɛlɔ ni, bútabla Katɔti kabla bútawɔlɔ. Na ɔƒɛni ni, bɔ́kɛ lɛnunsia lɛni ndia ntulo na lɛɛyá na bɔɔní teede Katɔti.
58007020	Ɔƒɛni ni, ɔɔɔdi ɔmmɔ lɛti, mmomu ɔkpane bɔdi ulu ɔmmɔ ɔdanku Katɔti linyese. Na uwi ɔni na bése bakpane babambadi ni, ɔɔɔdanku linyese lɛdi.
58007021	Nsu Yesu úbenwini ɔkpane ɔkɛnku Katɔti linyese lɛlɔ uwi ɔni na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Unwoti úse kenye kpakplaa kadi na ulavumana-ka kudii ɔnini, 'Adi ɔkpane úsela uwi ƒui.' ”
58007022	Ɔkɛnku Katɔti linyese lɛmɛni lɛlɔ ɔsu ni, Yesu ndi bula kama kekpokɔ na bunyimi bɔni ndia ntulo mɛni lɛlɔ.
58007023	Kavumana kabambadi kadi lɛnɔ kakya kani ndi ka bakpane bakukudi bammɔ bémomo, ɔsika ɔdi útakana nwuna kabla kenye bunye uwi ƒui ɔ́si kalɛ na beekpi ɔsu.
58007024	Nsu Yesu anwu uli úsela uwi ƒui, na ulavumana nwuna ɔkpane kabla ulete ɔdi kudii.
58007025	Anwuɔsu ni, ukyuli biala ɔni muubo Katɔti kudɔ ɔkɛnku-nwu lɛlɔ ni, Yesu ɔmmɔ ɔɔkana na ɔɔƒɔ́-ma ngba uwi ƒui ɔdubo buteevele teete-ma na Katɔti kudɔ.
58007026	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Yesu ɔmɛni ndi ɔkpane unengudi ɔni kani ndubɔbla lɛla lɛni na bɔɔwia ute-bu. Na use kedee, na lɛla lɛdi lɛɛɛda-nwu. Use sɛɛn na Katɔti údie-nwu ɔ́lɛku alaekpidi bablane akɔ, na ɔ́kɔliku-nwu útése sɛsɛɛ na katɔ kakaaka ƒui.
58007027	Na uuuse aani bakpane benengudi babambadi bammɔ kalɛ bani nálɛ ka bataabla akpala na ama ku bekyuli bakladi lili taasia kama limeyi ndi limeyi. Mmomu kunwi kɔni na anwu úti lɛlɔ ɔ́kpa na bekyuli ƒui lili ni, ɔ́kpa kunwi pɛ kɔmmɔ kani na ɔ́sa.
58007028	Ɔsika ni, ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ bɔɔƒuna bakpane bani naaakana bunye kpakplaa ama alati. Nsu linyese lɛni nébo na ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ kama ni, bɔ́ƒuna Ubi ɔmmɔ na ɔ́ya na ɔ́wɔlɔ nwuna kabla úte uwi ƒui.
58008001	Lɛla lɛni geen na bɔɔyɔ́ budie bɔtina na litemi lɛmɛni kemo ndi ka ni, bubo ɔkpane unengudi ɔmɛni ɔni nlie kesii kani náƒɔ kuye na Katɔti lɛgaboku kudɔ na katɔ.
58008002	Na ɔɔbla Katɔti kabla na kakpakɔ kedee kani ndi kakpakɔ geen kani na Katɔti ɔlati úti nwuna enu ɔ́bla. Na ɔɔɔdi bekyuli nábla-ka.
58008003	Báƒuna ɔkpane unengudi biala ka uti ala ani na béte ku ani na badubuti bakpa ƒui ɔkpa ute Katɔti. Na lɛni kani na ɔlɛka ɔkpane ɔmɛni lɛnɔ uti lɛla lɛdi ɔkpa ute Katɔti.
58008004	Na si nka kalɔ lɛlɔ mɛni na ɔkya ni, nka ulabla ɔkpane kabla kulaa. Ɔsika bakpane bakya bani mɔɔbla akpala kalɛ na ɔda bubo bɔni ntɛ nse bɔɔtina.
58008005	Baabla kabla na bana kakpakɔ kani nálɛ kani geen nkya katɔ. Ɔmmɔ geen ɔsu na Katɔti úbo Mose ɔda uwi ɔni na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnii ɔtu bana kakpakɔ. Na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Nu kaduɛ na atu kakpakɔ kammɔ na kamanku ulu ɔni na lɛ́tina-a na kɔbi lili mmɔ lɛlɔ.”
58008006	Nsu kabla kani na Katɔti úti ɔ́kya Yesu enu kemo ni, káƒɔ kuye ketulo bana ɔdi ƒui. Lɛni na bunyimi bɔwɔdi bɔni kenye na Yesu unye ni, bɔ́ƒɔ kuye butulo bunyimi bɔkukudi bɔmmɔ ƒui. Ɔsika bése bunyimi bɔmɛni bése na linyese lɛni ndia ntulo lɛlɔ.
58008007	Si lɛla lɛdi nétebie na bunyimi bɔkukudi lɛlɔ ni, na nka ɔ́sɔ útamanku na ulu biala lɛlɔ ka basɔ bete-bu bunyimi bɔwɔdi bɔbambadi bɔdi.
58008008	Nsu Katɔti ɔ́nu ka bekyuli báƒiɔ, na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ami Unwoti mɔɔsu ka ni, uwi ɔdubo ɔni na ndubo lɛla lɛwɔdi bunyimiku Israel kadi bekyuli ku Yuda kadi bekyuli.
58008009	Na ulése aani kalɛ na línyimiku bana bati kuuku na uwi ɔni na lɛ́da-ma kɔnu kɔnu na lɛ́tɔnku-ma lɛ́lɛku Egyipte kalɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔsika bátadi lɛla lɛni na línyimiku-ma lɛlɔ. Anwuɔsu línwini kama lɛ́kya-ma.
58008010	Bunyimi bɔni na ndubo bunyimiku Israel kadi bekyuli uwi ɔni ndubo kemo ndi ɔmɛni. Ndubuti mina ɔda bubo lɛkya-ma kasusu kemo. Na ndubunweni-mu lɛkya-ma kayi kemo. Ndubɔbla bana Katɔti na ama lɛnɔ babla mina bekyuli.
58008011	Na ɔ́si ɔƒɛni ni, ukyuli ɔdi ɔsɔ ulatina ɔkpanadi iye ɔnwani ka ɔti Blɔti. Ɔsika bana ƒui badubo-mi bɔti ɔ́si ubliidi ƒui útálɛ unengudi lɛlɔ.
58008012	Na ndubuti bana alaekpidi ani ƒui bábla lɛkyiɛ-ma. Na nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo bana ekpidi bunyimo kudii.”
58008013	Na ka Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnii ɔdubuse bunyimi bɔwɔdi ni, na budeedi bɔ́bla bɔkukudi. Na lɛla lɛkukudi lɛni néetu uwi ni, lɛdubo bɔyii uwi klukui kemo.
