62003003	Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔsia Kristo bubo anu ni, ɔɔklibi lɛlɔ teese sɛɛn aani kalɛ na Kristo lɛnɔ use sɛɛn.
62003004	Ukyuli biala mɔɔbla likpidi ni, ɔɔƒiɔ́ Katɔti ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ. Ɔsika likpidi ndi Katɔti ɔda bubo bɔƒiɔ.
62003005	Na bɛgyi ka Kristo úbo kalɛ na ubada-bu udie ekpidi kemo. Na anwu ni, likpidi lɛdi lɛɛɛma-nwu lɛlɔ.
62003006	Anwuɔsu ukyuli ɔni nliku Kristo ni, ulélie taabla likpidi. Nsu ukyuli ɔni muulie taabla likpidi ni, ɔɔtina ka útati Kristo kudii, na ɔƒaani muedi ɔɔɔgyi-nwu.
62003007	Bitaya na ukyuli ɔdi ɔtɔlɔ-mii! Mina bebi bayɔne, ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla ala ulu lɛlɔ ni, ɔdi ukyuli ɔni nse siin aani kalɛ na Kristo use siin.
62003008	Ukyuli ɔni muulie taabla likpidi ni, ɔdi Satan ɔdi. Ɔsika Satan nli mɔɔbla likpidi ɔ́si kayawi kalɔ kesekɔ. Na lɛla lɛni ɔsu na Katɔti Ubidi ɔmmɔ úbo ni, ani ndi ka ɔyila Satan ablala.
62003009	Ama bani ndi Katɔti bebi ni, belélie taabla likpidi. Ɔsika Katɔti udu nkya-ma lɛlɔ kemo ɔƒaani. Na ka Katɔti ndi-ma Ɔti ɔsu ni, balakana bulie butaabla likpidi.
62003010	Bɛya na lɛtina-mii kalɛ na bɔɔnu taati kavumana kani nkya Katɔti bebi ku Satan bebi ntɛ. Ukyuli biala ɔni naaabla ala siin ni, iye ulayɔ nwuna ɔnwa ɔƒɔtaadine ni, ɔɔɔdi Katɔti ubidi.
62003011	Ɔmɛni ndi kenye kani na bínu bɛ́si kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui, na ani ndi ka ɔlɛka bɛyɔ lɛlɔ.
62003012	Na utalɛka bɔbla lɛlɔ aani Kain kalɛ. Ɔsika anwu ɔdi Satan ɔdi, na ɔ́du ɔnwani. Na bi ɔsu na Kain ɔ́du-nwu? Ɔsika uukisi ɔnwani ka nwuna ablala ese siin ɔsu. Na anwu Kain adi eeese siin.
62003013	Anwuɔsu ni, banwa, utabla-mii dɛye dɛye si kayawi bekyuli beekisi-mii.
62003014	Na bɔgyi ka bɔ́ɔlɛ kukpi enu kemo, na búbo buli ngba geen, ɔsika bɔɔyɔ́ bula banwa baƒɔtaadine. Na ukyuli biala ɔni naaayɔ bekyuli ni, úkpi na kɔyu kemo.
62003015	Na ukyuli ɔni muukisi nwuna ukyulikpana ni, ɔdi bekyuli ɔdune. Na amii alati bɛgyi ka ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔdú bekyuli ni, uuubo ngba bɔni naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
62003016	Kalɛ na Yesu Kristo úti nwuna ngba ɔ́kpa na bula lili ni, ɔmmɔ mɔɔtina-bu lɛla lɛni ndi bɔyɔ. Anwuɔsu na abu lɛnɔ ɔlɛka buti lɛlɔ bɔkpa bula banwa baƒɔtaadine lili.
62003017	Si ukyuli ɔdi ubo ala adi na ɔɔnu ka ɔnwani ɔɔyaki nsu útete-nwu kebunku kadi mmomu ɔ́da anumi údie ɔnwani ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, dɛ na wakana bɔsu ɔnii ɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti?
62003018	Mina bebi bayɔne, bitaya na bɔyɔ lɛlɔ ku kenyekplu. Mmomu biteebunku lɛlɔ geen.
62003019	Ɔmɛni bɔbla kemo na bɔdubɔti ka bɔgyi litemi geen lɛmmɔ na bɔkɛ kayi ƒaa na Katɔti anumi.
62003020	Na si ina bula kayi kaadú-bu kɔtɔ muedi ni, enu ataƒɛ-bu. Bɔgyi ka Katɔti ɔɔtɛ litemi biala ulu lɛlɔ teetulo-bu, na ɔgyi lɛla biala.
62003021	Anwuɔsu ni, banwa bayɔne, si bula kayi kaladu-bu kɔtɔ ni, na bɔdubɔkana na bunye Katɔti anumi ku kayi buse.
62003022	Na lɛla biala na buuvele-nwu ni, bɔɔkɛ́-ni ɔsika bɔɔdi nwuna ɔda bubo lɛlɔ na bɔɔbla lɛla lɛni mɔɔyɔ́-nwu kaƒɔ.
62003023	Ɔda bubo bɔni na úse úte-bu ndi ka bɔƒɔ Ubidi Yesu Kristo ɔmmɔ bɔdi, na bɔyɔ bula lɛlɔ aani kalɛ kani na úbo-bu ɔda úbavi.
62003024	Bekyuli bani mɔɔdi Katɔti ɔda bubo lɛlɔ ni, beliku Katɔti. Na Katɔti lɛnɔ uliku-ma. Na Kɔyu kɔni na Katɔti úti úte-bu ɔsu ni, bɔgyi ka Katɔti uliku-bu.
62004001	Banwa bayɔne, bitaƒɔ kɔyu biala muulie ukyuli lɛlɔ bitadi. Mmomu bɛkɔku ɔdi biala bɛnu si kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔ́si Katɔti kudɔ. Ɔsika ɔkɔ kenye bediene béegyingya bakya kayawi ekpo ƒui.
62004002	Na ukyuli biala ɔni muudie kenye taasu ɔnii Kristo Yesu úbo aani ɔyawine kalɛ ni, ukyuli ɔmmɔ ubo Kɔyu kɔni nási Katɔti kudɔ. Na ɔmɛni ndi ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na bɛdubɔsia bɛti Katɔti Kɔyu.
62004003	Nsu ukyuli biala ɔni meni ka ɔsu ɔnii Yesu úbo aani ɔyawine kalɛ ni, kɔyu kɔni na ubo mmɔ kútasi Katɔti kudɔ. Kɔyu kɔmɛni kɔdi Kristo ukisine. Na bínu ka kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔdububo kayawi, na kúubo kɔkya ɔƒaani muedi.
62004004	Nsu amii bebi bayɔne ni, bɛ́si Katɔti kudɔ, na bɛ́ɛdi ɔkɔ kenye bediene bammɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔsika Kɔyu kɔni náƒɔ-mii lɛlɔ kemo ni, kubo ɔyikun kutulo kɔyu kɔni nlie ama bani ndi kayawi badi mmɔ lɛlɔ.
62004005	Kayawi lɛlɔ bekyuli kani na badi. Na baatɛmi taasiku kayawi ala lɛlɔ. Na kayawi bekyuli lɛnɔ beenú-ma litemi.
62004006	Nsu abu ni, bɔdi Katɔti badi. Na ukyuli biala ɔni ngyi Katɔti ni, uunú-bu litemi. Na ukyuli biala ɔni nátasi Katɔti kudɔ ni, ulenu-bu litemi. Ɔmɛni buuti taanu taati Kɔyu kɔni mɔɔtina litemi geen lɛmmɔ ku kɔyu kɔni mɔɔtɔ́lɔ bekyuli.
62004007	Banwa bayɔne, bɛya na bɔyɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔsika bɔyɔ bɔ́si Katɔti kudɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔyɔ́ bekyuli ɔdi Katɔti ubi, na ɔgyi Katɔti.
62004008	Na ukyuli biala ɔni naaayɔ bekyuli ni, ɔɔɔgyi Katɔti. Ɔsika Katɔti ablala ƒui adi bɔyɔ.
62004009	Ka Katɔti ɔ́yɔ ka udie nwuna bɔyɔ ɔtina-bu ɔsu ni, ɔ́tala Ubidi unwi pɛ ɔnii ubo kayawi, kalɛ na ɔkɛnku Ubidi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ na bɔkɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
62004010	Bɛya na lɛsu-mii lɛla lɛni geen muudie bɔyɔ keyi. Ɔɔɔdi kalɛ na bɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti muudie bɔyɔ keyi. Mmomu Katɔti ɔ́yɔ-bu, na úti Ubidi ɔ́kpa na bula ekpidi lili kalɛ na ɔklibi abu ku-nwu ntɛ.
62004011	Banwa bayɔne, ka Katɔti ɔ́yɔ-bu geen lɛni ɔsu ni, ɔlɛka abu lɛnɔ butaayɔ lɛlɔ.
62004012	Ukyuli ɔdi útanu Katɔti kudii. Nsu si bɔɔyɔ́ lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti uliku-bu, na bɔyɔ bɔni bubo bute-nwu búdu bɔ́wɔlɔ.
62004013	Bɔgyi ka buliku Katɔti geen, na anwu lɛnɔ uliku-bu, ɔsika anwu ɔlati Kɔyu na úti úte-bu.
62004014	Bɔ́nu bɔ́ti nwaa na buudie kenye ka Katɔti ɔ́tala Ubidi ka ubedie bayawine ɔlɛku ekpidi kemo.
62004015	Si ukyuli biala údie ɔ́su ɔnii Yesu ndi Katɔti Ubidi ni, ɔɔtina ka Katɔti uliku-nwu, na anwu lɛnɔ uliku Katɔti.
62004016	Na abu alati bɔgyi na bɔ́ƒɔ bɔ́di ka Katɔti ɔɔyɔ́-bu. Katɔti ablala ƒui adi bɔyɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔni muulie taayɔ bekyuli ni, uliku Katɔti, na Katɔti lɛnɔ uliku-nwu.
62004017	Na ulu ɔmɛni lɛlɔ na bɔyɔ búdu bɔ́wɔlɔ na bula akɔ. Ɔmmɔ ɔsu na bɔdubɔkana na bunye Katɔti anumi na litemi bɔtɛ limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ku kayi buse. Ɔsika kalɛ na Kristo use ni, lɛni kani na buse na kayawi kamɛni kemo.
62004018	Liƒu lɛdi liiibo bɔyɔ kemo. Mmomu bɔyɔ bɔni nédu bɔ́wɔlɔ bɔɔgyá liƒu biala. Ɔsika liƒu ku kɔtu bɔni nkɛ. Na ukyuli ɔni mbo liƒu ni, nwuna bɔyɔ bútedu bútawɔlɔ.
62004019	Bɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti ku bekyuli ɔsika Katɔti náka-bu bɔyɔ.
62004020	Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔsu ɔnii ɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti nsu uukisi nwuna ɔnwa ɔƒɔtaadine ni, ɔkɔ ɔnyine na ɔdi. Ɔsika ukyuli biala ɔni naaayɔ ɔnwani ɔni na ɔɔnu ku nwuna anumi ni, dɛ na wakana na wayɔ Katɔti ɔni na ulánu ku anumi?
62004021	Na ɔda ɔni na Kristo úbo-bu ndi ka ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti ni, ɔlɛka ɔyɔ nwuna ɔnwa ɔƒɔtaadine lɛnɔ.
62005001	Bekyuli bani ƒui náƒɔ bádi ka Yesu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ni, badi Katɔti bebi. Na alakana ubi ɔti bɔyɔ na ekisi nwuna bebi! Anwuɔsu si aayɔ́ Katɔti ni, aayɔ́ nwuna bebi lɛnɔ.
62005002	Na dɛ na bɔdubɔnu bɔti ka bɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti bebi? Bɔɔnu ɔmɛni taati si bɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti na bɔɔdi nwuna etemila lɛlɔ.
62005003	Na dɛ na bɔɔnu bɔti ka bɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti? Bɔɔnu ɔmɛni taati si bɔɔdi nwuna etemila lɛlɔ. Na nwuna etemila eeese aani etila ani nétulo-bu.
62005004	Ɔsika Katɔti ubi biala ɔɔkana na ɔɔdi kayawi lɛlɔ. Na bɔƒɔtaadi ndi lɛla lɛni na buuti taadi kayawi lɛlɔ.
62005005	Nsu ukyuli ɔdi ulakana kayawi lɛlɔ bɔdi amu ntu ɔ́ƒɔ ɔ́di ka Yesu ndi Katɔti Ubidi ɔmmɔ.
62005006	Yesu ɔmɛni ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni nébo kayawi, na bɔ́nu-nwu bɔ́ti ɔkɛnku ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔni na ɔ́ƒɔ ku nwuna ubugya ɔni néwi kalɔ lɛlɔ ɔsu. Na ɔɔɔdi ntu lɛti pɛ lɛlɔ na ɔkɛ úbo, mmomu ntu ku ubugya ƒui lɛlɔ. Na Katɔti Kɔyu muudie-nwu kenye na ulu lɛlɔ. Ɔsika Kɔyu kɔmmɔ ablala ƒui adi litemi geen.
62005007	Ala ani muudie-nwu kenye mmɔ ebo atɛ. Na anya ndi
62005008	Katɔti Kɔyu ku ntu ku ubugya ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔ́sia úbo mmɔ. Na kenye budie ɛtɛ bɔmɛni ƒui buse unwi.
62005009	Bɔɔƒɔ́ ukyuli kenye budie taadi bɔdi. Nsu Katɔti kenye budie na ulu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, bɔdia butulo. Ɔsika kenye budie bɔmmɔ bɔdi Katɔti ɔlati bɔdi na Ubidi lɛlɔ.
62005010	Anwuɔsu ukyuli ɔni náƒɔ Katɔti Ubidi ɔmmɔ ɔ́di ni, ɔgyi geen na nwuna kayi kemo ka kenye budie bɔmmɔ bɔdi litemi geen. Nsu ukyuli ɔni nátaƒɔ Katɔti útadi ni, ɔɔnu Katɔti aani ɔkɔ ɔnyine, ɔsika útaƒɔ ala ani na Katɔti ɔ́su ɔ́siku Ubidi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ útadi.
62005011	Na kenye budie bɔni na bubo ni, amu ndi ka Katɔti úte-bu ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii. Na uute-bu ngba bɔmɛni ɔkɛnku Ubidi kudɔ.
62005012	Ukyuli ɔni mbo kɔna ku Ubidi ɔmmɔ ni, ubo ngba bɔmɛni. Na ukyuli ɔni neeebo kɔna ku Katɔti Ubidi ɔmmɔ ni, uuubo ngba bɔmmɔ.
62005013	Muunweni ɔku ɔmɛni lite amii bani mbo ngba bɔƒɔ lɛnunsia na Katɔti Ubidi Yesu lɛnyi kemo kalɛ na bɛti ka bibo ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
62005014	Bɔgyi nwaa ka si buuvele Katɔti lɛla biala na nwuna bɔyɔ kenye ni, uunú-bu bɔkpali.
62005015	Na si bɔgyi ka uunú-bu lɛla biala na buuvele-nwu ni, bɔgyi geen ka ala ani buuvele taasiku-nwu kudɔ mmɔ éenwini bula ɔdi.
62005016	Si ɔdi ɔ́nu ka nwuna ɔnwa ɔƒɔtaadine ɔ́bla likpidi lɛdi lɛni na lilákpanku-nwu taatákya kukpi ƒui kemo ni, ɔkpali katɔ na nwuna lili na Katɔti ɔdubute-nwu ngba. Na ɔmɛni use ute bekyuli bani na bana ekpidi alákpanku-ma taatákya kukpi ƒui kemo. Nsu likpidi lɛdi lɛkya lɛni mɔɔkpanku bekyuli taatákya kukpi ƒui kemo. Na naaasu nnii bɛkpali katɔ na likpidi lɛmɛni lili.
62005017	Lɛla biala naaakɛ ulu siin lɛlɔ ni, ɔdi likpidi. Nsu ekpidi adi akya ani naaakpanku ukyuli taatákya kukpi ƒui kemo.
62005018	Bɔgyi ka ukyuli ɔni ndi Katɔti Ubi ni, ulélie taabla likpidi. Ɔsika Katɔti Ubidi ɔɔgyumana-nwu kalɛ na uleduo ukisine ɔmmɔ enu kemo.
62005019	Abu bɔgyi ka bɔdi Katɔti badi geen, na kayawi bekyuli bakladi ƒui bakya ukisine ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ bɔdi kalɔ.
62005020	Na abu bɔgyi lɛnɔ ka Katɔti Ubidi úbo kayawi kamɛni úbedie ala kalɔ úte-bu kalɛ na bɔti anwu ɔni geen ndi Katɔti. Na ɔƒaani ni, buliku anwu ɔni geen ndi Katɔti ɔmmɔ ku nwuna Ubidi Yesu Kristo lɛnɔ. Na anwu geen ndi Katɔti ɔmmɔ ɔni ndi ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
62005021	Anwuɔsu, mina bebi bayɔne, bɛda lɛlɔ bidie lɛƒiɔkpa kemo.
63001001	Ami baƒɔtaadine unengu muunweni ɔku ɔmɛni lite awɔ uleku ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna aani nwuna ɔdi ku ƒula bebi. Mɔɔyɔ́-mii na litemi geen lɛmmɔ kemo. Na ɔɔɔdi ami lɛti mɔɔyɔ́-mii, mmomu ami ku bani ƒui ngyi litemi geen lɛmmɔ.
63001002	Ɔsika litemi geen lɛmmɔ lɛ́ƒɔ abu ku-mii ƒui lɛlɔ kemo na lɛdubulie-bu kudɔ uwi ƒui.
63001003	Na si bulie na litemi geen lɛmmɔ ku bɔyɔ kemo ni, lɛƒɔndia ku kɔnyana bɔnu ku keyi buɛɛ kadubɔsiaku-bu ɔ́si Katɔti ɔni ndi bula Ɔti Ku Yesu Kristo ɔni ndi Katɔti Ubidi kudɔ.
63001004	Kubiti kɔ́da-mi geen ka lɛ́nu ka ƒula bebi badi bamua basiaku litemi geen lɛmmɔ kama aani kalɛ kani na Katɔti úbo-bu ɔda.
63001005	Na ɔƒɛni ni, uleku ɔyɔne, muuvele-ɔ ka aya na bula ƒui bɔyɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔmɛni ɔɔɔdi ɔda bubo bɔwɔdi na muunweni lite-ɔ. Mmomu ɔdi ɔda bubo bɔni nkya ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ.
63001006	Na bɔgyi ka bɔɔyɔ́ lɛlɔ si bɔsiaku Katɔti ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ kama. Na ɔda bubo bɔmɛni ndi ka bulie ngba na bɔyɔ kemo aani kalɛ na bínu ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ mmɔ.
63001007	Bekyuli bani mɔɔtɔ́lɔ bekyuli béebo bakɛ baaví kayawi. Bekyuli bamɛni muuní ka basu banii Yesu Kristo úbo kayawi aani ukyuli ɔyawine kalɛ. Na ukyuli ɔmɛni udu ni, unye ute ɔkɔ ɔnyine ɔni ndi Kristo ukisine ɔmmɔ.
63001008	Anwuɔsu binye kagyumana kalɛ na bilatuma bilewiakun, mmomu na bina katuma kalɛ-mii kɔsia kudu kɔwɔlɔ.
63001009	Ukyuli ɔni náda ɔ́via Kristo ala bɔtina na ulásia-nya kama ni, uuubo kɔna ku Katɔti. Nsu ukyuli ɔni nsiaku Kristo ala bɔtina bɔmmɔ kama ni, uliku Katɔti ku Ubidi lɛnɔ.
63001010	Ɔmɛni ɔsu si ukyuli ɔdi úbo-mii kudɔ na ɔɔɔda Kristo ala bɔtina bɔmɛni ni, bitegyingya enu bitaƒɔ-nwu na uduo-mii kaduli.
63001011	Ɔsika ukyuli ɔni megyingya enu waƒɔ-nwu ni, ɔ́blaku-nwu unwi na nwuna udunkpi ala bɔbla kemo.
63001012	Mbo ala pii na lɛsu-mii, nsu naaayɔ ka linweni ala ammɔ limene-mii. Mmomu mɔɔwia kuƒi ka libo-mii kudɔ na bɔtɛmi anumi ku anumi kalɛ na bula ebiti edu-bu ɔkwɛ.
63001013	Ƒula ɔnwani ulekubi ɔni lɛnɔ na Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna bebi beegyele-ɔ kaduɛ.
64001001	Ɔkpana ɔyɔne Gaio, ami baƒɔtaadine unengu muunweni ɔku ɔmɛni lite-ɔ. Mɔɔyɔ́-ɔ na litemi geen lɛmmɔ kemo.
64001002	Ɔkpana ɔbuni, mɔɔkpali katɔ nnii lɛla biala lɛtɛ lite-ɔ kaduɛ na akɛ ɔlɔkplu aani kalɛ na ebo ɔlɔkplu na kɔyu kemo.
64001003	Lɛlɔ lɛ́yɔ-mi geen uwi ɔni na banwani badi bébo na bábasu-mi kalɛ na aadi litemi geen lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na ngyi ka asiaku-ni kama.
64001004	Lɛla biala lilayɔ-mi kaƒɔ teetulo ɔni na muunú ka mina bebi basiaku litemi geen lɛmmɔ kama.
64001005	Mina ɔkpana buni, ka aanu banwa baƒɔtaadine ina ka badi badi baƒɔ bani na aaagyi muedi ɔsu ni, aabla ala ulu lɛlɔ teete Katɔti.
64001006	Baƒɔ bammɔ bábasu baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mɛni kalɛ na aayɔ́-ma. Anwuɔsu muuvele-ɔ nnii bunku-ma na bakɛ ala ani ƒui na baawia na bana ulu busie kemo aani kalɛ na ɔ́manku-ma aani Katɔti kabla bablane.
64001007	Ɔsika bése bana ulu busie kalɔ na Kristo kabla bɔbla kemo, na bátaƒɔ kebunku kadi bátasiku bekyuli bani nátaƒɔ bátadi kudɔ.
64001008	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, abu Kristoƒuɔ ɔlɛka bubunku bekyuli bamɛni udu kalɛ na bunyeku-ma na bugyingya Kristo litemi geen lɛmmɔ.
64001009	Línweni ɔku ɔdi líte ƒula baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa lɛmmɔ. Nsu ka Diotreƒe ɔɔyɔ́ ka ɔtalaku lɛlɔ katɔ aani ɔtɔnkune na mmɔ ɔsu ni, ulábu lɛla lɛni na abu batalane bɔɔsu.
64001010	Si líbo ni, ndubudie-nwu keyi na lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla lɛlɔ ku ala ekpidi ani na ɔɔsu tasiku-bu lɛlɔ ku ɔkɔ ɔni na ɔ́nyi ɔ́sia-bu. Nsu ɔmmɔ lɛti bɔbla bútabɔ-nwu. Ɔsika ulátuna ɔnii ɔɔƒɔ́ banwa si bébo. Na uutile bekyuli bamba bani mɔɔyɔ́ ka baƒɔ-ma lɛnɔ kuƒi, na ɔɔbɔku-ma teedie lɛkpa lɛmmɔ kemo.
64001011	Mina ɔkpana ɔyɔne, tasiaku likpidi bɔbla kama. Mmomu siaku lɛbuni bɔbla kama. Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔbla lɛbuni ni, ɔdi Katɔti ɔdi. Nsu ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla ala ekpidi ni, ɔɔɔgyi Katɔti.
64001012	Na Demetrio anwu ni, ukyuli biala ɔɔlɔ-nwu lɛnyi buni. Na kalɛ na bɔɔnu litemi geen lɛmmɔ na nwuna lɛlɔ kemo ni, úte-nwu lɛnyi buni. Na abu lɛnɔ bɔɔlɔ-nwu lɛnyi buni. Na bɛgyi ka lɛla lɛni na bɔɔsu lise lɛni.
64001013	Mbo ala pii na lɛsu-mii, nsu naaayɔ ka linweni ala ammɔ limene-ɔ.
64001014	Mɔɔwia ka libo-ɔ kudɔ uwi klukui kemo na bɔtɛmi anumi ku anumi.
64001015	Lɛ́wɔ mɛni. Keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-ɔ. Bakpana bani nkya mɛni ƒui beegyele-ɔ kaduɛ. Lɔ bakpana bani nkya mmɔ anyi unwi unwi na egyele-ma ete-mi.
65001001	Ami Yuda ɔni ndi Yesu Kristo kabla ɔblane na ndi Yakobo ɔnwani ni, muunweni ɔku ɔmɛni lite amii bani nénu Katɔti bɔlɔ. Na ka bɛ́siaku-nwu ɔsu ni, ɔɔyɔ́-mii. Na Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛnɔ ɔɔgyumana-mii geen.
65001002	Muuvele Katɔti nnii ɔnu-mii kɔnyana na nwuna keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-mii, na nwuna bɔyɔ butaakɔ katɔ teebu na bina akɔ.
65001003	Banwa bayɔne, ɔdi lɛla lɛni na mɔɔyɔ́-mii kaƒɔ geen ka linweni-mii ɔku ɔ́si ulu unwi pɛ ɔni lɛlɔ na Katɔti ɔdubɔsia ɔƒɔ-bu ngba lɛlɔ. Na ɔƒɛni ni, lɛ́nu ka ɔlɛka lɛkya-mii ogya na kalɛ na bɛ́ƒɔ Kristo bɛ́di lɛlɔ na bɛda-nwu kpakplaa. Ɔsika ɔmmɔ ndi bɔƒɔtaadi ulu unwi pɛ ɔni na Katɔti úti úte-bu na ulakana na wavumana kudii lɛnɔ.
65001004	Bekyuli bekpidi bani naaayia Katɔti bábɛ béduo-mii akɔ. Na Katɔti ɔ́lɛ ugyii úse ɔ́si kukuuku ƒui ka ɔdubɔdu-ma kɔtɔ na ɔyila-ma udu. Badi bekyuli bekpidi bani nákɛ kasiakɔ na bánu kalɛ na Katɔti ubo lɛƒɔndia úte-bu, na bátu ala bénwini kalɛ na bakɛ kuƒi bataabla bana lɛyalɛ ku likyulikpi ala.
65001005	Bɛgyi ɔmɛni, nsu nsɔ mɔɔsu-mii ka uwi ɔni na Katɔti údie Israelƒuɔ ɔ́siku Egyipte kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, ɔ́du bani nátaƒɔ-nwu bátadi ƒui.
65001006	Na Katɔti batu bani nátakana na benye bana kenyekɔ na ɔyikun ɔni na Katɔti úte-ma kenye ni, Katɔti úbo-ma kɔgba ɔ́kya kasuudikɔ wetédu limeyi lɛni na watɛku-ma litemi na limeyi likplodi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.
65001007	Na Sodom ku Gomora ku lɛma lɛni náka lɛ́mana-ma lɛnɔ ni, bátakana lɛlɔ bɔda na bábla lɛyalɛ ku ala ekpidi bamba. Katɔti úti ogya ɔ́kyula-ma kalɛ na abu bɔnu bɔtɛya.
65001008	Lɛni kani na ala ani na bekyuli bekpidi bani na bébeduo-mii akɔ baanu na ana ani na baatɛ teegye kemo ni, áya na baabla alaekpidi ani mɔɔyá bana ɔlɔna uusé lɛlɔ. Báta bénye Katɔti lɛlɔ na baatɛmi enyekpi na bagadine lɛlɔ.
65001009	Na Katɔti ɔtu unengudi ɔni ndi Mikael muedi ka kadɔ kéduo anwu ku Satan ntɛ na baakya unyeƒi na Mose ɔlɔna lɛlɔ ni, úteti anwu ɔlati kenyekɔ ɔyikun útabɔku Satan. Mmomu ɔ́su ɔnini, “Blɔti ɔbɔku-ɔ!”
65001010	Nsu bekyuli bamɛni udu ama ni, lɛla biala kalɔ na bétenu ni, beewida na beedumi. Na ala ani kalɔ na bénu ni, beléti kasusu baabla-nya aani bebuo kalɛ. Na anya geen mɔɔyila-ma udu.
65001011	Bɔbwɛ muute-ma! Ɔsika ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na Kain ɔ́vi ni, nwuna lɛlɔ kani na ama lɛnɔ bakɛ. Na bányonu lɛlɔ na belie ngba bukpidi bɔni na ukyuli ɔni baalɔ Bileam úlie ka baawia kayawi lɛkɛ ɔsu. Báta bénye Katɔti ɔda bubo lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na Koran ɔ́bla. Na badubɔyii udu aani Koran ɔmmɔ kalɛ.
65001012	Badi bekyuli bani ablala mɔɔyá na bina kasala keesé lɛlɔ si bɛ́sala bɛɛdi Blɔti adila ammɔ. Beedie lɛlɔ na ama lɛti baadi teemo kalɛ na baayɔ́. Bese aani ɔnantu ɔni nánwu, nsu ulána kudii, na ɔƒɛƒɛɛ kani muubó-nwu taavinku. Na bese lɛnɔ aani egyii ani naaanwu ina egyiibi bɔnwu uwi muedi. Bese aani egyii ani na bágyu-nya ku ligyiitu na ékpi ƒui.
65001013	Bese aani ɛpu ntu bɔni mɔɔnwanɛ lɛlɔ ku avlɔvɔ. Bana kɔƒa ala na bada baatina lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na avlɔvɔ aata. Na bese aani ayabi ani mɔɔkpa na kayaa na aayii. Bekyuli bamɛni udu geen na Katɔti ɔ́klibi kasuudikɔ kammɔ úse ka uti-ma ɔkya mmɔ uwi ƒui.
65001014	Bekyuli bamɛni lɛlɔ litemi geen na Henok ɔni ndi kaba maatɛdi ubi ɔ́si Adam lɛlɔ ɔ́su úse ɔnini, “Katɔti ku nwuna batu ƒui bumomo báyu bébo kalɔ lɛlɔ.
65001015	Bébo banii babatɛku bekyuli ƒui litemi. Na bekyuli bani ƒui na balábla Katɔti lɛƒɔyɔ ku ala ani ƒui na bábla ka baláyia Katɔti ɔsu ni, bátɛmi enyekpi na nwuna lɛlɔ lɛnɔ. Anwuɔsu Katɔti ɔni-ma kɔtu.”
65001016	Bekyuli bamɛni baadɔ na bana lɛlɔ kemo. Na beedie bekyuli bamba bɔƒiɔ. Baakun lɛlɔ lɛmɛnɛ, na bekyuli bamba ala alaƒɔ-ma anu amu ntu uwi ɔni na bákɛ-ma lɛlɔ kɔsia kani. Bana likyulikpi ala ani mɔɔda-ma ɔkwɛ kani na baabla uwi biala.
65001017	Nsu ni, mina banwa, bɛkali etemila ani na Yesu Kristo batalane básu-mii.
65001018	Básu banini, “Emeyi ekplodi ammɔ kemo ni, bekyuli badubo-mii buti bɔbla lɛmala na ala ani baasu taasiku-mii lɛlɔ ɔsu. Na basiaku bana udunkpi ala ani na Katɔti ulayɔ kama.”
65001019	Ama mɔɔyá na bekyuli beele lɛlɔ akpa akpa. Na Katɔti Kɔyu kuuubo-ma lɛlɔ kemo, anwuɔsu bakɛ basiaku bana ɔlɔna kemo ala ani mɔɔda-ma ɔkwɛ kani.
65001020	Nsu ni, mina banwa, biti lɛlɔ bɛsia Kristo kalɛ na bina bɔƒɔtaadi kedee bɔyu ɔkplu, na bitaakpali katɔ na Kɔyu kemo na ɔkya-mii ɔyikun.
65001021	Bɛda lɛlɔ na bitaayɔ Katɔti uwi ɔni na binye bɛɛnu ulu ka Yesu Kristo wanu-mii kɔnyana na bɛkɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
65001022	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, bekyuli bani na bana bɔƒɔtaadi bútayu tɔ ɔkplu ni, bɛnu-ma kɔnyana.
65001023	Na bidie babambadi lɛnɔ ɔkplu kemo na beleduo lɛgyavonku lɛmmɔ kemo. Na bakladi ni, bitaanu-ma kɔnyana. Nsu bɛgyumana bina lɛlɔ kalɛ na bana lɛyalɛ udunkpi ɔni náƒɔ-ma lɛlɔ aani adala kalɛ alávi-mii.
65001024	Na anwu ɔni ndubɔkana na uƒie-mii ɔda na bilebuli ni, ɔdubɔkana na ɔbla-mii kedee lɛnɔ. Na lɛlɔ lɛyɔ-mii na ɔya na bɛkana na binye nwuna anumi ani muukeye lɛtɔtɔ na bilásɔ.
65001025	Anwu ɔmmɔ ndi Katɔti unwi pɛ ɔni náƒɔ-bu ngba ɔkɛ Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ. Anwu na buumwi, ɔsika anwu mɔɔdi lɛga na ɔɔdi ala ƒui lɛlɔ ku ɔyikun ɔ́si kukuuku ku uwi ɔmɛni kemo ku ɔni mebo lɛnɔ kemo. Ɔsia lɛni.
66001001	Ɔku ɔmɛni ndi ala ani na Katɔti údie ɔ́tina nwuna kabla bablane ɔkɛnku Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ ka adubo bɔlɛ na uwi klukui kemo. Báti ɔmɛni ɔkɛnku Katɔti ɔtu ɔni na Kristo ɔ́tala ɔ́kya nwuna kabla ɔblane Yohane na ala ani na údie ɔ́tina-nwu kemo.
66001002	Ami Yohane línweni ala ani ƒui na línu ku ani na lɛ́nu. Na lídie kenye na linyesia lɛni nási Katɔti kudɔ ku litemi geen lɛni na Yesu Kristo údie ɔ́tina lɛlɔ.
66001003	Lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ ukyuli ɔni mɔɔká ɔku ɔmɛni teete bekyuli. Na lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ bekyuli bani muunú Katɔti linyese etemila amɛni na balábla atuɔkplu na lɛla lɛni na línweni lɛ́kya ɔku ɔmɛni kemo lɛlɔ. Ɔsika uwi ɔni na ala amɛni ƒui adubo bɔlɛ úude.
66001004	Ami Yohane muunweni ɔku ɔmɛni lite amii baƒɔtaadine akpa maatɛ ani nkya Asia kalɛkɛ lɛlɔ. Bɛkɛ lɛƒɔndia ku keyi buɛɛ bɛsiku Katɔti ku nwuna Kɔyu ku Yesu Kristo kudɔ. Katɔti ndi anwu ɔni nli ɔ́si kukuuku, na ulie ɔƒɛni, na ɔdubo bulie uwi ɔni mebo ƒui. Na Katɔti Kɔyu ndi anwu ɔni mbo ɔyikun maatɛ ɔni nnye Katɔti lɛgaboku anumi.
66001005	Na Yesu Kristo ndi anwu ɔni muudie lɛla lɛdi biala kenye ulu lɛlɔ. Ɔdi ukyuli udeedi ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́gyila ɔ́lɛku bekpine akɔ na ɔsɔ ulekpi kudii. Yesu ɔmɛni mɔɔdi kayawi baga ƒui lɛlɔ. Na ɔɔyɔ́-bu. Na úti nwuna ubugya ɔ́kpa na bula lili, na ɔ́ƒɔ-bu ɔ́lɛku bula ekpidi kemo.
66001006	Na ɔ́bla-bu baga ku bakpane bani mɔɔkpanku bekyuli teeboku Ɔti ɔni ndi Katɔti. Uukeye, na ubo ɔyikun ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ƒui! Ɔsia lɛni.
66001007	Bɛnu! Aanu-nwu ka ɔ́si kayaa ɔdubo na uyɔlɔ kemo! Ukyuli biala ɔdubo-nwu bɔnu ku bani ƒui nábla-nwu kalala. Kayawi bekyuli ƒui badubuwulo kɔnyana ku keku. Ɔsia lɛni.
66001008	Blɔti ɔni mbo ɔyikun ƒui mɔɔsu ɔnini, “Ami ndi kalɔ kesekɔ ku kawɔlɔkɔ. Ami nli, na lílie, na ndubo bulie uwi ɔni ndubo ƒui.”
66001009	Banwa, bɔdi bavinkpana ka buliku Yesu ɔsu. Na ami ku-mii ƒui bunye lɛbibo kenye kpakplaa na kayawi kamɛni kemo, na bɔɔdi Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ala. Ńtaakɔ Katɔti litemi buni lɛni nkɛnku Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ lɛsa na ulu lɛlɔ. Nsu ka bekyuli balayɔ lɛni ɔsu ni, béti-mi bétése ntuntɛ kalɔ kani baalɔ Patmo.
66001010	Na limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na baƒɔtaadine baasa teemwi Blɔti ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-mi lɛlɔ kemo ƒui na línu ka lɛdi lɛdi lɛ́ku momoomo aani kakpɛɛ na lɛɛtɛmi na mina kama.
66001011	Lɛdi lɛmmɔ lɛ́su lɛnini, “Nweni lɛla lɛni na ánu se na eti-ni esienku baƒɔtaadine akpa maatɛ na lɛma linengudi lɛdi kemo. Ani ndi Eƒeso ku Smirna ku Pergamo ku Tiatira ku Sardi ku Ƒiladelƒia ku Laodikea.”
66001012	Amu ka lɛ́tu línwini nnii mɔɔnu ukyuli ɔni mɔɔtɛmiku-mi ni, lɛ́nu sika ugyiedi ligyii maatɛ lɛni lɛlɔ na asogya ɔɔsia.
66001013	Na ligyii lɛmmɔ akɔ ni, lɛla lɛdi linye aani ukyuli kalɛ. Na ɔkya awu gyɔlɔɔ ɔni néne útédu-nwu kanintɔ. Na sika ugyiedi kabuli káda kámana-nwu kayi.
66001014	Nwuna lili linwini lɛ́ƒuala aani unwo na úlieku etubanke. Na nwuna anumi aada aani ogya.
66001015	Na nwuna lɛgba lise aani lɛbuala lɛni bédie na ogya kemo, na lígyie na liikeye. Nwuna lɛdi lɛɛku aani ketu kani mɔɔgbá taasi taayu lɛtabi lɛni nákuku lɛdi lili ku kɔku bonwu.
66001016	Ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔda ayabi maatɛ na nwuna kɔdianu. Na litemi geen lɛni nse aani kewii kani na bádɔ-ka lɛvi inyɔ lɛɛlɛ́-nwu kenye. Na nwuna anumi eekeye aani kalɛ na ɔƒɛ ɔɔbi.
66001017	Ka lɛ́nu-nwu ni, líbuli ńtáyu kalɔ aani ukpine na nwuna anumi. Nsu ukyuli ɔmɛni úti nwuna kɔdianu ɔ́sia-mi lɛlɔ na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Sɔ tayia! Ami ndi Udeedi ku Ukplodi.
66001018	Ami ndi Ukyuli Ɔni Nli Ngba! Líkpi, nsu ɔƒɛni ni, nli ngba. Na nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo bukpi kudii. Mbo ɔyikun na kukpi ku kekpine lɛlɔ.
66001019	Anwuɔsu ala ani na ánu ku ala ani nkya ɔƒɛni ku ani ndubo bɔlɛ lɛnɔ ni, nweni-nya se.
66001020	Ayabi maatɛ ani na ánu na mina kɔdianu ku sika ugyiedi ligyii lɛmmɔ enye ete lɛla lɛdi. Na ana kalɔ na ndubo budie mɛni. Ayabi maatɛ ammɔ ndi Katɔti batu maatɛ ute baƒɔtaadine akpa maatɛ ammɔ. Na sika ugyiedi ligyii lɛmmɔ ndi baƒɔtaadine akpa maatɛ ammɔ.”
66002001	Amu na ɔ́su ami Yohane ɔnini, “Nweni ɔku te Eƒeso baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa ɔtu anii Ami Yesu nda ayabi maatɛ na mina kɔdianu na muusié teebo na sika ugyiedi ligyii maatɛ lɛni lɛlɔ na asogya ɔɔsia mmɔ ntɛ. Na ami mɔɔsu kenye kamɛni.
66002002	Ngyi lɛla lɛni na bɛɛbla. Na ngyi kalɛ na binye kabla kammɔ lɛlɔ kpakplaa ku kalɛ na bɛ́kya ɔkplu. Ngyi ka biléte bekyuli bekpidi kuƒi ku kalɛ na bɛ́kɔku-ma bɛ́nu. Ama ndi bani mɔɔtɔ́lɔ bekyuli banii badi batalane, nsu baaadi batalane. Na bɛ́nu-ma bɛ́ti ka badi ɔkɔ banyine.
66002003	Ngyi ka binye lɛbibo lɛmmɔ kenye kpakplaa na bɛɛkya ɔkplu na ami ɔsu, na enu átaƒɛ-mii.
66002004	Nsu bɔƒiɔ bɔni muudie-mii lɛlɔ ndi ka bɛsɔ bilayɔ-mi aani kalɛ na bítaayɔ-mi kudeedi.
66002005	Anwuɔsu bɛkali bina kenyekɔ kedeedi kani bínye asa na bíbuli bɛnu. Na binwini kama bɛkya bina ekpidi, na bitaabla lɛla lɛni na bítaabla kudeedi. Nsu si bítenwini kama bítakya bina ekpidi ni, ndububo-mii kudɔ na mbada bina sika ugyiedi ugyii ku nwuna asogya ɔmmɔ lɛgyu nwuna kenyekɔ.
66002006	Nsu lɛla lɛni mɔɔda-mi kubiti na bina lɛlɔ ndi ka ala ani na bekyuli bani nsiaku Nikolatia kama baabla ni, biikisi-nya. Na ami lɛnɔ nkisi-nya.
66002007	Si bibo atu ni, na binu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ. Anwu ɔni madi ekpidi lɛlɔ ni, ndubute-nwu ulu na ɔdi ngba kugyii kɔni nnye Katɔti Paradiso kemo mmɔ ebi.”
66002008	Na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Nweni te Smirna baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa ɔtu anii Ami Yesu ndi Udeedi ku Ukplodi. Na líkpi, nsu lɛ́sɔ lɛ́ta líbo nli ngba. Na ami mɔɔsu kenye kamɛni.
66002009	Ngyi ka biibó abi na bɛɛyaki ala. Nsu geen ni, bibo ala ƒui. Ngyi enyekpi ani na bekyuli bani mɔɔlɔ lɛlɔ banii Yudaƒuɔ básu básiku-mii lɛlɔ. Nsu ni, baaasiaku Katɔti. Mmomu badi kasala kani ndi Satan badi.
66002010	Bitayia lɛbibo biala lɛni mebo-mii lɛlɔ. Bise atu na binu! Ukisine ɔmmɔ ɔdubo bina akɔ badi bukpoku bɔnu na ɔya na bakya-mii ɔtɔ na bekpoku-mii emeyi leevu. Ɔlɛka bɛbla ala ulu lɛlɔ bite-mi si ina úbo úte ka bikpi muedi. Na ami ndubuti ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii lɛƒɔ-mii kayu.
66002011	Si bibo atu ni, na binu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ. Anwu ɔni madi ekpidi lɛlɔ ni, uleduo kukpi kunyɔdi ɔgbankpi kemo.”
66002012	Na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Nweni ɔku te Pergamo baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa ɔtu anii Ami Yesu mbo kewii kani bádɔ-ka lɛvi inyɔ mmɔ. Na ami mɔɔsu kenye kamɛni.
66002013	Ngyi ka ɔma ɔni na bilie ndi likpo lɛni na Satan úse nwuna lɛga kadikɔ. Bɛ́siaku-mi kama kpakplaa. Na bítedie bina bɔƒɔtaadi atu na mina lɛlɔ ina uwi ɔni na bádu Antipa ɔni lɛnɔ nédie-mi litemi kenye ulu lɛlɔ na likpo lɛni na Satan ulie mmɔ.
66002014	Nsu alakpa alɛɛ adi ábala-mii. Bibo bekyuli badi na bina akɔ mmɔ bani mɔɔsiaku Bileam ala bɔtina kama. Ukyuli ɔmɛni nátina Balak kalɛ na ɔtɔlɔ Israelƒuɔ. Na ɔ́kpanku-ma útákya likpidi kemo. Baadi adila ani na béti bákpa béte baƒiɔ, na bábla lɛyalɛ ala.
66002015	Lɛni kani bibo bekyuli badi na mmɔ bani mɔɔsiaku Nikolatia ala bɔtina kama.
66002016	Binwini kama bɛkya bina ekpidi! Na si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, ami ndubo-mii kudɔ uwi klukui ku litemi geen lɛni mɔɔtu aani kewii kani mɔɔlɛ́-mi kenye na mbekpoku bekyuli bani nsiaku ala bɔtina bɔmmɔ kama.
66002017	Si bibo atu ni, na binu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ. Anwu ɔni madi ekpidi lɛlɔ ni, ndubo-nwu adila ani na Katɔti ɔ́bala úse adi bute. Na ndubute-nwu lɛtabi lɛƒualadi lɛdi lɛnɔ lɛni lɛlɔ na bénweni lɛnyi lɛwɔdi básia lɛni na ukyuli ɔmmɔ kani ndubɔti-ni.”
66002018	“Nweni ɔku te Tiatira baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa ɔtu anii Ami Yesu ndi Katɔti Ubidi. Na mina anumi aada aani ogya na mina lɛgba liikeye aani lɛbuala lɛni bákya ogya na lígyie. Ami mɔɔsu kenye kamɛni.
66002019	Ngyi lɛla lɛni na bɛɛbla. Na ngyi kalɛ na bɛɛyɔ́-mi na bɛɛƒɔ́-mi taadi ku kalɛ na bɛɛbla-mi kabla na binye lɛbibo kenye kpakplaa. Na ngyi ka kabla kabuni kani bɛɛbla ɔƒɛni ketulo kalɛ na bítaabla kudeedi.
66002020	Nsu bɔƒiɔ bɔni muudie-mii ndi ka biite uleku Isebel ɔni mɔɔlɔ lɛlɔ ɔnii Katɔti kenye udiene kuƒi. Nsu uleku ɔmmɔ ala ani na ɔɔtina aayá na mina kabla bablane bayii ulu na baabla lɛyalɛ ala, na baadi adila ani na béti bákpa béte baƒiɔ.
66002021	Líte-nwu uwi ɔni na uti ɔvumana na ɔda ekpidi bɔbla ɔya, nsu ulenu kalɔ.
66002022	Anwuɔsu ndubɔya na ɔlɛ ubo-nwu ɔva lɛtala lɛlɔ. Na bani na anwu ku-ma badi kɔsɔnɔ badububo abi geen, amu ntu bada-nwu kama bɔsiaku báya.
66002023	Lɛnɔ ni, ndubo uleku ɔmɛni basɔnɔbi ƒui bɔdu. Na mmɔ ni, baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa lɛmmɔ ƒui badubɔti ka ami ndi ukyuli ɔni ngyi ukyuli biala kayi ku lili kemo. Ndubo bina akɔ ɔdi biala kayu bɔƒɔ na lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla kenye.
66002024	Nsu amii bakladi bani nkya Tiatira na bɛɛɛsiaku nwuna ala bɔtina kama na bítatɛya Satan ala abɛdi ani baasu ka ana kemo ágyu mmɔ ni, mɔɔsu-mii ka nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo etila abambadi adi buti bɔsia-mii lɛlɔ.
66002025	Nsu biƒie bɔƒɔtaadi bɔni na bibo bɛda kpakplaa úti útédu uwi ɔni na mebo.
66002026	-
66002027	Na ukyuli ɔni madi ekpidi lɛlɔ na wenye kpakplaa wetédu kawɔlɔkɔ ni, ndubute-nwu ɔyikun aani kalɛ na lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́siku mina Ɔti kudɔ na ɔdubɔdi kadi ƒui lɛlɔ. Bénweni bése banii, 'Ɔdubɔdi-ma lɛlɔ ku ɔyikun kpakplaa na ɔbwɛ-ma uwi kalɔ kpɛtɛ kpɛtɛ aani ebwi kalɛ.'
66002028	Ndubute-nwu bukeye aani ɔtanta lɛyabi lɛnɔ.
66002029	Si bibo atu ni, na binu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ.”
66003001	Ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Nweni te Sardi baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa ɔtu anii Lɛni na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔdi ayu maatɛ ani mɔɔbla Katɔti kabla na nwuna lɛga boku anumi lɛlɔ na ɔda ayabi maatɛ ammɔ na nwuna kɔdianu ɔɔsu.
66003002	Ngyi kalɛ na bɛɛbla bina kabla, na ngyi lɛnɔ ka bekyuli baanu-mii ka bili ngba, nsu bíkpi na kɔyu kemo! Anwuɔsu bɛgyinya na bɛkya lɛla lɛni nébu lise-mii ogya kalɛ na bilekpi ƒui! Ɔsika lɛ́nu ka lɛla lɛni na bɛɛbla ni, lítedu tɔ lítawɔlɔ na Katɔti anumi.
66003003	Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, binyimo lɛla lɛni na bátina-mii na bínu lɛnɔ, na bɛda-ni kaduɛ na bina ekpidi eduo-mii na binwini kama bɛkya-nya. Nsu si bítagyinya ni, ndubo-mii kudɔ aani uyune kalɛ na biláti uwi ɔni kemo na meti mada malɛ-ɔ lɛlɔ.
66003004	Nsu bibo nkyuli ɛlɛɛ badi na Sardi mmɔ bani nétebile bana adala. Na ami ku-ma bɔdubɔda ala aƒualadi na bɔkɛ butaavi, ɔsika bámanku ka babla lɛni.
66003005	Ukyuli ɔni madi ekpidi lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubɔda ala aƒuala aani bana kalɛ. Na lɛɛɛdubo-ma anyi bɔda budie ngba ɔku kemo. Na ndubudie-ma kenye na mina Ɔti ku Katɔti batu ƒui anumi ka badi ami badi.
66003006	Si bibo atu ni, na binu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ.”
66003007	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Nweni te Ƒiladelƒia baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa ɔtu anii Lɛni na anwu ɔni nse kedee na nwuna litemi lɛdi litemi geen ɔɔsu. Anwu nda Ɔga Dawid ɔyikun ɔni na si ɔ́lɛmi kayakun kadi ni, ɔdi ɔsɔ ulakana-ka bɔkalɛ. Na si ɔ́kalɛ-ka ni, ɔdi ulakana-ka bɔlɛmi.
66003008	Ngyi kalɛ na bɛɛbla bina kabla na ngyi ka bibo ɔyikun blii ɔdi. Bɛ́siaku mina ala bɔtina kama na bɛ́di mina etemila lɛnɔ lɛlɔ ulu lɛlɔ. Lɛ́lɛmi kayakun kadi líte-mii na bina anumi na ukyuli biala ulakana-ka bɔkalɛ.
66003009	Bɛnu! Ɔkɔ banyine bani násala bewi Satan ku nwuna badi kasalakɔ ngye na baalɔ-ma Yudaƒuɔ nsu baaadi Yudaƒuɔ ni, ndubɔya na balɛ akɔnkɔ na ƒula lɛgba akɔ. Na bana ƒui badubɔsu banii mɔɔyɔ́-ɔ.
66003010	Na ka bɛ́di mina ɔda ɔni na líbo-mii lɛlɔ na bínye kpakplaa na bɛ́siaku ala ani ƒui muukpóku-mii ɔsu ni, ndubɔda-mii lidie lɛbibo lɛni mebo kayawi ƒui lɛlɔ na lɛkɔku bekyuli bani ƒui nlie kalɔ lɛlɔ lɛnu kemo.
66003011	Ndubo uwi klukui kemo. Anwuɔsu bɛda lɛla lɛni nse-mii kaduɛ kalɛ na ukyuli ɔdi uláƒɔ bina lɛyuƒɔla ulásiku-mii enu kemo.
66003012	Ndubo ukyuli ɔni madi lɛlɔ bɔbla aani lɛkpa na mina Katɔti kakpakɔ ɔni na lɛsɔ lilágyu mmɔ kudii. Ndubo mina Katɔti lɛnyi ku nwuna ɔma kedee ɔmmɔ lɛnyi bunweni bɔsia-nwu lɛlɔ. Na ɔdi Yerusalem ɔwɔdi ɔni mayu masi katɔ na Katɔti kudɔ. Na ndubo ami ɔlati lɛnyi lɛwɔdi lɛnɔ bunweni bɔsia-nwu lɛlɔ.
66003013	Si bibo atu ni, na binu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ.”
66003014	Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Nweni te Laodikea baƒɔtaadine ɔtu anii Lɛni na anwu ɔni mɔɔyá na lɛla biala lɛɛsia lɛni ɔɔsu. Na ɔdi Katɔti kenye udiene geen ɔni mɔɔbla ala ulu lɛlɔ, na anwu mɔɔdi Katɔti ala ani ƒui na údie lɛlɔ.
66003015	Ngyi lɛla lɛni na bɛ́bla na ngyi ka bítaba na bítaƒɔ ogya lɛnɔ. Nsu nka mɔɔyɔ́ si bɛ́ƒuna linwi.
66003016	Nsu ka buse kani na bise guguugu na bítaba iye bítaƒɔ ogya lɛnɔ ɔsu ni, ndubo-mii butuo bɔlɛku mina kenye kemo!
66003017	Bɛɛsu bɛnii, 'Mbo ala na ɔdianku-mi, na mbo ala ani ƒui na mɔɔwia.' Nsu bɛɛɛgyi bɛnii biisé lɛlɔ na bina lɛlɔ libo kɔnyana, na biiibo lɛla lɛdi, na anumi ábwɛ-mii, na bɛkɛ kasɔngya.
66003018	Anwuɔsu mɔɔlɛ-mii kpakplaa nnii bibo na bibeye sika ugyiedi ɔni bábla kede kede na ogya kemo na mina kudɔ na binwini balakɛne. Na bibeye adiƒuala ani na binyimi na bekyuli basɔ balanu bina kasɔngya ku kɔƒa. Na biye kuvo bɛkya anumi na bitaanu kaduɛ.
66003019	Bekyuli bani na mɔɔyɔ́ ni, ama na mɔɔdɔnku na mɔɔní-ma kɔtu. Anwuɔsu bɛsia lɛlɔ anu kpakplaa na binwini kama bɛkya bina ekpidi.
66003020	Binu! Nnye kayakun muubó kɔnu. Na si ukyuli ɔdi únu-mi lɛdi na ɔ́lɛmi úte-mi ni, ndubuduo-nwu kudɔ na ami ku-nwu bɔsala bɔdi.
66003021	Anwu ɔni madi ekpidi lɛlɔ ni, ndubute-nwu kuƒi na ulie-mi kudɔ na lɛgaboku lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na lɛ́di lɛlɔ na nli mina Ɔti kudɔ na lɛgaboku lɛlɔ.
66003022	Si bibo atu ni, na binu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ.”
66004001	Ɔmɛni kama ni, Katɔti údie kɔyu kemo ala adi ɔ́tina-mi. Na lɛ́nu kayakun kadi ka bálɛmi-ka na katɔ. Amu na lɛdi lɛni na lɛ́ka bunu aani kakpɛɛ ni, línu ka lɛsɔ lɛɛtɛmiku-mi lɛnini, “Bo katɔ kakɛ mɛni na lɛtina-a lɛla lɛni ndubo bɔlɛ na ɔmɛni kama.”
66004002	Kɔnakunwi ni, Kɔyu kɔmmɔ kúti-mi kɔ́kɔliku katɔ. Ka mɔɔnu ni, lɛgaboku lɛdi lise na Katɔti ulie liboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.
66004003	Na uukeye kede kede! Na bukeye bɔmmɔ buse aani aseebi egyiedi ku aƒualadi ani náƒɔ kuye. Na bukeye bonwu bɔdi bɔ́ka bɔ́mana lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ ƒui aani evete awɔdi bukeye.
66004004	Na agaboku aavlanyɔ-ene áka ámana lɛgaboku lɛmɛni. Na benengu aavlanyɔ-ine lɛnɔ belie-nya lɛlɔ. Na bebi adiƒuala lɛlɔ, na sika ugyiedi kɔgabwa kubi-ma eli.
66004005	Na ogya ɔɔbwɛ ku bukeye geen taasi lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ kudɔ! Na muunú adi adi ku ɔnantu budu kɔku na mmɔ. Na lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ anumi ni, lɛsogya maatɛ lɛɛda. Na ani ndi Katɔti Kɔyu kɔni mbo ɔyikun maatɛ ɔni nnye Katɔti lɛgaboku anumi.
66004006	Na kesii kani na lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɛ anumi ni, ɔdi kalɔ kani nwi aani ɛpu na use kede kede aani kanu. Na lɛgaboku lɛmɛni amadɔ ni, ngba batu ine badi udu benye lɛƒɛnyi lɛna ƒui. Na anumi áka ámana-ma lɛlɔ lɛtɔtɔ ku kama ƒui.
66004007	Ngba ɔtu udeedi ɔ́lɛ gyata. Na unyɔdi ɔ́lɛ akɔ. Na ɔtɛdi ɔ́lɛ ukyuli. Na unedi ɔ́lɛ kɔdigbo aasɛ ɔni muuveyi.
66004008	Na ngba batu ine bamɛni ƒui bebo avwi aku aku, na anumi akya avwi amɛni kemo ku kama. Usien ku ɔƒɛ ni, baláda bɔsu taaya banini, “Kedee, kedee, kedee ndi Blɔti ɔni mbo ɔyikun ƒui, ɔni nélie, na uli, na ɔdubo bulie.”
66004009	Ngba batu bammɔ beeti bumwi ku ɔbu ku linugya teete anwu ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ na uli ngba úsela ƒui. Na uwi biala na baabla lɛni ni,
66004010	benengu aavlanyɔ-ine bammɔ beebimi bana kɔgabwa taava-nwu anumi, na baayu teebi kalɔ. Na beemwi anwu ɔni nli ngba úsela ƒui, na baasu banini,
66004011	“Blɔti ku bula Katɔti! Awɔ námanku éte bumwi ku ɔbu ku ɔyikun. Ɔsika awɔ nédie ala ani ƒui, na áya na ana ƒui eli ngba na ƒula lɛƒɔyɔ kenye.”
66005001	Amu na lɛ́nu ka anwu ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔda kakunkɛ kadi na nwuna kɔdianu, na bénweni ala ani ndubo abalɛ básia-ka anumi ku kama. Na báƒɛ-ka, na béti kɔma bábala-nwu kenye ekpo maatɛ kalɛ na ukyuli keeke ulakana bubimi.
66005002	Mmɔ ni, lɛ́nu Katɔti ɔtu ɔyikune ɔdi ɔni násu ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Ɔma námanku ka ɔmami kɔma kɔmɛni na ɔƒɛnimi kakunkɛ kammɔ?”
66005003	Nsu ukyuli ɔdi uuubo katɔ iye kalɔ lɛlɔ iye kekpine muedi ɔni makana kakunkɛ kamɛni bɔƒɛnimi na wanu ɔku ɔmmɔ kemo.
66005004	Mmɔ ni, líwulo geen ɔsika bátakana ukyuli ɔdi bɔkɛ na ɔkana ɔku ɔmɛni bɔƒɛnimi bɔka.
66005005	Amu na benengu bammɔ akɔ unwi ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Sɔ tewulo. Nu! Yesu ɔni baalɔ banii Gyata ɔni nási Yuda kaba kemo na ɔdi Dawid Kugyii Ugyiitu ni, ɔ́di lɛlɔ. Anwu námanku ka ɔƒɛnimi kɔma kɔni na béti bábala ekpo maatɛ ammɔ.”
66005006	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛ́nu ka Katɔti Koƒonu Ubi ɔdi unye agaboku ammɔ lɛlɔ. Na ngba batu ine bammɔ ku benengu aavlanyɔ-ine bammɔ báka bámana-nwu. Na ɔɔtina aani si bɔkpa na béti-nwu bákpa. Ese maatɛ alɛ Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ lili, na ubo anumi maatɛ. Na alakpa maatɛ amɛni adi Katɔti Kɔyu kɔni mbo ɔyikun maatɛ kɔni na Katɔti ɔ́tala ɔ́kya kayawi ƒui.
66005007	Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ úsie na útáƒɔ kakunkɛ kammɔ ɔ́siku anwu ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ kɔnu kemo.
66005008	Na uwi ɔni na Koƒonu Ubi ɔmɛni ɔɔƒɔ́ kakunkɛ kamɛni ni, ngba batu ine bammɔ ku benengu aavlanyɔ-ine bammɔ báyu bébi kalɔ na Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ anumi. Ɔdi biala ɔda agyala ani béti kɔbuli bábla na baagyá taatu lɛnu. Na ɔdi biala ɔda sika ugyiedi kɔlaku kɔni néyi ku oloƒui. Na oloƒui ɔmɛni unye ute Katɔti bekyuli katɔ bɔkpali.
66005009	Bédie ɔnu ɔwɔdi ɔdi banini, “Awɔ námanku ka aƒɔ kakunkɛ kammɔ na amami kɔma kɔmmɔ. Ɔsika awɔ na bádu. Na ɔkɛnku ƒula ubugya akpala ɔsu ni, áƒɔ bekyuli lili kayu, na ásɔku-ma éte Katɔti. Awɔ náƒɔ-ma ásiku kadi ƒui bekyuli ku adi lidu biala batɛmine ku bekyuli lidu ƒui akɔ na kalɔ biala lɛlɔ.
66005010	Awɔ nábla-ma bénwini baga ku bakpane bani mɔɔkpanku bekyuli teeboku bula Katɔti. Na badubɔdi lɛga na kalɔ lɛlɔ.”
66005011	Ka lɛ́sɔ lɛ́nu ni, lɛ́nu katɔ batu mpimu ɛlɛ ɛlɛ ku mpimu leevu akpa leevu alɛ alɛ ka bénye bámana lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ ku ngba batu ine ku benengu bammɔ.
66005012	Na katɔ batu bamɛni bédie ɔnu ku lɛdi momoomo banini, “Awɔ ndi Koƒonu Ubi ɔni na béti bákpa. Na ámanku éte ɔyikun ku lɛlakɛ ku lɛnunda ku ɔlɔkplu ku ɔbu ku bumwi ku linugya.”
66005013	Na línu ka ala ani ƒui na Katɔti údie na katɔ ku kalɔ ku kekpine ku ɛpu ku kayawi beedie ɔnu banini, “Linugya ku ɔbu ku bumwi ku ɔyikun na beete anwu ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛlɔ ku Koƒonu Ubi ka ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ƒui.”
66005014	Amu na ngba batu ine bammɔ bédie kenye banini, “Ɔsia lɛni.” Na benengu bammɔ báyu bébi kalɔ na beemwi-nwu.
66006001	Amu na lɛ́nu ka Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́mami kɔma kɔni nda kakunkɛ kani mɔɔtina ala ani ndubo abalɛ mmɔ ekpo maatɛ ammɔ akɔ unwi. Na línu ka ngba batu bammɔ akɔ unwi ɔ́su ku lɛdi momoomo lɛni náku aani ɔnantu budu ɔnini, “Bo!”
66006002	Na lɛ́nu ɔpɔnkɔ ɔƒualadi ɔdi ka unye. Ukyuli ɔni nlie ɔpɔnkɔ ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔ́da kantaminta na béti kagabwa kadi béte-nwu. Ukyuli ɔmɛni ulie ɔpɔnkɔ ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ aani ukpone lɛlɔ ɔdine ɔni nésela utádi lɛlɔ.
66006003	Na ɔmmɔ kama ni, Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́mami kɔma likpo linyɔdi na línu ka ngba batu bammɔ akɔ unyɔdi ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bo!”
66006004	Mmɔ na ɔpɔnkɔ ɔbambadi ɔni négyie aani ogya kalɛ ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ. Na Katɔti úti ɔyikun úte ukyuli ɔni nlie ɔpɔnkɔ ɔmɛni lɛlɔ ɔnii uti kekpo uboku kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui kalɛ na bekyuli badu lɛlɔ. Na úte-nwu kewii bonwu kadi.
66006005	Ɔmɛni kama ni, Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́mami kɔma likpo lɛtɛdi. Mmɔ ni, línu ka ngba batu bammɔ akɔ ɔtɛdi ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bo!” Na ka mɔɔnu ni, lɛ́nu ɔpɔnkɔ totonto ɔdi ka unye. Na ukyuli ɔni nlie ɔpɔnkɔ ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔda kakpagyuɛ kani na baakɔ́ku ala unu taanu.
66006006	Línu ka kɔku kɔdi kɔ́si ngba batu ine bammɔ kudɔ aani ukyuli butemi, na lɛdi lɛmmɔ lɛ́su lɛnini, “Ya na kamu kalaku kenwi kuye kɔkɔ kutédu limeyi lɛyuƒɔla, na antabi kɔlaku ɛtɛ kuye lɛnɔ kɔkɔ kutédu limeyi lɛyuƒɔla. Nsu tavumana inɔ iye ntɛ bɔmmɔ kuye!”
66006007	Amu na Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́mami kɔma likpo linedi. Na línu ka ngba batu bammɔ akɔ unedi ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bo!”
66006008	Na mmɔ ni, lɛ́nu ka ɔpɔnkɔ ƒuƒuu ɔdi unye aani ɔlɛne. Na básia ukyuli ɔni nlie-nwu lɛlɔ lɛnyi banii Kukpi. Na ukyuli bamba ɔkpɛ-nwu kama ɔni baalɔ Kekpine. Béte-ma ɔyikun ka badu kalɔ lɛkpa linedi bekyuli ƒui. Na kekpo ku kɔka ku ɔlɛ ku beƒiebuo ndubɔdu-ma.
66006009	Amu na Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́mami likpo lɛlɔndi. Na lɛ́nu ayu adi na katɔ ka enye lɛbi lɛni lɛlɔ na baakpá mmɔ kalɔ. Badi bekyuli bani ƒui na bádu ayu ka básu Katɔti litemi buni ɔsu. Ama ndi bani nédie ala ammɔ kenye na ulu lɛlɔ.
66006010	Ayu amɛni áva ku lɛdi momoomo anini, “Blɔti, ala ƒui lɛlɔ ɔdine, awɔ nse kedee na ƒula etemila lɛnɔ adi litemi geen. Uwi ɛlɛ sɔɔn na adubunye etédu asa na bekyuli bani nádu-bu na kalɔ kamɛni lɛlɔ ni, atɛku-ma litemi na ani-ma kɔtu?”
66006011	Mmɔ na úte bekyuli bamɛni ɔdi biala awu ɔƒualadi, na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii bakɛ kayi betédu uwi ɔni na kayawi bekyuli bádu bana kabla bablane bakpana bammɔ aani kalɛ na bádu ama lɛnɔ. Ɔsika bana bumomo bútedu bútawɔlɔ tɔ.
66006012	Ɔmɛni kama ni, lɛ́nu ka Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́mami kɔma likpo lɛkundi. Na kayawi kemodi kákunku kpakplaa, na ɔƒɛ ɔ́da bukeye ɔ́ya, na ala ƒui ábla suu. Na kɔbuli kumodi kɔmmɔ kɔ́vumana kɔ́bla aani ubugya.
66006013	Ayabi ánu ébo kalɔ aani kalɛ na kugyii ebi aanú na ɔƒɛƒɛɛ kpakplaa kemo.
66006014	Kayaa káyii aani kalɛ na baaƒɛ ebuo ɔku. Na bágyu abi ku ntuntɛ kalɔ ƒui na ana kenyekɔ.
66006015	Amu na kalɔ lɛlɔ baga ƒui ku bekyuli bani mbo kenyekɔ ku bekpone batɔnkune ku balakɛne ku bayikune ku bekyuli bamba lidu ƒui bani mɔɔbla bekyuli bamba kabla ku bani mɔɔbla ama alati kabla ƒui bábala lɛlɔ na libu ku atakpɛ kalɔ na abi lɛlɔ.
66006016	Bákpali abi ku atakpɛ ammɔ banii, “Bibo na bibebi-bu lɛlɔ na bɛbala-bu kalɛ na anwu ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ulanu-bu, na Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ uláni-bu kɔtu!
66006017	Ɔsika Katɔti ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ kɔnyi kpakplaa limeyi lídu! Na ɔma makana kɔnyi kɔmmɔ kenye bunye?”
66007001	Na ɔmɛni kama ni, lɛ́nu Katɔti batu ine badi ka benye kayawi ekpo ene ammɔ. Na bada ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ɔni muukpó taasi ekpo ene ammɔ ƒui kenye, kalɛ na ɔƒɛƒɛɛ biala ulékpo na kalɔ lɛlɔ iye ɛpu anumi iye na egyii akɔ.
66007002	Katɔti úte-ma ɔyikun ka babla kalɔ ku ɛpu kalala na beti bani bekyuli kɔtu. Nsu lɛ́nu Katɔti ɔtu ɔbambadi ɔdi ka ɔ́si ɔƒɛ katukɔ ɔdubo na ɔda lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔni nli ngba ɔdubuti use bekyuli likpo. Na ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́kpali batu ine ku lɛdi momoomo,
66007003	na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bitabla kalɔ iye ɛpu iye egyii adi kalala weti wetédu lebo lɛni na búse Katɔti kabla bablane likpo ku likposela lɛmɛni na bana atɛntɛ.”
66007004	Na básu-mi ka bekyuli bani na béti Katɔti likposela lɛmmɔ bése-ma likpo na bana atɛntɛ bumomo bɔdubɔbla aani bekyuli mpimu eti anyɔ ku aavlene-ine. Na bekyuli bammɔ bási Israel kaba leevu-inyɔ kammɔ kemo.
66007005	Nkyuli mpimu leevu inyɔ bási Yuda kaba kemo. Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Ruben kaba kemo. Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Gad kaba kemo.
66007006	Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Aser kaba kemo. Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Naƒtali kaba kemo. Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Manase kaba kemo.
66007007	Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Simeon kaba kemo. Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Lewi kaba kemo. Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Isakar kaba kemo.
66007008	Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Sebulon kaba kemo. Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Yoseƒ kaba kemo. Na nkyuli mpimu leevu-inyɔ na bése likpo na Benyamin kaba lɛnɔ kemo.
66007009	Na ɔmɛni kama ni, lɛ́nu ka bekyuli pii badi benye mmɔ bani na ukyuli ɔdi ulakana bɔka! Bekyuli bamɛni bási kalɔ biala kemo ku kadi biala akɔ ku bekyuli lidu lidu ƒui akɔ ku adi lidu biala kemo ka bénye lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ anumi, na bákya lɛwu lɛƒualadi na bada like.
66007010	Na básu ku lɛdi momoomo banini, “Ngba bɔƒɔ bɔɔsí bula Katɔti ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛlɔ ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ kudɔ.”
66007011	Batu ƒui benye báka bámana lɛgaboku ku benengu ku ngba batu ine bani nnye mmɔ.
66007012	Na báyu bébi kalɔ na lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ anumi na beemwi Katɔti, na baasu banini, “Ɔsia lɛni! Bula Katɔti uukeye, na ubo lɛnunda ku ɔbu ku kenyekɔ ku ɔyikun, na ɔ́manku bumwi ku linugya ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ƒui! Ɔsia lɛni.”
66007013	Amu na benengu bammɔ akɔ unwi úye-mi ɔnini, “Ɔma bene ndi bekyuli bani nkya lɛwu lɛƒualadi mɛni lɛni? Na wɛ na bási?”
66007014	Amu na lɛ́su-nwu nnini, “Ati, lɛɛɛgyi-ma. Awɔ ngyi bekyuli bamɛni.” Amu na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Bekyuli bamɛni ndi bani nénye lɛbibo bonwu lɛmmɔ kenye, na bálɛ-nwu kemo. Bábla sɛɛn na Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ubugya ɔsu, aani kalɛ na baaƒɔ lɛwu na lɛɛƒuala.
66007015	Anwuɔsu na “benye Katɔti lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ anumi na baabla-nwu kabla usien ku ɔƒɛ na nwuna kakpakɔ. Ka anwu ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔkya-ma akɔ ɔsu ni, ɔdubo-ma bɔgyumana.
66007016	Na kɔka iye utukwɛ ɔsɔ uladu-ma kudii. Na ɔƒɛ iye liwulu lɛdi lɛsɔ lileƒi-ma.
66007017	Ɔsika Koƒonu Ubi ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛlɔ na mmɔ ni, anwu ndubɔda-ma aani baƒonu ɔdane buni. Na ɔdubo-ma bɔtɔnku busienku abiɔ ani kemo na ntu bɔni muute ngba buwi uwi biala. Na Katɔti lɛnɔ ɔdubo-ma imii buni.”
66008001	Lebo lɛni na Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́mami kɔma likpo maatɛdi ni, katɔ mmɔ ƒui kábla diin, na ɔdubɔbla aani ɔdɔ bubo kakɛ kemo.
66008002	Amu na lɛ́nu Katɔti batu maatɛ bani muunye Katɔti anumi, na úte-ma kɔkpɛɛ maatɛ.
66008003	Na Katɔti ɔtu ɔbambadi ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ ɔni nda sika ugyiedi libwi lɛni kemo na baakyula oloƒui, na úbenye lɛkpabi lɛmmɔ kudɔ. Béte-nwu oloƒui pii kalɛ na ɔkyula-nwu na sika ugyiedi lɛkpabi lɛni nnye lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ anumi lɛlɔ. Na oloƒui ɔmmɔ ku Katɔti bekyuli ƒui katɔ bɔkpali bɔbla akpala enwi.
66008004	Oloƒui ɔni mɔɔkywí mmɔ uyɔ ku Katɔti bekyuli bammɔ katɔ bɔkpali ƒui bɔ́kɔ búsie Katɔti kudɔ ɔ́si Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ enu kemo.
66008005	Ɔmɛni kama ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ úti oloƒui libwi lɛmmɔ na úyile-ni ku ogya ɔni na údie na lɛbi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ, na úbo éwi kalɔ lɛlɔ na kayawi. Mmɔ ni, línu ɔnantu budu kudu ku kɔku bonwu, na kayaa kaabwɛ ogya, na kalɔ kaakunku.
66008006	Amu na batu maatɛ bani nda kɔkpɛɛ maatɛ kɔmmɔ báklibi lɛlɔ kalɛ na bavwii bana kɔkpɛɛ.
66008007	Katɔti ɔtu udeedi ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ. Mmɔ kani ni, etubanke ku ogya ɔni násalaku ubugya ɔ́bwɛ úbewi kalɔ lɛlɔ na kalɔ kemodi ku egyii lɛkpa lɛtɛdi lɛ́kywi. Nsu livo ƒui lɛ́kywi.
66008008	Ɔmɛni kama ni, Katɔti ɔtu unyɔdi lɛnɔ ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ. Amu na úbo lɛla lɛni nálɛ aani kɔbi kɔni mɔɔda ku ogya útákya ɛpu kemo. Na ɛpu lɛkpa lɛtɛdi ƒui línwini ubugya.
66008009	Na ketu kemo bebweyi lɛkpa lɛtɛdi ƒui békpi. Na lɛkɔlɔ linengudi ƒui lɛkpa lɛtɛdi lɛ́kywi.
66008010	Katɔti ɔtu ɔtɛdi ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ. Amu na lɛyabi bonwu lɛdi lɛni mɔɔda aani ogya lɛ́lɛ líbo lɛ́si kayaa na lɛ́yu ntukpa ƒui lɛkpa lɛtɛdi ku abiɔ ƒui lɛlɔ.
66008011	Lɛyabi lɛmmɔ lɛnyi ndi Ɔdu Kati Kati. Ntu lɛkpa lɛtɛdi lɛmmɔ ƒui lɛ́yu ɔdu, na bekyuli pii badi békpi na ntu bɔmmɔ ɔdu ɔsu.
66008012	Amu na ɔtu unedi ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ. Na lɛla lɛdi lɛ́yila ɔƒɛ ku kɔbuli ku ayabi lɛkpa lɛtɛdi bukeye. Anwuɔsu usien ku ɔƒɛ limeyi lɛkpa lɛtɛdi lɛ́sɔ lítanu bukeye.
66008013	Amu ka nnye mɔɔnu budie bɔtina bɔmɛni ni, lɛ́nu kɔdigbo aasɛ ɔdi ɔni néveyi ɔkɛ kayaa kakaaka, na ɔ́su ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Si uwi ɔni na Katɔti batu ɛtɛ bani nébu mɛni bávwii bana kɔkpɛɛ ni, muute bekyuli bani ƒui nli kalɔ lɛlɔ bɔbwɛ, bɔbwɛ, bɔbwɛ kɔtɛ!”
66009001	Amu na Katɔti ɔtu ɔlɔndi ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ. Na lɛ́nu ɔtu ɔdi ka ɔ́nu ɔ́si katɔ aani lɛyabi úbayu kalɔ. Na Katɔti úte-nwu ɔyikun ɔni mɔɔbala kasuudikɔ ubu bonwu ɔmmɔ kenye.
66009002	Ɔtu ɔmɛni ɔ́lɛmi ubu bonwu ɔmɛni na uyɔ ɔ́lɛ ubu ɔmmɔ kemo aani uyɔ ɔni mɔɔlɛ́ taasi lɛgyavonku bonwu lɛdi kemo. Na ɔƒɛ bukeye ku kayaa kábla suu na uyɔ ɔmmɔ ɔsu.
66009003	Baalɔlɔ bani muubile edula badi báyu bási uyɔ ɔmmɔ kemo bébo kalɔ, na Katɔti úte-ma ɔyikun aani ɔni na batamlukpa bebo kalɛ.
66009004	Na ɔ́su baalɔlɔ bammɔ ka batabla livete iye livo iye kugyii kɔdi kalala ntu bekyuli bani na Katɔti útese likpo na bana atɛntɛ.
66009005	Útete baalɔlɔ bammɔ ulu ka baya na ukyuli ɔdi ukpi, nsu babla-ma kalala na bebo abi na benu ɔlɛ abuli alɔ. Na ɔlɛ bunu ɔni nkya lɛbibo lɛmɛni kemo ni, buse aani kalɛ na katamlukpa kaata.
66009006	Ɔƒɛni na abuli alɔ ammɔ kemo ni, badubo kukpi bɔwia, nsu balákɛ-ku. Badubɔwia banii beekpi, nsu kukpi kɔdubo-ma bukeli.
66009007	Baalɔlɔ bammɔ bɔnu buse aani bapɔnkɔ bani nnye kagyumana bete kekpo. Na kɔbwa kɔni nálɛ sika ugyiedi kɔgabwa kubi-ma eli. Na bana anumi álɛ bekyuli anumi.
66009008	Bana lili linwini lise gyɔlɔɔ, na bana kenye kemo anyi ese aani gyata anyi.
66009009	Na béti ala ani nse aani abuala lɛwu lɛni mɔɔgyumana kayi bákya. Na kɔku kɔni na bana avwi aabla ni, aaku aani kɛɛkɛ pii ɔni bapɔnkɔ báni béselaku kekpokɔ.
66009010	Baalɔlɔ bamɛni bebo lɛka ku akplɛ aani batamlukpa kalɛ na bana lɛka lɛmɛni kemo, na bebo ɔyikun ɔni na badubo buti bɔbla bekyuli kalala abuli alɔ.
66009011	Bebo ɔga ɔni ndi ɔtu ɔni mɔɔnu kasuudikɔ ubu bonwu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔtu ɔmmɔ lɛnyi na Hebri lɛdi kemo ndi Abadon. Na Griki lɛdi kemo ni, nwuna lɛnyi ndi Apolion ɔni kalɔ ndi Ɔkyulane.
66009012	Bɔbwɛ lɛla lideedi lɛ́vi. Na alakpa anyɔ ani ndanku bɔbwɛ inyɔ bɔni nébu ni, adubo bɔlɛ.
66009013	Amu na Katɔti ɔtu ɔkundi ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ. Na línu lɛdi lɛdi ka lɛ́si sika ugyiedi lɛbi lɛni nnye Katɔti anumi ekpo ene ammɔ lɛlɔ lɛdubo.
66009014	Lɛdi lɛmmɔ lɛ́su Katɔti ɔtu ɔkundi ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Táƒɛnimi batu ine bani na bényimi bése Euƒrate ketu bonwu kudɔ!”
66009015	Amu na báƒɛnimi batu ine bamɛni bani na bényimi-ma bése mmɔ bete ka báƒɛnimi-ma na ɔdɔ ɔmɛni lɛlɔ na limeyi lɛmɛni kemo na kɔbuli kɔmɛni kemo na lɛkwa lɛmɛni tutuutu kemo kalɛ na badu bayawine ƒui lɛkpa lɛtɛdi.
66009016	-
66009017	Ɔƒɛni na lɛla lɛni bédie bátina-mi mɛni kemo ni, lɛ́nu bekpone pii bani nlie bapɔnkɔ lɛlɔ bésela kekpokɔ. Na básu-mi bana bumomo ɔni ndi bekyuli bɔka etili eti ene. Na abuala lɛwu lɛni mɔɔgyumana-ma kayi mmɔ égyie aani ogya, na eekeye aani ɛpu ku ogya atabi. Bapɔnkɔ bammɔ eli ese aani bagyata eli, na ogya ku uyɔ ku agyakpabi aalɛ́ taasi-ma inye kemo.
66009018	Na alakpa atɛ ani ndanku kukpi na ási bapɔnkɔ bamɛni inye kemo ɔsu ni, bekyuli lɛkpa lɛtɛdi sɔɔn békpi.
66009019	Ɔsika bapɔnkɔ bammɔ ɔyikun ɔkya bana inye ku lɛka kemo. Bana lɛka libo eli aani balakpi kalɛ, na beeti taadu bekyuli.
66009020	Bekyuli bakladi bani ƒui nétekpi na alakpa atɛ ani ndanku kukpi mmɔ kemo ni, béténwini kama bátákya ala ani na ama alati béti bana enu bábla bése béte lɛlɔ ka bataakpa. Ala amɛni adanku ayu ekpidi ku bana baƒiɔ bani na béti sika ugyiedi ku ɔƒualadi bávɔ ku kalɔ kemo abuala ku atabi ku egyii ani na bánwi. Nsu ala amɛni ƒui ni, alánu na elenu na elesie muedi!
66009021	Bétenwini kayi na bana bekyuli bɔdu ku evo ala bɔbla kudɔ iye kɔsɔnɔ ala bɔbla ku kuyu kudɔ.
66010001	Amu na lɛ́nu Katɔti ɔtu ɔyikune ɔbambadi ka ɔ́si katɔ ɔɔyu. Na uyɔlɔ ɔ́ka ɔ́mana-nwu aani kɔdi, na bukeye bɔ́ka bɔ́mana-nwu lili. Nwuna anumi eekeye aani ɔƒɛ kalɛ, na nwuna lɛgba lise aani akpa ani nnye kalɔ na aada aani ogya.
66010002	Kakunkɛ blii suɛ kadi kébimi kakya-nwu kɔnu. Na úti nwuna kɔdianu ɔgba únyene ɛpu lɛlɔ, na úti kɔmiinu ɔgba únyene kalɔ lɛlɔ.
66010003	Amu na údie lɛdi momoomo aani gyata kalɛ. Na ka ɔ́va ni, kayaa kábwɛ ogya ku kɔku bonwu maatɛ!
66010004	Ka línu kɔku bonwu kɔmɛni ni, líse kalɔ nnii muunweni lɛla lɛni na línu. Nsu lɛdi lɛdi lɛ́si katɔ na lɛ́su-mi lɛnini, “Ɔlɛka abɛla lɛla lɛni na énu na kɔku bonwu kɔmmɔ kemo ese, na tenweni-nya.”
66010005	Amu na lɛ́nu ka ɔtu ɔni nnye kalɔ ku ɛpu lɛlɔ mmɔ ɔ́talaku kɔdianu kɔnu katɔ.
66010006	Na ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ Katɔti lɛnyi. Ɔ́lɔ Anwu ɔni nli ngba ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ƒui ɔni nédie katɔ ku kalɔ ku ɛpu ku ala ani nkya-nya kemo ƒui. Na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Katɔti ɔsɔ ulebile uwi!
66010007	Kabla kabɛdi kani na ɔ́su nwuna kenye bediene bani ndi nwuna kabla bablane ka kadubɔlɛ ni, kadubo kete lɛni si Katɔti ɔtu maatɛdi ɔmmɔ ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ.”
66010008	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛdi lɛni nátɛmiku-mi lɛ́si-ku katɔ mmɔ lɛ́sɔ lɛ́su-mi lɛnini, “Sie na atáƒɔ kakunkɛ kani nkya Katɔti ɔtu ɔni nnye ɛpu ku kalɔ lɛlɔ mmɔ kɔnu kemo.”
66010009	Amu na lísie ɔtu ɔmmɔ kudɔ na lɛ́su-nwu nnii uti kakunkɛ kammɔ ute-mi. Amu na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Ƒɔ, na eti-ka akun! Mɔɔsu-ɔ ka ɔdubo ɔdu bɔyu na ƒula kaƒɔ kemo, nsu ɔdubɔyu-ɔ emini aani uwɔ na ƒula kenye kemo.”
66010010	Amu na lɛ́ƒɔ kakunkɛ kammɔ, na lɛ́kun. Na ɔ́yu-mi emini na kenye kemo. Nsu ka líbweli-ka lɛ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́yu ɔdu na mina kaƒɔ kemo.
66010011	Nwuna kama ni, ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Ɔlɛka asɔ esie anumi eteedie Katɔti litemi lɛni ndanku bekyuli lidu lidu na kalɔ pii lɛlɔ ku adi lidu lidu batɛmine ku baga pii lɛlɔ ete bekyuli.”
66011001	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Katɔti úti ugyii ɔdi úte-mi ɔni nse aani lɛkɔkula. Na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Sie na atákɔku mina kakpakɔ ku lɛbi lɛni lɛlɔ na baakpá na katɔ mmɔ, na aka bekyuli bani ƒui nkya mmɔ beemwi-mi.
66011002	Nsu takɔku keyi, ɔsika béti mmɔ béte bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ. Badubo mmɔ ku ɔma ɔmmɔ ƒui lɛgba butu bɔvi abuli aavlene-anyɔ.
66011003	Ndubute mina kenye bediene inyɔ ɔyikun na beedie-mi kenye na emeyi apimu unwi ku emeyi eti alɔ ku leevu kemo. Badubunyimi adala ani mɔɔtina ka bewulo kɔnyana na bekyuli alaekpidi ɔsu.”
66011004	Ɔkya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka inɔ egyii anyɔ ku sika ugyiedi ligyii inyɔ lɛni lɛlɔ na asogya ɔsia ni, linye Kayawi Ƒui Unwoti anumi na katɔ. Na akpa anyɔ amɛni enye ete Katɔti kenye bediene inyɔ bamɛni.
66011005	Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔkplu ɔnii ɔɔbla-ma kalala ni, ogya ɔdubo bɔlɛ bɔsi bana kenye kemo na ɔkyula bekisine bammɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔwia ɔnii ɔɔbla-ma kalala ni, ulu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ kani na ɔdubɔsia ukpi.
66011006	Bebo ɔyikun ka betile ɔnantu na ɔsɔ ulana na uwi ɔni kemo na beedie Katɔti kenye mmɔ. Na bebo ɔyikun lɛnɔ na ntukpa ƒui lɛlɔ kalɛ na baya na bunwini ubugya. Na bebo ɔyikun lɛnɔ na baya na lɛlɛ lidu lidu libo kayawi ƒui lɛlɔ uwi biala na baayɔ́.
66011007	Ɔƒɛni si bédie Katɔti kenye báwɔlɔ ni, eƒiebuo ɔni nási ɔɔlɛ́ kasuudikɔ ubu bonwu ɔmmɔ kemo ɔda bukpoku-ma na ɔdi-ma lɛlɔ na ɔdu-ma lɛnɔ.
66011008	Bana ɔlɔna ɔdubɔtɛ lɛblɔnu lɛlɔ na ɔma unengudi ɔni baalɔ na lɛsugba kemo banii Egyipte iye Sodom. Mmɔ na bákana Blɔti bámana ugyii lɛlɔ.
66011009	Ama bani nási bekyuli ku kadi ku adi lidu ƒui akɔ ku kalɔ ƒui lɛlɔ ni, badubo bekyuli bamɛni ɔlɔna bɔnu emeyi atɛ ku kakɛ sɔɔn. Nsu badubuni na baláva-ma.
66011010	Na bekyuli bani nlie kalɔ lɛlɔ badubo kubiti bɔkɛ na nkyuli inyɔ bammɔ kukpi ɔsu. Badubo limeyi bɔdi na bete lɛlɔ ala, ɔsika kenye bediene inyɔ bammɔ béti lɛbibo pii béboku kayawi bekyuli lɛlɔ.
66011011	Na emeyi atɛ ku kakɛ kama ni, ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ɔni muute ngba ɔ́si Katɔti kudɔ úbo na úduo-ma lɛlɔ kemo na báta bénye. Na bani ƒui nánu-ma ni, liƒu lɛ́da-ma.
66011012	Mmɔ na kenye bediene inyɔ bammɔ bénu lɛdi bonwu lɛdi ka lɛ́si katɔ na lɛ́su-ma lɛnini, “Bibo katɔ mɛni!” Ka bana bekisine baanu ni, bákɔ bésie katɔ na uyɔlɔ kemo.
66011013	Kɔnakunwi ni, kalɔ bɔkunku kpakplaa bɔdi bɔ́lɛ na ɔma ɔmmɔ lɛkpa leevudi lɛ́bwɛ, na bekyuli mpimu maatɛ békpi. Liƒu pim líƒie bekyuli bakladi, na bákɔliku Ati ɔni nkya katɔ lɛnyi katɔ!
66011014	Bɔbwɛ lɛla linyɔdi lɛ́vi, na lɛtɛdi lɛdubo lɛmmɔ kama bɔsia uwi klukui.
66011015	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Katɔti ɔtu maatɛdi ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ. Na línu ka bekyuli pii báva na katɔ mmɔ básu banini, “Kayawi lɛga kadikɔ ƒui kénwini bula Unwoti Katɔti ku nwuna Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi kadi! Na ɔdubo lɛlɔ bɔdi ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ƒui!”
66011016	Amu na benengu aavlanyɔ-ine bani nlie Katɔti anumi na bana agaboku lɛlɔ báyu bébi kalɔ na bémwi Katɔti.
66011017	Na baasu banini, “Blɔti ɔni mbo ɔyikun ƒui, ɔni nli na úlie, bɔɔgyá-a enu, ɔsika áƒɔ ƒula ɔyikun ubendi na ése kalɔ aadi lɛlɔ!
66011018	Bekyuli bani ƒui nátaƒɔ-ɔ bátadi ni, béti kɔnyi. Anwuɔsu ƒula kɔtu bɔni kúbo-ma lɛlɔ. Ɔsika uwi údu ka atɛku bekyuli litemi. Ɔdi uwi ɔni na adubɔƒɔ kayu kabuni ete ƒula kabla bablane ku kenye bediene ku ƒula bekyuli ƒui. Na benengu ku banamu bani ƒui mɔɔbu-ɔ ni, adubɔƒɔ-ma kayu kabuni. Na adubɔkyula bekyuli bekpidi bani nádu ƒula bekyuli na kalɔ lɛlɔ!”
66011019	Amu na bálɛmi Katɔti kakpakɔ kedee, na bánu bunyimi adaka kedee ka use mmɔ. Na kayaa kábwɛ ogya ku kɔku bonwu. Na katɔ keedu taasia kama. Kalɔ kákunku, na etubanke áyu pii!
66012001	Amu na akɔla ala budie taatina bonwu adi áda álɛ kayaa. Na ɔƒɛ ɔ́ka ɔ́mana uleku ɔdi aani kɔdi kalɛ, na kɔbuli kɔkya-nwu lɛgba kalɔ. Na úbi ayabi leevu-inyɔ kagabwa kadi lili.
66012002	Ɔda kaƒɔ. Na ka uwi údu ka ɔwɔ ni, ɔ́va momoomo ka uunú ɔlɛ ɔsu.
66012003	Amu na lɛ́nu akɔla ala bɔnu bɔbambadi lɛnɔ! Liƒu kɔlakpi bonwu kɔdi négyie geen kɔ́da kɔ́lɛ kayaa. Na kubo eli maatɛ ku ese leevu. Na kagabwa kebi-ku lili biala lɛlɔ.
66012004	Na kútiku kayaa ayabi lɛkpa lɛtɛdi ƒui ku nwuna ɔka úbo úbewi kalɔ lɛlɔ. Kunye uleku ɔmmɔ lɛtɔtɔ kalɛ na kuti ubi ɔni na uleku ɔmmɔ wawɔ ɔkun si ɔ́nya ɔ́wɔ-nwu.
66012005	Na uleku ɔmmɔ ɔ́wɔ ɔnanabi ɔni madi kayawi ƒui lɛlɔ ku ɔyikun kpakplaa. Nsu Katɔti Kɔyu kúkpeli ubi ɔmmɔ kɔ́ƒɔ na kúti-nwu kúsienku Katɔti na nwuna lɛgaboku anumi.
66012006	Na uleku ɔmmɔ úkeli úsie ketele kemo likpo lɛni na Katɔti ɔ́klibi úse-nwu. Mmɔ na badubo-nwu lɛlɔ bɔnu emeyi apimu unwi eti alɔ ku leevu.
66012007	Amu na kekpo kálɛ na katɔ. Na Katɔti ɔtu unengudi ɔni ndi Mikael ɔ́tɔnku Katɔti batu bakladi na báta, na ama ku liƒu kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ ku kuna batu lɛnɔ békpo.
66012008	Nsu kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kútakana-ma kenye bunye. Anwuɔsu básɔ bátakɛ keliekɔ kadi na katɔ mmɔ.
66012009	Na bábɔku liƒu kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ béboku kalɔ. Aku ndi kɔlakpi kɔkukudi bonwu kɔni baalɔ ukisine ɔmmɔ iye Satan, na ɔɔtɔ́lɔ kayawi kemodi ƒui. Bábɔku anwu ku nwuna batu ƒui bábava kalɔ lɛlɔ mɛni.
66012010	Ɔmmɔ kama línu lɛdi bonwu lɛdi na katɔ na lɛɛsu lɛnini, “Ɔƒɛni na Katɔti ngba bɔƒɔ ku nwuna ɔyikun ku lɛgadi lɛ́da lɛ́lɛ. Na nwuna Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ kenyekɔ lɛnɔ káda kálɛ. Ɔsika bábɔku baƒɔtaadine ukisine ɔmmɔ bálɛku katɔ mmɔ. Anwu muunye bula Katɔti anumi usien ku ɔƒɛ taawia baƒɔtaadine bammɔ litemi.
66012011	Bula banwani bádi-nwu lɛlɔ ɔkɛnku Koƒonu Ubi ubugya lɛlɔ ku litemi geen lɛni kenye bédie lɛlɔ. Ɔsika bénye kagyumana ka beti bana ngba bakpa.
66012012	Anwuɔsu lɛlɔ lɛyɔ amii bani nkya katɔ mmɔ ƒui! Nsu muute kalɔ ku ɛpu ala ƒui bɔbwɛ! Ɔsika Satan ɔ́ɔda ɔ́lɛ-mii lɛlɔ. Na úti kɔnyi geen, ɔsika ɔgyi ka uwi klukui kani nébu-nwu.”
66012013	Lebo lɛni na liƒu kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kɔ́nu kɔ́ti ka bábɔku-nwu bábava kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, úse kalɔ ɔ́bi ɔ́siaku uleku ɔni náwɔ ubi ɔnanabi ɔmmɔ.
66012014	Amu na Katɔti úte uleku ɔmmɔ aasɛ bonwu avwi kalɛ na uveyi uteesie nwuna keliekɔ na ketele kemo. Mmɔ na badubo-nwu bɔgyumana akwa atɛ ku kakɛ ɔsiku kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kudɔ.
66012015	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kútuo ntu pii bɔdi bɔ́lɛku nwuna kenye kemo kalɛ na bɔgba butéƒie uleku ɔmmɔ na butiku-nwu bɔtɔlɔku.
66012016	Nsu kalɔ kébunku uleku ɔmmɔ na kébimi kenye na káni ntu bɔni nálɛ bɔ́si kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kenye kemo ƒui.
66012017	Mmɔ ni, kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kúti kɔnyi kɔ́kya uleku ɔmmɔ geen, na kɔ́gyu kɔ́tɔlɔ kúsie kútékpoku nwuna bawɔ bakladi bani muunú Katɔti litemi na beedie Yesu kenye.
66012018	Amu na kɔlakpi kukpidi kɔmmɔ kɔ́ƒɔ lɛlɔ kɔkya ɛpu kɔtu mmɔ.
66013001	Ɔmɛni kama lɛ́nu eƒiebuo ɔdi ka ɔ́lɛ ɔ́si ɛpu kemo ɔ́kɔ ɔɔlɛ́. Ubo eli maatɛ na ese leevu alɛ-nwu eli ammɔ lɛlɔ. Na lise biala lɛlɔ ni, kagabwa kebi. Na nwuna lili biala lɛlɔ ni, lɛnyi lɛdi lɛsia lɛni muudumi Katɔti.
66013002	Eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ use aani ebuoƒuala, na nwuna lɛgba lise aani kegiti lɛgba, na nwuna kenye kese aani gyata kenye. Liƒu kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kúti kuna ɔyikun kúte eƒiebuo ɔmɛni ku kuna lɛgaboku ku kenyekɔ kenengudi.
66013003	Eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ lili linwi lɛ́tina aani si ɔ́ƒɔ ɔlɛ ɔni na ɔlɛka ukpi nka. Nsu ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ɔsa. Ɔmɛni ɔ́bla kayawi bekyuli ƒui dɛye dɛye, na basiaku eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ kama.
66013004	Bekyuli bátaalɛ akɔnkɔ teete kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ, ɔsika kúte eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ kenyekɔ kenengudi. Na bátaalɛ akɔnkɔ teete eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ. Na baasu banii, “Ɔma nse aani eƒiebuo ɔmɛni? Na ɔma makana-nwu bukpoku? Ɔdi uuubo!”
66013005	Eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ɔ́kɛ ɔyikun na ɔ́di ala lɛlɔ abuli aavlene-anyɔ, na ɔ́talaku lɛlɔ katɔ, na údumi Katɔti geen.
66013006	Úse kalɔ uuwida Katɔti lɛnyi ku nwuna keliekɔ ku bekyuli bani ƒui nlie-nwu kudɔ.
66013007	Ɔ́kɛ ɔyikun ka ukpo Katɔti bekyuli na ɔdi-ma lɛlɔ. Kaba biala ku bekyuli lidu ku adi ƒui ku ama bani nási kalɔ biala lɛlɔ béduo nwuna lɛlɔ bɔdi kalɔ.
66013008	Na bekyuli bani ƒui nlie kalɔ lɛlɔ badubɔlɛ akɔnkɔ bete-nwu, ntu bekyuli bani anyi na bénweni bákya ngba ɔku kemo bése asa na Katɔti údie kayawi. Ngba ɔku ɔmmɔ ɔdi Koƒonu Ubi ɔni na béti bákpa ɔdi.
66013009	Si bibo atu ni, na binu!
66013010	Ukyuli ɔni na badubo buƒie ni, badubuƒie-nwu. Na ukyuli ɔni lɛnɔ na badubo bɔdu na ɔkɛɛ kenye lɛnɔ ni, badubo-nwu bɔdu. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, amii Katɔti bekyuli ɔlɛka binye lɛbibo biala kenye kpakplaa na bɛsiaku Blɔti ulu lɛlɔ.
66013011	Amu na lɛ́nu eƒiebuo ɔbambadi ɔni nálɛ ɔ́si kalɔ kemo. Ese anyɔ alɛ-nwu lili aani koƒonubi, nsu ɔ́talaku lɛlɔ katɔ aani liƒu kɔlakpi kɔni muuƒwii.
66013012	Únye eƒiebuo udeedi ɔmmɔ kenye útaabla nwuna kabla. Na únye kayawi kammɔ ƒui lɛlɔ beliene lɛlɔ ka balɛ akɔnkɔ bete eƒiebuo udeedi ɔni ɔlɛ nása mmɔ.
66013013	Eƒiebuo unyɔdi ɔmɛni údie akɔla ɔ́tina-ma, na ɔ́ya na ogya muedi ɔ́si katɔ úbo kalɔ lɛlɔ na ukyuli biala anumi.
66013014	Ɔ́tɔlɔ bekyuli bani ƒui nlie kalɔ lɛlɔ na nwuna akɔla bɔbla ani na ɔ́bla ɔkɛnku eƒiebuo udeedi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔsu. Ɔ́ya na bekyuli bammɔ bése baƒiɔ badi béte lɛlɔ, na bávɔ-ma na bese aani eƒiebuo udeedi ɔni náƒɔ ɔlɛ ka bébeyi-nwu ɔkɛɛ nsu ɔmua uli ngba.
66013015	Eƒiebuo unyɔdi ɔmmɔ ɔ́kɛ ɔyikun ka ɔnwuna ngba ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ɔkya eƒiebuo baƒiɔ bani na bése béte lɛlɔ mmɔ kemo kalɛ na ɔkana butemi, na ɔya na badu bekyuli bani ƒui naaadubo akɔnkɔ bɔlɛ bute-nwu.
66013016	Na eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ únye bekyuli ƒui lɛlɔ, banamu ku benengu, balakɛne ku bawabane ku bekyuli bani mɔɔbla bekyuli bamba kabla ku bani mɔɔbla ama alati kabla ka bese-ma likpo na bana kɔdianu kɔnu lɛlɔ iye bana atɛntɛ.
66013017	Ukyuli ɔdi biala ulakana na weye lɛla lɛdi wasiku ɔdi kudɔ iye uye lɛla lɛdi ute ukyuli bamba lɛnɔ si uuubo likpose lɛmmɔ. Na likpose lɛmmɔ nnye nte eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ lɛnyi iye bumomo bɔka bɔni nnye lɛnyi lɛmɛni kenye.
66013018	Ntu ebo lɛnunda asa na ala amɛni adubɔbla-a nwaa. Ukyuli ɔni makana ni, ɔwia bumomo bɔni nnye eƒiebuo ɔmɛni lɛnyi kenye kalɔ unu. Ɔsika bumomo bɔmɛni bɔdi bɔka bɔni nnye nte ukyuli lɛnyi. Na bumomo bɔmmɔ ndi 666.
66014001	Ɔmɛni kama ni, lɛ́nu na budie taatina bɔmmɔ kemo ka Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ unye Sion kɔbi lɛlɔ. Na bekyuli bani mabla aani mpimu eti anyɔ ku aavlene-ine benye mmɔ. Na bekyuli bamɛni atɛntɛ ni, bénweni Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ku Ɔti lɛnyi básia.
66014002	Amu na línu lɛdi bonwu lɛdi lɛni nse aani ntu bɔni mɔɔgbá taayu lɛtakpɛ bonwu lɛdi lɛlɔ na lɛ́sɔ lɛ́lɛ aani si katɔ muudu ku kɔku bonwu. Lɛnɔ ni, use aani ɔnu na bagyane baagyá na lɛbentaa lɛlɔ.
66014003	Na nkyuli mpimu eti anyɔ ku aavlene-ine bamɛni badi bekyuli bani na bédie básiku kayawi na bákɛ ngba bɔƒɔ. Na bana ƒui benye lɛgaboku ku Katɔti ngba batu ine bammɔ anumi ku benengu bammɔ anumi. Na béteedie ɔnu ɔwɔdi ɔni na ama lɛti pɛ kani nákana-nwu bɔtɛya.
66014004	Ama ndi bekyuli bani náda lɛlɔ sɛɛn. Na bana lɛlɔ lilese lɛlɔ na lɛsɔnɔdi ala lɛlɔ ɔsu. Ama mɔɔsiaku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ likpo biala na úsela. Ama na bédie bálɛku bayawine ƒui akɔ. Na ama ndi bekyuli bedeedi bani na béti béte Katɔti ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ.
66014005	Likpidi lɛɛɛma bekyuli bamɛni lɛlɔ, na ɔkɔ lɛla lɛdi lɛɛɛda-ma.
66014006	Ɔmmɔ kama lɛ́nu Katɔti ɔtu ɔbambadi ɔdi ka úveyi ɔɔví kayaa katɔ katɔ ku litemi buni lɛni nse nte uwi biala. Litemi lɛmmɔ lɛsa na úbo úbakɔ ute bekyuli bani nlie kayawi kamɛni lɛlɔ. Na ama ndi kalɔ biala lɛlɔ bekyuli ku kaba biala ku adi ƒui batɛmine ku bekyuli lidu ƒui.
66014007	Ɔ́su ku lɛdi bonwu ɔnini, “Bɛbu Katɔti na bɛkɔliku-nwu lɛnyi katɔ! Ɔsika nwuna uwi údu ka ɔtɛku bayawine ƒui litemi. Bimwi anwu ɔni nábla katɔ ku kalɔ ku ɛpu ku ntukpa ƒui!”
66014008	Katɔti ɔtu unyɔdi ɔsia udeedi kama na ɔɔva momoomo ɔnini, “Úbuli! Babilon bonwu ɔmmɔ úbuli geen! Kayawi bekyuli ƒui báni ɔma ɔmmɔ alaekpidi bɔbla békpi aani ntɛ. Na ɔ́tɔlɔ-ma aani kalɛ na ɔyalɛ ɔɔtɔ́lɔ bekyuli taatákya likpidi kemo.”
66014009	Katɔti ɔtu ɔbambadi ɔsia bammɔ kama na ɔɔva ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Bekyuli bani mɔɔlɛ akɔnkɔ teete eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ku nwuna baƒiɔ bani na bávɔ béte lɛlɔ ni, ama náƒɔ eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ likpose na bana lɛtɛntɛ iye kɔnu.
66014010	Ama na Katɔti ɔdubɔya na babani nwuna kɔnyi lɛbibo ɔɔƒɛɛ ku ɔdu kati kati! Ogya ku ogya atabi adubo-ma bɔkyula na Katɔti batu kedee ku Koƒonu Ubi anumi.
66014011	Na ogya ɔni mɔɔkyula-ma uyɔ ɔdubɔkɔ uteesie katɔ uwi ƒui. Na usien ku ɔƒɛ ni, bekyuli bamɛni balákɛ bɔnwuna! Ɔsika ama mɔɔlɛ akɔnkɔ teete eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ku nwuna baƒiɔ, na báƒɔ nwuna lɛnyi likpose.
66014012	“Ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔlɛka amii Katɔti bekyuli bani mɔɔdi Katɔti litemi lɛlɔ na bɛsiaku Yesu kama ulu lɛlɔ ni, binye lɛbibo kenye kpakplaa.”
66014013	Ɔmmɔ kama línu lɛdi lɛdi ka lɛ́si katɔ na lɛɛsu lɛnini, “Nweni ala amɛni. Bekyuli bani na lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ-ma ndi bani ndubukpi ka básiaku Blɔti kama ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ɔsu.” Na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔtuna kɔnini, “Ɛɛn, badubɔkɛ bɔnwuna! Na badubɔkɛ bana kabla kɔsia!”
66014014	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛ́nu uyɔlɔ ƒututuutu ɔdi. Na lɛ́nu ka ukyuli ɔni nálɛ Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ulie uyɔlɔ ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ, na sika ugyiedi kagabwa kebi-nwu lili. Na ɔda lɛsaka.
66014015	Amu na ɔtu ɔbambadi ɔ́lɛ ɔ́si kakpakɔ mmɔ na ɔ́va ku lɛdi momoomo ɔɔsu ukyuli ɔni nlie uyɔlɔ ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔnini, “Awɔ, sala Katɔti bekyuli lɛku kayawi aani kalɛ na beeti lɛsaka taanwa edula. Ɔsika uwi údu ka basala-ma bete-nwu.”
66014016	Amu na ukyuli ɔni nlie uyɔlɔ lɛlɔ mmɔ ɔ́sala-ma na kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ƒui.
66014017	Ɔmmɔ kama lɛ́sɔ lɛ́nu Katɔti ɔtu ɔbambadi ka ɔ́si Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ ɔ́yu úbo, na anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́da asɔsɔ ɔni mbo ɔbi.
66014018	Na ɔtu ɔbambadi lɛnɔ ɔ́si Katɔti lɛbi lɛmmɔ kudɔ úbo. Na anwu ndi ɔni mɔɔdi ogya lɛlɔ. Ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́va ku lɛdi momoomo na ɔ́su Katɔti ɔtu ɔni nda asɔsɔ mmɔ ɔnini, “Awɔ, sala bekyuli bekpidi lɛku kayawi aani kalɛ na beeti asɔsɔ ɔni mbo ɔbi teede egyiibi. Ɔsika uwi údu ka basala-ma.”
66014019	Anwuɔsu Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́sala bekyuli bammɔ na kayawi lɛlɔ, na úti-ma útéwi kesii kani na Katɔti ɔdubɔni-ma kɔtu aani ebi ani béte béwi ntɛ kablakɔ.
66014020	Na ɔ́ni-ma kɔtu na ɔma ɔmmɔ kabanye aani kalɛ na baamana ntu teedie ebi ammɔ kemo. Na ubugya ɔ́gba ɔ́si mmɔ, na ɔ́ƒɔ kalɛkɛ kammɔ ƒui. Na ubugya ɔmmɔ bɔgyu ɔdubudu ukyuli limɔ.
66015001	Na lɛ́sɔ lɛ́nu akɔla budie taatina bonwu bɔbambadi na katɔ bɔni nábla-mi kalɛ kadi. Lɛ́nu batu maatɛ ka bada lɛbibo maatɛ lɛni ndi lɛbibo maatɛ likplodi. Ɔsika ɔmɛni kemo na Katɔti kɔnyi kúdu kɔ́wɔlɔ.
66015002	Na lɛ́nu kalɔ kani nwi aani ɛpu na use kede kede aani kanu kani kemo na ogya ɔɔda. Na ɛpu ɔmmɔ amadɔ ni, bekyuli benye beedie lɛnu na baagyá lɛbentaa lɛni na Katɔti úte-ma. Ama nádi eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ku nwuna baƒiɔ ku bumomo bɔni nnye nte nwuna lɛnyi lɛlɔ.
66015003	Na lɛnu lɛni na beedie mmɔ ni, lɛdi Mose ɔni ndi Katɔti kabla ɔblane ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ lɛnu. Na beedie banini, “Blɔti ɔni mbo ɔyikun ƒui, ƒula ala bɔbla ébomo, na bulakana-nya kalɔ bunu. Na ƒula ablala ese siin, na ƒula etemila adi litemi geen. Awɔ ndi Uwi Ƒui Ɔga.
66015004	Ɔma makana-a anumi bunye na ulayia awɔ Blɔti, na uleti bumwi ulete ƒula lɛnyi? Ɔsika awɔ lɛti nse kedee, na kalɔ ƒui bekyuli badubo babakya-a lili kalɔ. Ɔsika bédie bátina ka aabla lɛla biala ulu siin lɛlɔ.”
66015005	Ɔmɛni kama ni, lɛ́nu ka bálɛmi kakpakɔ kedee na katɔ. Na adaka ɔni kemo na Katɔti bunyimi bɔkya ni, use mmɔ.
66015006	Na Katɔti batu maatɛ bani nda lɛbibo maatɛ bammɔ bálɛ bási Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ. Na bakya lɛwu lɛƒualadi lɛni muukeye na sika ugyiedi kɔbuli kɔ́da kɔ́mana-ma kayi.
66015007	Amu na ngba batu ine bammɔ kemo unwi úti sika ugyiedi kɔlaku kɔni na Katɔti ɔni nli ngba uwi ƒui kɔnyi kúyi úte batu maatɛ bammɔ.
66015008	Na Katɔti kakpakɔ kammɔ kemo kéyi ku uyɔ ɔni nási Katɔti ɔyikun ku bukeye kemo. Na ukyuli biala ulakana kakpakɔ kammɔ kemo buduo, amu ntu batu maatɛ bammɔ béti lɛbibo maatɛ lɛmmɔ béboku kayawi báwɔlɔ.
66016001	Amu na línu lɛdi bonwu lɛdi ka lɛɛtɛmi taasiku Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ úte batu maatɛ bammɔ ɔnini, “Bisie na bitéwilimi Katɔti kɔnyi kalaku maatɛ kammɔ biwi kayawi lɛlɔ!”
66016002	Amu na Katɔti ɔtu udeedi úsie na útéwilimi nwuna kalaku úwi kayawi lɛlɔ. Ɔmmɔ ɔ́ya na alɛbi álɛ éwi bekyuli bani mbo eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ likpose na baalɛ akɔnkɔ teete nwuna baƒiɔ mmɔ lɛlɔ.
66016003	Amu na Katɔti ɔtu unyɔdi úwilimi nwuna kalaku úwi ɛpu kemo, na ntu bɔmmɔ búnwini ubugya aani ɔni nkya ukpine. Na lɛla biala lɛni mbo ngba na lɛkya ɛpu kemo mmɔ líkpi.
66016004	Amu na ɔtu ɔtɛdi úwilimi nwuna kalaku úwi ntukpa ku abiɔ ƒui kemo na búnwini ubugya.
66016005	Amu na línu ka ɔtu ɔni mɔɔnu ntukpa lɛlɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, “Awɔ ɔni nli na élie ni, awɔ nse kedee. Ɔsika átɛ etemila amɛni ƒui na ulu siin lɛlɔ.
66016006	Bekyuli bamɛni nádu ƒula bekyuli ku kenye bediene. Anwuɔsu na éte-ma ubugya ukpidi ɔmɛni na báni. Lɛla lɛni námanku-ma na baaƒɔ́!”
66016007	Amu na línu lɛdi lɛni nási Katɔti lɛbi lɛmmɔ kudɔ ka lɛ́su lɛnini, “Blɔti ɔni mbo ɔyikun ƒui, ƒula litemi bɔtɛ buse siin, na ƒula etemila adi litemi geen.”
66016008	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔtu unedi úwilimi nwuna kalaku úwi ɔƒɛ lɛlɔ na béte kuƒi ka nwuna ogya ɔkyula bekyuli.
66016009	Na bekyuli bákywi ɔ́si ogya liwulu kpakplaa lɛmmɔ ɔsu. Na béwida Katɔti lɛnyi, ɔsika nwuna ɔyikun ɔsu na lɛbibo lɛmɛni líbo-ma lɛlɔ. Nsu ɔmɛni kama ƒui ni, bétenwini kama bátakya bana ekpidi na bemwi Katɔti.
66016010	Amu na ɔtu ɔlɔndi úwilimi lɛla lɛni nkya nwuna kalaku kemo úwi eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ lɛgaboku lɛlɔ. Na kalɔ kani lɛlɔ na eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ɔɔdi lɛga ƒui kábla suu kɔnakunwi! Na bekyuli baadu anyi na lɛbibo ɔsu.
66016011	Na bekyuli bammɔ béwida Katɔti, ɔsika bana alɛbi áya na beenú ɔlɛ geen! Nsu bátada bana alaekpidi bɔbla bátaya.
66016012	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔtu ɔkundi úwilimi lɛla lɛni nkya nwuna kalaku kemo úwi Euƒrate ketu kebendi kammɔ kemo. Na ketu kammɔ kákwi kalɛ na baga bani nási ɔƒɛ katukɔ bakɛ kavinkɔ.
66016013	Amu na lɛ́nu ayu ekpidi atɛ ani nálɛ aani bapɔtɔlɔ ka bási baalɛ́ liƒu kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kenye ku eƒiebuo udeedi ɔmmɔ kenye ku eƒiebuo unyɔdi ɔni baalɔ ɔkɔ kenye udiene kenye kemo.
66016014	Ayu ammɔ ndi ukisine ayu ekpidi ani muudie akɔla taatina. Na ayu atɛ amɛni muusié kayawi baga ƒui kudɔ kalɛ na basala lɛlɔ na bekpo Katɔti bekyuli na Katɔti ɔni ndi Ɔyikune Ƒui limeyi linengudi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.
66016015	“Binu! Ami Yesu ndubo bɔda bɔlɛ-mii lɛlɔ kɔnakunwi aani uyune kalɛ! Lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ ukyuli ɔni nnye kagyumana na ɔda adala ani mɔɔtina ka use siin uwi biala kemo, kalɛ na ulakɛ kasɔngya ku kɔƒa na kadi akɔ!”
66016016	Amu na ayu ekpidi ammɔ ásala baga bammɔ na likpo lɛni baalɔ na Hebri kemo bani Armagedon.
66016017	Amu na Katɔti ɔtu maatɛdi úwilimi lɛla lɛni nkya nwuna kalaku kemo úwi kayaa. Na lɛdi bonwu lɛdi lɛ́ku lɛ́si lɛgaboku kudɔ na Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ, na lɛɛsu lɛnini, “Ɔ́sa!”
66016018	Na kayaa kábwɛ ogya ku kɔku bonwu, na katɔ keedu taasia kama! Na kalɔ kaakunku ɔni na kalɔ bɔkunku bɔmmɔ udu bútalɛ kudii ɔ́si uwi ɔni na Katɔti údie ukyuli!
66016019	Na ɔma unengudi ɔmmɔ ɔ́bwɛ úle akpa atɛ, na lɛma linengudi lɛkladi lɛni nkya kayawi ekpo ƒui lɛ́bwɛ ƒui. Mmɔ ni, Katɔti únyimo Babilon ɔma unengudi ɔmmɔ ekpidi na ɔ́ya na ɔ́ni nwuna kɔnyi lɛbibo ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔmmɔ ƒui.
66016020	Na ntuntɛ kɔlɔ ku abi ani ƒui nkya ni, áyii ákya.
66016021	Etubanke bonwu adi aani atakpɛ áyu ási kayaa ábaƒiɛmi bekyuli, na béwida Katɔti ɔ́si ɔgbankpi ɔmɛni ɔsu.
66017001	Amu na batu maatɛ bani nda kɔlaku kɔmmɔ kemo unwi úbo-mi kudɔ na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Bo, na lɛtina-a kalɛ na badubo ɔyalɛ ɔni náƒɔ lɛnyi mmɔ kɔtu bɔni. Anwu ndi ɔma unengudi ɔni na bátu bényene ntukpa pii kudɔ.
66017002	Na kayawi baga bákya béteesie teesie ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo aani kalɛ na banana beesié ɔyalɛ kudɔ. Na ɔma ɔmmɔ ekpidi bɔbla bɔ́ƒɔ kayawi bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo aani kalɛ na baaní ntɛ teekpi.”
66017003	Ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́kpanku-mi úsienku ketele kemo na kɔyu kemo. Mmɔ na lɛ́nu uleku ɔdi ka ulie eƒiebuo ugyiedi lɛlɔ. Na bénweni anyikpi ani muudumi Katɔti ƒui básia eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Na eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ mbo eli maatɛ ku ese leevu.
66017004	Uleku ɔmmɔ unyimi adi atondi ku egyiedi na úti sika ugyiedi ku asɛɛ ku aseebi ɔ́klibi lɛlɔ. Na ɔda sika ugyiedi ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔdi ɔni kemo na ala ani na Katɔti ukisi na eesé lɛlɔ éyi tɛtɛɛtɛ ɔkɛnku nwuna lɛyalɛ ala bɔbla ɔsu.
66017005	Na nwuna lɛtɛntɛ ni, bénweni lɛsugba lɛnyi lɛdi básia. Babilon, ɔma unengudi. Bayalɛ ƒui uni ku ekisila ƒui uni.
66017006	Amu na lɛ́nu ka uleku ɔmmɔ úkpi ntɛ na Katɔti bekyuli bani ubugya na ɔ́ni ku bani na ɔ́du ɔsika benye Yesu kama kpakplaa ɔsu. Uwi ɔni na lɛ́nu-nwu ni, ɔ́bla-mi kalɛ kadi.
66017007	Amu na ɔtu ɔmmɔ úye-mi ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na ɔ́bla-a kalɛ kadi? Ndubudie lɛsugba lɛmɛni kalɔ lite-ɔ. Lɛkɛnku uleku ɔmmɔ ku eƒiebuo ɔni lɛlɔ na uleku ɔmmɔ ulie mmɔ lɛlɔ. Na eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ mbo eli maatɛ, na ese leevu alɛ eli ammɔ lɛlɔ.
66017008	Eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ni, úlie ngba dii, nsu ɔsɔ uuubo. Na ɔdubo bɔlɛ bɔsi kasuudikɔ ubu bonwu ɔmmɔ kemo, na usie na Katɔti ɔyila-nwu udu ƒui. Na bekyuli bani nli kayawi lɛlɔ na bétenweni-ma anyi bátakya ngba ɔku kemo asa na Katɔti údie kayawi ni, ɔdubo-ma bɔbla kalɛ kadi si banu eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ. Ɔsika úlie ngba dii, nsu ɔsɔ uuubo, na ɔsɔ ɔdubo bɔda bɔlɛ.
66017009	“Asa na ukyuli wenu lɛsugba lɛmɛni kalɔ ni, amu ntu ubo lɛnunda. Eƒiebuo eli maatɛ ku uleku ɔyalɛ ɔmmɔ benye bete ɔma ɔni bátu bálɛ abi maatɛ lɛlɔ. Na eli ammɔ lɛnɔ enye ete baga maatɛ badi.
66017010	Baga ɛlɔ bádi lɛga bávi, na unwi ɔmua ɔɔdi lɛga, na ɔkladi anwu útadi tɔ lɛga. Nsu si úbo ni, ɔdubo lɛga bɔdi uwi klukui ɔdi kani.
66017011	Eƒiebuo ɔni nélie ngba dii nsu ɔsɔ uuubo mmɔ ni, anwu ɔdi ɔga maanedi. Na nwuna udu use aani baga maatɛ bammɔ kalɛ, na usie na Katɔti ɔyila-nwu udu ƒui.
66017012	“Na ese leevu ani na ánu mmɔ ni, adi baga leevu bani nétese tɔ kalɔ ku lɛga bɔdi. Nsu badubo-ma kuƒi bute uwi klukui na badi lɛga ku eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ.
66017013	Baga leevu bamɛni ƒui bada kasusu kenwi, na beeti bana ɔyikun ku kenyekɔ teete eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ.
66017014	Na badubɔta na bekpoku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ. Nsu Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ku nwuna bekyuli baƒunadi ku nwuna baƒɔtaadine geen badubo-ma lɛlɔ bɔdi. Ɔsika anwu ndi Blɔti ɔni ndi Bati Ƒui Ɔti ku Baga Ƒui Ɔga.”
66017015	Amu na ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Ntukpa bɔni kudɔ na ánu ka ɔyalɛ ɔmmɔ ulie ni, anya nnye nte kalɔ ƒui bekyuli ku bani nkya kaba ku kadi ku kalɔ ku adi ƒui kemo.
66017016	Ese leevu ani nnye nte baga bani na ánu ku eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ni, badubukisi ɔyalɛ ɔmmɔ. Na badubo ala ani nse-nwu ƒui bɔƒɔ bɔsiku-nwu kudɔ na ɔsɔ ɔkɛ utaavi kasɔngya. Badubo-nwu lɛna bɔkun na bakyula lɛni nébu.
66017017	Ɔsika Katɔti úti ɔ́kya-ma kayi kemo kalɛ babla lɛla lɛni na anwu Katɔti ɔɔwia. Na bénu lɛlɔ kalɔ ka beti bana ɔyikun bete eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ na ɔdi lɛga uti utédu ka Katɔti etemila ani na ɔ́su úse ébo-nwu kemo lɛni.
66017018	Uleku ɔni na ánu mmɔ ni, anwu unye ute ɔma unengudi ɔni mbo ɔyikun na kayawi baga ƒui lɛlɔ.”
66018001	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛ́nu Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi ka ɔ́si katɔ mmɔ ɔɔyu ɔdubo kalɔ. Na ubo kenyekɔ geen, na nwuna bukeye bɔ́ƒɔ kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui.
66018002	Amu na ɔ́va ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Úbuli o-o! Babilon ɔni náƒɔ lɛnyi geen mmɔ úbuli! Na ɔ́ta únwini ayu ekpidi ƒui kabɛkɔ. Mmɔ na ayu ekpidi ku begbini ku baasɛ bani muusé lɛlɔ ƒui bakya.
66018003	Ɔsika Kayawi bekyuli ƒui báni ɔma ɔmmɔ alaekpidi bɔbla békpi aani ntɛ. Na ɔ́tɔlɔ-ma aani kalɛ na ɔyalɛ ɔɔtɔ́lɔ bekyuli taatákya likpidi kemo. Kalɔ lɛlɔ baga ƒui beesié ɔma ɔmmɔ teebo aani kalɛ na banana beesié ɔyalɛ kudɔ. Na kalɔ ƒui beyedine benengudi bénwini balakɛne ɔkɛnku bana liyedi na ɔma ɔmmɔ ɔni néyi ku akɛla ani ndanku adikpi bɔdi.”
66018004	Na línu lɛdi bamba ka lɛ́si katɔ mmɔ na lɛɛsu lɛnini, “Mina bekyuli, bɛvi bɛlɛ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo kalɛ na bilabla ekpidi ani na ɔɔbla, na ɔgbankpi ɔni mebo nwuna bekyuli lɛlɔ ulebo amii lɛnɔ lɛlɔ!
66018005	Ɔsika ɔma ɔmmɔ ekpidi éemomo na ákuku étédu katɔ, na Katɔti únyimo udunkpi ala ani ƒui na nwuna bekyuli bábla.
66018006	Amii Katɔti batu ni, bɛƒɔ-ma kayu na lɛla lɛni na bábla Katɔti kenye. Na bɛƒɔ-ma kayu kammɔ akpa anyɔ na bana ablala kenye. Ala ani na ɔma ɔmmɔ ɔ́sala aani ɔdu ala na ɔɔƒɛɛ kemo úte bekyuli na báni ni, bɛsala ɔdu ɔmmɔ akpa anyɔ na ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔmmɔ kani kemo na bite nwuna bekyuli na bani!
66018007	Na kalɛ na ɔma ɔmmɔ ɔ́kɔliku lɛlɔ katɔ na nwuna adikpi bɔdi akɛla kenye ni, bɛya na ubo abi na uwulo utédu ekpidi ammɔ kenye. Ɔsika ɔma ɔmmɔ use aani uleku ɔni násu na nwuna kayi kemo ɔnini, 'Uleku Ɔga na ndi, na nlie mina lɛgaboku lɛlɔ. Lɛɛɛdi ukpinele, na lɛɛɛdubo kɔnyana kɔdi lɛnɔ buwulo kudii!'
66018008	Anwuɔsu ɔgbankpi ɔdubuƒie-nwu ɔva limeyi linwi. Na ɔdubuduo ɔlɛ ku kɔnyana buwulo ku kɔka lɛnɔ kemo. Na ogya ɔdubo-nwu bɔkyula, ɔsika Katɔti úbomo na anwu ndubɔtɛku-nwu litemi.”
66018009	“Na kalɔ lɛlɔ baga bani muusié ɔma ɔmmɔ teebo taabla ekpidi na békeli basiaku adikpi bɔdi akɛla kama na mmɔ ni, badubo keku ku kɔnyana buwulo na ɔma ɔmmɔ lili si bánu uyɔ ka ɔɔkɔ́ katɔ uwi ɔni na ɔɔkywí.
66018010	Baga bamɛni badubunye ɔgyu kakaaka bataanu ala amɛni, ɔsika baayia ka ɔma ɔmmɔ lɛbibo lɛmmɔ udu lɛdububo-ma lɛlɔ. Na badubɔsu banini, 'Bɔbwɛ! Bɔbwɛ! Ɔma ɔni mbo ɔyikun! Babilon, ɔma bonwu ɔmmɔ! Ɔdɔ bubo unwi kemo kani ƒula kɔtu bɔni kɔ́da kɔ́lɛ-ɔ lɛlɔ!'
66018011	“Mmɔ ni, kalɔ ƒui beyedine benengudi béwulo keku ku kɔnyana, ɔsika basɔ beeebo ukyuli ɔni meye-ma ala.
66018012	Ka ala beyene basɔ beeebo ɔsu ni, bana sika ugyiedi ku ɔƒualadi ku aseebi ku asɛɛ ani náƒɔ kuye ébo kalɔ. Na bana adi abuni egyiedi ku aƒualadi ku ana lidu ébo kalɔ. Na egyii ani muunwenyi ƒɛƒɛɛ ku ala ani ƒui na béti ɔtunkpɛ bábla lɛnɔ ébo kalɔ. Lɛni kani na use ute ala ani na bábla ku egyii ani náƒɔ kuye ku abuala ani muukeye ku ani neeekeye ku atabi ani náƒɔ kuye lɛnɔ.
66018013	Na evete ani muudie inɔmii ƒɛƒɛɛ ku kutu akyala lidu lidu ku klobo ku oloƒui ku ugyulo ƒɛƒɛɛ lɛnɔ kuye kúbo kalɔ. Ntɛ ku inɔ ku ɔlaaƒɔ ku edula ebi lɛnɔ ébo kalɔ. Na balakɛ bekyuli bani na beye bana ɔmantɛ bakɔ ku baƒonu ku bapɔnkɔ ku kɛɛkɛ ɔni na bapɔnkɔ baaní ku bekyuli bani na béƒie betéye kalɛ na badubɔbla akpala lɛnɔ ƒui.
66018014	“Na básu banini, 'Babilon! Ala abuni ani ƒui na áyɔ ka akɛ ni, anya nálɛ-ɔ enu kemo mɛni. Na ƒula ebiti akɛla ku lɛkɛ ni, áyila-nya na asɔ aaadubo-nya bɔnu kudii.'
66018015	Beyedine bani mbo eyedila ani na beeti taakɛ lɛkɛ taasiku ɔma ɔmmɔ kudɔ mɛni ni, badubunye ɔgyu kakaaka na bewulo keku ku kɔnyana momoomo banini,
66018016	'Bɔbwɛ! Bɔbwɛ! Uwi ɔdi kemo ni, ɔma bonwu ɔmmɔ úyi ku adiƒuala abuni ku adi ani nse ƒuƒuu ku egyiedi. Na báklibi ɔma ɔmmɔ ku sika ugyiedi ku aseebi ku asɛɛ ani náƒɔ kuye éyi tɛtɛɛtɛ!
66018017	Nsu ɔdɔ bubo unwi kemo kani na akɛla amɛni ƒui ébie!' “Na lɛkɔlɔ libendi bakane ku bekyuli bani ngyi ketu lɛlɔ kabla kaduɛ ku bani ƒui mɔɔdi kuye na ntu anumi mmɔ bénye ɔgyu kakaaka.
66018018	Na báva momoomo uwi ɔni na bánu uyɔ ɔni mɔɔkɔ́ katɔ taasi ɔma bonwu ɔni mɔɔkywí mmɔ kemo banini, 'Ɔma bonwu ɔmani nsɔ nse aani ƒula kalɛ?'
66018019	Amu na béti enu béwi lili na béwulo kɔnyana geen na básu banini, 'Bɔbwɛ, bɔbwɛ na buute ɔma unengudi ɔmɛni. Kesii kani na bekyuli bani mbo lɛkɔlɔ bonwu na beesiénku-ni ntu anumi bákɛ bana lɛkɛ! Ɔdɔ bubo unwi kemo kani ni, lɛla biala líbie!
66018020	Amii bani nkya katɔ ƒui lɛlɔ lɛyɔ-mii. Na amii Katɔti bekyuli ƒui ku batalane ku Katɔti kenye bediene ni, lɛlɔ lɛyɔ-mii! Ɔsika Katɔti ɔ́tɛku ɔma ɔmmɔ litemi na lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla-mii ɔsu!' ”
66018021	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔyikune ɔdi úti lɛtabi lɛdi nse aani kukɔ bonwu kɔdi úbo ɔ́kya ɛpu kemo na ɔɔsu ɔnini, “Lɛni na Katɔti ɔdubo Babilon ɔma bonwu ɔmɛni bubo butáƒiɛmi kalɔ momoomo ɔni na basɔ balanu-nwu kudii.
66018022	Na ɔbentaa ku lɛnu bediene ku atoloyi ku kɔkpɛɛ bavwiine ni, basɔ belénu-ma kɔku kudii na ƒula kemo. Enu kabla ɔblane biala ɔ́sɔ ulabla nwuna kabla na ƒula kemo. Na basɔ belénu kukɔ kɔdi kɔku na ƒula kemo.
66018023	Na basɔ balanu asogya bukeye bɔdi na ƒula kemo kudii. Na basɔ belénu uleku buti lɛnu lɛdi lɛnɔ. Ƒula beyedine bani néteeti ala teebeye ni, bekyuli bánu-ma aani bekyuli benengudi ƒui na kalɔ lɛlɔ mɛni. Na ɔkɛnku ƒula evo ani na aaƒɛ teete bekyuli ɔsu ni, áya na kalɔ ƒui bekyuli báyii ulu.
66018024	Na Katɔti kenye bediene ku Katɔti bekyuli ku bekyuli bamba bani ƒui na bádu na kayawi mɛni ni, bana ubugya ɔsiaku-ɔ!”
66019001	Ɔmɛni kama ni, línu kɔku bonwu kɔdi na katɔ aani bekyuli lisu bonwu lɛdi. Na báva momoomo básu banini, “Aleluya! Ngba bɔƒɔ ku bukeye ku ɔyikun ɔdi Katɔti ɔmmɔ ɔdi.
66019002	Ɔsika nwuna litemi bɔtɛ buse siin. Na nwuna etemila adi litemi geen. Ɔma ɔni nébile kayawi ku nwuna alaekpidi bɔbla aani ɔyalɛ ni, Katɔti nátɛku-nwu litemi. Na Katɔti kabla bablane bani ubugya na béwi kalɔ ni, údie ɔma ɔmɛni bekyuli kasi na ubugya ɔmmɔ ɔsu.”
66019003	Básɔ báva básu banini, “Aleluya! Uyɔ ɔni mɔɔkɔ́ katɔ mɛni ni, utaakɔ lɛni usela ƒui.”
66019004	Na benengu aavlanyɔ-ine bammɔ ku ngba batu ine bammɔ báyu bébi kalɔ na bémwi Katɔti ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ banini, “Ɔsia lɛni! Aleluya!”
66019005	Na lɛdi lɛdi lɛ́si lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ kudɔ mmɔ na lɛɛsu lɛnini, “Bimwi bula Katɔti amii nwuna kabla bablane bani mɔɔyia-nwu, benengu ku banamu ƒui.”
66019006	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, línu kɔku bonwu aani bekyuli lisu lɛdi na ɔ́lɛ aani ntukpa pii bɔku ku katɔ budu taasia kama. Na baasu banini, “Aleluya! Ɔsika Blɔti ɔni mbo ɔyikun ƒui ni, bédie nwuna lɛga bɔdi keyi!
66019007	Bɛya na bula ƒui bɔkɛ ebiti na lɛlɔ lɛyɔ-bu na bɔkɔliku-nwu lɛnyi katɔ. Ɔsika Katɔti Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ limeyi libendi lɛmmɔ lídu aani kalɛ na beeti uleku. Na Katɔti bekyuli báaklibi lɛlɔ bése aani uleku ɔmmɔ kalɛ.
