66019008	Blɔti úte-ma kɔdi kɔbuni kɔni muukeye sɛɛn ka beti benyimi.” Na kɔdi kɔbuni kɔmmɔ ndi ala siin ani na Katɔti bekyuli bammɔ bábla.
66019009	Mmɔ na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Nweni ala amɛni. Lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ ama bani na badubɔlɔ beboku uleku ketikɔ adila kadikɔ.” Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Etemila amɛni adi Katɔti ɔlati etemila geen.”
66019010	Mmɔ ni, lɛ́yu líbi kalɔ na nwuna lɛgba akɔ na límwi-nwu aani Katɔti kalɛ. Nsu ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Tabla lɛni! Ami lɛnɔ kabla ɔblane ɔkpana na ndi aani ƒula kalɛ ku ƒula banwa bakladi bani nsiaku Blɔti Yesu ala bɔtina kama. Katɔti kani na ɔlɛka emwi lɛni. Ɔsika ala ani na Yesu ɔ́tina ni, ana kenye budie ndi Kɔyu ɔyikun ɔni nákya Katɔti kenye bediene lɛlɔ kemo.”
66019011	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛ́nu ka kayaa kálɛmi na ɔpɔnkɔ ɔƒualadi ɔdi ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ. Na ukyuli ɔni nlie-nwu lɛlɔ ni, baalɔ-nwu banii Kama Kekpokɔ ku Litemi Geen. Na ɔɔtɛ litemi siin na uukpó kekpo lɛnɔ siin.
66019012	Nwuna anumi ese aani ogya na kɔgabwa pii kubi-nwu lili. Na bénweni lɛnyi lɛdi básia-nwu lɛlɔ lɛni na ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔɔgyi ntu anwu kani.
66019013	Na ɔkya awu gyɔlɔɔ ɔni na báka bɔnyina bɔkya ubugya kemo. Na lɛnyi lɛni kani na bagyi-nwu ndi Katɔti Litemi.
66019014	Na katɔ bekpone ƒui bakya lɛwu lɛbuni lɛƒualadi lɛni nse sɛɛn, na belie bapɔnkɔ baƒualadi lɛlɔ na basiaku ukyuli ɔmmɔ kama.
66019015	Na litemi geen lɛni nse aani kewii kani bádɔ-ka lɛvi inyɔ lɛɛlɛ́-nwu kenye kani na ɔdubuti ukpo kalɔ ƒui bekyuli, na uti nwuna ɔyikun utaadi-ma lɛlɔ. Na ɔdubɔni-ma kɔtu kpakplaa ku Katɔti Ɔyikune Ƒui kɔnyi geen aani kalɛ na baaka ntu teedie ebi kemo kpakplaa na ntɛ kablakɔ.
66019016	Na bénweni lɛnyi lɛdi básia nwuna awu lɛlɔ ku nwuna libuili kakɛ banii BAGA ƑUI ƆGA KU BATI ƑUI ƆTI.
66019017	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛ́nu Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi ka unye ɔƒɛ kemo na ɔ́kpali baasɛ bani ƒui muuveyi taavi kaya ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Bibo bibasala na bɛdi Katɔti adila enengudi ani na ɔ́klibi úse-mii.
66019018	Katɔti úte-mii baga ku kekpo kenye benyene ku bayikune ku bapɔnkɔ ku bekyuli bani muulie-ma lɛlɔ. Badi benengu ku banamu ku bani mɔɔbla bekyuli bamba kabla ku bani mɔɔbla ama alati kabla. Bana ɔlɔna na úti úte-mii ka bɛduli bibweli na bimo!”
66019019	Na lɛ́nu ka eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ku kayawi baga ku bana bekpone ƒui básala ka betékpo Anwu ɔni nlie ɔpɔnkɔ ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ku nwuna bekpone.
66019020	Nsu béƒie eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ku eƒiebuo ɔni néti lɛlɔ ɔ́bla ɔkɔ kenye udiene. Anwu ndi ɔni nábla akɔla budie taatina na eƒiebuo udeedi ɔmmɔ kenye, na úti akɔla budie taatina ammɔ ɔ́tɔlɔ bekyuli bani na bése likpo ku eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ likpose na bémwi eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ baƒiɔ. Na bekpone bammɔ béti eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ku bekyuli bamɛni ƒui na bébo-ma bátákya ogya livongu lɛni nse bonwu aani ɛpu kalɛ, na ɔɔda ku ogya atabi kemo.
66019021	Na bekyuli bakladi ni, ukyuli ɔni nlie ɔpɔnkɔ lɛlɔ na kewii katu-nwu kenye mmɔ ɔ́du-ma ku kewii kammɔ, na baasɛ bammɔ báduli-ma ɔlɔna ƒui bébweli na bémo.
66020001	Amu na lɛ́nu ɔtu ɔdi ka ɔ́si katɔ ɔɔyu na ɔda kɔgba bonwu na ubo ɔyikun ɔni na uuti taabala kasuudikɔ ubu bonwu mmɔ kenye. Na úƒie liƒu kɔlakpi kɔni ndi kɔlakpi kɔkukudi kɔni baalɔ ukisine iye Satan.
66020002	Na únyimi-ku úse akwa apimu unwi.
66020003	Na úbo-nwu útákya kasuudikɔ ubu ɔmmɔ kemo, na ɔ́kalɛ na ɔ́bala ubu ɔmmɔ kenye kalɛ na ɔ́sɔ ulátɔlɔ kadi bekyuli wetédu uwi ɔni na akwa apimu unwi ɔmmɔ webo kawɔlɔkɔ. Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔlɛka baƒɛnimi-nwu kɔgba kɔmmɔ uwi klukui ɔdi.
66020004	Na ɔmɛni kama ni, lɛ́nu agaboku adi. Na bekyuli bani na Katɔti úte ɔyikun ka batɛku bekyuli litemi ni, belie-nya lɛlɔ. Na lɛ́nu bekyuli babambadi ayu. Ama ndi bani nédie Blɔti Yesu kenye na básu Katɔti litemi. Anwuɔsu kayawi bekyuli békulo-ma eli. Ama ndi bani nétemwi eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ iye eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ baƒiɔ bani bése béte lɛlɔ ka bataakpa. Na bátasia-ma nwuna likpose lɛdi na bana atɛntɛ iye enu lɛlɔ. Bekyuli bamɛni básɔ báta bébelie ngba na bádiku Kristo lɛga akwa apimu unwi.
66020005	Na ɔmɛni ndi bekpine bɔgyila kudeedi. Bekpine bakladi ama bátata bátalɛ kekpine útédu uwi ɔni na akwa apimu unwi ammɔ ása.
66020006	Lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ bekyuli kedee bani na Katɔti ɔdubɔgyila na bekpine bɔgyila kudeedi kemo. Na bekyuli bammɔ ni, kukpi kunyɔdi kɔ́sɔ kulákɛ ɔyikun na bana lɛlɔ. Mmomu badubo bakpane bunwini na bataakpanku bekyuli teete Katɔti ku Kristo. Na badubɔdiku-nwu lɛga akwa apimu unwi.
66020007	Na si uwi ɔni na akwa apimu unwi ammɔ ása ni, badubo Satan budie bɔsiku nwuna kasuudikɔ kakyakɔ mmɔ.
66020008	Na ɔdubo ubatɔlɔ kalɔ lɛlɔ bekyuli bani nkya kayawi ekpo ƒui, na baalɔ-ma na lɛsugba kemo banii Gog ku Magog. Na ɔdubɔsala-ma kalɛ na betékpo. Na bana bumomo bɔdubɔbla aani ɛpu kɔnwinimi.
66020009	Otogyi ɔmɛni ɔkɛ ɔɔví kalɔ kammɔ ƒui lɛlɔ. Na úbo úbaka ɔ́mana ɔma ɔni na Katɔti ɔɔyɔ́ na nwuna bekyuli kedee belie-nwu kemo mmɔ. Nsu ogya ɔ́si katɔ na úbo úbakyula-ma ƒui.
66020010	Na bébo ukisine ɔni nátɔlɔ-ma mmɔ bátákya lɛgyavonku bonwu lɛni mɔɔda ku ogya atabi mmɔ kemo kesii kani na eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ku ɔkɔ kenye udiene bakya, na badubo abi buteebo usien ku ɔƒɛ usela uwi ƒui.
66020011	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛ́nu lɛgaboku bonwu ƒuala ƒuala lɛdi ka Katɔti ulie-ni lɛlɔ. Na ka ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ ni, kalɔ ku katɔ ƒui káyii na asɔ alánu-ka lɛla lɛdi na kesii kadi.
66020012	Na lɛ́nu ka bekpine ƒui benye lɛgaboku lɛmɛni anumi, banamu ku benengu, na bébimi lɛku lɛdi béwi. Na básɔ bébimi ɔku ɔbambadi ɔni ndi ngba ɔku lɛnɔ béwi. Na lɛku lɛmɛni kemo na baanu taatɛku bekpine ƒui litemi ɔkɛnku ala ani na bábla na bénweni bákya lɛku lɛmmɔ kemo lɛlɔ.
66020013	Bekyuli bani ƒui nékpi ɛpu kemo bási bálɛ. Na bekpine ƒui lɛnɔ báta bálɛ kekpine ku kɔƒiɔtɔ kemo. Na Katɔti ɔ́tɛku ɔdi biala litemi ɔkɛnku ala ani na ɔ́bla lɛlɔ.
66020014	Béti kukpi ku kekpine kammɔ ƒui bébo bátákya lɛgyavonku kemo. Na ɔmɛni ndi kukpi kunyɔdi.
66020015	Na ukyuli ɔni na bétenweni-nwu lɛnyi bátakya ngba ɔku ɔmɛni kemo ni, béti-nwu bébo bákya lɛgyavonku lɛmmɔ kemo.
66021001	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛ́nu katɔ ku kalɔ kawɔdi. Ɔsika katɔ ku kalɔ kedeedi aka káyii, na ɛpu lɛnɔ ɔsɔ uuubo.
66021002	Na lɛ́nu ɔma kedee ɔni ndi Yerusalem ɔwɔdi ka ɔ́yu ɔ́si Katɔti kudɔ na kayaa ɔdubo. Na báklibi-nwu aani kalɛ na baaklibi uleku ɔni béti beete ɔgyani.
66021003	Na línu lɛdi bonwu lɛdi ɔ́si lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ kudɔ ka lɛɛsu lɛnini, “Bɛnu! Katɔti keliekɔ káyu kébo bekyuli akɔ. Ɔdubulie-ma kudɔ na ama benwini-nwu bekyuli. Na Katɔti ɔlati ɔkya-ma akɔ na ɔdi-ma Kɔti.
66021004	Na ɔdubuni-ma imii biala na bana anumi. Na kukpi kɔsɔ kulakya lɛnɔ. Na keku ku kɔnyana buwulo ku ɔlɛ bunu lɛnɔ bɔdi bɔsɔ bulakya, ɔsika ala akukudi ƒui ávi.”
66021005	Amu na anwu ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bɛnu! Lɛ́sɔku ala ƒui lɛ́bla ɔwɔdi.” Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Nweni ala amɛni se, ɔsika adi etemila ani ndi ukyuli kama kekpokɔ, na adi etemila geen.”
66021006	Na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Ɔ́sa! Ami ndi Alƒa ku Omega ɔni ndi lɛla biala kalɔ kesekɔ ku kawɔlɔkɔ. Na bani na utukwɛ ɔɔda ni, ndubute-ma ntu ƒaa na bani basiku libiɔ lɛni muute ngba ƒui kemo.
66021007	Ukyuli ɔni madi ekpidi lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubɔkɛ kadikɔ kamɛni. Na ami lɛdi-nwu Kɔti, na anwu wadi mina ubi.
66021008	Nsu bekyuli bani mbo liƒu ku bani nátaƒɔ bátadi ku bani muusé lɛlɔ ku bekyuli badune ku bayalɛ ku evo baƒɛne ku bani mɔɔkpá baƒiɔ ku ɔkɔ banyine ku bana udu ƒui ni, badubuduo lɛgyavonku lɛni mɔɔda ku ogya atabi mmɔ kemo. Na ɔmmɔ madi kukpi kunyɔdi kɔmmɔ.”
66021009	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Katɔti batu maatɛ bani náda kɔlaku maatɛ kɔni néyi ku lɛbibo kpakplaa maatɛ mmɔ akɔ unwi ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Bo, na ndubɔtina-a Katɔti bekyuli bani nse aani Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ uleku ɔni na ɔdubo buti mmɔ.”
66021010	Na útiku-mi na kɔyu kemo ɔ́tɔlɔku úsienku kɔbi bonwu kɔni nákuku lili. Na ɔ́tina-mi Yerusalem ɔma unengudi kedee ɔni náyu ɔ́si Katɔti kudɔ na kayaa ɔdubo.
66021011	Na Katɔti bukeye bɔ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ ƒui. Na uukeye aani liseebi lɛni náƒɔ kuye geen na baalɔ-ni yaspa, na lise kede kede aani kanu atabi.
66021012	Bátu kowodu kangyaa kɔdi báka bámana-nwu, na bakya-ku kɔyakun leevu-inyɔ. Na Katɔti batu leevu-inyɔ benye-ku kenye. Na bénweni Israelƒuɔ kaba leevu-inyɔ bammɔ bebi anyi básia kadi biala lɛlɔ.
66021013	Na ɔƒɛ katukɔ ni, kɔyakun ɛtɛ kɔkya. Na katɔ kakɛ ni, kɔyakun ɛtɛ kɔkya. Na kada kakɛ ni, kɔyakun ɛtɛ kɔkya. Na ɔƒɛ kanukɔ ni, kɔyakun ɛtɛ kɔkya.
66021014	Na kowodu kalɔ atabi ani bákya kowodu kɔmmɔ kalɔ ebo atabi leevu-anyɔ. Na bénweni Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ batalane anyi leevu-anyɔ básia kadi biala lɛlɔ.
66021015	Amu na ɔtu ɔni nnye mɔɔtɛmiku-mi mmɔ ni, ɔda lɛbuala lɛkɔkula lɛni béti sika ugyiedi bábla ka ɔkɔku ɔma ɔmmɔ ku kɔyakun kɔmmɔ ku awodu ammɔ.
66021016	Na ɔma ɔmmɔ ɔtɛ lɛƒɛnyi ine bɔmmɔ ƒui lɛlɔ ɔni na nwuna bune ku bɔbɛbɛ ƒui bɔdi unwi. Na ɔ́kɔku ɔma ɔmmɔ ku nwuna lɛkɔkula. Na ubo liluku bɔkɔku apimu unwi ku eti leevu. Na nwuna linene ku bɔbɛbɛ ku bɔkuku ƒui búlieku lɛlɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
66021017	Ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́kɔku kowodu kɔmmɔ butigbli, na kubo lɛgba eti ene ku leevu-ɛku aani kalɛ na bekyuli baakɔ́ku ala.
66021018	Yaspa aseebi bonwu ani náƒɔ kuye na béti bátu awodu ammɔ. Na ɔma ɔmmɔ ɔlati ɔdi sika ugyiedi na use kede kede aani kanu.
66021019	Na awodu ammɔ kalɔ atabi ani lɛlɔ na bátu awodu ammɔ basia ni, bákya-nya akya ku aseebi abuni lidu lidu ani náƒɔ kuye geen. Udeedi ɔdi liseebi lɛni baalɔ yaspa, na unyɔdi baalɔ sapir. Ɔtɛdi baalɔ yalkedon, na unedi baalɔ smardo.
66021020	Ɔlɔndi baalɔ sardonik, na ɔkundi baalɔ sardis. Maatɛdi baalɔ krisolit, na maanedi baalɔ beril. Yaalenwidi baalɔ topas, na leevudi baalɔ krisopras. Leevu-unwidi baalɔ yiakint, na leevu-unyɔdi baalɔ ametist.
66021021	Kɔyakun leevu-inyɔ kɔmmɔ kɔdi aseebi leevu-anyɔ ani náƒɔ kuye geen, na ɔdi biala ɔdi liseebi libendi linwi. Na ɔma ɔmmɔ ɔblɔnu ɔdi sika ugyiedi ɔni na akana na anu avinku-nwu kemo aani kanu.
66021022	Na ńtanu kakpakɔ kadi na ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo, ɔsika Unwoti Katɔti ɔni ndi Ɔyikune Ƒui ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ alati ndi ɔma ɔmmɔ kakpakɔ.
66021023	Na ɔma ɔmmɔ uláwia ɔƒɛ ɔdi iye kɔbuli ka ute bukeye bɔdi, ɔsika Katɔti bukeye ndi-nwu bukeye, na ɔma ɔmmɔ asogya ndi Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ.
66021024	Na bukeye bɔmɛni na kadi ƒui bekyuli badubɔnu busie. Na kalɔ lɛlɔ baga badubuti bana agala beboku ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo.
66021025	Na balakalɛ kɔyakun kɔmɛni kɔdubuwi uwi biala, ɔsika lɛdisa liiibo mmɔ.
66021026	Na kadi bekyuli ƒui badubuti bana akɛla ku ɔbu bebeduo mmɔ.
66021027	Nsu lɛla biala muusé lɛlɔ lileduo mmɔ kudii. Na bani ƒui mɔɔbla ala ani muusé lɛlɔ iye ala ani muukpó kɔƒa iye ala ani mɔɔtɔ́lɔ bekyuli ni, beleduo mmɔ. Mmomu bani anyi na bénweni bákya Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ngba ɔku kemo kani ndubuduo mmɔ.
66022001	Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔ́tina-mi ketu kani ntu muute ngba. Ketu kammɔ kaagbá taasi Katɔti ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ lɛgaboku kudɔ. Na buukeye aani kanu.
66022002	Na ketu kammɔ kaagbá taavi ɔma ɔmmɔ ɔblɔnu ntɛ. Na kana lɛvi inyɔ bɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, kugyii kɔni muute ngba kunye ku kuna ebi lidu leevu-inyɔ bɔmmɔ, na kɔɔnwu ebi ammɔ kɔbuli biala. Na kugyii kɔmmɔ evete adi kuvo kɔni na beti babwi kalɔ ƒui bekyuli.
66022003	Ewida eeebo mmɔ. Mmomu Katɔti ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ lɛgaboku lɛdubuse mmɔ na nwuna kabla bablane badubo-nwu lɛnyi buteemwi.
66022004	Badubɔnu-nwu anumi na nwuna lɛnyi lɛdubɔsia-ma atɛntɛ.
66022005	Lɛdisa lɛsɔ lilakya mmɔ. Na baláwia bukeye bɔdi taasiku asogya iye ɔƒɛ kudɔ, ɔsika Unwoti Katɔti ɔlati ndi bana bukeye na badubɔdi lɛga usela uwi ƒui.
66022006	Amu na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Etemila amɛni adi ukyuli kama kekpokɔ na adi etemila geen. Na Unwoti Katɔti ɔni muuti nwuna Kɔyu teete nwuna kenye bediene ni, anwu nátala nwuna ɔtu ɔnii ubatina nwuna kabla ɔblane ala ani ndubo abalɛ na uwi klukui kemo.”
66022007	“Bɛnu! Ami Yesu ndubo uwi klukui kemo! Na lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ ukyuli ɔni mada linyese lɛmɛni etemila ani nkya ɔku ɔmɛni kemo.”
66022008	Ami Yohane ni, ami ndi ukyuli ɔni nénu na lɛ́nu ala amɛni ƒui. Na uwi ɔni na línu na lɛ́nu-nya ni, lɛ́yu líbi kalɔ na Katɔti ɔtu ɔni nédie ala amɛni ɔ́tina-mi lɛgba akɔ na límwi-nwu aani Katɔti.
66022009	Nsu ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Tabla lɛni! Ami lɛnɔ kabla ɔblane ɔkpana na ndi aani ƒula kalɛ ku ƒula banwa kenye bediene babambadi ku bakladi bani mɔɔda etemila ani nkya ɔku ɔmɛni kemo ƒui kaduɛ. Katɔti kani na ɔlɛka emwi lɛni!”
66022010	Amu na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Teti kenye kani na Katɔti údie na ɔku ɔmɛni kemo etemila tabɛla, ɔsika uwi ɔmmɔ úude.
66022011	Ukyuli ɔni na likpidi na ɔɔyɔ́ ka utaabla ni, usie anumi utaabla likpidi. Na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔyɔ́ ka utaabla ala ani muusé lɛlɔ ni, usie anumi utaabla ala ani muusé lɛlɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla ala siin ni, usie anumi utaabla ala ulu lɛlɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni nse kedee ni, usie anumi na ɔda lɛlɔ kedee.”
66022012	“Bɛnu! Ami Yesu ndubo uwi klukui! Na ndanku lɛyuƒɔla lɛni námanku kabla biala nduboku, na mbaƒɔ ɔdi biala kayu na lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla kenye.
66022013	Ami ndi Alƒa ku Omega, Udeedi ku Ukplodi, Kalɔ Kesekɔ ku Kawɔlɔkɔ.
66022014	“Lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ bekyuli bani náklibi lɛlɔ bése aani kalɛ na baaƒɔ lɛwu sɛɛn. Ama ndubɔkɛ kuƒi ka badi kugyii kɔni muute ngba mmɔ ebi. Na badubɔsia kayakun mmɔ beduo Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo.
66022015	Na bani ndubunye ɔba kama aani bakpɛwe ni, ama ndi bekyuli bani mɔɔƒɛ evo ku bani mɔɔbla lɛyalɛ ala ku bani mɔɔdú bekyuli ku bani mɔɔkpá baƒiɔ ku bekyuli bani ƒui mɔɔyɔ́ ka batɔlɔ bekyuli na ɔkɔ bɔnyi bɔɔda-ma ɔkwɛ.
66022016	“Ami Yesu nátala mina ɔtu lɛ́kya-a nnii ubedie ala amɛni kenye ute awɔ, Yohane, kalɛ na eti asu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ ƒui. Ami ndi Kugyii Ugyiitu ɔmmɔ ɔni ndi Ɔga Dawid kaba kemo ubi. Ami ndi ɔtanta lɛyabi lɛni muukeye mmɔ.”
66022017	Katɔti Kɔyu kɔmmɔ ku Yesu bayɔne banii, “Bo!” Na ɔlɛka ukyuli biala ɔni muunú ɔmɛni lɛnɔ ɔsu ɔnii, “Bo!” Na bani ƒui na utukwɛ ɔɔda ni, bebo. Na bani ƒui mɔɔyɔ́ ni, babani ngba ntu bɔmmɔ ƒaa. Kayu kadi taƒɔ taƒɔ.
66022018	Mɔɔlɛ ukyuli biala ɔni muunú kenye kani na Katɔti údie na ɔku ɔmɛni kemo ka si úti lɛla lɛdi úbunku ala amɛni lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔya na ɔgbankpi ɔni lɛlɔ kɔtɛ na bɔ́tɛmi na ɔku ɔmɛni kemo ubo-nwu lɛlɔ.
66022019	Na si lɛla lɛdi na ɔ́da údie na kenye budie ɔku ɔmɛni kemo lɛnɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubudie ukyuli ɔmmɔ kadikɔ na ngba kugyii kɔmmɔ ebi lɛlɔ. Na ɔdubutile-nwu kuƒi ka uduo ɔma kedee ɔmmɔ kemo na katɔ.
66022020	Yesu ɔni muudie ala amɛni kenye ni, ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ɛɛn, ndubo na uwi klukui kemo!” Amu na ami lɛnɔ lɛ́tuna nnii, “Ɔsia lɛni. O Blɔti Yesu, bo!”
66022021	Muuvele nnii lɛƒɔndia lɛni nási Blɔti Yesu kudɔ lɛsiaku Katɔti bekyuli. Ɔsia lɛni.
